title: Fantastic
review: I stayed here with my husband for 7 nights as part of our honeymoon of 2 weeks in Thailand. On arrival we were greeted at the entrance with men there to take our bags, we were then shown to to reception whereby we got checked in by Tin who was very welcoming and had welcome drinks and cold towels waiting for us. He asked if it was a special occasion to which we replied and he offered a room upgrade at an additional cost then showed us the difference with pictures on an iPad. We decided to upgrade, so we were told there would be a little wait for the room to be made up, so we went to the coffee shop downstairs which was lovely and had a good selection but beware of the 10% service charge and 7% tax on top of the price shown on the menu. We finished our refreshments, then Tin appeared to say that there were two options available for our room upgrade and he suggested which one was best, so we went for that one which meant a longer wait but we were happy to wait in the reception and soak up the beauty of the hotel! Once the room was ready Tin showed us to the room and explained where everything was and then our luggage soon appeared at the door. The hotel had 3 restaurants (Thai, Italian and Japanese) all of which we tried, all were lovely and the service was great with friendly staff. Now onto the breakfast... There is so much choice!!! Which included the usual cooked breakfast (egg station, different types of sausage) Asian, Indian, a bakery section which had crepes, donuts and waffles, a beverages which has freshly prepared juices and smoothies. There is plenty of seating in the main breakfast area but we decided to sit in the adult only area which had an indoor and outdoor option. The hotel was fantastic but there is not much to do in the local area should you want to venture out. There are a few beach bars which are just a few couple of minutes walk from the hotel but they are mainly Thai cuisine should you want something else and a couple of convenience stores. There is a shuttle bus which runs from the hotel at 100 baht per person each way that goes to Khao Lak and Bang Niang which needs to be booked 2 hours before and a minimum of 2 people booked on to run. We felt it was a bit strep to charge as we have experienced a free shuttle at other from other chain of hotels with a further distance too. Overall a very memorable stay for our honeymoon, special thanks to Tin! …

title: Luxury in places but not throughout
review: Upon arrival we were upgraded to a pool access room 4003 which was very tired, although very clean and the bed was luxurious as all Marriott beds are. Following feedback we were moved to a refurbished room 2020 which was gorgeous but had a very small uncovered terrace which was not great when it rained. Positives:- Staff very helpful and polite Room spotlessly clean and luxurious beds Most public areas were immaculate 2 free drinks per day in Czar Bar (Marriott Bonvoy Members) 10% off food & beverages Free shuttle to Khao Lak Breakfast plentiful and lots of choice Beach Bar Food & Olive restaurant food good. Negatives:- Pool & Beach Area very tired No control over towels and bed reservations although most days beds were available Pool towels were bleached & unravelling Towels & rubbish not cleared quickly enough on the beach Piling going on next door which could be heard wherever you were in hotel Too much use of plastic water bottles around the hotel. We had a lovely stay, but not 5*. …

title: birthday trip
review: thanks for the upgrade to the best suite in the hotel really appreciate the birthday amenities too thank you  just a pity that the suites don't face the sea, of cos that's an architectural issue and nothing the hotel staff could do. but all in all a nice peaceful resort, great food and nice beach great jump off point for Similan and Surin

title: Fab hotel
review: Just back from a weeks stay at JW Marriott. We loved it . Arrived late in the evening and was greeted with a cool cloth and delicious refreshing cold drink. Everyone so helpful and extremely polite. Check in smooth and efficient. We had a refurbished room with pool access was great. Bathroom had a large separate shower and also a bath. All very modern. Replenished toilettes everyday and more than enough fresh towels. Every evening we had a gorgeous smelling candle lit in our bathroom which made the entire room smell divine.  The hotel was fresh and extremely clean. Cleaning all the time. Drinks and food a little prices ( to be expected in a hotel) so we are and drank on the beach in one of the many small bars. Breakfast had a massive choice 10/10, and the service was great. All in all I would definitely recommend this hotel. Location good. Ate at Pams restaurant a few times couple of minutes drive away Pam will pick up and drop off at the Marriott. …

title: Very nice but not a 5 star resort
review: Dear lorrainecbuckley,  We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  We are thrilled to hear that you found our staff helpful and polite and you had a fabulous stay throughout. We understand that many of our guests have traveled long hours to come to our resort; therefore, our staffs will try their best to make sure a smooth check in process. The infinity pool is surely our resort's pride, with it being the longest lagoon pool in South East Asia, many guests enjoy being able to float endlessly throughout our beautiful resort from your room's balcony.    I am glad that you found your rooms clean, neat and well maintained. We work very hard to keep our hotel clean and fresh, thank you for recognizing their work. Apart from this, we are all pleased to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast buffet. Our culinary team works diligently to ensure that we are offering a wide range of international food and wide selection of items for our guests’ enjoyment and they will be delighted to read such a glowing review of our offerings.  lorrainecbuckley, we would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Gorgeous Resort!
review: Stayed there for almost 2 weeks and enjoyed my time there immensely!  Staff was extremely helpful at concierge, especially the restaurants!  Will miss Laila, Honey, Paula, and so many others that made my stay a fun one!

title: Many good things but be aware of construction noise
review: Dear Rjbarthol,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak your preferred choice during your vacation to Khao Lak. We appreciate you taking time to share your comments with fellow travelers on TripAdvisor.   It is a pleasure to read your comments regarding your recent stay at the paradise in Khao Lak at JW Marriott. We are happy you found your stay enjoyable and our staff friendly and helpful; they are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services.  Rjbarthol, thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the future!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager  Yours Sincerely,

title: A lovely hotel - extremely expensive
review: There are a lot of good things to mention, especially the great staff. I will wire a detailed review later. But what really bothers me is the noise from the construction next door. I came to Khao Lak to enjoy an unspoiled beach and now I‘m looking at a construction area right at the beach and have to listen to loud construction work. It varies, sometimes no noise, sometimes loud construction work. Mid November there was no noise at all but since 6 days everday, I would say at least 4-5 hours a day. Not very relaxing.

title: Wonderful
review: Dear cespina,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for your constructive review. We are so pleased that you chose to stay at our resort and we are delighted to know that our staff has made such a great impact on your stay.  I am sorry to hear that some of your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies. With regards to the build next door that is currently underway adjacent to the wing1, we have reported the contractor to work away from the beach area already. We understand from the project team, this piling work will finish shortly. Please let us know if we can assist any further at tanyarat.m@marriott.com.   At JW Marriott, we strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent future occurrence.   We appreciate your sharing your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A had a fantastic stay
review: This is a beautiful hotel- we had a refurbished room with pool access which was super. The hotel itself was very clean and to top spec. For 5 stars though there were a few problems that need addressing- 1. No smart TVs so you cant access Netflix or decent tv channels- I know, I know - why do you even need a tv in paradise ??? Well... we had some rainy afternoons and a toddler and it would have been nice to be able to watch a movie 2. Beach bar - they’ve done it quite well by having an area for over 12s so people without kids can enjoy some privacy. The other area had no staff at all - no “ table service” and lots of sun loungers with old towels on so you don’t know if they are / aren’t taken 3. Pool bar bit run down 4. The price of food and drink. I’ve seen a number of comments…

title: Beautiful hotel let down by poor service
review: We loved the hotel and it’s environment. From the impressive drive up to the main entrance and the stunning lobby area to the lagoon style pool weaving through the hotel. We visited as the monsoon season started and it rained pretty much every day but despite this there was always something to do. Kids club for my son that had xboxes that i could not tear him away from. Table tennis, air hockey and table soccer were also available in a separate activities room.  The service was disappointing and no where near five star. If you expect a hotel where you will go to the pool or beach, have your sun bed set up for you with towels, parasol and water; or order a drink or food from said bed then  you will be very disappointed. Being a guest here is hard work. Staff are not intuitive to…

title: Tranquil stay!
review: Dear MaiBeebzy,  We would like to thank you for constructively reviewing our hotel on TripAdvisor and to also apologise for the inconvenience caused during your stay with us.  Firstly, we would like to thank you for your kind comment on hotel facilities and glad to know that you son did enjoy a lot at the Kids Club. Moreover, I am thrilled to learn that Chef Mohan, Chef Enzo, Wat, Janny, Thip and Laila went the extra mile to impress you with their sincere hospitality. Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team especially to our Food and Beverage Department, their most prized reward is to know that their hard work pay off!  Regarding your comment about our service, we are very sorry that you feel that the level of the service is not up to the standard. As giving the best service we can to our guests is a top priority of ours, please rest assured that we take this matter very seriously.    I do hope that you will look upon this breakdown in service as a one off and not indicative of the customer care we always strive to provide at all times. Once again please accept my apology and hoping to welcoming you back at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and having the chance to restore your trust and confidence in our service and make sure your next visit the more pleasant than the previous one.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Michael & Jill Wicke,U.K. - Amazing Hotel
review: We stayed for three nights here at the end of our South Asia trip. It was mainly to just relax and enjoy some calm and quiet before we headed home. The JW totally delivered the calm and quiet. It is a gorgeous property with immaculate landscaping and very serene with an exclusive beach. There are no other hotels close by to share it.   We had requested for an airport pickup since the hotel is about 1 1/2 hrs away from the airport. The check-in was seamless and the room was ready upon our arrival.   What I absolutely loved about this place was its pool access rooms. We could just get into the pool from our room patio. The whole property is connected through water canals which feed into to the hotel’s larger pools... amazing! However, the rooms need some serious work, specially…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Dear bsri135,  Thank you for your positive review on TripAdvisor!  We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We also love to hear about the aspects you enjoy and the factors you feel we should improve upon.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed many aspect of your stay and found your stay a tranquil one. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in a lagoon pool access room to get into our large lagoon pool easily, and you know what it is the longest lagoon pool in South East Asia as it is 1.9 kilometer long. We are sure on your next visit, you would experience a brand new JW Marriott Khao Lak both rooms, restaurants, and other facilities and amenities. We are going to have more restaurant and bars as well. So please make sure you keep updating about the hotel progress. You can also reach out to our social media team on facebook and if you need further assistance for the future booking, they are happy to sort it out for you.   For your constructive comments about our bar standard, we have also taken note on that. We hope if your travel plan bring you back to the area again in the future, we will have the opportunity to restore your trust and confidence in our service.   bsri135, thank you so much for your constructive comment on your recent stay. We highly appreciate you taking your time to give us such a positive review!  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Nice stay
review: This is a personal message of thanks to Keith Massey, General Manager.  We have currently visited hotels in 56 countries including The Marriott in Florida & many other hotels in Thailand but this one rates the very best . You are to be commended in the efficient way you run this hotel & the excellent staff that you employ. Without exception they all give the impression that they enjoy coming to work & give great & friendly service to your guests.Perhaps unfair to mention anyone in particular but Pooh, Nat, Tammy & the lovely Lailya rather stand out and feel the latter three deserve promotion. We always judge a hotel by trying to find fault with it but this time you really have got us stumped! Comments but not really criticisms:- 1/ Nice to have clean towels changed twice in the…

title: Great place. Great Service. Epic pool.
review: I've done a few 5 star resorts and this place grew on me each day. The entrance was excellent and the pool is the biggest I've ever seen. I kept thinking the tiler had a serious job to do. It's not a new resort by any means but the maintenance has kept up and so it's not tired or old. We went on a luxury escapes package with food included. It's located right on the beach and the waves were sometimes good for a body surf which was a bonus.  Our room was nice and we had access straight to the pool from our patio. I found the bed a bit soft and the staff changed my matress to make it more firm - now thats good service!  I had a 3 year old and an 11 month with me and they got treated like rock stars. The kids club was a great place for them to meet friends which made the holiday…

title: Outstanding family holiday!
review: Dear dubjohnston,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and for taking the time to review us on TripAdvisor.   It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience during your stay with us and we are so pleased we were able to make your holiday a memorable success. It makes all our hard work and effort paid off and sincere thank you on your kind words and your recommendation. We read every comment and will surely find way to improve.   We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us and hope to host you again in the near future!  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Why go somewhere else??? THIS Is the best place one can look for
review: My husband & I have travelled all over the world to various luxury beach resorts and this one was the BEST!  The service from all the staff was first-class (much better than ANY resort we've ever stayed in), the food at all the restaurants was lovely and the rooms have been renovated.  We loved, loved, loved our 9 night stay.  We will definitely return in 2020.   We travelled with 3 young children in Oct 2019.  The weather was warm in the mornings, raining on & off by about 2pm everyday, but still very warm (30deg) even when wet.  KEY TIPS for travellers: The resort is 1.5hrs drive north of Phuket airport.  Its about 15mins past Khao Lak township. The resort is located about 2km from the main road, down a paved narrow drive.   Once down the drive, just outside the resort, there…

title: We'd go back in a heartbeat...
review: Dear RaychandNick,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for celebrating your holiday season and your son's birthday with us.   We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service from the very moment you checked in with us and you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay. It is truly wonderful to know that we have been able to provide you with an extraordinary stay in Thailand with your family.  Our room with pool access is the main highlight of the resort. It allows you to jump off easily from your terrace and that you can enjoy your own lagoon or swim over to go to the main pool and hang out at both Infinity and Aquamarine pool bar.  As for our food selections, we understand that many of our guests have different food preferences and tastes, therefore our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide a wide selection of high quality of food in every outlet including at breakfast, Ta-Krai Thai restaurant, Olive Italian restaurant, Sakura Japanese restaurant, and The Deli cafe.   RaychandNick, once again thank you for this wonderful review. It is through reviews such as yours that inspire all of us to continue to exceed our guests' expectations and can't wait to welcome you back to our little paradise resort in the near future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Relaxing stay at beautiful JW Marriott Resort Khao Lak
review: Came 2nd time this year after our 1st trip in May got rained out. This time we came as a party of 4, including our 2 year old son and his grandma. Hotel staff was fantastic, very friendly, accommodating, knowledgeable and effective. Facilities outstanding, specially the multiple pools - heard however that the hotel will undergo major renovations in 2020 and will be closed in July / August. Am looking forward to see the result! This time we actually made it to the beach as the weather was much better. Clean water and the hotel makes a great job to keep the beach clean. Our favourite restaurant was Sakura but Olive and Ta Krai were certainly close. We again booked the Return to Paradise package - which needs to be requested when booking via Bonvoy. It is worth comparing to the…

title: Good
review: I have a pleasant experience at this hotel and I will definitely recommend this to each and every person visiting this beautiful place the staff is very nice and caring and they pay attention to every minute detail and they go extra mile in serving the guest

title: Once more a perfect visit
review: Dear sharjeelcool,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a review after your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. I am glad to learn that you had an overall good experience with us and how pleasantly your stay was.  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa is truly a dream oasis and a perfect tropical paradise for a peaceful and relaxing vacation. Our teams are committed to deliver an outstanding customer service and a true five-star experience, so you can trust that we . You'll be thrilled with our hotel's prime sandy beachfront location and the longest pool with a total of 1.9km in length meandering around the entire resort.  There’s nothing more luxurious than having just what you need exactly when you need it. That’s why, at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa, we have everything ready and waiting for you.   Please let us know if we are of any help for planning your next trip to Khao Lak. We look forward to making your next visit a more memorable one!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Almost there but still great.
review: This our 5th visit to JW Marriott Khao Lak and every visit just gets better. The newly renovated rooms are first class, however it is the staff which makes this hotel extraordinary.  Most team members have at least 3 to 5 years service, they have memories like elephants remembering names and personal details.  Every meal occasion or contact with front office is both efficient and exceptionally friendly.  From the Czar Bar to Waterfront the output and love of their respective jobs shine through.  A few mentions of above and beyond:  Khun Pooh and her team at Waterfront Khun Whiskey, Khun Bourne, Khun BB and Khun Ploy at Czar Bar Khun Meow and team at the Deli Khun Anne and team at Thakrai Enzo and team at Olive And last but not least, Khun Lek and team at Front Office.  We…

title: Another stay in Paradise
review: Dear BruceG448,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your holiday.   It is truly our pleasure to learn that we have exceeded your expectations in terms of our facilities, F&B offerings and staff services. We appreciate your comment regarding the friendliness of our staffs, as we Thais, are well-known for our true Thai hospitality, and genuine smile. We always work hard to ensure that you have a home-away-from-home experience and leave us with lasting memory.   BruceG448, thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back to our paradise resort for another perfect vacation getaway in Thailand.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: FRIENDLY ASSOCIATE WITH A TRULY AMAZING HOTEL
review: Visited in October for a week... it’s a very large resort but never feels busy or crowded. Of course, the pool is the star here and the crew work very hard to keep it clean and fresh.   Breakfast is great - many options and always kept freshly stocked.   The many restaurants on property are good but somewhat pricey compared to the restaurants on the beach. However, they are nowhere near as pricey as you would find at a 5-star resort in the US/EU.   The rooms are a bit tired but clean. Good news is all rooms are currently undergoing refurbishment.   There are some areas of the resort that look in disrepair but they were just coming out of the rainy season and it looked as if maintenance was beginning to address these concerns.   With a little work, the property could truly be…

title: Best hotel ever !!!
review: Hi I am 8 years old and I went to the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort. The room was amazing, the activities that you could choose were so many tennis 🎾 pin pong, squash and more.. kids club and a pool that just keeps on going. Buffet breakfast 🥞 every day was delicious dinner was also great 👍.Thanks for letting us stay.So l recommend going! Thank you 🙏   As a parent, the service from staff was exceptional in every aspect, nothing was too much for them! The landscaping and hotel surrounds were so relaxing, as was the pool which winds its way around the hotel - it was so relaxing to just float down the pool river. Staff were constantly there removing leaves and keeping the pool crystal clear. I also loved having a great gym onsite, free bike rental for 1st hour and plenty to do…

title: Beautiful Hotel made even better by extremely helpful and friendly staff.
review: Dear Speddos,  Thank you so much for your lovely review and many thank to your little one for recommending other traveler to stay with us because we have so many activities that suit everyone. We are appreciated that and thrilled to learn your 8 years old child enjoyed all activities mentioned.   We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our hotel facilities, found our hotel conveniently located, enjoyed excellent widespread of breakfast and were satisfied with the service of our hotel staff.   We could say that our resort is perfectly located right on a long stretch of sandy beach, making it a great serene vacation getaway for relaxation. Our resort is both adult and family friendly with the massive resort grounds, as there are plenty of spaces for everyone to enjoy their privacy. The pool access rooms are truly a treat and many families with young kids enjoy the privilege of being able to jump directly into South East Asia’s longest lagoon pool right from their private terrace.   The most important aspect that we concern the most is the cleanliness, that's why our team work so hard every day in maintaining each area and keep everywhere looking nice and clean. Our pool and beach area are often our guests’ favorite plus, especially for the sunset views.   Speddos, thank you so much for your wonderful review. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon and wish you all the best!  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: The Best family resort in Thailand!!!
review: During my two week stay with my Husband we started everyday with a lovely breakfast at Waterfront Restaurant. Everything was well presented and fresh with the experience made better thanks to the very cheerful and accommodating Nat. I would like to extend this thank you to Waterfront staff members; Honey, Thip, Wat, Golf and Na for making the start to everyday as pleasurable as possible. The service and food as a whole was exceptional. I would like to also thank Mr Tha who worked at Thai Restaurant who always made time for me and my husband in any situation and was always chatty and friendly.

title: EXTRAORDINARY GROUNDS ADD TO THE SERENITY
review: Dear allentara,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your preferred choice of destination resort and for sharing your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your holiday at our resort. It seems like the service from staffs is one of the main highlight of your stay with us; Honey, Thip, Wat, Golf, and Na from the Waterfront, and Tha from Ta-Krai – they are the true shining stars and made us proud of their hard work and professionalism. I feel wonderful to learn that the team left a good impression on you indeed.   Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the near future.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Stunning, Impressive & Breath taking to say the least
review: We have traveled to Thailand on many, many occasions and have now discovered the ultimate family resort that has set a new standard in customer service coupled with a stunning location and brilliant facilities. The private beach is beautiful, the restaurants delicious, the pool access rooms awesome and the whole property is very easy to navigate even with young children.  A special mention must go to the delightful staff who all took the time to make us feel welcome and enhance our experience. And to the ladies in the kids club that our boys adored and didn’t want to leave.

title: Perfect resort
review: The J.W Marriott Khao Lak completely exceeded all of my expectations. It was absolutely beautiful, the rooms were very clean and the staff were outstanding and so lovely. The food at the restaurants was delicious, I highly recommend the Italian! Thip who works at the waterfront restaurant was a particularly amazing staff member. Thip offered exceptional service and was extremely friendly and lovely. Thank you Thip and the rest of the staff at J.W Marriott, I will definitely be back one day!

title: Truly love the stay!
review: Dear georgiastrips,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We appreciate you taking your time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  It is truly our pleasure to learn that we have exceeded your expectations in many aspect such as the beautiful rooms you stayed, F&B offerings, and staff services. The friendliness and service of our staffs is another highlight of our resort as we always put a personal touch to everything we do for our guests – and we truly appreciate your kind comment on this. Thip is also one of the best team members we have and we are very proud of her too and we are appreciated to hear that Thip did offer you exception service and helpful to you.   georgiastrips, It is our pleasure to have you with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Amazing!
review: Here is the most beautiful resort in khaolak I have ever been. Well greeting by front desk staff especially khun Am the person who escort us to the room, she is a lovely girl and make us feel warm welcome since we arrived. And khun Sorn from the breakfast restaurant he always provide a very good taking care of us until we left the place. We would say thank to all staff and we will come back again for sure!

title: Lovely stay
review: Dear oatw2018,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. It is such rewarding indeed to read that you appreciated many aspects of your stay, especially the service provided by our staff. Khun Am and Khun Sorn are the epitome of professionalism and genuinely cares about their clients. I am happy to learn that the team left a good impression on you.   oatw2018, your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team especially to the ones you mentioned in this review, who would be very happy to receive your positive feedback.  The loyalty of our guests is of the utmost importance to us and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit to Khao Lak  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Extraordinary Resort
review: We stayed at the hotel this month along with all of our family and wedding guests, we held our wedding on the beach organised by Khun Bee and would recommend it to everyone. Not only are the hotel team amazing, friendly and always smiling but they genuinely do care about each guest. The events team helped organise such an special day for us including all the behind the scenes teams from cooks, to waiter, to house keeping team. Special thanks to Khun Bee and Sam & Tam 😃 We would definitely go back, for the hotel it’s beautiful, lovely renovated rooms, pools are incredible and the beaches are out of this world bright blue water and soft sand.

title: Could be better
review: We usually go to the marriott at Mai Khao but thought we would change it up and try something different this time.   Although the drive to the resort is 1.5 hours away from the airport the photos of the winding pool and pool access rooms looked good.   The rooms and property look a little tired and are in need of renovation. Some things in the hotel room don't work all the time - plugs - shower head holder and wifi drops off when it rains.   Pool access and the pool were good. Though no pool floaties or toys are offered to the patrons. You have to buy them yourself from the shop. It would have been a nice touch for them to offer the floaties to the guests when they are using the pool. Pool is always out of towels and when we asked for towels it took over an hour and they still…

title: just dam fine,reaxing hotel.
review: Dear smallmitten,  Thank you for your constructive feedback. We appreciate hearing what you liked about our hotel and the factors you feel we should improve upon.   In the first instance, I would like to sincerely apologies for the shortfall in the standard of service you have received during your stay. Kindly  note that this problem was a true exception to our normal practices and be rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem. All our efforts are concentrated in preventing future occurrences.   I do hope that you will look upon this breakdown in service as a one off and not indicative of the customer care we always strive to provide at all times. Once again please accept my sincere apologies and I do hope that if your travel plans bring you back to the area we will have the opportunity to restore your trust and confidence in our service.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Third visit - another wonderful holiday
review: great food.friendly helpful staff.great pool.loved the food quality.layout or resort was excellent.pool was refreshing to swim,which we find hard in thailand...so many places have warm pool water,the Mariot was nice.

title: 4 Star
review: Dear Guest,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We appreciate you taking your time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  It is truly our pleasure to learn that we have exceeded your expectations in terms of our rooms, F&B offerings and staff services. The friendliness and service of our staffs is another highlight of our resort as we always put a personal touch to everything we do for our guests – and we truly appreciate your kind comment on this.    OnAir22276649021, It is our pleasure to have you with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Relaxing and enjoyable holiday
review: This is our third trip to the JW Marriott in Khao Lak, and our first with our child. We booked with an all inclusive package deal, which is very reasonable for all it includes. I can see how things would be pricey if you were buying all your meals and drinks separately, but for us it was just a few cocktails a day and each bar has a cocktail deal.  We have always found the staff here incredibly friendly and welcoming. They all stopped to say hello to us and our little girl. Excellent attention to detail.   At the moment two of the restaurants are under construction/refurbishment, so these restaurants were operating out of the main waterfront restaurant. Olive restaurant has been done and looks great, so I look forward to seeing the other two during our next trip.   We love the…

title: Excellent Resort - Slightly let down by Luxury Escapes
review: I echo the vast majority of the other reviews. Impeccable facilities and staff.  My one criticism is shared for Luxury Escapes and the resort. Our package included a 3 course dinner each night. What was not included in the L.E. fine print and only became known to us upon arrival was that the 3 course meal would be from a smaller menu at each of the resort's restaurants (excluding  the Waterfront Buffet restaurant as you can't really restrict a buffet!). While not a showstopper, it was a slight dampener on the stay. At most restaurants the restricted menu was still adequate but not expansive.  The exception to this was the Japanese restaurant were the restricted menu was quite short!  I would have love to have ordered from the full menu at the Italian restaurant (and I'll…

title: Stunning
review: Dear sim86on,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. It’s wonderful to know that you have thoroughly and greatly enjoyed your stay with us!   It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience during your stay with us and found our products, facilities and services worth recommending. It gives us a sense of achievement and pleasure to read such positive comments from you.  Regarding your comments on Luxury Escapes package. I cannot comment on our partners here but I will make sure that your feedback has been passed along to related team and for further consideration and improvement on the package.  sim86on, thank you again for your constructive feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back to the resort again in the future.   Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manage

title: Amazing resort
review: My husband & I are currently staying here and we absolutely love everything about it, the service, the food, the atmosphere, the pool and grounds, love how the pool goes around the whole resort so its perfect for families. Nothing has been a problem. Would definately recommend to anyone looking to stay here 😊 I only have one gripe and thats the bed its way too hard and uncomfortable, i did ask for a softer mattress topper to go on top and they accommodated with no hesitation but did not change anything, but other than that i give this place a 10/10.

title: Very good!
review: Dear Tiasio,  Thank you for taking your time to share your experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! It's such a pleasure to read that you enjoyed many aspect of your stay.  It is delightful to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel and found our products, facilities and services worth recommending. It gives us a sense of achievement and pleasure to read such positive comments from our valued guests such as you.  Tiasio, we hope to see you soon and look forward to making your next stay even more memorable than the previous one.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Enormous swimming pool with ample sun loungers that you don't need to fight for.
review: Really nice resort, staff are very friendly, we got the all inclusive package, more food than you can eat but great value. Choice of Thai, Italian or Japanese every night as well as themed buffet choices  Three course dinners Pool are is huge, can always find a quiet spot  Very enjoyable

title: More Positives than Negatives
review: Currently enjoying our first trip to Thailand. Big mistake to have left it so long. What an amazing country this is. Staying at the JW Marriott at Khao Lak. Really nice hotel. Undergoing some renovation at the moment but hotel willing to accommodate change of room away from refurbishment area. We are in room 3116.  This wing not renovated so cannot comment on how hotel will look but room nice enough. Very clean with every thing you could need. Amazing beach which is the stand out here. Warm crystal sea a joy to behold.  Breakfast is very good. Lots of choice and freshly cooked food. Buffet in the evening is woeful. We tried it on first night and by 8pm most food was cold and choice limited. Have since tried Italian , great ambiance good food. Japanese good but suffers from being…

title: Love this place
review: Dear Robsonkaryn,  We would like to thank you for sharing your experience with us and other travelers following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your stay and that the service attitude of our staff made a lasting impression for you!  Moreover, we truly appreciate your lovely comments about your experience at our well-appointed room with the Thai style facilities within.   We have taken note of your comments and will take them into consideration to further improve our services and facilities.   Robsonkaryn, please let us know how we may assist in any way for your next return. We do look forward to making your next visit even more memorable !  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Highly recommend
review: If someone just gives me money to spend on a beach hotel, I would come here.  I have come to this place six times since I discovered it 15 months ago. That’s how much I like it. The buildings, rooms, gardens and pools are all gorgeous.   Renovation is under way and newly-decorated rooms look great. In my opinion the outgoing room design is already great and renovation is cool but not urgently needed.  The hotel also seems unaffected by beach erosion that the west coast of Thailand is facing.  The place is not cheap, so I can only come outside the high season. Even so, I still get to enjoy some sunny moments every time. We locals don’t like strong sunlight anyway and I like this place mainly for its facilities.  I came in December once and found that breakfast content was better…

title: Great staff and beautiful resort !
review: Dear peemak2015,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your accommodation in Khao Lak and your loyalty to us, and sharing your feedback relating to your current stay here.  We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service and you enjoyed every aspect of your stay. We must say that the most important aspect of every stay is the cleanliness, that's why our team work so hard every day in maintaining each area and keep everywhere looking nice and clean. Our pool and beach area are often our guests’ favorite plus, especially for the sunset views.   We very much appreciate your kind comments – we have passed on your feedback to the entire team. They are extremely proud to have made your stay wonderful.   peemak2015, thank you for your recommendation about the beach hut, we will look into this again later.   Look forward to your next visit.   Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: JW Marriott perfection.....The All Rounder!
review: Just completed our 2nd stay here. We purchased a luxury escapes package, this time bringing family members along too. This resort did not disappoint and the food was amazing. The renovations did not impact our stay at all. Great staff and amazing facilities. You just can’t get better value than an all inclusive deal at this resort. Highly recommend.

title: Mainly a Family Resort, thankfully with some Adult only (12+) areas..
review: We stayed 8 nights in a pool access room with a booking via Luxury Escapes.  It was one of the better Luxury Escapes deals we have been on.  Our Luxury Escapes package included:  Nightly three-course dinners, daily one-course lunches, daily buffet breakfasts, two 45-minute massages - plus two-for-one on any additional full-price treatments. One-way pickup from Phuket Airport  As a Marriott Bonvoy Gold Elite member we also received some other benefits:  15% discount on Food & Beverage exclude In Room Dining, 15 % discount on Laundry, 25 % bonus points, 20 % discount at Quan Spa, Complimentary Internet access, a complimentary shuttle to Khao Lak town, daily TWO complimentary drinks at the lobby bar “Czar Bar”.  This too was very generous and we especially enjoyed our two daily…

title: Great, relaxing family resort with amazing staff
review: Dear MojiNegro,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We also love to hear about the aspects you enjoy and the factors you feel we should improve upon.  It is such rewarding indeed to read that you appreciated many aspects of your stay, especially the service provided by our dedicated associates from the beginning to the end, our associates are the epitome of professionalism and genuinely cares about their clients. I am happy to learn that the team left a good impression on you. Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team and they will definitely be very happy to receive your positive feedback.  We take note of your comments on some of our services and facilities, we are really sorry for the service shortfall. Thank you for bring this up to our attention, and it is always important for us to receive constructive comments like yours that we can strive  to continuously improve the quality of our services and products.   The loyalty of our guests is of the utmost importance to us and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit to Khao Lak.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Amazing Hotel Amazing Pool
review: Family of 3 on the 9 day Luxury Escapes full board deal.  1) Staff - first and foremost this resort’s biggest asset is their staff. Everyone from waiters through to the back of house (inclusive of room cleaners, ground maintenance staff and other support staff are amazing, warm and very friendly. They always go out of their way to greet and make you feel special. Our little one was always adored and enjoyed the company of all staff throughout the resort.  Special mention to: Goong, Pooh, Wat, Ann, Au, Benz, Nuch, Thip, Nat, Bank, Dong, Chef Mohan, Bom, Don and the tall female gym receptionist (sorry misplaced her name).   2) The resort – Is quite big, with a large pool which snakes past all the rooms with direct beach access towards the back. The gardens and beach are well…

title: First impressions
review: Dear Navinane,  Many thanks for you positive review on TripAdvisor!  We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. We also love to hear about the aspects you enjoy and the factors you feel we should improve upon.  Regarding your kind comments on our service and friendliness, our associates will be very happy to hear that you enjoyed our service for providing a memorable experience for our guests is our top goal. Everyone on our team works very hard each day to keep our hotel looking at it's best and to ensure our guests have an enjoyable time at the hotel and leaves us with lasting memories.  For your constructive comments about our pillow, I have taken noted on that and will look for further development, we have also alerted the housekeeping department regarding the smell of the day bed and counch, the engineering department regarding the rain shower who are now actively looking into this matter.    We hope to see you again on your next trip to Khao Lak and highly appreciate you taking your time to give us such a positive review and we look forward to seeing you again.   Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: What a place?
review: Rooms: 295 with 100 currently under Refurb. Hotel is not running at high occupancy as its currently considered as low period.  Booking: Made on iPad through Marriott app. Booking was easy to make and with upgrade options. Confirmation email received within minutes.  48 hours before checkin I received welcome email and information on things to do in hotel and in the area. Day before arrival an email informing I could now do pre checkin.  Arrival: Security on boom gate. Welcome iced juice and towelettes. Seated in foyer with receptionist explaining hotel facilities. Made booking at hotel Japanese restaurant for dinner. Escorted us to room pointing out hotel venues. Receptionist used our names continuously. Room was ready on our arrival.  Room: Deluxe poolside King bed with bath.…

title: Definitely needs renovation, but still great
review: We were here for 10 days with Luxury Escapes. The package was fantastic value.   While we were there, approx ½ the resort was closed for renovation which is desperately needed. While it reduced the walkway access, it actually meant you didn’t have to battle for pool lounges. I think once it’s back open, if you want a lounge at a key location like the infinity bar or adults only section, you’ll need to be there early.   Our room was an older room, and looked amazing on the surface, but definitely needs renovation. Our bathroom marble was stained and chipped, and had been plugged with ugly plastic covers; the bathroom doors were warped and didn’t close; our TV hung crooked on the wall, etc., but unlike many other “pretty” hotels, it was an incredibly functional room with heaps of…

title: Unbeatable
review: Dear skyecoote,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We appreciate hearing what you liked about our hotel and your constructive comments on how we can improve our services.  We are glad to learn that you had an overall pleasant stay with us and glad to know that service received by our staff and Nicolai did really satisfy you and left with you lasting memories. We will share your kind comments to them definitely. I would say Nicolai is the epitome of professionalism and genuinely cares about his hotel and guests' comfort. I am happy to learn that the team left a good impression on you.    We are sorry that our room did not make you feel comfortable. At JW Marriott, we strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us. Our team and I are looking forward to welcoming you back again for your next trip to Khao Lak. I'm sure there are a lot more to explore and we hope to restore your trust in the guestroom upon your return.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Wonderful Honeymoon
review: My family and I spent ten days at the resort and we all agree that we have experienced the most attentive, genuine staff here. Not only is the resort itself incredibly beautiful, well maintained, constantly clean, smells absolutely incredible but the pool areas are beautiful the gym is amazing and the food is exquisite! But as stated the staff really made the trip something extra special. I’ve never been somewhere before where the staff remember your name, ask you how you are and take a genuine interest in you. The staff made me so incredibly comfortable and I can’t praise them enough for all the hard work and service they provide. I’d like to take a moment to thank specific workers we met on our trip that really enhanced it, Tha, Kwana, Phu Thip, Benz, Nat and Moi from the…

title: Wonderful resort
review: Dear P7382SRelizabeths,  Thank you for your wonderful review and giving us a 5 star rating on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay at JW Marriott hotel in Khao Lak.  After reading your review, I am pleased to read your compliments regarding the service of our staff and found you were pleased by their services and they could bring a great impact on your stay.   Everyone is extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on your positive remarks, particularly Tha, Kwana, Phu Thip, Benz, Nat and Moi from the restaurants, Sorn from breakfast Don from the gym and Wee from housekeeping team.   Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Best holiday for families
review: Our 10 night stay booked through Luxury Escapes was a delightful way to enjoy our honeymoon. From the special touches in our spacious room to the wonderful hospitality shown to us each day by the ever helpful staff (especially Nat in the Waterfront Restaurant who greeted us everyday by name), we couldn’t have asked for more. Despite the property undergoing renovations at the time of our stay, the attentive and smiling staff made up for any inconvenience.

title: Great service!
review: My family of four are visiting from Australia. It was my son’s birthday a few days ago. Staff at breakfast brought him a special pancake with candles and sang to him. They also remembered his birthday at dinner in Olive restaurant where he received a cake and singing.   Staff members Wit, Paula and Bana (Aquamarine bar) have been fantastic. Bana has provided excellent service and we are regulars at Happy Hour!   Food is great and weather has been good.   A nice, quiet time of year to visit. Highly recommended.

title: More like family 💖
review: Dear A322LBsarahn,  First of all, I am very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  That's lovely to know that your stay was incredible especially to know that our staff did make Surprise & Delight to enhance your holiday in Thailand even more special!   As providing the best experience we can for our guests is our first priority, our hotel staff will be thrilled to hear that you have mentioned them in your lovely review especially Wit, Paula, and Bana.   Last but not least, we would like to express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Luxury hotel that is beautiful but will be amazing!
review: When the staff treat your kids like their own you can’t help but love this place! The food was over the top amazing. Housekeeping were like perfectionistic ninjas and the resort itself was beautiful. We will be back! 💕  Nook, Tanny, Au, Tong you guys were amazing to myself and my children, there were so many more but these are just the staff I can remember off the top of my head.  Kids club was great so many activities and things for kids of all ages.

title: Luxury hotel / great facilities / ok food
review: Dear Manda,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your feedback after your recent stay.  It is delightful to hear that you had enjoyed your stay here in our hotel and found our products, facilities and services worth recommending. It gives us a sense of achievement and pleasure to read such positive comments from our valued guests such as yourself.   We are encouraged to hear that our colleagues left a good impression on you. Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team especially to our Reception, Housekeeping & Restaurant team, who would be very happy to receive your positive feedback.  Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellent Service, Great Property and Awesome Manager
review: We went to this hotel off-season through the company Luxury escapes. The hotel is quite beautiful set on stunning grounds in Khao Lak. It is located 2km from the main road to Phuket and one and a half hours north.  The hotel is going through some major renovations with the rooms needing much-needed updating. Check-in was excellent with a welcome drink and being escorted to our room, our bags arrived shortly thereafter. As we arrived quite late at night we went to sleep soon after arrival. The next morning we awoke to a beautiful vista of the pool outside. The room itself was quite nice but as mentioned before in need of an update, especially the bathroom room. The room was equipped with all the necessary things like robes and slippers, minibar and toiletries ( these individual…

title: Great resort
review: Like any good resort it’s staff are it’s biggest asset and this resort is the perfect example of that, they are competent, friendly and only to willing to assist. The resort is not 5 star but having said that, it is very nice, there is a very large maintenance program underway at present, I assume to refurbish a lot of the rooms, we couldn’t hear any construction noise where we were.  There is a massive pool that weaves it’s way around the resort and is easily accessible from the rooms, some of which you can step off your balcony into the pool, very nice. Within 100m of the Resort is a really nice beach, set up with chairs, umbrellas and life guards. The resort has 4 restaurants, Thai, Japanese, Italian and the Waterfront Restaurant all of which serve quality food and have…

title: Awesome
review: Dear HappyTraveller119,  It is wonderful to hear your positive opinion on the resort, especially our lagoon pool that is such a popular feature with all of our guests. It's great to hear that we did live up to your expectation.   How wonderful it is to know that you did enjoy your stay in the luxury experiences at our five-star JW Marriott resort in Khao Lak. Guests can relax in a sun lounger by Southeast Asia's largest lagoon-inspired swimming pool while enjoying a tropical drink and our 4 restaurants 1 cafe and the 4 bars are the main highlight of JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Our chefs appreciate that you liked the foods which we provide them with the top quality and fresh ingredients we could ask for.    As you mentioned, Khao Lak is about 90 minutes away from the Phuket International Airport, we provide an airport transfer services running 24 hours a day for your convenience. Moreover, you can also shop some local products and enjoy the local vibes in Khao Lak. There are some highlight markets not far from the resort are such as Build Factory and Bang Niang Market; these 2 markets are highly recommended places to visit if you’d like to experience local Thai food, buying souvenirs and/or some local/ beachwear clothing.   Once again thank you for your feedback. We hope to have a chance to welcome you again and provide you with several more pleasant experiences.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Best Food in Asia!
review: The hotel is incredible,  the staff are outstanding and the food is fantastic. We're still here for another day and would be keen to stay longer as everything is so we'll managed. Low season doesn't bother us as we just continue to swim. We have two pool access rooms for a family  if 5 with connecting door and so we all have space and can easily access the water. I have been to hotels all over the world and the breakfast here would be one of the best.  A stand out is the olive restaurant, their Italian night was extremely impressive with their skill and attention to detail. Including the kids club in the price is appreciated too as many hotels try and charge extra for these activities.

title: fabulous place
review: Dear Kate_Robinson,  It's wonderful indeed to hear how much you valued JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and rating us a 5 star experience on TripAdvisor.  We are thrilled to learn that you have well spent your time during your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and did enjoy the first day of arrival until the end of your stay with us.I am glad to know you had a great time and appreciated our price, quality and value offering. I will make sure to pass on your kind remarks to our team.   Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we will make sure your next visit will be more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: We wanted to stay for another week!
review: I couldn’t fault this property. Grounds were kept immaculate, staff friendly and above all the food on offer was amazing! Chefs were on hand to offer their assistance with anything and everything, often asking if they could make our kids something else to suit. Above standard food quality and quantity. The only minor thing I could mention is the resort is lacking a good activities program and/or music for the kids and adults in and around the pool areas, just to help with the vibe of the resort. Other than that a perfect stay thank you!

title: Monsoon delight
review: We decided to stay here in a different season from our usual in Jan/Feb and found that it was thoroughly enjoyable! As we are not folks who require all day sunshine for our entire stay, we found the bolts of lashing monsoon rain followed by spells of sunshine and balmy overcast weather very much to our liking... and kinder to our skins too.   One monsoon season beach bonus are the waves ! They allow for wave jumping and beginner level body/board surfing. As the sea shore slopes quite gently, one can still stand a way out in the sea.  We did find more debris washed onto the beach with the waves but the beach is till relatively cleaner and quieter than most in Phuket and Bali in our experience.   The resort has plenty of non beach and sea activity options including the most…

title: Good service
review: Dear Baitball,  Thank you very much for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and thank you for sharing your wonderful experience here on TripAdvisor.  We understand that a first impression goes a long way, which is why we put you with a memorable experience since the first day of arrival and until the end of your stay. We're delighted to know that you were able to take advantage of all facilities available at the resort and enjoyed delicious food and dining options offered. The breakfast restaurant is always the highlight of our resort with a great range of drinks and plenty choices of international and local selections to suit our different guests’ preferences.   We highly appreciate your kind words to our staffs at Waterfront, Olive Italian, and the bars. It's such a pleasure to learn how our team serve you not only for the delicious and high quality food, but also leave you with lasting memories.  We really hope that your memorable time here will entice you to return to us in the future so that we will be able to offer you another amazing stay!  Best regards,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: All food So good taste and lovely staff
review: Looking for lunch in Khoalak. I stop at JW marriott try to find the way to beach bar Mr.Ake pool staff escort me to the beach. Thank you him so much for kind and heart to serve the guest. Sit at pool bar but prefer to eat Yum woonsen lady staff helping me to order from main kitchen. Thank for helping

title: Poolside Paradise
review: Dear DrJimmy123,  Thank you for the kind review regarding your lunch experience in Khao Lak at JW Marriott.   It's truly wonderful to learn that you enjoyed your dining experience at the pool bar with us. We are also delighted to hear that our staff "Ake" and the lady who served you at that time were very accommodating. Our hotel staff are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services. As providing the best experience we can for our guests is our number one priority, our hotel staff will be thrilled to hear that you have mentioned them in your lovely review.  We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and very hope that JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa could be the place for your stay in Khao Lak upon your return in the future.  Sincerely,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Tucked away bliss
review: I came here first time with my girlfriend, my maindish is  Beef steak and Spaghetti Carbonara, all recommend from Chef Aek.  So all fantastic foods I thing when we have congrats I will come here again.  Thank you for all staff ❤️ Yoot , Preaw , First , Bow , Mam , Yom and Dong, every body greats service and lovely   Perfect Restaurant Perfect food and good feel   Sure, we will come again some day.  Thank you all.  All the best Ratchawit

title: Wonderful Place
review: I come to the JW Marriot Resort and Spa once a year, normally around September and can honestly say it is one of the best Hotels I have ever stayed in. The location, rooms, pool and staff are all exceptional and the food quality is some of the nicest I have tasted anywhere.  I took a pool access room this time and would highly recommend this, even if it can be a bit noisier during the day but if like most people you are in the pool anyway, which is just unbelievable in terms of overall size, this will not be a problem. Part of the Hotel was under refurbishment this time but there was no disturbance and it did not affect my stay at all.   Most people who come to Khao Lak are looking for rest and relaxation in secluded luxury and this Hotel delivers this experience perfectly. I…

title: Mrs Pawson
review: Dear RonSDubai,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and for your kind review and recommendation.  We are delighted to note that you had a pleasant experience on that your stay and that you enjoyed many aspects of the resort and the true Thai hospitality. We are also very happy to know that our staffs were able to assist you throughout your stay. We will pass on your much appreciated comments to our associates for their exceptional and attentive service.  It is wonderful that you enjoyed our F&B as well as an enviable location of our resort, the pool that could impress everyone who looks for a long swimming journey. Our team works hard every day  to keep the hotel looking clean and up to date as to ensure that guests have a memorable experience and wish to return to see familiar faces here at our resort paradise.   RonSDubai, thank you again for giving us 5 star rating and recommend us. We look forward to welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa again in the future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Biggest and best swimming pools
review: Fantastic resort  Fantastic people  Excellent customer service  Food really good Rooms very clean and comfortable  Will definitely go back can't recommend enough Pool is amazing and gardens kept so clean.

title: Smoke and mirrors
review: Dear 138sue,  Thank you on your encouraging and supportive review!  It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience during your stay with us and found our products, facilities and services worth recommending. It gives us a sense of achievement and pleasure to read such positive comments from you.  It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. We hope we will have the pleasure of greeting you again.  Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: What a lovely hotel and location
review: This hotel is undergoing extensive renocations and the rooms will be amazing on commpletion.  Rooms are a good size and the breakfast buffett very big .  The dinner buffett reasonable .  Good value family resort as the swimming pools are amazing   One very bad issue is the bath tap it is razor sharp and highly damgerous square shape the edge is as sharp as a steak knife .  I hope the renovated rooms remove this high risk for injury.  My kids had a great time very nice kids club.

title: Beautiful Resort.
review: I love this resort, The décor is amazing very comfortable an relaxing. I would like to thank the staff for helping to make our stay amazing. The best Italian restaurant very good food. The Chef Enzo Has a heart of gold and it shows in his food. Also the olive staff are very friendly, Mam, Macha, Yom, Aon, and chef Eak I hope to return to see them again. The breakfast is very good lots to choose from. We had a pool access room, very nice., Clean fresh linen and very good housekeeping.The gardens are lovely everyroom has a view. I love this place.

title: AMAZING FAMILY HOLIDAY
review: Dear patricia r,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your accommodation in Khao Lak and sharing your feedback about your recent fabulous stay with us.  We could not be happier to learn about how wonderful your trip to Khao Lak was and glad to know that we were able to provide you with memorable services in all areas you visited. The most important aspect of every stay of our guest is the attention to details and being able to demonstrate examples of good customer service and how to improve them. These key elements have made our team work so hard in every day to maintain all service areas looking nice and clean. Our pool and beach area are often our guests’ favorite plus, especially for the sunset views.   I am also glad to hear that you met our important guy of Olive, Chef Enzo is an amazing guy. He demonstrated the epitome of excellent customer service and would make sure every guest are well taken care of throughout their stay. Moreover, we have passed on your feedback to the entire team, especially Mam, Macha, Yom, Aon, and Chef Eak - they are extremely proud to have made your stay a wonderful one!   patricia r, thank you again for your time to review us and we look forward to seeing you again.   Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: What an amazing hotel.
review: This was our first visit to the JW marriott. This resort had come highly recommended by some friends and it certainly lived up to everything we had heard and much more. Unfortunately we where a little unlucky traveling in the wet season and experience a fair amount of rain but it certainly didn't dampen our holiday. There was plenty to keep us entertained and although our children don't usually attend kids club on holidays our daughter Poppy loved all the craft that was available and our 11 year old son was a big fan of Bom fitness classes which helped keep them busy on those rainy days. The staff at this resort are truely amazing and went out of their way to make sure that every aspect of our stay was well looked after. Our daughter suffers from food allergies and when…

title: What an amazing property!
review: Dear SuperSally35,  Thank you for taking the time to review JW Marriott Khao Lak.    It is wonderful to hear your positive opinion on the resort, you enjoyed our pool access rooms with perfect set up for your family of 4, and were satisfied with the service of our hotel staff.  I am very happy to know that the customer service we provide really made an impact on your first stay with JW Marriott hotel and we didn't fail that. Every single person you mentioned here and also every associates are extremely pleased about your lovely comments on their services, particularly Chef Sa, Chef Mohan, Olly, Tony,and Nat.   We are renovating the interiors of our guest rooms over a two year period.  50% of rooms over this summer, and 50% next summer.  All of the work is being completed out of sight, behind specially designed screens, and is not in any areas where our guests are being accommodated.  We have received many compliments on the work from guests and tour operators alike, especially how little, if any, impact this has on their stay.    SuperSally35, thank you so much for your time to review us and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: 2nd visit - just as good
review: We were on a "Return to Paradise" package that included a swim up room, all meals, 10 massages and a one way airport to hotel transport. The staff were extremely helpful, friendly and nothing was too much trouble for them.    The variety of food was excellent - the breakfast buffet was the best that we have ever experienced with so much selection one could have a different breakfast every day. The property was well maintained.     My wife was unable to swim at the beach due to big waves that are apparently at this time of the year - July/August, but the wonderful pool running through the resort was more than enough to counteract this.   We were kept entertained daily by the different people floating past on their blow up water devices and many stopped to say hello.  There were…

title: Faye Young and Neil Johnston
review: J W Marriott  was a beautiful resort to stay at we had a swim up pool room which was beautiful the beach was lovely  and the pools and restaurants were fabulous staff were amazing  The Olive Italian restaurant was amazing the food so authentic and beautiful and the staff were amazing you must dine here every bit as good as anywhere in Italy  Surroundings were beautiful We also visited their Thai restaurant which was also amazing beautiful fresh food and great service from very friendly staff

title: Our Amazing holiday at JW Marriot Kao Lak Resort & Spa
review: Dear Faye Y,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience you had at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   It's heartwarming to receive such a kind and thoughtful review about your experience at our restaurant especially the service provided by our staff and it's wonderful to learn that the team have left a good impression on you.   Faye Y, thank you again for sharing your experience and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellent!
review: Our Amazing holiday at JW Marriot Kao Lak Resort & Spa from the 1st Aug to 8th 2019. We are not sure if it’s our luck or just JW Marriott’s Normal standards: my family & I were treated like special guests. No hassles whatsoever right from prompt Airport pickup. Spacious Rooms. Immaculate housekeeping from the day of check in to check out. Quality toiletries –Towels –pool amenities. Lavish breakfast spreads, top standard restaurant/deli food at the resorts. Needn’t have to worry about going anywhere else looking for better options.   In those 8 days we got to know the staff as they were very friendly and would go out of their way to helps us out. They made us feel at home and were very genuine in attitude always smiling (nothing robotic or automated) all for real!! Our special…

title: Best Holiday Ever
review: Dear warriorviro,  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay and we were able to provide the relaxing holiday you were looking forward to have. Thank you so much for such kind and thoughtful feedback for our team members.   At JW Marriottl, we strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us. I am thrilled that we have exceeded your expectations with our “sincere” hospitality. Thank you for highlighting our chefs' names like Eak, Enzo, and Silvano, and also other associates like Mam, Jum, Tanny, Dong, and Oily in this review, and also sharing how relaxing you were in our beautiful resort.   We all look forward to the opportunity of serving you again in the near future and wish you another memorable stay.   Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellent in many aspects
review: I have a chance to stay at this property to celebrate my Marriott Platinum status last month. Once I arrived at the hotel, a front office manager, Khan Lek, came to welcome us and describe about the resort himself. The staff was very professional and nice, especially Khun Sorn, Khun Miss and Khun Rod from Takrai Thai Restaurant have treated us very well. As well as, Khun Kong, from the beach bar, who is very helpful on providing information about all the outlets and food.   In conclusion, I can conclude that I recognize the resort as one of the best holiday that I have ever had and that's why I want to spend my second time with them in the next month.

title: Best!
review: I was there in May and I truly love this hotel. Its massive connecting pool, garden, architecture were so fabulous. Staff was friendly. My boyfriend and I were truly enjoyed our stay. If you visit Khao Lak, do not miss out staying in this hotel. Totally recommend!

title: 9 day luxury beach holiday to treasure
review: Dear 488pattyp,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your accommodation in Khao Lak and sharing your feedback relating to your current stay in Khao Lak.   We appreciate your kind compliments regarding the pool, the garden, and the architecture of the resort!  Moreover, it's great to know that the customer service we usually provide really made an impact on your stay. Our hotel staff are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services.  488pattyp, thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope to welcome you back to a hidden paradise in Khao Lak like JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A stunning and picturesque resort
review: We recently stayed at this magnificent huge meticulously maintained resort on a 9 night all meals included package.  We upgraded to a pool access room, so could step off our room veranda into swimming pool canals which meander past most of the ground floor rooms. Definitely a worthwhile upgrade.  So too were the meals, as we were treated to beautiful meals and friendly engaging service at the 3 restaurants available Japanese, Thai, Italian– usually 4, but this was reduced to 3 when we stayed there,  I assume because it was off-season . The variety on offer via the set menus was equal to a la carte menus at fine dining restaurants. Waiters Nott, Golf and Honey and chefs Banana and Enzo and head chef Silvano made all our meals all memorable and delicious. The Italian restaurant…

title: Beautiful resort, huge pool
review: Dear VichrisF,  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your stay and we were able to provide the relaxing holiday you were looking forward to have. Thank you so much for such kind and thoughtful feedback for our team members.   It is always encouraging to learn that our guests are satisfied with our service as it is what we strive for every day and glad to know that you were offered for room upgrade by our staff. Usually if our rooms are available and you are a Marriott Bonvoy member, you can turn your travel experiences with us into endless rewards from bonus points to free stays plus room upgrade for a more space and comfort.    All our associates especially the ones you mentioned did embody a true hospitality spirit and work very hard each day to keep our hotel looking at its best and to ensure our guests receive 5 star service. And it is fortunate that we have an incredible team who genuinely care about our guests and strive to provide an exceptional experience. We have shared your praise with them and they are glad to learn of your positive remarks, because their most prized reward is to know that their efforts to make your stay carefree and memorable have paid off!     VichrisF, we would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa again in the future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Heaven on Earth
review: My partner and I stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak in July 2019 for 7 nights and booked through TUI.   Where do I start? The setting is absolutely incredible. The resort is right on a gorgeous beach and the design is stunning with a swimmable lagoon running all the way round with amazing architecture throughout. The hotel offer a taxi service to the nearby town so you are able to explore the area.   It was our first time travelling to Thailand and it succeeded all expectations - it is such a friendly and welcoming country and the JW Marriot captured this perfectly. All the staff we experienced were very helpful and wanted to make our experience a positive one. We stayed in a 'swim up' room which was amazing to be able to be able to go swimming straight from the room! There were…

title: All out service
review: We had our farewell dinner for our fiend and we did not regret chosing this place. From the servers, manager and head chef, all was giving their best to give the unforgettable experience in their restaurant. The food was great, specially because the head chef was expert in that field (Italian cuisine). The manager was very accommodating. The server we had was very attentive to details of service. The price is right equivalent to its taste and presentation. The outdoor gives you a wider view of everything, but chosing indoor isn't bad too specially if you want to feel romantic at all. So if you're planning to bring your special love one or even your family and friends, better to check this out!

title: The Resort That Really Embraces Both Families and Solo Travellers!
review: Dear kyledarren,  Thank you for taking the time to review JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.
