We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and thank you for recommending us to all readers on TripAdvisor. Also we are very happy to know that the customer service we provide really made an impact on your stay. Our hotel staff are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services. We can't thank you enough for these kind words and for such a lovely recommendation.   We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: 2nd time around- great but not fantastic
review: Description and third stay With sprawling grounds, lush greenery and labyrinthian waterways, the JW Marriot Khao Lak Resort & Spa is well-endowed to be the occasional much-needed hideaway for both solo travelers and families.    For families with kids, there are lots of activities and amenities to keep their loved ones well engaged.  For solo guests, the resort offers plenty of quiet spaces for peaceful reading and personal reflections.  For me who was there for a solo quiet time, one outstanding feature which I really liked is a lovely, quiet library with plenty of natural light and a lovely view of the outdoors.  Adjoining the library is a lovely large deli that serves excellent coffee and food choices.  There are ample seating spaces at the deli for quiet reading.  My deep…

title: Great hotel but a bit too isolated/remote for me
review: Dear TheDriftingDreamer,  We very much appreciate your comments regarding your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  It’s such a reward indeed to learn that you liked every aspect of your stay and especially our location, facilities and services did make your days splendid! Our team are working so hard every single day to make sure that we achieve our goal of delivering the excellent services to our guest and we so proud to have succeeded in providing you that everything you needed.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your fourth visit will be more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: JW - JUST WONDERFUL!
review: This is the second time we have stayed at the jw Marriott khao lak- absolutely loved the first trip. On the outside the resort appears beautiful, but the team members working there seemed under immense pressure and lots of errors were made.  The Sakura restaraunt to be completely honest were very un-accomodating when they made an error with our reservation. Very disappointed with the service there and would not rate any team members that worked there.  The team members that made it amazing experience for us were the following. Jum - amazing- so helpful went above and beyond. Wat, Pooh, honey, laila at waterfront were fabulous. Apple at kids club was so warm and lovely towards us.   Pool, spa and location are amazing, really sad that we didn’t love our experience on this occasion.

title: Fabulous holiday
review: A terrific family holiday. Staff were excellent - welcoming and helpful. Best restaurant - Olive, the Italian restaurant. We enjoyed both buffet and A la Carte menus.   The pools are amazing. the beach bar is a terrific spot to enjoy a ‘sundowner’ whilst watching the sun set or alternatively, the czar bar is delightful for a quiet cocktail overlooking the resort.   Rooms a bit tired. The resort is in process of renovating them. The advantage of this was the place was not at all crowded. Only criticism is the price of the drinks and spa treatments were well beyond expectation. Thankfully we booked a package that included all meals!

title: Second visit in 2 years
review: Dear kb875,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your recent stay in Khao Lak. We are so happy to know that we have made you a FABULOUS stay in Khao Lak.  Everyone on our team works very hard each day to keep our hotel looking at its best and works very hard to ensure you have had an enjoyable time at the hotel and leave us with lasting memories. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that we could exceed your expectations and would be very happy to welcome you back soon again!   At JW, we strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us.   Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General  Manager

title: Still amazing on our second Visit!
review: We are mid-way through our 2nd visit at the JW Marriott Khao Lak! We love the hospitality and service. The staff at the beach cafe are particularly attentive! We were most impressed that they brought a second drink for my husband after noticing he was wincing from the lime juice he had tasted. The 2nd drink was less sour and sweeter! We also enjoyed the fitness sessions with K. Don at the fitness club. We are not looking forward to leaving the hotel!

title: Fantastic resort
review: Dear Dataspice,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing our hotel during your recent trip to Khao Lak and for taking the time to share your feedback.    We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that we could exceed your expectations and would be very happy to welcome you back soon again!   Looking forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Khao Lak.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Sakura Restaurant
review: Recently spent a wonderful family holiday here,  as perfect as I remember.  The renovations in two of the wings caused us no problems at all, we could not even hear them except when walking past. Staff were amazing, food was fantastic and the pool priceless! Great place for a family holiday.

title: Amazing Resort
review: We had the pleasure of staying at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in October last year (sorry for the late review) and have nothing but praise for this magnificent resort. Located on a beautiful beach the rooms are modern and well serviced. Our room had direct access to the kilometre or so of swimming pool that meanders around the resort. The staff and management are amazingly accommodating to ensure you feel welcome and have the most relaxing and enjoyable stay. My wife and I along with a friend travelling with us are all vegan and when we requested if catering would be able to prepare a vegan meal for us. Not only did they satisfy our request but they went above and beyond to ensured that all restaurants on the resort were aware of our dietary needs and prepared the most…

title: Good but missing the finer touches in places
review: Dear grahamb353,  Thank you for your amazing review. It's never too late to review us. We really appreciate to learn how much you enjoyed your stay with us last October and then we were able to enhance your stay at the resort.  We were delight to read that you enjoying your stay with us from the pool, the service, and particular satisfying with our location. The hotel is located in Khao Lak area. The amazing line up of the natural environment providing natural authenticity and the major attractions of Khao Lak are just a stone’s throw away from iconic landmarks and shopping centers such the Chong Fah Waterfall, Khao Sok National Park, and the Khao Lak Center, for instance. We are glad that you have taken advantage of our prime location.   As providing the best experience we can for our guests is always our first priority, all of our associates are thrilled to hear that we could exceed your expectations with our .   We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellent!
review: Stayed here for ten nights. When we first arrived, there was a schools competition being held at the resort, so there were literally a hundred or so school kids around the resort - not what we expected! The hotel is in the throws of a major refurbishment, two complete wings and one restaurant are closed until September. ( The refurbishment is actually quite unobtrusive). But, This results in the rooms that are available are all located around the children’s pool. This can get quite noisy during the day! The rooms are standard hotel size with a very Western Thai theme, clean comfortable, but missing that extra details that I have found in other Thai 5 star resorts. Food at breakfast is outstanding, probably the best selection I have seen for a long time. the Japanese and Thai…

title: Don't bother.
review: Dear jeaton72,   Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your recent stay and for having the time to share with us your feedback on TripAdvisor and also recommending us to other fellow travelers.  Please accept our apology for the challenge you encountered with during your stay, please rest assured that your feedback have been looked into and we will definitely draw on your comments to make improvements to our standards.  In spite of this we are so happy to know that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to restore your trust in us and prove that your recent experience was not in line with our usual high standards.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Wow so beautiful
review: The hotel is absolutely stunning! The care taken over the finer details is simply lovely. After storms the staff spend hours placing stones back into the correct places and diligently cleaning the pools- the service is phenomenal! The hotel is in pristine condition with staff going above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable.   Food is good! Room service is efficient, delicious and good value. The variety of restaurants is exceptional. There's Italian, International, Thai and Japanese as well as a small deli and 2 pool side bars which offer food. Bear in mind the food at the restaurants can be rather pricey but there is a fantastic local restaurant named Pams which can be booked at the Lobby that offers a free taxi service- A MUST TRY! (Pam also offers great local tours and…

title: Couples luxury escape deal
review: This is indeed a lovely hotel.  We ventured there in the "off season", so it was fairly quiet and also the hotel is in the middle of fairly major room renovations, so a large number of rooms were not occupied.  The renovations didn't impact upon us in a negative way at all, in fact the hotel has gone to great lengths to reduce the amount of noise that you might expect to hear during a renovation.  All of the rooms that were being renovated were in fact completely boarded off, so you cannot see construction, nor did we hear much of it during the day either.  They are renovating whole wings, so that wing doesn't impact on the other wings, from our perspective it was jolly well thought out. The luxury escape deal was a good deal, which included all meals.  As the hotel is at the…

title: Off the charts 5++++
review: Dear brenny68,  Thank you so much for your kind and thoughtful review and for taking the time to let us know about your experience with us.   We are delighted to read that you had an excellent stay, only that we didn't allow you to surf when estimated the high wave during this season. Please consider this as a one-off as your safety is our first priority. However, we will consider this flop you mentioned to make a clearer statement for everyone who wish to use our surfboard equipment in the future. Apart from that it is always encouraging to learn that you are satisfied with our service as it is what we strive for every day.  Your kind words to our staff were shared during one of our meetings and we thank you for considering us again on your future visit.  brenny68, thank you for your kind feedback, and we hope to see you again soon for another enjoyable stay with us.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A peaceful Paradise
review: If you are looking for one of the most amazing, luxurious, and relaxing holidays, take your family to this resort.  Superb in every single way.  The pool, restaurants, the beach, other resort amenities and room were absolutely stunning.  The breakfast was perfection, so much on offer, variety and quality.  The infinity pool bar and beach bar were excellent, plenty on offer for adults and kids, so relaxing and overlooking the beach, just shear perfection!! The concierge service was well knowledgeable, the spa massage treatment was grat, and general customer service throughout the resort was second to none.  We felt special and didnt want to leave.  The room was spacious and having access to the pool from the room was a treat for the kids, especially when the staff came around…

title: Fabulous Resort & Fabulous Service
review: Dear Daz_8,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort, and thank you for giving us 5 star rating for your recent stay!   Our property, JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa, is a dream oasis and a perfect tropical paradise in Khao Lak. Our team is committed to delivering outstanding customer service and a true five-star experience. We are thrilled to learn that you had a great time with our hotel's prime sandy beachfront location and the longest pool with a total of 1.9km in length meandering around the entire resort.  It is particularly rewarding for us to receive such positive feedback. We are very pleased to hear you had a wonderful experience at the resort and our staff, breakfast, beach and resort facilities were able to delight you. I will convey your compliments to the entire team as your feedback serves us as great motivation.  Please let us know if we are of any help for planning your next trip to Khao Lak. We do look forward to making your next visit even more a memorable one!  Kind Regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Best Holiday Experience
review: The JW Marriott Khao Lak  goes the extra mile with well delivered customer care.  Once again meeting and exceeding expectations with a pristine and peaceful resort. Thoughtful touches make a big difference to comfort; including  mood lighting in the rooms, plenty of towels in the bathroom  and numerous  places to hang them. A Marriott beach bag provided for use during your stay and an extra large, extra comfortable bed.  The huge, well kept pool and surrounds offer plenty of areas to lounge including 12+ only zones, a family area and two swim up bars. Service throughout the property is attentive but never intrusive.  Excellent facilities including a well equipped gym, squash and tennis courts, book swap/ library, kids cub, games room with pool tables and a beautiful spa - …

title: Holidaying in a Kindergarten
review: We bought a Luxury Escapes Voucher for 10 nights which we upgraded to be a VIP Couples Upgrade, supposed to be in the "Couples ONLY" Zone. Well, guess what, there isn't one. False advertising ! Absolutely! We were also supposed to be notified that there would be renovations going on for almost the whole time we were there. Not notified BUT I did find out about them & contacted the Manager, Nicolai Mitchell & he told me not to worry as it wouldn't affect us. He said that only the upstairs rooms were couples only & children were still able to be booked into the rooms below us but that, as it wasn't school holidays, there wouldn't be many children. Ripped off for the upgrade we paid for - Totally !! We arrived & Toy showed us a room which had screaming kids in the room almost…

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Dear dioz,  thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share the feedback of your recent stay with us and the TripAdvisor community.  We are very saddened and sorry that you did not enjoy your stay, which was obviously mainly due to the presence of children. While we always take any feedback onboard and have discussed your review with our senior management team, please do allow us to respectfully disagree with some of the points you have brought up.  I would also like to take this opportunity to clarify, as I had mentioned in the email correspondence we had prior to your stay, what the "couples zone" refers to. Our resort sits on a very large footprint of tropical gardens and basically consists of two large U-shaped building arrangements, one of which is built around the family pool, with shallow pools, a jacuzzi lounge area, a slider and a swim up bar while the other is built around the adults only pool, as well as our Thai restaurant Takrai, our Japanese restaurant Sakura and, towards the beach-side another swim up bar. The latter has the couples zone on the first and second floor where we only accommodate adults.  We do have 1.9km long waterways that wrap around the whole resort, thereby also passing below the couples zone, which can and is enjoyed by couples and families alike.  Additionally we have an adults only breakfast area, which is located in the North Wing of Waterfront, an adults only pool area and an adults only section at the beach.  We are sorry that you felt that this was falsely advertised, rest assured we do neither want or intend to falsely advertise the different areas of our resort. What we want and strive for is to provide memorable vacation experiences, supported by Thai hospitality, to all our guests.  We were indeed busy when you stayed with us and had close to 500 guests in the resort, of which about 10% were children.  Once again, we are very sorry that their presence has impacted your stay in such a negative way. We are a resort property and as such popular with couples and families alike and I would agree with you that we would not be the right choice for guests looking for a resort which does not cater to families at all.  I am very sorry that we did not have the chance to meet personally as I was myself on annual leave during your visit and would have wished that you had contacted myself via email or Khun Mee, our Rooms Division Manager, whos name and contact details I had given you in our email correspondence, personally, in case that you have any queries or need any assistance during your stay with us.  It is always saddening for us to hear a guests disappointment after their stay rather than during their stay, as this deprives us of the opportunity to find a solution whilst on resort.  dioz, once again, I am very sorry that you did not enjoy your vacation with us and as you do have my contact details, I would be more than happy to further discuss your feedback directly with you.  Warm regards from a hot and sunny Khao Lak,  Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager

title: Awesome
review: We stayed at this resort last May 22 to 25, 2018.  My son celebrated his 11th birthday in this resort and we had dinner at their Italian restaurant, Olive. The staff prepared a birthday cake for him and the band (Pinoy band) sang for him.  The food was good at the Olive restaurant.  The highlight of the resort was the very long pool (takes about 30 minutes to walk around it- faster if you swim of course). There's also the beach. The Japanese restaurant was also good but you have to make reservations to get an indoor table. There are also good restaurants outside the resort- one is an Italian restaurant (Antonio's) just outside the resort which serves good pizza, risotto and pasta and a Thai restaurant (Blue Mist) which you can ask the hotel concierge for them to call the…

title: relax in style on a great sandy beach
review: Dear AnneP2838,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for celebrating your holiday season and your son's birthday with us.   We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service from the very moment you checked in with us and you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay. It is truly wonderful to know that we have been able to provide you with an extraordinary stay in Thailand, especially the 11th birthday celebration of your son.   Our room with pool access is the main highlight of the resort. It allows you to jump off easily from your terrace and that you can enjoy your own lagoon or swim over to go to the main pool and hang out at both Infinity and Aquamarine pool bar.  As for our food selections, we understand that many of our guests have different food preferences and tastes, therefore our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide a wide selection of high quality of food in every outlet including at breakfast, Ta-Krai Thai restaurant, Olive Italian restaurant, Sakura Japanese restaurant, and The Deli cafe.   AnneP2838, once again thank you for this wonderful review. It is through reviews such as yours that inspire all of us to continue to exceed our guests' expectations and can't wait to welcome you back to our little paradise resort in the near future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: The best food and hotel in Phuket. Try Olive restaurant
review: We’ve just returned from a fantastic stay at the Marriott.  Upon arrival we were meet with helpful friendly staff and the hotel itself is stunning.  We upgraded to a pool access room which our kids loved.  Our room was spacious, tastefully decorated and immaculate.  While their are many options,  can highly recommend breakfast at the waterfront (so many amazing options) lunch at the Deli and dinner at The amazing Olive restaurant.  The food throughout the resort is very high quality and delicious.   The grounds are amazing and as a keen Gardner I really appreciated the effort that went in to its upkeep. Our 6 and 10 year old absolutely loved the kids club and begged to go there everyday.  That said we really appreciated the adults only areas for those that want ‘time out’!But…

title: Amazing holiday
review: We booked an eight night package with Luxury Escapes and it was amazing. It was our first international holiday with our 9 month old baby and this was the best place to introduce her to travelling. The room was extremely spacious as well as the bathroom (loved the rainshower). The restaurants were all superb -  we loved Olive and the buffet breakfast at Waterfront. Great selection. The stand out though was the friendliness of the staff. They were 110% with our baby who loved being there. The service everywhere was amazing. Even walking down the hallway, you were always greeted by staff. There were too many names to remember (sorry!) but thank you to Pooh, Au (?) and Honey at Waterfront Restuarant and to Non at Ta-Krai. We'll definitely be looking at staying here again. The pool…

title: Amazing
review: Dear Maeish,  Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay and for having the time to share with us your feedback on TripAdvisor.  We were delighted to read that you enjoying your stay with us and particular satisfying with our spacious room, restaurants, the food, and we could exceed your expectations with our service. All of our team especially Pooh, Au, Honey and Non will be thrilled to your positive remarks.   Regarding our in resort food and beverage pricing, we are fully aligned with all other international five star hotels in the region.  We use only the highest quality ingredients, and work with the finest chefs and front of house associates possible.  However, please rest assured that we have taken note of your comment on this for consideration as well.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Khao Lak and highly appreciate you taking your time to give us a five star rating.  We look very much forward to welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa soon.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Paradise
review: We are just back from 8 nights and we had the most wonderful time. The resort is absolutely beautiful and the staff are so friendly and attentive. The food is fresh and delicious and service was impeccable, with a special mention to Tha and Enzo. Thank you, you made our experience so personal and memorable. Couldn’t fault the JW Marriott, was a prefect holiday.

title: Wonderful beach holiday
review: Dear emmaw599,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and for taking the time to review us!  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the customer service we provide really made an impact on your stay. All of our associates are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services, particularly Tha and Enzo at Olive Italian Restaurant.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be more pleasant than the previous one.  Regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Recent trip to Khao Lak
review: The resort was beautiful with the largest pool I've seen the facilities and restaurants top class the staff are excellent so friendly and helpful,your room had pool accesses (Fantastic ) the room was a large decorated beautifully with a full size bathroom and bath . For a 5 star resort it's very well priced great for a romantic getaway or families the staff are amazing with kids We stayed for 11 memorable days we had an awesome holiday and I will be rebooking next year  .

title: Another Excellent Stay
review: My wife and I have just returned from 10 days at this fantastic resort. Nothing is too much trouble for the staff and the facilities are first class. There will be extensive renovations commencing on the 20th May and going through until Sept 2019 with wing 1 to be completed this year. We would like to thank Mee who not only met us on our arrival but also came down to the Waterfront restaurant to catch up with us and saw us in the reception area on the morning of our departure. We had requested a room in the same wing as on a previous visit and this was arranged by Mee with a minimum of fuss. The room 3026 was in excellent condition and looked recently painted. The maintenance throughout the resort is excellent and there have been many small changes that make this resort a…

title: Beautiful Holiday
review: Dear Peter D,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. It is such rewarding indeed to read that you appreciated many aspects of your stay, especially the service provided by our staff at breakfast and Czar bar. Nuch, Nat, Pooh, and Czar bar team are the epitome of professionalism and genuinely cares about their clients. I am happy to learn that the team left a good impression on you.   Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team who would be very happy to receive your positive feedback.  The loyalty of you is of the utmost importance to us and we also can't wait to your return to Khao Lak again in the future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Wonderful relaxing time
review: My partner and I have had the best holiday - booked through Luxury Escapes.... We booked an upgrade room with a pool right outside our room! The food was amazing, the staff were brilliant and premises was just gorgeous! You are surrounded by pools and glamour ..... the staff especially Laila, Nat, Rod, Boy, Anna, Mind and Paula made out experience even more special  Thank you again .....  one thing that would make it perfect is in house movies for that rainy day 😀

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear pmsss,  I greatly appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Nothing makes my day like knowing our staff left a good impression on you. I am glad that you found our team to be friendly and courteous and glad to hear you enjoyed our pool access room, the food, resort surroundings, and found our staff services excellent and friendly especially Laila, Nat, Rod, Boy, Anna, Mind, and Paula.  Everyone on our team works very hard each day to keep our hotel looking at its best and works very hard to ensure our guests have an enjoyable time at the resort and leaves us with lasting memories.  Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team. The most prized reward to all of our associates is to know that their efforts to make our guests feel comfortable have paid off!  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Khao Lak and highly appreciate you taking your time to give us such a positive review!  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Hard to beat
review: I’m not going to say to much and repeat what’s been said before or be nit picking like some recent posts.   A superb hotel as you would expect from JW Marriott and I look forward to the extension and potential water park in the coming years.   As a Marriott Bonvoy card holder I received 20% discount on food and non alcoholic drinks, I did also find a promotion for 10% discount on alcohol at marriottasia.com. Staff didn’t know about this offer but prior to check out this was kindly rectified. There are a number of happy hours during the day on drinks.   We had room 3019 which had a view of the pool bar, a great location for people watching and seeing a bit of life. Other rooms can be in quieter locations with not such an open view.   We only ate at the hotel one evening for my…

title: Excellent Resort
review: Stayed here for 7 nights in Room 4031 pool access. What this means is you go outside your room and straight into the pool. On the veranda, you have a table, 2 lounge chairs with feet seats and cushions and a towel rail for wet towels & bathers. Walking into the room you have a bench for a suitcase, wardrobes and drawers, a safe, ironing board & iron. Into the bedroom area, a very comfortable king bed and 4 pillows.  A set of drawers with lamp, desk, large tv mounted on the wall, another set of drawers and space for another suitcase.  A chaise lounge, small coffee table and Thai style couch with a larger square table.  The bathroom is large, with a very deep stone bath, a large stone double vanity, shaving mirror, large walk in shower with an excellent rain head shower and hand…

title: Family holiday
review: Dear Jenny0401,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor! Really appreciated your very thorough review indeed!  It was a pleasure to host you during your vacation in Khao Lak and we are so grateful to hear that you spent a wonderful time with us and came back home with beautiful memories. At JW Marriott, we, not only strive to make every single moment of our guests count, to be stimulating and memorable, we always include "Wow!" factors.  It seems that the room you stayed and our breakfast were the highlight of your stay. The pool access room is a truly our best seller of all time and also a gift for every family with young kids when you can straight into the South East Asia’s longest lagoon pool right from your own veranda.  Last but not least, I would say our associates are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services, particularly Nee our superb room attendant.  Jenny0401, our guests satisfaction is our first priority, therefore we are pleased to read that you enjoyed each and every moment of your time here. We look forward to welcoming you back to our paradise again real soon!  Sincerely,   Keith Massey General Manager

title: Perfection... almost!!! We really had a great time but...
review: Great stay. Pool amazing. Spectacular sunsets. Nice food. Very friendly staff. Chefs took excellent care of our daughter who is coeliac. Thanks Silvano. Rooms were great either a poolside one or the mezzanine bedroom .

title: Comfortable!
review: Dear MatthewGarv,  Thank you for the kind review! We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us.   We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our rooftop pool access room, our spectacular sunsets, and were satisfied with the service of our staff especially chefs at our restaurants.   As providing the best experience we can for our guests is our first priority, our associates will be thrilled to hear that you have mentioned them in your lovely review.  We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Return to Paradise
review: I and my husband fall in love with Phuket when we first visited last year. This time, a month-long vacation, we've decided to explore more resorts instead of staying in just one place. Being Bonvoy members, we have plenty of choices, J.W. Marriott Khao Lak being one. Honestly we had second thought going here due to its location (Phang Nga, out of Phuket), we cancelled our first reservation but rebooked again months later. We were happy we did!!!  This was our last stop and we stayed 5 days. Coming from Karon (another Marriott resort south of Phuket), it was 2.5 hours land travel (120 km) but the ride was smooth.  Let me continue with my review as follows 1. Check in. Like the other Marriott hotels, they also have welcome drinks which we liked. Celium took care of us with check…

title: Fantastic family experience
review: This is one of the most family friendly resort we’ve ever been. Beautiful setting, impressive pool set up, super friendly staff. We went there with our 3 years old son and  our 4 months old daughter, Mr. Sartha and his team from Ta-Krai were the most helpful from the first evening we got there. Great experience!

title: An amazing stay at the JWM
review: Dear ms_elisalc,  Thank you for the kind review! We are very happy to hear that you had a fantastic family experience with us.   We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our pool, friendly staff, and found our resort in beautiful setting that pleases the eye and delights your senses, and also were satisfied with the service at Ta-Krai Thai restaurant.   As providing the best experience we can for our guests is always our first priority, our hotel staff will be thrilled to hear that you have mentioned them in your lovely review.  We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Superb Suite
review: Everything is true! The JWM Khao Lak has the best breakfast in Asia, the best pool in Thailand, an amazing beach, gorgeous rooms and most importantly, exceptional staff.  Thank you so much to beautiful Laila at the Waterfront, it was so lovely talking to you every morning. Thank you to Kwan (best waiter in the resort) and Tha the manager at Ta-Krai. Thank you to the amazing and hilarious Banana at Sakura and the lovely waiters Jay and Golf – Jay you are the happiest person we have ever met! And an absolutely huge thank you to Don, Bom and Bao in the gym (these guys are seriously underrated but they do such an amazing job in the classes and running the gym. They work so hard and are always full of energy whether it’s 8am or 5pm).  Ta-Krai is definitely the best restaurant for the…

title: Beautiful Hotel but too isolated
review: Dear  kuumoo,  Thank you so much for the review. The effort and time you spent in sharing your constructive review regarding your experiences with us are very helpful and appreciated.   First and foremost, we apologize for the service at Olive. Our top priority is to provide the best service that we can for our guests. For this reason, we are working on providing extra training sessions to eradicate this issue.  However, we are very happy that you enjoyed our professional service by Laila at Waterfront, Kwan and Than at TaKrai, also glad to know you enjoyed the professional service with Chef Banana, Jay, and Golf at Sakura. We would also like to thank you for your kind comments on our swimming pool and fitness center.  We once again apologize that you had a less than pleasant experience on our Olive restaurant, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Simply Superb - would highly recommend
review: Visited after school holidays in April-May 2019. Stayed in the suite, two story two bathroom room. Offered comfortable space to relax. Attended the one hour cooking class which I highly recommend! You get to prepare two meals in one hour,  make sure you book in advance, different menus for different days, so find your favourite!  All meals were included during our visit, quite a lot of food and choices to keep us entertained. The travel from the airport was closer to 1.5 hours and 1.75 on the return to the airport due to traffic and weather. Lovely resort and great staff! Make sure you get up for the sunrise and make sure you are at the beach for sun set!

title: The best service
review: Don’t know how to say for this hotel. Every thing good. Room very clean you get everything what you need in the room. Breakfast was good you get every kind of food. Good view good service. You get what you pay

title: PERFECT!
review: Dear SukiJones,  Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa and for taking the time to review us!  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the customer service we provide really made an impact on your stay. Our hotel staff are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services and  we hope your next visit will be more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Beautiful hotel set in amazing location.
review: In an idealic location the JW Marriott is a magnificent resort. You can do as much or as little as you like..with Daily activities..Beach Equipment etc..or as little as possible, just lounging by the pool reading a book. The staff are absolutely wonderful - From Front Desk to Groundstaff...friendly and always greet you with a smile. Thank you Laila from Waterfront, Tiahn from Housekeeping & Tha from Takrai ... the warmth you show and enjoyment you get from working here is obvious in the way you treat your guests.  I can not find one negative with the JW Marriott a truly luxurious relaxing holiday destination.

title: Highly Recommend!
review: Dear Droidster,  Thank you for choosing to stay with JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and taking the time to share your feedback with us.    I'm also delighted to hear that you enjoyed the daily activities we are providing, found our staff helpful and friendly, and that the customer service we provide really made an impact on your stay.  Our hotel staff are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services, particularly Laila from Waterfront, Tiahh from Housekeeping, and Tha from Ta-Krai Thai restaurant.   Last but not least Ariella W, I would like to once again express our deep appreciation on behalf of everyone for taking the time to share your wonderful experience in Khao Lak and we hope your next visit will be more pleasant than the previous one.  Sincerely, Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Just the relaxation I needed....
review: First impressions as you drive up to the hotel are great. Check in was quick and easy and bags arrived in room straight away. We jumped straight into the pool canal directly outside the room. Apparently the hotel has the largest pool system in Asia. This I can believe. The pool area's were very clean and uncrowded.  The beach was spotless. No lifeguards though which is unusual especially for a big chain like the Marriott. The hotel is well situated with local restaurants, shops, massage all easily assessable. We ate at the Thai restaurant at the hotel which I can highly recommend. Kids club was good and ticked all the boxes. Special thank you to 'Bell' although all kids club staff were friendly, professional and caring.  A big plus is the onsite dive shop which also caters for…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: We are a family of 6 and had 2 rooms.othrr than restaurant and drink prices in comparison to the local area I can not fault this hotel. The hotel is out of this world with its winding and Venice like pools. The staff are brilliant so friendly and extremely accommodating! Exceptional hotel design meant it never felt to crowded and very calm. Breakfast choice was also superb !

title: Wonderful holiday at the JW Marriot
review: Dear helenlangbourne,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for your excellent feedback and your kind mentions regarding our beautiful pool and the quality of staff services. It gives us great pleasure to know that we were able to provide you with the service that exceeded your expectations and that you had a memorable time here. Your feedback will definitely inspire and motivate us to keep our service standard and strive to do better everyday.  Helenlangbourne, we look forward to welcoming you back in our paradise resort during your next trip to Khao Lak.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Work, Rest and Play
review: We stayed at the Marriot for two weeks at the end of October, beginning of November. We are a family of 5 and booked two inter-connecting pool access rooms in Block 3. So much has been written about how wonderful this hotel is and I can not agree more. The pools, the stunning beach, the rooms-everything feels truly 5-star worthy. The breakfast is great and the other meals we had at the hotel including room service were of top quality- although admittedly expensive. We also frequently ate at the local beach restaurants or the local markets where food was also delicious and great value. The staff at the Marriot is however what makes this hotel so special. Everyone we encountered from housekeeping, the breakfast/restaurant staff, the ground staff-all treated us in such a warm and…

title: Outstanding
review: Dear EJandHK,  We really appreciate your comments and recommendations to all TripAdvisor readers. We couldn’t be happier to learn that you were impressed with your experience here throughout as our goal is to go above and beyond our guests expectations and that found our location convenient and easy to explore local Khao Lak.   Our staff is always ready to take good care of our guests and provide you the best service from check-in to the time we say goodbye. We strive to offer a "Home Away From Home " comforts and convenience, and to ensure you had a relaxing stay with us  EJandHK, we hope that your memorable stay will entice you to return to us in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Amazing hotel!
review: Spent 10 wonderful days at the JW and can hardly fault anything. The package we had included all meals and I have to say the food offerings are excellent. Our favourite was Olive, serving Italian food that would be at home In any big city in Europe. Chef Enzo has built a well oiled machine (pun intended). Wit and Nott our two main servers were excellent. Happy to chat but also knew when to give us some time. They were attentive, knowledgeable and also very funny. As for the food  WOW.  All the restaurants were wonderful, Thai, Japanese, the Deli and beachside and poolside dining.  Our pool access room was a good size and very clean and comfortable.  The layout of the resort is well thought out so you rarely hear your neighbors. Everything is easy to find and the staff are very…

title: Lovely swim up room, lacking some atmosphere
review: The unfortunate thing about our travelling experience is that we arrived mid morning to the hotel and could not check in until 3pm. This meant we felt our time was wasted. In fairness to the hotel there was a check out lounge where you could shower and play table tennis if you wanted to but we just wanted to unpack and get in the pool!   There were a lot of weddings in the hotel during our time and we did occasionally feel as though we were intruding on other people events just by walking or swimming past. We travelled as a family of 5 and was really disappointed when our swim up rooms were 7 rooms apart - we had emailed the hotel a few weeks before to request our swim up rooms together and was told they would do their best to accommodate our request - obviously they didn't.…

title: Beautiful hotel with inter-connecting rooms. Would definitely return!
review: Dear Polkadotz,  Thank you very much for you kind constructive feedback. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us.   Regarding your kind comments on our resort location, the beautiful and calm beach, and the largest lagoon pool in South East Asia we have to offer, we couldn't be happier to learn that you did make the most of your stay to enjoy them all.  At JW Marriott, it's our top goal to provide you with the memorable experience, leaving you a fond lasting memory.    Our sincere apologies for the shortcomings you've experienced during your recent stay at our paradise resort. Your comments have been highlighted to our senior management team for immediate remedial actions. I am so sorry to know that you had to wait until 3 pm after your arrival in very early in the morning of that day. We actually can't anticipate the occupancy of the resort in advance, therefore the only way to guarantee the early check-in is to reserve and pay for the room for the night before of your arrival. Otherwise, we can always keep your luggage in the reception, and use our facilities freely while waiting for the room to be vacant and ready for you.  Moreover, we have conducted an investigation into room allocation and make sure our prices of our food to be well in line with other five star hotel standards and will be improving our service too. Please rest assured that menu featuring local, organic, sustainable and premium ingredients in an elegant setting in order you to experience the real taste and freshness of our food.   Your constructive feedback is highly valued and it is guests like you that help us improve and strive for excellence.    We hope to see you again on your next trip to Khao Lak and highly appreciate you taking your time to give us  a constructive review.  Sincerely, Keith massey General Manager

title: Nice Visit
review: We’re a family of 5 (2 adults, 3 kids aged 13, 10 & 5) and we struggle to find luxury accommodation that suits us as we like to have a lot of space or inter-connecting rooms. We originally booked The Mai Khao Lak hotel but after reading some bad reviews we decided to change to the JW Marriott and we’re so glad we did! We requested inter-connecting rooms via email when we booked and were told they’d noted our request but they couldn’t guarantee it. We emailed again 2 weeks before we were due to fly and got the same response and then when we checked-in at 7:30am we asked again. They told us our rooms wouldn’t be ready til midday and still they couldn’t tell us if we had inter-connecting rooms but luckily when we got our rooms they were inter-connecting and we had loads of room to…

title: Fabulous family resort
review: Dear Paddy3891,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to celebrate such a memorable day.  We understand that many of our guests are staying with us for many days, therefore, we offer a number of indoor and outdoor activities suitable for both kids and adults, so there's never a dull moment in our resort. . It is our priority to ensure that we are to deliver the superb 'JW Marriott' service to our guests, and for the reason, our mangers are more than welcome to take any feedbacks from our guests.  Thank you for your kind comments about our staffs, we have shared your feedback and they could not be more thrilled.   We hope that the memorable service you had with us will entice you to return to us in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Decent Hotel
review: We are seasoned travellers both for work and pleasure and so feel we give a balanced view and  know value for money.  Beautiful and clean hotel. The gardens are very well kept and all the staff are exceptionally friendly. The hotel has a river style pool that meanders around the property and in front of all the room blocks. I’d strongly suggest getting a swim up room as it makes all the difference and is so convenient and the main feature.  Pros: Nice rooms - we had a swim up with glass front for little one.  Quiet (very, so don’t come here looking for entertainment) Friendly staff Beautiful beach Warm swimming pool & sea Great air con  Good kids club for over 6 years.   Cons: These are just facts rather than complaints Limited English kids channels on TV Expensive food and…

title: Relaxing...
review: We purchased a Luxury Escape package for a 10-night all meals,  family swim out room for 2A and 2C.   Pros: The resort was very clean with lots of options for dining or drinks at sunset. All staff are fantastic.. Great meal options... good kids club. You do have to book early for dinner if you want to eat at the 6 pm timeslot  Cons: Only gripe is the issue with the showers. We are in wing number one and had a problem with the shower either being too hot or cold. Every 20 seconds it would switch from cold to burning your skin hot. I cannot let my kids have a shower as they scream out after being burnt.  I spoke to the front desk who sent an engineer. He told me that he would investigate the heat pump.    I ring the duty manager (on the 21st of April) 2 hours later after…

title: Fabulous retreat
review: Dear Alio8,  We would like to thank you for constructively reviewing your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak resort and spa on TripAdvisor and to also apologize for the inconvenience caused during your stay with us.  Firstly, we would like to thank you for your kind comment on the cleanliness of the resort, a wide range of food choices, the beautiful sunset location we have, and I am grateful to know that you like our kids club too.   I am sorry to hear about the difficulty that you had during your stay with the showers and that ended up being a negative experience for you as we couldn't solve the problem. Thank you so much for raising this up to our attention. The engineering team has been alerted and are now actively looking into this matter. Please rest assured that our team has taken essential action and are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent future occurrence.  Our top priority is to provide the best service that we can for our guests; we are also working on a plan to provide extra training sessions to improve their skills and also eradicate this issue in the future.  Alio8, once again we deeply apologize for the aspect you mentioned and hope that we could restore your trust on your next stay with us.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Top Clasd
review: On being greeted at the hotel I was apologetically told that my room was taken and consequently I was upgraded to a suite. Great start start to the fabulous time I spent here! I had my own outdoor jacuzzi and shower, which on a star lit night is an amazing experience.  I spent a week here and most of that time was spent on the beach, swimming and kayaking, going for long walks and waiting for the breathtaking sunsets. There were plenty of activities on offer in the sports and leisure centre but the beach held sway, even over the hotel pool that snakes its way round the entire complex.  Breakfast was on an industrial scale with every conceivable food stuff on offer and the high point for me were the freshly squeezed smoothies and the wonderful selection of fruit for which that…

title: A must stay, everything was above expectations
review: Dear Mai2055,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your destination resort in Khao Lak and taking your valuable time to share your recent stay with others on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that you had such a memorable vacation here. It seemed like you’ve enjoyed the overall experience with us including the rooms, a variety of outdoor and indoor activities onsite as well as a number of food selections (Breakfast, Ta Krai Thai restaurant, Sakura Japanese restaurant, Olive Italian restaurant) We understand that our long stay guest may want to have different dining options. Therefore, we provide different theme night buffets by the beach side each night: Beach BBQ, South East Asian buffet, Persian buffet, East Meets West BBQ, Japanese buffet etc...  Our guests' satisfaction is truly the motivation for all of us to strive to keep up the good work. We all look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit.  Mai2055, we certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the future to create new memories at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Nice food and spacious toilet
review: Stayed here for a week with wife and daughter. A first class resort with outstanding staff who go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and ensure you have a special holiday. In addition to that the Thai people we met there from street vendors to tour guides were fantastic....polite helpful and courteous and we couldn’t have asked for more.   We will undoubtedly return to this resort in the future our stay was virtually faultless. I am an Ambassador Elite with Marriott and this is one of the best JW resorts we have used, well done to all.

title: Fantastic in ecru single way
review: I am feeling that my review will only repeat all the excellent reviews on here about the wonderful JW Marriott , so in fear of respecting so many things I hope to leave a few  helpful hints .  We are still here in the Marriott at the last leg of our wonderful holiday as said the hotel and its location are 5 ******* + we have been lucky enough to holiday at some fine hotels in our time but this one truly tops the bill in every single way . The beach that the hotel fronts is truly beautiful and by all accounts is much better than others in say Puket that are stoney , deep , and seaweed driven , here the beach is a complete sand bottom ( so don’t spend money on wet shoes as you will not need them ) no seaweed and the sea moves out at a gradual level , and as the hotel is away from…

title: Wonderful stay in JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: Dear Alison555550,  Many thanks indeed for your wonderful review and the kind recommendation you shared on TripAdvisor. It is truly our pleasure to learn that we have exceeded your expectations in terms of our facilities, F&B offerings and staff services, and that you had a memorable stay with us.   We are so pleased that you truly enjoyed your time here and that we were able to provide services that met your expectations. Your excellent feedback regarding the staff services and our wide range of facilities are very much appreciated and we are driven by reviews such as yours which motivate our team to strive to enhance our guests’ experience for memorable stays.   Thank you once again for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor and we look forward to welcoming you again in the nearest future.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Big family holiday
review: My wife and I had a wonderful two weeks at this lovely hotel in early April. On arrival, we were delighted to receive an upgrade to a pool access room which was great for a dip after a few hours at the beach to cool off: you can swim or paddle through miles here, it’s huge and peaceful. The gardens are amazing and immaculately maintained. We liked our room, it was spacious, comfortable, clean and quiet, though some areas needed minor refurbishment.  Undoubtedly, the staff here are a major strength. They are polite, professional and respectful. They lift the spirit with their greetings and genuine pleasure at having you here. If you have a problem, I feel sure they would help you sort it out, if possible.  Another strength, the great location. We breakfasted outside every…

title: Heaven on Earth
review: Dear johnhN5555CE,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa ! Thank you very much for sharing your experience on your return visit to our paradise resort.   We could not be happier to learn that we not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations. It seems the service from our staff is the key highlight of your stay as they put their heart into making each experience of our guests’ outstanding and memorable. I will definitely share your feedback with the team. There is no better motivation than your words of praise for a job well-done.  We're delighted that you were able to take advantage of our pool access room where you could directly jump in South East Asia’s longest lagoon-shaped pool and enjoyed our food selections, our chefs work hard everyday to ensure that guests are provided with a wide variety of items that cater to everyone's preference with high-quality and fresh items.   JohnhN5555CE, we hope that this wonderful experience will entice you to come back in the near future and we hope to see you again in our little paradise.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: The best hotel we’ve ever stayed in
review: We came to Thailand to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary. After spending a few days in Bangkok we came to JW Marriott in Khao Lak. We were greeted with smiles and a refreshing drink. The smiles from the staff have continued for the whole of our stay. The location is beautiful and the grounds are well kept. It's easy to venture off the resort with a taxi rank, just outside and there are bars, restaurants and Thai massages available along the beach. Nothing more relaxing than laid by the beach having a massage.  To add to our stay we arranged to renew our wedding vows at the JW, wow, Ivana was brilliant there was nothing that was too much. Our day concluded with a private meal on the beach. I won't go into more detail so not to spoil the surprises.   The food and drink are of…

title: Great resort, terrific staff
review: Located an hour and a half from Phuket International Airport, the resort sits right on the beach.  A swimming pool which wraps itself around all the accommodation blocks is 3km in total length.  Thai, Japanese, & Mediterranean  restaurants are apart of the complex, unbelievable food.  Buffet breakfast caters for all tastes and the choices are endless. Staff are very warm and friendly, waiters are always ready with a warm greeting and smile to assist you with any requests and service.  Activities are up to you, gym, squash, tennis endless planned activities to join in on if you wish.  Reception can assist with a myriad of activities externally, bike tours, kayaking, scuba diving,  bathing elephants, visiting temples, James Bond Island (Man with the Golden Gun) and a host of…

title: Great family holiday!
review: Dear PhilnSharon,  Thank you for taking your time to share your wonderful review with fellow travelers on TripAdvisor. We highly   appreciate your positive feedback and happy to learn that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay, including the large lagoon pool in South East Asia, the room, the facilities and activities in the resort.   Nothing makes my day like knowing that our associates have left a good impression and memorable experiences on you. I am glad that you found our team to be friendly and courteous. Everyone on our team works very hard each day to keep our hotel looking at its best and works very hard to ensure our valued guests have an enjoyable time while staying with us in order that they can leave us with lasting memories.  Thank you once again for your vote of confidence, it is a great encouragement to us all here at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and we look forward to welcoming you back again to even impress you more.   Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Not value for money
review: We went 8 days with a 6 and 2 yo in tow and had the best time.  The pool was great, the food delicious and the beach was perfect.  The staff truly makes the resort, especially Rod, J, Chef Mon, Mama Du and the team at The Thai restaurant.  Not only was the food delicious, the staff were so attentive. My children loved the team and Mama Du personally came out and gave us some curry mix to bring home! We also visited the spa twice and Roong and Ying were seriously the best therapists.  We have had our fair share of spas and massages and their technique, especially Roong was certainly memorable.  We had planned for a private dinner on the beach but due to bad weather, a private dining experience together with rose petals and candles was set up indoors by the beach.  Perfect way to…

title: 5 stars 🌟 all the way
review: Dear Vivian L,  Thank you so much Vivian for taking the time to share your honest review at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. We appreciate hearing what you liked about us and your constructive comments on how we could improve for the better for our services.  For your constructive comments about our room condition, we have alerted the engineering department who are now actively looking into this matter. We have also informed our Food and Beverage department about your comment on our breakfast for further improvement.  However, nothing makes my day like knowing your overall satisfaction and our teams have left a good impression on you. Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team especially to Rod, J, Chef Mon and Mama Du at Ta-Krai Thai restaurant, who would be very happy to receive your positive comments about their service because their most prized reward is to know that their efforts to make you feel comfortable have paid off!      We hope to see you again on your next trip to Khao Lak so that will allow all of us to restore you trust in us again, and again highly appreciate you taking your time to give us such a positive review.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Stunning
review: Nothing like a 5 star hotel who charge you £5 for a bottle of a bottle of water with your dinner to then live stream the football instead of paying for sky sports. Which is all well and good until they add 10% service charge onto every bill (even if it is just a pepsi).  We have also been incorrectly billed several times since coming here such  as twice for the same bill, or not accounting for the promotion.  The events are also very expensive. We paid near on £60 to attend the Thai new year event. Unfortunately rain turned the event upside down (even though it had been forecast for weeks). The event turned into a caravan park styled event of which nothing could be heard or understood. That being said the food was amazing.  The hotel is georgous, pool amazing, and sea views…

title: Fantastic hotel!
review: We found this hotel to be excellent.   We arrived late, about 01:00 hours & the check in was very professional despite the late hour. We were escorted to our room & the receptionist gave us a brief orientation of the room to get us settled.  We chose a Premium Lagoon Pool view room which was definitely the best choice for us travelling as a couple. The sofa facing the room afforded us privacy on the balcony. We almost booked a pool access room but were glad we didn’t as these rooms don’t really have any balcony privacy as they have access to the lazy river & there are always people floating past. It just depends what you want as I would imagine these would be great family rooms. The lazy river is a great feature to this hotel. The pools are all very well maintained along with th…

title: Just Wow!
review: Dear steveperryuk,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and thank you on your encouraging and supportive feedback!  It is great and heart-warming to read of your experience during your stay with us and found our products, facilities and services worth recommending. It gives us a sense of achievement and pleasure to read such positive comments from you.  It makes all our hard work and effort worthwhile and sincere thank you on your kind words. We hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you again.  Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Amazing place - 4028
review: Had a wonderful five nights at this resort in pool access rooms.  The staff were all so friendly and food and drinks all amazing.  Resort offers any amenities you could want.  We had a medical emergency late one night and the staff saw that we were well taken care of.  A fabulous vacation!!

title: A great experience after a bas start
review: Dear I7935OOjenniferp,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We appreciate you taking your time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  It is truly our pleasure to learn that we have exceeded your expectations in terms of our rooms, F&B offerings and staff services. The friendliness and service of our staffs is another highlight of our resort as we always put a personal touch to everything we do for our guests – and we truly appreciate your kind comment on this.   I7935OOjenniferp, It is our pleasure to have you with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Kind regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Love this place.
review: We are late afternoon on day 4 of our supposedly 8 night stay. It was cut back to 7 nights because our flight from Sydney was cancelled. We spent an unexpected night in Singapore at Jetstar’s expense. That being said it is our third visit to this resort and hopefully there will be many more. The resort is well maintained and the grounds are beautiful. As we will be in Thailand for another few weeks thought we would put our thoughts down now and address some of the amazing staff we have come in contact with during the last few days. Firstly, Tin in reception who again welcomed us like a family member. Some of the wait staff we see at just about every meal are (in no particular order) Nat, Leila, Mind, Thip, Oil, Dong and the top barista, Boy. We apologise to those who do not get…

title: Nothing Special, but beautiful beach
review: Big resort on the beach. Close to 300 rooms. Nice Architecture. Many things to keep you busy during your stay. Beautiful beach with enough chairs for everybody. Since there are no buildings on the left or the right of the hotel the beach is all yours for miles on each side. If you are close to the beach you have to walk a while to the lobby, and if you are close to the lobby you have to walk a while to the beach. If you are close to the beach you are closer to the Breakfast Restaurant, which is huge. I am not a breakfast person, but I do not think there is any food, bread, coffee, juices, fruits, meats, that exist in the world that you cannot find on those many counters. In the seating area I liked the area reserved for adults. I tried the Thai and the Italian restaurants, but I…

title: Fabulous Hotel with the most amazing Beach
review: Dear Terry2299,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and glad to hear about the aspects you enjoy such as the beach, an exquisite JW Marriott resort with an enviable location, and the factors you feel we should improve upon.   Recently Marriott Rewards has been renamed to Marriott Bonvoy in order to refresh our concept after Marriott Rewards has united with the Ritz-Carlton rewards and SPG. Marriott Bonvoy is more than a loyalty program, it is a travel program that enables members to travel more and experience more wherever they go and also with better benefits. Being the member means a lot to all of us especially you are a gold member, you will definitely receive the room upgrade, late check out, 25% bonus on loyalty base point and etc.   Providing a personalized and memorable experience by caring for each of our customer is what we strive for every day. Again we're very sorry that we failed to impress you, especially on your first stay with us. If you could write to us for more details at mhrs.hktkl.sr.marcom.mgr@marriott.com so that we can share with the team to improve the services and know what we missed, would be much appreciated!  Terry2299, we truly hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak in the future in order to positively regain your confidence in our services.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Amazing
review: Spent a week at the JW Marriott as part of a two centre stay in Thailand.  Stunning hotel.  We were there over New Year and the hotel was very busy during this time. Breakfast was amazing, so much choice and a fantastic egg station.  We only ate in one of the restaurant  - The Olive.  The service was probably some of the worst I have ever experienced -  total chaos.  We waited nearly 2 hours for our starters to come after asking where they were on a number of occasions as other tables that had ordered after us were served before us.  When the main course finally came it was cold.  At this point we had been in the restaurant for over 2.5hrs and it was approaching 11pm which was far later than we wanted to be eating.  We sent the food back and left.  One family we spoke to said…

title: Five ⭐️
review: Dear RachelDW1,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us about your experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. We appreciate hearing what you liked about us and your constructive comments on how we can improve our services.  First and foremost, we were sorry for the distress this has caused you during your visit at Olive. Your note regarding the unexpected service shortfalls during your stay has been raised among the team. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent future occurrence. Thank you for bringing this up to our attention.  However, we are delighted to read that apart from the service shortfall at Olive, we are truly humbled by your compliments on our location, rooms, an amazing stretch of Khuk Khak beach, and it's great to know that you did enjoy your time at the relaxing beach bar sipping on cocktails, enjoying the breathtaking sunset view and our live entertainment provided the mellow sounds for your reverie.   RachelDW1, once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   At JW Marriott, we strive to provide a superior service experience for every customer; therefore your feedback is very important to us. On your next visit we will ensure you have an enjoyable time with us and leave us with lasting memories.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellent Stay!
review: Stayed here for 2 weeks in a pool access room, half board. Absolutely fabulous hotel. Loved every minute. Great food and staff, especially Chef Enzo.  My only comment would be that they should better manage the reserving of beds on the beach. Have just booked again. Will be back here on 11 March 2020 for 2 weeks. Well done to management and staff. We loved our holiday. Thank you .

title: We truly love this place
review: It has been our 7th or 8th (I lost track) stay in this fine hotel. Every time I wonder if it will still be as nice as we remembered it from the last time. And every time from the very beginning of our stay it is all we could have hoped and wished for. The staff is marvelous. They are kind and extremely attentive in any way they can. We have the same room every year with its majestic view overlooking the entire property.  We do not really consider our selfs as "travellers". We are merely looking for a comfortabel place to spend many weeks in order to be away from the cold and a place where one can live into the day, feel save and well taken care off. This place has time and again fulfilled these wishes. We could live here and dream into the day. Everything around us went smooth.…

title: Lovely grounds and food but spoiled by a 3 day wedding
review: Dear 477PB,   Thank you very much for your lovely comments about your stay with us. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in Khao Lak, Thailand on your latest visit us.   I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay on your room and that the customer service we provided really made an impact on your stay. At JW Marriott, we are always so willing to "go the extra mile" in creating memorable stay experience for all our guests. Our team is very pleased to hear about your kind comments on their services, particularly Sorn, Nuch, and Pooh from the breakfast, Chef Enzo, Chef Eak, Wit the restaurant manager, Nott our Bar Supervisor, Mam our restaurant supervisor and Tanny our hostess from Olive Italian restaurant, Su one of the sophisticated housekeeping teams, and Bao and Bom from Fitness Center.   Moreover, Nicolai our Resident Manager, Mee our Room Division Manager and Patrick Director of F&B are also our great management teams who are behind every team success in bringing you a memorable customer service experiences and delivering on making your stay an unforgettable one.   It is fortunate that we have incredible teams who genuinely care about their guests and strive to provide an exceptional experience to every single person. They will be definitely happy to know that the efforts to make your stay comfortable have paid off by this lovely review.  We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us and hope to host you again on your next return to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Rather nice
review: My family of 4 (2 adults and 2 children aged 8 and 6) spent 8 nights here earlier in the month. We purchased through Luxury Escapes and went for an all inclusive package (breakfast, lunch and dinner). I’m torn writing this review as there are some spectacular pros for this resort but on the flip side there are significant negatives due to a 3 day wedding that closed off many areas. I would have given this hotel 4 stars if I wasn’t impacted by the wedding.   PROS  - The grounds are truly spectacular. The pools and garden are well kept and the gardeners do an amazing job considering how big the hotel is.  - The food at all three restaurants was fantastic and the chefs provided amazing service. Enzo at Olive (Italian restaurant) was the friendliest head chef I have ever seen in…

title: paradise
review: Dear Dem11,  Thank you very much for taking your time to write us your detailed feedback concerning your recent vacation at our resort.  We are very happy to read your wonderful feedback concerning our landscaping team and how impressed you were by the extensive garden areas of our resort.  Our Food and Beverage Team was delighted that you enjoyed your dinners in the various restaurants and rest assured that all associates highlighted will receive your feedback as well as a special recognition during our monthly get together.  We also take note of your comments concerning certain facilities and in the room and as we will embark on an enhancement and renovation of our resort from May until September this year we will certainly be able to positively surprise you on your next visit.  Please allow me to share with you that the nurse in our resort is indeed a registered nurse who works for the Bangkok Hospital Group, which is an international Private Hospital operating multiple hospitals and clinics throughout Thailand. The nurses rotate between hospital shifts and shifts at our resort. We are sorry that you felt that she was not professional enough and will certainly pass this on to the Bangkok Hospital Team.  Lastly please accept my sincere apologies that the wedding we had caused so much disturbance to you and your family. It is extremely important to us that all our guests have a wonderful time when staying with us and we obviously fell short in providing a consistently positive experience to you during the three days of the wedding.  Dem11, we sincerely hope that you will return to our little paradise with your family and are sure that you will have nothing short of a perfect vacation.  Very best regards,  Nicolai  Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager

title: 5-star hotel
review: Stayed with two children, Most things were nice, smoothies at the aquamarine bar were nice, however very overpriced. We had a connecting room with pool access and it was super! clean, however annoying that room cleaning came at different times every day. The olive restaurant was not bad. Also rather disappointing that our bed sheets had holes and stains on them. The beach was amazing and the sand was very clean. One time the hut on the beach where you got body boards had a rude man working there. I was also disappointed by the staffs lack of English, even ordering food was difficult sometimes. Some people would steal our sun beds and that was very rude. On the beach there is a good restaurant called “wonderful” which has cheaper food but of the same quality. Kids club was good.…

title: Couldn’t ask for a Better 8 Day Stay!
review: This hotel is amazing....clean, beautiful and big...but it’s designed with so many different areas, 3 pools that are connected with 1.9 km of pool waterways, which was totally awesome, restaurants and bars that you were never on top of each other. We saw Mee, one of the managers, almost every day either in the lobby, breakfast area or bar and she greeted us warmly.  Special acknowledgments to Poo, our hostess, in the breakfast area, who spoke with us every day, Kookai, our server in the Beach Bar, who wanted to know what our plans were and if she could be of assistance, Danny, at the front desk, Paula, in the Deli, and finally Art, Whiskey and Bee, in the Czar Bar.  All of you made our stay memorable! PS..... The hotel provided lots of bottled water in the room, which was very…

title: Amazing pool design. Can’t help but relax
review: Dear D3248RHmaryc,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing our paradise resort as your accommodation in Khao Lak and for sharing your wonderful feedback here.  We sincerely appreciate your kind compliments to our staffs Mee (our Room Division Manager), Poo at breakfast restaurant, Kookkai at Beach bar, Danny at the front desk, Paula at the Deli, as well as Art, Whiskey and Bee at   Czar Bar who are the true shining examples of staff who strive to deliver nothing but memorable services to you. We will personally share your great review with them as we sure it will further add an additional motivation to each and everyone of the team members to continuously deliver an excellent service to all of our guests.  With regards to the bottles in guest rooms, we're so excited to inform you that we're in the process of switching all plastic bottles to glass bottles in all rooms to support the local community and reduce their environmental impact. However, we will surely share your feedback to our management team for following-up and for further improvement   D3248RHmaryc, we do hope you will visit us again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to contact us if there is anything we can assist you with.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Three weeks in paradise
review: We were lucky enough to spend a lovely weekend at the JW Khao Lak with our family (girls aged 12 & 17). We found all the staff to be friendly, welcoming and helpful. It was a fabulous place to relax.
