We had an amazing duplex apartment, with stairs to the maisonette floor with king bed. 2 bathrooms, a large screen television for each floor and adjoining twin double room for our girls. Along with all the nice extras. We loved lounging in our robes on the balconies over looking the pools.   The pool is an outstanding design with picturesque river pools passing all the apartments which adjoin to the larger pools.   The beach is of soft white sand , which means for perfect Andaman aqua blue sea swimming (it was pristine with no plastic or nasties sited).   We ate at the Japanese…

title: Lovely place
review: Dear Karennewall,  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your recent visit to Thailand.   We appreciated your feedback and do agree on the point that our resort is located on one of the perfect beaches in Khao Lak, with its serene and peaceful surrounding coastline making it the perfect spot for relaxation and rejuvenation. We're pleased to read that you enjoyed our 2 bedroom suite and have tried our foods at different restaurants (Sakura Japanese restaurant, Olive Italian restaurant, the Deli Café and the Beach bar), especially the international breakfast buffet at our Waterfront restaurant.   Additionally, we truly appreciate your comments regarding the activities at our resort as we are offering a wide range of activities for kids, teens, adults and families whether at our Kids Club, Recreation Club, or Water Sports activities, so you’ll never have a dull moments in our resort!    Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you've experienced regarding the hotel reservation. Please rest assured we have addressed this issue with the management team for further improvement as we strive to provide nothing but exceptional experience.   Karennewall, We look forward to welcoming you back to our dream oasis in the near future. Please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A must try
review: Just returned after three weeks here February to March in a pool access room 4021 we were looked after by NEE who cleaned our room and made some wonderful towel animals and lovely floral displays in celebration of our wedding anniversary, this lady is an asset that Marriott hotels should cherish.     This hotel is ideally located on a fantastic beach the architecture and gardens are stunning each and every member of staff are incredibly service minded friendly polite very hard working. Breakfast at the waterfront restaurant was a delight with Nuch and Leila greeting us by name Sorn, Bank and Bus bringing our tea and coffee and remembering individual drink orders.     We ate at Olive on our anniversary very good food and wine. But by far the best food of the hotel ( going on…

title: Paradise
review: This is the third time we have stayed at the resort via the Luxury Escape package.  Its always the customer service & friendly staff that have us coming back again and again.  I would like to single out Nicolai the resort manager for his excellent customer service.  My mum and mother in law had a minor issue with their room, Nicolai and the team bent over backwards even with a 98% occupancy rate due to a wedding at the resort to move my family to another room.  It's this type of service which keeps us coming back.  Big thank you to Nicolai and the team 😬

title: Gorgeous Hotel
review: Dear Kainf2016,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the third time with the Luxury Escape package and your kind mentions regarding our good job in providing an excellent service standards and maintaining high customer satisfaction.   Seems like you were totally impressed by the service from our team specially the intuitive service from Nicolai, our Resident Manager. Nicolai always urges the team to go above and beyond to ensure a perfect stay for every guest.  Once again thank you very much  for your time sharing this review. We appreciate your kind compliments and please rest assured that every single word has been shared to all our team.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again in the future and please let us know if there’s anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Fantastic Hotel Complex with some deficiencies
review: It was simply paradise. Starting from the delicious breakfast buffet to perfect cleanliness and great service. All Staff are professionally service. Japanese food at Sakura Restaurant was really tasty. The room was spick and span. It's nice housekeeping team. "last weekend was very fantastic".

title: 3rd year in paradise
review: Dear Shanya_bunlu,  We would like to thank you for sharing your experience with us and other travelers following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   It is a pleasure to read that you enjoyed your stay and that the service attitude of our staff made a lasting impression for you! We are absolutely thrilled to learn that you had an enjoyable stay and our staff could make you feel like home. Moreover, we truly appreciate your lovely comments about your experience at our well-appointed room with the Thai style facilities within, all of our elegant and sophisticated restaurants especially the Sakura – Japanese restaurant with high quality raw materials and fresh ingredients in an elegant setting.  Shanya_bunlu, please let us know how we may assist in any way for your next return. We do look forward to making your next visit even more memorable !  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: The best resort in Khaolak
review: Fantastic hotel complex with extremely friendly staff and high service quality. Excellent price-performance ratio. Unfortunately there are not enough sunbeds and umbrellas available. The hotel rooms are well equipped and are relatively clean. However, the hotel rooms do not meet today's requirements of a 5 star hotel any more and need an urgent refreshment. Marriott offers free WI-Fi connection throughout the hotel complex, but with very slow transmission quality.

title: Beautiful resort and romantic sunset
review: Beach front Resort that full with many facilities. Stayed in pool access room. Room was cleaned and very nice ambience. Breakfast was busy with guests that came with families. We have tried Sakura Japanese restaurant which very tasty.  Staff are friendly and helpful.

title: Fantastic Service and food quality
review: Dear RainOppa,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review of your recent visit us at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  We are delighted to learn that you had an enjoyable experience during your recent visit and we will share your compliment with our colleagues to celebrate their success in creating magnificent experiences for our guests.   Our resort is both family and adult friendly, with different designated areas for children and families. At certain times, we indeed have a high number of families checking in, but we do separate families with kids and no-kids  zone for the convenience in every ages and everyone can enjoy private or noisy time.  RainOppa, we look forward to welcoming you back again to our hotel in the near future.  Warmest regards Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Superb resort in paradise
review: We are not stay here, just looking for good breakfast by checking from review. The water front restaurant is very nice place for breakfast. At the very beginning K. Beauty greet us with a lovely smile. K. Eve, Poo, Thip, Wat, and other staffs were very nice and always take care us during breakfast. We will come again next time.

title: Pure Relaxation!
review: Dear Paulkittisak,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa ! Thank you for sharing your positive feedback with others on TripAdvisor.  It was really a pleasure to read that you were satisfied with our breakfast offerings at Waterfront restaurant as our chefs work hard to ensure that we provide a wide variety of high quality food every single morning to start your days with the right energy! I would have to say our international buffet is famous not only in-house guests but also many other enjoy it!   The most importantly, thank you for your recognitions on Beauty, Eve, Poo, Thip, Wat, and our staffs. Please rest assured that your feedback are shared among the team and your compliments are truly words of encouragement for all our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.  Paulkittisak, we hope that your experience here will entice you to return to stay with us in the future so that we will be able to offer you an even better experience!   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Amazing
review: We did a package deal to the Marriott that included all meals. Breakfast is world class with an abundance of fresh food and fruit and superb bakery offerings. All three restaurants for dinner are also of a very high standard. There is also a nightly buffet on the beach. The staff are well trained and make an effort to meet every request. If the item you want for breakfast is not available they will source it for you. The gym and exercise classes are run professionally. Our room was on the pool level so we could slip into the water from our deck. The beach and sea were our preferred choice with an abundance of lounges and constant supply of cold iced water as you relax. There are several options for a light lunch all excellent. Alcohol is expensive.  Be sure to book your evening…

title: Great break
review: We live in Phuket but decided to take a short break in Khao Lak and chose the JW  Marriott. It was a great and peaceful stay, resort is beautiful, great food, wonderful spa and very friendly staff. We would return again.

title: Absolutely amazing
review: Dear Andy K,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   We could not be happier to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations and that you enjoyed our restaurants, and spa. Especially, you found our staff delivered an unforgettable experience while staying with us.   We look forward to welcoming you again to our paradise resort in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Expectations met
review: Highly recommend this hotel! Rooms are clean, nice staff, buildings/garden/pool everything is spotless. The gym has high quality equipment, great breakfast buffé. There are nice restaurants at the beach right outside of the hotel, try Pinkys or Wonderful! Its much cheaper than eating at the hotel (its very expensive at the hotel).

title: Comfort and relaxation by the beach
review: Dear Emma717,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for sharing such a great review on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased to know that you were impressed with the overall experience as our goal is to go above and beyond our guests expectations. Emma717, we wish you a wonderful day and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great relaxation and romantic sunsets.
review: We are currently coming to the end of a superb stay in Khao Lak having been to KL before .. The JWM is to all intents and purposes a wonderful Hotel/ resort far enough away from Khuk Khak Beach ( our last visit was the Ramada )..  this Hotel - (JWM) grounds and in particular the staff ( we have been fortunate enough to talk to ) have lifted our stay above the ordinary..  clearly the GM here ( in my opinion) runs a tight ship for the benefit of the guests and should be commended for his / her an the teams efforts ..  at this time in KL it is particularly hot and staff have been ensuring water is readily available throughout the resort ..it should be understood this is not a cheap hotel  Beverages are in a-linemen’s with other 5 star establishments we have stayed in as a general…

title: Secluded beautiful hotel with fab staff
review: Staying here at present for a week. On first day was dismayed as the usual culprits were laying out towels the night before so no sun beds available anywhere. However. Went to reception and winged a bit and a lovely lad found us two in secluded spot. Was delighted the next day when the assistant manager and another lad were removing all reserved towels of sun beds and notice had gone up that no sun beds could be reserved before 11 am. It was great sport watching the people return to reserved sun beds after 11.30 breakfast and seeing their towels gone. Well done Marriott Hotel is stunning. They actually sweep the grass. Lovely trees and plants and orchids growing wild . The pool snakes around the hotel and joins the main pool so you can swim for literally a mile. The beach is…

title: Beautiful & Seculded Hotel
review: Dear Trobertson123,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodation in Khao Lak and taking the time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   Firstly, We apologize for some inconvenience you have experienced regarding the sun beds, but we are delighted that the situation was resolved promptly and efficiently by our team. We, at JW Marriott Khao Lak, are always doing our best to accommodate our guests’ requests whenever possible.   We truly appreciate your compliments regarding the pool, the beach, as well as the breakfast which is always the main highlights of our resort where we offer a wide selection of high quality food to kick start your adventure in Khao Lak.  Trobertson123, we hope that you will have a chance to return to our little paradise in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Not 5*
review: My wife and I visited the Marriott in Khao Lak in January 2019.  We love staying at Marriotts because they are always beautiful, well kept, staff is professional and food is amazing.  The Marriott in Khao Lak definitley meets the gold standard Marriott is known for.  We stayed in one of the swim up rooms, which leads you to all of the larger pools and most importantly the pool bar!  The beach was amazing, well kept and there were crabs running all over the place.  We decided to stay here because it was more secluded, which was wonderful since we spent the rest of our trip in Phuket and Bangkok which were always really busy.  Overall we had a great experience and would highly reccomend staying here if you are visiting Khao Lak.

title: Beautiful resort, beautiful people.
review: Dear BerkCE,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and leaving such a great review to others in TripAdvisor.  It was really a pleasure to have both of you here and to know that all of you are satisfied with our facilities and services. We could say that we are an excellent adult- and family-friendly resort with lots of activities not only for children to enjoy, but also for adults to catch up the special cocktails during happy hour at our 2 swim-up bars (Infinity pool bar and Aquamarine pool bar)   Our goal is always to create 5* memorable experiences to our valued guests and hopefully with the desire to return! On behalf of the team, once again thank you for your recommendation and I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for another " home away from home" memorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Perfect holiday
review: We booked this hotel as a TUI multi centre holiday twinned with Krabi, Dusit Thani.  This was our second week and the week I was most looking forward too. The hotel is very over rated, the hotel is massive! Loads of people and not personal at all.   The room we were allocated was beautiful and always kept clean and fresh by a lovely room attendant called Jane.   Every morning was a fight to get sun beds! And we are early birds and still struggled some mornings. Sun beds were being reserved and not sat on for hours later! Some mornings the hotel had ran out of beach towels and didn’t become back available until 10am, this was infuriating as most of the ones were on reserved beds not even being used!   The breakfast had a great choice of food but again I wouldn’t say 5* I would…

title: Building work - 13 May to 30 Sept 2019 ??
review: I have a booking for July 2019 so not actually stayed yet !  I have just been advised that there is building / renovation work at this hotel, which involves wing 1 and 2 (the main wings that flank the main pool area) and the beach front `Restaurant and Bar.   I booked this hotel 4 months ago and there was not a single mention of this and or any information  of this work on their web site, yet they are still taking bookings.  Perhaps JW M will do the decent thing and put exact details of the work and impact to people's stay on the front page of their site.  I also emailed the hotel - no response to date.

title: Excellent beach resort in Khao Lak !
review: Dear saint6464,  Warm greetings from sunny Khao Lak.  Thank you for your feedback, I understand you were contacted by a third party yesterday and that you called us yesterday subsequently to find out more information.  We are actually currently reaching out to all bookings and informing our guests that we will indeed have some in-room renovations taking place. We are just to about to go live with our online notifications as dates of start and finish have only just been 100% confirmed, please rest assured, we want everyone to know in advance about the upcoming renovation as we do not want our guests to be surprised on arrival.  You are absolutely correct that the renovations will be in Wing 1 and Wing 2. Disruption to any guests staying in accommodation wings three, four and five will be extremely limited, if any.  This is due to the distance in between occupied  and closed off rooms, the nature of the in-room renovation and the daylight only work schedule, this coupled with the sheer size of the resort.   I am very happy to answer any further questions or queries you may have, as we are here to help with honesty and transparency being of the highest priority.   If you could please contact the resort directly, ask for me and I will make contact with you immediately.  We look forward to welcoming you later in the year.  Very best regards,  Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager

title: Hotel recommend.
review: This is an excellent beach hotel & resort in Khao Lak.  The following are some of the pros: - Right on a long beautiful sandy beach with very few people. - The sea is brillant - clean, warm and not deep. - Nice large rooms with all necessary comforts. I recommend room with pool access. - Great service (incl. cleaners, reception). - Large swimming pools. - All facilities are clean. - Reasonably sizeable gym, with daily free exercises (e.g. Yoga). - Excellent restaurants, in particular the Thai one. - Helpful concierge (helped us find organised tours). - Overall relaxing atmosphere with meditation music on all day and nice nature.  We experienced also cons: - We paid for a pool access room and we were given a different room for the first 2 days. It appears they were…

title: Fantastic - couldn't ask for more!
review: Dear Savvas123,  We would like to thank you for giving us a 5-star rating and sharing your experience on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay at our paradise JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort  Spa.   Thank you for the most complimentary words on our services, it's great to hear you had such a wonderful time with us and we're happy to hear everything had lived up to your expectation. All your comments both of pros and cons help us improve our service. We reassure you that your feedback will be shared with the entire staff.  Thank you again for your review, and we do hope to have the opportunity to welcome back on your return to Khao Lak.    Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: just ok
review: I got room number 1001, Beautiful room, clean and graded one, this hotel is for families so its not really my cup of tea, i look more night life.  the staff are very professional especially Mr. Kris (trainee) who helped me with all i asked him in front desk

title: Simply amazing!!!
review: You will not be disappointed in this hotel!! Me and my boyfriend absolutely loved it, was the nicest, most luxurious place ever! The buffet breakfast was amazing (not like a usual all inclusive buffet), so many different things to choose from all of a high standard! The rooms was spacious, nice and modern, couldn’t complain at all. The staff are very very well trained! All very polite and professional. The beach is lovely too! If your wanting somewhere to completely relax and wind down, this is the place! We stopped here for 4 nights while touring around Thailand and it was 4 nights of pure paradise.  At night time we had a walk to the few beach bars at the side of the hotel which was a lot cheaper than the hotel bar.   Overall, I would 100% recommend, I’m sure anybody would…

title: Second time - still very good
review: Dear 82brit,  Thank you so much for reviewing us of your recent experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. We are thrilled to read your had a comfortable and pleasant stay at our dream oasis.   We are so happy to know that we made your trip to Khao Lak "Simply Amazing"! How nice to hear that you had a wonderful moment in our little paradise and enjoyed many aspects of your stay. We are delighted to know that we have managed to exceed your expectations and succeeded in providing you with a memorable experience that made your 4 nights so memorable.  The whole team works very hard to provide all our guests with a top-notch experience and your feedback motivates us to keep up the good work.  82brit, once again, thank you very much for the strong recommendation and we all look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: What a wonderful place !!
review: For the first time ever we decided to go back to a place and in this case then the JW Marriott. We knew what to expect so maybe we also expected a lot. In general the estate is maintained very well and has excellent service. The beach is long clean and almost empty. What I really like is that despite we being there in high season it does not feel crowded at all. You get a daily big ration of water bottles for free and this is something that in other hotels you have to ask for. Not here. The gym has been improved a lot since we were here the last time and it’s nice that they have taken note of this feedback. Also, tennis, squash, bikes, wakeboards are all free to book. The WiFi is also phenomenal. You can watch videos on many devices simultaneously which the kids really enjoyed.…

title: Heaven
review: Dear joachimb288,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you very much for your loyalty and for taking your time to share this review following your recent stay with us. It’s always wonderful to welcome our returning guests to your home-away-from-home again!  We are delighted to know that we have managed to exceed your expectations and succeeded in providing you with a memorable experience that made your second time with us still special. However, I am very sorry to hear you could not enjoy the croissants as last time. I have taken note on this to our kitchen too to keep their good standard. Regarding your comment on the small bottles of water that we provide every day. Please rest assured that we are now considering ways to promote the minimum usage of plastic products for our Mother Earth.   joachimb288, thank you so much for your time to review us and give us some great recommendations. We all look forward to welcoming you to the resort again to see the change in the future.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Beautiful resort
review: First time in Thailand and our choice of accommodation fell on JW Marriott Khao Lak resort and Spa ... and what a choice!  The place is incredible in all ways, the restaurants pure class, the staffing exceptionnel (always smiling and service oriented) and the rooms and surrounding areas are astonishing with the ocean right at your feet.  I can only recommend this resort to everyone that would like peace and harmony combined with the best service you can imagine - my deepest respect to the management of JW Marriott!

title: Amazing place to relax
review: What an amazing resort…so hard to find any fault with our recent family stay in a duplex suite. The facilities are extraordinary and the staff are incredibly helpful and friendly. The breakfast buffet was outstanding with so many options available and many dishes cooked to order. With so many restaurants on offer and the variety of themed dinner buffet experiences by the beach, our hardest daily decision was deciding where to eat dinner. The swimming pool and connecting waterways meant that even though the resort is large, it never felt as though the pools were crowded, and the beach provided amazing stretches of beautiful white sand in relative quiet. The spa provided a wonderful (and reasonably priced) massage service – so relaxing! We also enjoyed the other activities on…

title: Money thank you for your help!
review: Dear gregbeaumont,  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience with us, we are very grateful for your comments to your recent stay. Moreover, we are glad to learn that you had an overall good experience with us and how pleasantly your stay was.  We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed a wide selection of food items in our extensive breakfast buffets, the variety of themed dinner buffet, found our beach and pool are quiet and comfortable, and very glad that you were satisfied with our services and various facilities.   Our guests are our main priority and therefore, making you feel like home is our main objective. Our associates will be thrilled to hear that you have mentioned them in your lovely review.  We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: The true meaning of hospitality
review: Great stuff great service great food. Awesome location very relaxing and spoiling   We would like to Thank Money who makes our 13 YO girl the best birthday she could ever have.  She was very helpful during our staying

title: The perfect honeymoon destination!!!
review: Dear Doron K,  Thank you for the kind review! We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us.   We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our food, found our resort conveniently located, and we are happy you were satisfied with our comfortable facilities as well as friendly and professional services from our entire resort associates.  As providing the best experience we can for our guests is our number one priority, nothing makes my day like knowing our associates left a good impression on you, particularly for praising the effort of Money to go an extra mile to appreciate your daughter's birthday.   We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Beautiful, big hotel.
review: The hotel remains fantastic - last visit’s only small complaint about poor wifi has now been resolved w superfast wifi everywhere.  But surely there are other  beautiful luxury resorts in nice locations. What makes JW stand apart is the staff.  No matter who you meet from manager to gardener, all smiles & friendly greetings going out of their way to help. Breakfast buffet is legendary and the team once more gave our now 9 year old a fantastic start to her birthday. And Enzo, the brilliant Italian head chef in Olive’s, treated the whole family to a special pizza-making experience in his kitchen in spite of being in the middle of the frenzy of preparing for next day’s Valentine extravaganza  Thanks from all 6 of us, for sure there will also be an 8th time:)

title: Superbly planned and beautifully executed - a fantastic experience
review: My husband and I stayed for a short 4 night break in February 2019.  We were hoping for a few days of rest and relaxation in a tranquil, convenient, and luxury hotel where everything was on hand without being too busy and "resort-y".  The JW Marriott did not disappoint.    This is a family resort but does not feel too busy or over-crowded - save for a slightly hectic breakfast time.  That said, with one of the best quality and most varied hotel breakfast spreads on offer, accompanied by good, free flowing coffee, and friendly and attentive staff, it is very hard to complain.    We stayed in a duplex room with a balcony - very spacious, and although without swimming river access, definitely better for privacy.  The well planned layout and swimming pool river "experience" which…

title: FAB! Beautiful, luxurious resort with Thai Style
review: Dear KLenks,  We are very much appreciated of your comments regarding your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and for taking the time to share with us your fantastic experience.   We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay, liked the design of the resort, found the resort conveniently located, and were satisfied with the facilities and glad to know that our associates were around to assist you throughout your stay to provide a remarkable holiday.   KLenks, I appreciate your loyalty and your continued trust in us and we hope that you will stay with us several times more on your next trips and looking forward to your next stay.  Warmest regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Fabulous holiday
review: LOCATION & ATTRACTIONS NEARBY *** JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa is located on a beautiful stretch of a sandy beach, surrounded by greenery inhabited with birds and different friendly creatures. Just 2 km from colourful Khuek Khak Temple and main road of Khao Lak (you could call it “centre”). Fantastic locations and sunsets in this spot are out of this world! Just check out my photos! Absolutely amazing and Khao Lak is know for this. Hotel has small parking attached, where you can self-park or use their valet; complimentary car park.  HOTEL OVERVIEW *** Do not be afraid that this “chain hotel” will have no local charm or atmosphere! The entire resort is stunning and probably one of the best I have ever stayed. It is a very spacious and large property, divided into two…

title: Wonderful stay
review: Dear marqoos_pl,  Thank you for the kind review! We are very happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us.   We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed our lagoon pool access, found our resort conveniently located, and were satisfied with the service of our associates.  As providing the best experience we can for our guests is our number 1 priority, our hotel staff will be thrilled to hear that you have mentioned them in your lovely review.  We would like to once again express our deep appreciation for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor and for recommending us to other fellow travellers  marqoos_pl, we hope to see you again in the very near future!  Sincerely,  The Management Team

title: Not impressed.
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks from 9th to 24th January.  We had a fantastic time.  We arrived really early, but our room was ready after we had breakfast.  A porter took our luggage to the room.  The room was lovely (2106 I think).  It was large and spotlessly clean with a large balcony and sofa.  The staff are truly amazing and a credit to the hotel.  Nothing was too much trouble.  We were bed and breakfast and the breakfast was fantastic.  Everything that you could want, and it was so good.  We ate at the hotel on 4 evenings.  It’s very expensive.  We walked along the beach in the evenings to Pinky’s beach where the food and drink was very good and inexpensive.  It was so lovely eating on the beach as well.  The hotel also offers a courtesy taxi to a couple of restaurants.  We…

title: Would return
review: There was no porter to help with bags; albeit our arrival was pretty early at 7am.  The room we requested was not ready but they allowed us to use another room for the day.  Not sure if this was because we are Platinum Elite but it was appreciated.  Furniture in rooms are pretty worn; even the hangers were chipped and scratched; one cupboard door almost off it's hinges. However we noticed that there was maintenance (or upgrading) work going on with several rooms while we were there.   Housekeeping did a great job.  It's a thankless job and they deserve to be tipped every day.  Slight sewage smell but spraying perfume helped. The long pool was great but cleaning was erratic.  Sometimes it was clean and other times full of leaves, flowers and pollen.  Staff were mostly nice.  Many…

title: Well kept property with great service
review: Dear Jin29,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa during your recent trip to Khao Lak, Phang Nga and for constructively reviewing us on TripAdvisor. We are very keen on hearing about the aspects you liked during your stay and the factors you feel we should improve upon.  Regarding your kind comments on our service and friendliness, our associates especially Praew at Concierge and our housekeeping team will be very happy to learn that you enjoyed their services. At Marriott, providing a memorable experience for our guests is our top goal and we are very happy that their efforts to make you feel comfortable have paid off!  For your constructive comments about our rooms, we do have near future plans to renovate and we hope you come back to our resort again after the renovation finish in September. We have also informed our concierge team to keep an eye on every guest and help with their bags and luggage every time. This is not the usual standard JW Marriott prides itself upon, I do hope that you will look upon this breakdown in service as a one off and give us an opportunity to restore your confident with us again in the future.   We hope to see you again on your next trip to Khao Lak and highly appreciate you taking your time to review us.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A Beach Resort that is the Total Package
review: We just finished a stay here and were very pleased.  We booked the family pool suite and it exceeded our expectations.  The food is great from breakfast to room service to pool and beach bars.  The sunsets and the beach are second to none.  The pool is very large and has places to have fun with friends and also tucked away places to have privacy.  We will absolutely stay here again on our next visit to Thailand.

title: Nice hotel, expensive food & drink.
review: Dear benhI2859XB,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your holidays.  We are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our Family Lagoon Pool Access, it sure is a treat to have a more spacious room to relax and enjoy your days. We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable time with the service of our associates, our infinity pool and bar, the location of our beach, and the wide selection of our breakfast. Please rest assured that your feedback are shared among the team and it would be a pleasure to service you again in the near future.   Please do let me know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better. Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Fab hotel in lovely location
review: I recently returned from a 8 night stay in a pool access room in block A. I like the privacy of the brush outside of the patio while sitting outside.   This is the only resort that we have returned to, and our second visit was equally as impressive.  We took advantage of all that the hotel has to offer; spa, all of the restaurants, bars, pool and beach.  Of our 6 year travel experience in SE Asia, this resort is a total package.  With the hotel being at full capacity, at no point did it feel crowded.  There was not a wait for a table at breakfast or difficulty finding a chair at the pool or beach.  All of the restaurants were of the best I've had at a beach resort, with the Olive restaurant (Italian) being our favorite. Breakfast was good with plenty of options, and with the…

title: Stunning resort
review: We had a wonderful week at this beautiful hotel.  Main highlights: - the pool is spectacular. Despite a large number of guests with kids it never felt noisy or crowded and it is so big that you can find your corner quite easily - beach is great..you can swim in the sea as well but it was a bit choppy - breakfast was fantastic..huge spread - great service..special mention to Patrick who was very friendly and always stopped to chat and see how we were getting on. Bianka at check in and Tin at check out- very friendly and helpful. Service at happy hour in the beach bar was great - rooms were spacious and well decorated. The bed was very comfortable and air conditioning super effective. House keeping did a great job - location. there are good local restaurants and beach massage…

title: 5 stars but basic.
review: Dear brightyellow4,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your honeymoon trip. We much appreciate your review and found it’s very helpful for all readers on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to learn that you and your family enjoyed the facilities and services in the resort including our beautiful Khuk Khak beach. It’s great to know that you enjoyed a massive spread of breakfast, your rooms provided, restaurants and our large swimming pool. It’s 1.9 km long and it wraps around the entire resort, surrounded by lush greenery.   Thank you so much for a special note on our staff, it’s wonderful to know that Patrick (our Director of F&B), Bianka and Tin from the front desk and the entire team of the resort made a good impression on you. At JW Marriott, we strive for excellence as it is an important part of professionalism and our most prized reward is to know that the efforts to make every guest feels comfortable have paid off!     We appreciate your kind compliments and please rest assured that every single word has been shared to all our team, including the staff mentioned. Moreover, we have taken note of your comments about the room and have already considered to make further improvement.   Brightyellow4, once again thank you for your review and look forward to your next visit.   King Regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Fantastic place
review: The hotel is nice, staffs are polite but nothing is surprising. We are a member of Marriott Club, so got an upgrade to a pool access room. However, the glass wall at the balcony (between balcony and pool) looked very muggy. It put us off, so we asked to go back to the standard room we booked which is located on the second floor. The hotel does not have lifts/elevators. The pool is very big and nice but it made me think how hard it is to clean to whole swimming pool and wondered how clean the water/how much chemicals its been added in. I spotted some guesses set up a small snack/beers party on their balcony while sitting/eating/swimming as well. Lots of crisps/crumbs possibly added to the pool each day. In general, it is nice and relaxing. Beach is great. Breakfast buffet offers…

title: We make recommendations
review: Dear unalomew,  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback concerning your recent stay with the TripAdvisor community and us.  We are delighted to learn how much you have enjoyed your upgraded room with direct access to our 1.9km long lagoon style swimming pool. Rest assured our pool hygiene is of the utmost standard – we have a team of 80 giving their very best each and every day to maintain our pool and garden areas. The pool water quality is checked twice a day and is cleaned several times throughout the day by our team. All glassed areas around the whole resort are also cleaned on a set schedule and additionally when required, in your mentioned case we had a short tropical shower and hence there were rain drops that dried up on the glass visible. Our Housekeeping team has of course rectified this as soon as they could. Thank you very much for your most positive comments concerning our restaurant offerings and we are delighted that you enjoyed Chef Mama Du’s Thai specialties at Takrai, she does take a lot of pride in sourcing the best available ingredients locally and some are handpicked from our small vegetable garden right next to Takrai.  Unalomew, we hope that we will be able to welcome you back very soon for a second visit and some more delicious Thai signature dishes prepared by Chef Mama Du.  Very best regards, Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Excellent Choice for a stay in Khao Lak
review: We were here for 2 weeks, it was fantastic! The hotell is beautiful, staff are so nice. Awsome breakfast! Special thanks to Enzo and his staff in the Olive restaurant!  We are leaving tonorrow but will definetly come back!  I have never had such a nice service in a hotel!!! Thank you so much! Christine

title: Beautiful hotel in a gorgeous setting
review: Had a warm welcome following our private transfer from the airport. Staff were very helpful at check in and took care of everything. Nice member of staff took us to our room which was lovely, large and well furnished with plenty of storage. Good size fridge and great patio onto the swim-up pool, again well furnished. Nice bathroom with everything you need.  Particularly liked the beach bag, wish I’d bought one. The hotel is set on the most beautiful beach with a lovely layout. Restaurants served the most amazing food, congratulations to all the restaurant staff from the chefs to all the waiting staff they were fabulous.  Particular thanks to the staff for making my birthday so special, loved the morning pancake and being serenaded and also thank you for the yummy chocolate cake…

title: .. still stunning .. superb stay.. we will be back
review: Dear lizh215,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort and we were glad to be a part of your memorable birthday celebration !  It is our priority to ensure that we are able to meet our guests expectations when it comes to beautifully maintaining our facilities, and the service of our associates. It is our key priority to ensure that our guest have a memorable experience and leave with an utmost feeling of relaxation.  Lizh215, we cannot wait to welcome you back again to our JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa family! Please let me know if there’s anything we could do to make your stay even more exquisite!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: A Winter destination
review: For many years my wife and I have traveled to the JW Marriott in Khao Lak. We always returned back home with wonderful stories of this breathtaking tropical paradise. Many of our friends would always ask why make such long journey from the east coast of the USA. Our reply was always "just try it one time and you would understand". Well this year friends decided to do just that and they joined us for the long trip for a  holiday in Khao Lak. The stunning resort with its picturesque deserted beach was only outdone by the care and commitment of its staff. From the gardeners to the front desk you feel cared for and so very special. The resort lived up to my boasting and hype and was described by our friends as the best holiday they had ever been on.  Simply stated the resort is more…

title: Top top top!!
review: Dear TandJalliance,  Warmest greetings from us, at JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa. It was our honor to be your choice of destination resort in Thailand. You review of your recent stay with us is much appreciated!  We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable experience with the service of our associates and our resort's ambiance from the very first moment you checked into our resort. As you have mentioned about the friendliness of our associates, as they love what they do, it genuinely shows from how they interact with our guests.  Thank you for your kind comments regarding our bar, restaurant and food, our team work hard to constantly innovate new food menus, and strive to offer our guest a luxury drinking and dinning experience, as well as the service our spa's associates. We take pride in our professional and organic treatments, our Quan Spa has been voted top 50 Spas by Booking.com  Please rest assured that we have shared your appreciation and kind words to the associates you have mentioned by name, and they could not be happier!  TandJalliance, once again thank you for your recommendation! Your continued loyalty to our resort is much appreciated, and it would be our pleasure to service you again in January.   Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa +6676.584.888

title: Not enough good words!
review: As with all reviews, the positives should be highlighted first. The grounds were immaculately maintained, and decorating seemed to be continuous on the external areas. The pools and toilets were constantly the subject of cleaning and the pool water temperature ideal - albeit and unbelievably, the see was slightly warmer still! The restaurants were clean, the range of food on offer to suit every taste and the only negative was that sometimes it could have been a little hotter. The variety of evening theme nights gave a great opportunity to taste a whole variety of foods from throughout Asia and some of Europe - a great innovation. It was usually possible to eat outside at every meal (unless a tropical shower intervened) and for a European, this was a great novelty.  The…

title: Jw Marriott Khao Lak
review: This was the families first time staying at this resort. What a large ground, the pool goes on for ever and being such a big resort it felt like you had the place to yourself. Being an hour and a half away from Phuket it is a quieter area but there was still plenty to do close by from the local markets to sightseeing.  The staff at the resort were excellent and all were so friendly and the food fantastic, especially the buffet breakfast. . A great place to star

title: A slice of Heaven
review: Dear Michael H,  We first of all thank you for choosing our paradise resort for your recent stay and really appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback here on TripAdvisor.  We are thrilled to here that you had a memorable experience with us and enjoyed our resort facilities, especially the service from our staffs and breakfast which are truly the top highlight of JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Your feedback is very important to us and it serves as our greatest motivation in providing even better experience for future stays.   Michael H, we sincerely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay in the future.  Sincerely, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Superb - one of the best hotels we've been to
review: A beautiful, well maintained resort hotel with lots of amenities and several good restaurants.  Infinity pool, very good sandy private beach, kids activity room, check out resting place, marvellous breakfast in an open setup and lots of special features.  The staff are so polite and go out of their way to help .   It feels so private that your don't realise there may be 300 rooms.  It is worth the money.  Highly recommended for couples, for groups or for families.

title: Relaxation and sport with family and friends
review: Dear Bianl7,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and rating us five star here on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your kind words regarding our resort facilities and services. We must say that our resort is both adults- and family-friendly as there is plenty space for everyone to enjoy their privacy. Once again thank you for your recommendations and I will pass on your compliments to the entire team as your feedback serves us as great motivation.  Bianl7, we hope that you will think of us as your choice of destination resort again in the near future. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards, Hataichanok R. Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: What a very lovely place
review: I `ve spent two weeks here with my husband and a 9 year old daughter at the end of August/beginning of September 2018, which  is considered low season. The hotel is not booked to the full but there are still many guest there: Europeans, Australians, Chinese. The big upside of the low season is that you do not have to fight for the sunbeds (even though you can see that some people still practiced leaving their stuff early in the morning and reserving their spot under the sun– a sport very popular among Germans but more widespread in cheaper hotels than this one- I am just hoping management is undertaking something against this). The downside is that you always have a lingering threat of the rain (even though we were very lucky and despite having several cloudy days it did not…

title: Amazing hotel ground but room is old and needs better maintenance
review: I checked into room 2107 of this resort today. Check in was smooth and the hotel ground is very beautiful. Service is excellent. I chose this hotel because I trust the Marriott brand and have never been disappointed with the group’s properties, not even for 3-star ones.  I originally booked direct but switched to a Luxury Escape.com  package this time as the deal offers great value. Maybe because it is a Luxury Escape.com package the rooms assigned are of poorer quality. Most of the furniture ( desk, cabinets) are chipped or stained. When I tried to use the safe, the whole keypad panel fell off and the maintenance guy had to take away the whole door for fixing at his department. I then checked for other defects and found the shower drainage was a bit clogged. Housekeeping…

title: Can it get any better?!?
review: Dear Wendy K,  Thank you so much for your great feedback regarding the hotels public areas and our associate services provided to you on arrival.   Our sincerest apologies concerning some of the loose furniture in your room. We do have an extensive maintenance and upkeep program as many of our guests often comment on how well maintained our resort is.   Your room clearly has been missed and I once again sincerely apologise. As spoken to you earlier today, we would love to offer you a room move but you have politely declined and please rest assured, this is a mistake on our behalf and has nothing to do with the package you have purchased.  Enjoy the rest of your stay.

title: Great Family Experience!
review: This is our 4th trip to this resort, and rather than getting old for us, it gets better every time.  The weather in January is spectacular (note to self - this is the time of year to come). We’ve only had a couple of brief rain showers during our stay that haven’t interrupted the trip at all.  This time, we decided to stay in the deluxe pool access room in Wing 3 (we’ve stayed in the family pool access room previously which is larger). We’ve really enjoyed having a balcony and the kids love being able to play in the pool right in front of the room.  Nothing is too much trouble for the staff here - all of our requests have been met immediately, and given the resort must be at near capacity, this really impressed me.  One of my daughters has an anaphylactic allergy that we…

title: Wonderful resort
review: Dear Kbbond,  Thank you for your loyalty to us at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! It’s always a great pleasure to welcome returning guests back to our paradise!  We are pleased to hear that you are able to take advantage of our Pool Access Rooms where are the key highlights of our resort which is highly recommended. You can just jump right to the pool with approximately 1.9km long, a minimum depth of 0.3 - 0.5 meters to accommodate for children and a maximum depth of 1.5 meters for all our guests who enjoy a good swim or just the float around the soothing warm waters.   Thank you for highlighting the efforts of our staff. Our team works hard every day to ensure that guests have the most memorable stay and wish to return to see familiar faces here.   It would be a pleasure to welcome you back as the 5th trip to our resort paradise. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Swim Forever
review: We stayed at the Marriott for the second time this year and have to say, it was a great stay and there have been some very good improvements to the resort. We’re a family of 4 and travelled with two young children (3y / 5month at the time). Pickup with matching children/baby seat was organized by the hotel and worked without problem. In the resort we were granted an early check in (9 am!!!) into a room where everything was set up for children (baby cot / sterilizer for bottles, microwave to heat the food, …). Personally, I have never experienced such an extraordinary welcome service before. In general, they have added mattresses to the beach beds, which means one does not lie on the rather hard beds anymore, but chillin at the beach is now truly relaxing! Breakfast offers a wide…

title: 6th time and we'll be back
review: Amazing ''retreat' once again- perfect 11 days spent in Paradise! I adore the snake-like pool where I can swim for hours, the calm sea, the beach walks for miles and miles, the spa, Yoga on the beach...This year I also went riding on the beach with Khao Lak Riding Club (concierge booked this in minutes for me) and can highly recommend! My horse was Monkon and he was really well-behaved and a dream to ride. I would also like to thank the following staff members for making our stay enjoyable:  Mr. Mai, Mr. Don, Mr. Bom and Mr. Bao from Fitness desk- great Yoga, Pilates, Tennis classes...Always greeting us with a smile and spreading positive energy around them.  Lovely Ms. Ya at the Spa- heavenly massages. She was recommended by a former member of staff that I keep in touch with…

title: Amazing
review: Dear AnnaaJ3912BM,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for your amazing review on TripAdvisor, following your 11 nights stay at our tropical dream oasis.  We are delighted to know that your overall stay was enjoyable and our services/facilities exceeded your expectations in every aspect for a spectacular stay. We always work hard to ensure that you feel like home away from home and leave with a memorable experience.  Thank you for your special mention of Mai, Don, Bom and Bao (at Recreation team), Ya (at the Spa), Pooh, Nuch and Nat (at breakfast restaurant) – they are the true shining example of how we take care of our guests with genuine care.   We certainly hope to welcome you back soon for another rewarding experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak

title: Excellent in every way
review: A place I will never forget. What an experience. Amazing pools travel for days, great cocktails, food and service. Best resort I have ever stayed at. So many great facilities. Very good large rooms and kept very clean, nice beach and swim up bars

title: Beware a Wedding
review: Dear Curioustraveller777,  Thank you for staying here at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and taking your time to share your feedback, especially rating us as 5 star on the Trip Advisor.  We truly appreciate that your stay was amazing and comfortable as it is what we strive to provide to each and every one of our guests in every single day. The entire team always go the extra mile to ensure that our guests meet the expectations since the moment they step in til' out.   We do look forward to welcoming you back to our paradise resort for another perfect vacation getaway in Thailand.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak

title: Honeymoon Visit
review: This was our 3rd time in Khao Lak & our first time to stay in The Marriott. Wow! We really didn’t think we could get better than The Pullman, now Robinson’s - We did. The rooms, the buffet breakfast, the beach, the pool, the service, the staff, the location ....... I could not fault one aspect of our stay. Kids too absolutely loved their stay. We will be back.

title: Amazing Place! Best in Class Service!
review: Special appreciation to Thip, Danny and Boy for their amazing service while on my stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Grounds - superb!  Service - Best in Service! Food - Excellent. Best I had in Phuket! Beach - OMG!  Pool - Infinity. It wraps around the entire hotel.   This hotel is approximately 1.5 hours from the airport but totally (trust me) worth the drive.   Enjoy!

title: Absolutely amazing
review: Dear sharlena1977,  Thank you for spending your precious time during your vacation at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and rating us five star on TripAdvisor.     It’s such a reward indeed to learn that you liked every aspect of your stay and especially our location, facilities and services did make your days splendid! Our team are working so hard every single day to make sure that we achieve our goal of delivering the excellent services to our guest and we so proud to have succeeded in providing you that everything you needed.  We can’t wait to welcoming you back to our paradise in the near future and wish you and your family all the best in 2019.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: LUXURIOUS PERFECT HOLIDAY
review: we definitely enjoyed our stay at the JW. it 's probably the best hotels i have stayed at ever. The staff are genunely friendly and accommodating , its locatd right by beach . imagine that hotel from hangover Part ll , it is gorgeous.

title: Just great
review: Dear JASONSHAWJASONS,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you so much for a five star review on TripAdvisor.  We're very pleased to hear that you were well taken care of by our team and we will definitely continue to work hard together to ensure our service quality remains consistent.  Jasonshawjasons, We sincerely appreciate your kind compliments and we do look forward to being of service to you in the near future.  Wishing you a year full of happiness and prosperity!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: We visited the resort in December and had a 7 night stay celebrating Christmas there. What can I say! It's a beautiful resort with a great beach and excellent staff. I have absolutely nothing to fault about this place. The whole experience from start to end was great. The food is another great part of the resort. Extensive breakfast and nothing was a problem to ask incase you needed more. We are vegetarians and we were introduced to the chef, called Mohan. He made sure we were comfortable and made us delicious cuisines to suit us and also cooked us what ever we preferred which was also not in the menu. Mohan gave us such great service that he also followed up each time to find out each time if the food met our requirement and if he could do anything else. We went to the resort…

title: Amazing family holiday
review: We spent a wonderful 8 nights at the JW Marriott on a Luxury Escapes deal.   The staff really made this holiday for us, in particular Nikolai, Chef Enzo and Joy at the front bar.  Our youngest celebrated her birthday here and they went all out to make her day memorable. Beautiful hotel and gardens with lovely pools and amenities.  We enjoyed all of the restaurants. I made use of the ample gym and classes daily - it's worth booking in advance if you are especially keen on a class to ensure that it goes ahead. There are some nice choices of restaurants and massage places just outside the rear of the hotel and Kwan, the tuk tuk driver, was fabulous to take us to the waterfall, turtle sanctuary and to White Sandy Beach.  Also recommend the trip to the Khao Sok Elephant Sanctuary.

title: Bellman needs improvements
review: Dear RachelW_8,  Thank you for taking your time to share your experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Such a pleasure to read that your youngest birthday celebration has been nothing short of and met all your expectations.  The entire team works very hard to ensure that we deliver a high standard of service and that leave a very good impression with the guests.   RachelW_8, we hope to see you soon and look forward to making your next stay even more memorable than the previous one.  Wishing you a wonderful 2019!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Fantastic Stay thanks to Mee, Tanny, & Yom!
review: Been there back in July 2018. The resort is huge with a stunning view at lobby. Checked in was quick and efficient by Japanese Staff with very good English.   Let me start with the pros ;  The room is quite old but still has a Thai style, classic vibes. The bed was comfy with all amenity prepared for your needs. Rooms was cleaned accordingly to Marriott's standard.   The pool are all linked throughout hotel's area. What we love is the way they placed the sunbed by keeping quite a distance from one another with thick trees in the garden in between. This gave a lot of privacy for couple who wants to spend a quiet time together. Thumb up for whoever designed this.  The breakfast was fabulous with large selection of all you ever wanted in the morning. They also had a Thai style pork…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Wanmai_Neil  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and for constructively reviewing our resort on TripAdvisor. We are very keen on hearing about the aspects you liked and the areas you feel we could improve upon.  In the first instance I would like to sincerely apologies for the shortfall in the standard of service you have received during your stay, we genuinely regret those occasions when the service does not meet expectations of our guests. We expect our staff to handle all situations with the utmost courtesy with great service-minded attitude and we deeply regret the adverse impression you have gained on this occasion. Please rest assured that we are taking the necessary measures to prevent recurrences in the future.  In spite of this, I am glad to learn that our service has earned your recognition and thanks for your praises, we appreciate that! We strive our best to present a lively environment for our guest.  I do hope that you will look upon this breakdown in service as a one off and we hope you choose to stay with us again in the future so that we may improve upon your past experience and to restore your trust in us.  Kind Regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Still great!
review: Mee, Tanny, & Yom went above and beyond to make our accommodations, experience, and holiday a fabulous time! The beach is wonderful! The pool & spa are excellent! And the staff truly cares about customer service!

title: Christmas vacation
review: We stayed in Marriott from 20 to 25 Des. Resort is good one as it is right on the beach and nice pool facilities for kids. Our special thanks to Chef Mohan Lal who made our Christmas Eve very special by making some nice Indian food. So ***** 5 star to him. About the resort itself it’s 4 star resort and not 5 star.

title: Great wedding spot
review: Dear AtulRampal,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us for your Christmas holiday in Khao Lak.  We appreciate your kind compliments to our staff, Chef Mohan who are the true shining examples of staff who strive to deliver you the best services to our valued guests. I will personally share him your great review as I'm sure it will further add an additional motivation to him to continuously deliver an excellent service to all of our guests.  AtulRampal, we hope to see you again soon and please let me know if there’s anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Wishing you happy holidays. Have lots of joy and fun!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak

title: Beautiful hotel
review: As wedding guests our Phuket trip took a turn north for a couple of days. Most of JW Marriot is a pure delight. Plenty of facilities (bike hire, multiple bars, intimate function areas and stunning grounds) - leave alot to explore in this huge property. Food and drinks were slightly hit and miss but generally we found the catered wedding food amazing.   We hired bikes and went exploring throughout the region but visiting off-season (August) alot of the neighbouring areas and resorts are a bit like a ghost town, dilapidated etc, so thankfully there are alot of grounds to enjoy back at the Marriott. No detail has been ignored in the public areas, everything is thought of and incredibly clean. The balconies at the rooms are a little worn from weather and run down but not a focus…

title: Amazing place and great hospitality
review: Dear Trufflepigsarah,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  We're extremely delighted to hear that everything went well and that you had a wonderful time with us. Our wedding and event teams aim to create that special once-in-a-lifetime memory and to offer our guests the most memorable experience during the entire stay.   We certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the future to create new memories at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Wishing you a Happy New Year 2019!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A little piece of paradise
review: We stayed in the JW Marriott for 4 nights in December. The hotel is stunning and beautiful. It’s amazing to swim or walk around the hotel. You never feel like other guests are on top of you as there is so much space for everyone. The beach is long you can walk for about 5k in either direction and only come across a few hotels, Surprisingly unspoilt.   Drinks and food are expensive but that’s to be expected with this type of hotel. There are a few beach side restaurants just outside the hotel which are more reasonably priced.   The only down side was that the hotel was so far from anything else but if your happy to jump in a cab you can get into town.  Service was excellent the staff are very happy and always say hello. The reception staff were always helpful.   The breakfast…

title: Great as always
review: Once again I have had a great holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak. It is our favorite holiday destination.  The rooms are lovely, the staff is welcoming, the location on the beach is fantastic and the food is great. There is no other hotel we want to stay at when we are in Khao Lak.

title: Worst check in, greeting ever
review: Dear LSMadsen,  Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and for taking the time to review us!    We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the customer service we provide really made an impact on your stay. Our associates are extremely pleased to hear about your kind comments on their service.     LSMadsen, thank you again for sharing your experience and we look forward to your next visit to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the near future.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A Lovely Hideaway from the World
review: Arrived here 1 st December, 4 adults 2 double rooms, meet by Danny on reception, he seemed confused over our rooms then told us rooms not ready will only be a short wait, 5 HOURS we waited to receive our rooms, left in our winter clothes, not given any information about if how we could get our cases get washed & changed, after 3 hours I asked to speak with the hotel manager, NOT HERE then everyone dissapeared behind reception. I then asked if they could get hold of our TUI rep on the phone as we had not received a welcome pack, they did call her, she said what do you want me to do ! She did say I can't believe you have not been given a curtesy room as hotel do have one down stairs !! So we waited 5 Hours on top of the 22 hours travelling we had done. We did notice other arriving…

title: Great hotel and nearby authentic restaurants
review: Dear Ann S,  many thanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us and the TripAdvisor community. We are very saddened that you did not enjoy your stay with us. While we always do our best to accommodate guests who arrive early, due to being at 100% occupancy on your day of arrival this was quite a challenge for us. Our regular check in time is at 3PM and given that you arrived at 8AM we needed some time for cleaning the rooms of guests who have checked out. Our regular check out time is noon. Danny had offered you the rooms that were already available with only a short wait but since you preferred to have two rooms close-by we had to wait for other guests to check out first. Danny also invited all of you to a complimentary breakfast while waiting for the rooms to check out and getting cleaned. One room was given at 12:30PM and the second room was given at 2:30PM, both before the regular check in time. We do apologize that this was the best we could do in this case. Concerning your feedback about the prices in our bars and restaurants I would like to share with yourself and the TripAdvisor community that while it is absolutely possible to spend 140 GBP for a dinner of two, this would also mean that the couple you mentioned must have had a very extensive multiple course dinner with imported beef, such as Angus or Wagyu, foie gras along with imported wines which unfortunately come with a hefty tax from the Thai customs. Our average prices for a main course range from 10 - 17 GBP and our alcoholic beverages start from just under 2 GBP and average around 5 - 9 GBP for wine by the glass. The cutting of the beachfront lawn is usually done in the morning hours when most of our guests are enjoying breakfast and not during late afternoons/early evenings as most of our guests are at our beautiful beachfront sunbathing or having a cocktail while watching our magical sunsets. We would have greatly appreciated if you would have mentioned that one of your family members is allergic to nuts as this would have enabled us to prepare a breakfast box suitable to your requirements. Ann S, my sincerest apologies that we were not able to provide you with the vacation experience you had expected and we thank you for your valuable feedback.  Best regards,  Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager

title: Nice hotel. Good value for money
review: This is a destination holiday. North of Phuket, the J.W. Marriot Khao Lak is a one and a half hour drive from Phuket airport. The road is direct, generally in good condition, but under construction in some parts. Once in Khao Lak, take the opportunity to stay put behind the tall rock walls as you will find everything you need. The centre piece of the resort is the enormous pool comprising four canals, a children’s water area, a large general pool overlooking the beach and a peaceful adults only swimming area. Everyting is connected. If you are lucky enough to have booked a room with direct pool access, then embrace it. Some parts are more private than others. If you are wanting to avoid the popular family areas with loads of floating water props, then look at Wing 1 with…

title: Exceptional
review: We would like to say how amazing the experience was at JW Marriott Khao Lak.  Beautiful hotel and staff.   Staff responded punctually to all our needs, without hesitation and with a smile. Food was amazing and plentiful. We were there for 7 days attending a destination wedding and cannot thank Zafar enough for his hospitality.  the wedding festivities and functions lasted 4 days without a fault.  The beach bar served amazing sandwiches and other snacks.  Very clean beach.  The entire hotel and grounds were kept immaculate. An exceptional wedding and relaxing holiday experience. We highly recommend this hotel for its location superb food and staff.  The room was spacious with access to the pool.  The amazing pool runs all along the hotel. Awesome wedding and relaxing holiday.…

title: Stunning hotel, perfect beach and nice area
review: Dear Easycome,  Thank you for choosing us as your wedding venue and giving us the opportunity to make the perfect day for you. Wishing you both a lifetime of love and happiness.  We are delighted to know that your overall stay was enjoyable and our services and facilities exceeded your expectations in every aspect, especially for your spectacular stay.   We appreciate your kind compliments and please rest assured that we have shared your words to the team especially, Zaffar who always go above and beyond guest expectation in order to create a memorable experience for guests.  Last but not least, JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa always do our utmost in providing the highest level of service and facilities to all our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back to our resort again for your honeymoon in the near future.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Stunning
review: We stayed in the JW Marriot for 11 days in Dec 2018 as part of a well needed get away.   Wouldn't hesitate to recommend.   Main Highlights of the hotel:  Rooms were big and beds comfy Exceptionally clean Pool was huge and with lots of sunbeds you were never not able to not get one The beach is spectacular and the views and sunset were amazing Khao Lak town only 15 min away with shuttle bus available for only 100baht each way Breakfast in particular was a highlight, wide array of food and all of it 5 star quality  Some Areas of improvement: All food and drink was exceptionally expensive  Service in the bars was sometimes pretty slow  Overall would certainly recommend this hotel for a couples holiday in real relaxation

title: Amazing
review: Dear Brittravel1988,  Thank you so much for sharing your constructive reviews following your 11 nights stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on TripAdvisor.   We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed so many aspects of your experience, especially the service that you received throughout the resort, and that we were able to enhance your time in Khao Lak and also the facts that you feel we should improve upon.  First and foremost, we have taken note on your comments on the food price and the slow service given at the bars. With regards to our food & drinks prices, thank you for your kind understanding that we are using high-quality produce and our main ingredients are from the certified suppliers to ensure the highest level of quality and safety. For our slow response, please rest assured that we take them into consideration to further improve our services and facilities and working on providing extra training sessions to eradicate this issue.  In spite of this, we are very happy to hear that you found our facilities excellent, services outstanding and staffs helpful and friendly; especially to learn that you enjoyed our pristine location, spacious bedroom, sumptuous breakfast, beautiful beach and our highlight –  South East Asia’s longest swimming pool (1.9 km) that wraps around the resort. It is always encouraging to learn that you are satisfied with our service as it is what we strive for every day.   Thank you once again for your review and for your patronage; and we are looking forward to welcoming you on your next stay with us.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: First impressions count....
review: The hotel is a little bit out of the main areas , but there’s a shuttle bus costing 100Bhat each way , the hotel is exceptional, the reception area is spacious with plenty of comfortable seating , the bedroom we had was on the first floor and overlooked one of the numerous pools , it was a big room with a great balcony , sofa and plenty of storage space , the bathroom was huge and the shower excellent . The room had everything needed for the stay . The breakfast was exceptional, food from different areas of the world , a superb egg station , that cooked eggs freshly , exactly as you wanted . Many types of fresh fruit , fresh juices and breads and pastries . The restaurant was very busy every morning , but with service from 6am until 11am , it was always possible to get a table ,…

title: The perfect hotel for relaxing
review: This hotel is the perfect place for relaxing and enjoying the fantastic beach that is several miles long with clean white sand. Our room was on the first floor with a large balcony and was very clean. Bathroom was large with two basins, bath tub and shower. Som of the furniture was a bit dated and could do with some polish. The rooms on the ground floor have direct access to a pool that rund around the entire area. But we preferred the first floor since that was more private. The beach is devided so families with children can be on one side whith several games etc and adults 12+ on the other side. Even though there are plenty of sunbeds the towel army is present that marks sunbeds early in the morning. We really had hoped that they were not present in a hotel of this hight…

title: Excellent - Pure Relaxation
review: Dear Povl H,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and thanks a lot for choosing our paradise resort for your holiday destination in Khao Lak.  We are very pleased to learn that our facilities and services had made your holiday exceptional. As you have known, our pool is the longest lagoon pool in South East Asia and we could definitely say that our resort is perfectly located in a peaceful pristine beach that allows you to relax while enjoying the panoramic ocean view...a wonderful spot to enjoy the sunset and cocktail after the beach..   Moreover, we also have various types of dining outlet to choose from, be it an Italian, Thai or Japanese - let's see if you can find something that's more to your liking. We are so happy that you enjoyed your dining experience with us. We look forward to your next visit as we would like to recommend our all new dining experience at Olive restaurant that has just re-opened this December 2018.   Povl H, thank you again for your kind feedback.  We all look forward to welcoming you again in the future!    Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellent Stay
review: Stayed 3 nights in a premium lagoon pool View room and enjoyed every minute of our time here. Staff were excellent and so helpful - every morning everyone would say good morning when passing by.  Breakfast: Excellent huge spread of a variety of foods to cater to all guests from around the globe with a healthy juice bar and gluteen free breakfast options.
