Beach:  Paradise - beautiful outlook overlooking the Amanda sea where you can walk along the beach without being hassled by people selling you something as there is practically no one else but other guests on the beach  Pools: Plenty of pools with 2 swim up bars and a huge lagoon style lazing river that winds its way around the entire resort  Spiritual:  My wife is spiritual and was worried about bad spirits or ghosts from the…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear McCarthy_QT,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking your time to share your feedback with others on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to know that everything we offered has lived up to your expectations during your recent stay with us.  We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service and you enjoyed every aspect including our spectacular pool/beach and our breakfast selections, we understand that many of our guests have different food preferences, therefore our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide a wide selection of high quality food to kick start your day.  Regarding the complimentary sparkling wine, please rest assured we have addressed this with the team involved for further improvement.   Once again thank you for kind review and recommendation. All associates at JW Marriott Khao Lak and I look forward to welcoming you back to our little paradise again.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Beautfiful and Perfekt Hotel
review: we had a fantastic stay for 3 nights at this hotel. We had a beautiful pool access room and took a meal plan for breakfast lunch and dinner. The resort has an interesting swim around concept. The beach is private and has a nice setup and a great bar. Don't miss out on Sakura and Ta Krai their speciality outlets. Loads of recreation such as tennis squash billiards table tennis cycling a huge gym...just to name a few. Chef Manoj was fantastic at the hotel and took care of our diet requests and needs. Friendly staff and a great stay. We shall be back again next year. Thank you.

title: Can't wait to return
review: We took a room on the first floor with direct access to pool and it was heaven. The conditioning was working perfectly and quietly. The interior was just a tiny bit dated (some wardrobe doors not closing effortlessly) but nevertheless the attention to detail was noticeable (like shower doors opening at the right angle to not slam at the vanity sink). Breakfasts are a feast with fresh smoothies, fabulous egg station and noodle soup station. Coffee is great and they make perfect flat white (not everywhere in EU you can find such a good coffee). The pool is big and only 1.3 m deep and you can swim practically throughout the whole territory of the hotel, plus there are surprisingly few people that you meet there. Overall, though the hotel was full with guests judging by the…

title: Beautiful but pricey
review: Dear Annayureva,  Thank you very much for your time in providing us with your feedback following your recent stay.   It is lovely to hear of your overall wonderful stay and I am delighted to hear of your great experience at Deluxe Pool Access room. Please be assured that I also had noted your feedback in regards to your breakfast experience and will be sure to share this accordingly with our team to ensure we can continue to provide service excellence and continue to maintain our high standards of guest services at the resort.  We truly appreciate your comments and hope to have the chance to welcome you back to our JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the near future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: PERFECT HOLIDAY !
review: Stayed here as part of our honeymoon for 4 nights. Great hotel very luxurious and up market. Entire complex is built around a massive pool which has lots of separate areas including swim up bars and adult only areas. Great access to beautiful beach aswell which was quite compared to other resorts we have visited. Staff couldn’t have been any better. Rooms stylish and modern always kept clean. Slightly out of town but hotel runs a shuttle bus every hour or so which is 100 thb per person per journey cabs also very easy to get on khao lak, taxi rank just outside hotel. Breakfast very good great selection of many different cuisines.  Didn’t rate food at restaurants in the resort the evening though as we ate at the Italian restaurant the first night which was average at best and cost…

title: Honeymoon heaven
review: Dear MrMan19,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your accommodation in Khao Lak and sharing your feedback relating to your current stay here.  We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service and you enjoyed every aspect of your stay.   With regards to our food & drinks prices, please note that they are in line with 5-star resorts in the nearby areas and we are using high-quality produce and ingredients from certified local suppliers to ensure the highest standards of our offerings. Nevertheless, we value our guests’ comments and will share your feedback with relevant team as part of our continuing efforts to create memorable guest experience!  We look forward to having you back for another experience here at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Love this place! Relaxation heaven
review: I have enjoyed very much at this hotel, my friends also like. The staff is good service, the food is good, the best swimming pool. This hotel also have the beach very clean and good for swimming. I will come back !

title: Beautiful Resort
review: We were here for a destination wedding. All the arrangements were outstanding. Great Indian and continental food. Chef Jai, Mohan and Jasvir were very creative and dedicated. Concierge was superb. All 3 persons Wut, Oil and Praew looked after every small need. Rooms and building superb. Property is right on ocean. No complaints.

title: Currently at the resort
review: Dear Bharat P,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for choosing us as the venue of this special occasion.   I am extremely delighted to hear that everything went well and that you had a wonderful time with us. Our wedding and event teams aim to create that special once-in-a-lifetime memory and to offer our guests the most memorable experience during the entire stay.   Thank you for your special mention of Chef Jai, Mohan, Jasvir, Wut, Oil and Praew – they are the true shining example of how we take care of our guests with genuine care and we all certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the future to create new memories at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Thailand's best staff
review: A beautifully located hotel. Staff are superb, service is excellent and the rooms fantastic. Food and drink on the expensive side, but there are restaurants and bars nearby. Breakfast selection and quality is incredible.  We are here for my birthday and I would like to thank the hotel for the birthday cake in the room. We can not recommend this hotel highly enough - a credit to the Marriott Group.

title: Same Same but Different
review: Dear robgilchrist,  Thank you for taking your time to share your experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We were glad to be a part of your memorable birthday celebration !  We are delighted to know that your overall stay was enjoyable and our services exceeded your expectations. We always work hard to ensure that you feel like home away from home and leave with a memorable experience.  I've passed your feedback to the team and we are all looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Amazing Place
review: The staff here are just amazing! None of the staff walks past you without greeting. My husband and I love this place. This was our 8th visit to JW Marriott Khao Lak.   We were upgraded to a Duplex Suite which looked like it had been renovated recently. It has a living room, small bathroom and large balcony downstairs and a bedroom and large bathroom upstairs.  The beach area is really big and they've made a family area and a separate adult zone which is great if you don't have children. The main pool also provides more private adult zones which is really cool.   Olive restaurant was being renovated while we visited and we can't wait to see it finished when we return next year.   A big thanks to Nuch, Poo, Thip, Laila, Cartoon and so many more for making our stay so memorable…

title: Some good, some..
review: The hotel itself is nice. The swimming pool was wonderful. However, our room was surprisingly tired and the service was not up to 5* especially service at Spa was bad as well as the treatments provided. It was our worst SPA experience from the hotels in Thailand. In short, I gave feedbacks for improvements for the first visit, the second visit they were like a revenge. I could write another review for that. We couldn’t believe it was from 5 Star JW Marriott. We didn’t leave the hotel for food and dined in the hotels for every breakfast, lunch and dinner. For dinners, we tried three restaurants: Japanese and Thai were good, esp Thai restaurant provide excellent services, some dishes were average some were tasty, portions big and hard to finish them all. Thanks to the staff…

title: A wonderful family holiday in a stunning hotel!!
review: Dear Jeme1211, Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback concerning your stay with us and the TripAdvisor community. We appreciate your very positive comments about our lagoon style swimming pool as well as the dining experiences in our Japanese and Thai restaurant. Our Housekeeping team is delighted to hear how much you enjoyed the animal folded towels in your room and the set up for your special occasion. We are very sorry to read that we fell short in ensuring you have a great dining experience in our Olive restaurant, Chef Enzo takes great pride in not only creating mouthwatering dishes for our guests but also tries to talk to as many of our guests as possible, he feels very sorry that he did not have a chance to meet you and how disappointed this made you. Despite investigating your poor spa experience mentioned we were not able to find out details and I would highly appreciate if you could please reach out to me directly to provide further details. Our Spa Manager Joy is devastated and determined to find out how it could happen that you had such a bad impression of our spa. As TripAdvisor does not allow for email addresses to be put into responses we would highly appreciate if you could email to our reservations email address as mentioned on our website and address it to Joy and myself. Jeme1211, my sincere apologies for our shortcoming in the mentioned areas and I sincerely hope that we will have a chance to welcome you back in the future in order to provide with an unforgettable experience at our resort.  Very best regards,  Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager

title: fantastic property, excellent service
review: All the amazing reviews you've read about JW Marriott are absolutely true! As soon as you arrive, the cooling towel and refreshing juice sets the tone and pace for your holiday (especially after a very long journey from the UK).  The host at the desk was extremely welcoming and professional, and settled us into our rooms personally.  From that point on, we had an incredible two weeks of family holiday fun.  We opted for swim-up rooms and with 3 young kids, we're so glad we did! (Tip: ask for rooms by the children's pool area - we were in block 3).  Days went by swimming in the pool, heading to the glorious sandy beach and warm sea and eating amazing food and drinks in the evening as the sun set.  Whilst we loved the beach and resort, we ventured out on a few days.  We chose to…

title: Absolutely brilliant!
review: Amazing property, managed in a perfect way, friendly staff, good and tasty food, prepared with love and responsibility by Enzo / the chief/ , spacious rooms, fast and reliable WiFi. Big and empty beach with warm water lure the tourists, who have the other option of 1.9 km swimming pools. unfortunately we had a too short stay to enjoy this treasure fully. Special thanks to Nicolai Mitchel, who transformed some of our troubles in adventures

title: It is like a second home
review: Dear 277dimitarg,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   We could not be happier to know that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us and that you were able to fully take advantage of everything we’re offering here. Seems like you were totally impressed by the service from our team specially Chef Enzo and the intuitive service from Nicolai our Resident Manager who go above and beyond to make every single guest happy.   Once again thank you very much 277dimitarg for your time sharing this review. We appreciate your kind compliments and please rest assured that every single word has been shared to all our team, including the staff mentioned. We couldn't be more proud of our team at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Look forward to welcoming you back again on your next visit to our tropical paradise!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Nice
review: After a disappointing check in where we had to wait until after 5pm to get to our room - with us having to check twice 3pm and 5pm - no phone call and no sorry - we had a nice stay. The resort is a way out of town so either hire bikes or cabs into town they do have a bus at 100bht one way but must book. Beach is amazing the gardens amazing the pool amazing just the check in more interested in taking a $80 Aussie dollar deposit per day off our credit card than getting us a room not even interested in helping me with a ground room as I walk with a walking stick which also was disappointing. The restaurants are expensive however there are three restaurants just outside on the beach 1st Friendship (our favourite) 2nd Wonderfull 3rd Pinky’s would recommend eating there instead of…

title: Huge
review: This hotel is large and gorgeous. The pool access rooms are worth the splurge. We upgraded to it when we arrived for 1500 baht($46). The breakfast buffet was delicious. Sooo many choices. We are usually Leary of hotel food but we tried the Italian. The prices were more expensive than let’s say In town but truthfully, not by much. Plus the food was delicious. I was surprised. The sausage pasta was so good as were the garlic shrimp.  Laundry service can be had on the beach just to the left of the hotel. As can some $10 Thai beach massages. The shuttle to town is available but truthfully the town is kinda blah. The only reason to go there is if you want to get the tours cheaper (which you most certainly will). We booked two tours and saved over $200 booking them in town versus the…

title: Amazing Architecture and Design, with mile-long swimming pool, stunning even after 20 years
review: Dear Grace j,  Thank you for taking your time to share such an excellent review following your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   We're delighted to hear that you have thoroughly enjoyed staying with us from the quality of rooms, food, staffs our beautiful beach and our infinity pool — the largest swimming pool in Southeast Asia at 16,000 sq m, and 1.9 KM in length.  Grace j, It would be a pleasure to welcome you back to Khao Lak in the near future and we all hope that JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa will be your choice of destination.   Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Gill Cairns
review: We liked this property so much, that - during this trip -we changed our plans, and came back for a second stay after a day away, instead of checking out other properties. While our original plan was, to check out a great number of properties in the region, for a family trip for the 75th birthday of my father-in-law next year, we decided we had found the place, better it could not get. Valet parking at check-in, followed by cold towels, and the ability to speak either English, German, or Russian - and Bianca knew all three. Khun Tin was extremely friendly, making us feel like VIPs, and made sure, we had a chance to meet Nicolay, the German/Danish/Scotch Resident Manager, who took much time to speak with us about our experience, and cultural differences, and the different…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear ExilschwabefromUlm,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our paradise resort as your accommodation in Khao Lak and for sharing your wonderful feedback here.  We sincerely appreciate your great recognition to our staffs Tin, Nicolai, and Su who are the true shining examples of staff who strive to deliver nothing but memorable services to all our valued guests.   JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa has opened since the last quarter of 2009, so it’s been 10 years approximately but we continue doing our best to maintain the highest standards not only in service, but also in ensuring our rooms, facilities and landscape are well maintained at all times. The most importantly aspect is the cleanliness, that's why our team work so hard to keep everywhere nice and clean.  Once again thank you for recommending us and we look forward to having you and your family back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: JW Marriott Khao lak
review: Amazing accommodation  Lovely food Great friendly staff There was building going on and we immediately got an upgrade  Fantastic pool Lots of things to do - went elephant trekking , visited temples , beach , etc  When kids were unwell - food was delivered to the room in a fast and efficient manner and still hot ! Definitely 5/5 or even 6/5

title: Amazing holiday
review: Dear ad112018,  Thank you for taking the time to share such a lovely review about your recent stay with us and giving us a 5 star rating on TripAdvisor!  It is an absolute pleasure to know that you have enjoyed so many aspects of your stay. The happiest thing for us is to see our efforts paid off when we make progress, as we strive to meet and exceed every guest’s expectations in every facet of our service and leave with long lasting memories.  Please let us know how we may assist in any way in the plans for your return. We all look forward to making your next visit even more memorable !  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Fantastic Resort
review: We actually stayed here the end of November 2017 and have been meaning to write a review all this time ! Amazing hotel , staff , food , beach . There is also a happy hour . Probably one of the best hotels we have ever been to and made our trip amazing ! Khao Lak centre is really nice too and they have a shuttle service to and from there .  They also upgraded us as a gesture . Thank you !

title: A nice resort - hopefully it will stay like this
review: Dear Jemma H,  Thank you very much for posting a review following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  We are truly passionate about delivering exceptional guest experiences and I was very pleased to learn of your great satisfaction with our service.  It seems that you are familiar with Khao Lak area and were able to take advantage of Khao Lak center where is highly recommended if you’d like to try out the famous Thai street food, or souvenirs and beachwear shopping.   The team and I greatly appreciate your feedback and we all look forward to your return in the near future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Not the perfect stay we wished for
review: We stayed here 3 years ago and loved it so we went back this year to celebrate our 20th Wedding Anniversary and was blown away at the way they went out of their way to make our stay perfect once again. The staff are simply Amazing and it almost feels life coming home to our family. Thank you for making our holiday as Amazing as always. Just love you all so much.

title: BIGGEST POOL I have ever seen (2km Lagoon Pool) – FANTASTIC HOTEL!
review: WOW! – The first word that comes into my head when I think about my stay at J W Marriott Khao Lak. My pictures will explain all, but my stay was filled with pure relaxation, heavenly bliss and extremely luxury accompanied by amazing food.   We arrived slightly early but was shown through to our room straight away (which I thought was fab as some hotels make you wait around the hotel until your check-in time). The staff were extremely helpful & friendly and really made you feel special. They even gave us a full tour of the hotel on the way to our hotel room. The bell boys arrived shortly after with our luggage which was a lovely little luxury as we had been travelling around Asia with a backpack for the last 3 weeks!    The resort itself was spotless and full of complete luxury.…

title: Luxury, Pampering & Love Unbound!
review: Dear Journeywithuss,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you so much for having taken your time to provide us with your wonderful feedback relating to your recent stay with us.   We could not be happier to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay including the rooms with pool access and a wide selection and high quality buffet breakfast at Waterfront restaurant. Moreover, I’m thrilled to read that our staff went above and beyond your expectation. The team is always eager to assist you in any way possible to ensure your satisfaction.  Our resort is both adults- and family-friendly and we provide a wide variety of activities, facilities and services to suite everyone’s taste. In addition, our spa has been voted as one of the top 60 Spa on Booking.com, and our spa therapists are doing their best every day to ensure that our guest dive into the feeling of relaxation.   Journeywithuss , this is truly inspiring to receive such amazing feedback from you as this is the greatest motivation for us all. On behalf of the team, I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for another " home away from home" memorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Just perfect
review: The stay at JW Marriott Khao lak was a dream come true right from the minute we stepped in. WE had chosen this place to celebrate a special occasion and had invited more than a dozen of our good friends and property & staff took such good care of us (despite being super full and hosting a big event!) we felt like we were having our ceremony in someone’s private palace! The property is Luxury and Style without the Gaudiness of a beach resort and though it was huge, we never felt the crowd. I   It seemed like each and every member of the staff had been informed about our special event, every individual went out of their way to make our special occasion way more than special!   LOCATION: Fantastic location right on the beachfront and an quick ride away from all other key points of…

title: Heaven on Earth
review: Dear Prasanna V,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. It is certainly our pleasure to have you on our little paradise resort to know that you had an amazing stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   We are truly passionate about delivering exceptional guest experiences and we are glad to hear that you satisfied with our service standards and facilities.  From all the lovely things you mentioned, we are most delighted to read about our hospitality and approach to services. We sincerely appreciate your kind words and glad you had a wonderful time with us. Our resort’s key highlights are the massive lagoon pool which is the largest in South East Asia, our impressive variety of breakfast offerings and our stunning sandy beachfront with breathtaking and peaceful sunset views – and I’m glad that you had enjoyed all of these features.  Your kind comments have motivated our team, as we strive to provide all guests the best possible experience.  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another amazing holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: WOW WOW WOW
review: After a harrowing minibus trip from Phuket airport we were instantly calmed by the lovely Sunny in the peaceful and beautifully scented reception of the resort. A cool face towel and refreshing cold tea, a quick introduction and we were escorted to our splendid pool access room where we could easily take a dip in the stunning resort pool which meanders its way through the entire resort. Warm thanks to the concierge Praew who was so helpful throughout our stay. Plenty of activities. Thanks to Bom ( not as in kaboom as he explains:-)) for yoga and relaxation classes. We had a package deal including all meals. The three restaurants available were all of high quality our favourite being the Japanese with the nutty chef banana serving up a treat every visit whilst entertaining the…

title: Quality family Holiday
review: Having just spent 6 years in UAE, I will admit to being spoilt when it comes to luxury hotels and service. This hotel equalled any that I have stayed in while there. The staff- all of them, were wonderful, welcoming and very helpful-from Sunny and Pim, who checked us in at the desk, to the staff in all the restaurants-Thyp, Tomey, Honey, San, Ton and the others whose names I did not catch, to the wonderful spar ladies-Daep, Chan, Bo, Duang and Aor who looked after me and those other ladies who looked after the rest of my group, and not to forget those unsung heroes-house keeping staff and those working in the garden and on the pool; there was the triage man who treated minor cuts and bumps and the guys who tended the beach towel stations and fulfilled poolside duties-you were…

title: loved this place
review: Dear triggerhappyteachaa,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  We are glad to hear that your JW Marriott Khao Lak experience was pleasant which you have enjoyed our the long lagoon pool at the resort as well as the services and facilities we provided was useful and able to add a great experience during your stay. Moreover, we appreciate you mentioning the perfect service you received while at our resort.   The most importantly, thank you for mentioning Sunny and Pim (Front desk) Thyp, Tomey, Honey, San, Ton (Restaurant) and Daep, Chan, Bo, Duang and Aor at Spa. The feedback such as yours always motivates and inspires us to continue to maintain the highest quality customer service.   Once again, thank you for staying in our hotel and we look forward to serve you again in the near future.  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Don't look past this hotel
review: From the moment we entered the foyer we new we were going to love this place and it did not let us down the staff were the best that we came accross in Thailand we could not fault it and seriously cannot wait to go back we stayed in a pool access room and it was money well spent just a beautiful peaceful place to stay and thank you to all the lovely staff for making our stay so memorable..kob khan krub.

title: Beautiful Resort - Amazing Pool
review: Sawasdee krub Arsaw,  Thank you so much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your stay and for highlighting the pleasant experience you had with us on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to know that the product, facilities at the swimming pool exceeded your expectation, your stay was comfortable and enjoyable and that you have taken back pleasant memories!  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the future and wish you a pleasant day!  Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Excellence personified.
review: 10 nights if complete relaxation. Absolutely stunning hotel with very helpful and pleasant staff. Swim up room is a must. Stayed in room 2006 which I highly recommend for peaceful stay. Only had breakfast as part of stay which we prefer as we enjoy going out and about. Plenty good restaurants a taxi ride away

title: Lovely place, extremely helpful staff!
review: We recently stayed here as family for the second time. This is a wonderful, friendly and relaxing place to stay. Unfortunately part way through our stay my husband accidentally injured himself and ended up having an operation the Bangkok Phuket Hospital. The staff at the JW Marriott were incredible. They stayed with my husband until he left from the new Khao Lak medical centre for Phuket, looked after my children and assisted me in sorting everything out and arranged transport and also accomodation in Phuket for us all. We can not thank them enough and look forward to coming back another time. Thankyou!!

title: Luxurious and easy
review: Dear Bridget M,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for taking your time to share your feedback with us on TripAdvisor. We hope that you are doing very well now.   Everyone on our team works very hard each day to keep our hotel looking at its best and works very hard to ensure our guests have an enjoyable time at the hotel and leaves us with lasting memories. Your nice compliments is a rewarding indeed and our associates are happy to learn of your positive remarks because their most prized reward is to know that their efforts to make you feel comfortable have been recognized.    Looking forward to your full recovery and to having you back soon.   Sincerely, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Forth holiday here!
review: We recently stayed on a luxury escapes package with our two children (9 and 11) and another family with 3 children.  We loved it! The pools and beaches were beautiful and so warm and the sunsets beautiful. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The rooms were comfortable and spacious  and the food was outstanding in all restaurants. Our highlight was the buffet breakfasts which were so varied and plentiful and the dining area looked out over the palm trees and sea. We really felt so relaxed here and there was little need to leave the resort as so many activities were available on site. Despite this being a big resort, you never felt crowded as there were so many places to go. We had a pool access room but which we under-utilised as the kids preferred to access the pool…

title: absolutely wonderfull
review: Dear Bridget L,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback following your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. It is such rewarding indeed to know that you liked many aspects of your stay and our resort, especially the service provided by our staff, the room, the buffet breakfast, and I am happy to learn that the team left a good impression on you. Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team.  The loyalty of our guests is of the utmost importance to us and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back for your next visit to Bangkok.  Sincerely,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Absolutely wonderful
review: We had a lovely stay here.  It was our forth family holiday here over five years and it has always been great. The staff are all so friendly and really kind to the kids.  Are kids are 2, 5 and 7 years.  They sang happy birthday to our daughter at dinner and breakfast on her 5th birthday, which she really loved.   There was a big Indian wedding on while we were at the hotel, it was really interesting to see and didn't affect our stay. The five of us stayed in a family room with pool access, which may be too tight for some but we found it great. The spa was still great, I had two included in our package and tried a few more.  We also had a massage every day at the beach next door. The gym had been upgraded since last year and the equipment was really good as well as being a really…

title: Lovely place to stay
review: I will preface this review by saying I don’t really feel comfortable in a first class resort in a developing country, the contrast just doesn’t feel right to me, but my husband picked the holiday so off we went. So having said that, I did love staying here for a week. The staff are exceptionally friendly (you must sit at the bar at the teppanyaki restaurant when Banana is cooking!), the food is good with plenty of variety and the pools are great.  We had a pool access room and the pool is set up so you can basically swim around the whole hotel - fabulous! And you can buy (and are encouraged to use) floaty things (giant flamingos and swans, crocodiles and basic rings) if you can’t be bothered swimming. We went in the off season so the beach was rough and windy, but I could see it…

title: Big resort with cosy feel
review: Dear Vanessa R,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you so much for choosing Luxury Escapes package for your stay at our resort and taking the time to share your valuable feedback here on TripAdvisor!.   We are very pleased to know that you found our resort worth recommending and better than you would imagine. Moreover, it’s great to know that you enjoyed the accommodation we provided especially your Pool Access where you could enjoy refreshing dip in the vast lagoon-pool at any time you like. Apart from this, I can say that our warm and friendly staff are to make sure that we deliver exceptional customer service to every guest as we strives for a high quality output as it shows our high level of standards.   We all look forward to your next visit to our resort in Khao Lak. Please let us know if there's anything we could do to enhance your next stay!  Best regards,  Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Good except for cockroaches
review: The Marriott in Khao Lak was a very nice experience. Lots of water, swimming areas and a nice location on the beach. A few nice beach bars & restaurants just nearby which was nice. The hotel could do with a bit of refurbishment to match many of its fancy Marriott sister hotels. The pool bars could also do with a face lift. But overall a nice hotel and a very nice experience. We enjoyed the gym, squash and tennis courts as well as the kids facilities and the easy deli cafe, which were appreciated facilities. The staff are pleasant and the manager very friendly.

title: Can’t fault
review: Dear kikilost,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with other travelers on TripAdvisor.   It’s wonderful to know that we were able to provide you services and activities that exceeded your expectations. We would like to invite you back to our resort again in the near future to enjoy our newly refurbished Olive restaurant. We are sure you would love all about it.  Best regards,  Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Absolutely fabulous JW Marriott!
review: The BAD  - We checked in at 9 pm on our 1st night, tired after a long day of shopping and 3-hour ride from Patong, and I still had work to do. Spotted a cockroach in the room which freaked me out. Reception got a guy to come over to catch the cockroach, and the guy took 15 mins to arrive. Couldn’t find the cockroach. I requested a change of room which the hotel arranged. This was a disturbance and a waste of my time; I couldn’t finish my work earlier and had a very late night. After we checked out of hotel after the 2nd night, my room mate told me she spotted a cockroach in the room too but didn’t let me know cos she knew I was afraid of cockroaches. 2 roaches in 2 rooms over 2 nights - I don’t know what’s the extent of roach “occupancy” in the hotel, but I will never return to…

title: Another Great Break.....
review: We visited in September this year, our second stay in this great resort. I have read a few reviews with negative thought on pricing, here are my thoughts on our all inclusive Luxury Escape Break for 11 nights.  Pool Access Room: I was so very blessed to be given a nice quiet room in Wing one. The balcony had partial sun/shade balance and I noted there are extra ladders this year making the pool access much better. The only feedback I have is the mat in the bathroom which caused me to fall and injure my foot on the second day. You just need to be extra careful and unlike me, less hasty as it can easily slide on the marble floor.  Food: As we had an all inclusive package, you are given a separate menu from others, we found this ample choice and the food was wonderful. I actually…

title: Relaxing
review: Dear Rosie D,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive feedback on your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   It’s a great pleasure to receive such a big compliment from our valued guest such as yourself. Nothing makes me happier than knowing that you enjoyed many aspect of your stay, especially you found the service provided by our staff during your stay courteous and far exceeded your expectations.  Please rest assured that we have passed your kudos along to my whole team, especially your recognition of our staffs like Pooh and Adele at Waterfront restaurant and our bar staffs like Ann, Poo, Wat, Chet and Chai.    Thank you once again for your trust in us and look forward to having you here with us so soon.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Loved it!
review: My experience at JW Marriott in Khao Lak was great. Service was on point. It’s a very relaxing place and not as busy as places like Patong. It has some really nice restaurants around it with free transport from the hotel and back like Pam’s and Bluemist which was really good food and I would 100% recommend. The little friendship bar / restaurant beside the JW Marriott on the beach is a must go. The little local bar has amazing foods and they make really good cocktails for cheap. The service there is second to none. As it’s a quiet place and to get into town was like 300b each way by taxi I would recommend hiring a scooter for 250b a day if your comfortable riding one.   I really do believe this is a great place and I will definitely be coming back.

title: Phenomenally good
review: Dear jgil0,  Thank you for choosing us as your holiday destination during your recent visit to beautiful Khao Lak.  It's wonderful indeed you were able to take advantage of the local food here in Khao Lak. Our nearby markets, Build Factory in Bang Niang beach and also the Bang Niang Markets, are highly recommended for the famous Thai street food, souvenirs and beachwear shopping.   Once again thank you for recommending us and please let us know if there’s anything else we could do to make your next stay even better. We can’t wait to welcome you back to the resort in the near future.  Best regards,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Travel with a toddler
review: We visited the Marriott in September 2018 having just spent 6 nights in the lovely Santhiya resort in Koh Yao Yai. I had been wondering to myself how anything could better that resort and was worried that the Marriott may be too corporate but I needn’t have concerned myself. It is not corporate in the slightest, it is a fantastic holiday destination and I really loved my stay there.   We had an issue with our room booking but this was more down to our tour agents Voyage Privé (who I would NOT recommend) than the hotel. We were guaranteed a pool access room but were not given one and instead had a lagoon view room. This room was wonderful and I loved it but, as it obvious from the name, it did not have access to the pool which I had especially been looking forward to. Neither the…

title: Honeymoon
review: We had the pleasure of having dinner last night at Mama Du's restaurant.such a fantastic and authentic experience.the restaurant setting is so relaxing by a huge pond.all the staff were so friendly and we had the pleasure of meeting Mama Du herself.such a kind and genuine person whom is very passionate about her food and using top quality ingredients.Mama Du even went to the trouble of writing out a recipe for me to try at home.The Marriott are so fortunate to have such a wonderful chef looking after their guests. Thank you Mama Du 🙂🙂

title: Luxury family resort
review: Dear Pádraig O,  Thank you for choosing to stay with JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and taking the time to share your feedback with us.   It is delightful to hear that you chose us for your Honeymoon trip in Khao Lak. It's amazing to know that you had enjoyed your stay here in our resort and found our products, facilities and services worth recommending. It gives us a sense of achievement and pleasure to read such positive comments from our valued guests such as you.   We are encouraged to hear that our colleagues left a good impression on you. Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team especially to Chef Mama Du who is the epitome of professionalism and especially the most dedicated chef you could ever find.    Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the near future.  Warm regards,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: A Journey of Friendship at Marriott
review: We really enjoyed our stay here. Having staff go the extra mile to make you feel welcomed. Rooms are good sized (we have a 2 + 4yr old) who slet on day beds. A pool access room made it convenient to use the pool. Well catered facilities gym, kids club/activities, bars etc. The restaurants all serve high quality dishes, especially the Italian restaurant serving exquisite food. Recommend and will return.

title: Fabulous Family Holiday
review: Dear topbloke1981,  Thank you for staying with us and taking your time to share your feedback, especially rating us 5 star on Trip Advisor  We couldn't be more proud to read that you had a great stay with us and specially you were able to take advantage of our restaurants, resort's facilities, our pool access room where you could directly jump into our fantastic lagoon-inspired swimming pool.   We sincerely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the near future.   Warm regards,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Great family resort
review: There are very few people who at times do go beyond their limits to make their customers feel comfortable and take their every small wish on the priority list. Mee, Room Division Manager from Marriott Khao Lak is one of them.  She made sure my trip have put on the priority list to be taken care of and to make it as one of the best trip for me and my friends. We were celebrating 40th birthday of my 3 best friends, with few prior emails, Marriott team did their best to make it the most special one.  To start with, Khun Wut absolutely nailed it on Hotel Signage board “Happy Birthday Girls”. They were stunned. From there on the Smile on their face did not disappear. It just broadened. Then singing Happy Birthday song when we arrived at the Resort, the sticky rice at the lobby  which…

title: Super Hotel
review: This is my second visit to the JW Marriott Resort in Khao Lak and I am pleased to report that it is still one of the nicest Hotels I have stayed in. The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful and make the place feel very special.   An example of this was watching them work all afternoon preparing for a special BBQ dinner beside the beach, only for the rain to arrive just as the event was about to start. Without a moment's hesitation or complaint, the entire event was moved inside within minutes and resumed with incredible efficiency, a real credit to the entire management team.  The rooms are beautifully clean, functional and everything works as it should. Food is some of the best I have tasted anywhere and the wonderful pools and landscapes have to be seen to be appreciated.…

title: Dark, wet and moldy
review: Dear RonSDubai,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you very much for your trust to choose JW Marriot Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your second visit to Khao Lak and also for taking the time to share your amazing review about your stay on TripAdvisor.   I am delighted to learn that you had a wonderful experience at our resort again and that you found our facilities and services to your satisfaction. Delivering our guests with superior customer service and a memorable experience is what we strive for every day. Please rest assured that I will share your wonderful review with the rest of the team who I am sure will be positively encouraged.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for your third visit in the near future.  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: Fabulous week at JW Marriot Khao Lak
review: We were staying at this resort for 7 days. Checking in to our room it was really cold and wet. The air conditioning was set to 23• but since it was dark and humid it felt really cold compared to the outside. We called to reception to ask if there was a way to warm up the room, there was nothing they can do. Going to bed the first night we noticed that the bedsheets were extremely damp and there was batter vapour collecting on both the windows/ doors, the glass front table and there was a smell of mold when we payed down by the wooden bed boards.  We had to change the room hoping that there would be one bit at least some sunlight or warmer or both. The room that was given to us was described as one on the most sunny wing - perhaps more so than the ones in the very middle of the…

title: Could Have Been 5 Stars, If Only...
review: Dear Gintare S,  Thank you for sharing the feedback regarding to your recent stay, I regret to hear of the inconvenience due to the humidity in our  guest room during the rainy day especially in September. Khao Lak's climate is likewise in the middle of the tropical greenery environment where mostly rain fall during the rainy season between May - October. With this environment may caused of some issues in our guest room.   However, I sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. As a teachable moment, we have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure the necessary guidelines are in place to prevent from re-occurring in the future.   I trust this experience has not overly affected your overall impression of the resort. The team and myself hope to be of your service in the furure.  If I can be if of any assistance Please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Best regards, Mee Room Division Manager

title: Great place to just relax and enjoy
review: Stayed here after 3 busy days in Bangkok... boy did we need it. The staff were the friendliest hotel staff out of anywhere we stayed... couldn’t do enough for you. The room itself was large,clean with plenty of toiletries... although the hotel looked a little dated and was being renovated whilst we were there it didn’t spoil our enjoyment. Ideal location right on the beach and within easy access to the main resort of Khao Lak. Taxi will cost you 300 Baht or the hotel mini bus for 100 Baht each. We had a great pool room access that enabled us to step right into the large winding pool. Plenty to eat for breakfast and lots of variation. Our only slight moan was there was a large 40th birthday party there for 2 days with booming bass music. We did complain to the manager who gave us…

title: Great Views and tremendous value for money!
review: So I have visited this hotel twice in the last 30 days for 2 different functions : 1. Big fat Indian Wedding 2. Insane 40th Birthday celebrations  The overall experience was excellent.  The food was also exceptional - since they make quite good Indian food as well.  The hotel was cooperative and organised everything , and helped us play music to party till quite late.  The rooms are luxurious and large , the ones adjoining the pool as quite cool!  Also they have some superb deals going on and is totally a steal deal at prices around $100 USD.  Very highly recommended for large groups / Birthday celebrations / Indian Weddings

title: Awesome stay
review: Dear Sidsood,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you so much for your lovely comments about us. It was our pleasure to have you as our guest, and delighted to learn that you have thoroughly enjoyed the comfort and convenience we offered during your time with us.   Sidsood, thank you again for making the trip to join the two special events to Khao Lak and for recommending our resort to other fellow travelers here on TripAdvisor. We would like to invite you to come visit us again soon, to celebrate the reopening of our Italian restaurant “Olive” and we’re pretty sure that you’ll definitely love it!  Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: wonderful holiday escape
review: We sadly just left the hotel and we can not be thankful enough to every single staff member that we have came across.  We stayed 5 nights in a room with pool access. The room is very spacious and very well equiped. Daily complementary water, turndown service, iron, dvd player, great air conditioner, plenty bath products, etc.   The swimmingpool is very impressive as is very big (3km) and is crazy how clean it is all the time. You can get fresh pool towels everytime you need it.   Buffett breakfast is extensive and with a big selection of products. You can get literary whatever you want or need. The staff members are really friendly and helpful. We would like to bring a special mention to Sorn, which remembered our special coffee every morning (great touch, no one else had after…

title: Relaxing stay & great facilities.
review: Dear Carlos M,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Thank you very much for sharing your comments with others in TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us. Our Infinity pool is truly the highlight of our resort with 1.9km long that connected all 5 buildings. It is also a pleasure to learn that you enjoyed our services as it is our goal to make sure every guest has a memorable stay here at the tropical paradise.   Khao Lak center is 15 minutes away from our resort and we provide shuttle service running from 11.00am - 9.00pm, departing every 2 hours with a minimal fee. Our nearby markets, Build Factory and Bang Niang Market, are highly recommended if you’d like to try out authentic Thai food, buying souvenirs and/or some local/ beachwear clothing.   With regards to our food & drinks prices, we are using high-quality produce and ingredients from certified suppliers to ensure the highest standards of our offerings. It is, however, wonderful to hear that you took advantage all around Khao Lak and we could expect your return in the future for more experiences here!   Please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards, Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Very bad trip
review: We had a very nice week at the Marriott Khao Lak. The resort infrastructure and gardens is marvelous and despite the large number of rooms and guests, it doesn't feel busy (except at breakfast buffet). The only things i would suggest is improving infrastructure for kids and infants, such as for changing diapers for infants or kids bathroom; the baby chairs were a disgrace and need better cleaning and attendance. Asking for plastic ware for baby, the staff declined saying they don't have, but a few days later, they offered us plastic dishes. The Japanese restaurant staff was the absolutely the best among the f&b staff crew and was professional and attentive and polite and very fluent in English too. The waterfront and the Olive restaurant infrastructure isn't pleasant. Tables and…

title: 5 star luxury!
review: We just spent 5 nights here. Unfortunately due to it being monsoon season we were not able to enjoy the beautiful pool, beach or any outdoor activities.   The service throughout the hotel was excellent and the staff were always friendly. We dined at all the restaurants and particularly enjoyed Sakura and tepenyaki chef Pond and his magic tricks!  I did however feel that there was a lack of entertainment at night..The hotel should organise events where guests can meet and mingle. The hotel is huge and it could have more public chill areas.  All in all, a good experience and we would go back!

title: MARRIAGE AT KHAOLAK SEA BEACH RESORT
review: Dear Debbie B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and taking your time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor and shared with us your constructive feedback.   It is delightful to know that you enjoyed your entire 5 nights stay here and found our services worth recommending. Chef Pond at Sakura is one of our remarkable chefs and the epitome of what professionalism is. He truly cares for and listen to his customers and understand their needs.  During monsoon time, it will not usually be constant 24/7 rain but it rarely lasts for a long time. When the rain stops, you'll still get to enjoy plenty of sunny days,as it's partly sunny or wholly sunny during the day too. However, I would recommend you if you visit us next time the same period to try out various indoor activity options that we provide such as Table tennis competition, Yoga, Thai boxing, or if you look forward to a place to chill out you can visit us at Czar bar next to the lobby area. There you can enjoy the great atmosphere and experience of the live entertainment.   Debbie B, thank you again for your review and thank so much for the trust and confidence in us. We all look forward to your next stay and we will make sure that you will get a more pleasant stay than this time.   Warm regards, Keith Massey General Manager

title: A relaxing week
review: Wonderful Resort with water canal in front of Rooms,Beautiful green walkways upto waterfront Resturant,Squash court,Pool table,Table tennis,Cycles available,Kids room,swiming pools,variety of Food and above all Sea view while having your meals.

title: Dream Holiday in a Dream Lcoation
review: Dear 537ranjits,  Thank you for taking your time sharing your recent experience with other travelers on TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your compliments regarding our resort with South East Asia’s longest lagoon pool. As you might know, we're both adults- and family-friendly as there is plenty space for everyone to enjoy and especially, we have been awarded “Best International Hotel – Krabi & Phang Nga” at the 2017 – 2018.   We offer a wide range of activities for kids, teen, adults and families whether it be at our Kids Club, Recreation Club, or Water Sports activities, so you’ll never have a dull moments in our resort and we hope that your memorable time here will entice you to return to us in the future so that we will be able to offer you an even better experience!   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Enjoyable family holiday
review: Had a week here in early July this year. Rooms very comfortable, food great. Loved the staff, they couldn’t do enough for us. Day trips were organised, everything went well. Three spa appointments each were in the deal. ,

title: Awesome Family-Trip
review: We stayed at this beautiful Resort for 9 nights, everything was great from the first moment on, had a warm welcome with cooling towels and a soft drinks, as Marriott Gold Member our room was upgraded too. Rooms were spacious and clean, a little bit outdated but ok. Hotel staff was very friendly, breakfast-selection is amazing, breakfast room was however very noisy and crowded. SPA was absolutely perfect, thai-massages were fantastic and professional.  Tried all the restaurants in the Resort, the Italian was fantastic, japanese too, the thai restaurant was disappointing but there are many other -Thai restaurants just outside the resort (for a fraction of price compared to the resorts restaurant), for example Friendship restaurant, Premuri, Phen... Overall a great holiday with my…

title: Again, awesome vacation
review: Dear I_Globetrotter_I,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience; we appreciate you choosing us for your recent family trip to Khao Lak.   We are glad to know that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. At JW Marriott, we take pride in offering our guests a unique hospitality and a 'home away from home' experience; therefore your feedback to us is of utmost important. Great to know that our breakfast was a major highlight of your stay. We understand that our guests have different food preferences, therefore our dedicated team of chefs work hard to ensure that they provide a vast selection of high-quality ingredients and a wide range of food choices.   Additionally, we are glad to know that you were able to make the most of your time at our restaurants trying different dining experience here such as Waterfront restaurant for your breakfast & lunch, Sakura restaurant for Japanese and Olive restaurant for Italian, Ta-Krai restaurant for finest Thai dining experience, but I am very disappointed that your experience at Ta Krai wasn't that pleasant. We are sure different guests have different taste and expectation but I have passed this to our food and beverage team to make sure that our guest leave us with good impressions.   We hope to welcome you back to the resort again soon in the future. And we promise your next visit will be much more pleasant than the previous one.  Warm regards,  Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Amazing Staff
review: This time we stayed for a week. Again, nothing to complain. Fully relaxation. The weather wasnt good, so the sea was quiete rough. couldnt go into the water. Rooms are beautiful and clean, needs now a little bit of refurbishment. Had a nice talk with one of the managers. They are building 100 more rooms to increase the capacity.  Their staff is simply outstanding. Everyone friendly and helpful. Their chefs Sa and Mohan are out of this world. So friendly, professional, quick and understanding. Mr Mohan showed professionalism and service excellence. And his cooking qualities are also out of this world.  We had a few chats with the management and chefs. As the hotel provides Halal Meat, we suggested to treat it also the Halal way, where the Halal meat cant get in touch with the non…

title: Huge resort ,great staff,exvellent service,iconic pool and ofcourse indian vegeterian food
review: Dear hoodyni,  Thank you so much for your constructive feedback. I appreciate you referred your stay with us as an awesome vacation again and it is great to learn about the aspects you enjoyed and the factors you feel we should improve upon.    We are delight to read that we could exceed your expectations with our service provided by our professional staff and particularly for praising the efforts of Chefs Sa, Executive Sous Chef and Chef Mohan. Please rest assured that your kind words have been shared with the whole team.   Our maintenance works are part of our daily routine and we are doing our best to make sure that we proactively and consistently keep the property in the best possible shape. Nowadays, the hotel has been undergoing regular maintenance sessions to ensure that all guests have an optimal experience with us. I hope you will see a difference next time you visit us.  Warm regards,  Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Another amazing visit
review: First of all the resort is amazing. The Deluxe Lagoon Rooms provide access direct from your room into the pool. The pool is massive, spanning 1.9 km in length winding around the property. The food is amazing. So many options at the buffet breakfast and both the Thai and Japanese restaurants were amazing. What struck us the most throughout our stay was how amazing the staff are. They work long hours with limited time off and often making significant sacrifices being away from their families.bNotwithstanding this, they are always so friendly, accomodating and always greet with a massive smile. In particular we want to shout out to Honey and Wat who's hospitality was unlimited during our daily breakfast and lunches. They deserve recognition and so much more for the amazing job they…

title: Our 3rd visit to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa
review: We have just returned after 11 nights at the JW Marriott Resort & Spa in August 2018, our 3rd visit here. We had booked a pool view room and had also contacted the reservation team prior to our stay there to request a good rate for an upgrade to a pool access room, thinking they may give us a favourable rate seeing this is our 3rd visit and we are there to celebrate our wedding anniversary, all info sent to the hotel before we had arrived, and had received correspondence from the reservation team so we hoped it will be good news when we arrive. When we did arrive, we were put into a pool view room on wing 2, told it was a quiet room (though overlooking the children’s pool, so not quiet during the day). The following morning we were told a pool access room was available, at a…

title: Best hotel in our honeymoon trip
review: The best hotel we visited during our honeymoon trip.  A luxurious hotel, breathtaking views, excellent food and most importantly - consider guests.  During our stay they arranged the room in a romantic way, we received a special cake for the honeymoon. The hotel staff is very nice and polite. Very recommended and we will definitely return again.

title: Still Great
review: Dear  עומרי ,  Thank you so much for your kind words. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your fantastic experience with us.   It is wonderful to read that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay at our resort and that we could exceeded your expectations. I am sure that this feedback will serve as an encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.  Thank you for recommending us, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Warm regards,  Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Great family resort
review: This was our second visit and it was just as good as previous. Staff are wonderful and cannot do enough for you. We had a pool access room and it was fantastic.  Restaurants are very good especially the Japanese where we were treated to a ‘show’ by Chef Banana! Only downside is that rooms need renovating but they are doing this and that will be great.

title: Service Excellence
review: Dear PJW17,  I'd like to thank you so much for your trust in us and choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa again for your recent stay in Khao Lak.  It is such a rewarding indeed to learn that you appreciated many aspects of your stay and the service provided by our staff made a positive impact on your stay. Chef Banana loves entertaining people. He is the epitome of professionalism and genuinely  care for and appreciate his guests. We were so fortunate to have such an incredible team to create a memorable customer experience at the resort.  Our maintenance works are part of our daily routine and we are doing our best to make sure that we proactively and consistently keep the property in the best possible shape. Nowadays, the hotel has been undergoing regular maintenance sessions to ensure that all guests have an optimal experience with us. I hope you will see a difference next time you visit us.  Warm regards,  Keith Massey  General Manager

title: Fantastic Family Holiday
review: My Family consisted of three separate groups  Myself my wife and her son 16,My eldest daughters family consisting of her and husband and their thre children 8 ,7 and 6. and my other daughter with her husband. We were accommadated on the ground floor five rooms  3 interconnecting with direct access to the lagoon pool. Step off your veranda into the pool. All rooms were high class and amenities were great. There was plenty to do for all ages and the childrens club was a smash hit. We tried all the restaurants but foundthe authentic Italian the best followed by the japanese then the Thai. Food was no problem as next dooracross the street on the beach was more restaurants and massage  centres. My only disappointment was it was a two hour trip from the airport and Phuket central.…

title: 2nd visit to hotel
review: Dear George k,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your holiday destination and for your time to provide us your valuable feedback relating to your recent stay with us.   We are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant experience on your stay and were satisfied by our services and facilities.  We are also very sorry to hear that you were not able to take the trip to Phuket central as you planned due to the location of our hotel, which unfortunately with the privacy and beautiful nature we offer, can be a bit too far from the city center.    However, if you plan to come back and visit us again, which we sincerely hope that you will, we want you to know that it would be our pleasure to give you some useful suggestions about your local day trips. So, on your next stay at our hotel, you can inform us about places you wish to go and we can look into your plan and try our best to see what we can do to make it possible and to make your journey the most memorable.  Warm regards,  Keith Massey General Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Marriott paradise in Khao Lak
review: So we decided to come back to this hotel so it would suggest it was excellent the first time round. And to a degree still is.   The beach bar has no consistency when it serves food, despite an itinerary. It’s a gamble as to whether it will serve food. We had to go to the bar more often than not to order food and drink is, despite it being table service.   The room is amazing- luxurious and clean. Hotel staff are very friendly. The breakfast is amazing-I guarantee they ha e something to suit everyone. The overall cleanliness of the hotel is impeccable. Midnight swims are amazing!  Now there’s is the biggest wedding setting up so our private, pool access room that has given us peace and tranquility is no more. There is a team of, at a guess, 50people setting up for this wedding,…

title: Excellent family holiday
review: Dear Suz99999,  Thank you for the feedback and thanks for your time for the catch up in the evening at the beach bar. I truly appreciated your sincere feedback and thank you for your kind understanding whilst the resort team trying to do the best they can to accommodate both regular guests and the wedding guest. Please accept my sincerely apologies for the inconvenience you have experienced. Please let us know if anything we can do for you.   Best regards, Mee Room Division Manager  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa

title: Superb hotel but don't just limit yourself to just the hotel dining experience
review: My husband and I stayed one week at the Marriott. Loved every minute of it. They have a few specials on check in of which we decided to take, pay a certain amount of money on check in for food and beverage and you get a certain percent on top of that to spend.  So glad we did as the food is delicious.  We ate in the Japanese and Thai mainly but they also have a beach bar and restaurant and a different buffet every night if the weather is nice it is served on the lawn right near the beach.   I am a coeliac and I can’t express to you how accommodating the chefs were for me! In particular Chef Doh in the Thai went through the whole menu with me to let me know what I could eat.  The head Chef in the main restaurant in charge of Indian food also went through the whole buffet with me…

title: Great Resort
review: On arrival we were greeted with juice and cold towels this was a nice touch after a long journey the lady at reception was very informative about the resort and showed us to our room. Our room was on the 1st floor was very spacious the bed was comfortable shower and bath were good. The buffet breakfast is a good spread even if you are fussy you would find something to eat. The highlight of breakfast was the different juices available everyday. We purchased a luxury escape deal and was very happy with our spa treatments the massages were one of the best i have had. The food i recommend to try is the Thai restaurant the food was  amazing plus the staff who work there are all happy to serve you. The town of Khao Lak is bigger then i thought but you can get good bargains at the…

title: Good, but not more
review: Dear Jo M,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review about your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and choosing our resort to spend your precious holiday.  We understand that first impression goes a long way, which is why we tried to create a memorable experience since the first day of your arrival and until the end of your stay with us. We're delighted to know that you were able to enjoy the benefits from booking our Luxury Escape Deal with all meals and spa packages included. The breakfast restaurant is always the highlight of our resort with a great range of drinks and plenty choices of international and local dishes to suit different preferences of our guests.  Your nice compliments will not come to pass without sharing them to my whole team especially to our reception, housekeeping, Quan spa and restaurant, who would be very happy to hear that their efforts to make your stay pleasant paid off.  We hope to welcome you back to the resort again and to ensure a more pleasant experience on your next trip to Khao Lak.   Warm regards,  Keith Massey General Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Great dining experience
review: Family of 2+3, reserved two interconnecting rooms. Rooms were nice, however, our room was right by some other rooms going under renovation and the smell of paint / turpentine was really bad so we asked for a different set of connecting rooms. They were very responsive and gave us a free upgrade to a two bedroom duplex which was really great. All in all in all its good, but here are a few Pro's and Con's: PRO's: - Very good service - Very nice rooms - Large pool - Free evening drinks and city shuttle for elite members  CON's: - No servers at pool, you want to eat / drink - you go get it yourself - Bars at pool - only if you get in the water and swim up to the bar - No food at pool area - Very large hotel, you are at the pool and need a restroom, prepare to walk - Stairs, not…

title: Third time round, still as good
review: Dear IamJ0ss,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback about your recent vacation at our resort.  We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience caused to you and your family because of the work being done at the rooms next to you. With the harsh monsoon rains during your stay we, unfortunately, had some water damages which needed urgent attention to ensure our rooms stay as beautiful as you have mentioned them to be in your review.  I am glad to read that our team immediately responded to the unforeseen circumstances and that the upgrade to our large 2 bed-room suite helped to soften the impact this had to your stay with us.  Our team does their very best to ensure that every area of our very expansive 1.9km pool area which spans all across our lush gardens is serviced at all times and I am sad to learn that we have obviously fallen short in our service delivery in your case. I will ensure your feedback is shared with our team so that we can further improve the pool experience for all of our guests.  Warm regards from a meanwhile sunny Khao Lak,  Nicolai Mitchell Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great for families
review: We stay  in the JW Marriott international resort in Khao Lak, Thailand at the end of July and it was an unforgettable, wonderful experience! While being there few times we went to dinner at the Thai Restaurant Ta-Krai It was a great experience and helped me to better grasp  what the authentic Thai food actually is. It was much more delicious, fresh, complex and delightful than Thai food in most Melbourne restaurants  I've been to.  It changed my understanding of Thai cuisine. At the beginning of our dinner the restaurant.manager, Ann, brought us the tray with eight spices most commonly used in Southern Thai cuisine and explained those. We wrapped the mixture of these spices into the leaves and tried them. They were deliciously fresh and clean in taste. Ann explained that the…

title: Fantastic pool
review: The service, staff and pool are just amazing (we booked this hotel before and after our Khao Sok forrest/lake trip).  I have never seen a pool like this, they advertise it being 3km long and I dont think thats a lie. Its fantastic, all around the resort, with two pool bars. We chose to book a suite (which is second floor), bit would defenitely recommend booking the poolaccess rooms (feels like having your own pool). We had quite bad weather (rainy season), but the pool made it quiye enjoyable for our kids.  If you want to eat on premise, they have three restautants of which two are fully booked quitr fast (downside), so you have to book in advance.  There is a great place (friendship restaurant) directly next to the resort on the beach, for good Thai food as well.  The location…

title: Marriott standard
review: Dear Daniel K,  Thank you for your kind feedback. We greatly appreciate you taking the time let us know about your experience during your stay with us. Indeed, the swimming pool truly is one of our well received facilities which is one of the longest in South East Asia, with a total of 1.9km in length meandering around the entire resort. As you mention, our restaurants are the main highlights of our resort so, we recommend you to book your table in advance to ensure we are able to provide you a seat. You can make a reservation online through our Facebook page "JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa"   I've passed your feedback to the team and we are all looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Amazing hotel and staff, loved every moment.
review: I have to thank you k. Pooh at water front restaurant and her team for wonderful service.  always brilliant hosting to my wife and me for breakfast.  she call us by name, she can remember and offer our drink that we use to have yesterday without asking.  Wow...  all the time i spend for breakfast i never saw her and team drop their energy to serve even 90% Occ in house. And she have a surprise BD to my wife when we have breakfast too! It so amazing, so lovely.    Need to say thank you for management team to have and well trained associate like this.  You all make my day start with happiness.

title: Better than ever
review: Dear Kaweewong T,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our paradise resort as your accommodation in Khao Lak and for sharing your wonderful feedback here.  We truly appreciate your kind compliments to our staffs K.Pooh and team who are the true shining examples of staff who strive to deliver nothing but memorable services to you and your wife. I will personally share your great review with them as I'm sure it will further add an additional motivation to each and everyone of the team members to continuously deliver an excellent service to all of our guests.  On behalf of the team, I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for another " home away from home" memorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Marvellous
review: Spent 8 nights here with wife and our 17 month old son. Easiest 5 star rating I've ever given. Couldn't fault anything about this hotel, stayed in a swim up/pool access room which was perfect, allowed for us to sunbathe and swim while the little fella had his midday nap. Grounds were amazing and immaculate, huge lagoon pool best I've seen, breakfast lunch and dinners were all delicious with so much selection. Best buffet breakfast selection in any hotel we have stayed in. Special shout out to the chef in the Japanese restaurant, very entertaining! The resort accommodates a LOT of guests, but it never felt crowded due to the layout, sunbeds spread out all over so you could always find a quiet spot if need be. I'll save my biggest thanks and rating for the staff, most genuinely…

title: Relaxing and peacefull
review: Attentive and friendly staff. Good and clean facilities both in room and at the hotel in general. Breakfast is excellent - the variety and quality above anything I have seen before. All in all the hotel is great.

title: Sublime holiday
review: Dear Stefan H,  Thank you for taking your time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to learn that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Our team works hard and do our best every single day to make sure that we provide you with personalized service with a luxury touch. We strive to maintain the highest standards not only in service, but also in ensuring our rooms, facilities and landscape are well maintained at all times.   We hope that you will have a chance to return to our little paradise in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Let down by Marriott
review: We were so lucky to experience a Luxury Escape at this Hotel. A bit off the beaten track but adequate transport to satisfy your needs. Staff so gentle and pleasant and helpful. Had eight night all inclusive stay so wre able to eat twice at each of the four Restaurants, Italian, Thai, Italian, Japanese and International Buffet. Plus lunches at Deli, Beach Club, Infinity bar. Amazing swimming pools and plenty of space for adults  [ 12+ ] Strong surf beach during our stay but the Australians absolutely loved it

title: Family summer vacation
review: Dear  aquarian1935,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to know that your overall stay was enjoyable and our services/facilities exceeded your expectations in every aspect for a spectacular stay. We provide different activities to suit everyone’s needs as well as a various options of food and beverage that have a total of 9 outlets in our resort, including our special themed night dinners. Please rest assured that I've passed your feedback to the team and we are all looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Maybe expected too much!
review: Unfortunately we won't be visiting this hotel even though we booked over 6 months ago.  Marriott have decided to take a block booking for the whole hotel and cancelled all individual bookings for the same few days in November 2018.  The holiday was to celebrate our 30th wedding anniversary and why we spent a lot of time choosing the right place and getting our booking in early.  So we are now back to the drawing board, with less available....

title: A wonderful resort- we will be back!
