review: We booked this holiday through Luxury Escapes and are so glad we did. Every moment has been superb. The staff are so friendly and accommodating and bend over backwards to meet your needs. Nothing is too much trouble. The restaurants have been great and the pool is gorgeous.  Our only suggestion is that the “adult only” pool area is enforced a little more. We have done years of holidays with our children and therefore now quite enjoy the quiet adult pool area. Unfortunately even though it is well marked some families (with noisy children) choose to ignore this which is a little disappointing.  All in all we cannot wait to return. Thankyou for making this a 5 star holiday.

title: Great service, good food
review: Dear nicole p,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and leaving us a 5 star review on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to learn that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay including the service of staff, the restaurants and the pool which is the top highlight of our resort with almost 2km long!   Your helpful suggestion is much appreciated and we certainly hope to welcome you and your family back soon for another experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Loved this hotel!!
review: Everyone was incredibly polite and friendly, food was great but a little pricey. Would recommend the Japanese restaurant. If you want cheaper but amazing Thai food then you can take free transport from the hotel to Pam’s Restaurant or walk about 30 seconds left down the beach to the odly named “Friendship restaurant”.

title: Japanese Restaurant Review
review: Dear Joe J,  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodation during visit beautiful Khao Lak. We appreciate your comment regarding the politeness and friendliness of our staffs. We take pride in our service, and always put a personal touch to everything we do for our guests. Also, we’re glad you took advantage of the local restaurants near the resort where you can try the original taste of Thai foods.   Once again thank you for your review, we hope to welcome you back in the near future!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: No Genuine Care!
review: Stayed a week in this beautiful hotel, the communal areas are just stunning, our room was an excellent size and well maintained, the pool is gorgeous. We ate in all the restaurants and really enjoyed the food, especially the Japanese restaurant. There was a big Indian 3 day wedding there when we were there which was intrusive but handled well by the staff and enjoyable to watch!!! I would definitely recommend

title: Stunning hotel in an ok location.
review: Visually this hotel is stunning and the grounds, garden and pool are very well looked after. The breakfast selection was excellent - sooo much variety. We was in the pool everyday it is well kept and pretty empty.  We didn’t eat in any restaurants during the evening as it a lot cheaper to dine at the restaurants just outside - go to reception and they’ll organise a free transfer to Blue Mist restaurant - authentic Thai food or walk to the restaurant next to the 7/11 - premrudian was so good and 1/3 of the price of the restaurants at the hotel.  We had lunch at the pool bar and the food was always great but English prices so it was quite expensive. Our room was stunning and we had no complaints at all staying there. Except for check was slightly awkward but we think that was…

title: Nice but standard
review: Dear EAGroves,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking the time to review us on Trip Advisor.   It's always a pleasure to read that you thoroughly impressed our breakfast selections which is one of the main highlight of our resort. We strive to maintain our standards not only in service, but also in ensuring our facilities and landscape are well maintained at all times. Also, we're glad you were able to take advantage of the local restaurants in Khao Lak. There are many restaurants both on the beach and the markets at Khao Lak Centre where you can find local food stalls, restaurants/bars and a number of small shops that offer all kinds of souvenirs, clothing, hand bags, shoes and much more.   With regards to our food & drinks prices as we are using high-quality produce and ingredients from certified suppliers to ensure the highest standards of our offerings. We truly hope to see you again soon to making your next visit as pleasant as the recent one!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Beautiful location with 3 fabulous Restaurants of variety, amazing Pool and so relaxing!!!
review: Ticks the boxes around what to expect in this type of resort: gym, multiple restaurants, multiple pools, kids club, etc.  Staff were friendly but bar and restaurant service quality was inconsistent each visit, in particular The Waterfront Restaurant, which is only breakfast option.  It’s also loud with some tables having really impractical sofa seating.  The beach bar/restaurant had lovely food options for lunch and operated with amazing efficiency.  The Italian restaurant had some nice options.  I enjoyed the food at the Japanese restaurant.  The Thai restaurant was good but second visit got a lot of the order wrong even though some of it - wine order - I double checked with them.  Kids enjoyed the kids club.  Good options for computer games for the slightly older kids.  While…

title: Disapointed
review: Dear Eelkins,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodation in Khao Lak and taking the time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor. Please accept our sincere apologies for some inconvenience you have experienced, and please rest assured we have addressed this with the team involved for further improvement.  It seems you took advantage of the many complimentary activities on offer. We are proud to be able to offer plenty of both indoor and outdoor activities that perfectly suits your needs. We could say that we are an excellent adult- and family-friendly resort with lots of activities not only for adults to enjoy, but also for children to catch up the special activities at the Kids club, so you’ll be sure to keep your schedule as busy or as relaxing in this dream paradise.  I've passed your feedback to the team and we hope that you will have a chance to return us in the near future  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Marriott revisited
review: If you want a great escape away from the hussle bussle of people, in a beautiful location, with 3 great Restaurants that have 3 cuisines, and your Rooms are literally surrounded by a pool that is I think the biggest and most diverse in Thailand.  My wife and I swam around it in it's entirety every day for the 7days we were at this location and loved it. Our favourite Restaurant was the Thai Restaurant, but the Italian food was also excellent as was the other choice.  If you have trouble with stairs, I would suggest you ask for a ground floor room as there are no lifts to the 2nd or 3rd floor and we were on the 3rd floor and got plenty of exercise and we are in our 60's.  The ground floor rooms also have the luxury of literally having out your bedroom living area a direct entry…

title: Perfection!
review: Really enjoying our stay at the JW Marriot. The staff our superb & nothing is too much for them🙏 We are only b & b. The breakfast is excellent and it’s great that there is a separate area for adults. ‘Laila’ especially efficient during the breakfast service👌 We eat at local restaurants all booked by the Concierge. Excellent service. Have really enjoyed Pams garden restaurant up the road from the JW. Our room is superb overlooking the fountains and massive pool. Perfect for families or couples. Hired a moped for a few days to see the local area. Wouldn’t rave about Khao Lak but loved the beaches north of the hotel🏖 Would definitely book again.  Writing this review whilst laying on the beach- life is good. 😎

title: Wow!
review: Dear nickmoore3337,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Khao Lak.  Seems like you thoroughly impressed the service from our staffs specially Laila at the breakfast restaurant who always go above and beyond to greet and help you in anything you needed. Our breakfast restaurants is one of the main highlight of our resort  and our chefs surely appreciate that you liked the foods which we provide the top quality and fresh ingredients. It's so great to know that you enjoyed Thai local food and had an advantage to visited Pams garden restaurant near our resort, I've pass on your review to our concierge team, they are very happy to know that you love there! :)  On behalf of the team, I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for another " home away from home" memorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: A stunning resort
review: Took a risk weather wise as their rainy season- well worth it as only 1 totally rainy day in 14- otherwise just quick showers . Stunning lobby area & totally gracious staff from moment you step into hotel. Beautiful gardens set around lagoon- all immaculately kept by gardeners who are on constant leaf patrol!  First floor room has beautiful view & lovely massive bathroom- all stone & marble. Biggest bath you can imagine! Ground floor rooms great for kids as direct access to lagoon for swimming. Loads of beds available- private adult only sunbed retreats around pool & choice of sofas etc facing sea next to beach bar. Loved happy hour 5-6 watching sun go down at beach bar with laid back guitar/ vocalist. Great breakfast choice & glad of adult only restaurant now our kids are grown…

title: Fantastic Resort but Isolated
review: Dear GillyMiddleAged,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and many thanks for choosing our paradise resort for your relaxing vacation in Khao Lak.   We couldn't be more proud to read that you had a great stay with us as we strive every day to offer our guests the excellent experience in every aspect whether it be for our facilities, amenities and genuine services and we work hard to ensure that every guest leaves the resort with great memories, and hopefully with the desire to return!   I must say that the most important aspect of every stay is the cleanliness, that's why our team work so hard every day in maintaining each area and keep everywhere looking nice and clean especially our pool which is the main highlight of our resort with a total of 1.93km in length – it’s a real treat and the ultimate relaxation!   Last but not least, We have passed your personal recognition to our staff to concerned team and they couldn’t be more thrilled and your feedback is always such a great motivation for us! :)  We hope life will take you back to us again soon. Please let me know if there’s anything we could do to make your stay even more exquisite!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Best place to spend vacations with family in Thai
review: We recently returned home after 7 nights in a pool view room. Our room was spacious the bathroom made of stone with the deepest bath I have ever seen.The bed was very comfortable and the room well appointed.There were many breakfast choices but was very busy. We didn’t eat at the resort but at the end of the driveway there is a Thai and Italian restraurant and a store like 7 eleven to get water and snacks.Both  are good value offering delicious tasty food. A trip to Bang Niang Market is an enjoyable evening event. The hotel charges 200 Baht per person return  for the shuttle and this must be booked. Shopping is no different to other places in Thailand but is a good place to wander around.The are many restaurants nearby to choose from. We had lunch in the deli which is offering a…

title: Simply Excellent
review: We came in the low season and got a total bargain on tge room price. The staff even upgraded us as we were celebrating a special occasion. The breakfast is out of this world! So much to choose from and everything is fresh. The beach is very, very quiet but this could have been due to the season. The sand is clean and a little rough/stoney. The swimming pool is haw dropping and in fact, wraps around the hotel rooms like a lazy river.   The onsite Italian restaurant has a fantastic Lamb Ragu!!

title: สุดยอดของโรงแรมเขาหลัก
review: Dear Honeytree24,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience relating to your current stay here which is very helpful for the readers on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to learn that you chose us to celebrate your special occasion and especially you found every aspect of the resort exceeded your expectations. Seems like our breakfast restaurant is your highlights of your stay where we offer a wide selection of high quality food to kick start your adventure in Khao Lak. Additionally, we truly appreciate your compliments regarding the longest pool and the sandy beach. Our goal is always to create 5* memorable experiences to our valued guests.  We certainly hope to welcome you back soon for another experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Beautiful resort, food lacking
review: ทุกอย่างของที่นี่ดีหมดเลยไม่ว่าจะเป็นห้องพัก อาหาร การบริการ ถ้าคุณมาเขาหลักคุณต้องไม่พลาดเลยกับการมาพักที่นี่   การต้อนรับดีงามทำให้รู้สึกว่าเป็นแขกคนสำคัญ  อาหารเย็นแบบบุฟเฟต์ตอนที่มาพักคนละ 900 net แต่คุณได้อาหารทะเลย่างและสด เมนูกริลล์ทั้งหมู เนื้อ ได้ ปลา ที่อร่อยน้ำซอสที่เข้มข้น  อาหารเช้า เยอะมากทั้ง ไทย ยุโรป อินเดีย ญี่ปุ่น จีน ครบถ้วนจริง ๆ  The Best Hotel at Khao Lak  If you come to Khao Lak, you will not miss this place.  Good hospitality makes guests feel important.  Buffet dinner at 900 net per person, but you get grilled and fresh seafood. Grilled pork, beef, fish, delicious sauce.  Breakfast very much Thai, European, Indian, Japanese, Chinese really.

title: Stunning - but debit your credit card & significant delays in repaying
review: สวัสดีค่ะ คุณ Ohm Suradech P,  ขอบคุณที่สละเวลามาเขียนรีวิวให้กับเรา JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa นะคะ  ดิฉันและรีสอร์ททีมทุกคนรู้สึกเป็นเกียรติและดีใจมากที่ได้ทราบว่าคุณลูกค้าประทับใจในการให้บริการของเรา ตลอดจนประทับใจในรสชาติอาหารของทางห้องอาหารของเราอีกด้วย ทีมงานทุกคนตั้งใจทำงานเป็นอย่างมาก เพื่อตอบสนองทุกๆความต้องการของลูกค้า และเราหวังอย่างยิ่งว่า ความประทับใจที่คุณโอมได้รับในการพักกับเราครั้งนี้ จะทำให้คุณโอมกลับมาพักและใช้บริการกับทาง JW Marriott Khao Lak อีกครั้ง  ขอขอบคุณเป็นอย่างสูงค่ะ  หทัยชนก  รักสำราญ Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Literal 5 star heaven right on the beach - relaxing and refreshing.
review: I recently stayed here for a week with my husband. The resort itself is stunning, with large and beautifully decorated rooms. All public areas are very nice. Beachfront is stunning. The pool access rooms are amazing.  Staff are very friendly and will always greet you. The service here is second to none. I celebrated my birthday while we were there and came back to the room to find a lovely birthday cake in the evening.  We dined at all of the on-site restaurants and I have to say, while the service was great, the quality of the food was not very good, with the exception of the Olive restaurant, which was great. The breakfast buffet was also great, however was disappointed with the Thai and Japanese restaurants. We did also have an issue with the waterfront buffet dinner and made…

title: Typical resort for travel machinery
review: This is a resort that will fit families or people who want all inclusive.  Rooms are clean. Beds are good and added up with pillows.  Service is in the middle level. Nothing to complain but nothing to add as pluss either.  Breakfast has a worldwide kitchen. If you go out hungry from here you can blame your self. It is not a 5 star breakfast room. Keep that in mind it’s busy and noisy.   There are a few restaurants on site in the hotel area. You need to reserve in good time. If you miss a table here you can find a couple of local restaurants on the side of the resort. You will not die if you eat here. Food is fine :) In my taste it’s better than the resorts.  For kids it’s plenty of options.   Swimming pool is mostly clean. But in some places there is a awful smell. Be aware when…

title: Terrible
review: Dear Knut b,  Many thanks for your feedback.  Last week was indeed super busy, this coupled with the poor weather last week resulted in the restaurants being extremely busy, apologies for the noise and congestion during breakfast.  During the school holidays, we are very busy with families and the majority of our younger guests do have a great stay with us as there is plenty to do, actually last week was the busiest week of the year so far.  Our meandering canal pool is 1.9kms long and we do take great pride in keeping our pool very clean as it is very important for our resort, with this said, it was challenging last week due to the weather with leaves etc in our pool, but I was not aware or have been made aware of a smell issue as yet but please rest assured our pool water in very clean and managed very carefully.  Knut b, if you do choose to visit again, our quietest months in the year are May, June and September, these months also being non school holiday periods for our key source markets.  Sincerely,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Seriously Good
review: Disappointingly we did not get a luxury holiday at all. Instead we got served contaminated food and water. My daughter got sick on the fourth day of our holiday-Friday at the resort with a fever, diarrhoea, Palin and lethargy. We spent most of the time in the room trying to look after her the best we could. We all suffered diarrhoea during our stay for several days. We were assured by staff at the restaurants that the water they were serving was bottled water...I doubt now that this was the case...we all suffered diarrhoea while we were at the resort and When we arrived to Australia We had to get our daughter admitted to the hospital and now she is being treated for salmonella as an inpatient

title: Ridiculously good pool; excellent service
review: Dear Luxury L,  Thank you for your review on our TripAdvisor Page. I am truly sorry to hear that you were unwell and hence not able to enjoy your holidays with us. I hope your daughter has fully recovered by now.  Unfortunately we cannot find any record that you fell sick during your stay, which makes it difficult for us to investigate the matter.  I would welcome if you could contact me directly via email to learn more details about your illness and about all food and beverages consumed with us as well as outside our resort. Please note that we take food safety extremely serious and adhere strictly to international food safety standards which are regularly audited. We serve hundreds of customers every day in our restaurants and fortunately we did not receive any other allegation of food-borne illness. As mentioned I would appreciate if you could share more details with me so that we can complete our investigation.  Thank you again for your review and I look forward to hearing from you.  Kind regards,  Patrick Smekens Director of Food & Beverage patrick.smekens@marriott.com

title: Great get away!
review: We (2 families - 4 adults and 5 kids aged 8-14) came in the wet season (July 2018) and my expectations were not huge.  I was expecting long periods of time to be rained in and bored. How wrong was I!  Let's start with the wow factor items. 1.  The pool.  over a kilometre of pool meanders its way through the resort.  It's just an amazing sight, and so much fun to swim around and discover the 2 bars within the pool. 2. The size.  The resort is so big, whilst it is a little overwhelming at first, after spending 8 days there the size is definitely an advantage as you don't get bored going to the same places over and over. 3. The gym.  I'm an avid gym goer and the gym was pretty standard for a hotel/resort.  To my absolute delight, a few days into my stay, they pulled out everything…

title: WOW Perfection At It's Finest
review: If you want a luxurious holiday in Thailand I can thoroughly recommend the JW Marriott Resort & Spa.  The rooms are beautiful and extremely clean - make sure you get a room with a balcony that has a day bed - just wonderful to sit on in the afternoon.  The pool is the longest I have ever been in and flows around the resort - stunning.  The gardens are gorgeous.  The food was sensational and first class.  The cocktails were refreshing as you sit by the pool or the beach.  Every evening the sunset is just gorgeous.  The ladies in the spa are excellent so make sure you go get a massage or manicure.  All the staff are very friendly.

title: Good but not environment friendly
review: Dear Darleen R,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodate during your trip to Khao Lak and sharing such a wonderful review here in Trip Advisor.  We couldn't be more proud to read that you had a great stay with us. We strive every day to provide memorable and genuine service. Your feedback is very important to us and it serves as our greatest motivation in providing even better experience for future stays. I've shared your review with the whole team and once again thank you for your recommendation. We sincerely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Great stay, highly recommended
review: Second time at Khao Lak Marriott with my family and the hospitality was nothing short of positive. Wait staff at Waterfront restaurant especially Restaurant Manager Poo is amazingly professional and welcoming.  However it is time for JW Marriott to take it up a notch and join the battle against single use plastic ! The beach is littered with plastic! Housekeeping were understanding and refilled our glass bottles with water ( but I am hoping they weren’t from plastic bottles). All drinks come with the plastic straw when they could easily be replaced with bamboo straws or go straw free depending on the drink.  I had to really battle it out with the lack of awareness of the impact of single use plastic: I know it is an uphill struggle but an important one, nonetheless.

title: JW Mariott standard - highly recommended
review: Dear Jessica G  Thank you for sharing your comments.  I wish we would have had the opportunity to talk during your stay as I would have been able to share what is actually in process with regards to the elimination of plastic here in our resort, rest assured this is our plan.  If I may, the plastic on the beach is not from us thankfully, nontheless it is still very disappointing. The plastic is a result of the major storm surges and wind from the Monsoon bringing the plastic from the ocean in during the last week. We are, as you are, shocked at the amount of plastic at the moment that is being swept in and highlights the enormity of the problem in the this part of the world.  Internally, our bamboo straws arrive next week, this is guaranteed, for your information collectively, Marriotts in our region have made the transition to move away completely from plastic straws, with a number of resorts taking on various initiatives so we are aware on how important this is.  We also will be moving toward recycled glass bottles once approval is granted.  Jessica G, as a resort we are making every effort to change/ improve our environmental practices and are advocates for the removal of plastic, I am sure if you choose to return, you will see positive change.  Thank you once again for your feedback.  Keith Massey General Manager

title: The Magnificent JW Marriott
review: This is a very nice resort. The a la carte  restaurants are amazing and the buffet is awesome. We got a pool access room through luxury escapes and had a great time. Great kids club and facilities in general. Highly recommend

title: Amazing holiday!!
review: We have just returned after an 8 day holiday to JW Marriott Khao Lak. This is our 3rd visit to this resort and it has only improved each time. The actual property is immaculate. The grounds and pool are being constantly maintained.  Each time we visit the staff make us feel most welcomed with comments like “ welcome back”, “ I remember you from last time”. This is our 3rd stay at JWMarriott Khao Lak.   I would like to mention 4 staff members who made our stay even more memorable this time. Firstly Fai from housekeeping. Always returned to our room which was cleaned immaculately. Lemon grass oil burning in the bathroom and a special towel animal on the bed.  Next is Nuch from the waterfront restaurant. She remembered us from our previous 2 visits. She greeted us every morning at…

title: Peace & Quiet in a beautiful place.
review: Dear Nick C,   Thank you for taking your time to share such an excellent review following your stay with us as the 3rd time in return! at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   We are glad to learn that our well maintained pool and ground, delectable foods, as well as the genuine care services from our true shining example staffs - Fai, Nuch, Meaw and Chef Banana, all become your glittering highlights and memories while staying with us.   They do our best every single day to make sure that you received a unforgettable experience with personalized service with a luxury touch.  The last but not least, We would like to say Happy Belated Birthday to your daughter and we are so glad that we could be part of your special family time especially, you all appreciated what we did!   Additionally, your special recognition of our GM Keith, he always try the best to add a personal touch and utmost care in satisfying all our beloved guests’ expectations and also make sure every guests leave here with memories and experiences.   It will be our pleasure to welcome you back to our little paradise. Please let me know if there’s anything we could do to make your next stay even better!   Best regards,  Hataichanok R   Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Too many noisy kids
review: I had a business conference in this hotel for a few days.   I have to say that I'm very satisfied with it.  The room is huge, with nice comfy bed.  One unique feature of the hotel is the pool.  It essentially runs along side each buildings.  So you can actually circle the whole hotel swimming!!  If you're a beach lover like I am, you would also enjoy this hotel.  The hotel has a wide private beach with soft sand.  The beach is clean but unfortunately due to the season the water isn't clear.   Breakfast is good with wide selection to suit everyone liking.   There're also a few restaurants outside the hotels although the choices are limited.     If there's only one negative point I must point out will be the location of the hotel. It's pretty remote. It's 2 km off the main street.…

title: Our stay was very disappointed
review: Dear Joytorelax,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review here in Trip Advisor.   Firstly, I hope your business conference went well. Our event team always go the extra mile to accommodate our guests’ needs and requests whenever possible. I must say that the most important aspect of every stay is the cleanliness, that's why our team work so hard every day in maintaining each area and keep everywhere looking nice and clean. Our pool and beach area are often our guests’ favourite plus, especially for the sunset views.  We look forward to welcoming you here at your home away home again and please let us know if there's anything we can do for you.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Fantastic stay!
review: The hotel and room are great but their policy is geared to captive audience. Your path entrance to the winding river pool from your room is dangerouse. There needs to be signs telling people and their noisy kids to be quiet and respect their neighbours and guards walking around might help reduce the constant noise. They are aware as there is a separate dinning area for adults. In the restaurants the cheapest wines are about £30.00. The cheapest I found was £20.00 at the beach bar. BRING YOUR OWN as 30kg for your  baggage can put loads of boxed wine in. Half board only so you have to buy your snacks and lunch, nothing like all inclusive. Will probably be an extra £1000.00 per week to leave here. You have to book a restaurant every night and it is only buffet. Breakfasts very…

title: Great stay
review: Stayed at the JW with my family and the place is truly amazing. Pros: staff, pool, bed and pillows, nice room decor and breakfast buffet. Con: that we have to leave! Thanks for your hospitality, we will be back for sure

title: The Vacation of your Life!!!
review: Dear nataliasmi987  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor, following your stay with us.  We are delighted to learn that we able to make your holiday a memorable experience and glad that you found our resort to be perfectly located and great facilities onsite.   We knew exactly what our guests expect, so we always strive to give the best and friendly service to all our guests feel comfortable of their vacation.   We wish you a warm and nice holiday season and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable getaway in the near future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa +6676.584.888

title: Beautiful 5 star resort with Asia's biggest pool
review: J.W Marriott Khao Lak has been a experience to remember. With its variety of restaurants and its breathtaking sunset, you just can’t miss it.   I was absolutely blown away by the length of the pool... As well as that, you will be able to to have drinks whilst swimming!!! My most favorite thing was swimming around the ginormous pool with my Mega Unicorn and my floating Pizza that I purchased here. Not to mention the amazing deserts! In my opinion the cakes at the Deli just started to make my mouth water.😋  Every night we went to a different restaurant and each one there is just something soo unique and special but no matter where it was the food was outstanding.   The Kids club here is Soo awesome,there was always something to do whether it was creating/making or just playing in…

title: Major General
review: Dear Dydgdsecretsgkxkxxk,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !   Thank you for choosing us as your accommodate during your trip to Khao Lak and sharing such a wonderful review here in TripAdvisor.    We couldn't be more proud to read that you had a great stay with us. It seems you took advantage of the many complimentary activities on offer both indoor and outdoor that perfectly suits everyone’s taste. Our Recreation Club offers several activities whether it be health and fitness, cultural learning, kids activities, arts and crafts, sports and entertainment and most of the activities are complimentary while others may have minimal fee. We do organize morning/ evening classes, depending on the timing, or group classes could also be arranged. Absolutely, I can not skip this point, our huge pool is truly a treat where is one of the longest pool in South East Asia, and hopefully you spent a lot of time in our wonderful pool that meanders around the entire resort!  Additionally, It was a great pleasure to read that you enjoyed our extensive foods at our Sakura restaurant and Deli. Our chefs surely appreciate that you liked the foods which we provide the top quality and fresh ingredients.   We very much appreciate your kind comments – I have passed on your notes to the entire team. They are extremely proud to have made your stay wonderful. Please let us know if there’s anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   We can’t wait to welcome you back to our dream oasis in the near future.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Paradise
review: I really enjoyed my stay here,the staff were very caring and accommodative,I stayed in room 4019 for ten nights and I really would recommend staying for longer. The buffets were amazing and you could get almost anything you ask for, there is a selection of restaurants you can eat at every night, some of them include:teppanyaki,seafood barbecue buffet, beach bar Pizza and beverages and many more. When staying here, I strongly recommend getting a pool access room because you spend most of the time swimming in the pool. I really loved my stay here and I hope you do to.

title: Disappointment in the offerings & service
review: The hotel was nice overall, the rooms are nice, we were overlooking the pool which the majority of the room are, spacious and has the basic facilities We were not very impressed by the cleanliness of the rooms, we felt that they don't go the extra mile to clean and just wipe the surface You would expect in a 5 starts hotel to have many options to hang out, eat a good meal and watch the game, but there was only the pool bar who was putting the world cup to watch, not mentioning that there was a wedding at the resort and every night they would book all the restaurants leaving us again with only the poor bar to hang out there  The staff should be able to communicate more in English, since the majority of their clientele is going to be tourists  A bit of common sense also or maybe…

title: Great place to stay if your planning on not leaving the resort
review: Dear Yara C,  Thank you for sharing your feedback, I regret to hear of the service shortfalls during your stay. Please accept my sincerest apologies or the inconvenience you experienced with regards to the cleanliness and dining option. Due to the fact of the resort is running high occupancy during your stay. We usually inform our guest to prebook the dinner at check in point to ensure every guests are trouble free during a full capacity and enjoy a nice dinner experience therefore I was not sure if the informaion is missed out at check in. please accept my apologies for that regards. The staff communication level is different in the resort therefore you may find some good in the high contact guest area for example the reception however we have taken your feedback as the opportunity for further development.   Once again, thank you for feedback. If I can be of your further assistance please do not hesitate to let me know.  Best regards, Mee Room Division Manager

title: Just Paradise!
review: Given 4 star only due to only some staff at restaurant have inconsistencies in service when compared to other 5 star resorts around Asia. This property does seem to focus on package travel deals, rooms are good, all other staff other than previous mentioned were outstanding. Great access to beach with pretty much all to yourself. Evening cocktails at the czar bar was great they have live music although the whole time we stayed the person only played once while we were in the bar and we would stay for more than an hour each night. Last but not least great location for some amazing sunsets. Would give 5 star however service in morning breakfast restaurant very inconsistent from poor to good.

title: Wow, wow and even more wow.
review: Dear Perry P,  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your choice of accommodation and for your time sharing experiences on TripAdvisor.   We are so glad to hear you had experience in our facilities including rooms, beach, bar and especially, you found a brilliant location with breathtaking sunset view in Khao Lak. We sincerely apologize for the inconveniences that you’ve mentioned, and please rest assured that all your comments has been addressed to relevant team in order to improve our services as we strive to provide nothing but exceptional experience.  We do hope you will visit us again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to contact us if there is anything we can assist you with.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Swimming pool heaven
review: Spent 5 days here on our honeymoon... WOW!!  This is just luxury, loved it, so quiet, we didn't ove off  the iste for the whole time - why would you it was just sooo comfortable - staff super friendly, breakfast amazing, the fresh fruit, the pancakes yum! We will be back!

title: Crushing The Hope & Trust
review: First, I booked for the Premium Room through Marriott website. Then previous days before the arrival date, I did print out all of my hotel reservations for my trip to Thailand. Once I printed out the reservation for JW Marriott Khao Lak, I was very surprised to found out that the hotel gave a complimentary upgrade of my room to Duplex Suite. Even after I did the Mobile Check-In on the expected day, it was the same Duplex Suite. I was very happy and did tell my family about the generous service of the hotel gave. But unfortunately, at the the day of arrival at the front office, they prentended they know nothing about the complimentary upgrade matter, then I showed up my print-out reservation. Again, they pretended in a surprise and would confirm to the manager first. Within 5…

title: Excellent
review: Dear Otiniel U,   Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your recent stay. I sincerely apologize for the issue with regards to the complimentary room upgrade situation. You are most correct, we did make a mistake with regards to your room allocation. Upgrades are subject to availablity and we should never have sent you a room gaurantee for the Suite Upgrade and I once again apologise for our mistake. I clearly understand your frustration as we once again have fallen short in our explanation to you what actually happened internally. I have shared the feedback personally with the front office team and I wish I could have spoken to you during your stay as I am sure this could have been fixed. Once again, thank you for taking the the time in sharing your thoughts with us and we hope to be able to serve you again!   If I can be of your further assistance please do not hesitate to contact me directly.   Best regards,  Mee

title: Superb excellent fantastic
review: This was our second stay on a Luxury Escapes package. We have been on several packages to different hotels and this is the best. The food choice is amazing. We ate at all the restaurants. The staff are fantastic. Special mention to Nuch and Jane the room coordinator. They were outstanding.  We had a pool access room and it was worth the extra money. You can swim for 3.5 kms. We walked/swam around most of the pools every day. It doesn't matter if it is raining.  Some rooms in block 4 are under refurbishment but it didn't really bother us.  The breakfast is amazing.

title: Simply lovely
review: Dear LindaEvVictoria,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for staying with us and taking your time to share your feedback, especially rating us as 5 star on the Trip Advisor.  It's always a pleasure to read that you gave us a second chance to hosting you during your vacation in Khao Lak. Such a wonderful that you’ve enjoy our F&B offerings as well as enjoy our pool access room where you could jump into South East Asia’s longest lagoon pool approximately 1.9km long !  Last but not least, we very much appreciate your kind comments to the team. We have passed your personal recognition to our staffs Nuch and Jane and they couldn’t be more thrilled :)  We certainly look forward to welcoming you back and please feel free to contact us before your next visit here.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Stayed for 4 nights
review: This was my first visit to an overseas destination with my daughter who has celiac disease(gluren allergy). Before confirming my booking at the resort I got in touch with the executive chef Mr Jai. He was very supportive and prompt with the replies and was extremely helpful. Upon our arrival at the resort chef Mohan had taken care of all the food requirements of my daughter with utmost care. They were able to provide very delicious gluten free meals for my daughter. The gluten free pizza was especially yummy. My daughter was extremely happy and so were we.   Apart from this the ambience and the calmness around the resort was worth a mention.   Definitely paying a visit again.

title: Beautiful, beautiful
review: We stayed at this resort via luxury escapes and it didn't disappoint us! The resort, rooms and pools are excellent. The beach is quite narrow, but when we went the waves in the afternoon were perfect for boogy boarding and we had complimentary access to the boards from the resort. All of our meals were included in the package, and we had choices each night as to where we could dine. The food was always of great quality. Kids club and the fitness centre are very well organised, with daily activities scheduled in each. You are away from the hustle and bustle (10min taxi ride) but with everything on site its not really an issue. Our room was a duplex suite, which was perfectly sized for our family of 4. Kids downstairs and parents upstairs.

title: Most Relaxed & peaceful stay
review: Dear stevenwQ9401MV,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  It's our pleasure to know that you are satisfied with our service and facilities including the large pool, spectacular beach and wide foods which are the key highlight of our resort as well as a range of recreation activities for everyone to enjoy.  Our Duplex Suite rooms offers the ideal accommodation for families where is two-level, separate living room on the 1st floor with direct into the never-ending lagoon pool and bedroom on the 2nd floor with the spectacular views of lush tropical gardens around the resort.   Positive feedback such as yours is always motivating us to continue to strive for excellent service. We all look forward to welcoming you back to our Top's beach resort for another unforgettable vacation.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Not quite a 5 star experience more  like 3 star
review: This was one of the best stays i ever had. The property is right on the beach with a big lagoon themed pool. I stayed in one of the pool access rooms and really had an awesome time. I really loved the room service which made our stay even more comfortable, relaxed and peaceful.  The in-house  restaurants are a treat. Had some really good food at the beachfront reataurant and the olive restaurant offered exceptionally good italian cuisine. Pasta was one of the best i ever had. Special thanks to chef Enzo from the olive. Indian cuisine was also a treat. Samosas and butter chicken at the beachfront are a must try. Thanks to chef Mohan for a great job. Hope to see more indian dishes on the menu. Liked the good attitude of chef mohan and chef Enzo, who took the orders themselves and…

title: Gorgeous Slice of Heaven
review: Dear Nitin T,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. It is wonderful to learn that you have very much enjoyed your stay with us and hopefully you spent a lot of time in our wonderful rooms access to the pool that meanders around the entire resort and especially, so proud that the exceptional service from Chef Enzo, Chef Mohan, Palm and others exceeded your expectations.   On behalf of the team, I look forward to welcoming you back in the near future for another " home away from home" memorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: A high class relaxing stay in Khao Lak
review: Excellent wide range of breakfast foods Package menus at other themed restaurants patchy  Eg Japanese restaurant nothing like any real Japanese  restaurant I have been to Decor inside and out a bit tired Garden , pool and beach setting nice  Drinks extremely expensive  Wine in particular  suggest you bring your own duty free One cocktail costs the same as a daily wage for the bartender Seems a bit disproportionate.

title: Holiday
review: I enjoyed the stay at your hotel very much. I was warmly welcome everywhere. But especially at the waterfront breakfast. I was travelling by myself and always felt integrated and like Family. Thank you.

title: Swim Up Rooms, In Pool Bar, Beautiful Beach
review: Dear Mam A,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodation in Khao Lak and taking the time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   It was really a pleasure to have you here and to know that you enjoyed our breakfast selections and service from our staff as we do the best everyday to offer exceptional service to all our guests and provide the "Home away from home" experience.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Please let us know when life takes you back to the beautiful Khao Lak.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: A fabulous stay
review: This is my favorite JW Marriott I've ever stayed at. Yeah it's nice to stay in Essex House or any big city, but this hotel is truly special.  As a Platinum member we were upgraded to a swim up room. Literally out your back door of the room is an awesome swimming pool that feels like Venice. You can swim to the main pool from your room and there go to the pool bar where you sit in the pool on stools and order drinks while looking at the beach or at the resort. I'm not sure which one is more beautiful because I was in awe the whole time.  The food in the resort is great if you don't want to leave the resort, however leaving the resort is also good. Just bring a car, it's not easy once you leave. You'll really miss it!  The breakfast is also fantastic. It's a crazy experience with…

title: Amazing resort for a relaxing vacation
review: Dear TravelBear990,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your recent stay with us at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Especially thank you for being our loyalty guest as a platinum reward member.  Our Pool Access rooms are truly the highlights of our resort where you can swim around the entire resort (1.93km in total) and spot at your favorite corners to watch the light change over the water, together with our 2 pool bars where you can enjoy swimming up and have a refreshing drinks on a warm day. Seems like all of our food onsite exceeded your expectations in every way, especially the breakfast where is offer a wide variety of International options along with fresh juices and smoothies, teas and coffees. Perfect kick start your adventure in Khao Lak !  We truly believe that our guests' satisfaction is our first priority so, the entire team always go the extra mile to ensure that our guests meet the expectations since the moment they step in til' out and leave our resort with nothing but memorable experience.  The feedback such as yours is the greatest motivation for us all. We certainty look forward of seeing you again on your next visit to our tropical paradise!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Excellent Hotel
review: 8 days here flew by. Package deal with Luxury Escapes was very good value given meals were included. Quality bed was sublime with lovely cotton sheets. Breakfast was great with huge variety catering to all nationalities. Not disadvantaged by rising late ie 10-11am, food fresh. The Italian restaurant ‘Olive’ was the stand out with their buffet night well worth paying a little extra for. Sakura Japanese restaurant was nice, their Thai restaurant was very average. Recommend doing their Thai cooking lesson only if you can’t boil an egg - it was pretty basic but good if you’re a beginner. Purchases outside the package deal are expensive here but you expect that. Wine drinkers can expect to pay a lot but hunt through the list and there are reasonably priced wines that are actually…

title: Beautiful property- 2nd visit, definitely recommend
review: Visited in March 2018. The hotel is great, it is around an hours drive from Phuket Airport. The check in staff are very helpful. We had a pool access room which was well maintained and odour free. Sleep quality was very food and the room we had was very quiet. Housekeeping did a great job with the room and bathroom throughout our stay, it was all kept clean and turn down was good too. Wifi worked well around the hotel. The hotel has a great breakfast with plenty to choose from and the staff are happy to cater to dietary restrictions. Other restaurants around the hotel are very good too, as is the spa. The hotel beach is very nice as well, great for sunsets. Will be happy to come back.

title: JW Marrioitt khao lak - bad service - rude - poor management by Manne disgusting how i was dealt with
review: Dear Karan b,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the 2nd time visit to Khao Lak.  Our resort is located with a 1.5 hours' drive from Phuket International Airport and just 15 min. reach Khao Lak Centre. Surely one most beautiful & romantic place to holiday where you can relax during your getaway in Khao Lak! We're delighted that you impressed the  facilities, services and especially, our team did their job very well in creating a great experience for you. Our breakfast restaurants is one of the main highlight of our resort with plenty of variety selections for our guests as well as the other restaurants onsite including Ta Krai (Thai cuisine), Sakura (Japanese cuisine) and Olive restaurant (Italian cuisine) and It's absolutely that FB team work hard every day to keep the concept fresh and delicious! together with the passion and daily attention that the chefs give to every lists and dishes.  The entire team do always strive to provide the best service as possible for a comfortable and unforgettable experience. Can’t wait to welcome you back in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Still the Perfect Resort to Swim, Relax, Unwind & Rest
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott hotel for 10 nights then we had to move out due to a large wedding. So i decided to check into somewhere else.  I still went to JW every day had food there drinks spending daily 3,000 thb use the pool the bars which for the past few weeks has not been a problem.  I have visited the JW now for the past 6 years plus my experience yesterday was disgusting the way i was dealt with was wrong on every level.  So i was sat by the pool having a drink when a wan't to be police man (security from hotel) came over to me started taking pictures of me so i stood up and did the same to him.  I asked to see the manager Manne who explained i was not allowed to use the hotel pools because i was no longer a guest there.  But i was allowed to eat drink there and use…

title: Eight days in paradise with an eight night Luxury Escapes package.
review: Dear Shamer2018,  Thank you for sharing your insight feedback regarding your recent visit whilst you are around in Khao Lak. I regret to hear of the under impression you received during the recent visit. Based on the review I can understand that the resort team is trying to protected the resort facilities for the house customer although the low season the facility need be reserved for our in house customer. I clearly understand that you are aware of the resort rules and you are absolutely welcome to dine in the resort outlets. With the matter of facts, our team may not doing good in explanation and action  therefore it gave a little bit of bitter taste. Please accept my sincere apologies for the impression you have experienced.  Once again, thank you for the feedback.  Best regards,

title: Brilliant place for a Holiday
review: This is my 4th visit to this resort, this time for 3 nights under the "Return to Paradise All Inclusive Package" booked from Marriot Website and my review as follows:  1) Location: JW Marriott is located at a secluded beachfront area (with long stretch of beach and sand) and is about 15 minutes drive away from Khao Lak Town. At the resort's entrance, there are local thai restaurant, massage/spa shop and minimarket while towards the left side of the resort's beachfront area, there are local thai food stalls, massage hut, laundry and transportation services (run by locals and not part of the resort). Hence, there is no need to even leave the resort. Overall, i thought the location was great and there's everything in the resort or within short walking distance.  2) Resort Outlook,…

title: I give 4 stars from 5
review: เอาไป 4ดาวจาก5ดาวและกัน I did more reservations cause this place is large and wonderful, breakfast is so variety, FB servicers very nice always greeted and smiled.  Except upon arrived, no one from concierge welcomed me and i didn't know where i can check in,where i can dropp my luggages, it's made me feel a bit upset but i still calmed so i had to wait around 30 min for get the room, it's ok. I walked around the hotel. Then when got the room,the room type was wrong and they  said, you have to wait for 30 minutes for change to the new room that made me feel totally upset. I had to complain even i didn't want to.... i hope they will improve it.

title: It just keeps getting better
review: Dear Rata T,  Thank you for sharing the feedback regarding the recent visit with us both great and the opportunity area at check in point. Please accept our sincerest apology for not having deliver a smooth arrival experience. We immediately call out the front desk and concierge team to discuss on an improvement action plan.  We all hoping that you have a good time in the resort and Khao Lak thus far. Should you require further assistance please do not hesitate to contact us.  Best regards, Mee

title: Wonderful resort in a beautiful location
review: Background I have stayed at the JW Marriott twice before and the first time was great.  The second stay was ok but I did notice that the place was ever so slightly tired.  I was a bit nervous about whether the Marriott would live up to previously set expectations.  Reservations The reservation team were great to deal with.  They were responsive (hence me asking them to forward this on to you), helped add another night to my stay, great at explaining the rate, inclusions and as I wanted to prepay they arranged this for me also with no fuss.  Check In Check in was welcoming and efficient as always and I was very fortunate to have been given an upgraded room which I thank you very much for.  Room Our room was immaculate, well maintained and lovely and cool to come into out of the…

title: Dream hotel
review: Dear LilMsGup,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  We sincerely appreciate your loyalty to our Marriott International and providing us with your valuable feedback relating to your recent stay as it is very helpful for the readers on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to know that you enjoyed several aspects of your stay with us since pre-arrival to the time you check-in 'til departure. As you might know, we have recently been awarded “Asia’s Top Beach Hotel” at the 2017 – 2018 as the best choice for getaway destination. We understand that many of our guests are staying with us for many days and has different needs and preferences, therefore, we provide a variety of facilities including choices of restaurants, pool, spa & Wellness Centre etc.. and a lot of activities on site and also outside excursions in case you feel a bit more adventurous!   It's always our pleasure to read that we deliver everything you wish for and especially, you will come back soon and this is really an honor for us. You can be sure that we will provide our consistently high quality service as always.   We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak

title: Amazing place to have a great vacation
review: So good, in fact, that we never left the resort during our 10 night stay! Absolutely everything about the resort - accommodation, staff, food, facilities was truly exceptional and made for an amazingly relaxing holiday. The only 'glitch' was a wedding party arriving and making a bit of noise for a few evenings at the pool bar - but the resort management happily offered us a much quieter room away from the noise and it actually turned out to be a more enjoyable environment. Walking the full distance around the lagoon pool (about 1.8km) was good exercise and helped work off the effects of three exceptionally good meals a day. We really loved the three restaurants - our favourite probably being the Thai one, but closely followed by both the Japanese and Italian/Mediterranean.…

title: Best service,resort and breakfast on the planet
review: My family and I travelled to the Marriott for the second time in April this year. The staff are all amazing and so friendly. They could never do enough for us even when we didn't ask. The chefs produced immaculate food every meal and I have never had a better breakfast in my life. Every restaurant was fine dining at its very best and we were never without fresh water and bread while we were waiting for our meals. The staff took the time to teach our kids some of the Thai language which they have brought home with them😊....The resort itself was beautiful and most certainly lived up to its 5 star rating. We will be going back again and again!! No complaints, nothing negative at all.... Thankyou to everyone at the JW MARRIOTT Khao Lak for yet another unforgettable experience.…

title: Absolutely loved it!
review: Dear Kate P,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !   On behalf of the team, I could not be more proud to read that everything was up to your expectations and you enjoyed our food both of breakfast and dinner as well as the service from our staffs as it is exactly what we aim to achieve on daily basis.   It was a pleasure for us to be at your service and see you leave us with a memorable experience.   We do look forward to welcoming you for another excellent stay in your next trip to Khao Lak.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Holiday Paradise
review: This was our second time in khao lak and we’re so glad we stayed at the JW Marriott!   We came with friends on a luxury escapes package (amazing value for families) so all our meals were included, transfer in an extremely comfortable van from the airport, massages and a pool access room. DO YOURSELF A FAVOUR AND GET A POOL ACCESS ROOM. We had room 3015 and it was in the perfect location right near the kids water slide and a pool bar.   The staff were all very friendly. Our room was clean and we always had enough water. The food was amazing! I have certain dietary needs and the staff always made sure they could cater for me. The buffet breakfast was incredible! The Italian restaurant Olive was superb and the singers they had as entertainment had such great voices!!  The other…

title: Five Star Luxury with exceptional Value in May
review: Dear DaniGill79,   Thank you very much for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor. It's always a pleasure to welcome you back to your home away from home !   We could not be happier to hear that you have received a warm welcome from our staff that always the first highlight of our resort that we go above and beyond in all areas to make our guests’ stay, a truly special one.   Your compliments on our beach, pool and spa are very much appreciated. As we are both adults- and family-friendly resort, so we offer a wide range of activities for everyone to enjoy even the little kids. Our professionally trained team are on hand to ensure the utmost safety and wellbeing for the kids at our kids club.   We apologize for the inconvenience that you’ve mentioned, and please rest assured that your comments has been addressed to the team in order to improve our services as we strive to provide nothing but exceptional experience   We hope to see you soon and look forward to making your next visit as pleasant as the recent one.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: A truly 5-star world-class hotel
review: We travel extensively through the Far East and this is our third visit to JWM and it was truly a wonderful holiday.  There is nowhere quite like it and for us, there is simply nothing to fault.  The check in was smooth and welcoming, our room was an oasis of calm, kept clean and with wonderful towel creations from Ket greeting us after a busy day sunbathing.  The food in all the restaurants was fantastic - breakfast with everything you could possibly want and a shout out for Pooh who kept everything ticking over efficiently at busy times at the Waterfront.   Also lovely to see Chef Enzo again working his magic at Olive - fabulous Italian food.    I had massages and facials in Quan Spa, all professionally done by the ladies there and the relaxing area afterwards was a treat. My…

title: Incredibile Resort to stay with your family. Unbelievable Italian restaurant too
review: We just came back from a 10 days stay at the Marriott and we found it amazing. Great rooms, really clean. Fantastic landscape and what is really the big plus of this hotel are the amazing canals that are going through the all resort. You can bath everywhere also with small kids which completely changes your experience because you don’t have to stay at the same place all the time. The beach is great too with bodysurfing possibilities too.  Then there is another amazing plus: the Italian restaurant. The chef Enzo does incredible specialities with a mix of local products for the seafood for example but also Fromm Australia for some vegetables and of course from Italy (fantastic burratta). Owning myself a restaurant I can promise that this restaurant called OLIVE is one of the best…

title: Great staff at the JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: Dear Green74,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your resort destination in Khao Lak and for taking the time to share your feedback on Trip Advisor.  We're pleased that you had such an amazing experience here and that you liked the rooms and enjoyed our South East Asia's longest lagoon pool (with a total of 1.9km in length meandering around the resort) Our resort is located directly on the beautiful long beach - lots of fun watersports and equipment available including stand-up paddle boarding, body boarding and kayaking.  Your compliments on the quality of the food and service at Olive restaurant have been shared with a special note to Chef Enzo. It is through reviews such as yours that motivate all of us to provide an even higher level of guest satisfaction moving forward.  We hope that you will have a chance to return to our little paradise in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Wow!!!!
review: Back for our 2nd visit and we were not disappointed. Our friend Laila Nussara who looked after us so well on our first visit, was in the Thai restaurant and also in the over 12 breakfast room, what a delightful young lady and an asset to the resort. We also used the gym activities each day and were expertly guided by Bau, Don and Bom - well done boys!  See you next time, Shauna & Marjory Turvey

title: Relaxing Holiday
review: Dear Shauna & Marjory Turvey,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for sharing your experience on your return visit to our paradise resort.   We could not be happier to learn that we not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations. It seems the service from our staff is the key highlight of your stay as they put their heart into making each experience of our guests’ outstanding and memorable.   We appreciate your sharing us the name of our staffs who had given you an unforgettable service including Laila at Thai restaurant, Bao, Don and Bom our fitness instructor at the gym. Please rest assured that I will personally share your wonderful review to them as I'm sure it will serve an encouragement and a great motivation us to do even better every single day.   We look forward to creating more special memories for your next visit.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team J W Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Back for the 8th year
review: We stayed at this resort on our final leg of touring around parts of southern Thailand.  I have to say this is the very best hotel we have ever stayed in.  It truly is a 5 star resort.  Excellent facilities,  beautiful Grounds, pool and beach, exceptional staff who go above and beyond to assist.   This place is paradise and will hopefully return.

title: Extraordinary Stay
review: My partner and I booked the JW for our third stay and for my birthday.  We love this resort and we love how relaxed and luxurious it is, but this time the hospitality and warmth surpassed our previous stays.  Our pool access room 3025 was superb, and it was no trouble to place us in the wing we requested, Wing 3.  My birthday day was amazing, from being sung "Happy Birthday" at breakfast by the staff and the guests, to our room being decorated with flowers and beautiful towel swans and scented oil and candles, and to top it off a chocolate birthday cake from the Marriott.  It made my birthday so very special, thank you :) . If possible, everything has just got even better - and nothing is too much trouble.  Special mention to Nart, our room maid, who kept our room spotless and…

title: This Resort and Spa is Unbelievable!
review: Dear CarolyniCat,  Thank you for your loyalty to us at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! It’s always a great pleasure to welcome returning guests back to our paradise!  We could not be happier to learn that you chose us to celebrate such a special occasion and may I say on behalf of the team once again ‘Happy Birthday’! We're delighted that you were able to take advantage of our pool access room where you could directly jump in South East Asia’s longest lagoon-shaped pool.  Thank you so much for your special recognition which I will personally make sure to share with our team members including our breakfast team, Nart, Palm, Money, Wat and Dong, to continue to inspire and motivate them to deliver exceptional service excellence.   We look forward to welcoming you again whenever your memories bring you back to Khao Lak.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Great hotel
review: The JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa was impressive on arrival with welcome drinks and cool towels, along with the beautiful very welcoming, Apple, who gave us a perfect introduction and explanation of our holiday package which we organised through Luxury Escapes. The surrounding gardens and pools were pristine and so beautifully maintained. All the staff we passed along the way to our room stopped what they were doing and welcomed us. This warm welcome was extended to us all throughout our stay every day. Our room was so perfect. Beautiful fittings, king size bed, balcony with a pool view. Luxury plus! Each day was a day in Paradise. A sumptuous buffet breakfast with so many choices and delicious fresh produce. We loved our lunches at the Deli. The staff were all so…

title: The best in Khao Lak
review: Dear cazzie9,  Thank you for taking the time to share the review during your recent stay with us.   We truly appreciate that your comments and are delighted that your stay was pleasant as we strive every day to provide each and every one of our guests a memorable experience. Please rest assured that your feedback and special recognition to Apple, Fern, Ree and Tunea will be shared with the rest of the team for motivation. We look forward to welcoming you back to our paradise resort for another perfect vacation getaway in Thailand.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Beautiful and luxurious... but a few issues
review: I can recommend this hotel! Stayed for 7 nights and I was satisfied. The only minus was that the beach restaurants could have been better, so we mostly ate at the hotel which had great food!  Clean rooms Lovely beach Tasty food Great service

title: Best escape!
review: If you want a resort that you don’t want to leave your whole visit, this is the place. We were there for 5 days and left only twice - once to see the city and the second to do a day trip.   The service and staff are amazing, rooms and venue simply bliss! They have many shops, bars and restaurants throughout the resort and even a market on Sunday nights.

title: Bliss! Family with 9 and 6 year olds
review: Dear Hendersonkelsey212  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodate during your trip to Khao Lak and sharing such a wonderful review here in Trip Advisor.  We couldn't be more proud to read that you had a great stay with us. We strive every day to provide memorable and genuine service. Your feedback is very important to us and it serves as our greatest motivation in providing even better experience for future stays. I've shared your review with the whole team and we sincerely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for another enjoyable stay.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Quick Stop
review: This is one of the best relaxing hotels in Thailand. We returned this year on a luxury escapes package for 8 nights. We asked for a front family room in wing 1 near the spa,the beach and restaurants. Ta-Krai Thai restaurant is of high quality, varied meals. Sunken lounges. Sakura is a fun teppanyaki restaurant, The chef Game is a lot of fun with his cooking tricks. Olive is Italian, the chef is bemusing as he fusses in Italian. We ate lunch in the sunken pool, Italian wood fired pizzas. The pool is a series of canals with a main pool overlooking the beach.the sunsets are amazing. There is a high and rather thrilling slippery dip for the kids in the kids pool. We brought flippers and a pool lounge for the kids to get around the canals. Lots of evening and early morning swims with…

title: We love this place
review: Dear MonicaAdelaide,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  Thank you for sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor. We strive to be your getaway paradise and we could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable experience with us. We appreciate your kind comments with regards to our dining options including the impressive array of breakfast offerings, the massive lagoon pool and stunning beach with perfect sunset views, and a variety of facilities and activities provided within our resort.   We hope that the memorable service you had with us will entice you to return to us in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Warm regards,  Kalaya Wu  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Tropical Paradise
review: Needed a quick brake and it was perfect. Probably more a family hotel but it was still just perfect. Conveniently located on the beach with one of the biggest pools in the country. The duplex suite was huge, loved the bathroom amenities, great sunset bar and really loved the Japanese restaurant. Probably one of the biggest breakfast buffets I’ve ever seen but then again when they full they have over 600 guests. Keith the GM is great, very visible which is not always the case in large resorts like this. Loved it and will be back.

title: Paradise
review: We were at JW 4 years ago and I’m glad to say that this hotel is still the best we’ve ever stayed at. With TUI the flight is always in early so rooms may not be available till 3, on arrival Money checked us in quickly and cold towels and a drink was very welcoming.  Our room was not ready but she gave us a voucher to go and have some breakfast then return to reception to check on our room.  On return our room was ready early and we were whisked off to our room so thanks Money for your help. ROOM - we had a premium room and it was absolutely lovely, as this was our second visit there was a lovely welcome back decoration on the bed a lovely touch, it was also our anniversary and the hotel gave us a lovely cake it was a nice touch. Thanks to ‘Ta’ who kept our room spotless.…

title: It does not get any better
review: Dear Pacersam,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share the review on TripAdvisor.  It's always a pleasure to welcome back our returning guests! We understand that you may be tired after a long flight, and that's why we always try our best to accommodate early check-ins whenever possible. We're delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time and enjoyed the facilities and services offered, especially our spacious room, extensive breakfast offerings, our massive pool and our lush tropical resort grounds. We strive everyday to offer exceptional services to our guests to provide a "home away from home" experience.   Most importantly, I will personally share your compliments to our members you've mentioned: Money, Ta and H, who will be thrilled to receive such recognition. It is the feedback such as yours that keeps us motivated and drives us to do even better every single day.   We look forward to creating more special memories for your next visit.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Pool to hot
review: This is our second visit, and frankly I’d never stay anywhere else when visiting the region. We traveled with three generations of our family and everything is accommodated for regardless of age or ability of our group. Food is excellent, staff are excellent and nothing is too much trouble.

title: The Best Hotel That I Ever Stayed
review: Dear Glen M,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking your time to review and choosing to stay with us during your stay-cation with your family here.  We're glad to know that your second stay here was excellent and enjoyable. All our guest's satisfaction and comfort is very important to us. I have shared your feedback with the team to ensure we motivate them to strive for excellent customer service every day.  Looking forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Beautiful luxury family resort
review: Great hotel for vacation.   Pool is too hot to swim in. Not refreshing refreshing.  Staff try hard to make guests happy.  Sakura restaurant is good.  New kids club activities are disappointing in that kids tennis has been removed.

title: Excellent - but could be perfect, wonderful family vacation
review: I have travelled with my young family many times to Thailand and Khao Lak, and had always wanted to try the Marriot due to positive reviews from friends. I booked a 10 night stay some 11 months before our planned vacation, and paid the higher fee for the larger family specific pool access room. Unfortunately, upon arrival, we learned that our room was not available and that we could only be accommodated in a smaller room. As the trip was planned around my wife’s birthday she was absolutely furious and asked me to consider leaving the hotel and finding alternative accommodation, however due to the Easter period, Khao Lak was essentially fully booked. Once allocated a room, I returned to the reception and asked to speak to a manager, and was met by Manee Sreekam. Manee took the…

title: Paradise
review: Dear Adrian S,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodation in Khao Lak and taking the time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   Please accept our sincere apologies for some inconvenience you have experienced, but we are delighted that the situation was resolved promptly and efficiently by Manee who is a true shining example of our passion to deliver exceptional guest experience. We could not be happier to learn that you had a wonderful time during your stay and will be coming back to visit us again in the future.   Our resort’s key highlights are the massive lagoon pool which is the largest in South East Asia, our impressive variety of breakfast offerings and our stunning sandy beachfront with breathtaking and peaceful sunset views – and I’m glad that your family had enjoyed these features. Once again, we wish your wife a belated Happy Birthday!  We appreciate your kind compliments and please rest assured that we have shared your comments to the management team, including the staff mentioned, and we all couldn’t be more proud of our team. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Please let us know when life takes you back to the beautiful Khao Lak.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Fabulous
review: We had 2 swim up rooms opposite the pool bar staff are outstanding couldn’t be more helpful prices in the hotel are high compared to local restaurants we went to all of the hotel restaurants and all of the beach restaurants hotel is about 4 times the price and I think that the hotel suffers because of the price difference but you can understand the prices because of the imports quality of food drink and staff this was our first visit to Thailand and we will definitely be back thank you for an amazing holiday

title: Amazing Hotel!!
review: Dear Janey438,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Khao Lak.  We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience with our pool access room which is the highlight of our resort offering a private direct access into South East Asia’s longest lagoon pool.  With regards to our food & drinks prices, thank you for your kind understanding as we are using high-quality produce and ingredients from certified suppliers to ensure the highest standards of our offerings. It is, however, wonderful to hear that we could expect your return in the future! We truly hope to see you again soon.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Fantastic family holiday at this excellent hotel.
review: Absolutely amazing holiday here in Khao Lak. The hotel is beautiful.
