The staff are very welcoming especially Money and Tin who provided exceptional customer service to myself throughout my 2 week stay.  I was unwell with travel sick on arrival at the hotel. To be told at 7 am on arrival that I couldn’t check into my room until 3pm was unacceptable after a long flight from the UK.  But Money on reception quickly found a spare room and let us check in, as she could see I was unwell.  Another excellent display of the customer service at this hotel was displayed by Tin at 3am in the morning when TUI hadn’t arranged our transport to the airport.  Tin quickly made calls to the rep and help provide assistance to myself and my family in arranging a transfer.  Well done Tin, you are…

title: Best resort in south east Asia
review: We have stayed at JW Marriott 2016 & back again this year as we have very found memories Longest swimming pool, excellent restaurants, most efficient & friendly staff.  Spa experience was amazing! Private beach is magnificent & Thai new year celebration was exceptional.  My 11 years old is in love with this place & sad to leave after 8 nights stay! We will be coming back for sure

title: This hotel is a dream!
review: Dear Anahita R,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your accommodation and leaving such a great review on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to hear that you joined us for New Year's celebration and that we were able to provide you with a memorable experience time and time again! It’s always wonderful to welcome our returning guests back to this paradise!  Additionally, we truly appreciate your compliments regarding our pool, restaurants, spa, and our level of services provided by our team of highly professional staff. Our goal is to always create memorable experiences with a personal touch of luxury!  We certainly hope to welcome you and your family back soon for another rewarding experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: I would give this 10 stars if I could
review: Wow, just wow!  We just got back from spending 14 nights in this little paradise and it was simply perfect!  We are a family of 4 with 2 young children. We loved the family facilities such as the kids pool and kids club. We also loved spending time as a family at the Aquamarine pool bar (the daily happy hour is great!)  Thanks to the kids club, my husband and I enjoyed some quality time together (at the Spa or the adult only swimming pool) The design of the hotel with the super long swimming pool, means that it never feels crowded - we found ourselves alone in some of the swimming pools several times. We also loved that loungers are spread across the resort meaning you can always find some privacy instead of being on top of each other. The food and spa packages are good value…

title: Well worth visiting
review: Dear Valued guest,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for your amazing review on TripAdvisor, following your 14 nights stay at our little paradise.   We are delighted that you and your family were able to enjoy the resort's many facilities and services including our kids club, pool bars, a wellness spa, restaurants and our highlight – South East Asia’s longest swimming pool that wraps around the entire resort surrounded by lush greenery !  It's always a pleasure to know that your stay was relaxing and enjoyable. We work really hard each and every day to make sure we went above and beyond our guests' expectations. Feedback such as yours always motivates and inspires us to continue to maintain and improve our excellent service standards.  Most importantly, thank you for mentioning Gift & Pokey (Aquamarine) Poo (Infinity Bar) Poo (room service) Pim (front desk) Enzo (Olive) Nong (Spa) and the whole team at kids club - I will personally thank them for the attentive service that they provided. On behalf of our entire team members, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back another time in near future.  Have a pleasant day!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Perfect in every way
review: Like many of the other reviewers I did not want to leave! What a beautiful resort - the pools and long, long lazy river are stunning and the beach is absolute beast - well over 15km long and unspoilt with no rubbish or stinky seaweed to ruin the view.  Although we are not gym people whilst on holiday we loved the free yoga and stretching sessions, plus there’s bikes, SUP and kayaks available for free for guests.  Just outside the hotel are some great beach bars where you can get cheap local food with your toes still in the sand, and a very reasonable Thai massage whilst listening to the sound of the waves. The town is a short shuttle ride away for other bits and pieces that you might need if you find the hotel shops a bit pricey.  What was a really touch for couples on a…

title: You won’t want to leave !
review: I stayed here for 3 nights, with my brother in law who’s a platinum member. It was such an awesome place to stay. We got a duplex, with 2 separate bathrooms. One had a massive bathtub. The amenities were well thought (sewing kit, dental kit, shave kit, soap etc etc...) and of good quality. There was also a beach bag to borrow and an umbrella. The room was really clean, and that’s something I’m quite fussy about. The swimming pool is amazing and they lend you towels if needed. The pool is so big, you won’t feel it’s overcrowded. The private beach looks like a scene from a movie :)  There’s a mini supermarket, a kids’ room, a play room, plenty of public toilets...you can eat inside the resort but there are a few cheaper restaurants next to it, where the food is also amazing.  The…

title: Blew us away
review: Dear Ellen R,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  We sincerely appreciate your loyalty towards Marriott and thank you for choosing us as your accommodation and for the review.   We are delighted to learn that you had an amazing experience and you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay including the rooms, the pool and the beach. The breakfast restaurant is always the main highlights of our resort where we offer a wide selection of high quality food to kick start your adventure in Khao Lak.  It is through reviews such as yours that inspire all of us to continue to exceed our guests' expectations. The team and I look forward to welcoming you back to our little paradise very soon!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Dream destination
review: Stayed for a week in January. We do not usually stay in large resorts like this one, and to be honest I was expecting it to be the least favourite hotel of our 3 week holiday around SE Asia, but it turned out to be my favourite. This is an excellent family hotel, offering all you need to have a good family hotel without leaving the site (although you would miss out on the locale if you did just stay on site). As other reviewers have said, prices are high within the resort for eg. food & drink, spa etc. But there are good quality, cheap local restaurants on the beach just outside, and the hotel is not snobby about you making use of these (we would often get takeaway lunch from one of these and bring it back into the hotel to eat on our terrace whilst our toddler was napping). You…

title: Fabulous resort!
review: Dear LizzieG,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing our resort for your recent stay in Khao Lak, Thailand.  We greatly appreciate your effort in giving us the honour of being one of your favourite resorts in SE Asia. We are so glad to learn that our facilities and services both make your holiday exceptional. It is always our highest priority to ensure that guests leave with nothing but memorable experience and hopefully, will think of us as your second home (and we sure hope you’ll be returning again!).  Our resort is both adults- and family-friendly and we provide a wide variety of activities, facilities and services to suite everyone’s taste. Our Recreation Club offers several activities whether it be health and fitness, cultural learning, kids activities, arts and crafts, sports and entertainment and most of the activities are complimentary while others may have minimal fee. We do organize morning/ evening classes, depending on the timing, or group classes could also be arranged. Our newest activity is the Running Project where we organize a small group run to experience the scenic Khao Lak! The upcoming one is the jungle run, which will be organized on April 28!   Please rest assured that your feedback are shared among the team and your compliments are truly words of encouragement for all our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services.  We hope that your memorable time here will entice you to return to us in the future so that we will be able to offer you an even better experience!   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Hotel in Paradise
review: I cannot rate this hotel highly enough. We're staying here as a family with two kids. The staff cannot do enough for us and have made the whole experience even more enjoyable. The rooms are spacious, modern and beautifully decorated. The pool is amazing and restaurants a gastronomical treat. Once you've experienced luxury like this you'll never want to leave.

title: Fantastic Hotel absolutely Amazing
review: Stay here for 10 nights ( wish it could have been 10 weeks). This is one of the nicest hotels we have ever stayed in . The Staff  are Always Smiling  Beach & Pools are never crowded. Rooms are spacious & Spotless. Restaurants food is superb.  The whole experience is Top class cant fault anything.  Thank so much for total enjoyable holiday Experience   This is a amazing hotel total luxury

title: Stunning Hotel
review: Dear Rob H,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for taking your time to share your feedback with others on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service and you enjoyed every aspect of your stay.   We very much appreciate your kind comments – I have passed on your notes to the entire team. They are extremely proud to have made your stay wonderful.   We look forward to your next visit and hope we are once again your choice of destination in Khao Lak, Thailand.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Stunning Location by the beach
review: My wife and I stayed at the resort for 14 days at the end of March 2018. From the moment we arrived the service was excellent. Nothing was too much trouble from any member of staff we spoke to.  The food was excellent in every restaurant and room service was just as good with all our meals arriving within half an hour of order.  We stayed in a swim up room which was superb and was cleaned daily to a very high standard normally before 10 o clock in the morning if we had left for breakfast.  Plenty of sunbeds and towel stations all around the resort so we could just move around from the beach to the pool or back to the room with clean fresh towels where ever we went.  All in all a fantastic holiday and a hotel I will definitely return to over the next year or two.

title: Lovely resort but very bad service
review: Dear jasonwB8773EP,  Thank you for taking your time to share such an excellent review following your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   It was a great pleasure to read that you were satisfied with the guestroom, our hospitality and services provided by our team. We aim to always provide all valued guests a warm welcome and exceptional service from the moment you check in ‘til your departure.   We're pleased that you enjoyed our dining experiences and quality offerings we provided. Our chefs work hard to ensure that the freshest ingredients are used and every dish tastes perfectly.  We certainly look forward to welcoming you back and please contact us before your next visit here.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Lovely resort for families
review: Great location by the beach. Stayed in a duplex suite which felt like a small apartment towering over the swimming- pool . Family friendly place but also quiet- we stayed here in April so I guess it is also more quiet than during summer holidays too. Amazing breakfast variety and quality of food - they even provide gluten free pancakes ! I am lactose intolerant and the staff was extremely kind and friendly as I was served a soya milk cappuccino upon request. The whole hotel resort feels like a small village with a massive swimming pool and other amenities. In the underground level below the entrance lobby you can find a small shop as well as a games room too. Piña coladas are also amazingly good ☺️( compared to other places I have been to). There is a good selection of…

title: Just divine
review: We had a lovely 8 night stay at the JW in March.   Lovely spacious rooms with a nice balcony.   Breakfast is amazing - great choice and something for everyone.   We visited the Thai and Italian restaurant - both were nice but a little pricey.  You can get the same quality of food in Khao Lak town, so worth a journey on the shuttle bus (100 bhat each way)  The spa is lovely and we booked the package (9000 bhat for 5 x 60 minute treatments) which is excellent value for money,the therapists are really professional and setting of the spa is so relaxing.     The beach area is well kept, really clean with good availability of loungers.   We would like to call out Bo and May at the spa and Eye at the beach bar as delivering outstanding service.   All are a real credit to the hotel.   I…

title: Back for the fifth time
review: Dear MissVip,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   We could not be happier to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations and that you enjoyed our restaurants, spa, beach and our beach bar. Especially, you found our staff Eye at the beach bar, and Bo and May at the spa who delivered an unforgettable experience while staying with us.   For your next visit, allow me to recommend you to try our newest beachfront Outdoor Spa Cabana where you can enjoy the scenic views of the beach, gentle sea breeze and the sounds of ocean waves during our treatments – it’s a real treat and the ultimate relaxation!   We look forward to welcoming you again to our paradise resort in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Excellent location
review: Why do we go back? We love to see new places, but... something is pulling us back. The (outside) people we might call friends, although we just meet them a couple of weeks every year, the landscape, the flowers, the breakfast at Marriott and the nicely shaped and above all so long swimmingpool... the lovely house keeping ladies. First the Marriott: we love the hotel and I especially like the garden. I see at tripadviser some people complaining at worn out pieces of furniture and other things. In a climate like that in Thailand nothing will last forever. And certainly not in a hotel with many guests.    We like our (different) pool rooms very much and prefer those in wing 1 or 2 with tiny gardens. The air condition at night was quite silent which is a bliss, the cushions were of…

title: welcome back
review: Dear kpvisionshuset,  Thank you very much for your loyalty and for taking your precious time to share such an amazing review following your recent stay with us. It’s always wonderful to welcome our returning guests!  We are delighted that your stay was wonderful and enjoyable. Our resort is surrounded by the meandering lagoon pool that connects the entire resort and lush tropical settings spread over the massive resort grounds. Our pool access rooms in Building 1 and 2 offer a private small garden with a balcony and a walk way down - just a few steps walk where you can jump right into the pool! Our breakfast is always a highlight enjoyed by many of our guests as well offer an extensive selections from local, regional and international cuisines to suit your tastes while providing healthy options to power up your day!  It seems that you are familiar with Khao Lak neighborhood and were able to take advantage of the bike rental at our Recreation Club and enjoyed exploring nearby attractions. Our nearby markets, Build Factory and Bang Niang Markets, are highly recommended if you’d like to try out the famous Thai street food, or souvenirs and beachwear shopping.   Last but not least, It's always a great motivation for our team to know that guests enjoyed the service and facilities our resort has offered. We have passed your personal recognition to our staff to concerned team and they couldn’t be more thrilled.   Please let us know if there’s anything we could do to make your next stay even better. We can’t wait to welcome you back to our paradise in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Very nice but will cost you.
review: An exclusive resort just north of Khao Lak, located directly on the beach. The resort is built around various canals working as vast swimming pools. Some rooms have direct pool access. The hotel offers special adult only areas, much appreciated when not travelling with small kids anymore. Staff overall very friendly and polite, always willing to be of assistance.

title: Faultless
review: We stayed at this hotel to celebrate my wife’s 50th birthday and from start to finish it was faultless, the food the room the resort and most importantly the staff. Everything was fantastic. We had a minor issue with the water to our room for one night and it was sorted immediately and a to say sorry we got a complimentary bottle of wine and a meal in the Italian restaurant great service. We purcahsed a spa package which was excellent as was the romantic meal on the beach, eating exquisite food watching the sun set what more could you ask for. The breakfast was lovely all be it a bit busy but never had a issue. We stayed in pool access rooms in block 3, absolutely lovely and the pool itself WOW.  Thank you all at the JW.

title: Services down ... down
review: Dear RichieSw,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing to stay with us to celebrate such a special occasion and we truly appreciate you taking your time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.   We are delighted to learn that you had an amazing experience and that you have thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay. We are sorry for the inconvenience but glad that the issue was resolved immediately and effectively. It is always encouraging to learn that you are satisfied with our services including our food, spa and romantic dinner on the beach as it is what we strive for every day. Our pool access rooms are the highlight of the resort as you can jump right into the meandering lagoon pool which is 1.93km long!   Thank you once again for your wonderful 5 star rating. We look forward to welcoming you in the future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Beware the check in 😡
review: It was our second stay in this hôtel. The resort and surrounding remain nice but since our last stay (last year) we have notice that unfortunately services are going down. 1- We have booked our room couple of months before and asked for having the same room (or same floor). This was not at all took in count. 2- check-in done by Kevin: he looks confused and completely lost in the resort when he escorted us to our room. He even did not mentioned we got an upgrade to a room with pool access (type of room that we personaly don't like) so we moved to another room directly. 3 - rooms are getting outdated with a lot of scratches on the furniture and stone in the bathroom takes another distrubing coulour with moisture, .. 4- Room was not clean at all, dust and spider web everywhere. We…

title: Perfect for a relaxing vacation
review: Dear Niko690,  Thank you for sharing your feedback of the recent stay. I regret to learn of your inconvenience during the stay. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the service shortfalls from the check in, room and the overall service was under the impression compared to your previous visit. I clearly understand your disappointment and frustration towards the situation. We have called out the department leaders and senior management team to discuss the issue in detail and long term resolution. We hoping to restore your confidence in the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa.once again. If I can be of your further assistance please do not hesitate let me know at your convenience.  Sincerely,  Mee Room Division Manager  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa

title: Beachside comfort
review: What is the point of TUI flying you in at stupid o clock, hurtling you in a taxi to the hotel , you arrive at seven am, you then have to wait until three pm in the afternoon to check in !   What did we get by way of some relief? , a breakfast that we had already paid for, because on the last day we would leave so early in the morning that we could not have had breakfast anyway.  Not entirely the fault if the hotel, but from what I can deduce this is a common occurrence so operator and hotel need to get on same page

title: Superb hotel in great location
review: This hotel is located on the best beach in Khao lak. Really quiet and nice beach with crystal blue waters. The breakfast is great and typical JW standard. The staff is really helpfull and friendly. Hotel has amazing pools around the whole resort so you can swim an hours. The hotel is bit old and tired but really good maintained. We will definitely come back!👍

title: One of our best vacation ever!
review: Dear martin85883,  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your recent visit to Thailand.   I must say that I agree that our resort is located on the one of the most stunning beaches in Khao Lak, with its serene and peaceful surrounding coastline, making ut the perfect spot for relaxation and rejuvenation. We're pleased to read that you enjoyed our pool (which is the longest pool in South East Asia) and the international breakfast buffet, as well as our friendly staff. It is our main priority to ensure that guests leave with nothing but a memorable experience.  We hope to welcome you back for your next visit to Khao Lak in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Excellent Once Again
review: There are so many positive points with this resort. First is the lobby, I must say JW Marriott hotel lobby never disappoints. Then the room where you have direct access to the pool. Definitely a big deal especially with my daughter who loves the water! The room is a very good size. We’re a group of 3 adults plus 1 toddler and we don’t feel squishy at all. The bathroom is so spacious with a huge tub. Did I mention they’re using Aromatherapy Associates as their toiletries? Yes, all that heavenly scents from shampoo to shower gel to bath salt!  The resorts ground is so nicely done and very well maintained. I’ve never seen so lush plants and trees. I think it’s great that they have separate area just for adults. I mean I have a kid and if I don’t have I would want to have a peaceful…

title: Just a beautiful resort with magnificent people
review: Dear Anaguerralow,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your accommodation in Khao Lak and for sharing the review on TripAdvisor.   We are delighted that we were able to impress you with our warm hospitality. I must say that it is our pleasure to be at your service and that all of us are excited to learn how much you enjoyed your experience here. Our pool access rooms are truly the highlight of our resort where you could easily jump into the pool from your private balcony.   As for the resorts ground, we work very hard to ensure all our areas are well maintained for our guests. Indeed, our longest pool, our breakfast selection, our sandy long stretch of the beachfront area and our exceptional service make JW Marriott Khao Lak an ultimate tropical paradise.   We look forward to welcoming you again and please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Amazing hotel⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
review: We had such a wonderful time last year, we decided to stay longer this year.  We were warmly back by reception, special thanks goes to Gift, Nee and Am .  Our swim out room was once again a great choice allowing for endless swimming direct into the well maintained pool.  Thanks to our hard working and very efficient room attendants, Wee, Boom and An.  The Spa is extrordinary, with such a beautiful setting and amazingly therapists.  Thanks Beer at reception , and our very attentive therapists, Ya, Fern an Duane.  ( book a massage to revive from a long flight)                                        . The food  here is amazing, breakfasts are so extensive and tasty from all corners of the world. The waterfront has a team of very friendly, efficient service staff. Some of whom…

title: My wedding and week stay
review: So after looking at a few resorts in the Khao Lak region, my (now) wife and I settled on JW Marriot Khao Lak. We are both so glad we did. Service was fabulous. Staff at all very helpful.   Our event coordinator put on an absolutely stellar wedding.  So much detail -, video calls and instant messaging months before to get ideas of what style event we were wanting. The wedding was so out of this world that every one of our guests (it was a small wedding) had only good things to say.  Huge thankyou to the entire JW Marriot Team for a truly special event.  Even little things like keeping my 1 year old niece occupied while speeches were going on.  Not something I would have though of but the team were there quietly keeping the small ones occupied.  We were not in any way nervous…

title: The JW never disappoints - beautiful, relaxing time and great service, again!
review: Dear ColinHyde,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Congratulations on your wedding and thank you so much for choosing our resort for your very special occasion. We understand this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and that’s why our team work extremely hard to make sure that we completely fulfilled your wedding dream. We couldn't be happier to receive such a wonderful feedback from you and that your guests enjoyed the event time spent here.   Our property is situated on a spectacular Khuk Khak beach that stretches for miles, only 15 minute drive from Khao Lak city center. There are plenty of nearby attractions within easy reach and we are also close to Thailand's largest virgin forests (Khao Sok National Park). Additionally, our resort also offers a variety of activities for all guests, whether it be health & fitness, arts & crafts, cultural learning, sports & entertainment, CSR activities or nearby unseen bike tours. So you can be sure to never be bored when staying with us!  We’d like to wish you and your wife all the best from all ofn us at JW Marriott Khao Lak. We look forward to welcoming you again on your future anniversary.!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: One of the best resorts I have been to
review: We've stayed at several JW's throughout the world, and this one is like all of the others - just wonderful.  The staff are so attentive, friendly, helpful, courteous, and welcoming.  The grounds were gorgeous.  The food was good enough (as far as resort food goes), and that includes the a la carte restaurants and the buffet.  The pool was amazing - absolutely huge!  It did surprise me a little bit that there was no real shallow/lounging end to the "main" part of the pool - it was either 6 inches deep, or 4.5 ft deep -- nothing in-between.  Not a huge deal for a grown adult, but it wasn't as easy to just stand/wade/lounge around the pool in a socializing way (that a 3 ft end pool would more easily allow).  They even had the olympics projected on wide-screen to watch from the…

title: Yet another time at the Marriott!
review: Dear Winchela,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! It is always a pleasure to welcome our Marriott guests!  We appreciate you taking your time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor. It seems like the friendliness and service of our staffs is the main highlights of your stay with us. We take pride in our service, and always put a personal touch to everything we do for our guests to ensure that you have a memorable stay with us. We have shared your kind comments to our staffs, and they could not be more pleased.  Our resort is located about one hour away from the airport, and since we are quite a distance away from all the clustered hotels and resorts, JW Marriott Khao Lak is a perfect serene getaway and a true tropical paradise. There are also several activities offered to kids, teens, adults, couples and families, ranging from health & fitness, sports and recreation, arts & crafts, cultural learning and short tours to nearby unseen local attractions - most of which are on complimentary basis. This means there'll never be a dull moment in our resort!  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future. Please let us know if we could do anything to make your next stay even better.  Warm regards, Kalaya Wu Management JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa +6676.584.888

title: The perfect hotel on a fantaastic tropical beach
review: Traveled here to attend a wedding and I can see why they choose this resort. The location is great and being in Khao Lak means you are well away from the overcrowded tourist spot that is Phuket, about 1.5 hours from the airport. The resort is a bit outside of Khao Lak itself but a 600 Baht for a return trip gets you into town.  The plus is that you don't get hassled on the beach allowing you time to relax. We had pool access room which is worth the money as you can swim around the resort. There are rooms that have a gate or glass door to prevent kids from falling in the water which I would advise you request if traveling with kids. The resort itself is very child friendly but they do have areas for those not wishing to be bothered by rugrats. I would recommend getting breakfast…

title: A piece of paradise.
review: As a party of five adults with different likes and dislikes, we were amazed to find something for everyone here. It's the most beautiful setting with 1.9 kms of pools and watery laneways. The spa is fabulous, and the food in each of the restaurants is superb. Breakfast, included in our tariff, was sumptuous and there were plenty of healthy options.  To top it off I didn't see anything but smiling faces from the staff - from the gardeners and housekeeping staff to the head chef. Our experience was positive from the time we checked in with the efficient and friendly staff to our departure where we were made to feel as though everyone was sad to see us go.   We each had pool-side villas. Beautifully appointed, large and comfortable rooms opening onto a watery laneway - the easiest…

title: Not as expected
review: Dear MamaBearOz,  Thank you very much for staying with us and taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that you have received a warm welcome and that we have made your stay memorable. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our resort surroundings, our massive lagoon pool, the beachfront, our pool access rooms and our award-wining spa. We strive everyday to provide all the necessities to be your home away from home with a touch of luxurious service. We also offer a wide variety of activities just to make sure everyone can enjoy their time here!  It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Warm regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Amazing hotel
review: The grounds are beautiful but inside our room we had a huge cockroach and while walking inside the corridor towards our room, there was a snake hanging by the ceiling. Scared the heck out of me! We called front desk regarding the cockroach after we killed it, they sent an attendant who just nonchalantly picked it up. I couldn't sleep that night. As for the snake, we told the front desk, not sure if they ever caught it. I wanted to cover all air vents and not use the toilet for fear it might end up there!! Laid awake all night and checked out the next morning.

title: Even Better than Earlier Visits
review: Dear 142nenette,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.   I am very sorry to hear about the insect issue in your room. we do have a comprehensive pest control program in place. In such unusual occurence, we recommend a room move in order for us to perform additional treatment. We do sincerely apologize if this was not offered or understood.   In regards to the snake in the corridor, as the hotel sits in 80,000 Sqm of lush tropical gardens we do have occasionally non-venomous green snakes wandering and once reported our security is called to catch the animal and relocate it in the neigbouring national park.   We do apologize for the unwanted emotions on this occasion and we thank you for reporting the issue to the front desk.   Our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences caused to you and if there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.   We very much hope to welcome you back whenever your travel brings you back to Khao lak.   Sincerely,   Luca Forges Davanzati  Resident Manager  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Well it starts a bit bumpy
review: Absolutely beautiful hotel and surroundings. Very friendly and helpful staff, always had a smile and could not do enough for you. Spotlessly clean. Only thing I would say it’s a shame that the foods was so expensive we had bed and breakfast and the food was amazing but eat at other places out of hotel which was a shame but a lot cheaper

title: Good
review: Hotel is looking a little tired. Our room 4017 has leaking wonky tap , they’ve tried to bodge with silicone. Tatty wood furniture and dodgy light in wardrobe , I got an electric shock when I advised reception lamp was replaced and wiring tidied within 30 mins. Our ceiling fan wasn’t working again within 30 mins fixed. These things should have been checked before letting room the guest should not have to discover them. Lots of family groups which can at times become irritating we didn’t think when booking assuming a five star hotel would lower the child count. room service excellent room servicing excellent more towels than you could point a stick at bed change nearly every day. Food very good in all restaurants , breakfast choice largest I’ve ever seen. Beaches sandy and clean.…

title: Not up to expectations
review: My comments are based on this being a 5* resort and having stayed in many over the last few yrs all over Asia . First the rooms were a bit shabby ,the 1st 5* I have stayed in with no fresh fruit each day the room was tiered each day but not cleaned . Beds were good and plenty of towels and toiletries but things like the night light was not lit coffee percolator was not washed and replenished , in a 5* resort you shouldn’t have to complain this should be standard. The staff all seemed very impersonal and for the first time left me not wanting to give tips !! I think the worst thing was on Buddha day no alcohol was served which is totally acceptable but there was a wedding and people were drinking all day ! We were all in a private sensory so either comply by the rules or not.…

title: Just perfect!
review: Dear stuartjohnh2017,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum. We regret to hear that you did not have positive experience with us; we have well noted the housekeeping issues you have mentioned for our action and improvement.   Our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences caused to you during your stay over the weekend as there was indeed a large wedding  in-house that featured a number of events.  If there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.     We very much hope to welcome you back in the near future at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Fabulous beach resort
review: I couldn't hope anything more for perfect relaxing holiday. Hotel is extremely clean, staff is very polite, breakfast is awesome, hotel outdoor and pools are clean and cared well, and beach is beautiful, clean and peaceful. This was our third time in hotel and next year we will visit again!

title: Paradise on earth!
review: Dear 19emh71,  Thank you for your continued support and also for taking your precious time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased to know that your overall stay with us was enjoyable and our location, facilities and services exceeded your expectations for a spectacular stay.   We look forward to welcoming you back for more pleasant stays in next year!  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Family beach holiday above expectations
review: 2 adults and 2 kids (4 & 11 yrs) stayed this wonderful beach resort for 10 Nights. We have travelled A lot But need to say this place was one of the best beach resort I have visited. Beach is beautiful and silent and clean. Hotel pools are amazing - you find the largest pool you have probably ever seen. Variety of activities (all kind of sport) were amazing. Enjoyed a lot of them. Kids club was also fine. Breakfast was really good one and you find everything from there. I recommend to take half board - we were satisfied with that for 7 days we had it. People working there were so friendly and also service oriented. Only little minus are the rooms, which are a bit old already and need to refurnished. Though we will come back here and enjoy some other beach holiday here as well.…

title: Love the place
review: Dear Andyfinland,  Thank you for taking your time sharing your recent experience with other travelers on TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your compliments regarding our beach and pool. As you might know, we have recently been awarded “Asia’s Top Beach Hotel” and are the global winners of Luxury Beach Retreat and Luxury Private Beach Resort. Our pool is also one of the longest pool in Asia. We offer a wide range of activities for kids, teen, adults and families whether it be at our Kids Club, Recreation Club, or Water Sports activities, so you’ll never have a dull moments in our resort!    Thank you for recommending our half board package which certainly offers the best value for money, by offering guests delicious meals at our signature restaurants on site. The entire team work hard every day to ensure that we deliver services that exceed expectations and I have passed this on to our team as words of encouragement and motivation as we strive to be better every single day.   We hope to have a chance to welcome you back in the near future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Still in love with this place
review: Second time in this hotel and will return. Staff is lovely, food is great, the lagoon is huge and rooms with pool access are terrific ! It’s far from Phuket : 1 hour and 30 minutes to and from the airport and it makes a difference to me : it’s a lot better than close to the city. So : staff - check, food - check, pool - check, room with pool access - check ! One thing though : it’s getting older and it’s noticeable, they are reviews saying that they need it and giving them one star. Honestly I don’t think it’s fair giving them such a bad review but I might one day if they don’t stop painting and painting and painting again and start thinking about a due over...

title: The Best Family Resort
review: Dear LouisandCo,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful second visit to our paradise resort at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort &Spa.  It was a pleasure to have you as our guests and also to read your positive feedback. We always work hard to ensure that you feel like home away from home during your entire holiday in Khao Lak. Rest assured that we will share your kind comments to the team as it helps us to improve as we move towards perfecting ourselves in service and value.  We hope to welcome you back in the future.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Love this hotel
review: We spent three weeks in February for the fourth time. We keep returning despite the fact we have a principle never go back to the same place. We simply cannot imagine our life without this hotel and certainly we developed a very special relationship with most of the staff.   I don’t want to repeat the details other TA members have already listed, every review reflects reality, no sponsored content.   This hotel is not a tourist factory, you can feel pampered and taken care throughout your stay. For families and beach lovers it’s a magical place for taking long strolls and swimming in the shallow sea.  We’re currently staying in a different hotel for a few days and we cannot get the staff from JW Mariott Khao Lak out of our mind. What also interests me, how come the staff gives a…

title: Superb in every aspect
review: This is a large hotel but it is so well designed and laid out that it never feels busy. Excellent staff. Excellent grounds - a large team are out every morning sweeping up leaves, cleaning the pool, tending to the gardens. The main pool is lovely and the pool that circles the rooms is a unique treat. The beach is superb, very clean and expansive. The restaurants are excellent (albeit prices are 5-star prices, particularly the wine). We ate at the Italian twice, both excellent and had the buffet at the Japanese which was out of this world. Sports facilities and activities are excellent (and mainly free). We did yoga and tai chi on the beech and used the air conditioned gym. There are bicycles available. The hotel operates a shuttle bus into Khao Lak at 100 baht per person each…

title: Top class for families
review: Dear Phil-the-badger,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you very much for taking the time to write your wonderful review and rating us a five star.   It is with pleasure to learn that you have had a truly relaxing vacation at our paradise resort. I highly appreciate your kind compliments regarding, our excellent staff service, unique pool, charming beach, comfortable rooms and delectable cuisine experience at Olive and Japanese restaurants, as well as a wide selection of sport activities and breakfast buffet offerings. The entire team strive everyday to ensure that guests leave with memorable experience.   Additionally, thank you for sharing the information regarding our shuttle bus service, which runs from 11.00am - 9.00pm, departing every 2 hours with a minimal fee. Our nearby markets, Build Factory and Bang Niang Markets, are highly recommended if you’d like to try out the famous Thai street food,  or souvenirs and beachwear shopping.   We certainly hope to welcome you back soon for another beautiful holiday in Khao Lak.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: High quality resort
review: We stayed here with our 2 children (8 and 10) in a pool access room and absolutely loved the place. Superb service, everything is spotlessly kept after and the breakfast buffet is the best we have had in Thailand. The pool system is huge, mostly 120cm in the canals and a little deeper (150cm) in the beach and 12+ areas. The beach is very nice, flat and clean with free SUP, Kayak and Bodyboard equipment - very appreciated. Good gym open 24/7. No kids mascots/disco, water gymnastics or anything - you can just relax, play around on your own and enjoy the atmosphere.   JW Marriott is a wonderful 5-star resort that allows children, which is rare. Highly recommended!

title: Great beach retreat !
review: Dear PJ U,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for staying with us and for your kind review and recommendations. It's such a delight to know that you and your kids enjoyed our services and the variety of facilities offered onsite. Our pool access rooms are certainly a favorite for many of our guests.They can easily jump into the pool from the balcony or have fun with a water slide and swim-up pool bars, with warm water.  Our resort is known for stunning sandy beach, azure seawaters and beautiful sunset views. We do have plenty of beach activities including stand-up paddle boarding, body boarding and kayaking available onsite as you mentioned.   We look forward to having you and your family back for another memorable experience.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Wonderful Hotel - Perfect Beach
review: We stayed in a pool-access room facing the children’s pool. I must say that I expected a more crowded hotel with that many rooms however, even fully booked we could easily find a place to relax and with close to 3km of pool the place never feels over capacity. The breakfast is to die for - everything you can think of! Most nights we had dinner at one of the local restaurants along the beach which gave the stay a positive and “localized” twist.  Overall an amazing resort that is surely on our revisit list!

title: Deserving of every positive review
review: Everything others have stated about this wonderful property is true - beautiful surroundings, exceptional service, excellent food, wonderful spa, etc.  A few things maybe not previously mentioned that might be helpful: -Pool/beach bag.  The hotel provides a bag to use during your stay, so skip squeezing one in your bag. -The hotel really is every bit of a 1.5 hour trip from the Phuket airport -Late check out lounge is located on the ground floor, below the lobby, that has lovely locker rooms with showers, etc.  Separate room near the lobby where your luggage will be locked.  Easy to check out on time but still enjoy the resort while waiting for an evening flight -Nice job setting up kid and no-kid zones.  Consequently, families, honeymooners, and everyone in between seemed…

title: Best hotel
review: Dear YinzerAbroad,  Thank you very much for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and thank you for sharing your wonderful experience here on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased to know that your overall stay with us was enjoyable and you were able to fully take advantage of our facilities and services offered here. One of the highlight of our resort is that we are located on a long stretch of sandy beachfront and surrounded by lush tropical settings. I must also share that our pool is the largest one in South East Asia – with 1.9km in total length which flows its way through the entire resort grounds.   Thank you for your compliments regarding the late check-out lounge and our designated kids / no-kid zones. Our late check-out lounge has shower rooms, towels and all the amenities you’ll need before heading off to the airport or starting your next trip. We also value your privacy and make sure that families and couples alike have own favourite spots to hang out.  We do look forward to welcoming you back in the future and please let us know should you plan to visit Khao Lak once again.   Best regards,  Hataichanok R  Management team  JW Marriott Khao Lak  +6676.584.888

title: Mr B
review: We had a wonderful time in mariott amzing staff, beach great time. The room are clean, they have a big pool. The resturants have good food and variety.  One of the best mariott. We will be back next year. If in khaolak must stay here

title: Fantastic vacation
review: Dear Nish W,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We could not be happier to hear that you have received a warm, memorable welcome from our staff. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our rooms, pool, beach and restaurants - we strive to provide all the necessities to be your home away from home with a touch of luxurious service.   It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Warm regards,  Kalaya Wu Management Team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: "Fantastic hotel in beautiful surroundings"
review: What an amazing stay, great welcome, great room, great staff, amazing breakfast this hotel totally exceeded our expectations , good service on the beech, the Czar bar was a great spot for a pre or post dinner cocktail, the food was excellent we chose not to gamble on going to town for dinner as the choice of food in house was so good. Also great facilities for departing guests which is a huge plus.

title: Fantastic Holiday again
review: This is our third stay at the Marriott Khao Lak and it was fantastic again.The location of the hotel is out of this world, you can walk either direction from the hotel along a pristine beach for miles with no high-rise buildings to encroach on the natural beauty of the  surroundings. I love the decor of the rooms as they have retained the Thai feel with dark hardwood floors and Thai style paintings on the walls. The check in was painless and although we arrived very early they managed to arrange entry to a room which suited our request very quickly and the small wait was eased by front of house arranging for a coffee and danish in the Deli. Special thanks to Money who arranged the room and looked after us so well for the rest of our stay.We would also like to wish good luck to…

title: Pretty much faultless
review: Dear StuartAnn,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you very much for taking the time to write your wonderful review and rating us a five star. It is fantastic to see valued guests returning to our resort. This is our biggest pridfe to read that you enjoyed every precious moment during your stay.   We are thrilled to learn you felt impressive with our warm welcoming service as we are committed to delivering a home-away- from-home experience. Our housekeeping team always makes sure to provide you with everything you need with a personal touch with varieties of amazing towel creations. We can see that Nee did a wonderful job on this while we are glad to hear that Money had made every effort to make your stay memorable from check-in til we bid our farewell.   As for our breakfast selections, we understand that many of our guests have different food preferences, therefore our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide a wide selection of high quality food to kick start your day. Thank you for your personal recognition for Nuch, Boy, Sorn and Leila, our staff at Breakfast restaurant and for your praises of Donald who kept the evening vibe at our resort. We have passed on your comments to all staff and they truly appreciate your kind review.   Once again thank you for your wonderful review. It is through reviews such as yours that inspire all of us to continue to exceed our guests' expectations. The team and I look forward to welcoming you back to our little paradise very soon!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak +6676.584.888

title: High-end hideaway in Khao Lak!
review: Had seven days here following a short break in Bangkok. A wonderful sanctuary. Tour East provided all our transfers, I suggest finding an alternative. The Rep Darren, however, was incredibly helpful. We asked for a quiet room, duly delivered. Luggage transfers really slick. Breakfast was included and was impeccable. We tried all the restaurants on a meal deal that included five nights at 1000 baht each per night. The Japanese restaurant was highlight but the finest meal was the beef buffet in the Waterfront. The head chef, Jai, is really personable and appears everywhere quality assuring all the food. The room service is reasonably priced and really efficient. We had all our massages just outside the resort and paid around 400 baht on each occasion. The Czar bar is the place for…

title: Amazing stay, highly recommend
review: Dear Phil C,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking your time to share your feedback with others on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to know that everything we offered has lived up to your expectations during your recent stay with us.  We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service and you enjoyed every aspect including our spectacular pool/beach and our various food and beverage outlets around the resort. Especially, you found our staff so friendly and knowledgeable. I will pass on your comments to the restaurants team, bar staffs, our Executive Chef and the trainee we had at the foyer. They are extremely proud to be have made your stay wonderful. It's always a great motivation for our team to know that guests enjoyed the service and facilities our resort has offered.   We look forward to your next visit and hope we are once again your choice of destination in Khao Lak, Thailand.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak +6676.584.888

title: Best hotel stay ever
review: Frankly, I knew this was a nice resort because friends has stayed here.  Normally we are more inclined to rent a condo versus staying at a resort but we decided to try the JW out and we were not disappointed.  As noted by others, the grounds and facilities are immaculately maintained.  Not a day went by that there wasn't a small crew of people sweeping, pruning, or touching the paint up.  The sight lines of this resort are beautiful, whether you're in the pool or walking in the gardens.  It really is a relaxing and beautiful place to stay.  The room was great and we are glad we sprung for the lagoon pool access. It was great to jump into the pool after a day at the beach or after walking back from dinner. You can really walk the entire hotel from the pool that runs through it!…

title: Stunning service
review: What a delightful couple of weeks, rooms excellent, staff amazing, restaurants beyond belief. Beach clean, excellent sand. Water very warm. Plenty of sun beds, adult and family pools. Fairly quiet of an evening

title: Memorable holiday
review: Dear Valdowlin,  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your recent visit to Thailand.   We couldn't be happier to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure that we provide the most memorable experience to all our guests. Thank you for your kind words and we certainly look forward to your return visit.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak +6676.584.888

title: Beautiful resort
review: A really special and beautiful hotel, we simply loved it. We stayed here with our family including our 13 month old little son. We received two rooms on the 1st floor that could be opened to each other, so we didn't have to go out - and in again using the corridor. It was very useful while the baby was asleep. The rooms itself were really nice furnished, the view from the balcony to the pools were stunning, especially by sunset. We loved the big and beautiful garden and the fact that although the hotel was fully booked, we never felt any crowd anywhere.Maybe a little bit at the breakfast but we didn't care... The stuff was also really friendly and helpful. They helped us a lot when we had to take the baby to a hospital on a Sunday evening because he had fever almost 40 degrees.…

title: Beautiful hotel on a stunning beach
review: Dear Bog77,  Warmest greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking your time to share your positive feedback with others on TripAdvisor.   We are pleased to know that you were impressed with the overall experience. I'm so sorry to hear that your baby was not feeling well and I hope he is all better, and that all you family is now back home and well rested.    We appreciate your kind comments on our staff service – we couldn’t be happier to assist you with all of your needs. Our apologies for the inconvenience regarding your credit card, though I’m glad that the issue was resolved prior to your departure. Please rest assured we have addressed this with the team involved for further improvement.  I hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Please let us know should there be anything we could do to make your stay even better.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak +6676.584.888

title: Like a dream
review: Stayed here the second leg of our Thailand holiday. Many of the previous reviews are spot on - its the staff that add that touch of class. Our room - 1026 - pool access was wonderful - pretty near the beach/restaurants. Pool complex is really very unique - but the sea for us was the big draw - endless miles of sandy beach and warm water. Visited the area - went native for a couple of meals, but kept coming back to the Mediterranean restaurant ! Found the guest a good mixture of nationalities - and friendly. But the fifth star is definitely for the Staff - nothing is too much for any of them; all done with tremendous grace and sincerity. Enjoy

title: Cant wait to go back!
review: I got a recomendation from a colleague to book this hotel and Im so happy I did. The hotel is just amazing and the staff are so service minded. The location is great if you just want to have lazy days by the pool or beach or maybe go for a excursion. The area is calm but you have many restaurants in teh area. The SPA is very nice and the rooms very spacious. The breakfast is just outstanding- you have everything to chose from!

title: Holiday
review: Dear Sofia_Lager,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and thank you for choosing us as your preferred destination resort.   We are thrilled to hear that you had a memorable experience with us. Our resort is surely a true paradise, with it be situated far from the many clustered hotels, the ambience of the resort becomes a serene getaway. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our room, pool, beach, our award-wining Quan Spa, and most importantly the service of our staff.  Thank you for your kind comments of our breakfast selections. It is our priority to ensure that we can help start your day with a healthy yet tasteful meal.   We hope that the memorable service you had with us will entice you to return in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Warm regards, Kalaya Wu Management Team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa +6676.584.888

title: So good, we're going back :)
review: Great hotel, Great location right on a Great beach.  The exterior of this very large hotel was like new surrounded by water and manicured gardens on all sides. The rooms were large and well presented but not up to the standard of the outside, and have had some improvements done but I will be surprised if the rooms are not updated soon? The breakfast was as good as it gets, also the beach bar food was above average. The Italian Restaurant was very good but we many ate at the many beach bars near by.  Also the staff were very nice and helpful.

title: Loved it
review: Dear Graham J,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you very much for your review on TripAdvisor, following your recent stay with us.   We are glad to hear that you have a great holiday here and enjoyed our surroundings. We strive to maintain the highest standards not only in service, but also our facilities and landscape. I can confidently say that our breakfast is one of key highlights of our resort as there always are a wide selection of high quality and healthy food with power drinks to start your day. Olive, the Mediterranean restaurant is highly recommended as you can enjoy the authentic food while watching the stunning sunset on the beach!   We definitely look forward to welcoming you back to our resort!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak +6676.584.888

title: Amazing Hotel with everything to offer.
review: Overall, the hotel is stunning, the grounds are kept immaculate, the pool is unique, and maintained and cleaned daily. Staff are constantly cleaning, painting, and trimming gardens.  The Room was, spacious, VERY comfy beds and plenty of storage, and a bath big enough to wash a great Dane in.  Very Clean, and kept clean for us by Fon.   Food is fresh, local produce, and they the hugest buffet I have ever seen for breakfast.  On site, there is everything you could want Pool, Beach, Bars, Coffee Shop, Restaurants, Small clothing Shop & (small) market, Gym, small games room, Squash, Tennis, Spa / Massage, Tour Desk ++++, and the Tailor at the top of the drive. Quiet, a bit off the "beaten track", but easy enough to go into Ban Niang & Khao Lak. If you want to Party - Stay in Phuket…

title: Marriott Khao Lak - Simply the Best
review: Marriott Khao Lak has set a new benchmark for us as a first-class resort.    There are four wings set in a beautifully landscaped precinct, with long pool circuits around each wing. Although there are 300 rooms, it never feels crowded.   There is extensive use of hedging, which has been used to make a number of 'outdoor rooms' - spaces with two lounges and an umbrella, giving out onto the main pool. Good havens for adults. Or you can go for the long flat beaches to either walk on, swim from or settle down on the many lounges or in a hammock.  The rooms are well appointed with a rich mahogany decor, day beds and lots of storage, but quite roomy, giving out onto balconies in the upper floors or directly to the pool at ground level.  There are all the facilities you would want,…

title: Great experience and service
review: Dear MichaelTMel,  Thank you for choosing to stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak and for giving us a perfect score review!   It was a great pleasure to read that you greatly enjoyed your experience here and we couldn’t be more proud to have set the standards for our Marriott family of hotels!  Pool access room is highly recommended and one of the main highlights of our resort, and being able to access the pool straight from the comfort of your own room is certainly a treat.   We much appreciated your comments about our recreation facilities. We strive to offer our valued guests with a variety of exciting activities to fill your days so that both kids and adults alike never have a chance to feel bored. We could not be happier to know that you enjoyed our extensive selection of breakfast offerings and choices of restaurants including Ta-Krai (Thai), Olive (Mediterranean), Sakura (Japanese) and Waterfront (International) restaurants. I hope you had the opportunity to try our variety of themed night dinners where we present different local, regional and international cuisines for unique culinary experiences.    It seems like the staff service is what makes all the difference during your stay – and we truly appreciate your comments on this. The entire team work hard every day to ensure that we deliver services that exceed expectations and I have passed this on to our team as words of encouragement and motivation as we strive to be better every single day.  It will be a great honor for us to have a chance to welcome you back again so please let us know the next time you’ll return to this paradise. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak +6676.584.888

title: Tropical Paradise ... JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: WE had a wonderful time. The resort was not busy so we had access to all the facilities we wanted. We had a great time at the cooking class, heading in to town to see the markets, cocktails by the pool, and even a romantic dinner on the beach. With all meals included as well as massages, it truly was an all inclusive trip. Cant wait to come back!

title: Fabulous
review: Dear Stacey K,  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your recent stay. We really appreciate your time sharing your experiences on TripAdvisor.  It’s wonderful that you were also able to take advantage of our wide selection of facilities and activities in the resort including our Thai cooking class, refreshing cocktails at our pool bars, romantic dinner on the beach, treatments at our award-winning Quan Spa and able to explore the markets in Khao Lak.  We hope you enjoyed swimming around the 1.9 km. pool where is the highlight of our resort as it is Southeast Asia’s longest lagoon pool. Moreover, I would recommend massage on the beach which is the newest addition in our property. You will  enjoy the spectacular views of the Andaman Sea at the same time!  Please let us know should you return and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak

title: Paradise
review: The Marriott has not disappointed with another spectacular resort. From the moment you arrive you feel as though you are in paradise. The rooms are spacious, the food is exceptional, the pools are plentiful, the private beach is clean and calming but what makes this resort one of the best I've been to is the STAFF!!!  The Marriott is to be applauded for the workers who greet you with a smile as you pass by and who are willing to assist you in any way to make your stay the most enjoyable it can be. Thank you JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for creating a special memory for my boys and I to cherish for the rest of our lives.  Would definitely recommend to everyone!!!

title: Hotel Exceptional... Area not so much
review: Hard to say anything bad about the hotel, some highlights: 1.  walk out to the pool from your bed and swim to your friends room  2.  buffet is amazing 3.  beach is private, quiet, clean, and plenty of free umbrellas and chairs, live music one night we were there. 4.  place is so expensive, you will be mingling with some high society folks, they were shooting a movie there when we visited 5.  feather down pillows, jacuzzi in room  Now about the area.. I can definitely say the area is lacking.  1.  the beach is deserted in both directions, nowhere to walk to 2.  it is down a very very long dirt road, and not easy to find, don't book this place without a rental car 3.  There are some elephant hikes and national parks in the area, closest waterfall I went to was so small and full of…

title: I fell in love .. The BEST BEST hotel in Thailand. 👍🏻
review: Dear Rum_Rum9,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your choice of accommodation and for sharing your experience with others on TripAdvisor.   It was a pleasure to have you staying with us. We are delighted that you had a pleasant experience at our resort and found the hotel to be a perfect private getaway in a serene and peaceful ambience with high standard of amenities and facilities, and that our buffet selection was impressive.  Our resort is situated on a private beach for a total relaxation away from the bustling and crowded tourist attractions. To keep you active on your vacation, we offer a variety of outdoor and indoor activities onsite (i.e. arts and crafts, cultural learning and health and fitness activities) as well as the outside excursions such as sightseeing tours (elephants, waterfall, Khao Sok National Park, etc.), islands day trips (Phi Phi Islands, Similan Islands, Surin Islands). There are also several nearby attractions within easy reach as well.    We appreciate your comments and truly hope we have a chance to welcome you back to Khao Lak again.   Wishing you a pleasant day !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak

title: Perfect Holiday Destination
review: We ware at JW Marriott for a week, to  celebrate New Year, and OMG what a lovely party we had, we ware about 400 people, and the staff did such a wonderful job, 👍🏻I think there was more than 50 different dishes , all from lobster, fish and eropean food   , lot of Thai food, and many more, not to talk about the cakes, and fruit... I have newer seen so much food, it was so great.  The hotel is so lovely and the staff is so professional, and almost all of the staff speaks English, and try every thing the can to make your holiday  a good experience.   When you are at the beach, the come with cold water with ice. What a great gesture...   the food is so nice, and you can order everything. There is some Restaurants,  and remember too book , as there can bee many people there .  The…

title: Everyone needs a place that feels like home - JWM Khao Lak makes me feel at home
review: Dear J-Lauritzen,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Thank you very much for taking your time to share such a wonderful review with others on TripAdvisor! We are so thrilled to learn that you had an amazing experience during the festive holiday and were impressed with our service excellence. Additionally, we are over the moon with your comments about our food selections at our New Year’s Eve. Our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide our guest with a wide sets of quality food selections; your comments have been shared to our team and they could not be happier. Our infinity pool is the pride and joy of our resort, and we’re glad that you had a great time enjoying your days in our lazy lagoon.   Thank you very much for your special recognition of Nu and Nuch, they strive every day to ensure our guests' stays are memorable. Please rest assured that I have shared your comments to them and the management team as words of encouragement that help us to maintain and improve our standard of services.   Please let us know should you wish to return and we hope to see you again very soon !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful Hotel w Great Facilities
review: We booked an 8 night Luxury Escape with all inclusive meals.  We had 3 rooms for our family with 2 of the rooms interconnected.  There was a small issue on Day 3 with our third room and the staff were so apologetic and accommodating that they moved us to another room in the same block.  They also delivered a special afternoon tea of cookies and fruit to our daughter who was in that room.  Breakfast is amazing.  Our meals included lunch either at the beach hut or Waterfront Restaurant and a three course dinner at all of their other restaurants - Olive, Sakura, TraKrai and also their nightly themed buffet dinners set up on the beach lounge in front of the ocean.  Just spectacular.  Teppanyaki at the Japanese Restaurant with Banana the chef was very entertaining.  All food was of…

title: Lovely (family) hotel
review: Stayed at the hotel to celebrate a birthday. We were a group of 8 (combination of adults and kids) and had booked 3 rooms based on a friend’s recommendation.  I had never tried the Marriot before but I can say I was pleasantly surprised and all in all it went well. There are lots of kids around but that shouldn’t be a problem for most as the resort is spread out. There is a kid’s pool that can get a bit lively so ask for a room away from it if you want peace and quiet.  The staff was professional and friendly but there’s a bit of a language issue so one should be patient and understanding. They messed up our transfer booking on arrival, someone was waiting but for 2 people not 8 which was odd since they had our booking. So we waited a little while and then it was fixed. Calling…

title: Stunning location and matching service
review: Dear GammelMont,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us to celebrate your birthday and for taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.  It's great to know that you and your family enjoyed spending time with us. Our resort is both couple- and family-friendly with different designated zones to ensure that guests of all ages have privacy and feel valued with a wide variety of unique activities and facilities to keep everyone entertained.   We are happy to know that you had a great time dining in our restaurants. Our chefs work hard to ensure that we provide fresh, tasty and high-quality meals to fuel your perfect holiday.  Our pool is one of the largest lagoon pools in Southeast Asia (with a total length of 1.9km!). There are 2 pool bars where you can enjoy swimming up and having refreshing drinks with stunning views.  Please accept our apologies for some minor inconveniences but I am glad the situation was rectified quickly. We appreciate your valued comments as we strive to provide our guests nothing but exceptional services.  We look forward to welcoming you again and please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Tel: +6676.584.888

title: Amaizing place!
review: We came here as part of a two family holiday and were not disappointed. The setting is stunning with the several km of pool wandering around the property, leading straight up to the beach, so there is a choice of pool or ocean. The villas are stunning, with a mezzanine level bedroom above the sitting area. They are well furnished and very spacious. The layout of the hotel is very well planned. The facilities are excellent with free racquet sports and gym. The restaurants are good and the breakfast buffet great. In the evening, the restaurants get busy so it is advisable to pre-book a time. There are numerous beachside restaurants which serve great local seafood - these are to be recommended - you can pre-order which seafood you want for the following day, if you have a…

title: Pleasantly surprised!
review: Dear archibald75,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for your excellent feedback and your kind mentions regarding our beautiful surroundings, spacious room, our recreation facilities as well as our restaurants and breakfast offerings. It gives us great pleasure to know that we were able to provide you with the service that exceeded your expectations and that you and had a wonderful time with us.  This season is the best time to visit Khao Lak as the weather is nice and warm and the beach is perfect for swimming and water sports. We do have plenty of activities including stand-up paddle boarding, body boarding and kayaking available onsite.   Additionally, if you have a chance to visit Khao Lak again, I would recommend Bang Niang market where you can try the local street food and souvenirs or clothing shopping.    Please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better. We can't wait to see you again soon!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful hotel, amazing beach, fantastic hospitality!
review: We fall in love with that resort! Location is superb: in the quiet area, far from commercial and busy roads, pristine water and private beach. But the highlight for us was breakfast - its variety impressed us! Special thank you for the fitness centre. Instructors were amazing. Will return for sure...  Thanks for making our stay unforgettable!

title: When can we go back?????
review: My husband and I loved almost every minute of our stay at this resort. The private beach is beautiful and truly private. There aren't other resorts close by so you can walk quite far along the beach without seeing other buildings which also means when you're in your beach chair, there aren't people constantly walking by. We ate at each restaurant but think that Olive is the best deal for your money. Service at the beach bar was efficient and comes right to your beach chair. The complimentary SUP is a nice feature. The gym is clean and pretty big for a hotel gym. The provide towels and water and there is even a trainer in case you'd like some assistance. We didn't take advantage of the many yoga and tai chi classes available. Our pool access room was large and very comfortable.…

title: Gorgeous resort and a perfect stay
review: Dear Jaclyn S,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to spend your festive vacation. It was a pleasure to read that you enjoyed every minute of your stay with us, and we are so glad to hear you had such a great experience in our facilities and services including the beach bar as well as our pool access room which is the one of the most favourite features of our resort. It seemed like Quan Spa is the highlight of your stay – our therapists are highly trained and they pay special attention to individual needs to ensure that the treatments are catered exactly to your preference.  With regards to our Christmas Eve dinners, we are truly sorry that there was some miscommunications as we offered several choices of dining experience on this special occasion. We appreciate your kind recommendations and have passed them on to our team for future improvement.  All your feedback has gladly been shared with the whole team and we all hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon.  Wishing you joy and happiness all year long. Happy New Year 2018 !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Spacious familyresort
review: Beautiful resort with a fabulous pool.and great beach. Incredible service, amazing breakfast with everything you could.imagine. we also enjoyed their New Year's gala shows and probably the nicest buffet I have ever seen. Perfect vacation! Only thing I would like to comment about is that for a 5 star resort it seems a bit lame to charge fot the shuttle bus to town and the tennis. These are servicea which we think should be included. Anyway, we shall definately be back!

title: Not exceptional
review: Dear Susanna P,  Thank you very much for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your choice of accommodation and for your time sharing experiences on TripAdvisor.   We're extremely happy to learn that you’ve enjoyed all aspects of the resort from the spacious beach, our lagoon pool (1.9-km long and one of the largest pools in Asia) and the service excellence of our team.
