To know that you enjoyed our New Year's gala night is truly appreciated as all our staff worked very hard to create the most memorable and unforgettable experience for this special occasion! I have also passed on your recommendations to our team for further improvement.   We truly hope we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back again very soon. Wishing you a year full of happiness and prosperity. Happy New Year 2018 !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great Trip ...just a few things to note !
review: Had a 8 day stay in this 300 room family resort with watercanals through the resort. It is located at a 1.5 hour drive from phuket in a very nice calm beautiful location. Have to say that  a 400 eur per night (christmas period) is not value for money (too high). For that price the rooms are a bit outdated. The TV sometimes did not work correctly.The hotel itself is well maintained and with friendly staff. Breakfast was very good. Beach was beautiful. However  people reserve the beach chairs with their towels in the early morning and then go away to return 1.5 hours later. It is a shame that the hotel does not inforce self imposed  rules on blocking unattended beachseats. (See pictures) That s frustrating and not correct for other hotelguests. A good thing is that there is a…

title: fantastic stay
review: we stayed in this resort and celebrated the Wedding of our nephew. Resort was excellent in all respects, be it the room, restaurant, swimming pool behind room , customer care, etc . Resort management made fantastic arrangements for the Wedding

title: Good all round; hard to book tennis...
review: Dear Sam30091945,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Congratulations to your nephew and the new couple and thank you very much for choosing us as the venue of this special occasion. We wish them both a very happy life together!   I am extremely delighted to hear that everything went well and that you had a wonderful time with us. Our wedding and event teams aim to create that special once-in-a-lifetime memory and to offer our guests the most memorable experience during the entire stay. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back in the future to create new memories at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Wishing you a Happy New Year 2018 !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Superb Hotel and Amazing Staff
review: My small niggle is that a small number of guests had advance booked tennis courts for the entire week so the lower temp slots between 4 and 7pm weren't available at all during our 6 day stay. We complained and got a call from the manager who organised a court for us one night, but the next day the system was back to the same... so we ended up having to play early morning which wasn't my preferred option. If you're reading this, JWM, I suggest you only allow one live booking per room at a time!  The rest was all good. The hotel is vast so it swallows guests and kids are not a problem for those travelling without them (us)! You do end up walking a fair bit from A to B as it's so big! Rooms are excellent, staff friendly.  Breakfast buffet excellent selection. For lunch and dinner,…

title: Perfect
review: Dear Char1ieP,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback on TripAdvisor - your feedback is very valuable to us as we strive to improve with each and every stay.   I’m glad that you had a wonderful time with us and are planning to return for another memorable stay! Our resort is both family and adult friendly, with different designated zone for children and families as we understand the need for privacy. With our spacious resort grounds and lush tropical surroundings, our resort offers a serene experience of a true private getaway!  With regards to the feedback on our tennis courts reservation, we welcome your suggestion for improvement and please rest assured we have addressed this with our team.  We do hope you will visit us again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to contact us if there is anything we can assist you with. Wishing you a Happy New Year 2018 !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Perfect holiday destination
review: Travelling as a family of five is never easy, always having to arrange two rooms, the need for services and facilities to suit children of varying ages as well as adults and activities that everyone can enjoy. The JW Marriott Khao Lak has all of this plus more!  Upon arrival we were greeted with wonderful Thai hospitality, huge smiles and an abundance of knowledge about the hotel and all it can offer. We were taken to our Wing 1 ground floor king bedroom with pool lagoon access and were not disappointed - huge space, lovely decor, every amenity needed was provided, plus a gorgeous leafy and private outlook over the property. The children were beside themselves with excitement over being able to come and go freely from the 'lazy river' pool into our hotel room - such a bonus for…

title: Excellent hotel and superb staff
review: It was our first ever Christmas away from home, so a little apprehensive.  However, from start to finish, the staff at the hotel made us feel so welcome that we never missed home.  The room was large and airy and the chamber maids, Fon and lost the name of her friend, made the most amazing towel creations. Breakfast was a massive choice of Eastern and Western cuisine, thank you to Pooh, Nuch and Kan especially for looking after us.  The pool is amazing and huge , it goes all round the hotel complex.  The bar on the beachside was great for sundowners. Olive restaurant and the Japanese restaurant provided great food.  The spa is top drawer and thank you to Goi, Beer, Money and Honey for wonderful service.  Patrick the General Manager was always on hand to assist and the staff…

title: Lovely Hotel - Quiet & Beautiful location - Only minor issues
review: Dear Wayne G,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us for your Christmas holiday and thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience to others on TripAdvisor.  We do try our best to make our guests feel welcome and home away from home. It's great to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast selections and are impressed with services from our staff, whether it be from the housekeeping, breakfast, food & beverage outlets, spa, recreation facilities and our management team. I have passed on all your comments to all our team members here and we truly appreciate your recognitions – this will greatly inspire and motivate us to keep up our excellent work and strive to make your holiday even more memorable!   We do look forward to welcoming you back in for another relaxing and memorable holiday. Happy New Year 2018!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful, relaxing and luxurious
review: We paid a lot for this trip - half board for a fortnight over Christmas was pricey with Direct Flights from Manchester UK - but we don't regret paying it at all. What a lovely location! The hotel is beautiful, rooms are great and beds comfortable. Beach is great and the pool spectacular. Get a swim up room and go night swimming! Even when full this hotel never feels crowded! The staff are exceptionally friendly and helpful. They have separate areas for families with under 12 kids and one for those over 12. Worked really well. Sunbeds easy to get on the beach, and I believe at the massive pools but we never sat at the pool. They have a "no reserving" policy on sunbeds which they need to keep on top of and perhaps explain ,ore clearly to new arrivals but generally works well.  …

title: Excellent and beautiful hotel by the beach
review: Lovely property, with an exceptionally good pool and a gorgeous beach. Staff are warm, friendly and helpful. The food was delicious. The chefs very accommodating and talented. They have a great kids club where our toddler was thoroughly engaged. Airport drop was well arranged.   Highly recommend.

title: Superb hotel - awesome pool
review: Dear meghna_kmr,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your preferred choice of destination resort.  Thank you for your review and recommendations to other TripAdvisor readers. Our resort is surely a true paradise boasting the longest pool in South East Asia and a long stretches of soft sandy beach, making it a perfect serene getaway for a total rejuvenation. We're delighted that you enjoyed our food and found our chefs very accommodating and talented. Our kids club also offers a wide variety of activities to keep your little ones entertained and offer new learning experience whether it be arts and crafts, health and fitness programs or cultural learning activities they can engage individually and as a group.   We hope that your memorable stay will entice you to return to us in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better and we look forward to welcoming you back soon. Wishing you a wonderful year ahead. Happy New Year 2018!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: 10 days of bliss in Khao Lak
review: Just returned from the perfect holiday at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak. Resort fronts on to a beautiful warm sandy beach. Resort has the largest pool in Thailand. Rooms are extremely comfortable with large king size beds. Breakfasts were absolutely yummy and meals in the other restaurants were excellent. The staff were friendly and we didn't lack anything. Excellent gym and other activities during the day if one was interested.

title: One of the best vacations ever
review: Dear tonymckenna,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us.   We could not be happier that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us. Our breakfast and pool access rooms are truly the highlights of our resort. Indeed our pool boasts the largest lagoon pool in South East Asia, with 1.9km in total length!   We pride ourselves with the hospitality that’s second to none and we are glad that you have truly enjoyed it! .Our team always work hard to make our guests’ stays memorable. With the massive resort such as ours, we have extensive facilities and recreational activities for our guests of all ages to enjoy and fill up their days!   It is our pleasure to have you with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Calm and serene getaway
review: Surrounding are absolutely lovely, grounds, hotel, pool extremely well maintained. Super clean and beautiful resort, excellent if your looking for relaxing time. The rooms are top-notch, room service, is perfect. Breakfast buffet style and very good choice. On a negative:- an ongoing complaint, every morning we are escorted to our breakfast table, and we order our hot drinks, and this never seems to turn up.. which is really annoying. Drinks are expensive, so is the meals. And be warned if you arrive here early, after travelling from the uk 20 hours, you cannot check in until 3pm, we had a full day, feeling exhausted and just waiting for our room.. some people have their rooms early, depending on Marriott..this was not a good start for us, and was slightly disappointed.

title: Fabulous
review: Dear Sandbach12,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor.   Your kind comments regarding the resort surroundings, rooms, maintenance and cleanliness, as well as our wide selection of breakfast offerings are greatly appreciated! Please accept our sincere apologies for some inconveniences you have experienced and please rest assured that we have passed on your feedback to relevant teams to ensure that we offer service excellence throughout our resort.  Whenever possible, we do our best to accommodate our guests’ requests such as early check-ins should there be rooms available.   We hope to have a chance to welcome you back in the future, so please let us know if there’s anything we could do to make your next stay even a better one. We wish you a wonderful festive season!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful resort
review: Taking a break from the city and visiting the JW Marriott Khao Lak was the perfect escape from the hustle of a busy life. The food is amazing and the variety provided in the breakfast buffet is something out of this world. My favourite part was the noodle bar and how the buffet managed to incorporate the essence of Thailand in terms of the tropical fruit spread as well as having a wide variety of other cuisines to experience, from an Indian curry to a wide variety of Kimchi!  An amazing place to visit whether you’re travelling solo or looking for a place to unwind with your family and friends!

title: Lovely hotel
review: We stayed at the Jw Marriott for 8 days in November for our 25th wedding anniversary. The hotel is beautiful, it is a little bit far from khao lak but the hotel runs shuttle buses. We enjoyed our evening cocktails in the czar bar and the service from Ruk and ploy was excellent, we enjoyed our chats and they was both so friendly and helpful.

title: Highly recommend and will visit again
review: Dear chaff2,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing us to be the venue to celebrate such a special occasion and also for sharing the review of your recent stay on TripAdvisor.   We couldn’t be happier to know that you had a memorable stay with us and enjoyed our services. It seems like Czar Bar was your favourite spot, and we are delighted that Ruk and Ploy were there to help make your experience even more special. We have passed on your comments to them as words of motivation!  We wish you a wonderful holiday season and hopefully will see you again for the 26th anniversary!   Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful hotel!
review: We stayed in a king suite and enjoyed every aspect of our stay. The room was lovely, well appointed and very clean. Breakfast was excellent in both choice and quality. We ate dinner in the hotel restaurants as well as trying the Italian and Thai restaurants just outside the gate. We enjoyed every meal without exception and prices for the hotel restaurants (the hotel Thai restaurant was our favorite) were very competitive with their competitors outside the gates. We enjoyed the winding pool, larger pool, pool bar, beach-side area and especially the secluded areas beside the pools. Kids would love this place but we're a bit beyond that and were glad that there were very few around. (Thank goodness we no longer have to travel during school holidays). It was a pleasure to stay here…

title: Wonderful hotel, fabulous location and friendly, helpful and attentive staff
review: Dear IJustwant2travelSam,  Thank you very much for choosing us as your vacation destination in Khao Lak and for your kind review and recommendation. To know that you had a pleasant experience with us is a wonderful present in this festive season!  We understand that many of our guests stay with us for a number of days, that’s why our team provides a variety of food and beverage options for breakfast, lunch and dinners with special themed night dining experience so our guests can try different cuisines. There are 4 restaurants, specializing in Thai, Japanese, Mediterranean/ Italian and International cuisines, including 2 swim-up pool bars, 1 lobby bar, 1 beach bar and our grab-and-go Deli café. Our pool is the highlight of the resort as it is one of the longest pools in South East Asia, with a total of 1.9km in total length! The staff strive everyday to ensure that our guests are welcomed with authentic Thai hospitality and that you all have an exceptional time with us throughout your stay!   We are located away from the bustling city center and offers a perfect hidden getaway paradise for those seeking a total relaxation. On your next visit, may I recommend you to visit nearby attractions with a bike trip provided by our Recreation team without extra fee to explore the unspoiled nature of Khao Lak – it is a sight to be seen!    We wish you and your family a blissful holiday season and  look forward to welcoming you all in the near future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Stunning location and super attentive staff, a tranquil paradise
review: One of the best hotels in khaolak.. good service friendly staff great pool.. The rooms are spacious.. quiet location.. there’s a restaurant by the beach and sports bar..will surely be back..great place for a good holiday with family and friends..

title: Great Hospitality!!
review: Been to jw khao lak in second week of december for a wedding.. was impressed by the overwhelming staff and their support.. great place to stay and special thanks to chef mohan thakur who curated special indian dishes for me. Never had such great indian food ever in all my travels across.. not even in my home country. Will definitely  recommend this place

title: I love staying here! It was not my first stay!
review: Dear DJVEE V,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us.   We could not be happier to hear that you received a warm, memorable welcome and enjoyed our services throughout your stay. Your personal recognition for Chef Mohan is much appreciated and please rest assured that we have passed it on to him. Chef Mohan is a true shining example of our dedicated staff who is extremely passionate and always strive and do his best to accommodate our guests' needs.   We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next visit a greater one.  Best regards, Kalaya Wu Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Tel: +6676.584.888

title: Peaceful and a swimmers dream!
review: I stayed there last November for 2 nights and it was not my first time. I love this place! I love everything in this hotel. The breakfast was really good, lots of selection of food! Fresh made, juice, smoothies, Thai and western food all together! So much to eat like a brunch already!  The room is very comfortable and clean! What I enjoyed the most is their swimming pool! The pool  surrounding the property and huge! It's fantastic and it's like a few steps from the beach too! You can either enjoy the beach and jump in the pool next.  The beach of the hotel is very long and clean. The location is great! Peaceful with the beautiful beach and coconut trees.  The other great thing about this resort is their activities, like they have many fitness classes and also perfect tennis…

title: Outstanding place to stay
review: Dear Phirapa M,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We appreciate you taking your time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor and are delighted to know that you enjoyed your entire stay with us. With regards to our breakfast, we understand that every guest has different preference, that's why we offer a wide selection of breakfast items to suit everyone's needs to kick start the day right! Our main highlights include the lagoon-shaped pool which is the longest in South East Asia, and the beach with a long stretch of sandy beach with warm, clear blue sea - and it is the perfect spot to sit back, relax and have a great drink over sunset.  Additionally, we do offer a number of indoor and outdoor activities suitable for both kids and adults, so there's never a dull moment in our resort. Bicycle trip to the waterfall is recommended!  Our instructor will take you to explore Sai Rung Waterfall and Ching Fah waterfall, see and learn the real local life and culture of Khao Lak, Thailand.  Thank you for your compliments to our team of associates. Our guests' satisfaction is truly the motivation for all of us to strive to keep up the good work. We all look forward to welcoming you again on your next visit.  Best regards, Kalaya Wu Management Team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Tel: +6676.584.888

title: Top beach resort and great food
review: We had a great weekend here in November the service was excellent and the resort is beautiful. The pool is huge and wraps around the resort and is excellent for a super long swim. I made the most of the yoga and the stunning peaceful spa. I even had room service which was very fast and arrived hot! I had a very relaxing weekend and would go back!

title: Great stay at wonderful property!
review: We stayed here with our teens (14,16) for four nights in Dec. Everything was amazing - the property is gorgeous and so well taken care of. We had a pool access family room that was nicely sized for the four of us. Lots of closet space and great balcony. The beach is amazing as are the endless pools that go on forever. Breakfast was great! We ate other meals off the property- there are cute local restaurants and massages for a fraction of the cost if you don’t mind rustic and simple. Awesome fully equipped game room with ping ping, pool, air hockey- no pieces missing. There’s a kids club for the little ones that looked cute. It’s our 5th time in Thailand and this is one of the best properties we’ve stayed at. Very well priced as well. Small issue with unclean toilet bowl (on the…

title: Holiday in paradise
review: Dear Valued guests,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your choice of accommodation and for sharing your experience to others on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and that you're able to take advantage of our pool access room where you can jump directly into the pool at the comforts of your own balcony. We understand that many of our guests travel with families, therefore we offer plenty of activities for everyone to enjoy. With regards to your comment, we truly appreciate your input and have passed this on to our team to ensure that our facilities and public areas are kept clean at all times.  We hope to have a chance to welcome you again in the near future. Thank you once again and we wish you all the joys on this festive season!   Sincerely, Kalaya Wu Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Tel: +6676.584.888

title: Best holiday I have ever had
review: We had heard a lot about the place . Considering J W Marriott you expect the place to nice. But this was Beyond expectation . The ambience , location , staff everything and everyone was outstanding.  Personal thanks to PIM , Manee, Enzo, Mohan ...These guys made the stay more comfortable and leisurely. The lovely swimming pool . This is the place to be if you want a relaxed holiday .   Thanks a lot . Looking to visit again .

title: Nice relaxing Resort
review: Dear Lakshminarayan P,  Thank you for choosing to stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and for taking your time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.   It’s wonderful to read your excellent comments and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our pool, location and services. Thank you for the special mention of our attentive staffs – Pim, Manee, Enzo and Mohan – I will definitely pass on your feedback to them and the rest of the team who were always more than happy to assist you whenever possible.  We can’t wait to welcome you back in the near future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Idillic holiday
review: This place is absolutely amazing. Not only is the resort stunning and the beach beautiful, but the staff are absolutely incredible. They go out of their way to help and provide you with the best customer service. Would highly recommend this place to anyone. Absolutely spotless, super friendly and just all around AMAZING!

title: Great Property, average service/ staff
review: In my view - A great hotel is made so by the quality of its staff in addition to the property itself. Stayed here for 2 nights for a family wedding.  The negatives first which tend to be usually top of mind - the service: My very first experience at check-in was unfavourable with very indifferent dour faced and unfriendly check-in staff, certainly expected a lot more from a JW Marriott property. Had a very unpleasant experience at breakfast thereafter where upon requesting a staff member to get us some juice from the buffet, she flatly refused...granted it was a buffet but have never encountered a flat refusal before! Was finally served after my stubborn insistence. In general found the service sub par for a so called 5 star chain. Now the positives - the property is sea facing…

title: Highly recommend sunny resort
review: Dear RovingWanderers ,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.  I’m glad to hear that you enjoyed the Wedding ceremony, décor, resort features and our food and beverage offerings. Thank you for your nice words about our associates in regards to the event arrangements and motivating our team to provide seamless organization to our guests.  Whenever possible, we strive and do our best to accommodate our guests’ requests. Having met many guests attending the same event, I was not aware of such issue so it comes a bit as a surprise and there might be some miscommunications. Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention and please rest assured that we are investigating the issues in order to further improve our services.    Our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences and if there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.  We very much hope to welcome you back whenever your travel brings you back to Khao lak.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Like coming home
review: Time to relax, then this is the place to be. Large sandy beach, large pool with canals along properly, cocktails and food all up to expectations.   The rooms are very large and all overlook the pool canals. We were given a very warm welcome on our arrival. Service on the beach is also exceptional!.

title: Wonderful
review: Dear Mark T,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for choosing us as you choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to hear that you have received a warm, memorable welcome from our staff and thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our facilities, rooms, beach, staff services and dining experience. We strive to provide all the necessities  to be your home away from home with a touch of warm and friendly services.   It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Sincerely, Kalaya Wu Management JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Great family hotel
review: My husband and I have visited this fantastic hotel 7 times, 7 years in a row and we are not about to stop. The resort is gorgeous, the food is great but the reason we keep coming back is the AMAZING staff at JW Marriott Khao Lak. It truly feels like coming to your second home, you are welcomed with heartwarming hugs by the staff who recognizes you and the ones you are about to get to know, - are just as kind, smiling, polite and very attentive. The attentive service at JW Marriott Khao Lak is unique and unlike any other hotel we’ve ever visited. A special thanks to Nuch and Poo who has always been incredibly serviceminded!

title: Wonderful!!!
review: Make sure you get a room on the bottom floor so you can jump in the pool from your veranda! Our family went on a 2 week trip to Thailand; Khao Lak, Chaing Mai and Bangkok. This resort was the absolute highlight for all of us! I traveled with my 17 and 20 year old boys. These ages are hard to please!  They made friends from all over the world! They played ping pong everyday with groups of kids, played tennis and mostly hung out in the pool (be sure to buy goggles and floaties before you get the resort. Expensive!) .  We went at a time of year when it was not crazy busy, which was awesome! We ate at a different restaurant every night, and all of them were amazing! My favorite was eating at the bar by the ocean. It was the least expensive and also nice to be by the water. One day…

title: Downhill since 2011 :(
review: Dear Bonnie K,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.  It was a pleasure to have you as our guests. We are delighted to know that you and your family have throughly enjoyed our facilities during your stay. We have 4 different restaurants, 2 pool bars, 1 lobby bar, 1 beach bar and 1 Deli – giving you a variety of options to try on during your stay, together with our special themed night dinners. We are proud that we could meet up to your expectations on the entire dining experience. The Beach bar is definitely many of our guests’ highlight where you are able to sip our crafted drinks and chill out with live music and stunning view.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon and wish you all the joys of the festive season. Please let us know if there’s anything we can do to make your next stay even a better one.   Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Okay - not a five star place
review: We arrived at this resort on 25th November for 12 nights. Before we booked this hotel we contacted Danny to arrange baby cot, steriliser for our room. At the point of booking we told Danny we had been to this hotel before and would appreciate an upgrade if there was one available and after a 're-assuring' telephone conversation we booked this hotel. After 24 hours in transit with our 10 month old we were promptly greeted on arrival and as soon as we got in was passed onto a member of check in team. The lobby was chaotic, the check in process was very much like a business type transaction - quick get your credit card out for the pre-auth! Whilst attending to us the check in attendant was serving other guests at reception. At this point, (45mins or so later) my baby was hungry so…

title: The staff make this place
review: Dear Raks21,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.  Thank you for your nice words about our room cleanliness and positive experience at Olive, our Italian restaurant, I will certainly let Chef Enzo know. We do believe associates compliments are the best motivation to keep providing a positive experience to our guests.  I am very sorry that we not able to upgrade your room to Pool access, unfortunately the hotel was running very high occupancy over the period. Whilst we always try to accommodate early arrivals, our regular check in time is 3 PM and we also have available our Late check out & early arrival lounge in order to enjoy the hotel facilities whilst waiting for your room to be ready. Please allow me to apologize if this was not clearly explained during the arrival process. As you have mentioned, our lobby was very busy on 25 November, due to a large group checking out on that day which may have inconvenienced you.    Please find below the silver elite benefits: -          Elite night credit earned on paid and redemption stays -          10% discount on Food & Beverage -          10 % discount on Laundry  -          20 % bonus points on base point earning -          10 % discount in our Quan Spa on A la carte menu -         Complimentary in-room Internet access when you book direct through Marriott -         Complimentary shuttle bus to the local Market   I was disappointed to hear about your experience in our deli outlet, however your feedback highlighted a number of areas  that I have since shared with our team for our improvement.  Our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences caused to you during your stay and if there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.     Raks21, we very much hope to welcome you back in the near future at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Five star quality and rest
review: The Hotel is really big, which is not always good. Anyway, they seem to have some special offers, hence you have "interesting" people at the beach and the pool - but that's not necessarily Mariott's fault.   We arrived at the Hotel and first thing we had to do is wait. I had to get our luggage out of the car, as no staff was around, neither did the staff in the lobby took notice (or felt the necessity to help). Not a big thing, but seriously, you are a five star place - this shouldn't happen. As we entered the lobby, we were greeted and checked in pretty quick, and - this might be a plus for some people - the gentleman checking us in spoke German.   We stayed at a room with access to the pool. The room was good, not modern, but nice and with everything you expect in a five star…

title: Busy Resort with many families with kids
review: My main reasons for booking JW Marriott was the pool, direct access to sea and the slightly lower prices that what 5 star hotels in Phuket charge. This property is isolated and it makes sense to rent a car if you want to go elsewhere from the hotel. Also, there are a lot of families with kids. The place must be on package tour operators list.  LOCATION  3 / 5 because of the remote location - for some a plus but a bit more restaurants outside the gates would be good.  JW Marriott is located 8 km north of more central areas of Khao Lak. It is some 3 km from the main road and there is nothing (except one small shop) on the road leading to the hotel. In fact it is bit of a surprise to find a property of this calibre and scale at the end of the narrow road. There are a couple of…

title: Extremely disappointed
review: Dear Timo R,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Thank you very much for your detailed review and for choosing us as your choice of destination resort in Khao Lak.   We are delighted to know that you had a great overall stay with us and that you enjoyed our range of facilities. It seems that the pool is the main highlight of your stay, and we are glad that you are able to take advantage of our pool access room where you can directly access our 1.93km-long lagoon pool at the comfort of your own balcony. Indeed, the pool access rooms in Wing 1 and 2 offer a bit more privacy with the views of tropical gardens along the area.   We appreciate your comments and will pass them on to the management team as part of the effort to continually improve our facilities and service excellence to make sure that our guests leave with nothing but lasting memories.   We hope that you will return to us again in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Wishing you all the joys of the festive season!   Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Number 1 resort in Khao Lak
review: This resort came highly recommended. On entering our room, it smelt musty and damp. After a day all our clothes were damp in the wardrobe, anything closed away in suitcases was fine. The resort staff on the whole were pleasant. The place was lovely but seemed to be under repair in a number of places. It was all due to dampness and mould. I have never had asthma in my life and 4 days later had to return to Phuket and ended up in hospital with a partially collapsed lung, bronchitis and asthma. I had the doctor called to our room twice in our 4 days of our 7 day stay. I had asked to be transferred to the Marriotts Phuket resort for the remainder of our stay due to illness and dampness. They refused and asked us to pay full rate to move. Pay for an extra 3 days and loose the 3 days…

title: Pure heaven
review: Dear Maddy S,  Thank you for contacting us and raising your concern. I am very much surprised to hear about the incident you are mentioning, it is normal practice to assist our guest when  hospitalization is required and we are  very flexible in emergency cases.     Safety and wellbeing of our guest is of the highest priority, please allow me to request you to contact us  directly at mhrs.hktkl.ays@marriotthotels.com so we can better understand and assist you with your request.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Nice hotel BUT they could have been more helpful
review: This was my return visit from last year, Has usual Thai hospitality is through out the start which is nice. I have noticed how they have improved from our last visit, The beach system has changed for the better. There are flags and board signs telling the safety of the day, that was missing form the last stay. We stayed in  pool view room on 1002, it was a great room, very well laid out with a good stone bath. The room was very clean with great flooring, bed is big and conformable, the room is quite cosy with a god seating area and a great outside sitting area with a view.  Breakfast at the hotel is great, if not the best so far I have had in Thailand. There is plenty of choice for everyone's tastes, I suggest the pancakes they are delicious in the bakery area. Staff our on the…

title: 3rd time the charm
review: This was our 3rd visit to this resort.  The resort is still fabulous, however we (11 of us, including 5 kids) felt that the service levels overall had dropped on this stay and would tend to fluctuate depending on who was serving you.  The waterfront restaurant was closed for major renovations, meaning that breakfast and lunch were served at either the Deli or Olive. The service at Olive was much better. We found that the Deli at breakfast was crowded and disorganized, the staff were rushed and there seemed to lots of miscommunication - often the desk at the entry was unattended and you just had to find your own way. Lunch was less busy, but meals never came together and again, the service was just lacking with wrong orders and missed orders common.  Quan spa was still excellent…

title: Fantastic holiday at a great hotel
review: Dear 2AD3CH,  We appreciate your continued support and loyalty for JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor. It is always our delight to welcome returning guests.  Please accept my sincerest apologies regarding the services you experienced during the stay. Please rest assured that I have shared your concerns with the management team to ensure that we work towards the goal of excellence and that every guest has a memorable stay with us.   Nevertheless, we are glad that you have a good overall stay and that you enjoyed our award-winning Quan Spa treatments. Our therapists are regularly trained and strive to ensure that guests leave with the utmost feeling of relaxation.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay a better one.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Management team JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Wow! What a place!
review: Our small family of four stayed here for 12 nights from Oct - early Nov and had a wonderful holiday.  We stayed in a pool access room near the kids pool and whilst the rooms weren't quite the 5* standard of hotels like those in somewhere like Dubai, they were clean and comfortable.  I would say they only require a little additional TLC to bring them up to 5* standard.  Kids club was small and in need of refurbishment, but our kids loved it, they had a daily schedule of activities to keep the kids busy and staff were great.  In fact staff all across the resort were fantastic.  The hotel location is a little isolated and you will require a taxi to get to town, but there are some local shops and restaurants within walking distance if you did fancy leaving the resort for anything. …

title: Some stars have lost their twinkle
review: Dear Anil J  Thank you for taking your time to share your feedback with others on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to know that you had a wonderful time during the 12 nights stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Our resort is truly a serene getaway  hence we are further away from all the clustered hotels and resorts in the bustling Phuket. We couldn’t be happier that you found our staff and services fantastic and that your kids enjoyed the various activities we offered at Kids Club.   Chef Mohan is one of our star associates who always goes above and beyond in making sure that our guests enjoy their stay. He is truly passionate and always has the guests’ interest at heart. We, as a team, are always happy to help guests with special dietary needs as we understand it is important especially when you’re away from your home.   We look forward to serving you again whenever your travels take you back to Khao Lak! Hope to see you again soon!  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A wonderful stay in a beautiful property with lovely staff!
review: Stayed here two weeks ago and absolutely loved it. Their attention to detail is faultless and I didn't want to leave. Would highly recommend a stay in this hotel and would go back in a heartbeat. It is located in a good area with plenty to see and do.

title: 3rd stay in paradise
review: We would like to thank you very much for the excellent service in the JW Marriott Khao Lak. Also our third visit to this hotel has us completely again thrilled. We felt like in paradise, no wishes remained open. Although the large restaurant was closed, both the "Olive" and the "Deli" restaurant did a great job. The breakfast was wonderful, we did not miss anything. On the contrary, the atmosphere was calm and relaxed. All dishes were excellent prepared and labeled. The quality was unbeatable. Also the theme menus were very good. We really enjoyed the evenings. Everyone does an excellent job. One feels that the staff likes to do their job. See you again next year.

title: A relaxing break in Khao Lak
review: Dear Peter S,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. It is always a pleasure to welcome back returning guests. Thank you very much for staying in our paradise resort, for your loyalty and your continued support in our JW Marriott brand.   We are thrilled to know that you had another memorable stay with us. Breakfast is truly one of the highlights of our resort and our chefs work hard everyday to ensure that we provide a large variety of high-quality food selection to start your day right. Our culinary team also strive to create meticulous dining experience by introducing themed night dinners so our guests can try different cuisines during the stay. I would have to say our themed dinners is popular not only to our in-house guests but also many others as well!   We couldn’t be happier to learn that our staff had exceeded your expectations and will definitely see you next year! Please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even more special.   Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: True 5 star accommodation
review: We enjoyed our stay at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak. We booked a swim out room and loved slipping in and out of the pool whilst lounging on the deck reading. I also liked the swim up bars and took full opportunity of happy hours!  We sampled all of the restaurants on site but we do enjoy eating at local restaurants and there are plenty in the area, it's easy to take the bus into the town. The staff were all very helpful and friendly. Plenty of options at the breakfast buffet, although it can get very busy. A great hotel, would definitely go back.

title: Excellent Stay in Paradise
review: Dear Spipit,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. We appreciate your feedback which is highly valuable to us.   We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our pool access room, which is one of the most fabvourite rooms in our resort. Our team works hard every day to ensure that the rooms and the pool area are kept clean and tidy for our guest to enjoy. Our happy hour offers change constantly to allow guests to try out different recipes crafted by our experienced mixologists. Our team of associates always strive to make every guest’s stay a memorable one, so it is truly wonderful to know we have met your expectations and provided you with such a great experience during your stay.   We definitely look forward to welcoming you back to our resort and serve you with our impressive hospitality.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Marriott Khao Lak... we love you!
review: Stunning hotel set on a beautiful beach. The hotel encompasses a massive swimming pool which goes all around the grounds 1.8km we were told and we swam part of it which was great! We were on the upper floor but if you can the swim up rooms looked great as you can just jump straight into the pool and swim to the actual pool area which is beach side. Staff from all areas were exceptional. Always stopping to greet everyone and this goes for all staff from housekeeping to bar staff and the front desk. Everyone speaks good English which is lovely. We dined in all 3 restaurants, Italian, Japanese and Thai and the food was great each time. Breakfast was lovely, with an egg station and a good choice of different coffees. Though this is a family resort it didn't feel like there were…

title: Great Stay - Thanks
review: We have just been fortunate enough to have returned from a 13 night stay at the JW Marriott and have thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and think that the hotel was “spot on” and hit all the right notes for us. The hotel lived up to our expectations and just enforces the previous positive reviews posted on TA about this hotel. Things got off to a good start as we had an early flight into Phuket and arrived at the Hotel early so the room was not ready, no problem there are late check-in/out facilities available that allowed for us to get a shower and changed into some beach wear, we were also offered a breakfast which was really welcome.  The Hotel is really nice and the facilities are hard to fault. The room we had (Pool access) had all the normally facilities you would expect and we…

title: What a gaff! Top notch
review: Dear Robert B,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Thank you very much for sharing your comments with others in TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us. Our pool access rooms are truly the highlight of our resort and I’m delighted that you are able to take advantage of it and able to jump right into the largest lagoon pool in South East Asia at the comforts of your balcony. We understand that many of our guests are travelling long hours to our dream oasis, so we make sure that we have dedicated areas so you can freshen up and get ready to enjoy your vacation here. It is also a pleasure to learn that you enjoyed our services as it is our goal to make sure every guest has a memorable stay here at the tropical paradise.   Khao Lak center is 15 minutes away from our resort and we provide shuttle service running from 11.00am - 9.00pm, departing every 2 hours with a minimal fee. Our nearby markets, Build Factory and Bang Niang Market, are highly recommended if you’d like to try out authentic Thai food, buying souvenirs and/or some local/ beachwear clothing.   We hope to welcome you back in the future, please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Incredible stay - will definitely be back
review: Been meaning to leave a review. I actually stayed here with my family 2 adults 2 children in Aug 2016. Sensational hotel, from what i understand it was ripped to shreds by the 2004 Tsunami. They have rebuilt it and its really good. We went for the swim up room, which the kids loved. giving them access to what has to be the biggest pool in the world?! its meanders round the whole complex with about 3 or 4 large pools attached to it. It really is something to behold.  Room was lovely and good sized, bathrooms ditto. Service, concierge and reception provided exceptional service. There is a variety of restaurants to dine at onsight. All providing excellent cuisine. Breakfasts was a well equipped buffet couple with great service. Poo was the standout waitress. There is a decent gym…

title: We had a great and relaxing stay
review: Dear Michael R,   Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you very much for taking your time to share such a great review!   We are pleased to learn that you had a wonderful experience during your stay with us. Our pool is indeed the largest lagoon pool in Southeast Asia (1.9km length) and it meanders around the entire resort. Many of our guests had great time doing a resort tour via the pool.    With regards to our restaurants, our chefs work hard everyday to ensure that we provide the highest quality of food and beverage offerings with a variety of different local, regional and international cuisines with memorable services. Our Recreation Club also provides all day activities for couples and family to enjoy your time in our resort, whether it be cultural learning class or health and wellness activities. Our local experts at the concierge are the go-to person and are always willing to recommend best places to visit around Khao Lak. There’s always something for everyone to do!   I have also passed on your kind compliments to our staff and they can’t be happier that you and your family enjoyed our facilities and services.     Thank you once again and we all hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak in the future.   Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Perfect family retreat
review: My family and I had an amazing couple of nights at this hotel recently. For a beachside property the resort is very well maintained and professionally presented - yet gives off a casual and holiday vibe as soon as you enter. The swimming pools were a highlight for us and really have to be seen to be believed.  We ate in the Thai restaurant one night and Italian the other night.  Both flawless service and delicious food. Our room was really well presented and staff went out of their way to accommodate our kids. I went for a run outside the resort one morning and encountered some local dogs that weren’t overly friendly but not aggressive either. We all felt super relaxed here and can’t wait to go back.

title: Relaxing,  beautiful resort.
review: As a frequent business traveller,  I'm usually wary of large chain resorts as I like a change from my business life to my holiday time.  I indeed, was pleasantly surprised here...   This resort deserves my commendation  based mainly on such lovely,  courteous,  professional and genuinely friendly staff.    The resort grounds and rooms are kept to a high standard and embrace Thai culture and architecture. The beach the resort is built on is lovely,  and there are multiple food and drink outlets throughout the resort to mix things up a bit throughout your stay.    Well be coming back here for sure. Thumbs up from me.

title: A great resort with a few creature comforts missing
review: Dear PaulCHongKong,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your holiday.    We could not be happier to hear that we are able to provide you with a memorable service during your stay. We understand that a majority of our guests have booked long stay with us, therefore our resort operates a number of restaurants and introduces special theme night dinners from local to international cuisines for a variety of dining experiences. We also pride ourselves in providing authentic experiences whether it be the local architecture to hospitality popular and unique for Thailand.    Please let us know should you return and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Thailand Paradise
review: Firstly it should b e noted that this is a great resort needing a few additions to make it truly memorable. We had as party of 5 rooms and the first negative was that it took us 1.5 hour\s to check in. The rooms when we finally got them were fine except when we plugged into the electic sockets some were olt working. The only space to put a computer was on the dressing table and to use it, one had to sit on a foot stool with no back support. There needs to be an office type chair, we requested a chair and a monstrous one was provided, it took up most of the walkinng  space between the foot of the bed and the dressing table. The pool is splendid winding its way through the resort and we took the opportunity of waking and swimming its  1.5 km length, The problem was getting out of…

title: Not 5 star as advertised
review: Dear balc90,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.    We would like to thank you for giving us a 5-star rating and sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. It seems that the pool is the highlight of your stay. Our infinity pool is the longest lagoon pool in South East Asia, and our staffs work hard to ensure that our pool is kept clean and our landscape beautifully sculpted. We are sorry to hear that there were some inconveniences at check-in and during your stay – please rest assured that your recommendations have been shared with the team as part of a continuing effort to improve our guest satisfaction.   Thank you again for your review, and I do hope to have the opportunity to welcome back on your return to Khao Lak.    Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful Resort
review: This was the most amazing experience. Absolute pure luxury. We obtained a deal through Luxury Escapes for this resort which was an all inclusive package. From the time you arrive to the time you depart you will experience nothing less than service excellence. The staff are wonderfully friendly and attentive to all your needs.There is nothing to dislike about this resort. From its spacious well appointed rooms, 1.9klm's of lagoon style pool, its amazing beach frontage and a choice of restaurants that will blow your culinary mind. All meals no matter what time of day are a gourmet experience. The children are very catered for as well including a kids club. All use of water equipment is fully included. The onsite massage facilities and services are to die for. Due to the location…

title: Sheer Indulgence
review: Enjoyed the 8 day Luxury Escape Deal with all meals, 8 massages included. Had the standard Pool View Room which was very nicely furnished and spacious. The whole resort is beautiful and the extended pool is amazing. We enjoyed the 3 restaurants, Thai, Japanese and Italian. The Waterfront was closed for renovations. Breakfast Buffet in the Olive and lunch in the Deli was also excellent. In spite of the resort being fully occupied, the spacious surroundings meant it never seemed crowded. Drinks are expensive but Happy Hour cocktails while watching the fantastic sunsets was well worth it. The staff are extremely helpful, polite and forever smiling. Easily the best hotel we have ever stayed in, and we have travelled extensively over many years

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear Apanie,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience on your recent stay with us. Here at our resort, we strive to be your home away from home, and we could not be happier to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed your time here at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  It seems that during your recent stay, our all-day dining Waterfront restaurant is under emergency maintenance; however, we are offering two alternative outlets for breakfast. Guests can select from Olive Restaurant and enjoy spectacular views of the Andaman Sea or have a cozy breakfast at Deli, overlooking Southeast Asia's longest lagoon pool. Our resort offers a variety of dining options: 4 choices of restaurants and café, 2 pool bars, 1 lobby bar and a truly stunning beach bar, which is perfect for sunset views.   The friendliness and service of our staffs is another highlight of our resort as we always put a personal touch to everything we do for our guests – and we truly appreciate your kind comment on this. It is our pleasure to have you with us and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Thank you and best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Awesome place for a dream holiday
review: This hotel is amazing, wonderful gardens, pool and beautiful beach.  The bedrooms had everything required, beautiful bathroom and such comfortable beds. Maid service and room service excellent.  Travelled with my two daughters and felt completely safe and made very welcome. Breakfast was amazing with dishes to satisfy everyone, restaurants and bars very good especially happy hour take advantage, my daughters loved trying the different cocktails. Restaurants were a bit expensive so try the many restaurants along the beach well worth it. Also go to the  night market in Khao Lak we caught a taxi (well back of a truck) outside the hotel gates, but they were very friendly and offered a good rate for a return. It was nice to see outside the hotel. The best trip we did was go to the…

title: Look no further
review: Dear Julie W,  Many thanks indeed for your wonderful review and the kind recommendation you shared on TripAdvisor. It is truly our pleasure to learn that we have exceeded your expectations in terms of our facilities, F&B offerings and staff services, and that your entire family had a memorable stay with us.   We appreciate your compliments about our rooms, gardens, pools and beautiful beach. Our team always work hard to ensure that everything is well-maintained for your ultimate tropical getaway experience.   Khao Lak is a destination with a lot to explore. Upon your next visit with us, we recommend you, besides the world’s famous Similan Islands, to venture out and visit our surrounding local attractions: Surin Island, Khao Sok National Parks, Chong Fah Water Falls, etc – and our Concierge team will be more than delighted to help you discover the local charms within short reach around the resort!    We certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you and best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort  Spa

title: Amazing Hotel for a relaxing getaway.
review: Amazing resort that is definitely 5 star luxury,  photos show view from our room balcony overlooking the 16,000 Sq metre pool with 1.6km of swimming canals alongside beautifully manicured tropical gardens. Also has its own private beach. Temp is 30 degrees in beautiful sunshine. Staff go out their way to make sure you are happy, we are still here now! Will definitely come back here.

title: Amazing and can't wait to go back!
review: Wow, what a trip. My husband and I just stayed here on our honeymoon and we couldn't have asked for a better experience. The resort is beautiful, the pool access room was a highlight. The choice of restaurants is great too! The staff and service are great here. Such a beautiful resort, so relaxing and beautiful and we can't wit to come back one day

title: Fantastic family holiday and base to visit Thailand
review: Dear Emma B,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We are very pleased to learn that you have thoroughly enjoyed the facilities and services in the resort. We truly appreciate your feedback and I will make sure to pass on your comments to our team, as this is what motivates us everyday to provide our valued guests a memorable stay.    We hope to have the chance to welcome you back again soon.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive   JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Tel: +6676.584.888

title: Second to none
review: Our family (including my sons 11 and 10) had a great family holiday in Thailand during half term. We really enjoyed the adventure that the Khao Lak/Phuket area offer during the day with the luxury and comfort of staying  at the JW Marriott. Food, rooms’ quality and amenities at the highest level. Great holiday!

title: A very enjoyable holiday
review: Dear Jomope,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for choosing us as your holiday destination. We are pleased to know that you and your family have enjoyed your time in our resort as it is our goal to make every guest's visit a memorable experience.   We do hope that we'll have the the opportunity to welcome you back in the future. Wishing you a pleasant day :)   Warm regards, Kalaya Wu Senior Marketing Communications Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa tel: +6676.584.888

title: Excellent
review: The JW Marriott in Khao Lak is fantastic and hands down, the best resort my family and I have ever stayed at! Extremely fun for all ages and the staff are incredible!   Thanks JW Marriott! See you next year

title: Real paradise on earth!
review: I stayed here on 16-18 Oct and this was my first time for me and my family. We chose Khaolak as it was more quiet, gave us feeling more relaxing and closed by Phuket (but wasn't busy like Phuket.) Moreover, Khaolak is way more easy to go to island like Similan which is just opened on 15 Oct so, for me, Khaolak is the best choice for family trip.   Staffs: their customer service is flawless. they were sooo friendly. No need to ask them for help but they approached to guests with enthusiastic smiley face. They always notice their customers and kinda know what we need.   Breakfast: Many choices, good quality, having both Thai and Inter breakfast. Now the resort splits breakfast restaurant to 2 locations. One is at 'Deli' by the pool and the other is at 'Olive' close to the beach.…

title: Almost 5 star perfect...BUT cigarette smoke :(
review: Dear Monsicha T,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing to stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and taking your time to share your fantastic experience with other travelers in TripAdvisor.   Excellence to read your feedback on your recent stay. We are thrills to know you had a comfortable stay and that you were very well taken care of by our team. We are delighted that you enjoyed our facilities and services including our friendly staff, delicious and variety breakfast, amazing pool access room and beautiful beach.Our goal is to go above and beyond our guests expectations.   All your feedback has gladly been shared with the whole team and we all hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R  Social Media executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Family Holiday
review: During check in I sat for approx 5 minutes and was not acknowledged.No eye contact,no greeting.I then got up and went to the toilet and returned.I looked around and saw three staff behind the counter all glued intently to their computer screens.I then glanced around for someone to assist or at least acknowledge me and a staff member said to me "Do you want to book a room ?" I then advised I had already made a booking and was waiting to be checked in and I had not had any service as was not happy.A supervisor then came to me to and provided me with welcome drinks and towels.I was then checked in as per usual procedure.Im not sure why I was not acknowledged on arrival? I have would have been happy with a greeting and a "we will be with you shortly" but received nothing.A very poor…

title: Family Fun
review: Dear Jetdownonit01,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us.  We are delighted to  hear that you have enjoyed our food and beverage offerings in our Olive restaurant and had a great time at the pool and surrounding areas.  We will make sure to let Chef Enzo Know.    One of our key priorities is to provide the highest level of friendly and courteous service.  I am very sorry to learn that the quality of service provided by our front desk staff did not quite meet your expectations. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the team in an effort to improve our arrival experience.    Thank you for letting us know the challenge with the smoking neighbours, as you have pointed out we have tried to assit you with alternative options however whilst all rooms are non smoking outdoor smoking is allowed.   Thank you  for your feedback that ultimately will enable us improve our service. Thank you once again for being a valued guest and we hope to serve you whenever your travels bring you back to Khao Lak.    Sincerely,   Luca Forges Davanzati  Resident Manager  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa   +66 76 584 888

title: Beach Bar
review: Firstly I want to say this hotel is amazing :)  Khao Lak Location:  Just a warning Khao Lak is not like Phuket at all. It is a quiet area and there is not much at all in the town. Markets are on roughly 3 days per week where you can buy  souvenirs, clothes and food but its very small compared to phuket.  You will need transport to get to the town as the hotel is too far to walk. It's roughly a 10 min drive into town, you can use the hotels shuttle service for 100 Baht each way per person altho our 2 year old was free. :)  My Husband was very disappointed with the lack of shopping but that didn't bother me as i was there to relax which i did :)  The Hotel:  This hotel is amazing!!! it has a massive swimming pool that winds around the whole resort. It has a kids pool sectioned off…

title: Exceptional
review: This was the third stay for us at this resort and as always, our stay was flawless!  The attention to detail and the superb customer service keeps us coming back time and time again. We had actually booked to stay 14 nights at another resort but after staying for an unsatisfactory 4 nights thankfully we managed to transfer and come stay at JW Marriott for the remaining 10 days of our trip!  The staff always are eager to talk and get to know the guests. They remembered our children’s names and made them feel special every morning at breakfast (special mention to Money from reception, Pearl from Waterfront and Pooh from the Deli; Pooh remembered us from the two previous years when we had stayed and gave my mum and kids a warm hug and “welcome back”). The ladies from housekeeping…

title: Lovely Resort
review: Dear Laulaubelle,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  It's always a pleasure to welcome you back and thank you for taking your time to write your recent retreat with other in TripAdvisor. I’m glad to read that you had a memorable holiday. The personal recognition for our team members Khun Money, Khun Pearl and Khun Pooh. I will definitely pass on your feedback to them and the rest of the team who were always ensuring that you felt like at home away from home during your entire holidays.   We look forward to be hosting you back in the future for another memorable stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Sincerely Yours,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fab hotel
review: Stayed on luxury escape 8 nights,  great deal with meals included all restaurant's were great especially loved Japanese restaurant and our chef Banana, lots of fun tricks.  Spa was also great and included.  Not a great amount to do in Khao Lak early October as trips out to the islands  don't start till 15th October.  Pool at resort was awesome.  Went to Phang Nga Elephant park which was awesome.

title: Fantastic resort, great beach, facilities and pools
review: Dear Littlemonkeys,  Thank you for taking your time to share your lovely experience with other readers in TripAdvisor. It was our pleasure to provide you with a memorable time during 8 nights stay with Luxury Escape. It's great to know that you enjoyed our Japanese restaurant. Thank you for your compliment to Chef Banana, I will pass on your compliment to him. We recommend a visit to the Build market and Bang Niang market where you can try the local Thai food, buy souvenir and clothes. We have many wonderful things to see on experience near the hotel as Chong fah waterfall, Sai Rung waterfall, or Tum Nang waterfall,  etc..   We hope that your memorable time here will entice you to return to us in the future.   Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R Social Media Executive J Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Chef's were rocking
review: Just come back from this amazing hotel we had 12 nights,breakfast was wonderful with a good choice Pooh who worked there was excellent and looked after us.Our taxi man who’s name was Joe was excellent he was our taxi first night he gave us his number and never let us down.Would recommend this 10/10

title: Almost, nearly, so close to 5/5 for families 🌴
review: Me and Husband travel with 3 Little’s (7, 9 and 11) - so here’s some things I learnt while staying at the Marriott:  THE GOOD: The Marriott Khao Lak is impeccably clean and tidy. Beautiful resort. Comfy beds. Big rooms. Great value.   The pool is amazing - our kids spent all day in there. So many zones and heaps of space for everyone (adults and kids alike)  Breakfast is epic. As in, E P I C 😝  Good set up for enjoying the beach and the pools - magical sunsets to enjoy with a cocktail or beer.   Free + reliable wifi.   Friendly staff.   THE NOT SO GREAT: The prophecy is true... The lunches and dinners on site are average and expensive. Highly rate Premrudi Thai just outside the driveway. Amazing food and good prices for large portions (contender for cleanest restaurant in the…

title: Fabulous Resort
review: Dear Ray G,  Thank you for sharing us about your recent stay with us. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the surrounding, comfortable room, and friendly staff. Please accept my sincerest apologies regarding the issues you had with the price of our lunches, dinners and laundry, our pricing is inline with other five star hotels and resort in surrounding areas. Thank you once again and we appreciate your kind words and recommendation.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to your home away from home.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Best staff. Best pool.
review: So highly recommend this resort. We are a family of three with an 8 yr old daughter we traveled with another family with two boys 8 and 11yrs. We stayed for 8 nights and I wanted more. The lagoon pool is sensational. We stayed in a room which accessed the pool directly from our deck - genius in design and heaven as a guest.    A day after we arrived there was an issue with our deck the wood had split and we needed to move rooms while they made the repairs. The staff and service was so good, helpful and efficient that it wasn't a bother at all and the duty manager sent us a bottle of wine and snacks for our trouble (it wasnt any trouble). Our new room was lovely.   Both pool bars are lovely. The Thai and Japanese restaurants terrific and the breakfast buffet offered many many…

title: Superb!
review: Dear Amber B,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Many thanks indeed for the wonderful review and the kind recommendations you shared with other readers of TripAdvisor. It's a great motivation to know when our guests enjoyed the experience of our hotel. We are so glad that you found our staff to be friendly and professional. Our goal is to above and beyond our guests expectations. We're delighted to know how much you and your kids enjoyed our facilities and attentive services. Our Spa has been voted as one of the top 60 Spa on Booking.com, and our spa therapist work hard to ensure that our guest leave with the utmost feeling of relaxation. We hope to welcome you back in the future, please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R Social Media Executive J Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Unbelievable Experience! Wow!
review: I went to 8 different hotels this September for a business trip and vacation. And this hotel had the best staff. Everyone is smiling all the time, very professional, and prompt. They speak English very well. I loved their attitude towards their work.  This place is very beautiful throughout the whole resort. The pools are great. It has the biggest pool in Bangkok hotels. Make sure you get the room that has pool access so you can swim from your room to other places.  Their breakfast is so good. So many selections and cook-to-order noodles. I would love to go back.

title: Wow!Thank you JW Marriott!
review: Wow! Very high standard hotel, the best we experienced. The hotel has an amazing beach, very impressive design, the rooms are large and well equipped, a huge pool (several pools), a number of quality restaurants, a quality children's area where you can leave the children to baby sitter and really feel safe about it. Extraordinary service courteous and pleasant. Maintenance and maintenance are very high. Definitely a hotel I would love to return to. Thank you very much JW Marriott!

title: Fantastic place!
review: Dear Eyal C,  Thank you for sharing your review with us. It is great to hear that we have exceeded your expectations including our rooms, pool, restaurants and kids club. It was our pleasure to take care of you and serve you during your stay with us and pleased to know that we fulfill your expectation. Thank you once again for your time and the excellent feedback  We look forward to welcoming you again.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fantastic Family Stay
review: Me and my boyfriend went to this hotel the first 2 weeks of January, we were very unlucky to have a week of rain, still the hotel was very nice.  We had to switch rooms after a couple of days, this was no fault of the hotel, more an incorrect description from TUI, hotel helped us so we could resolve the issue. I would say, try to get a room in area 3 or 4, this is much more cozy...  Breakfast was absolutely amazing! I could not ask for anything more, the buffet had everything I could ask for!   Eating lunch in the restaurant was ok, but as any hotel in Thailand, you get a better Thai meal in one of the local restaurants to a much better price. There are some nice along the beach, and also outside the hotel.  There is a very very nice restaurant called Blue mist, it’s a bit away…

title: Sprawling resort and fantastic pool facilities
review: Dear Maria J,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Thank you for choosing us as your vacation destination. We're delighted that your overall stay was enjoyable.  I appreciate your compliments to our friendly and helpful staff. I will be sure to share it  with the team who always work hard to ensure that they able to reach every guest's expectation. We're glad that you're enjoyed our cuisine. We have a themed buffet each night with food from different countries such as BBQ Buffet, Japanese buffet, Beef loves , Siam food (Thai buffet) or Kebab and Burry buffet.   On the resort we have a variety of activities to choose from including spa, boxing, tennis, bike tour, water sport or squash. For all mentioned activities advance reservation is required, please contact Recreation Centre.   Thank you once again and look forward to welcome you back.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Very good but can be better
review: I stayed here last month for a couple of days with my family.  The hotel is absolutely gorgeous and well laid out. The rooms are spacious, comfortable and well maintained. If you get a pool access room you can jump into the pool from your terrace. For kids they have a gate for security.   The staff is absolutely amazing. No matter if the receptionist, restaurant server, pool attendant or even gardener!  Food: The food is great at all restaurants, have tried them all (Italian, Japanese, Thai, Bars, Deli). They also organize special theme nights like BBQs on the beach which are really lovely. The breakfast spread is excellent. They even make all the breads and pastries in house and you can taste it!  The kids club is great and organized activities.  The Management is also visible…

title: Great Family Time
review: Stayed here all inclusive for 8 night. from Sydney was a hectic flight and 1.5 hr drive from airport to location but well worth it. we had a great time with the 10 year old and she loved the massive wrap around pool. Customer service was outstanding. The food was First Class to choose from 4 variety, Thai Japanese Italian and buffet.. a Great Stay for Anyone from Anywhere. will do it again.. and try the Spa. its great too

title: 2nd time here and just as good as remembered
review: Dear Ben R,  Thank you for choosing to stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and taking time to share your experience in TripAdvisor. We're glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with the all inclusive deal. It was our pleasure to take care of you during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Best Holiday Ever!!!!!!
review: This is our 2nd time here and just as good as we remembered. We even brought other family here who are used to Mexico high end resorts and they are in love with the tranquility, the service, the breadth of space and massive pool that is interconnected. Only two things bumped it from 5 to 4 stars. 1) main breakfast room is currently under construction making their breakfast offerings a little crowded and less impressive 2) they don't have a volume/headphone rule on phones and videos being shown in any public location, which ends up taking away from the tranquility when you're listening to a kids show on full volume or a FaceTime conversation three tables over.

title: Paradise for swimmers
review: Dear Sunyswimpurch,  It's our pleasure to welcome you back and thank you very much for your review of your recent stay at our hotel.
