Your feedback is very valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every stay. We're glad to received your comment about aspects of our service and the pool. I will pass on your kind word to our team.   It would be such a pleasure to welcome you back to our resort.   Thank you once again for staying with us and the feedback :)  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao La Resort & Spa

title: Best family holiday resort
review: So we had just stayed at the Amari Watergate Hotel in Bangkok for 4 nights and now we were going to see what it's like to stay in Phuket, so we picked one of the best hotels in my opinion the JW Marriott Hotel.  Right so let me start off with just one negative which is the hotel is around 2 hours away from the airport so if you wanted to go to Tiger Kingdom or the Phi Phi Island Tour, it will take you around 2 and a half hours each way. we thought we booked the JW Marriott which was 15 minutes away from the airport however we didn't realise we booked the wrong hotel and it was 2hours away. But make no mistake about it, it was the best mistake I have ever made lol.    So from the airport to the hotel this cost us around 1,300 Baht which is around £30.00 which is great. However…

title: Fantastic
review: Perfect holiday destination for families. This hotel is big but has been very thoughtfully designed. You never feel like you are surrounded by people as there are so many places to chill out. There are a few different restaurants to choose from and the Thai restaurant is very good. The daily breakfast spread is very good too. The lagoon pool that goes all the way around the hotel is lovely and there are enough locations around the pool for people to spread out. The beach is beautiful and the sunsets are to die for. We travelled with another family and we all had a great time. The day spa is well worth a visit.

title: A Paradise to come back for
review: Dear JamesSingapore2014,  Thank you for choosing our hotel, and for taking the time to write a review! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations. It really pleasure to read that you enjoyed every minutes with us. We do take everything to our guests’ needs the best way we can.   Thank you once again for your compliment and giving us a perfect rating !  We look forward to welcoming you again in the future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Just perfect ✔️
review: This time of the year ( September) is a low season of Khao lak but it didn't bother us though it's been raining. Sun shine through the cloud if you keep watching and we didn't mind the rain at all. We love it! I have come back here for the past 7 years and still love it!   The breakfast is still impressive and delicious. The pool is still as long as you can swim ( 3.2kilometers) without having to turn back.   Every morning we see the pool cleaners collect leaves and make sure the water is crystal clear. All plants and trees on the side are so lush from the rain and moist in the air.   The pillow and mattress is so soft that we just love it!the staff is super friendly and helpful.   The hotel separate the buildings between couple with no kids and family with kids which is good…

title: Wonderful place not to he missed
review: Dear Jimlimtravel,  Thank you very much for your recent stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and your kind words and positive comments. It is a great motivation to our team to know you enjoyed our facilities and services in the hotel even in the rainy season. Thank you for highlighting our Infinity pool. It is the one of the longest in South East Asia which nearly 2 kilometers long. Our staff always work hard to ensure that our pool is well maintained, and our tropical gardens are always beautiful maintained and designed. We're glad that the entire staff was accommodating during your stay and were able to leave a positive impression on you. Thank you once again for your wonderful feedback and your recommendations.  It was our pleasure to have you as a guest and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Best regards, Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: So beautiful 😍😍
review: I stayed here with my cousin, my first trip to Thailand, her second. We've both travelled extensively and we were looking for somewhere to relax and refresh. We didn't want action or adventure. This place was perfect! Every single staff member was so friendly, always smiling and stopping to say hello. From the front of house to the lawn mower!  We loved the pools, access to the beautiful beach, the amazing buffet breakfast and our room was really quiet and private. Everything was exceptional quality. We also used the gym, the spa and the bars/food service. There are a number of other small restaurants within five minute walk if you want local cuisine. 15 minute hotel shuttle available back into Khao Lak Central, but just the right distance if you want to feel like you're on a…

title: Highly recommend
review: It has to be the best place I have ever stayed at. The staff are so accommodating. The day spa was a highlight and the food was to die for. I highly recommend this place to people of all ages, even families.

title: Heaven! Highly Recommended
review: Dear staceedmonds,  Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your vacation destination and the positive feedback. We're happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and sharied your experience with other travelers.. We truly hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you once again.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Special Place
review: We stayed here as part of a large family group a week ago for a wedding. What an amazing place.   We booked in for 8 nights on a Luxury Escapes deal and were extremely impressed by the whole experience.   We checked in very late after a long but pleasant drive from the airport in the hotels van, we were greeted by their representative with a nice cold bottle of water and a cold towel, great introduction to our stay.  Check in was easy and pleasant, Our rooms were  wonderful, the A/C already on so a nice cool welcome. Cool room, comfy bed made for a great nights sleep. Daily breakfasts were at the Waterfront and were always fresh and plentiful.  Particularly loved the ever changing fresh Juices.  We enjoyed breakfast here everyday and found all the staff friendly and welcoming. …

title: Olive Restaurent
review: This is a very special Hotel with the longest swimming pool in Asia and wonderful beachfront vista. Check in was quick and the receptionist (Gift) was very helpful and allowed an early check-in. Room was spacious on the 2nd level with a pool view, nice balcony and very comfortable bed, all the usual amenities were available such as tea/coffee, mini bar and in room safe, multiple channels on the TV for all tastes and languages. Bathroom was spacious and well equipped, with plenty of hot water.  The Hotel has multiple in-house restaurants, Thai, Japanese and Italian, all of which are good and have special menus on different nights of the week, there is also pool and beach bars with live music in the evenings. The breakfast buffet was one of the best I have seen anywhere, with a…

title: Second Visit
review: Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Many thanks indeed for your wonderful review and the kind recommendation you shared with other guests. It is a great motivation for our team to know our guests enjoys our facilities in the hotel. We are glad to know you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for highlighting our bedroom, breakfast and staff. The entire team always try to make the guest's visit a memorable experience. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to your home away from home.  Thank you once again for your feedback  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing Hotel With Fantastic Grounds and Location
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa during a 2 week, multiple location stay in Thailand.  This hotel was the last leg of our holiday and was the "Beach" part.  The hotel is amazing with fantastic facilities and lovely rooms.   We had a pool access room which is highly recommended!  Top Tips: Make the effort to leave the hotel as Bang Niang is only a short trip away and well worth the time.  The prices are SO much cheaper as well and the market is brilliant fun.  Also try the beach bar and restaurant (Phen's Restaurant) just a round the corner from the JW.  You can walk it in 5 mins along the beach. Lunch was about £6 for 2 of us with drinks.  Absolute bargain and delicious!

title: Thailand Holiday
review: Dear Timeflies1980,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for taking your time to share your fantastic experience with other travelers on TripAdvisor. It was our pleasure to provided you a nice holiday during your 2 week stay. We're so happy to received your kind review and recommend u to other guests in TripAdvisor. Thank you for mentioning Bang Niang market. It is the market where has a lot of foods, souvenirs and clothes which is perfect if that's what you want. We are very happy to hear that you had a memorable experience in beautiful area around Khao Lak.  Please let me know should you have a plan to visit Khao Lak once again. We look forward to greet and welcome you in the future.  Thank you and have wonderful day ahead !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: An Amazing Resort - 2nd Visit
review: This is a first class hotel. The room was really spacious with the biggest bath I've ever seen. Loads of space to find a sunbed and the largest pool in Asia I reckon! The staff were really caring and attentive and the gardens and cleanliness immaculate.

title: Great destination
review: Dear  Thank you for taking time to share your experience stay in TripAdvisor.  We're so glad that you truly enjoyed your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. Our staffs would be delighted to hear about your positive review on their services. We truly pleased to hear you had a wonderful experience during your stay with us. Please let us know should you plan to visit Khao Lak again. We're waiting to welcome you as our repeat guests.  Thank you very much !  Best regards, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A beautiful resort with an incredible beach far from other hotels
review: We spent 10 nights at this fantastic resort mid August 2017.  The pool has to be the highlight which expands past most of the ground floor rooms.  We were lucky enough to secure a pool access room just opposite one of the pool bars.  The rooms are very clean, spacious and well furnished, with unobtrusive, friendly staff coming in twice a day to make sure 'all is well'.   The restaurants serve the most fabulous food.  Nothing was too much trouble for them to make you enjoy everything they had on offer.  The Italian cuisine at Olive was particularly good.  There were plenty of outdoor chairs and towels and umbrellas for everyone.  Although we did encounter a little rain it was fun to be in it and still be hot! Could not fault anything.  We hope we can go back for a 3rd  visit soon.

title: Awesome
review: Stayed here again. It is simply awesome. The rooms are nice, cosy and there is a light lemongrass diffuser which makes it even cosier. Beach access nice as well. It has a private beach. The swimming pool is like a landscape. You can simply relax and just do nothing. There are two-three restaurants around the hotel and one small convenience store. They have theme buffets for dinner. The price is ok. 25€ per head approx. Breakfast is outstanding as well.   Cant imagine anything negative.. oh yes. Too many geckos, but this is my personal issue lol

title: Mrs
review: Dear Hoodyni,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for taking your precious time to share your experience in TripAdvisor following your recent stay with us. Glad to read you had a great time at the hotel and enjoyed everything including our comfortable room, beautiful beach, variety cuisine and amazing Infinity pool. We certainly look forward to welcome you back in the future to another stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazingly relaxing week spent at this luxurious property
review: Can not fault the service. Extremely clean and very polite staff. Rooms are very clean and breakfast is very good with a very good variety.  Swimming pool is always very clean and the two bars in swimming pool do the best cocktails

title: Mixed experience - was expecting more from the Marriott
review: Just got back from spending a week with my family at this superb resort. They were kind enough to accommodate us with an early check in the day we arrived. The staff receiving us were extremely courteous and efficient. The room was well maintained and the amenities in the room were as advertised. The pool was well maintained. The beach access is very good and the beach is pristine. We only ate dinner once at the property. That was the beachside dinner buffet. The food could have been better that night. But wasn't bad at all! Overall, we had an extremely enjoyable week at the resort.

title: Best Ever
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott for 2 weeks in august and had a mixed experience. Hotel grounds are well groomed and the infinity pool was the hotel best asset . We stayed there as a family and had a pool access room which was the highlight of our stay. Our room was spacious and could easily accomodate the extra bed.  Hotel is far from all activities and the main road (2km with almost nothing around). As advertised by the hotel, there are several restaurants wihtin the resort and the hotel have a tennis court, squash court, fitness room... Check-in was efficient and fully handle by the staff when we arrived after a 10 hours filght and 1.5 hours drive from Phuket which has been greatly appreciated.  Unfortunatelly our experience went down a bit after that: Our first 2 morning at…

title: Fabulous
review: We are currently staying at this hotel and I must say it's beautiful. The complex is large and has 4 restaurants although at this present moment we have not experienced any of the restaurants yet, and a buffet breakfast that caters for everyone. The rooms are big and very very clean as is all parts of this fantastic complex.  The staff are very friendly especially Nana in the beach bar who always takes the time to speak to us. The checking in was very good as we arrived late evening and was glad to get into our room for a well earned rest.   This hotel has rooms which you can access the pool area directly from the patio area by stepping down two steps which leads directly into the water. There are no gates or anything on these rooms but for people who have small children there…

title: Had a great 50th at this awesome hotel!!
review: We recently travelled to this hotel with two other couples to celebrate my 50th birthday. Resort was fantastic- very friendly staff with great clean rooms. We booked through Luxury Escapes - our package included breakfast, lunch, dinner and six massages- great value. We selected the pool access room ( pool is awesome) room which was quiet and away from families with children. Food was fantastic, especially breakfast, staff made a big deal on the birthday night with cake etc. Thanks to Boy and his crew, plus Donald the entertainer in Olive restaurant for making the night memorable.Thanks to Enzo the Italian Chef for the great buffet night at Waterfront restaurant and the for the tour of the buffet with full description of everything that was on offer... Also dined at the Thai and…

title: Mixed Feelings
review: Dear WBE2016,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for taking your time to share your amazing feedback on TripAdvisor. We truly appreciate your positive comments and compliments.   We appreciate you choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak during your recent trip. We are glad to know that you had enjoyable and memorable experience with our cuisines, sport activities, spa, beach front as well as with our friendly and helpful staff. The personal recognition for our team member Boy, Donald, Enzo, Rook and Poo. We will surely share your feedback to our team who will be very happy that you enjoyed our services. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Thank you and have a good day.  Warm regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Excellent
review: We had a nice stay but there were pro's and con's:  Pro's: Pool is fantastic Gym and gym classes are great Food was good and plentiful The room is spacious and clean Staff are mostly friendly  Cons: The hotel is rather isolated and there are no co-ordinated activities or icebreakers that help guests connect with each other. It was bit like a cruise but with no entertainment director or other ports being visited. As the hotel is isolated one of the activities is a walk along the beach - we found in both directions that there were packs of dogs in the beach that were a little territorial and aggressive and so we didn't feel comfortable or safe continuing to walk - another issue that made us feel a little holed up in the hotel.  As I read in another review the staff seem to be…

title: Very large hotel with great breakfast
review: Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the overall stay here.   Thailand is renowned for its warm, polite and friendly hospitality and we pride ourselves in being ‘proud hosts’ for our guests. ‘Wai’ – the act of bowing and putting hands together – is the local way of greeting and is simply saying ‘Hi’ in Thailand. It is cultural. Please rest assured the well-being of our valued team of associates is a key priority for our resort management team. We take care of our associates and they will take good care of our guests.  We appreciate your comments and suggestions on things to do within the property. In order to keep our guests entertained, our Recreation Club offers a variety of private and group programs for kids, adults and families which include health and fitness activities, cultural learning, as well as short trips to local attractions nearby. Guests are welcomed to register to join available programs (most of them are complimentary) where you have the opportunity to meet others and enjoy the activities led by our highly experienced team of professionals.    At JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa, it is our goal to make every guest’s experience an exceptional one and we do apologize for the inconveniences you have addressed. Your comments have been well noted and shared with the team to continuously improve the quality of our service. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit. Please let us know if we can be of your assistance in the future.  Sincerely yours, Kalaya Wu Senior Marketing Communications Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa +66 76 584 888

title: Our favourite resort
review: This is our favourite resort. We have been here twice and we are planning a third visit. I proposed to my wife there on our first visit (March 2016) and then went there for our Honeymoon (Dec 2016).   The service and staff are excellent. Always friendly and willing to help.   Food:  Food here is generally excellent. There are many breakfast options in the buffet, with a variety of styles of food. All of what I tried was good and even their coffee was decent which can be hard thing to find when travelling.  Lunch options again hit the spot, they have a slimmed down menu which seems to have a little bit of everything from Thai to western - and one of the best Indian curries my wife has tasted. For dinner we ate at the resort most of the time and would generally prefer either their…

title: Fantastic experience!
review: Dear Jon P,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your honeymoon destination and taking time to write and share your recent stay in TripAdvisor. We very appreciate your support as our returning guest. It is such a great pleasure to hear that you and your loved one had an enjoyable time with us. We are so glad you enjoyed the spacious rooms and facilities- found the delicious cuisine. Our infinity pool is undeniably one of our highlights and most of our guests enjoy it.   We look forward to welcome you again and enjoy our pool access room.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Absolutely stunning
review: A truly great experience, the hotel is beautifully maintained, huge swimming pools, great location, the staff are very accommodating and extremely friendly. The room was beautiful, very clean, large, very well equipped, with power points for all devices and excellent wifi (which is very unusual in hotels I have found). The bed was super comfortable as were all the amenities, the bathroom was huge and they offer great complimentary toiletries. All in all a great stay and we would totally recommend this hotel!

title: 8 nights of luxury
review: Dear DorIreland,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak esort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your vacation destination and taking time to share your feedback in TripAdvisor. We're glad that services and facilities meet your expectations. Our team work hard to provide the best quality and service to every guest to ensure that they leave us feeling happy and relaxed.  Please let us know if you any plan to visit Khao Lak again.  Yours Sincerely, Hataichanok R Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A fine resort in the Land of Smiles
review: What a beautiful hotel! Everything about this hotel was lovely. The swim up room was to die for, the staff were so polite, the food was great especially the breakfast buffet. Easy Access to pool and beach. So sad to leave

title: Superb!!!!
review: First class 5-Star resort right on the beach at Khao Lak. Stepping out of our car, it was clear that we were staying in a 5-Star establishment from the treatment we received. Amazing lobby. Fab facilities. Great room and ace outdoor day bed situation. Pool incredible with 2km's of lagoons and private adults area part.   On that note - they have spots that are "Adults Only" - badly needed, and perfect for peeps like us, however the hotel needs to make sure they enforce the rule!!!!!!!!  Food was excellent and I've never personally experienced a breakfast like it - extraordinary selection of food!!   Also great little local restaurants and bar, and massages next door.   Excellent range of activities too, from yoga, Pilates plllllease, Thai Boxing, Meditation etc. so great way to…

title: Amazing staff and service
review: We went here on a family vacation after hearing good things about this hotel. And they were not wrong. The staff was incredible and so polite. The breakfast was delicious with a wide variety of food which is always nice. The restaurants had very nice food but were quite expensive. The pool was very nice but the reason you should visit this resort is the beach. The pool bars were one of my favorite things with the trip since they had mocktails as well as smoothies and fresh juices and not just soda which is usually the thing I have to order since I can't drink alcohol.  The spa was beautiful and I recommend the Indian scalp massage. They even brought us tea and banana crisps after me and my mother were done with our massages. Overall a nice experience and good location.

title: Fab resort but note re kid-free areas...
review: Loved our 3 nights here last week. Room was a good size & well appointed (if a little tired) & we particularly loved the balcony day bed. The grounds & pools were magnificent & the breakfast buffet outstanding. The activity program was fantastic...thanks to the yoga/Pilates instructor...he was wonderful...sorry, I can't remember his name. My only complaint is about enforcing your own "rules". You had very clear signs for a section of the beach to be "over 12's", yet screaming kids were allowed & staff even served water to the parents without saying anything! When I pointed out the over 12 "rule" (as we specifically chose this property for its kid-free areas) I was made to feel like a bad person, so left the area as I then felt uncomfortable. If you make rules, you need to…

title: Relaxing holiday
review: We stayed here June/ July for 8 nights on a luxury escape package. As we had been staying a another resort on a luxury escape package we asked to change our airport pick up to an airport departure to which they agreed which was great.  Check in was efficient and we were in our room in no time at all. The resort is quite large so lots of walking done to get to all the facilities. As the resort was pretty full we were advised to book a table for dinner each night which we did.  As all of our meals were included in our package we did stick with this. First night was the Japanese restaurant which was a disappointment using the Luxury Escape menu. I ordered noodles with vegetables ....but alas the only vegetable was cabbage! Not great.  Our next night was the Thai restaurant. On…

title: Amazing family holiday
review: Stayed 8 nights with hubby and two kids, bought a package which included meals, massages and a few extras. It was value for money. We had a pool access room near one of the canals, it felt more private than the ones near the slide where most families stay. The room was clean, comfortable, and well-stocked throughout our stay. Kids loved having immediate access to the pool. The pool and gardens were immaculate with staff tending to them throughout the day. Visited during low season which meant the hotel was not at capacity, which was great for us, but the beach was not safe to swim in. The buffet breakfasts had an impressive international selection including many of the local fruits, enough to cater to the fuzzy eaters in my family. Tried all 3 restaurants, bars and deli, each…

title: Fabulous resort
review: Booked a Luxury Escape package for this Marriott and love it (although would love it even more if the weather improves). The facilities are excellent. The staff is fantastic.Although somewhat isolated, they keep prices of drinks and food very reasonable. Breakfasts are a feast. There is the big breakfast area where it's noisy but if you don't like that you can go next door to the kids free quite zone. Our deal - and it seems from most guests - includes meals. The restaurants have a special menu for guests with meals included which includes a limited but good choice of appetiser, main and desert. We are particularly impressed with the food at Olive the Italian restaurant. So in spite of the lengthy rain periods we like it here and we're impressed with how the resort is managed…

title: Loved every minute
review: Been in Thailand many times but first time in Khao Lak. Stayed in Marriott for 5 nights with my husband and 2 kids (4 year old and 1 year old). We had booked a normal room but when we arrived at the hotel we asked to upgrade the room for a pool access room as they looked so nice! It was a great decision and the whole family enjoyed our room so much and spent so much time in the swimming pool. I've travelled a lot and stayed in many 5 star resorts but this stay was probably the overall best stay we had. Everything about it was great. The service, the room, facilities, the beach and food was great. The food is expensive but you have a few super cheap options right next to the hotel. The Thai restaurant on the road next to the hotel had the best Thai curry I ever tested! The…

title: fabulous family getaway
review: We have stayed in the resort after spending 5 nights in Karon and really enjoyed the place. There's plenty of activities for all ages, free bicycle hire for 1 hour, table tennis, pool, great kids club, solid gym and exercise programs, etc. etc. Buffet breakfast is absolutely sumptious, offering huge variety and exceptional quality, easily the best we had. Rooms are well appointed and comfortable, so are the beds. Hotel offers pillow service as well. Great and helpful stuff. Only 2 remarrks we could make - while resort is very well maintained some of the wooden items in the room and around (like doorframes, etc) are worn out and in need of refurbishment. On the higher floors when raining the water gets all over balconies as there's not enogh cover

title: Two visits not enough!!
review: Dear Igrr,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  We truly appreciate that you share your experience while staying with us. We are pleased that you enjoyed our all facilities and activities. I'll surely share your feedback to all department to continuously improve the quality of our services. I am glad to know that we gave you so much satisfaction. Looking forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: The most incredible holiday
review: My wife and I have celebrated two consecutive wedding anniversaries at the JW Marriot Khao Lak resort and enjoyed it immensely so much we would love to go back next year! We have enjoyed the 8 day and the 10 day packages. Both times we were greeted with a happy anniversary mud cake that always impresses. The staff at the resort are at all times friendly and smiling no matter where you are or what you are doing such as walking to breakfast or ordering from a bar. When you arrive you are greeted with personalised service and a welcoming drink while you check in. This certainly helped us relax considering we had taken approx. 90 minutes to arrive from the airport.   The breakfast at Waterfront is outstanding and there is a lot of variety offered. I always asked for a window seat as…

title: We loved it. Except !!!!!
review: We have had two stays at the resort and really enjoyed our time there. I regret not posting this before as the staff and facilities are exceptional. Unfortunately our experience over the last few days, eight weeks after leaving the resort has soured. When we left the resort in June we settled our account before we left. In August our visa account was again debited with the amount we paid when we settled. I have phoned and emailed the resort to get reimbursed but it has been a long process with me even having to send a copy of my visa account so they could see the transaction. I would have thought there accounting system would have been better than that. They are unfailingly polite but this even frustrates me more because they just don't seem to understand that this is not…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Vickiroe,  My sincerest apologies for the inconvenience and confusion  caused regarding the credit card payment upon your departure.   I have become aware of the situation on reading your review so thank you for reaching out to me ….. you are most correct, the team should have escalated the issue to me, so I once again apologize for your frustration. I am not sure why you have not been provided my contact details so please allow me to look into this internally as our team are very clear that if guests feel they need to escalate, I'm always here to help. Eight weeks is simply not good enough on our behalf.  The team will be reaching out to you today with regards to updates and please rest assured we will get this sorted out for you so once again my apologies.  Vickiroe, thank you again for your valuable feedback and we really do hope you return for a third visit.  Best personal regards,  Luca Davanzati Resident Manager

title: Beautiful we loved it
review: For family and couples that want luxury. This is the place to be. Beautiful pools, unbelievable hospitality, amazing breakfast.  The only draw backs are the expensive restaurants located on the premises and despite being a luxury hotel, many basic things are for additional costs (even things at the kids center).  All in all a wonderful resort and I would definitely return.

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear 4U2Smile,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for your valued time to share your kind review in TripAdvisor.  We are glad to know that you enjoyed our services and facilities. It has been a great pleasure to have you stay with us.   It would be a pleasure for us to welcome you in the future   Sincerely,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Wonderful!!!
review: We've arrived at the JW Marriott, wasn't sure what I'd think of the large chain hotel.  We stayed Bed & Breakfast in a family room.  The rooms a perfectly adequate a comfortable king size bed with two additional beds for the kids. The TVs allows you too attach your own device if you've uploaded movies on your laptop etc.  The shower has enough force to push the head and spray from vertical to horizontal by itself.    Breakfast was fantastic choice of Coffee's milkshakes, smoothies juices I imagine that anyone's tastes are catered for. The breakfast buffet again had a huge selection of pastries crepes, build your own soup noodles with at least 20 things to choose from a lot appealing for south East Asians(this option replaced my trusty Full English)  Eggs are cooked to request,…

title: Very nice resort
review: This resort is very nice and quiet, there is a direct access to the beach. The service is great, and the breakfast is excellent. The only thing is that the room is a little bit old, but it is still very comfortable and clean.

title: My stay so far
review: Dear Santi J,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Thank you for taking time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. We are pleased that you had memorable your whole stay and found room comfortable and clean. We do apologize for your comment regarding the room. Normally, we renovate our hotel's rooms and bathrooms every year. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Khao Lak. Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resrt & Spa

title: 5 star property and service.
review: Staff are so friendly nice and are always smiling! When I arrived and entered the reception they made you feel very welcome and relaxed,they provided cold towel and a drink! Rooms are incredible! The bathroom is extremely lovely, and you get a good view,parts of the lazy river/swimming pool. The facilities are extremely good there is a cafe which is nice but a bit pricey! Having a lovely stay and I'm sure will come back again soon.

title: Lovely Marriott hotel in Khao Lak
review: Dear Dbkev,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for staying at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. We appreciate your positive feedback that you shared to another on TripAdvisor. We're so glad that you have been impressed by the quality of the services provided and the helpfulness of our staff. We're thrilled you loved our facilities including room, pool and café. We look forward to welcome you in nearly future.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing Holiday!!!!! Couldnt be better!!!
review: We stayed at the JW Mariott Khao Lak for two nights. The property is far more stunning as compared to the website pics. Calm, clear and sandy beach (as in no coral or shells) Happy hours at the beach bar. All ground floor rooms connect to the unending winding pool. Fruits served to your room during the day. Beautiful big rooms. Widespread breakfast with an amazing variety for all nationalities and tastes. Attentive and polite staff. Our 3 year old fell sick and the nurse on duty was the first to prescribe the right medicine. Wish we had more time to spend at this property. Hope to go back someday. Infact we found the price paid for the hotel and the food out here cheaper than the equivalent hotels in Phuket. The most convenient was the Deli .... it's located near the kids club.…

title: Khao Lak Marriott
review: This is the ideal place for a resort-type holiday. I stayed for eight days with a group of friends. It is a beautiful place. The rooms were spacious and we had a lovely balcony overlooking the moat/swimming pool which wends its way around the resort. Our package included spa treatments and meals. Breakfast was an amazing buffet. The spa was lovely with a beautiful rest area for meditation. The spa staff were delightful. In fact, we found all the staff to be friendly and helpful. In particular, manager Palm was very helpful and charming. Just to the left of the beach were some beachside massage huts which, I think, are privately run. The foot massage I had there was the best ever. This is the second time we have visited the Marriott at Khao Lak. For all its size, it is remarkably…

title: What a Place !!!
review: Dear Gnatsky,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for taking time to write your wonderful feedback on TripAdvisor. We are very happy that you found our staff helpful and friendly. The personal recognition for manager Palm delightful to read as well. We are pleased that you found our rooms comfortable and spa relaxing. It seems like our Quan Spa is one of the main highlight of your stay with us; Our Spa has been voted as one of the top 60 Spa on Booking.com, and our spa therapist work hard to ensure that our guest leave with the utmost feeling of relaxation. We are delighted to read that you continue to enjoy our resort and planning to come back again  We hope to welcome you back in the future as our third times guest !  please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fun Fun Fun😎😎😎
review: What a paradise. We stayed here from 26th till 30th July 2017.   Initially we planned to visit waterfall, night market, city center but much to our surprise we stayed entire 5 nights in the resort itself.  Nice experience when we were checking, nice room overlooking private beach.   What a pool and nice selection of restaurants.  Choices of breakfast are endless and the food tastes great too.   A good fitness center with variety of outdoor sports.  We did cycling tour one day and one day we played Tennis along with Squash / Table tennis. Nice business center too, in case someone wants to clear work emails.   Simple routine entire 6 days. Get up 7:30 In the morning… walk around the private beach.. Have breakfast at 9. Jump In to the pool at 11:30. Sun bathing at 1:30… Spa at…

title: Khao Lak Marriott
review: Bloody Awesome!!!!!! Staff amazing, rooms great, swimming pool the best ever!!! Don't be mad and miss this opportunity to enjoy life, even if it cost a little more... The breakfast will last through the entire day and then try the heaps of places to eat and shop close by😎😎😎😎

title: An excellent family holiday
review: Dear Miss/Mr,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  We appreciate that you enjoyed many aspects of your stay. We're so happy that you found the perfect holiday and enjoyed the facilities and service of our staff.   Please let us know should you plan to visit us and we look forward to welcome you again as our repeat guest.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great family resort
review: Just checked out after 6 enjoyable days at the Marriott. If you are looking for a fun and extensive family resort then this is probably the place for you. The pool is genuinely incredible and you can spend many hours just working you way round and round the resort. We'd recommend bringing or buying an inflatable or two! The rooms are very nice and we'd certainly recommend a pool access room. Our preference would be rooms in blocks 2 or 1 which have more foliage giving more privacy and just a nicer feel. We felt blocks 3,4 and 5 were more exposed and not as pretty.   Restaurants and bars were good. Staff were very friendly. Beach is very pleasant and you can walk for miles in each direction.   On the beware side - it is a huge resort and caters for a lot of people. It doesn't…

title: Second visit even better
review: Dear EricPDC,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with other travelers on TripAdvisor.  We are very grateful to know that you had a memorable and enjoyable time with our paradise resort. Thank you for your recommended regarding Pool Access Room. Pool access room is recommended from every guests. We always continue to encourage our staff to smile and continue their service excellence.   We are looking forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back for your future stays in Khao Lak  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Holy moly! What a place!
review: Staff in all areas were friendly, happy and helpful Our room was always clean, of very good standard and nice and cool (good air con) Pool access room this time. Great choice - never left the awesome pool.  Resort activities have improved and no reason to go elsewhere. We did tours 2 yr ago.  Luxury Escapes package is wonderful value - understandably fewer choices at meal times but with 4 dining options it was of no bother.  Our 4 x 45 min spa treatments each sensational! Watch your spend on alcohol - the wine is very pricey (import duty etc) but if you take advantage of the happy hours it's ok.  Watching young families having a ball here at the resort makes us wish we'd brought our own a few years ago.  All in all another totally relaxing and excellent holiday at a fantastic…

title: Meh – There are better places to stay
review: Dear Sally S,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you so much for taking the time to write your wonderful Luxury Escapes package experience in TripAdvisor. We are truly glad for the great compliment to our property and highly appreciate your feedback regarding our staffs and services. Thank you for your recommend our Lagoon Pool Access room. Our Pool Access room is surely a treat to be able to directly access the pool at the comfort of your own room.   We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you to visit our paradise hotel again.  Thank you an best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Returned two years after our first visit.
review: You get what you pay for. We were blown away by this hotel. Check in staff were friendly from the get-go and our room was overlooking the pool in an adults only area and had a beautiful day bed. The whole resort is just absolutely stunning and huge. I recommend you get up early and secure a day bed for tanning by the pool down by the beach though because they get snapped up quickly.  The breakfast was beyond anything I could have imagined, there is nothing you can't get.  My only complaint is that when the staff told us about the hotel shuttle to Khao Lak town, they didn't mention you needed to pre book or pay 200 baht return each. That is an extremely steep price when you can fit 8-10 people in one bus! It's a money making ploy that you have no other choice but to accept…

title: Relaxing Family Holiday
review: Had a great time at the Hotel. Staff were friendly and helpful. It was impossible not to relax. The pool was fantastic. There is a kids pool but the main pool is all over the resort making it fun to explore. Sitting on deck chairs looking out at the beach was wonderful. The staff would come along with glasses of iced water, a nice touch. There was a well equipped gym and a kids club. Breakfast was very good with a huge selection for all tastes. The 3 restaurants were good but the Italian restaurant Olive was our favourite. There are only w few restaurants along the beach but they were nice enough. I would definately go back.

title: Stunning resort
review: Dear fullcircle2017,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for your review in TripAdvisor. Your feedback is highly appreciated. We're delight to know that you enjoyed and found the wonderful experiences with us. We thank you for your compliments regarding our amenities and facilities. Our staff work hard every single time to make sure that your are getting the perfect and wonderful experiences.  We hope to have a chance to welcome you in nearly future.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Very good. I just couldn't give it 5 stars.
review: This was a gorgeous resort with the most fabulous, and biggest, resort pool I've seen and the staff were amazing. The breakfast buffet was great and the lunches ok but I have to say we were very disappointed by the food quality at all 3 of the dinner restaurants. Otherwise would've been an easy 5.

title: HOLIDAY
review: Dear Montford1,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khoa Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your destination resort and thank you very much for your kind words. We're pleased to know that you enjoyed staying with us. We also appreciate your highlight our restaurants. It is one of the best highlights on our property. Our chefs work hard to ensure that they work hard to provide a large variety of food selection and always take a good care and make sure you're getting enough high quality foods.   We all look forward to your return in nearly future.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: Had a great time at the JW Marriott.   Went with my brother and his girlfriend, with my wife. And we had a luxury voucher style booking. Room was good, but the fixtures were a little dated. They probably couldn't help it but there was a real feeling of damp that permeates through the rooms.   Beach was good but not unreal. It's a weird break there on the beach but there isn't much going on from a surf perspective.   Food was just getting good. There wasn't a lot of the food I was dying to come back and have. It is the hard part of doing ratings.   The room was 4 stars.  Food 3 stars  Resort facilities - 5 stars.  Service - 5 stars  Price 4 stars   Depending on whether you want to spend more time in the resort or not would determine whether you book here. You can get better value…

title: Average
review: The customer service sucked. Don't buy their zip lining tour it's not safe Mosquitos in the balconies  Food : the waterfront restaurant doesn't have too many options  Thai restaurant is better  Far from everything  They lost our credit card authorization twice and then kept forgetting to update the system with our payment information   Overall a waste of time for us, regret staying there

title: Highly recommended
review: Dear Anjana G,  Thank you for the review. I sincerely regret to learn of your disappointment during the stay with us. Please accept my sincerest apology for not having delivered the best experience for some reason.  You have addressed the feedback after the zip lining tour which was under the impression so that our concierge team have immediately investigated with the tour operator and we were offered the discount which have been applied into the outstanding prior departure. In regards to the waterfront restuarant where is mainly breakfast venue with full range of the buffet breakfast choices and we do offer some theme night dinner so I was wondering if you meant any meal period however we are glad to hear that our Thai cuisine is one of your favorite during stay. I have investigated the credit card issue and I found there was misunderstood and unclear communication between the payer and the hotel team which caused your inconvenience and I clearly understand how was the disturbance so please accept my sincerest apologies once again for this matter. I do believe that the issue being sorted prior your departure. Thanks again for sttaying with us.  Best regards, Mee

title: Luxury at paradise
review: We have two nights left of our eight night luxury escapes package and will be very sad to leave. This place has been amazing, we have been travelling with three generations of one family and friends, and everyone has loved it. There is lots to say, so here is the summary! Upgrade to pool access very worthwhile.  Consider bringing blow up pool toys if you have kids with you Loved all the restaurants, booking ahead very worthwhile Make sure you get out of resort and do some tours Spa is divine, again, make sure you book as soon as you can Small shop just outside resort great for cheap snacks, drinks and ice-cream Visit local market, open three nights per week Staff are just wonderful, very friendly and very helpful We had a wonderful time even though I was worried about it being…

title: Gorgeous resort, stunning pool, memorable family holiday
review: Dear Emmatt24,  Thank you for sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to know that our services and facilities, all added to the enjoyment of your stay. We appreciate your kind words about our helpful team and I'll surely share your comments to the team.  We look forward to seeing you again for your another memorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Great Hotel on a Beautiful Beach
review: We are in our second day of 7 nights stay at this awesome property.., being a long time Marriott rewards member and traveled to several jw Marriotts around the world including the jw Marriott mai kao north of Phuket... this property ranks in the top 5 . If you are looking for relaxation.., this is the place .. the spa is a must ... I mean you really must try. We tried the Thai restaurant it was ok ... tried the Sakura restaurant it was very good.  I'll have more to say after few days.

title: Below expectations
review: We booked this hotel because of a wedding which we attended. Location wise this hotel is very isolated and there is nothing nearby unlike Phuket where you can do a lot of activities outside the hotel. The spa and salon were fully booked a week in advance hence we couldn't get any massages or hair services.   The room was well below expectations. My husband and I were given 2 single beds joined together with the crack in the middle and two overlapping blankets as a "king bed". The air conditioning and tv didn't work. The bathtub was dirty and the shower water temperature constantly fluctuated making it very uncomfortable.   The service was also very poor at the pool bar and beach bar as staff seemed overwhelmed with the number of people at the hotel.   Compared to some of the…

title: Very nice!
review: Dear Shilna S  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.   I am very sorry to hear that your guest room was below what you had anticipated.  Our Front desk team had offered you a twin Bedded Room to accommodate your early arrival after 11 am, ahead of our regular check in time of 3 PM.   A King Bedded room was available at that time however we did could not get in touch with you to move you into the correct room. Please accept our apologies for this issue.  Khao lak destination is known for natural beauty, waterfalls, beaches and its numerous national parks surrounding the property. There are limited shopping facilities in this area however there is a local night market 3 times a week and once a week at the hotel.  There are a number of facilities at the local village and our concierge can arrange transportation for you with a fee.   We do understand your frustration with the Spa being fully booked on that day, we certainly could have arranged a treatment for you on a different day or at nearby facility with complimentary transport, Please allow me to apologize for this situation.    Our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences caused to you during your stay and if there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.     We very much hope to welcome you back in the near future at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Beautiful beach and brillant pools
review: Had a great stay here, pool is lovely, food was great. We had a pool access room, was was clean and very spacious. Shame kids club closes at 7pm every night Deli lady's were lovely made the best coffee.  Breakfast had ALOT to choose from.  Would stay again.

title: AMAZING!!!
review: Dear Naomi S,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for your feedback. We are truly delighted that you enjoyed our facilities and services. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Lovely hotel but ........
review: We stayed five night at JW Marriott in July. There was fourteen of us staying together.   Positive reason to stay here, Amazing looking resort. Soon as you arrive you can tell the pool is one of a kind straight away. Then you go to the beach it is very clean and I can truly say one of the best beaches in Khao Lak. We loved swimming in it. Breakfast was great so large and so many choices. The active area was very well run. The gym classes were like the ones I do at home instructors should be rewarded. The kids club good. Also waterslide very good.  Negative things about this resort, The resort isn't great for older people if you stay on the top leave as only stairs no lifts. The staff are lovely around resort but more staff needed for the amount of people staying at this resort.…

title: Fantastic resort
review: My wife and I stayed here for 10 nights, on our first trip to Thailand. The resort offers separation from families with kids from people who just want to kick back and relax. The gardens are beautiful designed and manicured to perfection. Staff are cleaning pathways and facilities daily, taking great pride of their work while stopping to greet you as you walk by. Food-wise we enjoyed great quality Thai, Japanese and Mediterranean cuisines in the in-house restaurants as well as a huge variety of breakfast options. With four bars scattered around the resort and pool, and their 2-for-1 and happy hour offerings we were kept sufficiently "relaxed". The pool is about 3 kms long and perfectly clean with about a third of the rooms offering pool access. The spa? Awesome, with many…

title: Cattle class
review: Dear Kostas W,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  We are delighted to know that you had an amazing time during your 10 day stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak. We are extremely happy to know that we were able to live up to your expectations and had a memorable experience of our staff, cuisine, beach, pool and spa services.   We hope to welcome you back in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Direct pool access can't be beaten
review: Don't stay here, there are so many beautiful and affordable places to stay in Thailand. The resort rooms so many people that it is crowded and the service is very poor. The staff try hard but they are stretched too thin. We booked the low season to avoid the crowd but the resort had a 3 day 250 guest wedding during our stay which took over most of the resort and we couldn't access large sections of the resort. we were not told about the wedding when we booked. There were restaurants booked out only for the wedding so there was limited choice in the resort. Even without the wedding the resort is so busy that you have to book your dinner for the whole week in advance, so you have no room for spontaneity in your holiday. If you don't book there are nights where you can only eat at…

title: Caution with upgrade
review: Dear TraceyW097,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your recent experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on TripAdvisor.   We are very sad to hear that we did not meet your expectations during your stay with us. Due to the weather and a high number of reservations for our sunset BBQ themed night at Olive – our Italian restaurant – we in fact have relocated the dinner to a larger indoor venue to accommodate more seats for our guests’ comfort. The restaurant was then used for a smaller group function. Other wedding events are organized in our meeting and event facilities. We do value our guests’ experience at the hotel and have issued an in-room letter to inform the venues of wedding in advance in case you wish to avoid high crowd areas.   We do understand your frustration on dinner reservations. Due to the resort’s high occupancy, we inform our guests at check-in to make advanced reservations to ensure that we are able to offer excellent service while guests dine with us in any of our outlets.    At JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa, it is our priority to make every guest’s experience an exceptional one and we do apologize for the inconveniences you have mentioned. Your comments have been well noted and shared with the team to continuously improve the quality of our service.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           We very much hope to have the chance to welcome you back in the future on your next visit to Khao Lak. Please let us know should there be anything we could be of assistance.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Excellent service and experience
review: The design of this hotel is very ambitious and it's best quality and every day we liked it more and more.  We holidayed in the rainy season and this hotel was perfect - you can wander to almost every part of the hotel under cover and the direct access to the pool from all the downstairs rooms means that you could easily swim anytime or sit out on your deck under cover - no traipsing to the pool area with all your stuff then dashing indoors when the rains come - perfect!  With different room types ie: fenced, garden in front, deeper, shallower, close to kids pool, close to adults only pool - there is an option for everyone and the money on the room upgrade was 100% worth it.  The hotel is fairly remote but we had no need or desire to go anywhere.  I started every day in the gym -…

title: Beautiful Resort
review: We had had a Luxury Escapes package at Katiliya Resort which suddenly closed. Fortunately Luxury Escapes came through with an alternative booking at JW Marriott which turned out to be nearly as good. We had a 1 bedroom duplex unit which was excellent. On two levels, we had a lounge area with balcony downstairs and bedroom upstairs. Bathrooms on both levels. Balcony had a view over the garden and pool.  Staff were very good and helpful. In particular in the restaurants Laila,  June and Honey were outstanding. Senior management were also visible and approachable. Our package included all meals which were very good. The food was plentiful and lots of variety even over the ten days we stayed. Unlimited bottled water was provided in the rooms. Alcohol is expensive but there is a…

title: Everything we wanted
review: Dear Nuages,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing us as your destination resort. We are enjoyed our facilities and services. Our team work hard to ensure that every guest's experience is an exceptional one. The personal recognition for Laila, June,Honey and Senior management is delightful to read as well.  We hope to have the opportunity to seeing you soon again.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Wonderful Stay
review: This hotel is amazing. It is huge but still manages that personal touch. Our cooking class was on the day we chose and ended up being just the two of us which is an indication of the care and attention we received. The choices of restaurants included Japanese, Thai and Italian and they were all brilliant. The staff in the restaurants were very attentive. The towel art by the cleaners was so clever. The Spa was lovely too. We booked diving from the hotel and it all worked so smoothly and managed to see the Manta Rays!

title: Pool dissapointing
review: Dear Lynne M,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing to spend your vacation with us at JW Marriott Khao Lak. We are all delighted that this wonderful stay became everything you wanted it to be. We value your feedback regarding the different aspects of your experience.   Please let us know should you plan to revisit Khao Lak and we hope to welcome you back to our resort again.  Thank you and Best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Family holiday Khao Lak
review: A friend and I stayed here for 4 days June 2017.  The resort is fabulous and we stayed there the entire time.   We had booked a room on the ground floor with direct pool access.  We were located next to the "kids" part of the pool, and so our patio was glassed in.  That was fine except that it blocked any breeze, but we opened the gate and that helped.  The room was huge and the bathroom had every convenience.   Luckily the room was large because although we had booked twin beds, and confirmed it more than once, all they had for us was a king bed, which we did not want.  I'm a restless sleeper and did not want to be whacking my friend in the middle of the night.  They did put a small extra bed in the room that was comfortable enough, but we were disappointed that our…

title: Great stay in well appointed room!
review: We stayed at the end of June using a Luxury Escapes deal - having upgraded to a pool access room.   Transfer to the hotel on arrival was included in our package. We looked for the sign or group of people or appropriate shirt in the place we were directed to look. We walked back and forward and on about the third attempt found the lady with the smallest sign with the hotel logo. We were then made to wait in the heat with our kids and luggage for about 10 minutes. I wasn't particularly impressed at this start to our trip.   Once in our mini van, with aircon, sleeping kids and cold water things started looking up.   We arrived  at the hotel at what would have been midnight in our home town, and we had started the day at 5am. The lady checking us in was good humoured and tried to…

title: Amazing
review: All I can say "Superb". Had a brilliant family holiday. Had the chance to upgrade to pool access. I can highly recommend these rooms. Thank you to everyone at this resort and making it a family holiday never to forget.

title: Perfect for resort-style R&R
review: Dear Sir/Madam,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for taking time to write a review of your experience in TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to learn that you had an amazing time during your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back shortly.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Very relaxing
review: My partner and I came here as part of Luxury Escapes package for much needed resort-style R&R. Our concerns that the deal might be too good to be true were quickly alleviated as we were warmly greeted in the expansive foyer    with a welcome drink and cool washer....much needed after long trip from Sydney.   Our 8 night stay was very relaxing. Drifting from pool to bar to restaurant to beach...rinse and repeat daily. Just what we were after. It's definitely a family resort but the adult pool and adults only breakfast area were a sanctuary for a couple.   Room was very big with everything you need including massive bath. Staff were really friendly (everyone from the gardener to the cleaner greets you with a smile and hands together) and generally attentive...sometimes you need to…

title: Bliss in a secluded part of Thailand
review: Dear Owen F,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for taking your time to write this review. We great to read that you spent time in many different venues, Infinity pool and Beach bar is our highlight as well as our cuisine, our chef do the best to ensure that they provide a wide variety of high quality food.   We wish you have wonderful day in every single day and look forward to welcome you back in the future.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok Mim. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Relaxing Break
review: Stayed at this hotel for 8 nights on a Luxury Escapes Package with another couple. We were picked up at the airport and transferred to the hotel. The drive is about 90 mins and the resort is quite isolated but that is the reason we picked it. We had booked an Premier pool view room but were offerred an upgrade to a pool access room. After a bit of haggling we managed to get a better price than first offerred and it turned out to be one of the best things we did. It completely change the experience we had.The grounds of the hotel are beautiful and well loked after. The pool meanders around the resort and all the pool access rooms are different. Block 1 is the quietest and most private with a garden area in front of the room and a path to the canal. Block 2 is very similar but a…

title: S vaz
review: Dear gonow51,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for taking your time to share your experience, this is truly valuable for us.  We are delighted to know that you had an amazing time during your 3 day stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak. We are extremely happy to know that we were able to live up to your expectations and that you enjoyed the comfort of view, room, pool, beach and food. We enjoy giving warm, attentive and friendly service and are delighted to know that this has made your stay with us more memorable.   We hope to welcome you back in the future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: What an experience
review: The stay was spectacular!!! The food was amaaazing!!felt at home with the warm service!!! loved the idea of the pool right outside the room .would go back in a heartbeat!!!really pleasant vacation!! would highly recommend for a family vacation!! looking forward to going back again!!

title: Anniversary and Birthday
review: Dear Sheena V,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you so much for the kind words. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed to stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak.   We hope to welcome you back to our resort again.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok Mim. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Package holiday resort
review: We had gone for a Wedding to the JWM at khao lak and was really amazed at the wat the hotel handled the event. The staff was very courteous. Check in was smooth. No hassle at all. Housekeeping was excellent and rooms were large and fresh every day. The beach side relaxing atmosphere was the best and you can spend the full day relaxing under an umbrella with service with a smile. The food was really very very good and unlike other hotels the flavor was authentic, and every day different and exciting. We even requested for certain special dishes and chef Jai went out of his way to comply.Mr Shashawat took special care of us and gave good advise of where we could go and took care of our every need.  thank you Marriot, we will definitely return again.

title: Inexpensive and exquisite
review: Hotel is about about an hour drive north of the airport in Phuket. It is beautiful drive for about the first half of the drive. Most of the drive is next to the ocean and it is wonderful. Nearby is a state park (hour drive east) and the mountains and jungle is incredible. There are treking tours, white water rafting and the scenery is unbelievable. Hotel sits on a lovely beach and the walk in either direction was great. The sunset was a post card!  We ate the buffet breakfast and it was wonderful. Lots of choices and the food quality was over the top. We ate at the local places for Thai food and it was fantastic. Thai massage was cheap and great. There is a main road that is about a mile from the hotel where we found the local places to eat and get a massage. We were there in…

title: One of its kind experience!
review: Dear Pmart2,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. We are all very glad you had a wonderful experience here in our resort.   We very much hope to welcome you back and please let us know when you plan on returning to Khao Lak.  Thank you and best regard,  Hataichanok Mim Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Good hotel,bad service
review: We wanted to experience Phuket and we wanted to stay away from the touristic buz. We chose to go to Khao Lak, 90 minutes away from the Airport. We did a lot of research online  and booked direct with the hotel, the Return to Paradise Package which included daily breakfast buffet, lunch dinner and total of 8 spas. We arranged the hotel to pick us up from the Airport, the vehicle was very comfy, waiting for us promptly on arrival. we arrived in the mid night, so it took us little over 60 minutes to reach the hotel. The check-in was very swift, great smiles. The first impression of the room was very peaceful. From the morning next day, we started to feel we were really in the laps of paradise. The amazing swimming pool goes around the hotels with cute little bridges everywhere, our…

title: The Complete Package is Waiting For You
review: Dear Ajanthan S,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  We are thrilled to know that you had a wonderful time with us and I really appreciate that you took the time to write your wonderful experience on TripAdvisor. We are delighted to hear that you've enjoyed your stay with us. Our resort is located within the serene surroundings perfect for a private getaway. Additionally, we do offer a number of indoor and outdoor activities suitable for both kids and adults, so there's never a dull moment in our resort. Our team works hard everyday to ensure that each and every guest's experience is an exceptional one.  We look forward to seeing you again soon for another momorable holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak and please do not hesitate to visit our website for your future bookings.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok Mim, Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak resort & Spa.

title: Extremely nice hotel
review: Check in wasnt fast,considered take quite sometimes. Give us block 3 level 2,which has some minor renovation (so we need to go down to level 1 from lobby which located at level 2,walk to block 3 and take staircase again to level 2 to be able to access our room from the lobby). Had bad experience today,tried to access our rooms and both access keys wasnt able to open it. A room service kind enough to help us to call (someone,which we dont know who he was calling to),and asked us to wait 5min, and the great thing start to happen,we waited for about 20min,and the room service came to us again,ask the same question,and did the same thing again and asked us to wait for 5 min (dejavu). We decided to walk ourselves to lobby (remember down up down access),the person there told us to…

title: Excellent stay, great service!
review: I'm Poom, a 10 year old student.  This is a very nice hotel has wonderful service and very good food. I liked the beach too!  My room had a comfy bed with a good view of the pool. The pool was nice and clean with two water slides. And the staff is the best.

title: Choose your room carefully
review: Dear 173Panjit,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for taking the time to review JW Marriott Khao Lak. We are all very glad you had a wonderful experience here in our resort. We work hard to making your trip fantastic and to making you feel comfortable.  We look forward to welcome you back soon !  Thank you ad best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Chong fah waterfall
review: An out of the way, beach hotel with water swimming canal theme. Suitable for all.  Best rooms are what are termed pool access. This is where the right area choice is important. There is a children's area with a slide and shallow canals and water access rooms nearby are with glass gates and barriers. This is fine but without young children better in my opinion to have the free view without the glass barriers.  Care to be taken around room 3021 and surrounding area as there is a noisy fan conditioning plant located close that could cause a disturbance.  The breakfast buffet has to be one of the best I have ever seen. All countries catered for. Fantastic fresh fruit. Juices. Etc.   On our visit Chef mentioned they had just won best buffet in all Asia for Marriott hotels, very…

title: Excellent resort, food and staff!
review: If you ride mountain bikes with an average fitness level then this is one trip we reckon you should take.  3 hrs return trip, fairly flat cycling but a steep 1km walk in to waterfall. 3 levels and a truly rain forest experience.   Only cost 200 bht for bike, helmet and guidr plus another 200bht to enter national park. Exhilarating!

title: Incredibly memorable family holiday
review: Dear Janine M,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  We appreciate you taking your time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our recreation activities and took advantage of the excursion program that we provide. Our team works hard everyday to ensure that each and every guest's experience is an exceptional one.  We hope to welcome you back to our resort again.  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: A beautiful hotel at a very attractive tariff - worth the 90 minutes drive from Phuket airport
review: I visited with friends for three nights. The hotel and the surrounding Beach is very well laid out and swimming pool that wraps around all four wings of the accommodation is quite splendid. Good dining options and high standard of food within the Hotel make it very self-contained and there is little desire to go outside exploring other restaurants in the vicinity.  Very good service and everyone of the staff has a smile and a greeting as you pass them. I would visit again and would target 5 nights as optimum.

title: nothing short of amazing
review: Dear Adil_moloobhoy,  Greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for sharing this wonderful experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to know your expectation of everything as the beach, Infinity pool, friendly staff, food and restaurants. We cannot wait to be welcoming you back as our repeat guest for another perfect holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak. Thank you once again for your review.   Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.

title: Fabulous Resort to unwind and relax
review: This is truly a quality property and after nearly a month in asia it was amazing to simply unwind and relax. The beach is lovely and completely uncrowded. You can walk for miles by the sea. The sunsets are breath taking. The pool is humongous and all 3 restaurants are fantastic. The quality of the food is to very high standards and the buffet breakfast has absolutely everything you could dream off. The staff is also extremely kind and polite. Warmly recommend.

title: Incredible hotel and staff !
review: Dear Corine M,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you very much for sharing these wonderful words with us regarding the different aspects of your experience, including our staffs, beach, breakfast and restaurants. We are very pleased to know that you had such a great time here.   It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future  Thank you and best regards,  Hataichanok R. Social Media Executive. JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Family Resort not Adult friendly
review: We booked here for an 8 night stay. Unfortunately we could not get the dates we wanted for the 'deal' that was offered.   Firstly we arrived very late at night and our first communication was that we had been upgraded.  Fantastic.  Our room was located close to the beach which we loved.    The food at the resort was really good quality and varied which made our stay very interesting.  Theo have 3 restaurants Japanese, Thai and Italian. All 3 are good quality.  The also gave a wonderful deli offering cakes and sandwiches.    Khao Lak is a very quiet area so there's not much offering in the way of alternate places to eat.  They make it interesting by having special night meals featuring different cuisines on the beach around 3 times a week   Also we found the alcohol charges to be…

title: Lovely staff
review: We visited as a family group of four adults. We stayed in a 2 balcony lagoon view rooms in block 4 on the second floor. This was our first visit to this hotel and we used a Luxury Escapes 8 night stay package. Found the room comfortable and very spacious. We appreciated the additional privacy offered by the higher floor rooms. The housekeeping was spot on, keeping the room tidy and clean, replenishing toiletries and sheets as needed. We loved the location of the beach being more laid back and relaxed compared to the busy Phuket beaches. But with the options of still going to have a beach massage nearby. We loved the options of different areas in the hotel to explore, making the most of the large pool but also playing tennis, squash and using the fitness centre. As a family we…

title: A Great Experience
review: Dear GingyDaPoops,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa !  Thank you for choosing to spend your vacation with us at JW Marriott Khao Lak. We are all delighted that this wonderful stay became everything you wanted it to be. We value your feedback regarding the different aspects of your experience, including our staffs, facilities, beach, pool, breakfast and restaurants and spa massage & treatment.
