review: Dear Ronald W,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking you time to recommend our resort by sharing your experiences with others here on TripAvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our facilities, our pool, beach front, and our recreation activities. We take pride in our breakfast selections, our chefs work hard to ensure that we provide a wide rage of high quality food selections. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,

title: Good hotel but that just it
review: If you stay just in hotel, jw marriot is the place but there is nothing outside the hotel anymore, just cuople bad restautants, all the good beach bars,small restaurants driven away from the beach, bad thinking & remaining vars serving tastless food,lack of competion...

title: Romantic dinner on the beach
review: Dear Risto T,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of preferred destination resort. We appreciate your review here on TripAdvisor. Unfortunately, due to government regulations, most restaurant along the beach have been relocated. We hope that you did enjoyed your time with us, and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.   Kind Regards,

title: LIves up to the reputation
review: We had a fantastic experience having dinner on the beach outside the olive restaurant and we can highly recommend it!  A special thanks to our fantastic waiter "Yom" who gave us excellent service throughout the entire evening.

title: Very nice place with some minor issues (depending on how you weigh them)
review: Dear mattiasnordqvist90,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We could not be more happier to hear that you enjoyed your dinner by our beachfront. Our team work hard to ensure that you had a memorable evening by  delivering superb service. We have shared your kind comments to our associate Yom, and he could not be more thrilled. We hope that you will return to us in the future.   Kind regards,

title: Thailand holiday!!
review: Having travelled to Asia and Thailand before and spent and 5 star hotels. Some have been great, some have been less so. I am happy to say that JW Marriott does live up to the reputation. The estate is very well maintained but not new, so if you are looking for something which is completely new then this is not the place. However, the rooms are spotless and the estate is well maintaned and cleaned with rigour. What is the best thing is the breakfast. The variety and quality is outstanding with its own bakery, freshly made eggs, even poached, smoothies, Asian Work, pancakes and the works.  The lunch restaurant is good as they have 250 baht snack foods which are considering a 5 star hotel, good value. The gym is ok, not the best I have been in but ok. What is great is that you have…

title: Almost perfect !
review: I think there are two aspects to my stay at Khao Lak which is the hotel itself and the general area of Khao Lak  Firstly the J W Marriott is a fine hotel. It has outstanding staff and an outstanding beach location. We had a deluxe lagoon pool view room and it was very nice. Very comfortable bed and stable and functional wi fi. The bathroom was a little tired in decoration but perfectly functional and acceptable.  The buffet breakfast was extremely comprehensive and offered options to suit all tastes. Most evenings the hotel offered a special themed buffet dinner on the lawns and we attended several of them and the food was very good. We also used all the restaurants ( Thai, Japanese and Italian ) and the Thai and Japanese were first class. However the Italian was very poor and…

title: Nice hotel
review: Stayed here in February for two weeks this hotel is lovely but first impressions last! We booked a pool access room and we are traveling as a couple on arrival we were told that our room wouldn't be ready for another 2 hours after a very long flight I was disappointed,after 2 hours had past no one came to us and was left wondering about like lost sheep eventually I ask a member of staff how much longer were we going to wait ,she then said our room was ready and to follow her the room was amazing although after a few day we realised we were put in the children's area and as the days went past it got noisier and noisier with screaming kids very disappointed as we had booked this hotel a year in advanced! The breakfast was out of this world and the hotel was spotless pool was very…

title: Amazing hotel with great staff
review: Dear Doodle555,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   We apologize that your check in experience might not have meet your expectations. Our standard check-in time is 15.00, and early check ins are subject to availability upon the date of your arrival. We could not be more thrilled to hear that you enjoy our breakfast offerings, our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide a vast variety of high quality fresh food.    Thank you for your review and comments, we have taken note to discuss with our team for further improvements.   Kind Regards,

title: Question for the lucky people who have just returned
review: Stayed here for 2 weeks with my family. The hotel was amazing. Great facilities and great staff! We tried out most of the facilities, including tennis, squash, gym, thai boxing, the pools, the restaurants etc and we were happy with all of them. Furthermore I wanted to mention the breakfast staff, Laila, Benz & Tal, all great! Highly recommend this hotel! On a further note, it was my fathers 65th birthday and the staff did a great job of celebrating this!

title: Good hotel but sub-standard reception service
review: Dear the_swede85,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to celebrate such special occasion. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our facilities, restaurants, and infinity pool. It seems like the the highlight of your stay with us is the friendliness and service of our associates and we could not be  more proud, the associates that you have mentioned by name are the super star of our resort. Your comments have been shared to our team, we look forward to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,

title: Third time in one year!!
review: I think that says it all. Once again we loved our stay at the JW Marriott (10 days this time). At the beginning we were worried we might get a bit bored, but when it was time to leave, we would have gladly stayed longer. The hotel and the rooms are still as well maintained as ever. Unfortunately we had a bit of trouble in our room 1209 one evening. I think a nearby water pipe burst. Thank goodness we were in the room to alert the staff. Many thanks to Duty Manager Khun Siri who reacted immediately and even came herself to help us move to a different and nicer room! Once again we loved our breakfasts at the Waterfront Restaurant. Yes, the buffet is absolutely delicious, but the experience would not be complete without Khun Poo and her amazing service team. Our good wishes from…

title: 5 star hotel 3/4 quality 7 star prices
review: Adding to my review, I forgot to say the breakfast was excellent. Going back to the rooms , when we booked the trip with my daughter and her husband we asked for a adjoining rooms ,needless to say the 2 rooms were as far apart that was humanly possible OVER 250 YARDS APART. They also added 30 Bart per day every day for a charity .per room over 1000 bart I would not go back to this hotel

title: Lovely resort and beach
review: Dear David63437,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy our extensive breakfast.   We sincerely regret being unable to allocate you two nearby rooms due to very high occupancy during this period.    The JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa specifically supports the local community via  social responsibility programs such as IUCN (international union for the conservation of Nature)  to help with  mangrove reforestation  and promoting long term sustainability. We indeed propose 30 THB (about 0.8 USD) per day to participate in this program which is entirely optional. Please accept our apologies if this was not clearly explained.    We truly regret that we did not meet your expectations and will improve the areas which you have highlighted.   Respectfully,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Great service
review: We wanted to find a hotel in this area on a great long beach with enough restaurants for some variety - and perfect - this hotel met those expectations! We chose a 1st floor room,  a Premium Lagoon Pool view, and requested nearer the beach and the restaurants and that's exactly what we got. The room was really good, only criticism was the furniture was a little tired and could do with a refresh. The food at breakfast was great and lots of choices, dinner was fine and good food but not "fine dining". Watching the sunset every night at the beach bar was memorable as was walking along the lovely sandy beach for miles. The beach was pretty unspoilt and tidal so plenty of space to walk along and on the flat. Weather was perfect too. The spa was good and plenty for options for…

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: Dear Paul S  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and taking your valuable time to share your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and a memorable dining experiences. Currently we are in the process of renovating and adding new furniture to our room and restaurant, we apologize that we have fallen short of your expectations. We hope to provide you an even better experience upon your next stay with us. Look forward to welcoming you back.  Kind Regards,

title: Great experience
review: The hotel was beautiful and we had a swim up room - which I would definitely recommend as it was beyond amazing!  The staff were totally lovely and the women who cleaned our room were so sweet. I couldn't fault any of the staff. They were attentive and never stopped smiling, without being intrusive.   Our only real grumble were the amount of weddings that meant we either had loud music till late or couldn't access either parts of the pool, restaurants, bars or the front of the beach.  We have nothing against a good wedding, heavens we are scottish so a celebration of any kind is welcomed! However 6 weddings in 10 days would make anyone want to elope,....somewhere quieter.  This hotel is advertised as "tranquil", for these 10 days "tranquil" is not a verb I'd use. We were lucky…

title: Great experience
review: Dear SpeysideTravelers,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   We are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our our pool access room; since the infinity pool is the highlight of our resort, having a pool access room is surely a treat. Thank you for your kind comments regarding the service and friendliness of our associate, as we Thais, are know for our genuine smiles and superb hospitality. Please accept our sincere apologies for any in conveniences caused by the wedding group in house.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Great Beach Experience
review: One of the biggest swimming pool at Asia pacific we had great with all my family holiday at this resort, this is not our first time trip to khaolak we have been here before 2015, great place nice people very close to the beach.

title: Not what it used to be
review: Dear norasmith932,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and your continued loyalty to us. We are happy to hear that you have a great family holiday. It would be a pleasure to continued to provide exceptional service with your next stay with us. Please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Highly recommended, lovely hotel
review: I stayed at the hotel with my family and friends. A great way to get away from the hustle and bustle and just relax. A fantastic uncrowded beach and one of the most amazing pools i have every seen that went the whole way around the hotel. All in all a very relaxing holiday we stayed for 6 nights. Staff were always friendly and warm. I will certainly go back and all the meals on the beach during the day were great value for money. Breakfast had a fantastic selection of food just what you want to start the day off.

title: Beautiful and Relaxing Resort
review: Had a pool-side room which was very well presented and clean. Everything is as your fingertips and food is of excellent quality and in abundance. Staff very friendly and obliging. Made for a very relaxing holiday. It is a little out of the way and over an hour and a half into Phuket, however if you are looking for a chilled out holiday right on the beach, then I can't recommend the Marriott highly enough.

title: Amazing getaway!
review: Dear pemmett2017,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. Delivering the highest quality of service is our priority and we could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable time with us. Thank you for your recommendations of our resort to others, it surely is a paradise getaway. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Amazing holiday
review: Pros: Very quiet part of town, you have your own beach, beautiful facilities! I can just stay here forever.  Cons: sink doesn't drain in a timely manner, request for King size bed (i used marriott voucher and specially requested for a king bed and I book this room more than 1 month in advance) but end up with a double bed, was really disappointed. The food in a hotel can be a little cheaper but it's still acceptable.

title: Unbelievable
review: Dear Tum T,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your perfected choice of vacation destination. Thank you for your review, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed our beach front and facilities. We apologize for any inconveniences in regarding your room. We hope that we can serve your better the next time you return to us.  Kind Regards,

title: Luxury in paradise
review: We have returned for the second time to the JW Marriott having loved our first trip here. Luckily it was every bit as wonderful as we remembered it to be, on a beautiful beach in lovely grounds. In fact we loved it so much that although we were meant to stay for 5 nights, we were luckily able to change our next hotel booking and stay for another 5! We stayed in two different rooms, both were very nice. Although the hotel was at high occupancy, it didn't feel crowded at all. The staff are all so polite and smiling, they make you feel very welcome! Since our last visit they have separated the beach into kids and no kids which was good, except that smoking was allowed in the adult area which we found unpleasant, but were happy to stick to the family section. The pool is of course…

title: Attentive staff, relaxing stay, laid back and enjoyed our stay
review: Beautiful property and friendly staff. Cannot think of a negative experience here. From airport pick up to check-in and throughout our stay staff was courteous and smiling. You can be as energetic as you want or as we did, relax in the pools and coast your way through the many canals of the pool. Special thanks to Un, Chef Nui and staff at Thai restaurant (do the cooking class !) staff at the beach bar as well as all staff at breakfast (Honey ;) Nursing staff as well when my wife took sick and gave medicine to cure her nausea. Wee, our housekeeper to keep our lives happy. Appreciation for the flowers.  Will definitely plan a trip back to experience this property.

title: Highly recommended
review: Dear  ricski64,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your preferred choice of destination resort.   We appreciate you taking your time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor. It seems like the one of the highlights of your stay with us were the friendliness and the service of our staffs, and would could not be happier. As we Thais, are known for our genuine smiles and superb hospitality. We have share all your kind comments to the staffs you have mentioned by name.  We look forward to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even more special.  Kind regards,

title: Lovely hotel on a gorgeous beach
review: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel and will probably come back. Great facilities with an amazing big pool where you can find your own almost private space. Really nice beach and you don't need to be up at 6am to find a sun bed.  Restaurants are great and pricing is as expected at a hotel of this standard. We especially recommend the Japanese restaurant where food and service were awesome. Also there is some nice local Thai restaurants just a short walk on the beach.  The only negative feedback that we got is that the beds were really hard. We asked for an extra mattress, but were only handed an extra quilt to have under the sheets. We didn't sleep well because of this and it's the only reason why we won't give a 5 star rating.

title: Great place to chill out or be active or BOTH!
review: Dear Martin K,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Sap! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our facilities, infinity pool, and the ambiance of our resort. We are sadden to hear that the quilt we gave you did not meet your expectations, we have noted your feedback. We hope to welcome you back in the near future, please let us know if we can do anything else to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Tropical paradise
review: Sadly we only had one night here but it was very good. The hotel is on s fantastic beach. Food in the Thai signature restaurant very authentic and tasty. The only reason to mark down was breakfast service which a bit of a bun fight!

title: Another wonderful holiday!
review: This was our second time staying at this hotel. We were welcomed back by Tin's smiling face and Louis' friendly words. We upgraded to a pool access room as we knew how much fun it was and very convenient. The room was a good size and very comfortable. Breakfast was great, there is a large variety to select from and hardly ever a queue. There are fresh juices, Asian or European choices. The egg station is just waiting for your request. We swam every day, in clear blue water. Often the coconut man would come past in his boat and we would treat ourselves to a fresh coconut. Lunch was again a choice of a hot Asian or European meal. We chose to have a sandwich or hamburger sometimes. Happy Hour was where we headed with our newly found Welsh friends. We exchanged conversation and…

title: A really great first experience in Thailand
review: Dear  David W,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   We could not be happier to hear that you received at warm welcome for our staffs Louis and Tin from the very moment you checked in with us. It sure is a treat to have a pool access pool where you can jump in to our infinity pool at the comfort of your own room. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our restaurant and food selections.  We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if we can do anything to make your next stay even more special.   Kind Regards,

title: The most relaxing hotel ever, worth every star
review: We stayed for 2 weeks in JW Marriot Khao Lak as our first trip to Thailand and we had a really enjoyable stay. We were with a small yoga group and were able to practice each morning on the grass near the sea and evening in a small studio nearby. The hotel staff were very courteous and we were delighted with the different animals made from towels that our maid left for us each day. The location near a quiet beach but within easy taxi reach to nearby towns worked well for us. The large swimming pool and canals were novel and we loved the very generous and varied breakfast buffet. The hotel Thai restaurant and the Chinese New Year event were excellent but rather expensive. We ended up eating most of our meals in the local beach restaurants which were very cheap. I really enjoyed my…

title: 5th visit and planning the 6th
review: Dear Julia W,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. Welcome to Thailand! We are thrilled you enjoyed you stay with us, our service, activities, and culinary offerings. Many world re-known islands and national parks are just a  short distant away: Similan Island, Surin Island, Khao Sok National Parks etc... We are looking forward for your return to us. Please do let us know if we can do anything else to make your next stay even more special.  Kind Regards,

title: Very disappointed
review: The service is excellent, everyone is very helpful and kind. The hotel area is large and has many rooms, but You really do not see so many people around somehow. Atmosphere is very quiet and relaxing. The beach is nice- wide and long. Spa is just amazing, but quite expensive. The pool really is as long as they say, which is hard to believe:). Best rooms are not with pool access, but higher rooms, as they have really great balcony with large sitting area, where we spent most of the time while in room. bathrooms are huge, with shower and very large bath. Only minus is location-it is quite far from the Khao Lak city (15-20 min drive). But they also have much entertainment for every day. Shuttle to city costs 100 BHT per person. Most guests are older people, so perhaps not really…

title: Great 5 Star Hotel!
review: This is a great hotel.  The JW Marriott is one of the best we have been to. It's big, it's beautiful, the staff is super friendly and the food is excellent, specially the Thai Restaurant.  We spend almost 3 weeks in the resort and we had the best time. The hotel offers sports and craft classes and we loved the Live Music, specially Gerard and Naomi, they create a  fantastic ambience and are really good at Entertaining. The town Khao Lak is about 15 minutes drive (hotel offers shuttle Buses)  from the hotel, but don't expect too much.   The rooms in the hotel are clean, big and convenient. Miss Mee was very attentive when it came to our rooms. We had 2 Pool view rooms and they were perfect.   The Spa is a BIG plus, i loved having my massages there, its so relaxing and…

title: Its all relative...
review: Dear antonioaxa,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! It is an honored to be your choice of destination resort. We could not be happier to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and to hear that you were able to take advantage of our recreation activities and venturing out to other excursion in Khao Lak. We have shared your kind comments to our team and they could not be thrilled. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back.   Kind Regards,

title: A Really Great Hotel
review: Sometimes people spend so much on their holiday that they feel compelled to write an amazing review just to justify their expensive experience and feel better about themselves.  I am not driven by this compulsion.  Rather, I prefer to offer an alternative view to help potential visitors avoid disasters.    PROS:  There is a nice enormous pool that my daughters really enjoyed, a decent game room for a rainy day, a large breakfast buffet with helpful attendants, and generally pleasant and helpful staff.  We also had adjoining rooms with pool access and again, it was really fun for our daughters.  My wife also tells me that the spa was nice.    CONS: This may have been a 5 star resort when it opened, but it is now so run down as to no longer qualify.  For example, the cabinets in…

title: Wonderful staff!
review: Dear AmericanCurmudgeon  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us. We are delighted to learn your positive feedback on the overall hotel services .  We regret to hear that some aspects of your stay did not meet your expectation.  May I clarify that all services and prices quoted by our concierge are all higher price compaired to what is available outside of the property due to our insurance coverage and service requirements.  If you would prefer to use a local taxi we are supporting the local community by contacting a local taxi just outside the gate at no charge.  The Price is provided by the taxi directly.   In regards to your comment about the land north of the hotel, we regret to let you know that the hotel has no control over it, however we have notified the relevant 3rd party.   I would like to thank you for taking the time to write such a detailed review for our improvement and we very much hope to welcome you back in the near future at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Please contact me directly if I can further explain or understand your concerns.  Respectfully,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Fantastic wedding, honeymoon, holiday
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks in January 2017. We had a pool access room. Note some of these have a short walk of 3-5m to the pool or canals and others, like ours opens directly on to the pool. The rooms are great with large comfy beds and lovely bathrooms with a big bath and separate shower. The hotel is clean and the food, especially breakfast is great. All 3 restaurants as well as the beach bar are very nice although we preferred the Thai. The food ( if you are not on a package) is not expensive but the wine is, so drink beer! The hotel is about 10 mins by car from Bang Niang and about 15 from Khao Lak and there is a shuttle and plenty of taxis. Also there are some nice beach bars along the pristine beach. We liked memories( out and turn right). The staff are fantastic and so…

title: My wife and I spent 6 nights at the JW Marriott Khao Lak for our honeymoon.
review: This is a fantastic resort! We enjoyed every moment there and hope to go back in the future. The service is excellent and the facilities beautiful. Great food and even better cocktails throughout the resort at a reasonable price. Wonderful and gorgeous spa and a very nice beach. Thanks to the incredible staff for making our stay so enjoyable!

title: best breakfast and best New Year's Eve party ever...!!!
review: Dear Sam M,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We could not be happier to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us. Our staffs work hard to ensure that our guests have a relaxing holiday and leave with the feeling of satisfaction. We look forward to your return to us and please do let us know if there is anything we could to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Paradise
review: we spent New Years Eve and New Years day here in Jan 2017.  Simply amazing.  This is the best New Years Eve dinner party we have ever been at..!  The food quality and variety has to be seen to be believed.   There are a few restaurants in the resort and all are very good. ... although service a bit slow in the Italian.. the food is worth the wait.. the Italian Chef here is brilliant.  The breakfast quality and variety is also best we have experienced in any resort... and we've been to a few..!  The enormous pool area circles around the entire hotel... said to be the largest pool area in Southern Thailand. The rooms and bathrooms are fabulous.. ultra modern and spacious. ..  best beds in Thailand..!  The location of the hotel is only down side here... its well off the beaten…

title: Paradise indeed
review: Dear BOSP,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort to celebrate the New Years.  We are over the moon with your comments about our food selections at our New Years Eve and other restaurants' venues. Our chefs work hard to ensure that they provide our guest with a wide sets of quality food selections; your comments have been shared to our team and they could not be happier. Our infinity pool is the pride and joy of our resort, any we could not be more thrilled to hear that you had a great time enjoying your days in the pool. In regards to your comments about our beach areas and sun beds, in order to maintain a clean and organized beach, the government prohibit any hotels and resort to place sunbed directly near the beach.  We hope that your memorable experience will entice you to return to us. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make you next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: 3 week stay in paradies
review: We stayed here for our honeymoon. We had nothing to fault! It was a perfect location to unwind and relax. We stayed in a pool entrance room which was amazing. Staff were friendly and helpful. The restaurants were all delicious. No worries getting a sunbed. Beach was so clean, although a little rough at times. My partner and I really enjoyed the free boogie-boards you could take. Breakfast was delicious each day and the variety of food was magnificent. We will be back very soon!

title: Nice resort on outanding beach
review: Our experience at this resort was outstanding, we didn't want to leave and look forward to returning again. The entire staff was very friendly, helpful, courteous, professional and made sure we had everything we wanted or needed. For me the highlight is the beach and bay the resort is on. I have traveled to many resorts around Thailand and this is the best so far. I picked this resort initially because the goal for this trip was to take a tour of the Similan Islands, and this is close to the pier where the boats depart from. In the end, I was glad we got to see the Similan's, but could have stayed a few more days at the resort and beach. I am very happy with our stay and would recommend this resort to anyone looking for a nice resort to stay at and relax.

title: Relaxation and first-class service
review: Dear  Jerry E,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   Thank you for your review and recommendations of our resort to others. We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable time with the service of our associates. We are surely located in such a marvelous area with truly tranquil atmosphere. Similan Island is a true treasure of Thailand, and we are thrilled to hear that you were able to take advantage of visiting the island on your stay with us.   We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Beautiful property, but isolated
review: If you want relaxation and first-class service then the JW Marriott hotel is the place to stay in Khao Lak. The hotel area with the pool and beautiful gardens are so spacious, that you can sit on your terrace and just relax without being disturbed by anyone. Just watching the beautiful flowers and hear the birds sing. We had a room in with pool access, which is really nice. Though the balconies on first floor also looked very cozy :-) Every morning I swam the same route in the pool along the five hotel wings. You can swim for at least one hour without swimming in the same place in the pool, - that's how big it is! All of the surroundings are perfectly kept and cleaned. The rooms are nice with a nice bed and a big TV with different movie channels. The bathroom has a rain shower…

title: Excellent wedding venue and hotel
review: Dear Susan H,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable stay with us and enjoyed the ambiance of our resort. Our associates work hard to ensure that our infinity pool is well maintained and our garden beautifully landscaped. We appreciate your feedback regarding our rooms, we are looking to renovate and add new furniture accordingly. Thank you for your comment regarding our breakfast buffet, our chefs take pride the large selection of food they provide every morning. It seems like the service of our associates was the main highlight of your stay and we could not be more thrilled, as we Thais, are known for our warm smiles and genuine hospitality.  It would be a pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future.   Kind Regards,

title: wonderful 5* resort!
review: Stayed here with 2 kids in mid January on a last minute Marriott Rewards booking. I would stay again, although would suggest you should set your expectations accordingly.  The Good: - The Pool; This is a repeated theme in reviews, but it really is a spectacular feature of the hotel especially for kids. We were upgraded to one of the ground level units with direct pool access which allows you to step off your deck and into your swim. - The Beach; a multi-mile sand beach is at your doorstep with relatively few immediate neighbours. No good snorkelling but safe to swim. - Breakfast; Great food located beach side. Don't expect it to be comp'd if you are a Marriott Rewards member though. You'll either need to book it in your package or pay per use.  The OK - The Room; The room is…

title: Beach paradise in Khao Lak
review: This was my third stay at this hotel, albeit I hadn't been for three years. I'm checking in, you are met with the most wonderful fragrance in the lobby, and the wonderful Thai welcome.....they are actually at the door waiting on you: a special touch. Dominic was a charming ambassador for Marriott at checkin, and she dealt with all efficiently. The highlight of the hotel is the staff:delightful and genuinely charming, from check in staff to restaurant servers , housekeeping, beach staff and maintenance.....all just perfect.  Rak,  our room attendant , was absolutely first class, with little touches every day, always smiling. She kept our room immaculate. It's still a beautiful resort hotel with a  spectacular swimming pool, and wonderful manicured gardens. Looking at other…

title: tsunami coast
review: Dear iris m,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! It is always a pleasure welcoming returning guests and thank you for sharing your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to hear your kind comments regarding your check in experiences. It seems like one of the main highlights of your stay with us was the service and friendliness of our  hotel's staffs. We take pride in the service of our staffs and their unwavering hard work to ensure that our guest feel welcome and leave with the utmost feeling of a relaxing holiday; we have shared your kind comments to the staffs you have mentioned by name and they could not be more thrilled.   Thank you for your continued loyalty to our resort, and we cannot wait to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Nice location but not a 5* hotel
review: went for a resort wedding 3 days followed by a 4 day stay  wonderful place atmosphere  rainy season , so need to plan time of year but just right after its stops raining in term of heat etc.. one  and half hours from irport resorty so feels isolated but just take  5 minute walk and you are on main road wit the variety of shopping masgae service and eating  we are vegetarian so choice in resort or outside not great  resort choice  by bcaaling the indian chef out who was very helpful massage etc,,, 10% of price of resort  either on left or right of the resort bech 5 minute walk either side stray dogs on beach a concern for  famillies they chased  one person walking alone new resorts no lifts to upper floors NEGATIVE : Hot water wnt available one day  After a call to Customer…

title: A 4 star not a 5 star or an old one
review: Dear  desidealfinder,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  Thank you for sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor. We understand that our guests have different dietary preferences, and our chefs are more than happy to set up special menus upon our guests' request. We are located further away from city center, however, the resort is truly a private gateway for those looking to avoid the hustle and bustle of clustered hotels and resorts in Phuket. In regards to your comment about our elevators, we do have an elevator close to our reception area operating 24/7 . We apologize for the inconsistency of the hot water in your room, and glad to hear that you enjoyed venturing out to to visit other places in Khao Lak.  We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.

title: Fab pool and swim up room
review: I was looking forward to staying at this hotel over Christmas following the review I had read. The location is nice so is the beach which is wonderful. However, here are some negative points.  1. I had breakfast everyday at the Waterfront restaurant and was with my wife and my 2 kids. I was surprised to notice that no one was willing to help while I was carrying 3-4 plates. Usually, you have at least one waiter asking if they can help and take 1-2 plates and bring them to your table.  2. I went many times to the beach bar asking for coconuts. I was told many times that they were none. However, there were lots of coconuts at the pool bar which is only 50 meters away.... I guess the waiter could call the other bar to have coconuts brought to the beach bar.  3. I rented 3 times a…

title: Amazing holiday in Khao Lak
review: The best hotel in Thailand! Ideally suits for any family with kids. We enjoyed wonderful rooms with direct access to the pool, best beach ever, perfect service and food at the hotel. Kids visited some activities at the kids club where they really had a lot of attention from the staff and learned to paint fans, umbrellas and T-shirts.  The New Year celebration was amazing, beautiful decorations, the food was above all expectations. I can maybe mention only one thing for Russian visitors - Christmas tree was removed before the 31st December whilst our X-mas is the 7th of January, however we decorated in our own terrace and still had a great fun! Concierge service is of a very high level. We received the best guides, great quality minivans and boats whenever we booked any. Special…

title: The smiles of employees at Thai restaurant were awesome！
review: Dear  Maria C,  Greetings from JW Marriot Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort to bring in the New Years.  Our resort is certainly family friendly, and we are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our kid's club and activities. Thank you for your kind comment about our New Year celebration Dinner, our team work hard to make certain that our guest had a memorable time while enjoying extensive food selections. We have shared your appreciation to the associates you have mentioned by names and they could not be more happier.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Happy New Year!  Kind Regards,

title: Excellent long stay in Khao Lak
review: Your hotel was neat and tidy and the service was exceptional too.The facilities were splendid, but the smiles of employees were awesome！Because pick up time for diving was early, I was able to take out breakfast in a box. We were glad by the consideration.It was the best hotel.

title: Oh-kay experience, not a 5 star resort
review: Dear Kotarojuku,  Warm greetings from Khao Lak! Thank you for rating us five stars and sharing your experience with others. As we Thais, are know for our smiles and genuine hospitality, we could not be happier to hear that you have experiences such treatment here at our resort. We hope that you will return to us again in the near future! Kob kun ka :) !  Kind Regards,

title: Stay at The JW Marriot Kaho Lak
review: My wife, doughter (almost 1 year old) and I spent three weeks at this hotel. We had an excellent time and enjoyed the fantastic service. The long pool was excellent for morning swims. The beach and gym was great and our doughter loved the kids club area. The breakfast was amazing and special thanks to Poo in the breakfast area that took excellent care of us. Also a special thanks to Ploy who was our doughter's favorite among the staff.

title: Good family escape....
review: First...  I must say getting through immigration was a real pain in the butt... took forever, and then the taxi ride there was around an hour.  We caught a late night flight so the experience leading up to the Hotel wasn't ideal.   Location: Right next to the beach so super convenient in that regard, however, not close to shops/ restaurants etc..   There is a shuttle bus that takes you to two locations.   Room: The room was two stories which was great for our family of 5 (got an upgrade).  However, in hindsight I think the lower level room would have been equally as good -- at least more convenient jumping into the pool, and having everything on the one floor (I would be running up and down trying to find clothes, or get the kettle boiling etc...  ).    Decor of the room was…

title: LUXERY AT ITS BEST IN KHAO LAK
review: Doesn't get any better than the JW MARRIOTT, in KHAO LAK . The staff is excellent, the service is impeccable , and the pool is just gorgeous. We didn't stay there , but we had New Years dinner there, i can't begin to tell you about the amount of food , everything you could dream of!  A bit pricey i believe , but i hope that we can manage to stay there next time.  thanks again for the hospitality

title: Stunning!
review: Dear ParadiseSeaker2013,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to celebrate the New Years. It seems like the highlights of your stay with us were the service of our associates and the quality of our food. All our associates work hard to ensure that our guests leave with memorable services, and a happy and full belly! It would be a pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind regards,

title: Ok but not to repeat
review: This hotel is unlike any other! The fact that you can hop off your balcony straight into the pool is great fun. The food is delicious, one restaurant offers Italian food for those who don't enjoy Asian food. The rooms are spacious and clean. The beach is right outside too and it's absolutely beautiful. I would definitely visit again!

title: Absolutely beautiful but that first day is so important
review: The hotel reception and the entrance are beautiful.  Room: The room was big and well structured for a family of 4. However it smells TERRIBLY to moister due to the air condition which was freezing too. It is so humid in the room that even the bathing suits did not dry in the room. After few days the bed started to smell as the sheets were humid. The shower is big but the water comes out under the door even though we showered in the corner. The hand shower browser fell all the time from its holder. The furniture is old, especially the textiles which are stained (this is something in the entire hotel). But overall the room was clean. The location of our room was perfect (wing 2). However, I would have been very disappointed if we would have received a room in wing 3 or 4... there…

title: Great location and staff were fantastic
review: Room was fantastic, although bed was a little bit hard. Be careful of the walkways as there are wide gutters that are made from the same concrete "pattern" as the actual walkway itself. I know of at least two of my family members that had a fall as a result of this strange gutter.   Restaurants in the resort were fantastic with great food and bar staff very responsive (and funny). Disappointed with the staff manning the beach bar (aquamarine pool bar) - not only did they forget our food order, but when we advised them to cancel and that we would just pay for drinks, took about 20 minutes to generate the bill, take payment and give us change. Prices were comparable to western countries for food and drinks (for Thailand probably regarded as expensive) however the quality of food…

title: A beautiful family escape
review: Dear SidandCandice,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed you time with us. Please accept our apologies that the service provided to you at our pool bar has fallen short of your expectations; we will look into the matter to discuss with our team for further improvements. In regards to our food and beverage pricing, we believe we provide our guest with high quality products, and that our pricing are inline with other five star hotels and resorts in surrounding areas. As per your comment about our infinity pool, we do have the longest infinity pool in South East Asia!  We hope to regain your trust in our service, it would be a pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future.   Kind regards,

title: 5* wonderland for families
review: We had a wonderful stay of 8 nights during Christmas and New Year 2016-2017. We travelled with our 3 and 5 year old sons and booked a duplex suite, which was wonderful. I really recommend it, especially when travelling with small children. It has enough space and also gives an opportunity for us adults to relax when the kids are sleeping.   The beach is wonderful and quiet. There are a few restaurants quite close. We chose to eat lunch at the hotel and took a tuktuk most evenings to Khao Lak center for dinner. The ride cost 300 bahts. I can also recommend Pam's restaurant which is located about 1 km up the road from Marriott. Really good food (try the spring rolls!) and athmosphere.   Overall a five star experience! One thing that does need improvement is the area around the…

title: Great Hotel with a wonderful beach!
review: Dear  LauraKR76,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your family holidays.  We are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our Duplex Suite, it sure is a treat to have a more spacious room to relax and enjoy your days. As we are quite a distance from the hustle and bustle of Phuket's clustered resorts and hotels, our beaches are surely much more quiet and peaceful than the ones in Phuket. Thank you for bringing your observation to us in regards to the children pool, we have taken note for future improvements.   We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind regards,

title: Wonderful place, great staff
review: Thaïland, the name itself sounds like music to my hears. When I think about Thaïland, the singing of exotic birds, the clapping of the waves, the music of their greeting (sawadi khaaaa) comes to my hears. So when I escape to my dream country rocked by the wonderful Andaman sea, I want everything to be perfect : the shuttle to the airport, my room, the pool temperature, my Pina Colada... That's why I booked a hotel in Khao Lak, I want to escape the smell and sound of busy town, to be near pristine waters without facing hundreds of other tourists. The JW Marriott in Khao Lak gave me my dream vacation, the kind I prepare months in advance, checking pictures of the breakfast, trying to get the bar menu to get a glimpse of the cocktails I'll sip in front of the sunset. Getting there…

title: As good as it gets
review: This was our first stay in this part of Thailand.  The beach is much nicer than Hua Hin (which is better than Pattaya) and it seemed quieter, even though it is high season. Not many people were swimming in the sea, probably because the pool is so amazing. I could swim from our room to the beach, have a dip in the ocean and swim back a distance of around 500m, enough to justify a reward drink at the beach bar. For exercise, there is also a gym with all the latest equipment to work off weight gained dining at the fabulous Olive restaurant, which has world class Mediterranean cuisine. One night there was also a Thai buffet on the lawn beside the beach with a variety of Thai traditional musicians and dancers.  There is also live jazz with a couple of singers at the beach bar, which…

title: Out of this world
review: Wouldn't normally consider a Marriott when visiting a cultural country like Thailand but they have produced an incredible Thai based hotel, the best I've ever seen. We booked a swim up room, well worth it, gorgeous, the best bathroom I've ever been in too. The pool and off shoot canals are beautiful and relaxing. The only downfall is how expensive the restaurants and bars are in the resort but there's a shop at the end of the road to buy cheap drinks and cheap but gorgeous food in the restaurants along the beach. One of our best holidays and we've had a few! It is as amazing as the pictures look!

title: Special thanks to the Staff
review: Dear  Kelly M,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination. We could not be happier to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our resort. Having a pool access room is surely a treat, our infinity pool is certainly loved by many of our guests. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards

title: First experience of Thailand
review: We stayed at the JW Marriot  and what an amazing stay it turned out to be.The standards displayed by all, were of the highest order.The staff were incredibly polite and respectful,from the pool and room attendants, to the waiters,receptionists and even the lovely lady who sold us the trip to the Similan Islands all displayed a professionalism beyond our expectations. The quality and variety of the daily breakfast and the attention to detail handled with a  calmness,politeness and with a smile but always maintaining a level of service amidst the chaos of having to deal with so many people during breakfast - they are indeed a credit to the resort. All the staff displayed such warmth and impeccable standards of kindness and always helpful and for that reasonlook forward  to…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear hstc2016,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and sharing your experiences to others on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable service at our resort. The service of our associates seemed to be the highlight of your stay with us and we could not be happier. Our associates work hard to ensure that all guests have a relaxing yet memorable experiences with their stay with us, and our management team can not be more proud.   It would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the near future. Happy holidays!   Kind Regards,

title: Nice beach hotel
review: After a hectic stay in Bangkok, we came to relax at the Marriott in Khao Lak. The hotel is in good condition and the rooms are spacious. The beach is very long and you don’t have direct resorts as neighbours making the beach private. The breakfast buffet is fantastic with a large and various choices of food. The Thai restaurant is very good. We did not try the Japanese restaurant so cannot comment. While the hotel facilities are good, it is nice to leave in the evening to Khao Lak to discover traditional and local offerings.

title: Simply amazing
review: Dear Alexandre H,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort.   Our resort is surely a good gateway for those who want to rest from the hustle and bustle of the cities. We are are happy to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, our chefs work hard to ensure that they are able to provide a wide variety of food selections. As you have mentioned, it is nice to ventured our to visit many of Khao Lak famous attractions: Similan Islands, Surin Island, Khao Sok National Park, Etc.   We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Seven Star! Best Hotel of my honeymoon!
review: We booked through Luxury Escapes and after a shocking flight from Australia I was ready to be an angry tourist.  From the moment we arrived at reception till the moment we departed the car at Phuket airport the experience was incredible.  The staff simply brilliant and you know they cared.  The room perfect and just 4 steps from our room to the pool.  We are thinking of returning next year.

title: Excellent hotel - could not recommend it enough!
review: Dear Graham M,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you rating us five stars and could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable experience from the very moment you checked into our resort. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Visually stunning resort
review: Words cannot describe how amazing this experience was.  Friendly check in.  Room clean modern and comfortable.  Flower decoration for our honeymoon complementary.  Every request was fulfilled, and staff were ever so friendly all across the board.  Breakfast - fantastic selection. Made my wife Indian tea every day freshly brewed. Amazing! Couldn't have wished for anything better for her.  The pool is amazing - you can easily spend a few hours in their.  We are at the Japanese restaurant - average food. Good service.  We had a beachfront dinner, which was very special. There was a slight miscommunication regarding this however was amicably dealt with by the hotel and we had a fantastic time,  The food was excellent at the Olive restaurant and chef Enzo personally greeted us and…

title: Quiet beautiful hotel - bit pricey
review: Staying 10 days at Marriott. Got upgraded due to membership and have good room on first floor not far from breakfast dining room. Good location - important because large resort. Adult only eating zone for breakfast which is excellent. Adult swimming area with quiet places to sit (we have been lucky to get as if busy would be a challenge). Beach stunning with restaurants and coffee shop for all tastes. Staff very friendly and helpful and grounds beautifully kept. Generally I have to say it's pricey - we appreciate we are in a beautiful hotel but it's a shame that some items and services are just too much. One is consequently tempted to go out for supper and therefore the hotel looses out.

title: Nice and luxury hotel
review: We stayed at the marriot for 4 nights. As we are Marriott members we got a very nice upgrade to a suite with pool access, which was very good. Allthough it is a big hotel the staff is very attentive, they know you. The restaurants are really good. Next to the hotel on the beach there are a few little beach restaurants, who are nice for lunch and a place for massage on the beach

title: Relaxing,restful holiday
review: Dear Iris W,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are proud to welcome Marriott Members to our beautiful resort. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our restaurant and the service of our associates. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Excellent place for couple time
review: Stayed here 18/11-3/12 and had booked into a direct access pool room. Check in was very relaxing, we sat on sofas in reception with a cool drink whilst our details were sorted and then shown to our room. The room was very spacious with flat screen tv, tea/coffee facilities, hairdryer toiletries incl. hair conditioner and a lovely large bath. There is a glass window with a venetian blind that separates the bathroom from the bedroom and this can be raised if you want to watch the world go by as you bath.  The pool and grounds were awesome, definitely the best pool I have ever been to. If you take a swim right round the pool it takes about an hour (if swimming gently) and often we would only pass 1 or 2 other couples in that whole time.  The hotel has a large adult only swimming…

title: Need renovation quick
review: Dear yvette741,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We are glad that you were able to take advantage of our pool access room. Our infinity pool is the longest infinity pool in South East Asia, and our associates take pride in  ensuring that our pool is well maintained and our landscapes beautifully sculpted. Thank you for your kind words about our breakfast selections, our chefs are constantly adding more varieties to our already extensive menu selections.   Being located a distance from Phuket sure has its perks,  our beach remains serene and away from the hustle bustle large tourist crowds that Phuket may have. We hope that you will come back and visit us again in the near future. Please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: A truly relaxing stay
review: JW Khao Lak is located 90mins car ride away from Phuket airport. It is truly away from the hustle and bustle of Phuket. If you are looking for a relaxing vacation without crowds of people on the beach. This is the place to head to. The return to paradise deal from the Marriott website offers an unbelievable deal including 3 meals for two and one daily massage.   The property is huge and beautiful. The pool is fantastic and you can wadein it for hours. We booked a family room with direct pool access. I am not sure this is a must because access to the pool is all over. The upper floor rooms seem to be more airy and some w an ocean view though the pool access rooms seem to cost more. The 1000 rooms are designed for families, so the pool depth is about 1m. The pool in front of the…

title: Excellent quality, great set up for adults v family
review: Dear victoriaxyz,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa!Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  It surely is a good choice to book our pool access rooms for guests who want to access the pool directly from the comfort of their own rooms. However, booking our pool view and garden view rooms are equally amazing; Hence,  our infinity pool glides around our resort and can be easily access from anywhere around our grounds. We could not be happier to hear that you were able to venture out to see Khao Lak's world renown island and experience a valuable day  with Thailand's national animal. We deeply regret that our maintenance did not meet your expectations, we have discuss this with our team for future improvements.      We hope to serve you even better upon your next visit with us, look forward to welcome you back.   Kind Regards,

title: Relaxing and Peaceful.
review: Just back from a lovely stay here.  Recommended by friends & endorsed by ratings on here it didn't disappoint. No it isn't the small, locally run property than some compare it to, but it doesn't pretend to be. It is pricey but the quality supports that. Rooms are fabulous and service generally excellent (the only time we were let down on service was a pretty slow bellboy service and a long wait for lunch on the beach but the bar was partially closed for a refurb so it was a special circumstance). Resort layout is well throughout all built in 4 wings over 2 U shaped sections which all have a lagoon flowing around the edge, so every ground floor room has a swim up option! One side of the resort is focussed on adults - no barriers by the swim up rooms and the beach on that side is…

title: Fantastic resort, such a treat to have a holiday at the Marriott
review: The resort is isolated should you wish to explore the area however, there is a small town nearby and a good taxi service available.  The Resort has a magnificent aspect with a water canal that wends its way around the accommodation. The pool and waterways are pristine and the gardens beautifully kept.  The pool is huge and a bar available.   Our room was large and well appointed as was the bathroom and the service excellent. The Gym was well equipped and the instructors knowledgeable and obliging.  They ran personal tuition classes as well as Pilates, yoga, Ti chi, Fit-ball classes to mention a few. We had a number of spa treatments which were most enjoyable and the setting for these was beautiful and tranquil. The surf beach was safe and clean with plenty of lounges and an…

title: Best place for an Indian wedding!
review: Comfortable well furnished rooms and bathroom. All rooms overlooking water channels, that run right around the property and lead out of the pools. The ground floor rooms have direct access into that water...........and it is fabulous to swim and walk around the property in this idyllic war water.

title: Ok resort, good price but NOT JW Marriott standard!
review: Stayed with family in 3 rooms, found amazing package called "return to paradise" which included food and a daily massage...  Rooms nice traditional Thai style, water access room not as easy as it appears on pictures as you need to walk from balcony thru rocks and mud...to access pool in most wings...  Food was the most dissapointing! The package included all meals, bfast was good. Lunch basic and dinner very restricted menus in the 3 restaurants.  Biggest issue was the quality of food, smelled off sometimes, thing there is a big focus on keeping food cost down in this place. Having stayed at other JW's in Thailand and 3 of the Thai renaissance hotels, I was expecting the usual good quality...but was very dissapointed.  If you stay here, prepare to bring some immodium!  The set…

title: Nice, a little too remote for us
review: Dear Kurt Q,  Thank you for your feedback. Regarding the Pool access rooms we have two types of pool access rooms. One room type has a gate access that we allocate families too for child safety. This room type is the room type that you stayed in and has stepping stones out through a small garden to the pool. In recent weeks we have had a lot of rain so sincere apologies for the soil you make reference too. The other pool access room leads directly out into the pool which we sell to guests with no children as it does not have a gate or barrier between te room balcony and pool.  With regards to our food and beverage offerings, I am very sorry that you feel this way. Kurt Q, please be rest assured we operate our restaurants under the strict guidelines of a food saftey management system that exists on resort with paramount importance being on food safety. Chef prides himself on the quality of our offering and if i may re-affirm, we do not cut costs and put guest safety at risk. The saftey and well-being our guests is of the highest priority.  Thank you  Keith M. General Manager

title: Just Aweful no respect for Platinum Members!
review: It's a very nice property (maybe needs a refresh?)...our room was gorgeous and spacious - we booked one of the rooms that walks out into the (extensive) pool system. All the food we ate on property was delicious; and the breakfast is pretty incredible.  We were there as guests for a wedding. The property was a great venue for the wedding. However, the hotel is SO far away from Phuket Town that we would never actually stay there otherwise. We went on an ocean kayaking tour (highly recommend) and it took over an hour to get to and from the dock.   The staff is terrific

title: Superb Hotel, totally unique and awesome pool system and large beach
review: I have spent over 180 nights at Marriott Hotels this year and this was by far the most disappointing stay! I booked a hotel limousine from the airport confirmed by the hotel and got a Toyota Camry with a girlfriend in the front seat who got dropped off on the way!  The room was good as we took a pool access room and not the upgrade of Platinum as we wanted to be near our friends.  Friday night dinner we spent over $3000 for our birthday party which was excellently catered by the Olive restaurant and staff.  Two nights of our stay were paid by our friend who had paid in advance but we still received a bill for those nights to his extreme embarrassment! What a total let down by the resort.  The general staff are great but the front of house staff are totally useless and a bunch of…

title: Excellent Location for relaxation and nice resort
review: Thailand has certainly changed since I was there 20 years ago, but if you want a relaxing chill out then this hotel is perfect for all ages. I was very happy. My views:  Pool Massive, varied, approx 600m of 'pool rivers' to swim around, with bigger pools, pool bar, Jacuzzi stops, beds in pool, kids area, clean and beautiful. The best and largest pool I've ever seen.   Rooms Perhaps not 5 star but more then you need. Clean and great toiletries  Beach Very large, clean, quiet and good long walks along it. Great waves but also can chill out in shallow water.  Spa We had a couples treatment and it was superb, the spa area is 5 star no doubt  Food I read lots of great reviews about the food but with a high price. I felt the food was very good but not as amazing as others had said.…

title: Phone enquiry
review: Phoned regarding use of Marriott facilities for the day. I have previously stayed in Marriott so knew to be a good standard. I rang the hotel and made 3 attempts to understand the fast talking Thai lady , she put me through to someone else who then transferred me to someone else where I was put on hold.i gave up after 5 minutes!

title: Good 5* resort - could use a refresh
review: This resort has much to commend it, although for a 5-star its rooms show quite a bit of wear and tear. I booked a 2BR suite for 2 adults and 2 kids (8yo and 5 yo) and an extra pool view room (2 adults) in November.  The good: - quiet location - spacious and quiet suite with comfortable beds - quality food at restaurants open for dinner (although very pricey if you don't have a package) - prompt response from requests of housekeeping  - lovely decoration and cake in room on birthday - quick/easy/welcoming check in - large pools (not crowded for a large resort) - fusion massage at spa - kids club activities if your kids like craft  What needs work: - wear and tear in rooms (stained couch cushions, faded furniture, broken towel rail) which were otherwise very comfortable  - wear…

title: Second Visit Better Than The First
review: Dear Karen_ML_Melb,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum. We are very proud of our resort and the service we provide to our guests so we are very glad that you enjoyed our facilities and services provided.  I am very sorry our current appearance was not what you had anticipated. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel.  In regards to hotel upgrades and improvements, we do have preventative maintenance program to maintain our guest rooms and public facilities. The upholstery replacements you have mentioned in our guest rooms is currently ongoing   with replacement of all the luggage racks, cushions, outdoor cushions and other soft goods. These are simple replacements thus no noise or any inconvenience is expected. We have also noted the public toilet issue you have mentioned and shall close it for urgent maintenance.   Our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences caused to you during your stay over the last weekend as there was indeed a large wedding  in-house that featured a number of events.  If there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.     Karen_ML_Melb, we very much hope to welcome you back in the near future at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.    Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Great place! Highly recommend!
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak three years ago and had such great memories, that we decided to add a week to our SE Asia vacation. The resort is a great place to relax with a fantastic beach. The staff is friendly and attentive. The rooms are large and the beds extremely comfortable. The food in the Olive restaurant and the morning buffet in the Waterfront restaurant is of good quality and taste. The wine selection in the Olive is very large. The Czar bar is a great place to visit and have a pre-dinner drink with live music. Time goes by too fast when you are here.

title: All very nice "BUT"
review: I and my boyfriend stayed at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for a week in the end of November, it was a wonderful experience for both of us. The hotel itself is very unique and greatly designed. Rooms are nice and clean. Big enough for two person for sure.  Additionally, we love the food there. Especially in the Japanese restaurant! It is of course a bit expensive if you consider the averages expense in Thailand, however, depends on the quality and taste, we think it deserves! Importantly, I have to mention those Thai restaurants around JW Marriott along the beach. Yes, they are way cheaper than the Thai restaurant inside of the hotel, however, the flavour was not comparable! The Thai food in the hotel is greatly better than those other Thai restaurants. So, if you want to…

title: The worst JW Marriott I have ever been
review: Being SPG platinum for years and Marriott offer platinum status. I decide to try this place. The hotel is very run down and I am so surprise the head office would allow it to carry the JW Marriott name! No lounge , no breakfast are offered. Only two small bottles of local beer and a bowl of nut are the gift for the platinum member . Open the fridge some cans were already consumed. The list goes on.  Went to talk to the duty manager and her altitude was so bad that I decide to leave tomorrow ( right now I am still in this awful so call resort). The place to avoid in my opinion .

title: A Luxuary Escape!
review: Dear PhuketBunny11k  Thank you for your candid feedback and a very  warm welcome to Marriott as a valued SPG member.  I am so sorry that we were not able to upgrade you to a suite as you requested at check-in and that you feel the resort is looking run down. There are some areas that are not looking perfect due to the very long wet season but please be rest assured we are actively conducting a spring clean and touch up as the lovely dryer weather has finally arrived here in Khao Lak.  As a valued Marriott Platinum or SPG Platinum member, you are entitled to a number of great benefits which I am sure you are aware of. For your information though, Marriott branded resorts do not have Executive Lounges which you make reference too but I am glad you enjoyed your complimentary local beers and snacks which you requested upon check-in. So many of our guests appreciate the opportunity to have these complimentary gifts in the comfort of their own room.  I am surprised regarding your negative service experience which I sincerely apologize for as we do pride ourselves on providing caring thoughtful service to all of our valued guests.  I hope you had a safe trip back home to Phuket.  Kind Regards,  Keith Massey General Manager

title: Tropical Paradise
review: It really was just like the photographs!   A Tropical Paradise! A wonderful and relaxing experience in beautifully maintained spacious grounds with a 300m beach frontage directly onto a magnificent very quiet long non-touristy beach. The hotel boasts apparently the longest pool in Asia which was very well maintained. An emphasis on excellent friendly customer service guaranteed that during our eight nights all inclusive stay we lacked for nothing.  Hotel Reception even contacted us on our way from Phuket Airport to check on anything that we may require on our arrival at the hotel.  Wow!  Thanks to First for a great welcome and to Siri for sorting out a blip with our room, promptly and efficiently.  Selection of Restaurants was terrific and our dietary requirements presented no…

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear lrsteele,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable time with your stay with us from the very moment you arrived at the airport. It seems that the highlight of your stay with us was the service of our associates may it be from the associate from our front desk, restaurants, spa, or our beach and bar staffs. We Thais, are known for our friendly hospitality and genuine smiles.   We hope you welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Stunning hotel
review: Great food, luxurious spa facilities and spacious rooms. Easy to organise tourism trips via the hotel staff. We went in the rainy season, but were blessed with 10 days of sunshine. Well worth the extra cost :)

title: Fantastic and relaxing stay
review: My partner and I stayed in a Deluxe Lagoon Pool View room for a few days in mid November. This was ideal as although it was the start of the peak travel season, the hotel was not too busy and it wasn't too difficult to get a sun lounger by the beach! The staff were super friendly and helpful, the hotel was well-appointed and the room was spacious and comfortable. When I made the booking, I considered booking a pool access room but decided against it and I didn't regret this since the hotel is situated right on the beach and we spent most of our time there. We were also spoilt for choice for breakfast - the selection is amazing - and if you can bag one of the tables on the veranda looking onto the beach, well what more could you ask for?! We also used the shuttle a few times to…

title: It was my second time and even better than the first time
review: Dear TravelLover2803,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort!  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that you find our associates friendly and accommodating. Thank you for your comment regarding our breakfast, we take pride in providing many selection of food and fresh juices. One of the beauty of Khao Lak is how exclusive it is from all the cluster hotels and resort if Phuket. Therefore, we ensure our guest that we do offer many choices of restaurants and activities to do within the resort and transfer and recommendations if guest decide otherwise. We have taken your comment regarding complimentary transport to our team and will discuss what we can do.     We look forward to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Amazing property, service and stay!
review: It has been the second time I have stayed in this beautiful hotel and it was even better then the last time. The hotel is a real juwel and the food is awesome. The staff is the best ai have ever seen. I can only recomment this hotel with no doubts at all. I cant wait for the next time to come

title: Lovely people but management could do better
review: Dear Norman1501,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! It is always a pleasure to welcome back our returning guests, thank you for your continued loyalty to our resort and your recommendations to others. Thank you for your kind comments about our food and our associates. We hope you do feel at home during your visits with us and will continued to do so. We look forward to welcome you back again.  Kind Regards,

title: Brilliant
review: My wife and I had a wonderful honeymoon stay in January 2016. The staff were wonderful and the breakfast was the best we have ever experienced. We enjoyed the activities and amenities the resort offered, especially the bike tours. The local restaurants adjacent to the resort were great and we also enjoyed our time at the Italian restaurant at the resort. Thank you!

title: Amazing
review: A beautiful hotel -everything was perfect from the rooms, gym, bars and restaurants. We loved the lobby bar in particular and was served by such gracious hospitality in particular Oui, Pui, and Rachel. We will definitely be back to this JW  Meena And Sameer

title: Excellent Hotel to relax
review: The hotel is very nice and located at a beautiful beach. The staff is very friendly and helpful, the food and the drinks in the hotel restaurants are good. We liked the big pool area in which we could hop in from our room. Next to the hotel are 3 little local restaurants where you can eat good Thai food to cheap prices. Also massages outside the hotel area are available. If you want to go to the center of Khao Lak you have to take a taxi or a tuktuk. We enjoyed our stay at this hotel very much and can recomend it if you are searching for a great hotel at the beach to relax.

title: 12 night stay
review: Dear Xelafunk,  Sunny greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you rating us five stars and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the service of our associates, our food and beverage, and our famous infinity pool. Thank you of your recommendations to others, we hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: It was Fantatic and Deseve to be 5 stars👍
review: Overall we had a positive stay. I was expecting a very luxurious resort being a Marriott but there were a few disappointments. Upkeep and pricing being the main points. I will definitely visit  Khao Lak again, I would however be 50/50 in considering a stay in JW Marriott   Positive points:-  1. Fantastic reception area. The space and fixtures are excellent. 2. The pool. We had a pool access room in wing 4. Far from reception but very close to the restaurants and beach. 3. Beach front hotel  Negatives  1. Very expensive. Prices for drinks and food would be the same as the UK and in some cases higher.  2. Room required maintenance 3. Every morning woke up between 0300-0400 with the bins being emptied into a truck. 4. Vary rarely was there hot water  5. The hotel is a bit out of…

title: Resort and Service don't deserve five stars!
review: Dear Anthony H,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your holiday.  It seems that our infinity pool was the main highlight of your visit and we could not be more proud.
