We pride ourself for having the longest infinity pool in South East Asia, and it sure has been the highlight of many guests who visited us. Thank you for bringing up your concerns to us, we do understand that maintenance is important and we do constantly renovate throughout out the year despite our high occupancy. In regards to your comment our our food and beverage pricing, we believe that we provide high quality products and that our pricing are inline with other five star hotels and resort in surrounding areas.  Thank you for your review, we hope that you will revisit us again.   Kind Regard,

title: Relaxing at its best
review: We have throughly enjoyed our stay here from start to finish.  We were warmly greeted on arrival with a cool towel and drink, we were shown to our room and given a full explanation how everything worked, which I thought was a great touch, as we were travelling as a couple they moved us to a quiet part of the complex which we appreciated.  The room was spacious, clean with a king size bed which was so comfortable.  We only ate here once as we did find the food and drink very pricey, however we expected this as it is a five star complex, this didn't stop us enjoying a few drinks in an evening.  The pool facilities are excellent with plenty of sun beds and parasols for everyone, so there was no one rushing to reserve sun beds which is a bonus. The staff topped you up with iced…

title: Could be perfect
review: Dear DaveP75,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you so choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We could not be happier to her that you had a memorable from the very moment you checked in with us. It seems that the highlight of your stay with us were our amenities, our pool facilities, our breakfast, and the service of our associates and we could not be more happier. In regards to your recommendations, we are currently working on setting up a beach bar. Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you back again in the near future.     Kind Regards,

title: Great Hotel, Great Staff
review: Very nice welcome from the Swiss receptionist to a gorgeous resort. She took time to shown us round hotel facilities. We had booked a pool access room and were offered a choice of two. One at the adult (12 year old +) side with small private garden to pool. We opted for the second one even though it was on the family side because we preferred the direct access from deck to pool. It was very quiet, hardly seen any kids. We really liked the room. Thought I was walking into a spa due to the wonderful smelling oil burner to keep out mosquitoes. All so very Thai. The bathroom was really nice. We were very happy. Beach is beautiful, wonderful for walking along. Did have a scary encounter with an aggressive stray dog.  Plenty of sunbeds, non smoking areas (brilliant). Staff come round…

title: Fantastic place, isolated relaxation
review: Dear  Veronica T,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  We are thrilled to hear that our Swiss Management Trainee "Marion" has received you with a very warm welcome to our resort. It seems that you enjoyed our pool access room, the Quan Spa, our breakfast selection, and our famous infinity pool. We can see that the service of our associate is also the highlight of you stay with us and we could not be more proud. Our associates are surely the pride and joy of our management team and we could not be happier to hear that you were well serviced and had a memorable time relaxing at our resort. In regards to our food and alcoholic pricing, we believe that we use high quality products and that our pricing are in line with other five star hotels and resort in Khao Lak. We are happy to offer alternative options if guest want to venture out of the resort to dine or do other activities.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Relaxing stay
review: I stayed there with my wife for 4 nights. The hotel is simply remarkable. We had the pool access room which was very useful. The pool goes all around the hotel and is quite clean. The staff are very professional, very helpful and very friendly. We've tried all there restaurants which were very nice especially Olive (Italian restaurant), which I personally recommend. In short term, our stay was perfect and the place was great. We will definitely stay there again...

title: Pure indulgence
review: We had a great family stay here.There are 4 restaurants to choose from,offering different styles of cuisine.The pool(the longest in Asia),kept the kids busy for hours.It rained a bit here and there but we just parked ourselves at the pool bar and had a cocktail.Our package included massages and we both loved these, whichever style we chose-the therapists are all lovely and attentive.I had my 50th birthday at the resort and we had a great meal at Olive restaurant where all the wonderful staff sang me a Happy Birthday-I felt rather special at that moment.A big thank you to Arkom,sous chef at Waterfront restaurant for helping with our dietary needs.Would love to return one day.

title: Simply beautiful
review: Dear Hugh D,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your birthday. We could not be happier to hear that you had a special birthday and the you have been well taken care of by our associates.   We do have four restaurants on site, Waterfront for International, Sakura for Japanese, Takrai for Thai, and Olive for Mediterranean. In addition, we do provide special theme night such as BBQ Extravaganza, Catch from the Ocean, Japanese Buffet etc..   We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything else we could do to make  you next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: The most amazing staff and service
review: Our second visit in the last three months from the UK and our stay, which included all meals and a daily spa treatment, was outstanding.  The resort is beautiful, the staff friendly and helpful, the meals a sheer delight and the massages an added bonus.  It was simply a perfect 7 days and there is absolutely nothing I would have changed.  Thank you to all the staff for their warm welcome - we'll return - hopefully sooner rather than later.

title: Sakura Japanese Restaurant
review: Dear  FliPad,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We are glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our all-inclusive package. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our restaurants, massage treatments, and most importantly the service of our associates. Our associates are surely the gem of our resort, they work hard to ensure that they provide superb service while still maintaining a level of personal relationship with our guest. We hope that the memorable experience you had with us this time will entice you to return to us in the future. Our JW Marriott family cannot wait to welcome you back!  Kind Regards

title: Amazing resort
review: It’s very difficult to find much about the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to dislike. From check-in, to check-out, the staff demonstrated exemplary levels of customer service the like of which I have never experienced before. Indeed, it’s difficult to namecheck everyone we encountered but special praise must be reserved to those who took the trouble to send us a complimentary bowl of fruit and a “get well soon” card after our daughter slipped and cut her lip playing in the bedroom. Thank you, Stephanie, Marion, Apple and Nee for your concern, as well as those in the on-site clinic for your care.   The food on offer at this resort is extremely good for an all-inclusive. The choice and quality available at breakfast time is a veritable delight and the other restaurants – Olive,…

title: A Stunning Break Away
review: While we thought it was a bit far away after 90 minutes drive (in total comfort I might add) we arrived at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and were instantly impressed.  The surroundings, buildings, and amenities were outstanding and far too many to list.  However special mention must be made of the following:  The Pool - one of the loveliest swimming pools I've ever had the pleasure of enjoying - great temperature, kids free zone, only a few steps from each room and all connected easily to the main pool.   The Spa - pure indulgence, and absolutely top notch.  I enjoyed three massages - each one different, and a facial and each time was totally delighted.  Nong was my service provider each time and WOW - she was totally magnificent, professional, capable, and delightful.  The…

title: Not Nearly What We Expected
review: Dear dixiemc2015,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. Thank you for sharing your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   Our infinity pool is the longest infinity pool in South East Asia, and we could not be more thrilled to hear that you enjoyed it. There is nothing better than to be able to float endlessly through our beautifully sculptured landscape. Our Quan Spa has be voted Top 50 Spas on Booking.com, and our Spa associates work hard to ensure that all the treatment they provide are high quality of both service and products. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our restaurants and food selections. We take pride in your comments regarding the hospitality of our associates, as we Thais, are known for our friendliness and superb hospitality.   We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Great hotel... A few niggles but not major
review: It's not our first family beach vacation to Thailand. We are a party of five – 2 adults and 3 children aged – 11,10,5. We came to the hotel with high expectation and were extremely disappointed. The hotel is huge, and moreover - old. It seemed that time stood still for 20 years or so. The rooms although nice and big are noisy – one can hear people from the pool, the room next door and people walking down the hallway. The smell in the rooms is extremely (did I say extremely?!)  - Moisty!!! Breakfast is like one giant factory, which reminds me that when we entered the place was full – we had to wait for 5 minutes or so (totally exactable), but we were taken to a different room and they started opening new tables, with temperature less than 16 degrees…of course we didn't stay…

title: Great hotel.....5 star service questionable
review: Dear wipwop123,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.    As guest satisfaction of is a key priority, I am very sorry that your room fell short of your expectations. We do have thick walls, double glazed balcony doors and soundproof timber entry doors, however if you had experienced any issue with particularly loud noise please contact us. We have noted your comment about moisture in the room; if you would prefer we can offer a different room.  As you may have noticed, we are currently undergoing a facelift of some of our 1st floor corridors, which are currently closed. An Alternative route is available at the ground floor. We are undergoing renovation in order to provide a stylish décor in elegant Thai Fashion to our valued guest such as yourself.  Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the resort  team in an effort to improve our service.  Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Does not deserve 5stars
review: Just got back from 8 days at the JW Khao Lak....firstly the location is stunning.... Khao Lak has none of the sleaze and over developed nature of phuket.... Next where the JW is situated is amazing... A little out of town but set on a stunning beach and a true tropical paradise setting. On the room front we were upgraded to a pool access on checking in which was nice but rooms still the same.... I would agree with some other reviews that rooms are a little tired....spotlessly clean but I think a poor choice of materials on building has lead to a lot of wear and tear but they are still very good.... My only real niggle is with the design of the bath which is totally impractical.... It looks trendy but it takes so much water to fill the bath and so much time that you give up and…

title: Beautiful... but lacks the JW wow factor
review: Myself & my partner booked to stay here in October for 2 weeks, my partner had previously stayed at the JW Marriott in Phuket and couldn't rate it highly enough. We opted for the Khao Lak JW instead due to its remote location, opting for tranquility rather than the hustle and bustle of city life. On arrival via hotel transfer into the resort it ticked all the boxes, it looked very impressive. Upon check in, we were checked in by a male member of staff who decided to check us in stood at the desk and served us our drink &a refreshing towel stood at the desk too. He lacked the warm welcome and any rapport that the Marriott normally offers. When our room was ready we were shown to our room and our bags followed. On entering the room it was very spacious and decorated very…

title: Back again
review: We visited JW Marriott Khao Lak, October '15 and had a great time and said we would come back. The second trip was just as good as our last trip.  The accommodation, food and hospitality were excellent. The Thai people are very friendly and make you feel very welcome. The excellent hosts at the Waterfront restaurant were great to be with. A special mention to Boy, Poo, Tal, Laela and Nat whom we met last year and Phip, Pearl and Teaw who we met this year. The dinners at the Thai restaurant were great, J and Oil were excellent hosts. The Japanese restaurant was also great and our excellent host was Kit.  We enjoyed the pool and beach and cocktails upstairs overlooking the resort, beach and evening sunsets. We will be back. Chris and Nerida

title: Out of this world.
review: Dear Chris M,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! It is always a pleasure to welcome back returning guests, thank you for continued trust in our resort.   We could not be happier to hear that your recent visit at our resort was as memorable as your previous visits. All the associates that you have mentioned by name are our surely our superstars and we could not be more proud of their services. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our restaurants and bars.   We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make you next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: The most beautiful place!!
review: this resort is an absolute wonder. Architecturally Thai style, landscaped in such a way that all wings are quite private and all have access to the meandering pool which separates them. Rooms are spacious and well airconditioned. Room housekeeping service is excellent. Food is excellent. Staff very attentive and helpful. 2016 was our first visit, but it is certainly not our last.

title: Wonderful beach hotel with the best sunsets!
review: Dear  kvj565,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We are glad that you enjoyed the ambiance of our resort. Our rooms' decor has a touch of Thai while also be equipped with luxury necessities. We are proud to say that we have the longest infinity pool in South East Asia and it sure is the highlight of many of our guests' visit.  We cannot wait to welcome you back again in the near future, please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind Regards,

title: A Holiday to Remember!!
review: I could sum up this resort quite easily by saying this. It was a 4 star room, on a 5 star resort, with 6 star food and 7 star service!! We stayed for 8 nights in late October 2016 and besides the first two days when we get the edge of a typhoon that was going through Vietnam and it rained and stormed for 2 days, the weather was great. The staff are so friendly and the check-in process was great. We got picked up from the airport, and halfway back (it's about a 90 minute drive from the airport), the resort calls the driver and asks to speak to me, appreciating we've had a very long day coming from Melbourne, and it was late at night, they asked if there was anything we wanted ready on our arrival to help us, such as drinks, food, or anything special in the room! And that level of…

title: 5 Reasons why this is a wonderful resort to visit!
review: Dear John G,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We are glad to hear that you had a memorable experience with. As we are a JW Marriott, our associates will go above an beyond with in comes to the service we deliver to our guests. Thank you for your kind comment regarding our associates, we have shared your comments to the associates you have mentioned by name, and they could not be more thrilled. We hope that the experience you had with us this time will entice you to to return to us in the near future. Look forward to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind Regards,

title: Mr&Mrs Robertson
review: We booked this resort through Luxury Escapes purchasing a 8 night package with all meals included ,airport transfer & 8 massage vouchers.   5 Reasons why l recommend this resort! 1. The rooms are a good size with a huge comfortable bed,nice bathroom with huge shower , seperate large bath & a seperate toilet behind glass..(a little odd)! We had the opportunity to upgrade to a pool room on the ground floor where you have direct access to the pool but we were glad we decided not to take that option as we found our room on the 3rd floor to be more private & quieter ie..people not swimming pass your room all the time & being able to look straight in. The linen & cleaning of rooms what you would expect at a Marriott .  2. The pool is wonderful! ..3 kms of swimming pool ,amazing with 2…

title: Great relaxing holiday
review: A lovely place. Thankyou Thip and Laila for looking after us at breakfast each morning at waterfront Marriott. . We had great breakfasts and great holiday here... From Pam & Merv Robertson Queensland Australia

title: Great relaxing holiday
review: We were here for two weeks, good hotel, great service, friendly staff, especially Harry the bar manager. We loved breakfasts, I found the Miso station which served yummy soups.   The margaritas with banana chips and sweet potato chips which we drank and ate at the pool bars with caesar salad with prawns and seafood pizza so yummy and freshly cooked.   We had a pool access room which we made good use of and were in there rain or shine. Great accommodation and we were looked after. My husband loved the movenpick ice-cream. Thai restaurant was fantastic and so were the Italian and the Waterfront, never tried the Japanese, just love Thai food too much.

title: Great Place to Chill Out
review: Slight late review.... We stayed here at the beginning of September. Not the best time to come due to the rainy season. Some of the days were a complete washout, others bright sunshine. My wife was on a 5 day retreat hosted in the resort, so for quite a lot of time I was left on my own. We paid the upgrade to the swim up room. From memory it was an extra £20 (GBP) per night. The rooms are what you expect for a 4/5 star hotel- nothing extra special, but posh and clean. The hotel is a bit isolated, but if you just want to relax in a large 5 star hotel then it's great. The main feature of this hotel is the staff- I had a great time with the pool bar staff at the Aquamarine Bar. Pingping, Puk, Sky, Pond, Uom etc. They were great company, and their hospitality was excellent. Thanks…

title: A luxury resort at a bargain price.
review: Dear PL123,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for sharing your experiences with others here on TripAdvisor.  It seems like the service of our associates have been the highlight of your stay with us, and we could not be happier. The associates that you have mentioned by name, have received many kind comments from our guests regarding their superb service and friendly hospitality. As our location is quite a distance away from main cities, it is an ideal get away for those looking to relax or spend private time with their love ones    We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make you next stay even better. Our associates sends their regards.  Kind Regards,

title: Amazing hotel for families
review: Having stayed here 2 years ago, I looked for an opportunity to bring the whole family, 6 adults and 5 kids for a holiday. We took advantage of special prices on offer and occupied 3 pool access rooms between us. The accommodation was excellent and having the pool at our doors great. Meals were included in the deal and ranged from a smorgasbord breakfast to a choice of 4 restaurants for lunch and dinner - fab food. As well, all adults indulged in the Spa treatments, massages etc which were all included in the tariff. The kids loved the kids club. In all we had a great holiday.

title: Lucury Escape Holiday
review: Dear Warren D,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for sharing the memorable time you had at our resort with others. It sure is convenient to book an all inclusive package hence we do offer many different options catering to all guests preferences. We are happy to her that you were able to take advantage of our pool access rooms. As our infinity pool is one of the biggest highlights of our resort, having pool access rooms is surely a treat! We hope that the memorable service you had with us this time, will entice you to return back to us again in the future.  Kind Regards,

title: Very relaxing, floating around the pool a highlight
review: We stayed here for 3 nights , a family with 3 kids aged 8-15. All loved the hotel, beautiful hotel with exceptional service. Wonderful pools and a clean beach. Lots of stuff to do for everyone even if it's raining - kids club and games, great fitness center and classes. Excellent breakfast with wide choice. Staff and facilities are very kid friendly. The hotel restaurants are more expensive but there are good priced restaurants at walking distance just outside the hotel - a good Thai restaurant and also on the beach. Only comment is that as there were some rainy days some of the passages between the lobby and rooms/ restaurants were very slippery, should find a better solution as it's a safety issue

title: Still good to get away
review: Like many, we took advantage of the luxury escapes promo, which was an all inclusive deal consisting of 8 nights, all meals, massages etc  The resort is located approx 10 mins drive from khao lak central, and is very much on its own in terms of not having any resorts side by side.   The hotel appears older than what I've been told, but it has a fantastic little position on the beach, with a huge pool (definitely a positive) which wraps itself around almost the entire resort, making it so much nicer than having to swim in an over crowded pool.   Accomodation: We had a pool access room initially, which we found was too cramped for space with the four of us (2 adults, 2 kids), so we paid extra and upgraded to a family pool access room, which is almost the same as the other room,…

title: Great Staff, but unsafe, no management control
review: The place is very beautiful, staff are extremely friendly, Tal and Poo were wonderful hosts at breakfast every morning, especially Kind to our children .  The water slide is unsafe, my son cut out his front tooth. Management was very sorrow, but completely fails to judge safety for children in the facility. Keep a close eye!  We had a 3 day wedding with the pool only partially accessible and loud bass for hours over the entire place. Drones taking pictures of our children and drunken party guest wondering around at night. Management did not control any of that.

title: 10 Days of Heaven
review: Dear Philipp B  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us. We are delighted to learn that you love our resort and that associates took well care of you.  We regret to hear that some aspects of your stay did not exceed your expectation. It was very unfortunate that your child suffered minor injuries from the improper use of our facilities. As you know we attended to him immediately and provided all necessary care to ensure he is well. One of our key priorities is to provide the highest level of safety to our guests.  During your stay we had a private function at a small section of the pool which we had separated off to ensure that resort guests and function participants alike enjoy a splendid stay with us. Please again accept our sincere apologies if you felt being disturbed by the event. We also noticed the unauthorized videography and have taken immediate steps to ensure all footage is deleted.  Dear Phillip B, as mentioned to you already during your stay again our heartfelt apologies that we did not live up to your expectations. We sincerely hope we will be able to host you again soon at our resort. Please do contact me if you wish to do so and I will personally ensure you have a memorable stay with us.  With kind regards  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Great pool and service
review: By Claire's husband, Marcel and for our boys Hugo and Toby, who all had the best time ever from 13/10 for 10 days. From the moment we were promptly picked up at the Airport at 1.30 AM and arriving so tired the staff were very gentle with us having travelled 22 hours. The rooms were beautiful and cleaned and tidied every day. The Pool was incredible so clean and well designed with amazing infinity bars and staff that made the best cocktails. The breakfast and lunch smorgasboards were the best I have ever seen and tasted with the cooks doing a great job. The restaurants were equally as good and food wonderful and massage incredible, thanks Fern and Gai. But the best part was the lovely people who worked at the resort, even writing this email I get tears of happiness, I cant…

title: Remote, great escape
review: Think this is a very smart comfortable bustling hotel offering excellent rooms facilities and service by brilliant staff who are very obliging. Could mention lots of great features but in particular the bathrooms and showers are very good, as are rooms and beds. Lots of sockets and have USB and shaver outlets. Complimentary umbrellas are a useful nice touch and wow the 3km of swimming pools are amazing. Excellent food choice and quality from 4 restaurants, 2 pool bars and deli but note they are pricey. Lots seem to be on meal deals. We were on inclusive breakfast (excellent) and never needed anything before dinner. Could benefit from increased choice of TV channels and better reliability of signal, that is poor, particularly in view of frequency of rain. Could take DVDs but not…

title: spectacular setting , but service leaves a lot to be desired
review: we were quiet surprised with the size of the resort and the amount of rooms . but it lacked atmosphere. because of the 3kilometer pool you didn't get too much of a chance to mingle with people , drinks were affordable at happy hour only. wine is out of most peoples budget.we went with luxury escapes deal and the meals included were set menus with a choice of about 4 meals each course which were quiet nice[ you had 3 restaurants to choose from] we went with the understanding that we were getting airport transfers  both ways but found we had to pay for return to airport, which is about 2 hrs drive. we had no hot water for the first few days but when complained was told you had to run water for at least 9 minutes each time you needed hot water.the fridge in our room kept going on…

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear  Reynard1944,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.   Thank you for your kind comments regarding our associates service and food quality in our food and beverage outlets.   We do apologize about the issues you have mentioned and will review it with our management team for future improvement.  The Inclusions of your package are mentioned on your travel documents as  one way transfer to the airport. However we have taken note of the issue and will address it with your travel agent.  It is the hotel procedure to pre-authorize the amount on credit card for usage during your stay, and the unused portion is released on the day of departure. This process ensures a smooth check out process.   We sincerely apologize for not having delivered towards your expectations and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: The only way to maximise pool time!
review: It is very difficult to find any negatives about this hotel...it is beautiful. The grounds are very well kept & all the employees are helpful & very friendly. The food in all the restaurants was very good & I can highly recommend the Thai restaurant. The pool that meanders around the whole site is incredible & I would definitely recommend a visit.

title: Beautiful setting, wonderful staff
review: Dear Me19491943,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate your kind words regarding our hotel facilities, our restaurants, and the service of our associates. Our associates work hard to ensure that all our guest leave with a memorable time. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Experienced both highs and lows
review: Getting to the hotel was a bit of a long haul.  It takes about 90 minutes from Phuket airport.  After long flights to get there, it was a bit of a hurdle.  But when you arrive - smiles and wonders all around!  A luxurious setting and a welcome with a cold towel and some yummy cold lemongrass and ginger tea.  The staff were great - everyone was helpful, friendly and just so very smiley!  But be warned - if you are the inner-city scowly type like myself, unseasoned in regular smiling at strangers, you will be tested!  My face muscles were aching from all the smiling after a few days!  We locked onto this place via the Luxury Escapes website.  There was an "all inclusive" price for 8 nights - Deluxe Lagoon Pool View room, all meals, transfer from the airport, discounted transfers…

title: Paradise!
review: I can't find the right words for this resort but it is beyond my expectations!.. Luxury in a hidden paradise! The staff are very helpful, friendly and hospitable. The food are scrumptuous may it be the Thai, Japanese or Meditteranean restaurant onsite; not to mention the buffet breakfast that serve a wide variety of international food is definitely gonna get your appetite working,.. The room service is superb and as soon as you ask for one, they are on to it swiftly. There's a lot of recreational activities (eg. bike riding, tennis, squash, gym etc.) and believe me the lagoon pool is massive! Plus you got the option to swim at the beach. You can also book snorkelling or diving activities. I have nothing bad to say about this place, I have been to a lot of luxury hotels and…

title: Excellent facilities in a tropical setting
review: We were a group of 6 adults and 4 children ranging from 10 years old to 2 1/2 and the range and standard of activities and facilities were excellent for all of us. Especially having pool access outside our room worked really well and the pool extends for a huge distance. There are also general pools and a kiddy pool. The gym was well equipped and the older kids enjoyed the games room and the younger kids, the kids club. The staff were extremely helpful and many of them spoke good English. The spa also is worth mentioning as it is in a beautiful setting and is very professionally run. Our package included all meals and there was a choice of 4 restaurants for evening meals although some were closed on some nights. Finally, I wish to mention the buffet breakfast which was extensive…

title: Pool is great, food is good after exploration
review: been here before, went back and yes mixed feelings. no upgrades of any kind, maintenance for keeping the place in piece however no improvements seen, been here approx 3 years ago, also summer time. changed room, were well served by the staff, no complaints there, they did not make the hotel. the thai restaurant was good food, also perfect service. next time we just go somewhere else. also the hotel does not honor any marriott members different from all JW's we stayed before and also 3 years ago there was a much better service. anyway, seen it done it and not too bad, let me be clear on that, but not worth the money. this is a butlins special

title: Great, all inclusive resort with amazing pools
review: Dear Bob S,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum. Thank you for your kind words regarding our Thai Restaurant Takrai, I am glad you enjoyed our culinary options and our friendly service.  In regards to hotel upgrades and improvements, we have noted your comments and shall review it with our senior management for future action. We do have preventative maintenance program to maintain our guest rooms and public facilities. Our high speed internet was upgraded last year inclusive of the beach and public areas. Our Kids club and teen zone was also expanded with additional games and culturally sensitive activities.  In regards to the Marriott Rewards member’s benefits, applicable elite benefits are as follows: -    Upgrade to next available category -    20% discount on Food & Beverage -    15 % discount on Laundry   -    50 % bonus points on base point earning -    20 % discount In our Quan Spa on A la carte menu.  If there is anything we can do to further assist you please do contact us directly.     Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, we hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Great pool
review: We went here to relax for 10 nights with the kids (6 and 3) after being at a busier resort. The JW Marriott easily provided everything we wanted, it had a good kids club and on call babysitters as well as amazing pools. In fact so many pool areas that you could not hope to use all of them! We went for the inclusive package so all meals were included, and there was a great range across 4 main venues, with lots of different specialty nights. The wine list was also international and well priced (for Thailand). Rooms were a good size and had lovely views. All of the staff were very helpful, and always eager to do anything they could to further improve your stay.

title: Poor poor poor
review: Unfortunately, one of the worst experiences in Thailand and I will write this long review just for the hope that hotel management will improve their service.  We were a group of 2 families with young kids so we booked 6 months in advance 4 pool access rooms for 6 nights . After reservation was made we sent our confirmation numbers to the hotel so they could block for us those 4 rooms near each other and we asked connecting rooms for each family so each family will have 1 king room connected to 1 twin room for the kids.  We got confirmation from hotel for that so we were pleased.  When arrived to hotel we met Siri who is the reception manager on duty. With  her poor service she told us that they dont have connecting rooms for us, only one family could "enjoy" this connecting room…

title: Most Dissapointing for a Marriott
review: Dear Liorlev,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.    I am terribly sorry to hear the string of issues happened during your stay. I would like to assure you that this is not the way we treat our guest.  May I take this oppotunity to apologize about the miscommunication regarding the connecting rooms. Our room’s configuration has pairs of connecting rooms in different buildings and floors. It is unfortunately not possible to have 4 connecting rooms close by.   Not related to this we have experienced a breakdown of the hot water system in one section of the property as you have pointed out. Due to the complexity of the issue, it took longer than expected to identify the problem despite us flying in a specialized contractor and emergency spare parts.   Unfortunately I was not in the Hotel during this time however I believe you have met our Director of Operations and duty Manager who contacted your travel agent to make alternate arrangements. For additional assistance please contact me directly.  Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the future.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Another Luxury Escapes Visit
review: As a Marriott’s rewards member l normally favor this hotel chain.  After 4 days of an 8 day holiday this has now changed. In the last 12 months l have stayed at 2xJW Marriott’s , 1 Marriott Marquis and 1 Ritz Carlton , based on my patronage, l believe l know what to expect from a Marriott hotel .  The Hotel layout and the way the rooms are spread across the resort give a nice ambience to the hotel, bear in mind that many hotels in Thailand have lovely settings.  The Marriott Khao Lak is a Marriott in name only , to date this would be the lowest standard Marriott l have had stayed  in . I had booked to stay 8 days but decided to check out after 4 days. Check- in was excellent no issue here.   The 1st night we did not dine in the hotel ( and in retrospect should have not eaten in…

title: Wonderful place to stay
review: Dear TBGH,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   One of our key priorities is to provide the highest level of friendly and courteous service. While it was a pleasure having you here as our guest, i was disappointed to read your feedback regarding the service our team provided.   I am very sorry to learn that the quality of service provided by our food and beverage team did not quite meet your expectations. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the team in an effort to improve our overall dining experience. We do apologize for the inconvenience caused during your breakfast and have extended the opening hours accordingly.   I’m very sorry to learn about your credit card issue. Please note that due to Thailand credit card fraud protection policies the hotel is unable to charge your American express or any other card without your signature authorization.  Please accept my sincere apology for the issues you have mentioned, please contact me directly for further assistance.   Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Dinner on the beach
review: Family of 2 adults, 2 teens and an 8 yr old in adjoining rooms.  Stayed for 10 nights/9 days through Luxury Escapes.  Wing 3 first floor for the first two nights and then took up very reasonable offer to upgrade to a pool access room in Wing 5 for the remaining eight.  Five days really good weather, 2 days mixed, with fine mornings and wet afternoons, and two very wet days.  Weather did not interrupt holiday due to warmth.  Package included all meals across the four restaurants, spa treatments and one-way airport transfer.  Overall a really good stay and would love to come back, but... A few disappointing issues first.  We had room service twice.  Very good menu, but both times all meals served were cold.  Housekeeping changes bed linen every three days for environmental…

title: Amazing
review: We had an amazing time at JW Marriott Khao Lak.. visited with my husband and my two children on a 2 week holiday. The Hotel is amazing and the staff are fantastic!! Food great and well worth staying in the hotel for. Just beautiful.. my only recommendation is August is rainy season so avoid! We didn't know but still enjoyable the hotel even provide JW Marriott umbrellas which we used on a regular basis!! So worth a visit...

title: Excellent
review: Dear Phiuth,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to spend your family vacation. We appreciate your kind comments regarding the service of our associates and our food selections. August is surely one of our rainier months, however, the weather remains warm year round and we provide many rainy activities at our resort to keep our guest entertained. We glad you enjoyed your time here with us, it would be a pleasure to welcome you back in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: wonderful place
review: We came here with another couple which we brought an eight day Cudo deal all inclusive of meals & 8 spa treatments.  Well it was amazing, the food was absolutely delicious & such a good choice. The pools at the resort are also amazing, we had a direct swim up pool room & loved it.  The spa treatments are also excellent, you come out of there floating!!! Just outside of hotel is a 7 eleven & down the bottom end some beach massage, laundry 80 baht a kilo & comes back next day.  We have had a wonderful holiday here, thank you.

title: Amazing place
review: Dear  locko61,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   We could not be happier to hear that you had a wonderful experience at our resort. In regards to your comment about the food we provided, we want to ensure that our guest are able to have many options of dining selections and look forward to try the various restaurant options through out their stay: Sakura for Japanese, Olive for Mediterranean, Waterfront for International Buffet/ A la Cart, and Thai for Ta-Krai.   We hope to service you again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards,

title: OMG It's Eating time again?!?
review: It's a really beautiful hotel. Large rooms, some with pool access, excellent service, wonderful garden. We loved the breakfast, the choice of food is really impressive. Restaurants offer a great selection of food on an excellent quality.  The garden and the whole pool is impressive.

title: Apart from Rain everyday, we loved it.
review: We had an 8 night Luxury Escapes vacation. We had three rooms, and were luckily enough to be upgraded to the area away from the Kids pool area.  Our rooms were lovely, but the aircon was freezing.  We had balconies overlooking the canal pools. On arrival Lovis looked after us, and she was so friendly, funny and informative. We were shown to our rooms.  Our room had cigarette butts on the balcony, which I think came from the room above us, as Ya, who kept our room immaculate was wonderful.  I doubt she would have missed them. It rained, and rained. We spent some time on our balconies, but the rain kept us inside a lot. I wish when I head read reviews on the weather I had known this. Yes I know, no one can predict the weather, but the locals all thought it was common knowledge…

title: Really satisfying
review: Dear Phuketwergoing,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you sharing such detailed review of your experience of your stay.  We are happy to hear that you had an awesome experience with the service and friendliness of our associate Lovis, from the very first moment that you have checked in to our resort. Ms. Luvis is adored by many of our guest for her upbeat personality and hospitality services. As for the star of your comment, Ms Laila, we could not be more proud of her. Ms. Laila has been awarded and recognized for her superb hospitality, and set as an example for all our associates. We have shared your kind comments to her and her team.  As per your comment regarding the food you had at our Ta-krai Restaurant, we have taken this matter seriously, as the health of our customers is our number one priority. We  have spoken to our chef regarding the matter to ensure that we will continue to only serve food of the highest quality and proper preparations.   We hope to gain back your confident in us by serving you again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Great Pool, Great Location
review: Frankly we were skeptical going to this place but it turned out to be a good decision. The best part is The Lagoon Pool. My advice : spend a few extra bucks and take the pool access room...it adds that icing on the cake. Do try the the neighborhood massages (to the left on beach) and the food at adjoining shacks. They are too much value for money.

title: Fantastic Place to Stay
review: Dear Brijbhuvan S,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa. Thank you for sharing your experience with others here on TripAdvisor. We appreciate you recommendation to others about our pool access rooms. It surely is wonderful to be able to directly access the pool from the comfort of your own rooms. We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Luxury Escape!!!
review: This is a beautiful property with a friendly, accommodating staff. About 11/2 hours from Phuket, the beaches are lovely. The pool is, I think, one of the longest in Southeast Asia. It has swim up bars with yummy drinks. There are three good restaurants on site. We found the Thai restaurant particularly good. The breakfast bar has so much to choose from, it took us days to sample everything.  We were 5 adults and 4 children, all under 10. We each had poolside rooms. The kids loved that.   Not so much the seniors. It was difficult getting into the pool - especially for one of us with a slight mobility problem. And impossible to get out of without help. There seemed to be no easy access into or out of the pool-even in the main areas.     The property is big, so plan to do a lot of…

title: Beautiful place with very helpful restaurant staff
review: Still at this resort, from five morning, three were with a cold sower. Food and drinks are very overpriced. The average vine list, with a very high price. Not the best destination for a relaxing holiday. Unsupervised,screaming children everywhere.

title: Awsome family holiday
review: Dear Edvina K,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.    May I take this oportunity to apologize about the hot water issue. We have send our engineer to your room to correct the issue, I trust now everything is in order.  We feel that our Menu and  pricing are in line with other estabishments in the south of Thailand and offers a good value. We do have promotions available in some of our outlets please consult our food and beverage weekly program or reach out to  our associates for more details.     Although we fell short of meeting your expectations yesterday, I hope we can make up to you during the remainder of your stay. Please contact myself or any of our associates,  so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Almost Perfect
review: A great holiday destination to have fun and relax with the family. Massive lagoon swimming pool is adventurous for kids and fun to float around on for adults.  The all inclusive package is great but be careful on the drinks as they are not included and can hurt.  If you can get a pool access room you will just love it. Really enjoyed the resort.  If you plan on site seeing, walk out to the road and book a taxi as its heaps cheaper and you can book for a day rate.  Resort staff are friendly and very helpful. My tip on restaurants at the resort if your with kids is Olive. Live band who love kids requests, great food and very relaxed on the deck b if its a nice night. Kids play on the grass infront while you enjoy time together between courses.  Had a great stay.

title: Amazing holiday
review: Dear Jake W,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor  Thank you for your kind words regarding our infinity pool. To highlight our pool, we have many activities and shows though out the week: coconut boat visits selling drinks, coconut boat race, coconut boat room service delivery, water aerobics, and drum ritual shows. In regards to things to do in Khao Lak,  there are surely many well renown Natural Parks and Islands that guest can ventured out too: Khao Sok National Park, Similan Island, Surin Island, Elephants tours etc.  We hope that you will visit us again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Folio incorrect, poor F&B. Nice room.
review: Stayed for a week in September. Travelled with a party of 12, unfortunately, the most important part of travelling with a group they got wrong. We were very insistent right from the start that we were all to be together in the wing right behind the Quan Spa, alas, this did not happen. The resort is huge and we were placed all over the place. This area on the ground level right behind the spa really is the best to be, lovely grassy area between the patio and the pool and I think the only rooms to have this. The rooms were great, a little musty, but that's what you get in the wet season. Quan Spa fabulous, food in all restaurants fabulous, all staff friendly and efficient, with exception of Reception, they need some more customer service training there. Great Wifi, hard, but very…

title: Day care on steroids
review: Well where does one begin!  The pros Beautiful grounds Pleasantly appointed rooms Hospitable staff Efficient punctual pick up at the airport Quality food especially the stand alone restaurants. A fantastic gym with quality equipment in numbers  The cons 1.After a lengthy flight no early check in or offer to freshen up as other resorts in this area offer. We have noticed a late check out lounge since but was never offered the facility 2.A lengthy wait for our luggage to get to our room after we were given the key. 45 mins after entering our room.Frustrating after already waiting so long to freshen up. 3. The Waterfront buffet is a lovely three room area however the children run amuck as parents enjoy their responsibility free role. It is less than appetising watching children…

title: Beautiful hotel for our honeymoon, loved the lagoon pool design, excellent everything... At a premium.
review: Dear  Charmaine A,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.   Thank you for your kind comments regarding our room’s quality, efficient service and food quality in our food and beverage outlets.   I am very sorry to lead about the issue that happened upon check in. We do have a lounge available for early arrival or late check out; perhaps our associate may have not indicated that service availability to you. We will ensure that additional training is provided on this matter to correct this moving forward. However we did provide your room as quickly as possible and ahead of the check in time by 3 hours.  In regards to adult only areas, the waterfront restaurant north wing is reserved for adults only and the main wing for families. We would be delighted to arrange seating on that area. We also have a dedicated adult pool in the center of the resort away from the kids pool.   We do understand your frustration on this issue; we will further emphasis on training our associates to improve communication with our guests.    Thank you for being a valued guest, we sincerely apologize for not having delivered towards your expectations and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: One of the best resorts we have been to
review: What a brilliant hotel to spend our 2 week honeymoon!  We stayed in a deluxe double, pool view, B&B, September 2016.   Good:  The hotel is gorgeous, despite the fact they are currently making some 'touch ups' to the paint and some of the rooms... Not that we really noticed.  The pool is quite frankly the best pool I have ever swam in and we are frequent travellers. Winding lagoon style pool swerved its way around the majority of the hotel, 2 swim up, cashless bars allowed drinks to be served anytime. As there were so many pool access rooms due to the design of the pool there were always plenty of sun beds available.   The rooms were beautifully styled, sized, and decorated (especially the gorgeous bathroom). Satellite tv and super fast wifi kept us entertained when the tropical…

title: Awesome family holiday
review: Always friendly & efficient staff, great food at all of the restaurants and the best pool we have ever experienced. The rooms and facilities were excellent and the Thai & Japanese restaurants were our favourites.  We were on an all inclusive package (the meals at all of the restaurants were included), but we note that they were quite pricey (it is 5 star after all) The buffet breakfast was outstanding! The spa struggled with the demand, however, the massage that we did have there was good. It is rare that you can go to a resort that is both couples friendly and family friendly.  The pool is so big, meandering through the resort, that you never feel crowded or affronted by the noise - a great design. We highly recommend this resort. We went to another Khao Lak resort after this…

title: Best holiday ever
review: This was our first holiday with our 1 year old girl and it was simply the best. From the time we got to The Marriott the staff are very professional and friendly. Everyone was so accommodating from the front desk, house keeping and restaurants. Even the pool cleaners are lovely to speak to and they all put you first. We had a very efficient lovely lady Tuean, who cleaned our room daily and played with our little girl. We had a Deluxe Lagoon Pool Access room and it was the best room we've ever stayed in. So luxurious and having the beautiful pool access was so special. As we had a toddler it was great having the glass pool fence up, as she could play out on the deck safely and enjoy hopping into the pool anytime of the day. Our package included some massages from the Quan Spa at…

title: Lovely Time
review: Nice hotel, little out of the way but that's why you chose Khao Lak to stay. We had a pool access family room and were "upgraded" to the 2 floor rooms being a gold member, however, I declined it because the whole purpose was the pool access room.  We had a wonderful time going around in the pool.  Kids club was excellent as well.  We will be back.

title: Fabulous family holiday
review: Dear Todd W,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for rating us five stars, we hope that your rating reflects the experience you had with your stay at our resort. .  Our infinity pool is the selling point or our resort, therefore having a pool access pool is surely a bonus for those who would like to access our pool straight from the comfort of their own room. We are glad that you find our Kids Club wonderful, we have added many new activities such as Thai Dessert Making Classes, Thai Weaving Classes, Clay Making Classes etc..  We hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Still amazing!
review: My family of 7 including 2 grandchildren have just had a brilliant holiday - the food was excellent and was geared to handle both children and adults.  The breakfast is the best I have had anywhere and evening meals are held in smaller more intimate places.  The swimming pool stretched through the hotel wings is both fun waist deep and constantly cleaned.  One of the rooms we had led directly onto the pool through the rooms porch.  The kids loved that. I would suggest that any family upgrade to the rooms with direct pool access to really enjoy this hotel. Highly recommended

title: Holiday with hubby
review: Dear annettefoodstylist,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your time to share your experience with others on Tripadvisor.  We could not be happier to hear that you had had a memorable time with your family during your stay at our resort. While our resort is very suitable for adults and couples that are are looking for a sweet escape, it is also family friendly with areas equipped with pool slides and many fun activities at our Kids Club. Thank you for your recommendations of our pool access rooms to others, our infinity pool is surely the highlights of many of our guests.   We hope that you will think of us as your choice of destination resort again in the near future. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Just so relaxing
review: Our second stay at the beautiful JW Marriott in Khao Lak was brilliant, and it still manages to impress, even on dull weather.   We stayed 7 nights in a family room which was more than adequate for our family of 2 + 3.  Rooms are well presented and suitable space for our family, while allowing direct pool access to the never ending lagoon pool.   While the hedges in front of the room provofe privacy, it doesn't allow view of the pool, which would have been preferred to enable us to supervise our children swimming.  The resort is secluded, which is a plus, and the resort it self is well equipped to be able to cater to all desires, with 4 restaurants on site as well as numerous others within walking distance of the beach or on the road.   Kids club is brilliant, with plenty of…

title: Five Star Treatment
review: The people working at this resort are the stars here. Everyone we encountered was on the top of thier game - friendly and happy and helpful. The rooms are relatively spacious but will be in line for somewhat of a refurbishment soonish. Nevertheless they are quite comfortable with great air conditioning and showers.  The food service in the Japanese, Thai, and Italian restaurants got high approval ratings from our group and we were on the "group/package" menus. There is a reason why everyone seems to rave about the breakfast buffet; it is spectacular to say the least. Bravo!

title: Enjoyable stay
review: We spent 8 nights there. The staff at the restaurants are very friendly and welcoming. The food is varied and very good, with a choice of 3 restaurant for dinner. The pool was great as it's very large, there are some deep areas and shallow. The beach while we were there was rather churned up with sand at the edge with a strong under tow at the wave break We started staying in a pool access room, the room was very dark and had a damp odour. I would recommend the higher floors if you like sunshine to come through. The common areas a very good. The spa is beautiful though the treatments included in package, specially the facials are very ordinary. I would go for an aroma therapy massage, much better deal. We would stay here again.

title: Staff excellent very friendly
review: Room very clean pool excellent  if your on ground floor you can get straight in the pool its huge best pool I've been in lovely and warm.taxis very cheap plenty of them good location beautiful beach the best. Plenty of restaurants  visit phi phi island and James bond island brilliant hotel quite expensive expected in a 5 *restaurant serve a,lcarte food exvcellent.Thia staff lovely friendly welcoming couldn't fault anything

title: Wonderful relaxing holiday
review: My husband & I visited the resort to celebrate my 50th birthday ..... I can't fault the resort! The staff are so lovely and friendly and greet you everytime. The pool bar staff very quickly learn your favorite drinks and it is served with a smile. The pool is so great, we walked the length of it countless times and as a result gained no holiday weight :)   We enjoyed the massages that were included with our Luxury Escapes deal and also took advantage of the cheap massages on offer just outside the entrance of the resort. We used the tailor at the entrance also and was very impressed with the clothing and service. We also went to the 7/11 to purchase drinks & snacks and had our laundry done for 70 baht a kilo which was ready to pick up next day. Next time we visit and we…

title: WHAT A GEM
review: Dear Jackree66,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort to celebrate your birthday.  We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable time here with your stay our our resort. You were in good hands with the associates at our Pool Bar and Czar Bar. Ping Ping, Pocky, and many of our associates at Caza Bar, have received many kind comments for their superb service and friendly hospitality. We have shared your comments with our team.  Our Quan Spa has been voted top 50 spas on booking.com, and our Spa associates work hard to ensure that our guest leave with an utmost feeling of relaxations.  We are excited to hear that you are making plans to revisit us again. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your stay even better.  Kind Regards

title: Exceeded our expectations
review: We booked this holiday over a year ago and had been looking forward to it for ages. We knew there was a risk coming in the rainy season (September) but we simply wanted the chance to relax. We took the shuttle offer from the hotel and were met and transported from Phuket airport in a comfortable mini-van. We were greeted on arrival and our greeter sat down with us and handled our booking in, we already felt welcome. Our room was 2016, easy to remember, it is the year ! Lovely clean room, and out the back, just 5 steps and we could slip into the snaking 3km long swimming pool that was immaculately clean all the time. We had an all inclusive deal, so we have an excellent breakfast buffet every day (breakfast fitting for Europeans/Aussies/Japanese/Chinese, they had it all. Lunch in…

title: Great getaway
review: Dear  LarryGS,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We are proud to hear that you had a memorable experience from the very first moment you checked in with us. It seems like you were able to take advantage of our direct pool access room, it surely is a treat to be able to dive in to our endless infinity pool straight from the comfort of your own door steps. We are glad that you got a chance to try our different restaurant outlets, we are open for your comments so that we can improve our food quality and sections. All of our restaurants has it's own Tripadvisor page. Thank you for your kind comments about our Olive Manger and our Somelier, we have shared your comments with them.   We hope that you will come back to visit us again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make you next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Amazing Pool and attentive staff so nice
review: I have been to Phuket several times, however this as a first family holiday I wanted to go somewhere that's quiet and relaxing for the kids.  Khao Lak was certainly that! The staff at the hotel by far provided the best customer service I have ever seen. The restaurant staff all knew our names by the 2nd day.  I have read reviews on the hotel being expensive with their meals and messages etc; however the level of cleanliness and service for it speaks for itself. They do have a lot of overhead and staffing to pay for to keep the place the way it is. I would definitely visit again.

title: Relaxing & great service again.
review: Stay September, Even this season quite rain a lot but resort its own amazing and huge with many restaurant in resort variety of food and choices so enjoy so much with real relax with Thai hospitality. Recommended for family and couple and could be alone if you need to retreat yourself its deserve to visit

title: Friendship and Relaxation
review: Like the earlier post, this was our second holiday at the Marriott. Agreed, it was a most welcome return. If you're expecting to walk into the Peninsula in Bangkok however, this isn't the hotel for you. I give it 5* for a laid-back vibe and attentive service & facilities rather than any sophisticated wow factor. As always, the wow factor is in the eye of the beholder. However if you want to swim, relax, read, enjoy a quiet drink and be greeted & served by friendly staff, the Marriott is a great place to put your feet up and forget your worries for a week or two. Specific information/opinions on what to do, rooms, services etc is posted on myriad posts earlier. Only particular mention this time was the personal and warm welcome we received from management on our arrival. Much…

title: Second visit was as wonderful as our first!!
review: We are not really people to return to the same place for our holidays - however after having an amazing time here last year, we were so keen to return again this year!  We travelled again on a Luxury Escapes package (really incredible value for what you get!) - this time with family. There were 5 adults and 4 children (aged 6, 6, 8 and 10) in our group.  We totally concur with all the positive comments made by other travellers on this site - pool, restaurants, staff, room, spa all wonderful! Rather than go over these things specifically, here are some tips that you might find helpful if travelling to this resort with kids:  - last year we had a pool view room. Decided to treat the kids this year and upgrade to a pool access room. We were not disappointed and would highly…

title: A pleasant enough stay, with room for a few improvements - but not quite 5 star
review: Dear saflinn,   Warm Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for your continued loyalty to our resort, and choosing us again as your choice of destination resort this year. Thank you for sharing your experience with others here on Tripadvisor.   We are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pool access rooms. It surely is a treat for the kids to be able to jump in the pool directly from the comfort of their own rooms. We have received many feedback in regards to adding more diverse activities for both genders at our kids clubs, and we have started to provide fun activities such as Thai weaving classes, Thai Dessert making, and Clay Classes. We want to make sure that our guest don't miss the chance to cheer on their favorite team, therefore we ensure that we have the appropriate channels available for our guests. You were in good hand with our associate Ms. Pearl, she has received many positive comments regarding her hospitality and kind heart.   we cant wait to welcome you back again in the near future. Please dont hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Oustanding experience, amazing resort and staff
review: Stayed for 8 nights on a Luxury Escapes 'Package' that was upgraded to Deluxe Pool Access Room.  As well as breakfast, the package included lunch and dinner meals for 2 person and 8 spa treatments.  We travelled with another couple on the same package, and one of our sons on a regular Marriott booking (entry-level room with breakfast).    Both couples included Thais, and many years (40 years +) of combined experience living/visiting Thailand between the 2 non-Thais.  We deliberately visited in the low (wet) season with the prevailing SW monsoon, knowing the weather would be a bit rainy and the beach rough - this was expected and fine with us, but could be a disappointment for 'first-timers'.  The pros.    First, the local staff.  Without exception local staff in all areas of the…

title: A great stay!
review: Dear fokkerguy,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa. Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experiences with others on TripAdvisor.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed you time here at our resort despite the weather during you stay period. During rainy seasons, our resort have many fun complimentary activities such as pool competitions, Pandanus Flower making, Animal Towel folding, Origami classes, Shuffle board challenge, balloon art making, Thai , Meditation classes etc.   We take pride in your comments about the service of our associates, our associates have received many kind comments about their superb service and friendly personalities. We understand your frustration in regards to the hold on your card, it is our policy to have that hold for insurance purposes. We apologize for not meeting your expectations of resolving you hot water concerns, we have taken your comments to discuss with our team for further improvements. Thank you for your review of our different pool access rooms and the upkeep and maintenance of our infinity pool.    We do hope to welcome you back again in the near future. Please don't hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Almost Perfect
review: This was my first time in Khao Lak and at a JW Marriott and I had a perfect experience. It starts when entering the lobby – you get first looks on the pool and all you think is “wooow” and you get so excited for your stay. The staff welcomes you with a delicious drink and a small cold towel. They really know how to make you feel comfortable from the first second. I have to praise the whole staff at the hotel. It is the best I’ve ever encountered. When you walk through the resort every single staff member greets you with the typical Thai hand gestures and a friendly smile. I think that’s not just show, they really mean it. The gardeners stop work for a second to take the time to greet you. I seriously loved it.  After the check-in was done, a staff member escorts you to the room…

title: Kyrabree
review: Purchased our holiday to the Marriott through Luxury Escapes, all meals included for 8 days. We upgraded to a Pool Access room and 10 days. Wow!!! We lived it so much we are back here this year. Four Restaurants to choose from, a wonderful pool, great activities, amazing Spa and even more amazing staff.  Well done JW Marriott Khao Lak for two wonderful holidays.

title: Fantastic Stay
review: Dear Kyra L,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We appreciate you rating us fiver star, we hope that your rating reflects the memorable experience you had at our resort. We hope that you will continued to visit us again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Luxury holiday
review: We purchased our holiday stay on Luxury Escapes (our first such purchase) and were a little apprehensive. However, from the time we arrived at the resort all staff were welcoming and so friendly we immediately felt at home.  We upgraded to a lagoon room and the location was wonderful.  It was so close to the Pool bar and all other facilities it truly was a great location. The staff at the Pool Bar were all very friendly and accommodating (as were all staff) to any request. We would have no hesitation in definitely recommending the JW Marriot Khao Lak to any of our family and friends.  John & Kate

title: They deserve the 5 star chain hotel.
review: Fantastic beautiful hotel. Upgraded to pool access room , the pools are endless, staff very warm and friendly. Kids loved the holiday and we would definitely come back and stay again. All the restaurants, breakfast buffet and lunch menu is faultless. The hotel is so big there are times you feel like you have the place to yourself...very serene and relaxing. The massages are the most relaxing we have ever had. Our daughter received the child massage and fell asleep during it!! Would highly recommend the hotel to anyone.

title: Tranquil oasis with somber undertone
review: We stayed in family pool access for 2 nights on my birthday occasion. Thanks for offered me a delicious chocolate cake in room. The room is nice decoration with a large space for my toddler to walk. The pool access is more bigger size than other hotels have. The swimming pool and kid's pool is huge also.  There are 3 restaurants here, Italian, Japanese, and Thai cuisine to serve you all day all night. Don't miss the grand breakfast buffet at a seaview restaurant. Freshen up your day with fresh juices, assorted fruits, cereals, cold cut, dim sum, variety of bakery and jams, and a lot of east meet west dishes. Hotel facilities are waiting to seyrve the guest such as kid's club, yoga and thai boxing course, squash tennis, pool, and ride a bike activity. All staff here are friendly…

title: Great staff
review: We stayed with a Luxury Escapes voucher which included massages and all 3 meals throughout the stay which is excellent value.  Congratulations on your staff, they are all so kind, polite and helpful.   Sadly we had a lot of rain during our stay which was disappointing, this made our room smell a little musty. The Marriott is quite a distance out of town, more suitable for families and people wanting a relaxing holiday.   Overall a very nice place to holiday.

title: Fantastic relaxing getaway in Paradise
review: We purchased this holiday through luxury escapes and had some reservations that the resort would live up to the hype. We were very wrong as it not only lived up to the hype it exceeded it in our eyes. The food was spectacular, the spa was beautiful, the location was magnificent however the most impressive piece of this holiday was the staff. They could not do enough for you throughout our stay and anything we needed they helped in whatever way possible. We had a bit of rain being the rainy season however temperatures still allowed you to swim in the 3km pool, the rain did not stop most activities and to sit in a warm environment, having a nice cocktail and watching the day go by was truly amazing... words nor photos does this resort justice... its one you need to see to believe.

title: A fantastic and relaxing family holiday
review: Dear Nudger05,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your destination of choice.   We are glad that you took a chance to come visit our resort, and that the experience you had exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your kind words regarding our food, the Quan Spa, our location, and most importantly or associates. It is all our priority to deliver JW Marriott Luxury Service, while still establishing personal relationships with our guests. We hope that you will come back to visit us during our sunnier seasons and venture out to many of our well renown islands.   We cant wait to welcome you back. Please let us know if there is anything else we could do to make you next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Relaxing Holiday
review: The customer service levels and friendliness of all staff exceeded our expectations for the duration of our 8 day stay at the resort in September 2016.   It was a great relaxing holiday.   The resort highlights included: Our spacious family pool access room which comfortably accommodated a family of four and was very well maintained daily.  The daily buffet breakfast in the Waterfront Restaurant was exceptional and catered for all.  Our package also included lunch and dinner and the food was always of the highest quality as was the service.  The children's menu offered a good  variety of foods which was nutritional and a good portion size.  Dinner options at the Olive Mediterranean Restaurant (especially seafood buffet evening), Takrai Thai Restaurant and Sakura Japanese buffet…

title: Great place to relax
review: Dear  FrankSA66,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa. We are honored to be your choice of destination resort to celebrate your special day.  We could not be more thrill to read all the highlights of your stay and the memorable birthday experience you had at our Olive Restaurant. The service of our associates is surely the main highlights of many of our guests and the reason why they continue to revisit us over time. Thank you for your review of our restaurants, as well as our food quality and selections. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful resort.   Thank you for your review, and we hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Kind Regards,

title: Wonderful resort in ok location
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak in August 2016 for 7 days. The resort is very good with highlights being the fantastic breakfast buffet, great pools and quality service. August is in monsoon season so it rained most days but that didn't impact our experience too much.  We had a special birthday dinner one night at the resort's Olive restaraunt which was also great.  Our only 'complaint' would be that we booked pool access rooms well in advance of our stay (6 months) on the basis of the descriptions and photos on the web site. But there are two very different styles of pool access rooms with the rooms we ended up getting being the older style with a stepping stone path through garden from the room's deck area down to the pool. This was much different to the more modern…

title: Wonderful holiday, the staff make it!
review: Family of 3 staying for 8 nights on a luxury escapes voucher. A car seat was provided for my daughter which was great.
