We thoroughly enjoyed our stay, the grounds were beautiful, lucious and green, the pool was cleaned daily and the water temperature was perfect.   The rooms were clean and tidy, housekeeping was attentive and prompt when we had any issues.   The buffet breakfast is fantastic as was the thai buffet. We also had dinner at the meat and seafood buffet which was also good but some of the seafood was abit overcooked. The food in general at Olive, and for lunch is fine, nothing super amazing. Although the strawberry milkshake is amazing.  There were two nights where my daughter was asleep during dinner (3 hr time difference) the restaurants let us takeaway food which…

title: Experience of Stay JW Marriott 4.09-15.09
review: Dear Sandy-Joni,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa, thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you sharing your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.  You kind comments regarding our facilities is heart-warming, our associates work hard to ensure that our resort is well-maintained, our pool cleaned, our our trees beautifully landscaped. We have shared your feedback regarding our seafood buffets to our team of chefs and they have duly taken note of the matter. Ms. Poo is thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed the service of our associates, and Chef Mohan sent his regards. We do agree with you that our Quan Spa has a certain tranquility, it has be voted top 50 spas on booking.com. Upon your next visit with us, we encourage you to participate in many other Kids Club activities: Thai Weaving classes, Luk Chup dessert making, temple bike tour etc...   We do hope you will continue to come back and visit us. We strive to deliver unforgettable services and provide luxury treatments.  Kind Regards,

title: Good for young kids and nice beach
review: As a loyal Marriott customer (Gold Elite) I have stayed at many Marriott in the World. In my opinion JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort@Spa is not standard that you would expect. The Hotel is long overdue for renovation. The rooms are old. The bathrobes are not clean. Some plates for breakfast are not clean (see photos). I can still list many faults, but they are written in other reviews. But I want to talk about dinner in Sakura Japanese Restaurant. We went there only to eat Kobe. Before we booked the table, I asked the cook about Kobe: how big steak and so on. We ate Kobe in District Grill Restaurant in Marriott Bangkok Sukhumvit and believe it was unforgettable. What was my surprise when they brought the plate with Kobe. It was not Kobe steak! It were 4 pieces meat with vegetables…

title: Beautiful place, kindest people
review: Dear Yuriy B,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.     I am very sorry to learn about the issue that happened at our Sakura Restaurant. Our Restaurant menu clearly mentions the following: Kobe Connexion, “Thin slivers of Kobe Beef , US Scallops and pepper Butter”.  Unfortunately we did not have Kobe Steak on our menu.   Perhaps some miscommunication occured during the ordering process and our associate may not fully understand your request. We do understand your frustration on this issue; we will further emphasis on training our associates to improve communication with our guests.    Thank you for being a valued Marriott Rewards gold member, we sincerely apologize for not having delivered towards your expectations and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Heaven on earth
review: Stayed here for 10 nights on a Luxury Escape deal. We decided to splurge on the pool access room and this didn’t disappoint. Like many of the reviews, I have to reiterate that the staff at the hotel are the best I have ever encountered! EVERY single person that you meet greets you with a genuine smile!   Kudos to the management and their training - it is as if everyone is happy to have you as their guests. The F&B crew are excellent, greeting you everyday and look after you as if you are their only VIP guests. Special mention to Thip, Nuch, Poo, Sorn, Ja, Bew, Pearl, Fern, Nook, Honey, Fun, Macha and sincere apologies to those who I may have missed. Also big thank you to Oum who took our bookings and the front desk staff, Lisa who checked us in and Leonie, Nicolas and Palm who…

title: Amazing hotel - amazing breakfast - difficult to contact
review: Dear Skyecougar,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa. Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate your recommendations to others through this TripAdvisor review.    We are glad to hear that you have chosen the pool access room, it surely is a treat to be able to directly access the pool at any time you please. As we Thais, are known for our smile and friendly hospitality, we could not be happier to hear that you have experienced such treatments with the associates at our resort. From the service your received at our restaurants, our informative guest service team, and our detailed friendly housekeeping team ; All the associates you have mentioned by name, have been the super star of our resort. They pride themselves in delivering luxury and flawless service, while still remaining personal relationships with our guests. In addition, we are constantly renovating our facilities to ensure that it remains well-maintained despite our high occupancy through out the year.   We hope that you will return for many more visits to our resort. Please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Kevin Langmead's holiday summary of the JW Marriott Resort.
review: Great place, lovely beach and scenary. Great looking bathroom but be careful with opening glass door for toilet and shower. My husband had a bit upset stomach before arriving to the hotel, and there is even doctor on site. The customer service is great. And the grounds are cared for perfectly. The breakfast has everything you can image - even coffee all different types and smoothies made to order. Just amazing!!! The only bad thing was the first contact with the hotel or rather lack of contact. I sent an email to the hotel from UK. Because I wanted to book birthday dinner on a beach (they prepare table on a beach with all decorations around it). However I received no reply, even though I was chasing. I arrived to the hotel on my birthday and unfortunately they didn't know…

title: Fantastic!!
review: The JW Marriott, What a fantastic place, a beautiful Resort in an ideal setting, with warm and friendly staff. I loved my time in the Sala Sawaddee / lobby. ..i had many a happy hours in there, great band, good staff, loved the drinks & cocktails supplied by barman Aof. With great service from the staff, Mai, Tomtam, and especially "Pui", she's quite an amazing girl, not only a very pleasant & engaging girl with a great smile & very charming, but was very informative as well. We were all blown away with her ability to remember all our names & previous drinks consumed by my family and friends. She is a very talented young lady. We all can not wait to come back again to this picturess paradise, and catch up with the many friends we have gained here..☺☺☺

title: The little things add up..
review: We had a room that opened out on to the pool, room was beautifully fitted out, pool was amazing. Staff were super friendly, lots of choice when it came to restaurants and bars onsite. We never had to leave the resort in 8 days. Location is right on a beautiful private beach, altho about 10min drive from Khao Lak and 90 mins from Phuket

title: Lovely place to find
review: Perfect setting in what seems middle of jungle area. Large complex  with long covered walkways,especially important as rainy season  . Rooms good very clean & well serviced only fault musty smell from aircon. Lots of swimming areas,about 2km waterways & pools ranging from shallow to deep. Interspersed with nice gardens. So plenty to see & do around the place. Hotel also has beach front but to date sea been rough so stick to pools.  Hotel has gym& business centre & shs & library however only English book in library is bible!!!  No monitoring of screaming kids& parents  our luck to have these below us would hate to visit in school holidays or peak season but pleasant now in off season Food here fabulous  choice unbelievable, must suit everyone.

title: Ideal for a Family Break
review: The hotel is very conveniently situated for organised tours and its staff are exceptionally customer-focused. Our room was poolside and very clean and well-maintained, if a little dated. The restaurants on the complex are generally of a good standard with the Japanese being the stand-out choice and the Thai a little disappointing. The beach on a calm day, particularly when there's a cool sea breeze, is a delightful place to be and the bars offered refuge from the monsoon, albeit it at a price! The spa treatments are not particularly cheap, but the standard is high and a vigorous Thai massage first thing in the morning was a novel and very pleasing way to start the day. Overall, we were very happy with the Marriott and would not hesitate to repeat the experience.

title: the good, the bad and the ugly
review: the good...   Overall we have enjoyed our stay and in particular we enjoyed the fantastic facilities (pool, sporting, games room, spa). The staff are also of a high standard particularly in the restaurants and sports centre.  The restaurants were also good although perhaps not enough variety for the children.  the bad.... and the ugly....  We had book foldout/roll-away  bed for our 11 year old son and instead was provided a sheet over the day bed couch (not long enough and very hard/uncomfortable). We commented as they were setting up could they make it softer as it was quite uncomfortable. The staff then put a quilt on the bed covered by a sheet. To our surprise, we only found out after 9 nights that the quilt provided to us was dirty and also had a blood stain on it from other…

title: Best of the best
review: Dear AndrewC,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.  Thank you for expressing your appreciation about our great facilities and positive impression about our associates friendly and professional service.  As the cleanliness of our hotel is a key priority, I am very sorry that your sofa bed fell short of your expectations. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the housekeeping team in an effort to improve our service.  Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Sensational Stay
review: Great place to relax try for an all inclusive deal meals are great,pool is really nice even as a big complex its still not crowded 8 days or longer would not be too long to stay ,markets are close maybe ten minutes by taxi or hotel shuttle cheap as.

title: Past 'Used By' Date
review: As a loyal Marriott customer (Platinum Elite Premier) I have stayed at many Marriott hotels across Asia, including many JW Marriott hotels. As such, I had high expectations for this stay. The photos looked amazing on the website. However from the time we entered the foyer (and then our room ) it was clear that the hotel has aged, and has lost the 'shine' that it once must of had. It is no where near the 'JW' standard that you would expect. It is more like a 2 star hotel than a luxury 5 star resort. It is tired, and it appears that the staff are too, or they have become too complacent. Either way, this stay was disappointing. The only saving grace was 'Khun Oil' at the thai restaurant - she was amazing and really looked after me and my wife. I have stayed at the Renaissance hotel…

title: Relax in style
review: Dear JamesJ,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on this forum.    Thank you for your nice words about your positive experience at Takrai, our Thai restaurant, I will certainly let Khun Oil know. We do believe associates compliments are a powerful motivation to keep them providing a positive experience to our guest.  I am very sorry our current appearance was not what you had anticipated. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel. Unfortunately, this sometimes requires essential renovations in our guest areas.  As you may have noticed, we are currently undergoing a facelift of some of our corridors adjacent to the lobby, which are currently closed. An Alternative route is available at the ground floor. We are undergoing renovation in order to provide a stylish décor in elegant Thai Fashion to our valued guest such as yourself.   Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: A must do
review: I have been trying to find fault in this hotel, and I have to say I'm struggling.  We stayed for 8 nights on a Luxury Escapes package.  Loved every single second of it.  We arrived late at night with one sleeping child and one who just wanted to go to bed.  They expressed our check in and took us to our room within 10 minutes, inviting us back to reception in the morning to run through everything we needed to know about the hotel.  We spent the next 8 days relaxing in our swim up room (highly recommended!!!) and eating in the restaurants.  The staff are amazing.  Nothing was a worry and they loved the kids, even knowing their names within a day.  Our room was always made up beautifully each day.  Breakfast was fantastic with so much variety you'd never be bored.  We generally…

title: WOW
review: Dear Familyof4Victoria,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for taking your valuable time sharing about your recent trip at our resort with others.  We could not be happier to hear that you had a great experience the moment you checked into our resort, we understand the importance of expressed check-in as our guest can be weary from such long travels. Your kind words regarding the service of our associates are much appreciated, our associates often remember our guests by name and create long lasting friendships as our guests continue to come back for many more visits. Our Food and Beverage team pride themselves for providing many variety of food selections,  while also focusing on superb service. We are glad you were able to ventured out and take advantage of Khao Lak's surrounding areas. Upon you next visit, we would like to recommend you to visit Khao Sok National Park and many of our world renown islands: Similan, Surin, and Phi Phi.  It would be our pleasure to welcome you back, please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Perfect hiliday
review: A perfect relaxing escape. A great way to remove yourself from many distractions. It's perfect perfect perfect. Food was great / buffet breakfast caters to western style breakfasts. Just so relaxing. Pool access rooms recommended.

title: Quiet, relaxing, for pool swimmers, avoid rainy season at all costs
review: Despite being reassured that it would only sprinkle now and then during June, it rained buckets through most of the day for the entire holiday,  but still I enjoyed our stay. The best thing about this resort is the canal-like pool. If you are a person who swims every day in a pool, particularly for health reasons, this place is magical. There was always a half hour break in the rain  which allowed us to slip off our deck for a stroll or swim in the water. The next best thing was  the beautiful room.  The least pleasant was the argument with the staff when I had to leave early because of an illness in the family. I requested a letter stating that I had to depart before the scheduled day for insurance purposes. They simply refused. The meditation and yoga class was ridiculously…

title: Great resort for relaxing
review: Dear Dawn K,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa!  Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others here on Trip Advisor.  Thank you for your kind words about our infinity pool, it sure is our resort's pride and joy. Many of our guest love the fact that they are able to swim through our resort endlessly while being able to enjoy our beautiful landscapes.  Our associates also come around the pool access rooms with the coconut boat serving coconuts, alcohol, and soft drinks every day around 3-4 pm. We have taken note about your comments regarding the yoga class, and we understand that we need room for improvements. We have share your kind comments about our restaurants and the service of our associates to our team and they could not be happier.  We look forward to welcome you back in the near future, please kindly let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Great place
review: Travelled here on a Luxury Escapes package for 10 days with friends. Had a great time. Rooms are large and spacious and they provide the option to a paid upgrade to pool access rooms on arrival if they have any available. We didn't bother upgrading but it is a good option for those who want to. We saw complaints on this site about the package deal, particularly the food, but we found it great value for money and the food fantastic. As well as the main "Waterfront" buffet serving breakfasts, lunch and dinner there are also Thai, Japanese and Mediterranean restaurants for dinner and a coffee lounge for light meals throughout the day. Breakfast and lunch buffets were great with a wide variety of cuisines and plenty of food (as was the Waterfront buffet on the one night we ate…

title: Best resort
review: Dear g6rry,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa!Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you sharing your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. Our pool access rooms are surely popular with guests who wants to be able to directly access the infinity pool straight from the comfort of their own rooms.  You kind words regarding our restaurants are much appreciated, our chefs work hard to ensure that we provide many food selection, while also focusing on taste and luxury service. We have share your staffs' comments to all  the associates that you have mentioned by name, and they sent their regards to you.  We hope to be able to welcome you back in the near future, please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Amazing
review: We were 6 adults and 2 children,we had pool access rooms. The rooms were lovely and the pools were amazing....we spent virtually all our 3 days in the pools...took the spa daily which was top notch. The restaurants were also very good...all in all a great relaxing holiday...

title: Excellent staff , courteous, attentive and so pleasant.  Second time there 12 months apart and going again
review: We went in 2015 for 8 days and went in 2016 for 2.5 weeks . Did JW  for .5 of that and regretted we went to the next resort for the remainder,  but that was booked beforehand, we will definitely be back and told the staff and management of our happiness. We have media contact with people in Khao lak through our travels. Beautiful people, beautiful country.

title: Very relaxing stay. Very friendly staff. Breakfast could be better
review: Dear mcgoo445,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa. Thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa as your choice of destination resort, it is always an honored to welcome back returning guest.  It is our priority to ensure that our guest experience friendly, attentive, and luxury service at our resort. Thank you for your continuous loyalty to our resort, and we hope to welcome you back many more times.   Kind Regards,

title: Great rooms and restaurants
review: The staff is very friendly, greeting us whenever they see us.  Thumbs up x 1.  Room is clean although the furniture seems lacking some TLC. Serving ice water to the guests sunbathing by the pool/beach is very thoughtful. Thumbs up x 2.   Hotel offers different types of pillow! Great for picky sleepers like me. Thumbs up x 3  While the daily breakfast spread is good, the chef did not change the menu at all, at least not during the 4 mornings while we were there.  My excitement for the breakfast waned off on the last 2 days.  Not sure if management can look to improve the TV connection as the connection breaks whenever it rains. Cant swim or watch TV whenever it rains. :(

title: Romantic Getway
review: Dear ing121,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   We are happy to hear that you enjoy stay with us, and were delighted by the pillow selections we provided. We have taken note regarding your breakfast experience, and our chefs are looking forward to add an even more variety to our extensive breakfast selections. Since we are in rainy season, we understand that our guest have limited option for out door activities, therefore we provide rainy day activities at our recreation center free of charge: movie time, Thai culture class, Animal Towel folding, Pandanus Flower making, Origami, Squash lessons Balloon Art Making, and many more..   We hope that you would come back to visit us again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Best resort I have ever stayed at :-)
review: The room was a good size and with direct access to the pool, this was one of the best hotel rooms I have stayed at.  All 3 restaurants were very good and it is probably one of the few resorts I would consider for an "all inclusive" packages.

title: Stunning resort setting - wonderful holiday
review: The resort itself is probably among the most stunning set up we have ever seen. The gardens are incredible; it's like a little paradise. It is certainly quite beautiful. The sea was quite brown when we went and not suitable to swim in as too rough. I am not sure whether this is just seasonal as we went in the monsoon season. However you can do day trips to other beaches.   The layout is amazing, the spa layout is stunning and the choice of restaurants is very good indeed. In many ways it deserves 5 stars, but there are a few things that let this resort down. We had a wonderful stay and if there was a 4.5 button we would have utilised it. There were many things we did love. The staff were excellent (apart from one in reception who was very impatient and unhelpful-unfortunately we…

title: Amazing
review: Dear HelloMrBerry,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share you experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   Thank you for your kind words regarding our Resort’s landscapes and amenities, our associates work hard to ensure that our amenities are well-maintained, and our gardens are trees are beautifully landscaped. We apologized that the service provided to you at the reception did not meet your expectation, but happy to hear that you had a great experience with all of our other associates. In regards to your comments about your room location, we understand your concerns for privacy away from loud noises, and we do try our best to allocate guests away from certain wings upon their request. We have taken note about your dining experiences and will speak to our chefs regarding the matter. Our management team have taken note of your suggestions, and will work on improvements to the areas you have mentioned.  We appreciate your feedback and hope that we would be able to meet your expectations upon your next visit with us.   Kind Regards,

title: Relaxing and luxurious time
review: The property and staff were really top notch. While we visited without our children this looked like a great place to travel with family. Special mention for the Thai restaurant Ta-Krai where we ate 4 of our 5 nights! Both the food and staff (Aof in particular) were superb.

title: Great family stay
review: My wife and I have just spent 10 nights, enjoying this beautiful resort. We enjoyed a pool access room, this was fantastic. We enjoyed meals at all the restaurants at the resort, and had great service. The stand out for us was the Thai, especially the friendly service we recieved from Ann and staff. We also enjoyed the friendly welcome from Thip and others each morning as we enjoyed breakfast at the Waterfront restaurant.  Thanks to all the staff for their constant attention and friendly smiles to make our holiday in Thailand memorable..

title: The greatest swimming pools ever
review: We spent 10 days in JW Marriott Khao Lak in August 2016, with our 2 kids (3/6) Very nice and comfortable room with a lagoon pool view (but I think that every room have a pool view). All the accomodations are surrounded by an amazing pool, and the hotel is facing a nice beach with a stuning sunset.  Italian and Japanese restaurant are great (we didn't try the Thai one). Buffets at the Waterfront offers a great variety (especially if you love German breakfast, which is unfortunately not my case). I just missed an arabica expresso (much better than the robusta proposed). Nevermind, our stay was great. And in my comments, I have to enlighten the smiling teams (housekeeping, waitresses, front desk, etc ...). Always a pleasure to feel welcome ! And last but not least, the kids club…

title: Great family hotel
review: You will find what you expect from a 5 star resort! I think the largest pool in South East Asia, kids games room, kids play club, 2 swim up pool bars, welcome drinks upon check in. This is a great resort! I would just advise you when booking make sure you get breakfast included in the room rate! I did not and was charged $25.00 USD for breakfast and the continental breakfast was $15.00 USD. Tad expensive if you are a family of 4! Just so you know, McDonalds does not open till 9 AM! I would highly recommend this resort... Very relaxing!! I have been to this hotel 6 or 7 times. I will return again, but this time I will make sure my reservation includes breakfast!!!

title: Lovely property
review: Dear Derrick1230.  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. Thank you for your kind words regarding our swimming pool and our amenities. As per your comment regarding our breakfast packages, we would advise all guests to check our resort’s web page to see the different packages we have available.  We are happy to hear that you had a great time during your stay with us, and we hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.    King Regards,

title: Fun and relaxing stay
review: Enjoyed our stay at this resort. The pool access rooms are a must because you can just slide out into the pool and you don't have to walk the steps to your room (no lifts at this resort).   We ate at the Japanese restaurant and the waterfront. The Japanese is delicious and they have a Japanese buffet once a week, it is amazing, all you can eat sashimi.

title: Fantastic Resort, great service, food and facilities, can't get enough!
review: We spent a week here in August 2016.  My husband and I traveled with another couple and booked direct with the hotel.  We had pool access rooms - there are two types of pool access rooms (from what we could tell).  We got the ones where you walk off your terrace, down a short path through the garden and in to the pool.  At first we thought the other ones looked better as their deck was right on the edge of the pool, but I think our rooms were actually quite a bit bigger, so we decided we were better off where we were.  Breakfast was one of the best resort buffet breakfasts we have ever had.  So much variety, and all great quality.  The egg station was so efficient, even at busy times, and did everything from fresh fried eggs (however you like them) to eggs benedict (fresh for…

title: A resort that takes care of all of your needs
review: Dear FrPaKr,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share you experience with others here on TripAdvisor.  We are glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pool access room. It sure is a treat to be able to directly access our infinity pool right at the comfort of your own room. We are humble by your kind words regarding our breakfast, our chefs work hard to ensure that we provide our guest with as many variety of food selection while also serving it fresh and fast.   We hope that you would choose to visit us again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  King Regards,

title: Fantastic Stay at a Beautiful Resort
review: We choose to stay at this resort for the first three nights of our honeymoon, before moving to a Marriott resort in Phuket. The primary reason we chose this resort was for its seclusion from crowded touristy areas and it's location along the beach...and we have not been disappointed, the service has been world class. From Money at the Front Desk who helped us check in to the other staff at the restaurant, we were impressed by the genuine warmth provided during service. The dolphin bands provided at checkin and the significance behind the same was very interesting.  P.S. - the breakfast spread is to die for. Get in a little early and catch the tables along the front facing the sea. And don't miss the happy hours at the pool. bar.

title: Lovely stay
review: Dear amane 287,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort to celebrate your honeymoon. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share you experience with others on TripAdvisor.  As Khao Lak is favor by many travelers who prefers a gateway from the hustle and clustered hotels in Phuket, it sure is an ideal place for a sweet honeymoon escape. We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable hospitality experience with the service our associates. The dolphin bracelet that we provide you upon your check in is a reflect of our commitment to Khao Lak 's community. We support Khao Lak's Children Charity buy purchasing their handmade bracelets.   We hope that you will come back and visit us again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Kind Regards,

title: Everyone was Happy
review: I rarely like this type of the hotel as prefer something modern but Jw marriott khaolak is really change my mind. At the moment we arrived , we were greeted by mr. Luca the hotel manager gave us the warm welcome and khun Money lobby guru was very impressive to give us the all direction of the hotel and show how professional of JW marriott brand !! Then we have a chance to visit one of the restaurant which the staff is so freindly , we love the service from Khun keaw  and the others i could not remember all their name but it was a great night. The singer also great entertainer , we love the song he sung and i can see everyone enjoy the night ;) Lots more to say and im sure if i have a chance will stay here again.

title: No Complaints
review: Dear ppp2203,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to hear that you were warmly greeted upon your arrival with pleasant, yet professional hospitality. As providing superb and luxury service is a key priority for our JW Marriott brand, we are thrilled that you were able to experience such service here at our resort. You kind words have be shared to our associates.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make you next stay with us even better.   Kind Regards,

title: So disappointing!
review: We had a lovely time here last week staying for 8 nights on a "Luxury Escape" deal. Undoubtably the best part was staying in a pool access room. The kids LOVED IT! (5 and 7yrs) This meant no packing up bits and pieces for the day, finding a lounge by the pool etc. It was all at our door step. It was also great for my mum who stayed in the room next door who would normally feel a bit self conscious about walking around a resort pool. She swam every single day, which was so great for her. We found the set menu as part of the deal satisfactory and were blissed out completely by the 8 spa treatments we enjoyed. The spa itself was a serene space and the staff were lovely, professional and gave killer thai massages. In fact all the staff were genuinely lovely, from the front desk to…

title: Lovely and Relaxing
review: We have spent 10 beautiful, relaxing days here. The service has been second to none with staff very friendly and helpful. We had 4 couples massages which were fantastic thanks to the great ladies who started our days so well - Rung and Aor. My husband organized a fantastic very special birthday celebration which was supposed to be on the beach under a white awning, but due to the wind the staff set us up is another beautiful setting, and we were soooo well looked after by our personal event organizer Oum, chef Mohan Lal and server Jane. The signature restaurants were great - our favorite being Sakura. Big thanks to our serving staff Honey, Poo, Oum, Jane.  The swimming pool is beautiful and huge as it winds around the resort. Tours were easily organized and fun. We had a great…

title: Mr g morris
review: Dear Rahji1956,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort to celebrate your special day.  Thank you for your kind words regarding our spa and the service our spa's associates. We take pride in our professional and organic treatments, our Quan Spa has been voted top 50 Spas by Booking.com.  We have shared your appreciation and kind words to the associates you have mentioned by name, and they could not be happier. As per your comment regarding our buildings, we are currently doing maintenance throughout our property.    We look forward to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards,

title: Room
review: The resort was very nice the staff were very friendly. On arrival we were told that they would put 20.000 thai bauht against our visa card .thinking we would spend it over our 10 nights there. That was a bit strange as we didnt know when we bought  the package. I would rather see our expenses booked to our room number. Also the drink prices were too expensive they should charge local prices. The food and staff were fantastic. Cheers geoff.

title: Fabulous hotel in a quiet, family-friendly location
review: Dear 542060,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort and taking your valuable time to write about your stay with us.  We are happy to hear that our food selection and the service of our associates were up to your expectations. As per your concerns about the money hold on your card, it is our standard procedure to set aside a certain amount of money from your card for our room insurance policy. Upon your departure, the hold will be return to you. Any food and beverages charges that you may have, you may pay off the balance by allowing us to deduct from you hold, or pay cash.  Hope this clarify any confusion, if need be, our management team can also reach out to you directly to further clarify the matter.   We hope that you will continue to give us a chance to service you again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if you have any other questions.  Kind Regards,

title: The friendliest staff ever
review: We arrived very late in the evening and as I had checked in online we were warmly welcomed with an upgrade to duplex 2125. It had been serviced and all laid out for us. It was amazing. Next day was relaxing our room was serviced with a towel made into an elephant and with my sunglasses on it. We go to dinner then come back to our room where we find a notice has been slipped under our door. We have to move rooms due to maintenance. We move that night. The room we go to has not been serviced. Room 1126. No expresso machine, no mineral salts for the bath, only one little body wash, shampoo and conditioner. We rang the service desk to get these, nothing. The next morning we go to reception and ask, we wait all morning, nothing. Go again, we finally get our expresso, mineral salts,…

title: Waterfront restuarant
review: The service we received by the lovely staff there was brilliant! They could not do enough for you and there were a few in particular, Thip, Laila and Pearl!! Thank you very much and the resort itself was absolutely amazing.  Will go back for sure and highly recommend going their for a holiday.  Deb and Garry

title: Wonderful time, wonderful people, wonderful resort
review: What a fabulous hotel and people! We arrived early from our airport transfer and were met with huge smiles and a beautiful cool drink. The staff were very quick to say hello to my 2 year old and 5 month old and made us all feel very welcome. We opted for a family pool access room which is fantastic and perfect for our little family. You can swim in the pool out the back or there is a great toddler pool that allows them a little freedom.  It's rainy season but who cares, with a pool that goes on for a kilometre and great food, we haven't even noticed the rain.  So many restaurant choices and the staff absolutely love children. My baby has been the star of the show every night and they have been kind enough to take him for a walk whilst I eat my meal, so that my husband and I can…

title: Second visit and not disappointed
review: Dear Sarah N,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that you experience exceptional service right at the moment you first checked in with us. Our associates receive many positive comments in regards to their exceptional, yet personal services and we are delighted to hear that you were touched by such service.   It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again in the near future. Please don't hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Kind Regards,

title: A piece of heaven
review: We made the silly decision to choose another inferior resort to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary this past July.  From the minute we checked in we knew we needed to cut our losses check out and move to the Marriott having stayed there previously.    On check-in we were overwhelmed with the lovely staff that greeted us and the attention to customer service.  This was missing at the previous resort. On entering our room we were touched by rose petals and towel swans on our bed, later followed up up with a delicious dessert. The Marriott resort has lovely clean spacious rooms, the best buffet breakfast, the most amazing pool and lovely friendly staff that make you feel special.  Having started our holiday at a resort that didn't stack up it was so nice to return to the…

title: Great Family Stay in Phuket
review: Dear Nikki C,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! It is always an honor to welcome back our returning guests. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate you trusting us as your choice of destination resort to celebrate such a special occasion, happy 20th anniversary! It seems like the service of our associates is one of the highlights of you stay with us, and we could not be happier. Our associates work hard to ensure that they are able to provide our guest we the highest level of service while sincerely adding personal touches. Thank you for your kind words regarding our facilities, we are thrilled to hear that you found our rooms accommodating, and our food selections up to your standards.   Your continued loyalty to our resort is much appreciated, and it would be our pleasure to service you again in the near future. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Kind regards,

title: Fantastic!
review: It was a long shuttle ride from Phuket airport, and equally expensive taxi ride back. But it was definitely worth it! The resort was huge and had everything we needed, from fantastic pool, to yummy restaurants, great spa and kids club. If you go, I highly recommend paying a little extra to get the pool access room. My kids jumped right off the back into the pool, and I was able to sit on the deck watching them, without having to worry about bagging a communal deck chair. We booked through Luxury Escapes, which included 3 meals and 8 x 45mins massages. Again, highly recommended, else we would have tried to scrimp & save that $50/day and miss out on the blissful massage and fantastic food from their 4 restaurants.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear An D,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience here with others on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to her all the highlights of your stay with us, and we appreciate your recommendation to others in regards to our pool access rooms. It surely is a treat to be able to directly access our pool straight from the comfort of your own room. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our restaurant and food, our chefs work hard to constantly innovate new food menus, and strive to offer our guest a luxury dinning experience.   We look forward to welcome you back in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Best Regards,

title: beautiful resort
review: The hotel, both inside, the outside is beautiful! It has a huge garden with lovely surroundings and the 2km long pool is great for children and adults! The rooms are big and the interior design is tasty! The staff is good and really helpful with everything you ask for in a nice way! There is three restaurants at the hotel, one Japanese, one Thai and one with western food! The food is ok, but really expensive, so my family and I took a 10 min long taxi ride to Khao Lak city to eat sometimes! They have a lot of activities arranged at the hotel, trips to the local market, yoga classes etc. they also have a good cafe where you can take a coffee and relax! The spa at the hotel is fantastic, expensive, but definitely worth a try, they have plenty of massages and other treatments! We…

title: Happy & engaging staff.
review: Dear Victoria E,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   We are glad that you enjoyed our infinity pool; it surely is relaxing to be able to swim endlessly through- out our beautifully maintained landscapes. It is great to hear that you were able to venture out to see Khao Lak surrounding areas, on you next visit with us, we would recommend you to check out our world renowned islands: Similan, Tachai, and Surin.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Quan Spa services, our spa treatments are favored by many of our guests that we have been voted top 50 Spas on booking.com   We look forward to service you again; please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Best Holiday
review: Fantastic place to stay   Great food and no food poisoning here.  Make sure you upgrade and get a pool access room especially for kids.  Great beach but watch for jelly fish which can sting you but wont kill you.

title: First visit
review: This was our first visit to Khao Lak and the Marriott - and we were not on a luxury escapes package unlike many of the guests.  We had booked two rooms and the hotel upgraded both rooms which was a nice start to the holiday.  Without doubt, the resort is beautiful and relaxing and we had a very enjoyable time trying out many of the complimentary activities and chilling out on the beach.  There are a couple of local restaurants but choice is very limited and 7 nights at the resort was probably enough for us.   The only niggle we had was after a night of very heavy rain the room that our sons were staying in had leaking through the bathroom ceiling (we were on the top floor) soaking the floor.  They reported it to Reception but it was only dealt with some three hours later. …

title: Nice hotel for family
review: Dear maxwellcn,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience here with others on Tripadvisor.  We are happy to hear that you had a memorable stay with us on your very first visit to Khao Lak. It is our priority to ensure that our guests have an exceptional stay and that any arising problem would be dealt with in a timely manner. We apologize if we have fallen short of your expectations in regards to the minor incident you had. We hope that you would visit us again and that we can gain back your trust and loyalty. With your next visit, we would recommend you to also visit our surrounding areas such as Similan Islands, Khao Sok National Park, and many of our nearby hot springs.  It would be our pleasure to service you again, please don’t hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.  Best Regards,

title: Escape to the Khao Lak
review: It was the first hotel since we arrived in Phuket island, lagoon is 3km long, it is fun to have a kid to play. Breakfast is excellent, but there was few restaurants in the hotel, when we first arrived, we cannot find a restaurant for our dinner, because they are fully booked. Without a reservation, we need to wait until 8:30 pm to have the dinner.

title: R&R in bucket loads
review: Dear maxwellcn,   Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others here on Tripadvisor.   Thank you for your kind words about our breakfast selections and the infinity pool at our resort. We do have several restaurants on premise Olive for Italian and Mediterranean, Sakura for Japanese, Takrai for Thai, waterfront for international dining, and other special theme buffet nights. With such high occupancy, we do recommend our guest to make their restaurant bookings in advance.   We hope that you would give us a chance to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Best Regards,

title: Mixed feelings
review: On arriving at a resort or any accomodation first impression is always a plus . My first impression was  WOW. On arrival after a hectic flight we were greeted with cool towels & a lovely drink whilst our bags were delivered to our room . No standing at a sterile desk, we were seated on comfy chaises & all paper work brought to us . Our room was scrupulously clean, bed laid back, fresh flowers & air conditioned. The buffet breakfast was amazing , the 3 onsite restaurants were world class, the bars provided every possible drink & cocktail you could imagine ,the Spa visits were heavenly . The gardens were immaculate , the pools inviting,the beach pristine , beach and pool bars delivering right to your beach lounge. The staff were friendly yet very professional.,organising all our…

title: Best resort holiday we have EVER had !
review: We have just returned to NZ after having spent 10 nights at the JW Marriot - Khao Lak. We've traveled a lot, and stayed in a lot of hotels and resorts - but this experience was by FAR the best. We were so taken by our time there we are planning to return next NZ winter. We had 2 Deluxe Lagoon Pool Access Rooms. They are a bit more expensive but SOooooo worth it. You can dip in and put of the lagoon pool from the deck outside your room. As we didn't have young children our deck didn't have a barrier- which was extra nice. The lagoon is 3 km long - and is unbelievable. Blue- clean- windy - adult areas - kids areas. We've never seen anything like it. The rooms were spotless and the bathrooms luxurious. The daily housekeeping kept them looking fab the whole time. We are in the food…

title: 5 STAR HOTEL, 6 STAR STAFF !
review: Dear Carmel D,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to hear that you had such a memorable time with us that you are now planning to visit us again! It seems that you were able to take advantage of our pool access room; it surely is a treat to be able to directly access the longest infinity pool in South East Asia, at the comfort of your own room. Thank you for your kind comments about our food selections, we are beaming with pride of such comments, hence our chefs work hard to ensure that we are able to cater to our guests’ various taste preferences and life styles. On your next visit with us, we would recommend you to visit our local favorites such as our world renowned beaches: Similan, Tachi, and Surin, or many of our hot springs and waterfalls attractions.   We can’t wait to welcome you back to our resort, please don’t hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even  better.   Best Regards,

title: Beautiful hotel with excellent service - a relaxing trip
review: We arrived on the night of the 15th July 2016 around 8pm. The check in service was amazing. It felt relaxed and comfortable with everything explained. Apple and Louis were exceptional and created a bond with us straight away. Everyone was great! Booking through Luxury Escapes, like most people purchasing for the first time, we were not sure what it was going to deliver and how we were to be treated. We had chosen the pool access room and the room was amazing. King size bed, and king size bathroom. Everything was there, and if anything was needed it was never too much trouble to get it. The next morning were went to the breakfast buffet which had everything your stomach could desire. My 5yo daughter was treated like a princess by the staff, and we first met AU and the rest of the…

title: WOW Marriott.
review: Dear  Holtontrio,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with others here on TripAdvisor.   We could not be happier to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pool access rooms. Our pool access rooms is loved by many of our guests, it surely is a treat to be able to access the longest infinity pool in South East Asia at the comfort of your own rooms. As Marriott’s associates, we pride ourselves in the excellent, sincere service we provide to our guests, and we are delighted to hear that you were able to experience such service here at our resort.   Our kids club is a truly is a haven for both kids and adults. We have well trained associates whom kind heartily assist children with many activities while parents are able to have a private relaxed day. On your next trip with us, we would like to recommend you to ventured out and join an elephant trekking tour!Being able to service you again in the near future would be our pleasure, please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better.   Best regards,

title: Perfect family location, exceptional staff
review: When I go away to relax, the most important thing for me is service. The best judge of that is the way things are handled when something goes wrong. We had poor service during our first meal and the manager of the restaurant, Jack, did an incredible job of making sure the rest of the trip was perfect. Everyone makes mistakes and I was so impressed by their efforts to correct it, that it was the highlight of our stay - Thanks Jack.  The hotel was beautiful with a great beach, massive pool, decent food and a lovely spa. I love Thailand anyway, but the Marriott staff's attention to detail ensured that we had a thoroughly enjoyable holiday.

title: Who's up for another buffet?
review: We booked our annual family holiday through Luxury Escapes and got a package deal that seemed like great value. We'd never booked through luxury escapes before but thought we'd give it a go as it was pretty much all inclusive apart from drinks and the odd snack.   Overall the resort is very neat and the way the pools are setup is fantastic, loads of places to take a dip and the "pool access" rooms are a must! The staff are super friendly, we have a 13 month old daughter and they were great with entertaining her (especially at Olive Restaurant which probably had the best food and atmosphere. But who travels to Thailand for Italian food....?).  Now, when we booked the package we were under the impression that breakfast was buffet (not a drama, pretty standard for resorts) and all…

title: A well-oiled machine with superb service and amenities
review: Dear stubuck80,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us. We are delighted to hear your positive comments about the overall facilities and our associates.  I am very sorry to hear about the inconvenience you experienced, for Luxury escape package the inclusion is one a course lunch, however we have expanded it on certain days to a lunch buffet which provided more options. Perhaps we have not properly informed that a la carte is also available upon request.  As you have noticed, some of the local restaurants have moved away from the beach but they are still here and have relocated on the road near the hotel entrance.  Our restaurants and bars provide Entertainment every evening with a variety of talented artists featuring Pop, Reggae and Jazz favorites. The Daily program is available in guest rooms and at our concierge.      Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager

title: Beautiful Hotel
review: My wife, myself and two kids (Miss 11 and Master 8) stayed for 10 nights on a Luxury Escapes deal and had a wonderful time. Our pool access room on wing 4 of the large resort was set up perfectly for all 4 of us, without the space feeling cramped. The kids loved being able to access the amazing pool at will. The immensity of the pool and its winding canals needs to be experienced first hand to fully appreciate it. There are two in-pool bars and our nearest - the Aqua bar - was a regular late afternoon pit stop after a day of swimming, eating and lounging. The beach is also beautiful and was swimmable a lot of the time. Even though we stayed in the wet season there was only one day where the rainfall was too heavy to still enjoy the pool.   The resort has a great gym and other…

title: Ticks all the boxes
review: Dear DolphZ,  Greetings from JW Marriot Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort and appreciate you taking your valuable time to share you experience here on TripAdvisor.  We could not be happier to hear that you were able to take advantage of the pool access room. It surely is a treat for the kids to be able to directly access our infinity pool straight from the comfort of their own rooms. It is our priority to ensure that our guest have a memorable experience may it be from the service of our associates, our facilities, or our food sections; we are happy that we have met your expectations.  Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay even better. We look forward to welcome you back in the near future.   Best Regards,

title: So glad we chose this hotel.
review: Amazing hotel!  Beautiful grounds, wonderful pool which goes all around the resort.  We had a room which went right down to the pool and it was fantastic.  Very good and comprehensive breakfast.  Lovely clean beach and some really good restaurants very close by.  Spa was good and it was nice meeting the hotel elephant!  Hotel offers a shuttle to the nearest town and market which is a fab place for buying souvenirs or just having a look at some of the local delicacies.  Hotel staff were all very friendly and extremely helpful.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Paradise
review: We stayed three nights at this lovely resort at the end of a month long holiday. From the moment we checked in the staff were welcoming and attentive. Our room was very comfortable and had a balcony overlooking the long winding pool and beautiful tropical gardens. We spent a lot of time reclining on beach chairs soaking up the sun and enjoying the iced water served to us. The breakfast buffet as expected was very good with endless choices both sweet and savoury. We sat outside on the terrace which had views across the gardens to the ocean, very relaxing. The only reason I'm not giving the Marriott five stars is because I found it difficult to enter and exit the pool with no rails and steps to negotiate although this would not be an issue for many others.

title: Lovely Hotel needing a tweek
review: Dear 2375barbara,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. We are glad to hear that you had a memorable experience starting from the moment you checked in with us. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our pool, landscape, and the service of our associates. We have taken note of your concerns in regards to the absent of rails by the pool. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.   Best Regards,

title: Jw Marriott Koa lak
review: I believe the recent Trip advisor post by Jamierob2000 provides a well balance review of the Marriott Khoa Lak.  If I may plagiarise from Jamierob2000, the “Food was average to v. good” and “The Thai restaurant was very average on all fronts” My satay entrée was served cold, (as I noted, so was another couple’s seated nearby) and I waited 50 minutes for my main course of pork fried rice. I only ate at the Waterfront restaurant for breakfast, choosing sit outside to avoid the sparrows flying, feeding and defecating in the dining room, (as also noted in Gerald W’s Trip advisor review). J.R. Marriott – hygiene please! The Italian and Japanese restaurants were pleasant although to gain a preferred dining time, bookings need to be made a couple of days in advance. I loved the little…

title: Fabulous!
review: Dear Scott F,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.  We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share about your experience with others here on Tripadvisor. It is our priority to ensure that our guests have a smooth dining experience with us, and it saddens us to here that we have not met your expectations. We apologize for the inconveniences that you have encountered at Ta-Krai Restaurant, and have spoken with our kitchen team regarding the matter. As for your comments regarding the birds in our Waterfront Restaurant, we are taking action to prevent the problematic matter. Thank you for your kind words to our Housekeeping team, they could not be happier to hear that you enjoyed their kind gesture.  You kind comments and concerns have been duly noted, and we do hope that you would allow us to service you again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: Absolute perfection.
review: Looking for a great rest   Gym 10/10 Restaurants 10/10 Spa 10/10 Guest services 10/10  Very fine Hotel facilities and adjoining restaurants.  Very friendly staff what a credit to the Marriott.  The staff at the Olive restaurant are friendly and very caring.  The hotel offers one of the best spa and relaxation centres.   What a breakfast to start your day at the JW Marriott.

title: A great family friendly holiday retreat.
review: A great family friendly hotel. Staff are friendly and the overall service and facilities are top class. Lots to do and the location 90 minutes from Phuket airport provides excellent seclusion away from the busy tourist spots. A great beach, fantastic games and gym options, the largest pool in Thailand and the restaurant and food options were fantastic. Highly recommended and we will be going back.

title: Luxurious, beautiful and a paradise!
review: Dear Matt R,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Sap. Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We are happy to hear that you had a great time staying with us. Thank you for recommending our resort to your friends. We hope to see you again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: Highly recommend - Luxury Escapes package
review: My partner and I couldn't believe what an amazing package with Luxury Escapes this experience was. The hotel.....magnificent. The beautiful grounds, the friendly helpful staff, the delicious food, the gorgeous room, the luxurious spa treatments......I could go on and on. We really enjoyed all that it had to offer. We took bike rides to the local waterfalls, or simply rode independently around the area. We took an unforgettable day trip to Phang Nga Bay. We played tennis, ping pong, walked the beach etc etc and everything was wonderful. But most of all we loved our room.....we were up graded to one of the high balcony rooms which felt like we were high in the trees. It was wonderfully appointed and so quiet. We really felt spoiled. We have no complaints...and I am a rather fussy…

title: A great choice
review: Dear Kylie S,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort.   It is our priority to ensure that we are able to meet our guests expectations when it comes to beautifully maintaining our facilities, and the service of our associates. We could not be happier to here that you were able to ventured out and see Khao Lak's surrounding areas. We do hope that on your next visit with us, you would get a chance to see our many stunning islands: Similan, Tachai, and Surin.   We do look forward to welcome you back in the near future, please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Best Regards,

title: A good time, but feeling of disappointment
review: We purchased the Luxury Escapes all-inclusive package for 8 days, (2 Adults and 2 kids stay/eat free plus 8 spa treatments).  The deal was fantastic and I highly recommend it.   We are 2 adults and 2 children (age 5 and 3). We arrived very late (close to 12pm) but the resort staff were very professional and friendly and provided us with fresh cool towels and refreshments.    Our room was very spacious was on the top floor and we had the option to change to a pool access room but we were happy to stay where we were.  The room had a double bed for us and kids slept on sofa and pull out bed.  A/C in room was excellent.  The room was clean and in good condition and was cleaned daily. The cleaner was very sweet and made special animals made out of towels for the kids each day, which…

title: Exceeded ALL my expectations
review: We as a family of four (2 adults / 2 kids - 8 and 5) were joined by another family of four and a couple (no kids) for an 8 night stay, booking through Luxury Escapes Travel.  To say my expectations were exceeded is an understatement.  Having worried prior to the trip that the deal "was too good to be true", I need not have bothered.  The resort, the staff, the rooms, the food, the service, the atmosphere were all 10/10.  We did have to arrange extra bedding for the kids, however, this was done without any issue.  Tips: 1) Take lilos and pool floats with you (the shop has a compressor to blow them up). 2) Book your spa treatments on your first day as the spa is brilliant and therefore popular. 3) as with the above you may need to book the restaurants a day or two earlier, as they…

title: Hidden treasure of Thailand
review: Dear  Duncan013,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort! Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience and tips with other here on our Tripadvisor page.   We are thrilled that you were able to take advantage our Luxury Escape package; it surely is a favorite among many of our guests. From your review, it seems like you had a memorable experience with our facilities and the service of our associates; we will share your kind words to our team.   We look forward to be able to welcome you back again in the near future. Please do let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: Excellent hotel
review: I have been to Thailand many times in the past few years. I also had the privilege staying in best resorts in and around the region. I can assure you this is one of best resorts in Thailand if you are looking out for beach destination property.   We checked in on 20.5.2016 in a group of 14 family members including 2 infants. Right from Check-inn we knew we are up for something very nice. Check in was very swift with front desk officer M/s Lisa explaining us about the property in detail and taking us to our room.   We had booked for Direct pool access rooms was although little small in size however the sun deck area outside the room was very nice which further direct connects to the extraordinary big swimming pool.   Hotel was divided into 5 building all interconnected via a…

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: Dear GAURAV G,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort on your recent visit in Thailand. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with others here on Tripadvisor.   It is our priority to ensure that our facilities are well-maintained, and that we are able to meet the expectation of our guest when it comes to the service of our associates. We are thrilled that you were able to take advantage of our kid's club and happy to here that we were able to accommodate your dining preferences with our vegetarian food selections. Please do not hesitate to inform our associates if there is anything that we can prepare for you to make your next dining experience with us even better.  We hope that you will continue to give us a change to service you, look forward to welcome you back in the near future.   Best Regards,

title: Fantastic beach resort
review: An excellent hotel with nice staff like most of the places we've been to in Thailand.  The location is a little of but you can take a cab if you want into town.  We got tired of Thai food one evening and eat at the sushi restaurant at the hotel,  it was expensive but well worth it.  The other nights did we eat at the restaurants that were located beside the hotel.

title: Relaxing Spa holiday
review: We spent eight nights at this resort from early July and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  We flew into Phuket Airport and took a hotel arranged 'people mover'/mini bus (there were five of us) to the resort at Khao Lak.  The road trip took just under 90 minutes.  We hadn't researched the weather pattern for this time of year before hand.  (Lesson learnt for next time!). It is the wet season in July so we generally had thunderstorms or heavy rain every day but thankfully not all day every day.  Our road journey was made in one of these thunderstorms.  An interesting drive in heavy rain!  Check-in was painless.  We were one of three parties checking in simultaneously.  We were invited to sit in reception and enjoy a cold drink while the paperwork was sorted out.  Our rooms were…

title: Beautiful relaxed resort
review: Dear malronan,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. Your review about your recent stay with us is much appreciated. We could not be happier to hear that you found our facilities and the service of our associates accommodating. It would be a pleasure to be able to welcome you back again in the near future. We hope that on your next visit with us, you would be able to experience Khao Lak surrounding nature areas. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: Probably the best resort in Thailand
review: We stayed 8 nights under the luxury escape all inclusive package. Nothing at all to fault really. Amazing pool, a big highlight of the resort, and so nice and warm! Travelled with our 9 yr old son who had a great time. Never used the kids club. I have to say it does seem very themed towards little girls! My son had no inclination to go, and there was very little in the way of activities for active boys.  We used the table tennis a lot and also had a hit on the tennis court. Our son did a Thai boxing lesson and my husband enjoyed the gym.  We stayed in the pool access room for the first 6 nights and this was great. Decided to treat ourselves to the duplex suite (and have some privacy from our son!) for the last two nights and it was lovely. By then the pool access novelty had…

title: Amazing
review: Dear coleenaperi1,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa!  We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with others on Tripadvisor.  We are glad that you were able to take advantage of our Luxury Escape package. Hence it is an all-inclusive package; it surely has been a popular package for many of our guests. As per your comment regarding the activities in the kids club, we have taken note and will consult with our team to see how we can add more diverse activities that both boys and girls can enjoy.  It seems that you have enjoyed dining at our restaurant outlets and we could not be happier.   We hope to welcome you back again in the near future, please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: Nice rooms and breakfast, isolated location
review: Nice bed, perfect breakfast, extraordinary facilities, friendly staff and relax ambience. Noodle station in breakfast time should win Michelin stars. More delicious than pho in Hanoi. The slightly minus is not too many direction signs.You can easily get confused.

title: Excellent resort hotel
review: We have never stayed in a resort before but usually stay in city hotels.  I have to say this was a first but not the last.  Sooooo relaxing and peaceful.  This hotel is stunning with a 3 kilometre pool winding around the resort.  4 restaurants, and all the amenities you could want.  It is traditional Thai decor which we loved, rooms very well appointed with free wifi.  We upgraded to a deluxe pool access room so you walked out onto the deck and stepped down into the water.   Mostly I need to comment on the staff and how they made you feel welcome.  I cannot say enough except heart felt thanks. Thank you Marriott.

title: Two weeks in paradise
review: Dear 3Ponies,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for rating us five stars, we hope that your rating reflects the memorable experience of your recent stay with us. Your kinds words regarding our pool, restaurants, the the decor of our facilities are much appreciated. It is our key priority to ensure that that we are able to recreate our guests' idea of a perfect vacation, and we could not be happier that we were able to do so. We hope that you will continue to give us a chance to service you again, look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best regards,

title: Wonderful luxury escape
review: Our first visit to Thailand and what a trip that was. We stayed at the Marriott in Khao Lak and I must say that it is the best place I have ever stayed in. The staff, the service, the possibilities. The rooms were excellent, the food was excellent and the pool/grounds were just magnificient. Nothing bad to add, just go there!!

title: An amazing place to be spoilt
review: Dear Thomas J,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Welcome to Thailand and thank you for choosing our resort as your choice of destination resort. We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable experience with the service of our associates and the facilities at our resort. We hope that you will come back to visit us again and experience the natural surroundings that Khao Lak has to offer: the islands (Similan, Tachai, Surin), our local national forests, and elephant and turtle camps. Please do let us know if there is anything we could do to make you next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: We have had the best time with three families  Kids had endless beach and pool activities  Adults enjoyed fitness activities and all of us loved the food  Outstanding Japanese Sakura restaurant, Thai, continental and international cuisine Safe place Staff very friendly

title: AMAZING POOL!! - NICE HOTEL
review: As part of our tour we spend two days in Marriot.  Friendly staff and smooth check in the nice lobby area. Hotel is no so new and it's age is shown but renovation is on going.   Nice, big, clean room with balcony overlooking pool area. Room had all amenities and comforts you expect from 5* hotel.  Indeed area is bit remote but just outside the hotel there is small store  where you buy drinks and snack and also a couple of restaurants there.  You can go to Khao lak with hotel shuttle service at a cost of 100baht per person one way. Taxi around 250 baht one way and take around 10mins.  Breakfast is good with a big buffet and wide selection to choose from. Hotel was full so breakfast room was full and bit noisy on pick times. But there some sections on the side that are rather…

title: Lovely and remote.
review: Dear ROULA-THANOS,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort.   It seems that you had a memorable experience ever since the moment you checked into our resort. We are happy to hear that you enjoy our facilities, and were able to venture out to see Khao Lak’s surrounding areas. Your praises regarding our infinity pool are much appreciated, it sure it our pride and joy.  We hope that you will continue to give us a chance to service you again. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better,  Best Regards,

title: longest pool i have seen
review: This is an amazing hotel if you are looking for a "bargain" as a couple. When I say "bargain" I mean it: Hotels in more popular areas of Thailand are obviously much more expensive, so me and my fiancée were beyond happy to get a Luxury hotel for a fair price. What we found, was amazing as well...  We stayed at the hotel for 8 nights and we got to know hotel better than we wanted to. We just came directly in the week where the Andaman sea brought rain to the area. So we had plenty of time to explore the hotel, eat at some of the restaurants and well... have a very thorough look at the hotel room.  VALUE The most important factor for me in advance: the hotel is very well-priced for what you get. An amazing deal. However, if you want to explore the area a bit, taxis are surely…

title: A Week In Paradise
review: Dear Florian,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort. Thank you for taking your time to thorough review about the experience you had on your recent stay with us.   You kind words regarding our facilities, beach areas, and our restaurants are much appreciated. We take pride in our international breakfast food offerings; hence, we offer such a wide range of food and beverage selections. We have taken note regarding your comment about the burger and sandwich, and will bring the matter up to our kitchen team. We hope that you will be able to come back to Khao Lak during our “less rainy” season, and truly experience what Khao Lak has to offer: All the islands (Similan, Tachia, Surin etc.), kayaking trips through Khao Sok’s national rainforest, Khao lak local markets, and elephant trekking.   We hope that you had a memorable time with us. Please do let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best Regards,

title: One of the best resorts I have ever stayed at
review: Khao Lak is away from the bustle of Phuket. J W Marriot Khao Lak, is further secluded and has a nice beach to itself. It's a great property to visit with kids. The property has water and a connected pool which goes all over the property. You can jump into the pool from your room's verandah, if you are on the Ground Floor but from rooms anywhere, the pool is just a few steps away. The property has lovely tropical flora and they conduct a tour if you ask them. We enjoyed the Kid's play area with it's friendly staff. There are multiple restaurants and an all-day deli, which were all good. A great place for a family vacation.

title: Magnificent resort with the best pool in Asia, it goes for miles.
review: The rooms are beautiful, along with complete glassed bathrooms and excellent toiletry products. Cable TV. Wonderful food, two pool bars, and an endless pool.
