Excellent and friendly staff, especially Joe in the Sakura Japenese restaurant who gave us lots of tips on the best shopping spots, Wot who drove us around the facility as I have mobility issues, excellent Buffet breakfast. Private adults only section of the pool, and a guy paddles around the pool offering alcohol, soft nd fresh coconut drinks. The live music was great and day trips organised well and on time, we wanted for nothing and would highly recommend this resort to anyway needing a relaxing holiday. Also The Quan spa was not only the most beautiful place I have ver been, they were also the best massages I have ever…

title: Relaxing and beautiful resort with the best staff
review: Dear Kelly J,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your time to share your memorable experience here with others on tripadvisor.  We could not be more thrilled to hear your praises about our facilities, amenities, and our well renowned infinity pool.  Thank you for your kind words about the service of our associates, we will share your kind comments with them. We are glad to see that you have taken advantage of our local activities such as bathing with the elephants and shopping at the local market. We do hope that the memorable experience you had here with us, will prompt a reason for you to revisit us again.     It has been an honored to be your choice of destination resort, please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we can do to make you next stay with us even better.  Best regards,

title: Another great stay
review: Stayed at this wonderful resort for 14 nights and had an exceptional stay from our arrival until we departed on the 27th June. Following our 15+ hour journey all we wanted was to get into our room and get showered. On arrival we were immediately blown away by this resort, it was beautiful and the staff were all so welcoming. We tried to make use of all the fantastic facilities and we have nothing but praise. The restaurants were all exceptional and the drinks and cocktail bars again, nothing but praise for the staff. We would definitely stay at this resort again.

title: Beautiful place...beautiful people....
review: Dear Beverley D  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Sap! Thank you for choosing us as your destination resort. We could not be happier to hear that you had a memorable experience here with us. Our associates here work hard to ensure that we are able to recreate you perfect idea of a paradise vacation. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our facilities, restaurant, and the service of our associates; we will share you kind words with our team. We do hope that you will continue to give us a chance to service you again in the future. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Beautiful setting!
review: We stayed for the 2nd time with our two boys who are 2 and 5. We had a lovely stay and thoroughly enjoyed the hotel. The highlights were: The kids club and quality of the child care. Lots of activities for the kids to do The relaxed atmosphere of the resort and service The treatments at the spa and nearby local places The quality of a standard room and how easy it us to fit a family of 4 into a room The gym Great sleep in comfy beds and dark, quiet rooms. The range and quality of food options. Overall a great value family resort and consistently good hotel.

title: BLISS!
review: We stayed here on an 8 day Luxury Escapes holiday and for us it was an wonderful place to relax and enjoy the excellent facilities. The deal included all meals so the hardest decision we had to make each day was which of the 3 restaurants we would eat at that night! The choice was from Thai, Japanese or Mediterranean and all were excellent but there were also buffet meals at the Waterfront restaurant on some nights. Breakfast was an amazing choice of Eastern and Western styles of food and the range was incredible. A brilliant way to start each day. The staff were friendly and polite and always helpful. We couldn't help but be impressed by the beautiful gardens and the number of staff tending them every day. The pool (all 3 kms of it!) was very impressive. It meandered around all…

title: A fantastic holiday experience
review: As many of the other reviews, we thoroughly enjoyed staying at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  We stayed on a Luxury Escape voucher which was great value - especially with all of the meals included (otherwise might get expensive as there are only a few local restaurants outside the resort entrance).  We found breakfast was amazing and typical five star resort standard.  The various restaurants were also excellent too.  Amazing clean pool which was fantastic with our kids - lots to explore.  Our pool access room with our kids.  We had stayed at another resort last year and this pool was amazingly huge.  The kids club had a number of activities and video games for the kids (limited time which was good, so they don't play for hours).  You can get a taxi just outside the…

title: Best holiday ever!
review: Dear DazMan8,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort.  We are glad that you were able to take advantage of our Luxury Escape Package, since it is an all inclusive package, it surely gives you many dining options at our different restaurant outlets. Your kind words regarding our pool is much appreciated, it surely is our resort's pride and joy; hence, our infinity pool is the largest infinity pool in South East Asia! Our resort is certainly a good distance away from cluster areas of Phuket, it benefit our guests by offering a more peaceful and personal atmosphere.   We truly hope that you had a memorable time with us, please do let us know if there is anything else we can do to make your next stay with us even better. Look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best Regards,

title: Lovely hotel and staff
review: We absolutely loved it here. My husband and I stayed on a Luxury Escape voucher! Such good value. 99% staying at this place seemed to be on this voucher. A beautiful pool access room which we thoroughly enjoyed being able to get in and out of the water whenever we wanted. Food was nice enough at each of the restaurant (not brilliant but nice enough especially since all meals were included). Breakfast was amazing. Loved siting out on the verandah each morning overlooking the ocean & immaculate gardens. The smoothies and fresh juice station is beautiful!  The actually resort is simply stunning. The gardens are kept immaculate, pool is very clean & goes on forever, the beach is nice (although some people were complaining of stingers) & happy hour on the beach with the sun going…

title: Dream place!!!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to share about your recent stay with us.   We are glad that you were able to take advantage of our Luxury Escape Package. The Luxury Escape Package has been a favorite package among many of our guest; hence it is an all inclusive package. We take pride if our breakfast session we provide our guests, we are always trying to add more variety to our already extensive selection. Thank you for your kind words regarding our facilities, our associates work hard to ensure that our that our facilities are well maintained and our landscapes are beautifully sculptured.  We are honored to be your choice of destination resort, please do let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.  Best regards,

title: Excellent, relaxing holiday resort
review: Booked the resort via Luxury Escapes and it was excellent value for money. Arrived at Phuket and picked up by the resort's mini bus on time. The drive took 1.5 hours and we arrived at the entrance with friendly staff to help us with baggage. Met by Leonie, a German girl trainee who was unbelievably polite, cheerful and ever so helpful.Every minor detail of the Resort, functions, restaurants and facilities were explained to us. She escorted us to our which was  enormous. All the room's facilities were explained in detail and we felt at home immediately. From our balcony overlooking the 2.5km serpentine swimming pool was outstanding.  Once settled we explored the restaurant. Excellent food and entertainment. The other two restaurants were Thai and the final one Japanese all which…

title: Stunning location, tranquil surroundings
review: Dear iantev,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of resort destination. Thank you for taking your time to share your experience with others.  We are glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our Luxury Escape package, it surely is favored by many of our guests; hence it is an all-inclusive package. It gives us joy to hear that you had a memorable experience with your check in process with us; we will share your kind words to our associate. We are thrilled to hear that you were able to take advantage of Khao Lak’s natural surrounding areas, thank you for sharing that experience with others here on tripadvisor.  We hope that you will continue to give us a chance to service you in the future. Please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Thai delight!
review: We had a great 10 days at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak.  Beautiful location with private beach and a pool that never ends... There was some work going on around the hotel when we were here, however, with the size of the pool and hotel it was not intrusive and it was probably to get ready for the forthcoming high season (June 2016).  Hotel is approx. 10 minutes from Khao Lak centre (hotel shuttle bus 100bhts per person each way) which may be rather basic but has some great restaurants which we would highly recommend; the Red Chilli may look like a cafe but the food was fabulous and really reasonable. Peter Pan offers an alternative to Thai with Pizza, pasta etc and cocktails at 99bhts - an absolute treat. Hotel is very family friendly but as a couple we had no complaints. Staff…

title: Endless Swimming !!!
review: Dear iantev,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to share about your experience of your recent stay at our resort. We apologized for the current maintenance that we are undergoing and hope that it was not much of an inconvenience for you. It is heart-warming to hear that you had a memorable experience with our associates. Our associates genuinely work hard to ensure that our guest leave with an utmost feeling of satisfaction and happiness. We will share your kind words with our associates.   We are honored to be your choice of destination resort, please let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next stay with us even better.     Best regards,

title: A taste of Paradise
review: This is our first trip to Thailand and we found this hotel delightful. The most beautiful pool is tended by a team of expert staff who care for it with such pride. We floated, swam, and dog paddled our way around the canals striking up conversations along the way. The restaurants were lovely, catering to families, couples, and singles with such care and joy. The welcoming and attentive staff made the restaurants a wonderful experience.The Quan spa was heavenly. They massaged away all our troubles in a secret garden of serenity. The traditional style rooms were comfortable and the poolside access a real treat. Thank you for the most wonderful, relaxing, first stay in Thailand. The staff are your best asset in this wonderful place. Their pride is evident in  their care and smiles.

title: Beautiful Property
review: Excellent resort, pool is amazing. Khao Lak is the destination of choice if you don't want to go to Patong or Phuket. The JW Marriott is clean, safe, and a wonderful choice if you're looking just to relax in the humongous pool or on the beach.

title: This resort is the business!
review: Dear Andy B,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of destination resort! We appreciate you rating our property five stars; we surely do hope that your rating reflects the memorable service you experience here with us. Thank you for your kind words about our property, we hope that you will continue to choose us as your destination resort.  Best regards,

title: Gorgeous hotel with all the trimmings
review: Stayed here for eight nights with our 14 and 12-year-old kids on a Luxury Escapes package and couldn't be happier.  All our meals were included and the food was above par for resort food with a choice of three restaurants.  The spa was a highlight - we had treatments everyday of our stay (also included in our package) and every single one was blissful. The kids loved the massive pool which they could access from our family lagoon suite. This was our second trip to Khao Lak - previously we had stayed (sans kids) at Beyond which was average!  Not a patch on JW Marriott.  We travelled during the low season so White Sands beach was closed and the Similian Islands were off limits which was a bit sad.  Usually we like to do lots of day trips and eat anywhere but the hotel, but this…

title: Absolute Bliss!
review: Dear Mandy H,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with others here on tripadvisor. We are glad to hear that you have taken advantage the Luxury Escape package, it surely is a favorite among many of our guest; hence, it is an all-inclusive package. Your kind words about our Quan Spa’s service is truly heart-warming, our Quan Spa associates work hard to ensure that our guests leave  with an utmost feeling of peacefulness and relaxation. Currently the Similan Islands are temporarily close, and will reopen in November. However, we do encourage guests to check out Khao Lak surrounding areas, visit the waterfalls, and do elephant trekking.    We hope that you will visit us again in the near future. Please don’t hesitate to let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.    Best regards

title: It really is a 5 stars resort !!!
review: Prior to our arrival, I was very excited to stay at this hotel and I was not disappointed. Even the most 'basic' room (lagoon view room) was large, comfortable and fitted with all the amenities you could need (including an umbrella for wet weather and a beach bag). My partner and I stayed here for 4 nights in mid June 2016. Although I was slightly apprehensive about the weather, it only rained fairly constantly for one day of our trip. The resort is large, but we often found ourselves as the only customers in the bar or swimming in the pool. We never felt crowded, including at breakfast when we were seated outside on the balcony overlooking the beach. I treated myself to a massage at Quan Spa, and it was by far the best spa experience I have ever had. We ate several times at the…

title: Look elsewhere for a relaxing holiday
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak using the luxury escapes deal, staying in a pool side room on wing 4.  The purpose of the holiday was to relax, rest and unwind at a 5 star resort.  The good: Most of the staff are friendly and begin to recognise you by sight  The grounds are well kept and the resort is well presented  The food was good, without being great Nice size bathroom  The live music during dinner, both Gerard the saxophone guy and the Duo the duet were great and provided nice ambiance.  The bad: The rooms are tired: the shower head has calcium deposits so it doesn't spray straight; the deck flexes when you walk on it and the decking isn't flush.  There is minimal privacy and tranquility: we were staying under a 2 story family room and would frequently hear kids…

title: Nice but not excellent
review: Dear GerardW  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us.   As we have responded in your earlier review, I am very sorry to hear the inconvenience you experience in your room and lack of response from the concerned associate.   We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel.  As you noticed, we are currently renovating some of our guestrooms to provide a better functional space and stylish décor that meet the modern needs of our valued guests, such as yourself. All Balconies feature long chairs however if you would prefer a beach reclining chair, we are more than happy to provide it to you upon request.  In regards to drinks list, wines are taxed at 1,000 baht per liter of 100-per-cent pure alcohol, or 300 baht per liter of product value – whichever is higher. Products above 600 baht cost price are additionally taxed at 36 per cent of the wholesale prices so, fine wines prices are particularly high in Thailand.  Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager

title: Great Stay!!!
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak through a deal purchased from Luxury Escapes. The deal included set meals and a few extras.  Rooms: the rooms (as with the hotel overall) are old but fairly well maintained. All requires amenities are provided and the room was clean. Downside was that there was a horrible smell coming from the shower drain and permeating through the room... There was a lot of rain during our stay so probably due to overflowing pipes. Also, there was maintenance/construction going on 2 rooms away from us, which wasn't ideal. Power saws and drills don't do much for the relaxing atmosphere we were trying to find!!  We had a pool access room which was nice, but the chairs on the balcony don't actually recline, so we (and our neighbours) took to lying directly…

title: Superb venue for a family holiday
review: Dear SGWat,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us. We are delighted to hear your positive comments about the overall facilities.  I am very sorry to hear the inconvenience you experience in your room and lack of response from the concerned associate. We strive to maintain the highest standards, not only in service, but also with regards to maintaining the overall look and feel of the hotel.  As you noticed, we are currently renovating some of our guestrooms to provide a better functional space and stylish décor that meet the modern needs of our valued guests, such as yourself.  All Balconies feature long chairs however if you would prefer a beach reclining chair, we are more than happy to provide it to you upon request.  Our cooking lessons are meant as an introduction to Thai cooking class with local favorite’s that guests can replicate at home with accessible ingredients such as curries, Thai salads or spicy soups. If you would prefer a more elaborate dish we are happy to arrange this for you with our executive chef.     Although we fell short of meeting your expectations during your past stay, I hope you will consider JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa on your next visit to Khao Lak so that we can better deliver upon the guest experience you deserve.   Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great Resort
review: I have stayed in this property on my Honeymoon (Jan 2015 - too late post) ... Excellent Service and polite staff... Every day here was so pleasant. We had a private access to the swimming pool... Something, I liked about this property is that the entire property is surrounded by the swimming pool, then a small outlet of bar and snack in avail in the pool itself.. The food quality and the musical night in the evening was a perfect evening. We had a private dine beside the bay... Overall a wonderful stay!!!

title: This pool is fantastic! Bedrooms are great too.
review: One of the nicest hotels I've stayed at. Rooms are spacious with huge oversized baths hand carved out of marble, bathrooms amenities are endless and constantly topped up. Beds are super comfy and the overhanging balconies are amazing. Great place to have a drink or even room service as you look out over the hotel grounds. The pools are huge and the adult one is a quiet oasis from the kids area.  The choice of onsite restaurants is great, we dined in everyone and didn't have a favourite. Nice beaches just off the complex. All in all a fantastic resort.

title: Special place to celebrate our Wedding anniversary
review: Dear Simontravels,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your time to share your experience here on tripadvisor. Your comments regarding our rooms are much appreciated, and we are happy to hear that you have enjoyed using our infinity pool.  We hope to welcome you back again in the near future, please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Beautiful and very Nice staff
review: Went November 2015, and it was everything and more.... Beautiful hotel, amazing swimming pool... That meanders around the grounds of the hotel.  Rooms excellent, service brilliant. However only ate breakfast in hotel, as found amazing restaurants on beach...BLUE MIST... WILL DO separate review for there.  The hotel does offer transport to "town", where you can mooch around market etc.  Personally consider is too far to walk to town. Travelled as a two centre holiday with Thomson, first spent couple nights in Marriott in Bangkok...so got the best of both worlds, frenzy and excitement of. City, calm and relaxation of Khao Lak. Would definitely go back again

title: Amazing grounds and facilities; but not 5-Star's unfortunately.
review: Dear JoPickle,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your destination resort to spend your wedding anniversary.   Your kind comments regarding our facilities are much appreciate, our associates work hard to ensure that our property is well maintained and that our landscapes are beautifully manage. We hope that you will give our restaurant outlets a chance on your next visit with us. We have Takrai for Thai, Olive for Mediterranean, and Sakura for Japanese. In addition, we also have special buffet theme nights such as Catch from the Ocean where we serve fresh caught seafood, and Bollywood night where we serve Indian Cuisine.    We hope to welcome you back in the near future, please don’t hesitate to let us know if there is anything we could do to make your next visit with us even better.   Best regards,

title: A Good Four Star Hotel
review: We spent a week my sister and i in this beautiful hotel, i must say it's one of my favorite in Thailand ( i did 9 trips in Thailand in accor hotel) the staff is more than Nice and welcoming, always smiling, helping, special big thank to Léonie and the Reception staff. We'd like to come back with the whole family in january but prices are really more expensive So...we'll see, hope we find a good discount. The pool is amazingly crazy, the biggest i've seen in my Life, rooms are very confortable. The only negative point is the restaurant prices too expensive for the country, the weather was not really good but it's the tain season so a bit normal , the cost of the shuttle to go in bang niang 5€ return it could be Free for a 5 stars hotel. But despite those few little negative point…

title: Perfect holiday destination
review: An unbeatable destination. JW Marriott is set in a small town where life is slow and peaceful. The hotel property and the ambience of the town seem to be in sync.   The staff at the hotel are curtious and friendly, though I was a little surprised that majority of them cannot speak English especially when 60 percent of their guests are English speaking.   Let me start with the rooms. It's a big property so a lot of walking is required but once in the room, it is bliss. We were in the deluxe pool facing room... the view is beautiful. The monsoons add to the visual. They have jute beach bags in the room, a small gesture but very helpful when you are travelling light from another country.   The pool goes 3.2 km across the hotel. Small boats float around with refreshments. The…

title: Wonderful stay, 5-star service
review: Dear RajikaTalwar,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of resort destination. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share about your recent visit with others here on Tripadvisor.  We are thrilled to hear that you have taken advantage of our pool access room. It is surely a treat to be able to access the pool directly from your room in our hot heat. Your kind comments regarding our infinity pool is much appreciated, it surely is our resort’s pride and joy; hence, it being the longest infinity pool in South East Asia. Thank you for sharing information regarding our local markets and things to do in Khao Lak, that information will certainly benefit other readers.   We look forward to welcome you back in the near future, please let us know if there is anything that we could do to make your next stay with us even better.    Best regards,

title: Enjoyable, with a few disappointments
review: We were upgraded upon arrival to a room in the Spa complex. This room was stunning, with a private outdoor shower, sauna and spa bath. It opened onto a beautiful Thai water garden replete with lilies, frogs and calming music. The room was exceptionally comfortable and a menu of pillows allowed my partner and I to both have very restful nights.  The service in the complex is first class, with all staff being not only genuinely friendly and helpful, but going above and beyond to ensure their guests comfort it maximised. The food was delicious, although the busier times at the buffet breakfast and lunch were a bit noisy. I would recommend requesting the side room for breakfast away from the families with small children. The onsite restaurants were very good, providing ambience and…

title: Amazing Marriott get away!
review: Dear Oz_Lady_Traveler,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write about your memorable experience here on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your review about your stay at our Spa Villa; it is certainly a great choice of room for those looking for a more private, intimate experience.  We are proud to hear your praises about the service of our associates, our associates work hard to ensure that our guest leave with an utmost feeling of relaxation.  It is an honored to be your choice of destination resort to spend your special day. Please let us know if there is anything that we could do to make your next stay with us even better.  Best regards,

title: Amazing resort for relaxaing.  Staff were brilliant.
review: We are currently enjoying our stay at this lovely resort. We are 5 days into a 13 day stay. There are a lot of really positive things to say about this resort, but a few negatives as well.  First, the positives: 1. We booked directly with the resort on the Return to Paradise package, after seeing the resort on Luxury Escapes. The All inclusive nature of this package makes it a good deal and a really easy holiday when you are travelling with small children.  2. We are in a Family Pool Access room which gives a good amount of space for the 4 of us, and the pool access is great with children.   3. The staff at reception and all the restaurants have been wonderful. Money at reception made our checkin in seemless which was just what we needed after 20 hours of travelling. All the…

title: Beautiful however beware the beach dogs
review: We stayed here 6 nights in a lagoon pool access room in wing 4. It was just lovely. Staff were very friendly and helpful. There was some customer service issues with the waterfront restaurant which i addressed in a separate review. The rooms were beautiful. The pool was fantastic and relaxing. Hot tip- early on if you want an inflatable bed for pool get it straight away- they do not have them for hire but sell them on site or in town which is probably cheaper..we didnt get any and were regretting it the whole time but didnt want to waste the money at a late stage of the holiday. Grounds were well kept. Groundsmen very humble and respectful. There is one danger that i think the hotel needs to make more of a danger sign for rather than a little warning. There were a couple of…

title: Nice hotel with great pool and a tasty breakfast
review: Dear Natalie R,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We appreciate you taking your valuable time to write a review about our property and our restaurant outlets in their own individual tripadvisor pages.  Thank you for your kind comments regarding our facilities, our associates work hard to ensure that our property is well maintained, our landscapes are beautifully manage, and our pool and beach areas are kept clean. Thank you for bringing up the situation regarding the dogs at the beach front, we are well aware of the situation and have taken serval actions to try to remove the dogs. Furthermore, we do have warning signs on both side of our beach front.  We are honored to be your choice of resort destination. Please don’t hesitate to let us know if there is anything else we can do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Excellent Location, Excellent Staff & Excellent Hotel
review: Me and my husband stayed at this hotel for 10 days during the first half of May, 2016. The room was big and cozy, though the furniture was slightly old. The king-size bed was large and comfortable. Very big bathroom with shower and bath. Nice swimming pool with canals around the whole territory of the hotel. Great beach and sea.  The breakfast was one of the best ones we've ever seen. Such a wide variety of food from multiple cuisines, fresh juices and shakes, bakery, confectionery, etc. The beach bar and pool bar have a happy hour from 5 p.m. until 7 p.m. when all drinks are sold with 50% discount. We wished it was earlier, i.e. between 2p.m. and 4 p.m., like it was on Samui. There are several nice cafes near the hotel where we went for lunch/dinner. Go out of the hotel to the…

title: So far so good BUT.... the flies and the birds in the breakfast restaurant is not gastronomically appealing
review: Dear Ktretyak,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are honored to be your choice of resort destination. Thank you for taking your valuable time to share about your experience of your recent stay with us.  Thank you for your kind words regarding our hotel amenities and facilities. We are thrilled to hear your praises about our breakfast buffet; we certainly do have an extensive food selection. Your recommendations to others about our happy hour and local surroundings are much appreciated.  We hope that you had a memorable stay us. Please let us know if there is anything we can do make your next stay with us even better. We look forward to welcome you back.  Best regards,

title: Great place to stay
review: My first visit to Thailand, a mother and daughter retreat. When we arrived at the hotel, from the onset staff were outstanding in their delivering of service. Staff are very friendly and nothing seems to be too much for them. There is always someone to help, if they see you lost they approach you to offer help. A special mention to Hanna, who work in social media (public relations). She is amazing, she offered us tips on how to make the most of our time in Khao Lak. Also to the staff in the Waterfront restaurant. It is a great way to start the day surrounded by beautiful smiles. Another special mention to Nat, Tarn, Benz, Sorn and Boy. Yes some crazy names there.   About the hotel, it is absolutely stunning, the decor & location too. My room was outstanding, clean and fresh. The…

title: The most magnificent resort
review: We just finished 5 nights in this resort and there is nothing but good things I can say. On arrival we were met with warm welcoming smiles, we were swiftly checked in and walked to our room. The rooms are beautifully decorated and set out, even if the hotel is a little older you could hardly tell. The bathroom was beautiful and the bath was huge! It is spotlessly clean and you are made to feel so at home. The staff make you feel as if nothing is too much from them, every single member makes you feel so happy and welcome, as if you're in such a special place.  The breakfast Buffett has the largest spread I've ever seen- with stations to make your own juice, pancakes, waffles, soup, eggs.. Basically anything you could ever want for breakfast! The manager Poo is also an absolute…

title: A memorable and relaxing stay
review: Dear Tyneil,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write a review about your recent stay with us.   Your kind comments about our resort’s facilities and landscapes are much appreciated, our associates work hard to ensure that our property is well maintained, our landscapes are beautifully manage, and our pool and beach areas are kept clean. We are thrilled to hear that you are able to experience “Thai Hospitality” here with our resort associates. As we Thais, are known for our superb hospitality and warm smiles. Thank you for your praises about our breakfast buffet, we do have an extensive food selection. We have shared your kind words about our Manger Poo with her and she could not be happier.    We are honored to be your choice of destination resort, and glad to hear that you are planning your trip back to us. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Paradise
review: We had a great stay in this hotel. Its a beautiful hotel with all the luxuries one can ask for. It has variety of restaurants for all the moods. The beach is very nice and calm. Not to forget the lagoon access to the pools and you can access this lagoon right from balcony of your room! That was something new and exciting prospect. Staff was very polite and helpful. All in all had a very pleasant stay and would surely like to visit again!!

title: big beautiful hotel in khaolak!
review: Dear hardik16v,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We are glad that you were able to try our different restaurant outlets: Takrai for Thai, Sakura for Japanese and Oliver for Italian and Mediterranean.  It is definitely a treat to be able to access the pool directly from your room in such hot heat. Choosing the pool access room was certainly a great choice! We hope that you did have a memorable time with us and will continue to give us the chance to service you again in the near future.  Best regards,

title: Absolutely incredible
review: Just got back from this stunning hotel. we stayed 10 nights.  The hotel is stunning it have everything you could dream of. The rooms are the most beautiful room you ever seen . The staff is the most polite and  Kind you will ever come across.  The beach and grounds are heavenly beautiful.  We are going back next year and that says a lot as I like to see different parts of the world. Go you just have to go!!!!

title: Beautiful Resort Amazing Staff!
review: We attended an Indian wedding at this resort. The hotel is very beautiful with spacious rooms, quiet, peaceful, relaxing. The hotel staff was super friendly. Wherever you walk, the hotel staff greets you with a smile and folded hands. Breakfast with fresh juices and tens of savory dishes. One of the days, we rented the bikes to go around town. There is a small village nearby with local stores, school and a shrine. Beaches too are gorgeous. Pool is perhaps the longest surrounding the entire property and can be entered from anywhere. There was some rain in May but the beauty of the resort far compensates the rain and some heat. I would definitely recommend to everyone!

title: Once again, an incredible holiday here!!
review: Dear jlalani,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your time to write about your recent visit with us. We could not be happier to hear that you were able to experience memorable “Thai” experience with us. As we Thais, are known for our warm smiles and humble hospitality. Please do not hesitate to leave us a comment letting us know if we can do anything to make your next stay with us even better.   Best regards,

title: Absolutely beautiful
review: This is my 3rd time staying here and I intend to book again soon! The long drive here (over 1 hour from the airport) is still worth it, the resort and surrounding areas truly have everything you need! The biggest, most impressive pool awaits you here, not to mention great beaches right in front of the pool (with pool bar as well of course!).

title: great and long swimming  pool
review: Dear Cristian A,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa, it is always an honor to welcome back returning guest. Thank you for your kind comments regarding our pool, it is surely our resort pride and joy; hence, it is the longest infinity pool in South East Asia. Thank you for your continued loyalty, please do not hesitate to let us know if we can do anything to make your next stay with us even better. We look forward to welcome you back again in the near future.   Best Regards,

title: Another fantastic stay
review: We have just come home from 10 days in this magnificent resort. The food was amazing, the staff were so lovely and always smiling, and the pool spectacular. My husband is a coeliac and they made him fresh bread and pancakes  daily. He did take 2 loaves with him just in case, but needn't have worried. We purchased the Luxury Escapes Deal and all our meals were included. Sometimes we ate out at local restaurants with friends and can highly recommend Smiles Restaurant and Mojo Restaurant. Unfortunately for us it rained 8 days out of the 10, but we still had a fabulous time as the temp didnt drop much below 30deg so it was still hot. The rain wasnt what I expected. I was thinking it would be on and off throughout the day, but it was consistently raining with breaks overnight. We met…

title: Not what it used to be
review: We have stayed at this resort on several occasions over the years and recommended it to friends and family and others over social media. As Marriott Reward Gold members the resort has usually gone the extra mile for us. This time around (we are currently staying at the resort) the welcome and service have been decidedly lacklustre. Perhaps there has been a change of management. Certainly not the standard you would expect from a JW branded resort.

title: A truly magnificent resort
review: Dear Andy01,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa with us.  One of our key priorities is to provide the highest level of friendly and courteous service. While it is a pleasure having you here as our guest, your feedback regarding the service our team provided caught my attention. I am very sorry to learn that the quality of service provided by our team  did not quite meet your expectations.   I  beleive our duty manager had met you and resolved the issue you have mentioned. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the team in an effort to improve our overall arrival experience.   Thank you for being our loyal Marriott Rewards Gold MEMBER and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Luca F Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A dream come true!!
review: We have been privileged to holiday at many resorts in a number of countries over the years but the J W Marriott at Khao Lak would probably be close to numero uno for us.  It is a huge resort that consistently has close to 90%+ occupancy and despite the high rate it never exudes an atmosphere of being crowded due to its large sprawling layout.  If I said we stayed there for eight nights what would you think? Yep, like many other Australians we were staying on an almost unbelievable deal through Luxury Escapes which included all meals, massages and several other perks.   I cast my executive chef eyes over the breakfast spread and I can say that there is nothing missing. For those previous posters who complained that the breakfasts were the same every morning I tried to think of…

title: Excellent for pure rest and relaxation
review: This property was our last treat near the end of our honeymoon and it was absolutely fantastic!! If only we could have spent more time here.   There were very few and minor negatives: our stay started off strangely when the front desk staff took me to the wrong room that she thought was assigned to us and somebody was already staying in (which they graciously apologized for and sent a fruit basket to our room in apology)  I wish I had known about the endless array of pools, or someone had written about the benefit of bringing a floating device - so that you could float around in all of the pools. They have this very long river that goes around the whole resort!! But the pools were absolutely fantastic! You could always find a pool with sunshine and they had adult pools as well…

title: Great hotel let down by rain!
review: Dear HotelWrockstar,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! We appreciate you spending your valuable time to share your experience of your recent stay with others on tripadvisor.   We are honored to be your choice of resort to celebrate your special occasion.  You kind comments regarding our pool are heartwarming. Our infinity pool is surely our resort pride and joy; hence, the pool being the longest infinity pool in South East Asia. Therefore, having a pool access room is certainly a treat in our warm climate. We are thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed our choices of food selection.  Our Quan Spa has been a sweet escape for many of our guest, and we could not be happier that 6you had a great experience there. Our Spa associates work hard to ensure that our guest leave with the utmost feeling of relaxation.    Thank you for your review, we will share your comments with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Please let us know if you can provide you with anything to make your next stay even better.   Best regards,

title: LOVELY HOTEL
review: We stayed at JW Marriott for 3 nights ,A truly beautiful resort with a great beach front location. Rooms are very spacious . very delicious food , restaurants overlooking ocean great service and friendly staff .

title: Incredible pool, deserted beaches, fantastic resort!
review: It was my first time I ever stayed in a JW hotel, but it will for sure not be my last. I had a fantastic time in this incredible hotel. I stayed 3 nights and loved the experience from beginning till the end. The fabulous pool, the amazing food, the amazing Spa and the lovely staff. Simply an excellent stay!  We were greeted by Lotus who served us a delicious welcoming drink. She started joking straight away and was mocking us which immediately broke the ice and I felt home from that moment on as we started laughing straight away! The service was great and we were guided to our room and they explained everything in the room and outside. They showed us on a map where the restaurants were located, the breakfast was served, the Quan Spa was housed, where the tennis courts and the…

title: Awesome Resort
review: Beautiful resort with the best buffet breakfast I've ever had. Even though rained for our entire stay was still a relaxing stay. Staff very helpful and a great choice of meal options during the evening.

title: Ist visit and loved it
review: We stayed for 10 days and were very happy with the facilities, food and staff. A special mention to the Catering Manager Suchart, who went out of his way to make us welcome and the professional way he dealt with some unruly/noisy guests from a wedding party. Also thanks to Tanny in the Olive Restaurant for her great service and friendly nature. The breakfast bar is one of the best we have ever seen, you have a choice of omelettes, pancakes, smoothies, coffees. thai etc  to order to your liking. The lunch is reasonable but could do with more variety, but probably doesn't matter as breakfast goes until 11am. The option of dinner in the Italian, Thai and Japanese restaurants was exceptional, our favourite was the Japanese with Wit the Manager being very caring and friendly. The…

title: 3rd Visit and still going strong...mainly
review: Dear Jan and Michael,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time in sharing your experience of your recent stay with us.   We apologize for the any inconveniences that the noise disturbance may have caused you. We are happy to hear that our Food and Beverage Director Mr. Suchart, was able to help you regarding the matter. Your kind words regarding our associates from different restaurant outlets are much appreciated, we will share your positive feedback with them. We have taken note of your comments about the variety of our lunch selection, and will speak to our chefs to see what we can do to add an even more variety to our lunch menu.   Your feedback is much appreciated and very heart lifting to our management team. Please let us know if there is anything that we can do for you to make your next stay with us even better. Look forward to welcoming you back.  Best regards,

title: Excellent American style hotel
review: Large hotel on a deserted long beach. Went in the off season so the hotel and beach were quiet which we liked but the weather was awful. Hotel staff very friendly and helpful and as you'd expect from a Marriott all the facilities you could ask for and more. Room was a premium pool view top floor which we can recommend. Quiet, large, clean, very comfortable king bed, great shower. Would visit again as for £80 p.d. a real bargain.

title: Luxury Escapes experience was exactly that...superb, relaxing holiday with plenty of family time and pampering!
review: Arrived very late 2300hrs, 1.5 hrs from airport greeted with cold towels and local drink...great start! Upgraded family pool access room was not ideal for family of 4 as no privacy for 13YO daughter. Next day, met German intern Lisa, very helpful and understanding and took care of things. Being a Marriot member Lisa recommend upgrade to superb 2 story duplex and kicked off a wonderful 7 more nights...F&B was superb across all restaurants, (special mention to Oil in Thai restaurant and Exec Chef Chai) though be careful with seafood night as fish prices are very high. Poh, Manager Spa was very helpful and the treatments out of this world. Being a male, recommend you give Spa treatments a go, otherwise you are missing out! Highlight was the facial...definitely a wonderful relaxing…

title: Superb hotel, with stunning location and excellent food and staff
review: Dear Lee W,  Warm greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write about your recent experience with us.   We are happy to hear about your positive experience upon your check in with us. It is pleasing to hear that you have taken advantage of our two story deluxe room. Your kind comments regarding each of our restaurant outlets are much appreciated. We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience at our Quan Spa, our associate at the Quan Spa work hard to ensure that our guest leave with the utmost fleeing of relaxation. All you positive comments regarding our associates have been shared to our team.   Please let us know if we can improve anything to make your next stay with us even better. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best regards,

title: Not to be missed
review: I spent one week at the hotel with my family (wife and children of 5 and 8). Already at entry we were greeted by the staff and were placed in the large reception area with a drink and small cool towel. The room was very nice and we got a small gift every day from the cleaners. The pool area, being several kilometers long, was great for the kids. Finally I must praise the breakfast! I was superb - with a plethora of options and very good smoothies (you must try the Khao Lakh Booster). Thank you!

title: Best ever in Khao Lak
review: Just back from an 8 night stay , with all meals included .cant think of any thing I could fault about our stay at the JW Marriott Khao lak  .The Breakfast was amazing  every thing covered whether you are fro Europe or Asia or the antipodes . Had amazing weather but did rain on our last part day but still pleasant and swim able day   Restaurants are all good but our prefered was the Thai  staff were really nice and the food always the same   top standard .

title: Truly Beautiful resort
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott in April this year and from the moment we arrived we felt relaxed. The resort is gorgeous, staff were so friendly and welcoming and nothing was too much trouble. We had originally booked a deluxe swim out room but we found we needed more room and we were next door to smokers on both sides so we asked if we could upgrade to the family suite. The resort accommodated us almost immediately for a small fee and we were so happy we moved as the suite was great for a family of 2 adults and 2 children.   The room was extremely clean and was maintained each day despite the mess I felt we left it in sometimes.  The swim out aspect was fabulous and my 9 year old would jump out of bed each morning, open the doors and go for a swim. The pool is amazing, being the…

title: Good place to rest
review: Dear Harmeyholiday2016,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak! Thank you for choosing us as your destination resort to celebrate your special occasion.  We cannot be happier to hear that you have found our services and associates accommodating. Our associates work hard to ensure that we are able to recreate your version of a memorable vacation. Your kind words regarding our pool is much appreciated. It is, surely our resort’s pride and joy, and one of the highlights of many of our guests. We are glad that you were able to take advantage of our recreation facilities and try our extensive food selections.   We are so humble by your praises and hope that you will continue to let us service you in the future. Look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Best regards,

title: A PIECE OF HEAVEN! A TRULY 5 STAR Plus Resort! Highly Recommend!
review: We have spent here a week and that was certainly enough to wind down after a hectic time at work. The resort is quite isolated so the hotel facilities is all you get. Return trip to Khao Lak town is 200 baht per person and there's hardly a reason to take it. Then it's a good thing that the hotel is pretty much self sufficient with 4 restaurants, some basic shops and a fabulous 3km swimming pool which surrounds the entire hotel complex. Gym is reasonably well equipped but very popular with the patrons. Hotel is located right on the beach which extends several km in both directions. The sea though was quite rough during our stay. Restaurants are pretty good witch a choice of italian, thai and japanese cousines and prices are quite fair. The character is family oriented with some…

title: Beautiful Resort, exceptional Staff
review: Dear PSzymiczek,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write about your recent stay with us.   Thank you for your thorough review about our property, facilities, and restaurant outlets. We are glad that you were able to take advantage of our recreational facilities. Your kind comments regarding the service of our associates are much appreciate, we will share your comments with them.   We hope that you enjoyed your time here with us and will visit us again in the near future. Please don’t hesitate to send us any other comments or concerns; we want you to have a memorable experience here with us.   Best regards,

title: Holiday at Khaolak
review: We have been many times to all the different beaches and places in Thailand but one of our new favorites is now the J.W. Marriott Khao Lak.  If you are really looking for a peaceful holiday with the best of the best Thai hospitality then this is your new place of dream. Everything from the Check Inn, wonderful and in still good conditions Duplex Suite, the amazing long really 3,2km outdoor pool, nice breakfast buffet, good room service food all this things and even more made our holiday very enjoyable. Mostly of the time we stay in 5 star hotels but is the first time since long time ago I felt a bit sad to make the Check out. Can't wait to be back there for another week.  Our next holiday is booked already at the J.W. Marriott Khao Lak. Can't wait to arrive in there and swim at…

title: Very Nice!!
review: Excellent resort. Amazing service and food. Love the kids club..😉. Only 2 small issues - bugs!!! They really need to spray the resort each morning, my 5 yr old son got about 30-40 bites on him in the first night. And the some of the Aussie tourists are just down right rude and disrespectful - and I'm Aussie too, never seen Aussies be so rude! Apart from those 2 very small issues, can't wait to come back again. If you can book through luxury escapes definitely do it, great value for money!!

title: It's the little things they get wrong in spades.
review: Dear Glen A,     Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for your praises about our resort.      Your kind comments regarding our kids clubs are much appreciated; please don’t hesitate to leave us comments of how we can improve to make it even better. We are sorry to hear about your minor incident with other guests, we hope that it did not ruin your memorable experience here with us. In regards to your comments about the bugs at our resort; since we are in such tropical climate having many bugs is something we cannot control. However, we do spay our property every now so often and each of our restaurant do carry bug impellent spray.     Thank you again for choosing us as your resort of choice. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.   Sincerely,

title: Best Resort I've been to.
review: It's not the nice room, the restaurants, or room service. The wide selection of over priced drinks at the bar, the pool, gym or onsite spa that makes a five star resort. It's the little things. The efficiency and ease in room reservation, the timely and comfortable pickup from the airport for your transfer. The smiles of staff,  timely room servicing and the flawlessness of the room. That's how I  judge a hotel or resort.   Maybe I set my expectations to high but when you deal with a name like JW Marriott Khao Lak it's hard not to.   Unfortunately on my most resent trip there my expectations weren't met. Not to mention I didn't feel like I was being listened to.   I booked my trip, which was simple enough but I was then encouraged to become a Marriott's Reward member. Which I…

title: Excellent hotel with great beach
review: Dear Robert T,   Thank you for choosing JW Khao Lak as your preferred holiday destination and taking the time to share your feedback on this forum. We want to thank you for bringing these concerns to our attention as we take all the feedback very seriously as we use this information objectively to improve the experiences which we provide to our guests.  We sincerely regret the issue with the shared transfer as the Manager indicated upon your arrival and while meeting you at departure.  We will finely tune this process.  The nature of the sea and nearby wildlife is a constant variable and we have procedures in place which we update on a daily basis to ensure the safety and enjoyment of our guests.  Marriott constantly strives to improve all communities which we are involved and works on long term development plans for such communities and their members. The JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa specifically supports the local community by directly enabling surrounding beach restaurants, shops, vendors, taxis, and local suppliers. We support the local community through job training, beach cleanups, and a variety of social responsibility programs including but not limited to mangrove reforestation, supporting local orphanages, underprivileged autistic children at a local foundation, animal welfare, child safety campaigns, and long term sustainability.   We are committed to “Operation smile”, gathering funds to support medical procedure fees to perform life changing operations for children. In fact, the majority of our resort associates are permanent members of the community and take pride in our sincere commitment to the long term sustainable development of the destination. We do not however support businesses which have a history of engaging in illegal or unethical business practices which may directly compromise the safety of our guests and community.     Once again, we genuinely regret that we did not meet your expectations and will improve the areas which you have highlighted.   Please contact myself or another member of our management team if we can further explain or understand your concerns at mhrs.hktkl.ays@marriotthotels.com.  Sincerely yours,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: Amazing stay
review: Currently staying at this resort on a Luxury Escape package. This resort is outstanding. It is perfect for travelers of all types. Caters beautifully for young families. No problems with dining. Most people feed themselves and kids early so plenty of kid free adult time available. We are traveling with a four year old and it is perfect. Kids club and a fantastic pool fill our days. No need to leave the resort as everything you could want is here. Gym, squash courts, bike hire, pool tables, tennis courts, an infinity pool plus a 3 km long pool and beach keep you busy. There is a deli for snacks and coffee breaks as well as outdoor bars both on land and in the pools. Choice of 4 restaurants with amazing menus. Did I mention that the breakfast is the best I've ever experienced.…

title: If the Marriot does not make you happy you must be hard to please
review: My Wife and I are just back from 8 wonderful nights at JW Marriott and I can’t believe the whinging reviews that have been posted on TripAdvisor  I am so mad I just had to post a review Myself . My wife and I are both involved in hospitality and have stayed in many top hotels and cruise ships around the World and the staff and management at JW Marriott need to be praised and supported. They could not have done more or had a better resort. Was it 100% perfect no it wasn’t but I’m not a nit-picker looking  for something to complain about  I’m  on holiday and want to enjoy myself.  The JW Marriott is awesome and we can’t wait to return it has a real wow factor from the moment you arrive until the moment you leave. The rooms are large all with views and balconies, the ground floor…

title: Remote but Relaxing
review: Dear Graeme06111,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write and share your experience here with others.  Your review is certainly heat lifting, we appreciate you kind comments regarding the service of our associates. We are happy to hear that you were able to experience ‘Thai hospitality’ here with us, and will share your kind comments to our associates. As we Thais, are known for our amiable hospitality and warm smiles. Your comments regarding the selection of our food are much appreciated; we are always looking to add and even more variety to our food selection.   Please don’t hesitate to let us know what we can improve to make your next stay with us even better.We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best regards,

title: Very relaxing stay, great service, beautiful beach
review: We stayed for 4 nights and apart from a little hiccup on the first night, everything was splendid. Splendid because the resort manager listened to our concerns and rectified the problems straight away. She was very accommodating which makes the whole difference when you stay at a resort. All staff were friendly and polite. Quan Spa is a must try when you're there.

title: Just lovely
review: Dear Nina L,   Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for reviewing and sharing your experience with others here on Tripadvisor.   We are sad to hear that you had a minor incident upon you first day with us; however, we are thrilled to hear that we were able to provide service recovery for you. Please don’t hesitate to share any other comments or concerns you may have with us.  We hope that we would be able to provide you and even more “wow” service the next time you come visit us. We look forward to welcoming you back again   Sincerely,

title: Underwhelming
review: The staff were all lovely - very friendly and helpful. Our room had pool access and was nicely laid out, clean and well maintained. They seem to separate the couples from the families in different sections of the hotel which suited us as we were on our honeymoon. It was really relaxing and quiet at our room but we could go down to the main pool for more action if we wanted to. The beach is beautiful, amazing sunsets and there were loads of different events on while we were there. The food was great but if you're watching your waistline this is not the place for you! Breakfast, lunch and some evening meals were buffet and we found it hard to not keep going back - it was so good. The only downfall was the price of alcohol - it was expensive to have a drink by the pool or over…

title: I need to go on a diet!
review: Wow...what an array of food! Buffet breakfast and lunch and wonderful restaurants for dinner. The temptations are endless. Never a dull moment. Lots of activities available. Cooking classes, beauty treatments including massage, facial and mani/pedi. Swim swim swimming. Kids club if fab. Elephant/turtle day out was great. Bangniam markets 10 mins down the road worth a visit. Staff very obliging and super friendly. Just beyond markets is a sports bar + accommodation at a place called Walkers inn..my husband very excited to be able to watch Aust rugby league (beer cheap and cheap food if you are hungry which I would doubt). No real negative comments- if I had to say anything it would be that the power tripped out several times but was remedied very quickly. All in all a great break…

title: So Friendly
review: We had an exceptional 8 night stay. The staff were the friendliest I've ever experienced. They really added to my enjoyment, thanks. The food is so good. We ate at all the restaurants and went to a couple of buffets and they were all great. The breakfast was best though, so much choice.

title: Amazing hotel on the perfect beach
review: The hotel itself is beautiful and perfectly maintained, with big clean rooms and friendly stuff. Restaurants on the property are also good, though a bit expensive, the Japanese one being our personal favorite. Very good spa, as to be expected in the hotel of this level. They offer wide range very reasonably priced day tours as well. We've booked our tours ahead with a local tour provider, as we usually do, but in this case it was unnecessary - the prices and tour variety in the hotel were similar.

title: Good hotel, but very big
review: Okay This is really a big hotel! Everything is good arranged and completely set for tourists. We had a Great time, but something the feeling of a machine.   If you come for rest, don't go, if you come for pleasure, yes go to The marriot!  Nothing is too Much, big breakfast, enough sunbedding, watersports, tennis, kids, Amazing spa and more ...   For us The biggest disadvantage were the fully booked spa and it was a bit moist in the room. Clothing did not dry and our quilt was wet.   Overall thanks too all of The staff and Nice place to stay!

title: More crowded than last visits
review: Dear JeWeDe,  Greetings from sunny JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time sharing your experience of your recent stay with us.   Your kind comments regarding the service of our staffs are much appreciated. Our Quan Spa has been one of the highlights of many of our guests; therefore, we are looking to hire more associates to cope with the high demand for service. Since we are located in such humid climate, drying clothes can be a challenge; however, we do provide laundry service upon our guests’ request.   Your comments and recommendations are much appreciated. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sincerely,

title: Great Break
review: Travelled on a Luxury Escape holiday.  Hotel was lovely, rooms clean and the staff were exceptional.  Great choice of restaurants and the food choice at breakfast was great.  I personally like to eat local food when I am away and they certainly catered to my taste buds.  Can honestly say did not have a bad meal.  The only down side was the trek to get into the pool so I would recommend getting a pool access room.  Certainly well geared for kids and the Kids Club had some great activities.  There were also activities for the adults including paddle boarding, Tia Chi, Yoga etc.  I did a cooking class, held in the Thai restaurant by their chef.  Cooked two dishes and was a hands on class.  Lot of fun and we got to eat the food.  Utilised the spa and had an aromatherapy massage and…

title: Serenity all in one place
review: Dear Dolores W,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Your kind comments regarding our food and restaurant choices are much appreciated. We are glad that you were able to utilize our recreation facilities and take advantage of the classes we provide. Thank you for choosing our resort as your resort of choice. We look forward to welcoming your back to our paradise in the near future.    Sincerely,

title: Fantastic resort but let down by the food
review: I have just returned today from a week at this stunning resort. Already yearning to be back there. Came home so relaxed. The accommodation was spacious and luxurious. The pool, the spa, the grounds, the beach, the staff were just beautiful. Did the walk around the whole pool about 2klms about an hour or so it was great. We were treated like royalty. I would not hesitate recommending this resort. I only hope I can return again some day. Khao Lak is away from the hustle and bustle. Very peaceful, romantic and serene. Sawadeekah.

title: Fantastic resort, would happily return
review: Dear Parksy2016,  Greetings from sunny Marriott Khao Lak and Spa!  We appreciate your kind words regarding our accommodations and service. We are thrilled to hear that you had a memorable experience on your recent stay with us. It would be an honor to welcome you back again in the near future!   Sincerely,

title: A little piece of heaven
review: This is my 5th trip to Thailand and my first in Khao Lak. I will divide this review in multiple sections and compare against other Marriotts and other 5 star resorts in Thailand that I have stayed at.   The Pool Hands down the most amazing pool you are ever likely to see. 3.1km of canals and large pool sections catering from adult depth to very shallow. We usually don't do much pool swimming at hotels but this pool was something else. In addition the water is very warm (almost hot tub temperature) so you can easily spend hours in the water comfortably. Wing 4 had slightly deeper water which is great. Some of the other wings are far too shallow (unless you have kids) so you'll have to swim to other parts for a more enjoyable experience.   Resort Grounds.  Immaculate and beautiful…

title: Superior in every way
review: We stayed here for a week in late April/early May.  As has been mentioned before, the hotel is set on a beautiful beach (think white sand, clean water) and is a luxurious oasis in a quite isolated part of the coast. The hotel is exceptionally well designed and despite the hotel being full, you can always find privacy and a secluded area if that is what you are after.  The canals are also well designed with shady areas to sit in the water and enjoy the view.  The hotel is huge and the distance from reception to the beach front is significant.  If you have mobility issues (as my husband did) a room close to the beach would be the best.  Discuss your needs with the hotel before arriving - we found them to be very helpful not only in the planning stages but during our stay the staff…

title: excellent hotel with good price at a very beautiful beach.
review: Dear charliemelb,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. You review and comments are much appreciated.   We are thrilled that we were able to accommodate you with your special requests on your recent stay with us. As you are our valued guests, we want you to be able to have a memorable experience at our resort. We want to apologize regarding the noise disturbance and hope that it did not spoil your time here with us.   Please allow us to service you again in the near future. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,

title: Hidden Oasis
review: The hotel is huge but very well organized. The staff is kind and well trained. The result can be seen at mealtimes with almost no queues and no problem in getting tables.  The beach is splendid, long and warm sea, ideal for long walks. The breakfast is very good, tasty and with an extensive array of choice. There are four restaurants with different type of food, so you are not obliged to eat only thai. The alcohol beverages is very expensive, but this is in all thailand, i think.

title: Very nice place for relaxation
review: This resort is hard to fault the spirit of culture captivating, superlatives abound. We chose the Pool Access Room, great choice and well worth the additional cost, it was lovely to pop in and out of the pool at leisure.  Traveling with friends we were able to have villas side by side, so shared pool dips  early mornings and late evenings, was a great start and finish to each day. Happy hour and swim up bars were a great way to meet other vacationers, the 3.2 klm swim canal is amazing so swimming to and from your room to the swim bar was quite unique. The resort was at 92% capacity but at no time did it feel crowded. The room was well appointed, fabulous water pressure, free wifi, our room attendant (the beautiful Fon) with her infectious smile and happy demeanor was ever so…

title: Almost Faultless
review: Dear Lyn and Peter,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for choosing us as your choice of destination resort. We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share you memorable experience here with us on Tripadvisor.  We are thrilled to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pool access room; it is definitely a treat to be able to directly access the pool in this hot heat. You kind comments regarding our service and associates are much appreciated. Our associates work hard to ensure that our guests have a memorable experience in their stay here with us. We will share your kind comments with our associates.  We hope to see you and service you again in the near future. !

title: A Meandering Pool?
review: A feature never before encountered in a hotel; a pool that meanders throughout the complex amongst the five wings and surrounded by gardens and trees, interspersed with bars and playgrounds and in excess of three kilometres in length.  The pool certainly lent itself to the early morning walk and awakening splash or two.  As you come to expect in Thailand the staff here were top class, cheerful polite, accommodating and seemed to be able to entrance and entertain children of all ages.  Special mention to Laila and Tin, who went out of their way to make our stay as enjoyable as possible.  To take full advantage of the pool it is highly recommended that you upgrade to a poolside room in wings three and four; they have direct access to the pool.  Wing three receives a little morning…

title: Our first Holiday :)
review: Dear Donald C,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your valuable time to write about your memorable experience with us.  Your review about our different pool areas are much appreciated. We take much pride in our infinity pool, as it, is definitely one of our strong selling points. Thank you for your kind words about our restaurant outlets, we would recommend you to try our romantic dinner if you have not already done so. Our romantic dinner booking allow guest to be able to dine privately by the beach with a beautiful set up, and end the night lighting lanterns.   Thank you for sharing the pictures you took at our property here on Tripadvisor. We hope that you experience here with us will lead you to continue to choose us as your resort of choice.   Sincerely,

title: Amazing dtaff
review: We stayed for 8 x days April 23rd - May 2nd 205, booked  through Luxury Escapes, it seemed most of the people we met were also there through Luxury Escapes. Marriott is a beautiful resort about 1.15-1.30hrs away from the airport, we arrived late at 11.30pm, so missed our first dinner unfortunatel,  Although arriving in our room there was a lovely cake (for our anniversary) and 2 lovely swans made from towels and rose petals on our bed, it was such a lovely and thoughtful surprise :) We had a dip in the pool straight from our room (be aware the pool is ALWAYS very warm). Daily breakfasts, lunches and dinners were all included and also 4 spa treatments each. we LOVED our breakfast, although we could eat at all restaurants there was only a Set Menu at most restaurants if we used…

title: Just what we needed.
review: Dear Shontal5,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! Thank you for taking your time to write about your recent stay with us. All your kind comments and concerns are much appreciated.  Our Luxury Escape package has been admired by many of our guest and we could not be happier. We are thrilled to hear about your memorable experience with our associates. Our associates pay close attention to our guests’ personal requests and always attempt to go above and beyond to provide guests with a memorable service.  We will share your kind comments to our staffs.  You kind words regarding our food and restaurant outlets are much appreciated. It saddens us to hear about your experience with the noise annoyance, and we do hope that this minor incident did not disrupt your memorable experience with us.   As per your comments regarding our Spa, we are looking to hire more associates to cope with the high demand for our service. Our Spa associates work hard to ensure that our guests leave the spa with the utmost experience of relaxation.   We hope that you and your family would continue to give us another change to service you. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.   Sincerely,

title: A great place to stay for couples
review: Besides from being situated in one of the most breathtaking beaches I've had the pleasure of visiting before, and besides from the hotels pools, bars and restaurants all being on high individual merit in my opinion, this hotel also has exceptionally warm and friendly staff who made my stay extra special. They were always available to help with and accommodate any request, and in some cases predict what we needed before we had the chance I ask. I would happily return to this resort in the future!

title: Better 2nd time around!
review: We had 8 lovely days here and it didn't disappoint. Another Luxury Escape and we will be awaiting the next one. This time there were 11 of us and they catered to everything we asked.  We requested to be in the same bay and this was accommodated. They also recognised that it was (for 5 of us) our 2nd time and we were welcomed with welcome back flowers on the bed. Couldn't fault the room, the meals and the spa.

title: Great help when we needed it
review: Dear pheinze8,  Warm greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa! It is always an honored to welcome back returning guests. Your comments regarding the service of our associates are much appreciated; our associate takes pride in providing our guests with an utmost memorable service. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.   Sincerely,

title: Beautiful Resort!
review: My wife and I arrived at the Marriott on a Saturday night and intended to stay for 10 nights.  Unfortunately my wife fell unwell after 3 days (not at all related to the hotel), needed hospitalisation for an operation.  After a week in hospital we needed to,extend our stay until doctors would let us fly back to Australia.   I approached the duty manager to inquire whether we could extend our stay, hopefully at a reasonable rate.  I dealt with Siri who was absolutely fantastic.  The hotel went out of its way to assist us and to accomodate our request.  It was no problems to extend our stay at a very good rate.  When my wife returned to the hotel after 7 nights in hospital we found fresh flowers in the room, and a lovely note prepared by the staff wishing a speedy recovery.  So…

title: Family Holiday with Friends
review: Dear  Guylaunder,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak and Spa, thank you for choosing us as your destination resort and taking your time to share you experience with us.   You kind words regarding our front office associates are much appreciated, and will be shared with the team. It saddens us to hear about your heath, but we are glad that we were able to assist you and made you stay more comfortable.    We hope that you have a speedy recovery, and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sincerely

title: 2nd Visit and Still Very Good and Very Relaxing
review: I was hesitant to travel to Thailand as it was our first family trip with 2 children overseas but I had nothing to worry about! The resort is 1 in a half hours from the airport and we were exhausted by the time we arrived.  We were greated with cold towels and a lovely cold drink.  Nothing was too much trouble! We changed our room as we had a teenager and needed more space and another bathroom.   The pool is to die for the water lovely temperature sparkling clean.  The restaurants fantastic great food something for everyone! Staff bend wonderful will do anything to accommodate you! We had 7 days of relaxing bliss. Weather warm sunny very humid. Kids area has pool tables air hockey table tennis.   We even used the gym make sure you have proper shoes for running as tread mills…

title: Good In part - depends who YOU are
review: We just returned from a two week stay.  I am a regular traveler and alway review hotels/restaurants etc because I find these reviews very helpful guide to me.   We picked this place because it was meant to be quite.  The first week was fine then we had the 3 day private celebration that the hotel allowed to take over different hotel areas  - it was horrendous !! It spoilt our holiday.
