review: Dear Wilmerx1,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our helpful associates, the guest room, the breakfast, the high speed internet, the restaurants and your experience at the Private Romantic Dinner.   We regret to learn of the inconvenience you experienced with the sunbed experience. Our team will further check for details ensuring this will not happen again.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Best holiday ever!
review: The hotel is fantastic, rooms are clean and very nice, service is top. The pool is everywhere and large we had an excellent family holiday at the hotel and we appreciate the hotel level of service. Food options are very good and large, sport club including the GYM is very good.

title: Nice beach for a swim
review: Dear Noam W,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our fantastic hotel, the guest room, the service, the pool, the food and the facilities.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: it is a paradise
review: We visited here in November for the second time and will be sure to return again. The resort facilities are amazing, in particular the pool. Kids and adults have a great time . Beach access is also fantastic. In short there is nothing missing from the resort.. Breakfast is phenomenal and restaurants cater well for special diets (we are veg) ! Staff are wonderful, polite, friendly and very accommodating. Perfect resort for family time and relaxation!  We would like to thank the staff across the resort for their great service ! See you all in 2016!!

title: Khao Lak and JW Marriott are a match made in heaven
review: The beautiful beach, nice pool, spacious rooms, delicious food and friendly people make that you want to visit this hotel in Khao Lak. The staff members are very kind and willing to serve you the best they can. The restaurants next to the hotel on the beach complete the picture. We did not have the feeling or urge to go out and drive miles to explore. All the facilities and views kept us in close proximity of the hotel, which is our case not so common.

title: Just Fantastic, will be back soon!
review: Dear randy c,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our beautiful beach, the nice pool, the spacious guest room, the delicious food and the friendly associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Excellent
review: The hotel is incredible. It has it all-- miles of pool canals and the beach front. Even in season, you don't feel that you are at a crowded beach resort. Plenty of quite time, sunsets on the beach and live music. The food is great and the shacks near by give you great options. A must do for someone looking for a relaxed beach holiday.

title: A trip to paradise
review: Dear DaminiTandan,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  It is lovely to see that you had such a pleasant stay and we thank you for your compliments about our hotel, the pool, the beach sunset with live music and the food.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Excellent resort in paradise
review: Marvellous stay at the JW Marriott. Excellent room standard and breakfast first class. Disappointed that a simple request for rooms in a specific building (my mother in law had recently undergone an operation) not only went ignored when I emailed the resort in advance, but wasnt catered for during our stay unless we paid for an upgrade - we simply wanted a 'standard' room in an accessible block (which were available! But my mother in law was put on the 2nd floor!) Nonetheless, our stay was most enjoyable, the pool and grounds are immaculate and the room service was of a high standard. Drinks during Happy Hour were good value. The only thing the hotel lacked was a personal touch, this is probably down to the sheer size of the resort and the fact it is part of multinational chain…

title: Amazing Stay
review: My Partner and I went away here for our anniversary and we were completely taken care of by the staff. The room was amazing and has all of the facilities we were after. We found having the pool access room to be the most important part as the closest entrance tot he pool from our room was a little walk away (but not too far). Having the multiple restaurants meant that we were not bored with the food and that we could have different experiences every night. This hotel truely brought out the relaxation we needed and provided everything for us. Very comprehensive package from the hotel which made out stay very enjoyable.

title: The most friendly and trustworthy people....
review: Dear Peter C,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred anniversary destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room and our associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic location facilities and wonderful staff
review: I stayed at JW Marriott Khao Lak for 8 days( 5 Dec 2015 - 13 Dec 2015). I chose JW Marriott Khao lak because it was famous for its swimming pool and beach. But the people in the hotel are the most impressive. They are really kind and helpful! When my 3 years old son was suddenly ill and had high fever, the hotel stafves checked my son's fever and helped us to visit local clinique. The Thai doctor was so good, and my son recovered soon and had a really good time in Khao Lak. Through all the effort they made, my family had a wonderful vacation, I appreciate it so much.( I don't remember her name. Thank you!)  Preaw, the F&B staff, was helpful,too.  Nam, Bee have beautiful smile and make us happy. My son misses them so much. My family will stay JW Marriott Khao Lak and hopefully…

title: Safety Issue - Hotel Airport Transfer
review: Dear travelsoooogood,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Preaw, Nam and Bee are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Very chilled hotel
review: We enjoyed a Pool Access room on a bed and breakfast basis, we were totally wowed by the hotel on arrival, the lagoon pool was amazing, the sun loungers were comfortable.  The breakfast is out of this world I don't think I have ever seen such an array of food on offer, including a juice/smoothie bar along with the other traditional fair.  We stayed for 7 nights in December and loved every minute.  We used the sunbeds by the beach in the day and then returned to our room and utilised the pool to attend the swim up bar from 5pm, which was lovely, it often rained during this time but it was warm and the drinks were on "happy Hour" so it was all good.  There are some lovely on the beach restaurants to use we ate there several times, the hotel also had some lovely restaurants to use.…

title: Best ever!
review: Fantastic resort.  Enjoyed the couple of days we were there and wish it could have been longer.   Was worth paying extra for a pool side appartment. Breakfast the best ever.  From smoothie bar to chocolate fountain it was an experience.  Choice of outside or inside seating and almost on the beach. There is even a pillow menu!

title: Best resort ever
review: Dear Gala-galavanting,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our fantastic resort, the guest room, the breakfast, the beach and the pillow menu.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future! Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: High Expectations
review: Great outstanding serviced rom all the staff! Lots of space for the guests... Amazing pool access rooms! Wonderful morning buffet with the greatest selection of very high quality.... Perfect beach! A bit quiet in the evening, and expensive restaurants....

title: JW Marriott 5*, Staff 10*
review: Dear marie-eve-dk,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  It is lovely to see that you had such a pleasant stay and we thank you for your compliments about our associates, the amazing pool, guest room, the breakfast and the beach.  In terms of pricing in our restaurants, we believe that we are fairly priced and definitely in line with other properties of similar categories in Thailand. The comparison with local dining establishments is not really insightful since the level of service, quality of food, hygiene, etc. are completely different. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great resort fir families
review: I had a nice relaxing time at the JW Marriott. I stayed there at the recommendation of colleagues and it’s a nice place. There was nothing that overwhelmed though. I have high expectations for resort properties and it was just okay.   The check in process was smooth and quick. Great hospitality throughout my stay.   The rich dark wood in the rooms make them warm and cozy. The bed was a little more firm than I like but it was comfortable enough. You can tell that the property has a little age because of the cracks in the natural stones used in the bathrooms. They have amazing tubs in the rooms but it takes forever to fill the tub. Be careful with the water the temperature isn't constant.   The amenities at the hotel are great, especially if you have a family. There’s plenty to do…

title: Paradise
review: The best hotel I've ever stayed at. Normally, I prefer to visit new places instead of going to the same place twice, but I'm definately coming back to JW Marriott Khao Lak. It was everything we hoped for and more.

title: So disappointing in many aspects...
review: Dear LSMadsen,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. We were delighted to read your review and positive feedback. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Honeymoon blidd
review: Wanted to find a perfect girls getaway for a weelend: being in a nice resort, having a friendly and attentive service in a beautiful environment...well JW Marriott was not the place to go!  Except the main lobby and the amazing swimming pool, the hotel grounds and rooms are very old and not well maintained. The cleaning in our room has not been done properly and dust was flying around. We could not take a bath because the tub was broken...We paid for a room with a balcony and sofa, they gave us a room for which the balcony was closed because of maintenance. We had to complain to have the room we initially asked.  We love Thailand because of the friendliness of its people, however their staff does not reflect this mentality at all. They just don't care...  Except breakfast, food…

title: Amazing holiday
review: Dear Cis24,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Hong Kong!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback, this is sincerely appreciated. Thank you for your nice words about our swimming pool and Breakfast offerings despite the issue you have encountered. As safety of our guest is paramount, we may have had to perform an urgent maintenance and close temporarily the balcony access.   As the cleanliness of our hotel is a key priority, I am very sorry that your guestroom fell short of your expectations. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with our team in an effort to improve our service.   We are disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy our Food and beverage offerings, perhaps you did not get the opportunity to sample a variety of Authentic Thai Cuisine at Takrai restaurant, Modern Japanese Offerings at Sakura Restaurant, Mediterranean Cuisine at Olive Restaurant and our seafood buffets served at the Beach. If you would require specific items not on our menu we are delighted to have it available for you on request.    We sincerely apologize for not having delivered towards your expectations and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Sincerely,  Luca Forges Davanzati Resident Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa  Tel: +66 76 584 888

title: AMAZING HOTEL
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott for 8 nights in Dec for our honeymoon. We could not have asked or dreamt of a more wonderful place to stay!   The pool is incredible, despite it being a large hotel with many guests, there is always room in the pool for everyone, a quiet corner, never felt full or crowded.   Breakfast was Devine, everything you can think of.  The room was traditional Thai style, very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom with huge bath and shower. We had a deluxe pool view room on second story wing 2, overlooking main adult pool. We liked the couch on balcony and the privacy. The pool swim up rooms are cool but people swim/look straight into your balcony/room.  We ate at the Thai buffet one night which was a real treat. We ordered room service at the beach front and ate…

title: Nice Hotel with an amazing pool
review: The pool around the hotel buildings claims to be one the biggest in SE Asia and that could very well be true.   The hotel is very nice and the beach looks good too. Also the restaurants are some of the best in town. We really enjoyed our stay here.

title: An utterly fantastic holiday – a big thank you to all the staff at the JW Marriot for making our stay so special!
review: Dear Fabian B,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   It is lovely to see that you had such a pleasant stay and we thank you for your compliments about our resort, the beach and the restaurant.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic customer service
review: We have just returned from a 14 night holiday (booked through Thomson, UK), staying at the JW Marriot, Khao Lak. We needed a well-earned, chilled out holiday with a bit of luxury thrown in and this hotel more than exceeded our expectations. If you haven’t got time to read this fairly lengthy review then all I would say is that if you are looking for a really top class hotel in beautiful surroundings, with great staff – then I would highly recommend staying here!  Positives ------------ -	An absolutely fantastic welcome! During the very relaxed check-in process, we were given plenty of information to help with our stay. Also we were given access to our room early, so that we could sleep off the jetlag. -	Our ‘deluxe pool view’ room was incredibly comfortable, spacious and…

title: A perfect family vacation !!!
review: Dear Glencdawson,         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: THE PERFECTION (apart from worn sun beds and umbrellas)
review: Staff: Pleasant and friendly with excellent customer service. The most impressive.  Accommodation: Room and all buildings have such a good maintenance despite large size of the resort.  Facilities: All that you need for a stay.  Food and beverages:  Nice in terms of taste, portion and presentation.

title: Fady
review: Very well managed hotel with fantastic customers service. The staff will do whatever  possible to please you and accommodate all your needs. The resort overall is almost as good JW Marriott in Mai Khao in my humble opinion. The beach here is ideal for a family and definitely has the edge over Mai Khao beach. We stayed 8 nights and would consider coming back 4 nights Khao lak and 4-5 night Mai khao. Khao lak is approx 1.5 hours drive away from the airport. As far as tours is concerned, we visited James Bond island and did an elephant ride/shower. We also visited Bang Niang Market nearby. I have no hesitation recommending this hotel to others and I am aware there are great all inclusive deals going on if you contact the hotel directly.

title: Amazing hotel in gorgeous Khao Lak!
review: Dear Fady m,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!     Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination, for spending time to share your feedback and recommending our resort with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our fantastic customer service and the beach.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Calm, relaxing, excellent staff
review: Myself and my boyfriend spent 10 days at this lovely hotel after 3 days in busy Bangkok. The hotel is gorgeous and the service is excellent - the staff were always eager to help us! It has a gorgeous private long beach with beautiful sea colours! If you stay here, make sure to book a room that has access to the pool – we loved waking up and have a quick swim before breakfast! In terms of breakfast, the buffet includes so much variety that you will be amazed! The room is also lovely – the bed is sooo comfy! You will definitely have a nice sleep!  Something to note is that the hotel is a bit far from Khao Lak centre – this means that you will need to book a 10 minutes taxi to take you to the centre! Don’t let the location put you off as the JW Marriott is an absolute gem! My final…

title: Looking for paradise? This area & The hotel are simply amazing!
review: Dear Clau G,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London!      Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the service excellent by our helpful associates, the beach, the guest room and the breakfast.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Best Hotel Swimming Pool Ever!
review: What a great place! The staff is outstanding, the resort very well maintained and beautiful. Good food, lots of activities and a lovely beach make it easy to relax and calm down immediately.  All three restaurants were at least good average (Italian and Japanese), the Thai place served some really nice dishes. (There are a couple of local places just down on the beach, e.g. Phren was really good). Looking forward to the next stay there.

title: FRIENDLY PARADISE
review: This resort is beautiful and lived up to our high expectations. From the moment we stepped into the resort to the moment we left the STAFF could not have done anymore for us.   They are so welcoming, warm, friendly and passionate about providing their customers with a great stay and experience. SUCHART, JAI, POO and many more i could name made a HUGE DIFFERENCE to our stay.   We never once heard no from the staff for any request we made and they were always looking to do more. I would recommend this hotel as a complete thumbs up and we are definitely looking to go back again at some point in the future.   If anyone has negative comments about this resort i would speechless. Well done JW MARRIOT KHAO LAK you exceeded our expectations ;-)

title: Love this resort
review: Dear BOBBOTOFFO15,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Birmingham!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay and exceeded your expectations, thank you for your comments about our welcoming, warm, friendly associates. We will certainly ensure to recognize Suchart, Jai and Poo for their outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Absolutely beautiful hotel with amazing service
review: Stay 2 nights with Mom enjoy everyday at #jwmarriottkhaolak resort and spa very good properties and wonderful staff 😙 special thank N'Phing and N'Shopper at Infinity Bar for take care my mom during the stay with excellent services, see u again next year 😆

title: absolutely wonderful in everyway - the pool, the beach and the staffs
review: Dear Khun Napa D,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Phing and Shopper are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Superb property and a perfect beach town
review: We stayed 6 beautiful nights at JW Marriott for our honeymoon. Firstly, the hotel is sublime - amazing facilities, great restaurants, stunning pool, excellent location right on the beach and adjacent to many local restaurants and massage places. All facilities are modern with great wifi, great activities for guests (e.g. market tours, tai chi, cycling tours, yoga) and the buffet breakfast is to die for - so much fresh produce!  Secondly, the staff are lovely. We received excellent customer service, and all staff members greeting us with a genuine happy smile.   I would definitely stay here again! Loved it!

title: A real jewel in Khao Lak with excellent staff
review: Immense property compared to the number of room (290) - the space is incredible for an hotel those days in the southern Thailand - the pool is clearly an amazement, but foremost, the sea side is absolutely splendid  It's not common those days to have friendly, genuinely polite though casual staff in hotels in south of Thailand, this deserves a 5 stars, really. People are a key asset of this hotel, I'd recommend the place just for that reason compared to other properties in the neighborhood I stayed before  The food is outrageously good, what else can I say ? It's lucky they have fitness center and tennis and so on....   Overall it's luxurious, calm, relaxing, friendly... it's a place you wish to stay again !

title: amazing and well kept hotel
review: Dear Marc-PhillipeG,               Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bangkok!     Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are happy to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the amazing pool, the splendid beach, the friendly, genuine polite associates, the good food and the fitness facility.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great Family Friendly Hotel
review: Wonderful hotel, great ambience, impressing pool with canals running throughout the whole hotel facility. Very friendly and motivated staff especially at the main restaurant. Jai Govindan and his team spoiled the guest with their high quality products and the extensive range. The bread and the croissants were just delicious - rarely found something alike abroad.

title: Magical escape from the grind
review: Dear Judy9290,              Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Zurich!    Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  It is lovely to see that you had such a pleasant stay and we thank you for your compliments about our wonderful resort, the great ambiance, the poo, the friendly and motivated staff and Chef Jai. It is definitely the great team and service that makes the difference we are so grateful for you to mention it.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing hotel in a beautiful part of Thailand
review: We have stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak many times over the last years. It is a great place to spend your holidays with your family. It`s not a small, romantic boutique style hotel (but I am sure that couples will enjoy it as well) and is build on a large area with a wide pool/canal system running through the hotel (about 3KM of pool fun). They offer everything from beachside activities to a very nice kids club, tennis courts (unfortunately no shade, so it is better to play in the evening or early morning), an onside dive shop (you can buy swimming/snorkeling gear for you and your kids at reasonable prices). The  concierge/activity desk can help you book activities with outside providers (Elephant Tracking/Trip to Waterfalls etc.). The Quan Spa is great and they even provide…

title: Paradise
review: As we sit, sipping mojitos, adjacent to one of the gorgeous pools that weave around the hotel like the canals in Venice, it is difficult to find fault with this special hotel located near one of the best beaches in the area. I suppose it can be quite expensive to eat in the hotel, but then again food quality is superb and there is always the option of eating downtown.  We booked a superior room on the third floor which is large and comfortable. We wouldn't change it, even though the lagoon access rooms look fantastic.The hotel is beautiful, with lily filled ponds and gorgeous gardens surrounding the lagoons. The staff are excellent.  The wifi works a treat. Great gym and separate exercise room for Pilates, Yoga etc. We have used the hotel as a base for diving as there are some…

title: Outstanding resort
review: Dear Nothing2lose,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Manchester!        Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the quality of food, the guest room, the grounds, the excellent associates, the high speed internet and the gym.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: ... and a really good beach too
review: Hi, after reading the reviews here our expectations were high but I can say that all our expectations were met or exceeded!   We were a family of two adults and two children (9 and 11) and we were staying at a Family Pool Access Suite. The room was spacious for the four of us and included everything you needed for a holiday. The bathroom was great with a large Jacuzzi, and of course it was fantastic to drop into the pool from your own terrace. We had a great location in wing 1 which was calm and away from the children pool so this is something you should discuss when check in, that do you need to be close to children pool or not. We also had a small garden between the pool and the terrace that gave nice privacy. The pool area was huge which gave the luxury of relaxing in the…

title: Loved the staff
review: Dear Been_to_many_hotels,         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Tampere!       Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us. We were happy to read that we exceeded your expectations. Thank you for your comments about the guest room, the professional, extremely, helpful and polite associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Pleasant lunch spoilt....
review: Our late October Luxury Escape to JWM at Khao Lak was exactly that - most enjoyable indeed and helped by perfect sunny weather. The hotel grounds are outstanding - one of the many obvious ways in which this property eclipses the Le Meridien/Pullman down the road, where we stayed last year. Lots of positive things can be said but it is the staff who make this place special as has been noted before on this column. So in no particular order thanks go to Nat, Poo, Boy, Nook, Jue and Keng and the many others who just make it all happen each day in the friendliest way. Mention must be made of the excellent restaurants - Japanese being our favourite: sitting outside on the verandah beside the waterlily [and frog] pond was most pleasant. And if your trip is in the future make a note to…

title: Lovely resort with superb breakfast
review: We stayed at the Marriott for 7 nights in the end October. Our first impression was great - the lobby was beautiful and we were able to sit down on the sofas with cold drinks and towels while the check-in was taken care of. We had to wait for an hour and a half for our room to be ready, but since it was lunchtime we went to eat at the Waterfront restaurant. We were pleasantly surprised as the prices were surprisingly low for a hotel restaurant and the portions were huge.   The staff at the reception was great throughout our stay, very friendly and helpful. In fact we found everyone working at the hotel very friendly and welcoming. It was almost exhausting greeting and smiling back at everyone! The breakfast buffet was amazing with a huge variety of delicious foods and drinks…

title: Amazing Hotel
review: Dear Johan552,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Germany!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the beautiful lobby, the lunch at the waterfront restaurant, the friendly and helpful associates, the breakfast buffet, the pool, the grounds and the beach.   We have well noted your comments about the room and breakfast experienced. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Perfect hotel for relaxing!
review: Quite expensive but it worths it  !!!  The staff members, the rooms and the breakfast are just amazing. The employees are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are very spacious, modern but with local touch as for the breakfast I cannot describe it  !!!  There is a great choice of hot and cols meals, salads, type of eggs, noodles, fresh fruits, indian-thai-english dishes, etc. The view from the hotel is impressive. From the entrance you can admire the undescriptive sunset. It is SO romantic. The rooms are well equipped and cleaned everyday and filled in with new soaps, etc. One plus side for the room is the choice between fan and airco   !!!  Well thought.  The hotel gives direct access to the private beach. The beach is simply like a dream... White sand, blue water and extremely…

title: Fabulous pool
review: Dear Amel S,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   It is lovely to see that you had such a pleasant stay and we thank you for your compliments about the guest room, the breakfast, the pool and the friendly and helpful associates. We have well noted about your comments. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Truly paradise!
review: We spent a week at this hotel in a pool access room which was really worth the money. The hotel is right at the beach, the beach is wonderful! Rooms are spacious, yes a bit wornout but very clean and comfortable! Breakfast was good, a lot to choose from. If you want to eat breakfast in a bit more quiet atmosphere, there is an adults only area for that. Breakfast was the only time there was some noice, besides that it was always calm and quiet at the resort! Plenty of sun beds available both around the pool area and at the beach. There are many people placing towels at the sun beds to reserve the best ones and many times these people did not even use the beds until around 11. Maybe the hotel should set a 60min time for at least the exclusive sunbeds if he beds are not used during…

title: Fantastic.
review: This was our second time to the JW, we loved it and it was sad to leave.  We purchased the luxury escapes voucher, which was brilliant.  We had a pool access room that the kids absolutely loved, directly opposite the kids pool which was an added bonus.  We loved all our meals here, the food was fantastic, Olive was our favourite and the staff were fantastic.  Breakfast was huge, great variety.  We didn't eat lunch much, we were having early dinners and then walking to the restaurants outside the resort to grab a drink!.  The drinks are expensive in the resort, and much cheaper outside. We absolutely loved this resort, the massages were brilliant, the Tai Chi and Yoga classes were excellent.  It's a shame the kids club was under renovation, our kids were looking forward to it. …

title: YOU CAN SWIM FOR EVER AND EVER
review: Dear Nancy T,                                      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are happy to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the Olive restaurant, the breakfast, the associates and the Tai Chi and Yoga classes.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Beautiful luxury hotel
review: It is five star all the way with the longest pool ( 3000m ) in Asia.The Resort is right on the beach.  A wonderful choice of restaurants ....Italian, Thai, Japanese, International ....a wide selection of food , I don,t think anyone would criticise. The service is great especially from Poo. The Spa is the one of the most relaxing place I have visited , the massages  were of high standard and the staff very friendly. The markets are 15 mins down the road and as usual make sure you barter . The Resort is undergoing a new paint job at the moment so by Xmas is will be sparkling. To sum up this Resort is very very good but if you are after nightlife go to Phuket but if you are after a high class Resort to relax or for the kids to have a bit of fun this is the Resort for you.

title: Great Resort, amazing beaches and swimming pool
review: Dear dropshot37,                                     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Surfers Paradise!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool, the restaurants, the service and the spa. We will certainly ensure to recognize Miss Poo for her outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing stay
review: We loved our stay here! From the fruit bowl and towel elephant and soaps on the bed spelling out Welcome, to the beautiful pool which meandered past our deck this was the best hotel we have ever stayed in. Great hotel for families as well. Although an hour & a half from Phuket airport & quite remote, there is the opportunity to do lots of tours and go to markets in Khao Lak town by cheap taxi or shuttle bus.

title: A really good family oriented resort
review: We purchased a Luxury Escape package to the JW Marriott and while large resorts are not normally our style, this place is pretty hard to fault.  At the airport we were picked up in a very modern air conditioned car (complete with wifi connection) and driven the hour and a half from Phuket to the resort which is situated on a very pretty and very clean beach, surprisingly little used by guests who seem to prefer the pool. The check in was seamless and we were offered a choice of rooms, opting for 1006 which is separated from one of the pool canals by a small garden which provided privacy and direct pool access.  On the subject of pools, the "pool" at this resort is huge - canals meander around the rooms and gardens and feed into the main pool which is 100 metres long.  I…

title: Honeymoon destination
review: Dear John N,                                 Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Ballina!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.    We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the pool and the restaurants.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Best hotel in khao lak
review: My wife and I just got back from spending 8 nights in Khao Lak. The resort was great and ideal for us.   We had to swap rooms after the second night because a floor board on our balcony snapped. We got an upgraded room and complimentary drinks.   This is a generally a high standard resort, and while we were there light renovation work was ongoing in preparation for the high season. The rooms are generally of a high standard and the staff are always willing to help. Swimming pool (3km long around the resort) was amazing and really clean and we never found any area crowded which was refreshing.  We hired a moped from Bang Niang to get around and see other attractions in Khao Lak. We felt safe wherever we went (hotel and town).   Tips - due to the high prices at the hotel…

title: Enjoyable Stay !
review: Dear Kojobeef,                                Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.    We are happy to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the guest room, the staff’s service and the pool.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Beautifully relaxing and peaceful
review: Ive stay here at least 4 times, i felt that i needed to leave a review. The property is my favorite on khao lak, when i go there first this i do is swim the giant pool that they have. I get the room where u can walk directly into the pool, i love that. The food is good but the location is amazing. I always thank the staff for a unforgettable stay. Thanks

title: Idyllic and private
review: We held a 2 day business review meeting at the resort, followed by a 2 day customer event. The beach, pools and landscaping were faultless and in general the resort and the outlying areas much quieter compared to staying close to Phuket. The staff were very welcoming and the catering options ample. Note however that the drive from Phuket International Airport to the hotel is approximately 75 minutes.

title: Be captivated by the awesome resort grounds!
review: Dear Simon W,                             Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Wollongong!     Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday and meeting destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.    We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool, the beach and the grounds.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Just lacking the luxury touches
review: For an atypical experience away from the normal nightlife of Phuket, we took the trip down to Khao Lak and stayed at this JWM resort. Transport was organised externally, costing about half of what the hotel was offering and slightly over an hour trip from the main Phuket area. At check-in, we were received by Fon and Money who went over the process efficiently and politely. One of the ladies even walked us all the way to our pool-access room, which was quite a distance away!   The winning point of this resort is no doubt the manicured grounds, surrounded by a meandering "river" which essentially functioned as the pool. From the buildings to the beachfront area, everything fits into a picture-perfect holiday. The best experience we had was jumping into the pool right from our…

title: Very nice Hotel
review: Dear smackO,                            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Brisbane!    Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.    We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the warm welcome by Fon and Money and the pool.   We have well noted your comments about the room experienced. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing Resort.
review: Now don't get me wrong - this is a very nice resort but I'm now comparing to other luxury brands like Four Seasons and JWM Khao Lak just come up short.   On all fronts.  Service while polite and effective wasn't memorable.  The pool access room was nice enough but no coffee machine, and the bathroom layout a bit odd.  The grounds were exceptional and were the standout of the property. Always clean tidy and postcard-like.  The beach while nice didn't entice me into the water which was a bit turbid.  The service in one of the beach front restaurants was a little comical for its malfunction. Make sure you don't order a bottle of wine that needs a cork removed. It was a struggle.   I only left the resort to go to the town market 10 mins by tuk tuk. Can't comment about surroundings. …

title: Very good holiday - made special by this hotel
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak for my 50th birthday with a group of 17. From the check in stage to the day we left, the service and friendliness of this hotel was top class. The rooms are spacious and clean, the amenities are all excellent and the grounds pristine. This resort boasts an amazing pool and it takes a fair while to swim or walk the entire length of is as it winds past the various accommodation wings. As a number of our group had pool access rooms it was great to be able to have afternoon drinks at various rooms and then walk/wade back to yours. The beach at the front of the resort was as good as any we had visited and there seemed to be enough lounges etc to accommodate the guests (and it was full). Either side of the resort had a number of massage businesses…

title: Paradise

Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Nice and Relaxing
review: This is a perfect location for a beautiful relaxing holiday. Beautiful pristine waters, amazing pool and great food to be had at the resort or outside at the beach restaurants. Fresh seafood always available.

title: Amazing
review: Dear Lois c,                         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our resort, the amazing pool and the great food.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: We will come back again and again
review: My experience on arrival was not very pleasing especially after a red eye flight - upon reaching around noon we were asked to wait for our room to get ready which we got after about an hour and half. We got the rooms with the large sit out balcony which was nice as we got good views and used that area a lot while we stayed. The breakfast was very large and included enough options for vegetarians as well. We really enjoyed the Italian restaurant and spent all our evenings there - they have a nice deck area too out in the open for dining.   The beach was nice and the hotel provided ample sun deck chairs with towels.   It was a good place to stay and relax. So would recommend it was travellers looking to relax and spend quality time with their partner. I would also recommend a…

title: Is it a JW Marriott or a family holiday resort?
review: Just spent 8 days on great relaxing holiday at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa. The biggest issue with this resort is - what is it trying to be & how to rate it!  As a JW Marriott it just rates a 3 and is not up to the standard one expects from this brand.  As a family holiday resort in Khao Lak, it rates a 4.  Hence overall a 3.  Pros: - fantastic 3 km long pool that winds through the resort with children's play areas and private spaces for adults. - great gardens provide a lovely compliment to the pool. - resort is spread out so that you never feel crowded. - fantastic & friendly Thai staff. - good restaurants. - Khao Lak is much quieter that Phuket, - Quan Spa is well designed and generally provides good massages, However do not expect the same treatment for the same…

title: Wonderful Resort
review: Just returned from an 8 day Luxury Escapes deal. Beautiful location, wonderful staff, excellent service and great value. We stayed on the top floor in Wing 1 closest to the beach restaurants and spa and seemed to be the quietest of the wings. Luxurious room with nice view over the resort and sea glimpses. No lift but we needed the exercise after excessive overeating. We tried all the restaurants and were surprised that we could choose any dish on the menu with our vouchers (including themed buffets). The Japanese Sakura was our personal favourite for dinner with 2 very entertaining chefs (get seats at the teppanyaki bar). The breakfast was excellent with a huge variety to cater for every taste. Lunch was buffet style with a lot of options. The Spa treatments were amazing in the…

title: Nice hotel, some refurbishment needed, excellent staff

title: Another great trip in paradise
review: We stayed for a long weekend in October. Prior to our stay I had contact with Mee. She made the reservation and answered all questions. Upon arrival, Mee also greeted us and showed us to our room. As we are platinum members we got an upgrade and were offered a welcome snack and drinks. When we asked for a room change (upgrade rooms are duplex rooms but no direct access to the pool) Mee was once again very helpful in arranging this. Big compliment to her on her level of guest service! The room itself is spacious and has a nice bathroom with glass windows. The interior was a bit outdated though and it wasn't hard to see the wear and tear of various elements in the room, like the sliding door to the bathroom and the wooden floor. The airconditioning was not easy to operate as it…

title: Happy Days
review: Just Love this resort and everything about it. Great room, unbelievably friendly and helpful staff, great food at all four restaurants, kids free breakfast alternative room, fabulous pool and 2 swim up bars, loved the beer boat which floats around the channels every afternoon. Fantastic beach and local massage and beach restaurants outside the hotel. My thanks to Poo, Wat, Laila and all the guys at the pool bar who made the stay more memorable. Weather was great this time of year only had one day of tropical monsoonal rain which I enjoyed. Humidity was much lower than expected and remained low for the whole trip. Would go again anytime.

title: Amazing holiday
review: Dear colbertoz,                Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!    Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Beautiful Khao lak resort
review: We have stayed in many luxury resorts. JW Marriott Khao Lak is the best. The hotel is run by an efficient and extremely friendly staff. The room was great and we felt at home the first day we arrived. The food at all of the restaurants was fantastic. Japanese, Thai, Italian and Western food restaurants were terrific. Having a drink in the evening watching the sunset was relaxing. The beach and surf was very clean and we had numerous enjoyable swims. The room had direct pool access. The pool is huge and has swim up pool bars. The restaurant staff led by Poo were all fantastic and very happy, always smiling. A special mention to Boy (24 years old), Tal, Dan and Ben. Thank you for our wonderful holiday. Be back next year. Chris and Nerida

title: Best resort we have ever been to.
review: Dear Chris and Nerida,              Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Brisbane!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Fabulous location amenities and friendly staff make this a great relaxing hotel choice
review: We recently stayed in the Marriott on an 8 night luxury escape package.   We stayed at the Marriott after a lengthy stay In Europe and when we arrived at 4am we were greeted by a very cold reception area.  AC full blast and a lovely lady who was intent on up selling us to a more expensive room before we had had time to even check in. When we tried to explain to her we had been flying for hours, were very cold and tired and we just wanted to go go bed she just continued with her efforts to up sell. This was not appreciated but was the only real downside to our stay in this beautiful resort. The room was spacious and well maintained. Bed comfortable, bathroom very good with plenty of room.  The breakfast restaurant was excellent with a side room which was an adults only area. This…

title: Fantastic experience!
review: We stayed at this resort for 8 nights early September with a couple of friends.  Such a great place to stay I must say!  Lots of things to do around the resort itself.  I'm not the resort type of person so I was a little worried that I'd get bored.  But this place is amazing.  The service was exceptional with all of the staff being so helpful from the time that we checked in until the time we checked out.  The restaurant staff got to know us so well they knew what we liked so we were very well looked after.  We couldn't fault any of the meals at any of the restaurants - very nice.  The acoustic duo who played live at the Olive restaurant were are really nice touch and added great ambience to our dining.  One of our party had her birthday there so the staff at Olive went all out…

title: The best October of mine
review: Dear ColinNZ01,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Auckland!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Mass tourism and many young children
review: We stayed for two nights in a studio pool access room. The best choice we ever made. The scenery, trees, pool, pool bar and sunset were fabulous. We did enjoy the breakfast as there are two separated dining hall for those with kids and no kids areas. The staff are very friendly and helpful. We will definitely go back :)

title: A Great Family Resort
review: Dear Khun Paschara,         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Serene and exotic khao lak
review: I stay at the Marriott Kaolack October 2015. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  However the facilities are very old and in dire need of an upgrade and maintenance.  Huge tour buses pull up with hundreds of people getting out at  one time for all you can eat breakfast buffets lunch and dinners.  The pool is filled with many young crying children in diapers.   This facility is for families looking for low-cost vacations. This is not your five-star Marriott facility, three star at best .

title: A Certain Smile, A Certain Face
review: Even an eight-day stay at the JW Marriott Resort and Spa at Khao Lak, Thailand passes far too quickly for those soaking up the ambience, the luxury, the incredible amenities, the fabulous food, the excellent housekeeping and the wonderful Thai hospitality.   Being thoroughly spoiled each waking moment by such delightful, smiling and sincere staff is an experience that will linger for years to come.   The resort offers so much five star value but the staff must at least be worth a six star rating.   It is they who make the experience so humbling.   A genuine affection and desire to please is ever apparent which may make the staff of JW Marriott Resort and Spa its greatest and finest asset.   We found everything about the resort delightful and cannot wait to book our next holiday…

title: Truly Magical
review: Dear bluecoatseagles16,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Adelaide!    Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Laila is absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Sweet escape
review: I cannot say enough good things about this resort. We were on our honeymoon and the resort was so nice to set up our room with a nice welcome for us. The resort is basically a giant swimming pool. The location on the beach is so beautiful. There were a lot of families staying there and it was pretty perfect because there are so many activities for kids so that they're constantly entertained. The staff was so nice and welcoming. The location is a bit far from the center of Khao Lak but the resort is so wonderful that you won't want to leave. Of course the food and restaurants available at the resort are priced at resort prices but I feel that is to be expected. We loved it and would definitely return again. We left to Phuket after two nights and definitely regretted it. We would…

title: Relaxing stay
review: Dear Travelandia11,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Jiangmen! title: Our 8 Day Vacation at JW Marriott
review: It was one of the best resort we've visited! The resort is such a relaxing resort, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. All the staff are very friendly and efficient . They even surprised me with a cake for my birthday! Thank you so much!  We will definitely come back soon!

title: Loved our stay.
review: I booked using the Exclusive Deals voucher for 10 nights (all meals & spa treatments) upgrading to a family pool access room. Which was just right for the five of us (children 22 months, 10 yr & 14yrs).   Firstly the staff always greeted us with a happy, welcoming & pleasant attitude, they are always there to help with a smile. All three restaurants have enough variety on the menus & catered for our diets (including vegetarian & GF).  The buffet breakfasts were plentiful. Happy hour mocktails by the beach were a favourite.   The day spa is SO beautiful. The treatments were perfect. The staff again were so lovely.   The pool is incredible, it's hard to imagine 3kms or 16,000 sq m - crazy but so fun. The pool has different depths so our baby enjoyed shallow play, canals were…

title: An amazing week in Khao Lak
review: Nice hotel and good restaurant , have been for tow weeks in Thailand , Marriott hotel is good place to visit Phuket and jungle ,  Large sweimg pool and nice music during the day Good food specially Japanese restaurant  Service is high level

title: Perfect in every way!
review: Dear Ziad C,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Perfect for a family!
review: My husband and I stayed here in September for 10 days. Our deal  (*luxury travel) included all meals and 8 spa treatments and we upgraded our room to a deluxe room to a be on the quieter side. We loved that could dive in and out of the pool canals every day.  The adult pool area was private and beautiful and we loved the 3km of pools. We frequented the swim up coffee and smoothie bars.  The spa was incredible and the treatments were beautiful.  All restaurants were all of high quality, especially the Olive restaurant. We loved the adults area for the breakfast (the food was incredible) as we travelled this time without our children.  The beach was safe and beautiful and you could walk for miles without seeing a soul.   We thoroughly enjoyed  the James Bond island tour, cycling…

title: Great service
review: We recently spent eight nights at the Jw Marriott resort in khao lak  The weather was not always the best but the pool was just amazing  A number of choices for meals being either Japanese Thai Italian  The service from the staff was second to none I highly recommend this resort to unwind and enjoy the Thai hospitality

title: Great family holiday
review: Dear Andrew M,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Traralgon!     Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Splendidly designed resort with vast number of facilities
review: It was always meant to be a relaxing holiday: lying on the beach and doing absolutely nothing and that what we'd got! We bought a good deal for this hotel with all food included and 4 spa treatments each for 2 adults. We have two little kids (4 year old and 10 month old at that time) who were treated like royalties in this resort (saying that all kids, not only ours, were spoiled with the staff attention). Almost every staff member knew every kid in the resort - they knew their name and what they like or don't like. Kids club was ok. It's wasn't a big one and had limited activities (mostly all inside) and after 4 days my daughter didn't really want to go there but for a few hours a day it did the job. We had to pay extra to babysit 10 month old one but we knew that in advance. …

title: First Time Visit 3 Nights
review: Dear Galprin,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sydney!    Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our service, hospitality, the amazing pool and the restaurants.   We have well noted your comments about the associates experienced. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: The pool is amazing!!!
review: This resort is amazingly impressive in many aspects from a huge swimming pool to vast choices of facilities.  You would find this hotel a perfect place for a tranquil retreat while at the same time a thoughtful setup for couple and/or family travelers.  The hotel is extremely well maintained and clean - you can hardly find a fallen leave in the garden throughout the day - it just tells how much the hotel had gone for an extra mile to keep it a perfect condition (in a very natural ad beachfront setting)! Try out the Thai restaurant and Spa. Highly recommend!

title: Organized Resort
review: The pool(s) without a doubt are the largest in Thailand.  This resort is endless.  Beautiful beach and very manicured grounds.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  Very obvious all were well trained.  A smile goes a long way.  This resort was a great place for small kids as well.  We liked the convenience store out the front gate along with the cheaper massage spot.  The restaurants on each side of the resort on the beach we OK...nothing special.  Eating and drinking at this hotel was not unreasonable and we enjoyed room service and several of the restaurants on site.  I liked the sushi bar...great fatty tuna and miso.  The breakfast buffet was exquisite...very clean...huge selection of food.  The staff was so helpful...they would bring our orders to our table.  The service on…

title: Best pool ever
review: Dear Denver_CoEdwink,  thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your most valuable days of the year and for taking time to share your impressions with other travelers in this forum.  We are glad to read all your positive comments about our resort, such as big pool, the beautiful beach, good location for children, exquisite Sushi offers and the god beach service. What a pity and please apologize that our Wi-Fi could not meet your expectations.  We are very happy to inform you and other readers that we're just in process to install a brand new Wi-Fi system with 6 times higher bandwidth and new hardware all over the resort and in every single room.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Nice and Relaxing
review: The pool was outstanding at over three km long  it was an easy walk  The swim up bars wore outstanding  The staff wore very nice and friendly  And made the best cocktails   In Thailand  Breakfast  is the best

title: Subtle yet very attentive service
review: Dear Vanessa,  Warmest greetings to Melbourne from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Thank you for all the compliments and your 5 star rating!!  With pleasure we read that you loved to walk through our giantic pool and that abviouly you liked our cocktalls and our staff service.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing resort
review: We have just returned after doing a Luxury Escapes package for 8 nights and must say the package was of excellent value.  The resort on first impressions is amazing and the set out with its gardens and pool set up spectacular.  Food we found generally good with some ups and downs, and found the Thai restaurant very good and the best of the three.  No excuse in the Japanese restaurant and they were seen, for slabs of frozen salmon to be cooked and served cold in the middle. Even thou we have rated this excellent there were still some faults with this place.   We did cop a few days of bad weather which was expected at this time of the year, but it showed the resort up a little with three of the restaurants leaking through the ceilings and doors causing flooding.  But hey its the…

title: Rest and relaxation
review: Have just returned from an amazing stay at this Marriott hotel . The staff go out of their way to help , always smiling ,polite and very genuine . We stayed on a bed and breakfast basis, breakfast was excellent with plenty of choice . The other three restaurants very good but pricey. Alternatively to the left of the beach is Farmai , serves great food and beer at a good price. Only negative about this hotel is the shuttle bus , 100 baht per person one way , please make this free . I would have given 5 stars otherwise . Would I stay here again ? Yes yes yes .

title: Quiet, Unobtrusive and attentive hospitality
review: Dear Allison B,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bristol!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the smiling, polite and genuine  associates, the breakfast and the restaurants.   We have well noted your comments about the resort feedback. We will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your wife back to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Not our cup of tea
review: Fabulous location on the beach, sprawling lush green, extremely well maintained landscape and a long winding pool that goes all around the resort! Full marks to housekeeping. Full marks to F & B... Yummy and huge arrays of varieties of cuisines laid out at every meal, staff was friendly and attentive.. Despite it being a big fat Indian wedding party. umbrellas in every room.. Great! Smiling staff handing out warm dry towels to hundreds of guests running in out of the pelting rain- simply fab!

title: Great rooms and Fantastic facilities
review: Dear KirtiAnand,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Mumbai!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about the fabulous location, the beach, the grounds, the pool, the housekeeping, the F&B and the friendly and attentive associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your wife back to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: superb resort
review: Having been told great things about this resort we really were expecting a WOW factor. The resort is gorgeous looking, a huge massive pool that wraps around - plenty of water for everyone. Downside  - did the online check in and room and said we would be there by 2pm - wasn't given an interconnecting room and then had to wait to 5.30 - the resort is in the middle of nowhere so if you want to be able to wander and not be stuck eating at the resort this is not ideal - saying that we had decent pizza just outside the resort - but only perhaps 4 places to choose from - the beach here is not great - cant swim this time of year and not a patch on kata and karon beach - we booked ahead and the found it would have been much cheaper to book on the day - the pool is huge so huge that it…

title: A relaxing resort to unwind and recharge amongst an incredible pool and peaceful surrounds far from the hectic crowds.
review: This review will cover in detail all the areas I wanted to find out more on and could not get enough detail from reviews. I will review the resort service, grounds, surrounds, pool, restaurants, spa, best rooms, kids club, overall opinion of resort, comparison with JW Marriott Phuket, staff for special mention and Luxury Escape package value. So you may want to scroll down to the areas you are interested in reading, they may not be in the order as listed above.  Pool: There is no denying that the pool is the greatest asset of this JW Marriott. It is fantastic, unique, relaxing, beautiful surrounding landscape and great way to get around the resort and swimming off those calories from the buffet. It is also shallow enough most of the way around the 3km to walk it with your head…
