title: Just what the doctor ordered.... rest, pampering and excellent service
review: I had a great staycation in this hotel. Customer Service is really good , honest and efficient. The facilities are all good as well . Love their food especially the breakfast buffet , the infinity pool and the spa !

title: Fantastic stay
review: Dear Eliza C,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Taguig City!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort, the honest and efficient customer service, the facilities, the breakfast, the infinity pool and the spa.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Nine days of paradise
review: My partner and I just returned from a holiday at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa.  We are well travelled and have stayed at many 4-5 star hotels.  From the moment we were met at the airport, we enjoyed every aspect of our holiday.  We bought a package for 8 nights which included spa treatments and all meals and we really indulged in everything and even had more than the allocated spa treatments.  This resort is truly a 5 star hotel and what defines it from any other resort is the exceptional staff!!  Without being intrusive, they were so very friendly and helpful... nothing was too hard and they always had a smile.  Made me realize how different Thai people are from other cultures...  I would highly recommend this resort to anyone.  The facilities, room, are top notch in all…

title: Great Hotel for a relaxing family holiday
review: We've been to this Hotel in May and booked a pool access room to share with our 9 year old daughter. The Hotel is a fair drive away (about 1hour 30 minutes) from the Airport in a really secluded and private spot near Khao Lak. When we checked in we were offered a chargeable upgrade to a family room which offered more space than the originally booked room and we felt good advised here by the very friendly Hotel staff. The Hotel despite it's surprisingly big size and thanks to the clever design never really felt crowded with lots of different areas to spent your time. We really loved the pool and beach area, restaurants were really good and Hotel staff was always friendly and forthcoming. So what are the downsides? To come up with some I need to be really picky....this Hotel is…

title: Wonderful stay, beautiful location & lovely people!
review: Dear firestarter69,                                    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the friendly associates, the hotel grounds, the pool, the beach and the restaurants.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: We came to relax and relax we did.
review: We stayed here for 06 days & loved every bit of it. The rooms are large, airy with great amenities & the direct pool access makes it feel even more luxurious & fun. Breakfast is vast, the beach clean & the food in the restaurants & from room service (they deliver in under 30mins prompt - so no long hungry waits) was brilliant. What was slightly disappointing was that the buffet dinner one night at their Thai restaurant Ta-krai closed at 10pm - service should atleast be available till 11pm if not midnight as once you're back from the local markets you do need some time to freshen up & then head out for dinner.  What really adds to their charm is their staff. Each & everyone of them is so friendly, welcoming, helpful & serve from their hearts! True Thai hospitality with a smile.…

title: Relax relax relax!
review: Dear Myra S,                                   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Dubai!           Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the guest room, the breakfast, the beach, the restaurants, the room service, the friendly, welcoming and helpful associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: The only pro goes to its private beach
review: We bought this 8 night holiday as a package through luxury escapes. It was a deal - 8 nights, all meals and 4 massages each.  The pool is amazing as is the landscaping and buildings. We upgraded to a poolside room which is highly recommended. The design is such that you feel that you have your own private pool just off your porch. The rooms were quite large and so were the bathrooms.  We went in September so had a few days of rain as well as glorious days. For us it didn't matter as we were there to chill and the warmth and weather is all part of it.  As I mentioned the landscaping - included in amongst all the beautiful tropical plants were lemon grass clumps and fragrant pandan.  Coming at this time - the resort was at 50% occupancy and it was perfect. The view of the sunset…

title: Outstanding service with a huge Thai smile
review: I and my fellow travellers were a able to find fault in any way.  Service, food,grounds and pool all rate five plus stars.  The pool is huge and over three kilometres long winding past our room.  I just slip off the porch for a morning lap at about four feet deep I can walk it.  The gardens are magnificent   Easily the best we have had in Thailand

title: Heaven!
review: Dear Marin T,                               Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Coombabah!       Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about the service, the food, the grounds, the pool and the magnificent gardens.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Best stay and best Italian food
review: As almost everyone else says, this is the most wonderful, heavenly resort, and it certainly lived up to my expectations.  Service is second to none, the facilities leave you wanting for nothing, the rooms are spacious, spotless, so very comfortable.   The enormous pool is incredible, and there was nothing better than to sip a drink on the edge of our private deck before dropping in for a swim.  Breakfast was huge with more variety than you could imagine.   Words fail me with this resort - it is so big and luxurious, yet so very friendly and welcoming.   My partner and I were so totally impressed that we will return next year, stay for longer and bring the kids too.  Thankyou for making our stay so absolutely perfect.

title: Heaven in Thailand
review: Dear iCat_351,                              Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!      Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our wonderful and heavenly resort, the second to non-service, the guest room the pool and the breakfast.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Awesome Stay!!
review: Olive restaurant was outstanding quality and service.  We choose to eat there several times even though there was such a wonderful choice of other top quality eateries in the resort .  Our stay overall was fantastic, the outstanding attention to detail in every way. The smiles . the beauty of the resort.  The pool service, ice cold water continually poured. A Nice touch.   Over 3 km of swimming lagoons to meander through including a coconut canoe bar in the afternoon.   Ping pong for laughter therapy.  Oh and the incredible spa, a must while you're there.  Thank you to Fon and Nick on front desk for your welcome ( Nick) and Fon for continuously attending to our wellbeing .  The infinity bar is a must even in the rain you can enjoy a cocktail or great coffee or equally eat a…

title: The best week off we have had!
review: we have never been to Phukett before and we were looking forward to having the time off, relaxing on a holiday, rather than tripping around, however we were a bit apprehensive about the location, venue etc. we needn't have worried! it was amazing, the hotel (although under repairs) was fantastic, everywhere in the hotel had fantastic views of, pools or the sea. There is (approx) 3 kms of pools, if you go up and down them all, or 1.5km around! we really didn't leave the water as it was beautiful and hot (30 - 33 deg C) every day, even when it rained or there was a thunder storm. the restaurants were fantastic (Italian - Japanese - Thai - buffet - mixed A-La-carte) plus the Deli, which we went to every day for a decent coffee. the staff were fantastic, and very appreciative. the…

title: Value for price, aging property
review: Dear CantonFairVisitor,  warmest greetings to Melbourne from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Thank you for all the compliments and your 5 star rating!!  Just for other readers please let me point out, that the Airport you arrived is Phuket, which is an island connected towards north by a bridge to the mainland. Our Resort is located on the mainland on a wide sandy palm beach near the Village Khao Lak.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Good Resort, but we were unkucky with the room
review: For the price, this hotel is superb. I really liked the Executive Suite, and very highly recommend that room category. The master bathroom is super luxe, the bedroom is comfortably furnished, and the living room is huge. The one disappointment was that they didn't replenish the fresh fruit, which was just an odd way to be cheap.    The Thai restaurant was excellent! The pool bar restaurant was sufficient.   A really nice touch were the beach cabana boys constantly checking up on sunbathers, assuring that ice water glasses were topped off. At a huge, older, property like this, that is the kind of thing that makes a difference in the guest experience.   The General Manager was seriously engaged with making the guest experience the best it could be.  I had an interaction where he…

title: Absolutely beautiful!
review: Dear Nunna,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa through this portal.  As a valued guest, we appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you liked your Executive Suite, our Beach Service and our way to manage the Hotel.  On the other hand we are deeply saddened that you showed us with your rating that we could not meet your expectations, while we are doing great efforts to keep the rooms and the hotel in general well maintained. As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travel, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apologies. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team - in particular the maintenance team - to ensure that this that is corrected moving forward.  Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Khao Lak.   Sincerely,  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful Stay on Marriage Anniversary
review: We came from Phuket just for 1 night for a birthday party. the pool area. the breakfast are really good and the beach is amazing.  we got a room with pool access, but the room was really dark and it smelled terrible in the room like mold and a spec spray. we called the reception few times, but no reaction.

title: Family Holiday
review: It was a great location, the people were lovely, it was very clean.  We bought  our package deal with Luxury escapes, apart of this package were spa treatments - the hotel were dreadful at honouring the spa treatments and tried to squeeze 8 treatments into 2 days. My friend ended up missing out on 2 spa treatments.  I have stayed at other Mariott hotels in the past and this would have to be the first hotel I have stayed at that the beds were rock hard, worst sleeps I have ever had.  It was disappointing experiencing this as, you could not ask for friendlier and more helpful people except for the Spa Salon and certain receptionists.  Thankfully the pool, the beach and the restaurants are amazing !

title: Great Family Holiday Destination
review: Dear Theresa C,  thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your most valuable days of the year and for taking time to share your impressions with other travelers in this forum.  As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apologies. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this  is corrected moving forward.   Upholding our commitment to provide a memorable experience with exceptional service, we hope to have an opportunity to better your experience with us whenever your travels bring you back to Khao Lak.   Jörg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Do I have to go home?
review: We had 8 great nights at this Resort, with direct pool access the kids loved just being able to step right out and swim. As we were on a package that included all meals it really took that stress away from what the final check out bill was going to be - as it's very easy to just keep charging things to your room.   The resort arranged elephant trekking and phi phi island tours which were both great and good value for money.   The beach is also direct access and a great start to the day to walk off breakfast . Next to the resort you can also have all you laundry cleaned prior to going home - very cheap !

title: Khao Lak Paradise
review: Dear Roy B,  thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your most valuable days of the year and for taking time to share your impressions with other travelers in this forum.   We are very happy to read that you and especially your children enjoyed staying with us.  We are happy you found relaxation, enjoyment, amenities and activities at the same time in the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  We would be happy to welcome your family again.  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Five star hotel should be 10 star rating
review: I travelled with my mum in April 2015 after we bought a Luxury Escapes deal. It was definitely the best money ever spent - I don't think any other deal will ever match it's awesome value.   Our room was wonderful, on the top floor, with a great view of the lagoon pool and the Aquamarine Pool Bar. The meals were all amazing, although I wasn't all that impressed by our meal at Olive. However, the staff definitely made up for that. The highlight for me was definitely Sakura. AMAZING!   The breakfasts and lunches were great, with a heap of variety, and all the staff were just fantastic. I loved the omelettes and the iced coffee.  We did a Thai cooking course which we really enjoyed. We had a nice small group - we were 9 and our chef created a great atmosphere! The food turned out…

title: Very Relaxing stay... Loved every minute
review: My wife and I have just returned from spending 10 relaxing days at this fabulous resort. We were looking for a place to relax and not have to worry about anything at all and we found it here in abundance. We had a swim up room in Wing 1, and whilst we were looking forward to the swim up facility, we didn't use it once. The expansive grounds of the resort offer plenty of space to move around. The rooms were well sized, with a small couch and day bed provided as well as the massive king sized beds.  The inclusion of a kids free dining room for breakfast was an excellent idea, as we weren't too keen to listen to kids being kids first thing in the morning. We traveled in the wet season, but only had 2 half days of rain across the 10 days. The resort is also pretty quiet of an…

title: Excellent place for a family vacation
review: Dear Andrew_bec,                          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne! Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: An idyllic place for a relaxing holiday.
review: Spent 3 nights at the hotel as a part of work team retreat. The location is breathtaking with an awesome pool that goes around the entire hotel. Rooms on the ground floor have direct access to the pool. Business center is very useful. Rooms are really big and well designed. Wifi in my room was excellent but some colleagues had trouble accessing in their rooms. Staff were very friendly and willing to help but I sometimes felt that they didn't understand what some of us said. Need to train them to understand different accents. The buffet was great with a lot of variety. However, the Indian food section needs more attention. The staff were unable to understand what I wanted but thankfully I found Chef Mohan Singh who immediately made some pooris for me from the kitchen. Thanks and…

title: Amazing
review: Dear JuntaJ,                         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore! title: Comments on our visit
review: We had a very enjoyable stay and found this to be one of the best, if not the best, resorts we have stayed in. The staff were delightful and the resort was stunning. We came for a relaxing getaway, and left refreshed and rejuvenated. We booked with a luxury escapes package, which included 9 days and 8 nights accommodation, all meals and four spa treatments each. This was exceptional value for money and we would not hesitate to recommend this deal to anyone wanting a five star experience at an excellent price.  The staff at the reception when we arrived were friendly, professional and attentive. We were processed quickly and the resort processes and facilities were clearly explained to us. The rooms were very well fitted out. They were absolutely beautiful and definitely worth 5…

title: Nice hotel
review: Have spent a week here - nice hotel and lovely friendly staff We arrived late at night and our rooms were not interconnecting despite my email communications prior and stressing we have 2 young kids. The hotel upgraded us for one night to adjoining.. Worth spending the extra money on deluxe pool access rooms.  Guest a good mixture of Australians, Brits and Chinese .   Hotel facilities good , though in need of a lick of paint somewhere. Kids club very quiet and focussed on younger kids and arts and crafts . We stayed previously at the JW Marriott Phuket which had more to do for kids (circus  skills etc) Breakfast good - plenty of choice - but busy!  We ate in Japanese restaurant twice which was good as was Italian. Beach restaurants on either side very well worth a visit (and…

title: paradise!!!!! AMAZING!!!
review: Dear Golf g,                     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Abu Dhabi! title: Fantastic resort
review: we went on our honey moon in march, was soooo hott....this is the best hotel i have ever stayed in!! clean , tidy., stunning inside rooms are amazing, staff are lovely, pool is perfect, beach is beautiful, cant wait to visit this place again and the breakfast buffet was out of this world

title: very pleasant place
review: Dear Andrew R,                    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London! Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Excellent resort with friendly staff
review: What an awesome resort for comfort and service. Min, Boy and Tarn at the Infinity bar , were the nicest and most welcoming people you could meet, their service was second to none. Recommend this resort to those who are looking to relax in the best of comfort. The private dining on the beach was just a perfect way to finish our 8 night stay. Would definitely return to this picturesque resort

title: Perfect family holiday destination !!
review: Our stay at the Khao Lak resort ( starting 4th August )was extremely comfortable and the service was wonderful . Although it rained every day , except for one , we were more than able to make use and appreciate the many services and activities provided by the resort.   Our luxury Escape package included all meals and all the food was amazing and we never had a problem with bookings. The spa was difficult to get into , possibly because of the weather. The staff were all accommodating , friendly and eager , in particular Min,,who checked us in super quickly and arranged a room suitable for me  to have easy access to the pool,( I have severe atthritis) . Also Fon, Neyuny? And Bao . Just to name a few , My only complaint and it was really just bad luck ..was that because of the…

title: Very Relaxing Break even in the rain
review: Dear Kathryn,                Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Hobart!      Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort activities and the associates. We will certainly ensure to recognize Min, Fon, Money and Bao for their outstanding service and efforts.   We regret to learn of the inconvenience you experienced with your room, thankfully it was resolved promptly. Our team will further check for details ensuring this will not happen again.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing honeymoon in Khao Lak
review: Decided to take a short break, 4 days, 3 Nights just to recharge and catch up with some friends. The resort is about 90 minutes from Phuket Airport and the pick up services was great. We arrived in the morning and mid-week so there was little traffic and the journey went quickly. The resort is huge, with about 3km on canals going around the rooms. We had a pool view room on the 1st floor and the balcony had a huge day bed plus two lounge chairs so even though it rained half the trip it was relaxing. If you want to explore there are things to do around the area as well the hotel has daily activities. Next door there is a little village with a couple of restaurants and can I say the food is fantastic and cheap. The only drawbacks I have, and they are just little things that could…

title: Perfect Holiday
review: Dear BazinSG,               Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!     Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are happy to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the resort’s ground, the pool and the guest room.   We have well noted your comments about the resort feedback. We will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Beautiful Pools&Gardens, Breakfast you will LOVE.
review: Our stay at the Marriott was for our honeymoon & if anybody is considering this location as a honeymoon destination I would tell them to book immediately.  Our stay was amazing, we had such a good time.   The staff are attentive & efficient, nothing is too much trouble. Every time we went to reception the staff would say "Happy Honeymoon" - this is something small, but something that does make a difference because it shows that the staff see you as individuals, rather than just 'another guest,' which is what I've found can happen in some 5* hotels.  The food: We paid for full board & although in our opinion, breakfast & dinner were worth it, we felt that for us, the lunch wasn't. This was for 2 reasons. Firstly, we went on trips which meant that we had paid for lunch & then not…

title: Simple outstanding
review: Wonderful 10 night stay. Unbelievable service from all staff. Wonderful welcome to the hotel from Money, this made checking in a pleasure after a long day traveling. Breakfasts outstanding, something for everyone and so much more. In our opinion we preferred to eat lunch and dinner out of the hotel and we were never disappointed. Excellent authentic Thai cuisine on your door step at amazing prices. That said we had a lovely evening at Ta Krai, tasty meals, lovely cocktails and a complimentary birthday cake for my boyfriend - great touch.  The hotel grounds are really well looked after. You can always get a sun lounger on the beach. You are never hassled and iced water is served to you throughout the day on the beach. We found this resort very safe.  Definitely try a Muay Thai…

title: Just simply sensational value for money
review: Dear Evie L,           Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Little bit of luxury
review: My self and my wife booked this resort by mistake we were supposed to stay at another JW Marriott in Phuket. It did not make a difference to us and we enjoyed 3.3 kilometres of swimming pool and enjoyed our pool access room which allowed us to slip into the pool at any time of the day or nights and swim or walk around to the swim up bars which we did a few times each day. The resort had four restaurants a Japanese, Thai, Italian and an international buffet. We tried them all. The food was always presented extremely well but fell short in some cooking techniques. The spa treatments that were included in the price were very much worth while and we enjoyed the massage treatments we received. There was bike hire, gymnasium, some specialty shops and a market on a Sunday night. We had…

title: Amazing stay, amazing hotel
review: Dear 0_E         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Brisbane!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the pool, the guest room, the restaurants, the spa and the beach. title: "Luxury Escape"
review: This was my second stay at JW Marriot Khao Lak, and didn't even hesitate on booking another room for our stay.  Ok let me start with Khao Lak itself. Dependant on your driver, Khao Lak is about an hour and a half from Phuket airport, and is an opportunity to avoid the hussle and bussle in Phuket or Patong, which is exactly what we wanted, and although it is away from it all, you will not need for anything. They have plenty of great food spots and bars to wet your whistle, and every Monday, Wednesday and Saturday they have their own markets where you will find all the things you want, and every kind of genuine knock offs, lol. We found the people so friendly and willing to do anything for you.  Now for the resort, what a complete oacis. I love every minute that we spent there.…

title: Wonderful Place
review: If you want relaxing this is your place. Secluded hotel with private beach. Great staff and rooms. Large pool that meanders throughout the property. Great for romantic get away or just to unwind and recharge. Small town nearby if you want to get out to a bar or dining. Shopping also available but not extensive. Activities in the area that can be arranged by the hotel such as elephant trekking. Overall, great place.

title: Beautiful Resort to Unwind!
review: Dear SingaporeGringo,        Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!    Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the beach, the associates, the guest room and the pool.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Spectacular Hotel, amazing staff, beautiful beach
review: We stayed for 4 nights at the Deluxe Lagoon Pool Access, it was a treat to have found this place. Calm and peaceful to take you away from your busy work schedule. Loved the pool system and the PoolBar. Rooms were planned well to keep it spacious and compact at the same time. Breakfast spread was huge and interesting, we enjoyed each day by choosing various cuisines. Quan Spa was a delight never been to a perfect spa with great ambiance and quality. You got your very own Beach away from the crowd and you can just sit at peace and enjoy the sunset. Yes you are away from city, but if you want to avoid the noise and crowd and just want a few days relaxed atmosphere this is one of the best places to be put up. You can always do few of the several day tours which are available. Great…

title: Isolated and serene
review: Dear Joshua_2183,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Dubai!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are happy to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool access room, the pool, the breakfast, the spa and the beach.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: beautiful resort, amazing pools, lovely rooms, great staff, good food, quite a big place...
review: We stayed in this hotel for 4 days and were an amazing experience. The hotel is located in a quiet area, 1hour and 30 min from Phuket airport.  The breakfast was buffet and has variety of items distribute in different stations, that even when the area is really crowded, the hotel can still provide a very good service. We didn´t use the room service. We liked very much DELI, the coffee shop of the hotel right under the lobby. In this area are located many other facilities like Ping-Pong tables, snooker table, meeting room, library, ATM, squash. We were in a duplex suite room, were very spacious and complete with safety box, hair dryer, 2 bathrooms with good shower in each floor, confortable bed and in our room we had 2 TVs. Internet WIFI is free of charge in all property. The…

title: Spectacular and worth it!
review: We had a lovely time at Khao Lak and JW certainly was the icing on the cake. Very friendly staff and service as you would expect from JW. The whole stay for us was hassel free; loved the local restaurants on the beach side, beside this property.  The only negative was that our room (pool access) was not thoroughly cleaned on the 2nd and 3rd day of our visit. But thats fine...of the 6 days we loved every minute here. Thank you to the entire team and we shall be back a 3rd time :) next year. The people at Khao Lak  were wonderful adding to our experience.

title: Beautiful Hotel And Location
review: Dear pmvs2012,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the very friendly associates and the restaurants. We regret to learn of the inconvenience you experienced with your room. Our team will further check for details ensuring this will not happen again.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Go to pullman Hotel
review: Nice quiet hotel, with beautiful pool, beach and hotel grounds. Our room was nice and clean. We had a very pleasant stay. Walked to some restaurants off the hotel property that were good and reasonably priced. We would stay here again.

title: Luxury plus
review: Dear Kalexander,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Naples!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our beautiful pool, the beach, the grounds, the guest room and we are glad that you had a very pleasant stay.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic hotel
review: We stayed there 4 families total of 8 rooms for 6 nights .the Hotel is beautiful with great arcitecture ,service of stuff all over the Hotel is typical Thai means -very good , breakfast is exelent . Bad: Reservation - central reservations in Bangkok , dont respond to mails ( send 2 emails and after 10 days called them ),all was verbal , we got special  rates I understood include breakfast ,we found out when arrived that its not , and they send you to the small words . Conecting rooms for all of us with children - only for part of the group .( its family Hotel ) don't  book if you dong get guaranty for connecting rooms . Rooms - part where very good ( all the hotel need renovations ) , but one family had room that smell very bad ,and only after 3 nights that they found out that…

title: Thai treat
review: This hotel had it all like the last place we stayed but the kids enjoyed this place alot with the large wrap around pool and all the places you can swim. Good kid facilities which gave me and the wife much needed time. The area itself was very nice with local shops in walking distance and a local market with shopping and spices just a short taxi ride away. The restaurants were nice and very easy to book. Room service was accurate and prompt and the food itself was very good. The happy hour was fun and gave us time to relax and enjoy the beach.  Take advantage of the great tours see the elephants and take a trip Phi Phi island the hotel staff was great at recommending things to do.  The housekeeping and restaurant staff were great the front desk the check in was easy and quick. …

title: Disappointed
review: Dear soeth,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Dubai!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about the pool, the facilities, the restaurants, the associates and the pool access guest room.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing resort
review: Best Spa in Asia- staff and ambience was excellent. Check-in to the hotel was very poor- no processes at all, our passports were even mixed up. Many issues with our upgraded pool access room- no information, dirty curtains, not stocked adequately and a ? blocked drain that made the room smell like sewerage. When I bought this to the attention of the manager on duty I am pleased to say most of the issues were fixed quickly & was offered  to move rooms. The food in the restaurants was excellent with the exception of the buffet lunches.be aware that there are many hidden taxes in Thai hotels. The pools are excellent and very clean.

title: Amazing Resort Fantastic Staff
review: Dear alannah2010,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience in August 2015.  We really appreciate your nice words about our Spa being the best in Asia, the great food in our restaurants and the pool.  I am deeply saddened to read of the inconvenience you experienced during check in and in terms of room condition. Please accept our sincere apologies for that.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future and please let me know if I may be of any assistance.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Very nice resort hotel
review: This resort is amazing - the views, the pool, the staff and the food. STAY HERE!!!  Definitely get a package that includes the gorgeous buffet breakfast, as otherwise it's around 800 baht per person per day. It's the best buffet I've ever seen and I'm quite well travelled. From Indian and Thai curries and noodle soups, to a smoothie bar, to a bakery with endless bread and pastry choices (fresh from the oven), to a Western station with eggs/frittatas/omelettes any way you could want and the crispiest of crispy bacon. Plus more! Also good strong coffee which is often hard to find in Asia.  The other restaurants and room service are all good too, especially the Japanese restaurant Sakura (see pics). We ate there twice and it's worth booking to sit at the teppanyaki bar and watching…

title: Awesome all round
review: I haven't stayed in many luxury hotels and I think I'm now screwed.  We had a Luxury Escapes voucher that included all meals and spa treatments for 4 adults (the child of 11 stayed free and had the best time). It took us a while to really get to grips with what this actually entitled us to but they are far more relaxed than we expected and no one was paranoid about what we were eating or using. We found that if something wasn't working for us, we just had to ask and someone tried to make it work. To start, we were asked to stay in an alternative hotel for a  night as there was a huge wedding on there. We were put up in high luxury and transported from said luxury to the Marriott. This wasted holiday time for us but they more than made up for it with flexibility and a good rate…

title: Forget the world at Marriott Khao Lak
review: Dear Deb G,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sydney!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the breakfast, the restaurants, the pool, the spa and the associates. We will certainly ensure to recognize Alex, Poo, Mee and Money for their outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Most relaxing beach holiday!
review: The best family resort you can go to that caters to all your needs. The hotel is simply amazing. If you are looking to switch off and unwind then this is the place to be in. Lots of activities to keep the kids entertained. They are away from you and yet so close to you. Words cannot describe the amazing stay that I had with my family. I would get my tennis and squash gear to enjoy with the family.

title: Very Nice and comfortable property
review: Dear aqeelk12,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Dubai!   Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our amazing resort, the kids’ activities and the facilities.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Do yourself a favour and stay at this beautiful resort
review: This place was breathtaking! I just came here with my aunt for 8 days to relax and do nothing.The location was amazing, it was right on the beach away in the middle of no where away from the touristy areas. The hotel was nothing short of 5 star, the room was beautiful and there were 4 restaurants on the property which had very good quality food. There are great day trips offered in the area. Seeing that it is in an isolated spot the night life is limited.

title: Another wonderful stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: This was our second visit to the JW Marriott Resort & Spa Khao Lak.  We loved this hotel so much last year that we returned again. We had a pool access room (4022), which was excellent, the rooms are decorated in a traditional Thai style and very well equipped with comfortable beds.  The rain shower was fantastic and just what you need after swimming around the canals.  We would really recommend the pool access rooms, this makes such a difference to your holiday especially if you have rainy days as we did, it was excellent to be able to sit on your terrace. The hotel was quiet, especially after breakfast, where does everyone go? The staff really make this hotel.  They are polite and courteous and nothing was too much trouble.  While we were there it was my wife’s  birthday and…

title: Great place
review: Dear Rasasayang,               Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Undy!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Ple and Nook are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of you two; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. I hope you and the turmeric are doing well. We all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana (Nana)   Guest Relations Executive

title: Just a great experience
review: We have just had 10 days at this resort. A great place to relax and enjoy. Fabulous for families but if you were like us with no children there were places you could  go to be quiet - specially meal times. The staff were fantastic - they could not have been more helpful and would go out of their way for you. The food at the 5 different restaurants was always beautifully presented and such a huge variation - enough to please any discerning palate. It was great to try all the different cuisine on offer every day. Jirawat Sakuljan was the Assistant Waterfront Manager and was particularly helpful with one situation. He, as do the other staff, work very long hours and we really appreciated his help. The pool experience is something else. 3Kms of interconnecting pools to walk or swim…

title: Great Hotel, Wonderful Service
review: Dear Liz C,               Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Mangawhai!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the food, the pool and the associates. We will certainly ensure to recognize Jirawat, for his outstanding service and efforts.  We regret to learn of the inconvenience you experienced with your room, thankfully it was resolved promptly. Our team will further check for details ensuring this will not happen again.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us. We hope you are well and we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fabulous with kids!
review: We just got from Thailand and spent three nights at the JW Marriott Khao Lak. My wife had been before and wanted to take my daughter and I. Even though I was sick the entire time, I can't say enough about this resort. The grounds are incredible and we lucked out with some good weather, even sunny on a few days. I would love to come back during January or February when we could do some diving. Biggest reason I loved it is the service. The staff were just amazing. I probably interacted more than the average guest because I was sick, but they showed genuine concern, asking after me whenever my wife passed by. They arranged for a doctor's visit and follow up. The rooms are lovely, clean and roomy. The bathroom, which I saw too much of, was great. My biggest regret? Not feeling up to…

title: Luxury Escape Package
review: We have just stayed at the Marriott on the Luxury Escape package , I must say it was a wonderful stay , I think the first ever that we have just relaxed and chilled by the pool for the entire 8 days , was pure bliss, as we normally are out and about , but with this package we didn't have to leave the resort , to some it might sound boring but the days unfortunately sped by. With the choice of dining there is ample with the Thai , Japanese, Olive , Deli, Waterfront restaurants and the Czar lobby bar , and infinity pool bar to choose from you will never need to leave . The swimming pool wraps around the resort so is wonderful to swim / walk each day with the large infinity pool looking out to the ocean. Plenty of seats in the sun/ shade / beach front . The rooms are fantastic with…

title: Lovely stay at JW Marriott
review: Dear lovetravelperth,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the pool, the restaurants, the guest room, the spa and the friendly and helpful associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Awesome Resort and Awesome People - love it
review: Fantastic stay at the Marriott. It is as brilliant as people say it is! Lovely room, great staff and well kept grounds (as well as 'that pool')!  Positives  1. We loved our room, very comfortable, everything you need, well maintained 2. The grounds and general feel were luxurious - exactly what you expect from the Marriott brand 3. Food was great, we loved the breakfast buffet and the set menu options for dinner were very good. The Deli has great food as well 4. The gym is brilliant, well equipped and well maintained.  Negatives - really not many! 1. The cost of drinks was a little excessive to be honest. The cheapest glass of red wine was £8 which struck me as seriously expensive. It's difficult because we had such a good offer on the room that they need to make money somewhere…

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear Widdventurer,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  Unfortunately all imported alcoholic beverages are heavily taxed in Thailand and whenever you order this kind of drinks in any restaurant, hotel or bar, you will experience similar pricing.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the food and the fitness center.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: The most amazing pool
review: Me and Wife booked for our 25th Anniversary, What can i say, they really made our holiday special, The room was dressed with flowers and welcoming  - The staff are exceptional, real people, they engaged with us in conversation and nothing was to much trouble, I must say Ms Nana is a true ambassador for JW , She made our stay the trust dream holiday, The resort is large and the pool is out of this world, clean and long, swimming around the resort is an experience, the beach is clean and great sand and waves, We booked for Bed and Breakfast, the breakfast buffet is vast and caters for all needs, trust me you will not be eating until evening - I will be visiting again - TRUE PEOPLE AND GREAT RESORT love it

title: A fantastic family hotel in Khao Lak
review: We stayed at JW Marriott Khao Lak in July for three nights, staying at the room with direct access to the pool and absolutely loved it.  It is about one hour and fifteen minutes from the airport so for a family traveling with kids landing late and the extra drive was a bit of a stretch.   It didn't help that our room wasn't ready straight away and we had to wait another hour until the kids beds were made.   The check in staff was pleasant and professional with the staff explaining the resort in details.  The family lagoon pool access suite is nice, big enough for two adults and two kids sleeping on the two sofa beds.  The amenities are great as you would expect from a Marriott and the bathroom is spacious, a nice bath and clean.  The minibar is standard with your basic drinks…

title: Relaxation Central
review: Dear Tatiana V,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Dubai!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the guest room, the pool, the restaurants, the kids club, the gym, the pool bar, the concierge and the associates.    We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: wedding  anniversary stay
review: We usually do not take a trip where we stay in one place but this was well worth it and the Resort had everything we needed at our finger tips.  Great pool, beach and restaurants that catered to our every need. The staff were so friendly and helpfully.  Our room was always impeccable and we got all the bottled water we could use.  We did drink the tap water and we did not get sick, as the hotel said it uses filtered water and all there fresh food is thoroughly cleaned and washed before use.

title: Character Wise (Most stunning Marriott)
review: Dear Purple7279,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Woy Woy!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool, the beach, the restaurants, the friendly and helpful associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Paradise
review: Stayed at the hotel for our 40th wedding anniversary and I must say it was excellent the food and  service is very good the staff at the hotel go out of their way to help you and I would say a special thank you too na na who was so helpful to us during our stay at the Marriott she is a great asset to the hotel

title: Watch out for cane mites
review: Beautiful holiday, amazing pools lovely staff but the chairs in the waterfront restaurant are infested with cane mites and when I was bitten and discovered them in my chair I told staff who just moved the chair to another table where another guest promptly sat on it. Six days later the blisters have calmed down but my legs are red raw and I still can't wear jeans, a really nasty creature to be bitten by. If you are heading there eat at the other restaurants and consider spraying chairs before you sit down

title: Fine resort let down by housekeeping and room service..
review: Dear Pauline595,         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!  Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the pool and the associates.   I am deeply saddened to read of the inconvenience you experienced at the restaurant. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused, I have followed up immediately with our team to ensure these service delivery issues will not reoccur.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: wonderful holiday
review: There is alot to like at this resort. Beautiful surroundings, a great spa and pleasant rooms.. In addition the restaurants are universally excellent with fine food and friendly service. However the housekeeping and room service are poor... Rooms frequent not made up or poorly done. Room service is also extraordinary slow and often inaccurate prompting repeated sloe / unanswered follow ups - you eventually give up...

title: Perfect Family Holiday
review: Dear Squaremeal,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London!         Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the beautiful surroundings, the spa, the guest room and the restaurants.  We have well noted your comments about the housekeeping and room service experienced.   We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great resort, great people
review: don't know where to start, from picking us up at the airport to the last day, the staff only wanted to please. We have been Marriott members for 25 years, so have stayed at a lot of properties all over the world. Had you asked me before, I would have said the Cayman Island Marriott was the best "beach" Marriott, but then we went to Khao Lak.  We rate this property as the best we have been to. From the beautiful room, to the outstanding grounds, we have nothing negative to say. You can do as much or as little as you wish. We wanted a quiet, relaxing holiday, the first we had had in 6 years and this hit the mark.  You have 4 different dinning options and they are all outstanding. I will say that the service in the Japanese restaurant was not quite as good as the other 3, but the…

title: The best 8 days of relaxation & service
review: Stayed for 8 days on an all inclusive DEAL (ex drinks) and had the best level of service in every aspect of our stay. Picked up at the airport with another couple in a luxury van, given cold water and ice cold towels that were much appreciated. Booking in was a breeze, sat down on comfy chairs and again drinks and cold towels before being escorted to our room with all the necessary meal and spa vouchers. Room service was excellent with fresh towels daily, beds and pillows were the best and each afternoon an extra service offering replacement of any toiletries etc. Meals at all of the venues together with the service by staff was extremely good. Theme buffet meals at the Waterfront were excellent and our favourite restaurant was the OLIVE, even with the set menu. We are currently…

title: Staff urgently required - good food though
review: Dear FrancisM1944,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Yinnar!          Thank you for making our resort as preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the guest room, the restaurants, the efficient and friendly service by our associates and the incredible longest pool in Southeast Asia.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcoming you back again to our beautiful resort in near future!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Not 5 stars but
review: We visited the JW Marriot for the purpose of having dinner at Olive based on a friend's recommendation. When we arrived at the lobby it was unclear where the restaurant was, so we asked. We needed to take a golf buggy to get there. This seemed fine...at the time. The food and drinks at Olive were delicious, but when it came time to leave, things became difficult. We asked for a buggy to take us to reception so we could get a taxi home. This was greeted with much consternation. After 10 minutes they asked if we would mind waiting another 20 minutes. 5 minutes later they said it would be half an hour. We asked for someone to show us the way on foot which it turns out is a much shortedr route than on the buggy. I wish they had told us that right away. When we asked for a taxi to…

title: luxury! can't wait to go back
review: Dear CallyfoxHK,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred dining destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your recent experience in our resort.  We really appreciate your nice words about our delicious food and your great dining experience at Olive.  I am deeply saddened to read of the inconveniences you experienced during your departure. Please accept my sincerest apologies and I will follow up immediately and once more with our team to ensure these issue will not reoccur.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future and please let me know if I may be of any assistance.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beach at JW Marriott
review: a good resort all the same. Stayed here for 14 nights and had an enjoyable time. Resort is starting to look a little dated in some areas. Service at breakfast was found wanting on many occasions and this is why it isn't a 5 star hotel. Staff very respectful and mostly always smiling, but getting plates and cups cleared off the tables was hopeless. Staff would just walk by and not clear the table. More training in this area would help this resort. Ate at a number of the beach restaurants and the food, service and pricing was extremely good.

title: Not Jw Marriott level
review: Yes, facilities are great. Swimming pool is amazing. But the staff in the restaurants ..... When I came in the morning for breakfast I had never heard  "good morning".  It seemed that all the waiters are tired or fed up with all the guests.  The restaurant is dirty and overcrowded during breakfast.  Prices for food is too high. The quality is low.

title: 10 days in paradise
review: Dear Yulia K,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bangkok!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience back in April 2015.  We really appreciate your nice words about our great facilities and the amazing pool.  I am deeply saddened to read of the inconvenience you experienced at breakfast during your stay. Please accept my sincerest apologies and I will follow up immediately and once more with our team to ensure these issue will not reoccur.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future and please let me know if I may be of any assistance.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Wonderful stay - Luxury Escape brilliant value
review: My wife and I travelled to Thailand in August 2014 to utilise a special voucher we bought from luxury escapes. We were a little dubious of the voucher concept at first but the ad was comprehensive and we thought that Luxury Escapes was linked with the TV Show Getaway which we have watched for years, so we took the plunge and bought the voucher. Then we had to use it to get our booking which we did and then our flights could not be synchronized as expected from a verbal advice on the Thursday to a not available on the Friday - a tip for new players - you must transfer your 'frequent flyer' type points to the Airline of choice before they lock in the booking. In the end we had to change our flights and as a result our voucher hotel booking with JW Marriott (JWM)  by a number of…

title: Excellent experience
review: Dear David R,         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Gold Coast!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic family resort
review: Having never purchased a Luxury Escape deal I was quite dubious - but I had no need to be.  Given it was school holiday the 4 of us (2 adults, 2 kids 9 & 11) have just returned from a wonderful holiday.  We upgraded to the pool access room and upgraded again to a pool access family studio for extra room - this was a good move given the kids are a bit bigger. The staff are amazing and are the true stars of this resort - Thank you to Koi in the Waterfront Restaurant - her smile and welcome was beutiful and her concern for my daughter who was a little pink in the sun (she is a red head) was gorgeous by getting cold yoghurt to put on her face.  Nana was also a stand out at the Waterfront - her humour and obvious engagement with the guests was exemplary. We dined at Olive 3 nights -…

title: Just Keeps Getting Better
review: Our family of 5 (3 kids under 12) had such a great time at the JW Marriott last year that we decided to come back again this year. What a great decision this turned out to be, particularly as the weather was less than ideal (rain, rain, rain). The hotel is perfect for families particularly if you get a pool access room with a pool fence (at this time of year the north facing Wing 4 balconies get partial sun which is perfect). We took up a special hotel advertised online deal which included a number of spa treatments which came in handy. We didn't take up the meal deal (except for breakfast) as we like to frequent the local restaurants of which there are many great ones to choose from (refer other reviews). The staff were again amazing with many going out of their way to try to…

title: Tecnoteach
review: Dear chustonk,     Welcome back and warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  How gratifying to read your nice words about the guest room and the friendly associates. We will certainly ensure to recognize Nuch, Poo, Mam and Goong for their outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: A great relaxing holiday at a nice resort.
review: The staff at this hotel were ever so helpful and polite. They fully respected their guests and we're always courteous and gave them respect. I could not have been treated better. The resort is beautiful and a paradise to many. I did not use the restaurants due to travelling solo but room service was excellent. The gym and facilities are excellent and my maid was just wonderful. For the price out off season this is well worth the cost.   Unfortunately, due to travelling alone this was not the place for a solo female traveller due to mainly couples. This made me feel awkward going to one of the lovely restaurants. This is not the resorts problem at all just a word of warning to the so female.   Location is far from the maddening crowd. This means you are on a secluded resort so no…

title: Happy kids, happy parents!
review: Dear Tecnoteach,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the helpful and polite associates, the resort’s grounds, the room service and the gym.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Eat, Swim, Relax, Repeat..
review: We stayed here for 9 days through the rainy season and thoroughly enjoyed the resort.   Good facilities and excellent rooms with comfortable beds and well laid out rooms.  Restaurant's on the resort were good and you soon pick your favorites to keep returning to.   Happy hour at the bars is 5 to 6.30 and this also includes the pool bar's. Great swimming pool and sports facilities with well laid out gym, squash courts, table tennis tables, tennis courts,  yoga/thai chi area. The staff are amazing and very helpful, they seem very happy and put the guests first.  Don't get your laundry done at the resort as it is expensive but there is a small laundry place next to the resort that will wash, dry and fold your clothes at a fraction of the cost. Pick up is the following day.  We…

title: An Amazing Resort
review: A family of ten,three generations all had a wonderful time.The staff,the service,the food,the spa & massages,the gardens,the pool access room----all excellent.In every aspect exceeded our expectations,would certainly recommend.  Joan & Morrie Abrahams

title: wonderful
review: Dear Joan and Morrie,        Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Wollonggong!          Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Amazing Place to Stay!
review: Our stay at this resort was most relaxing and indulgent.  Great position and facilities.  The food was very good with lots of choice. The staff were very attentive to any request  and our room was most comfortable.

title: superb resort, restaurant quality food, amazing value
review: Dear David H,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!         Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing hotel
review: We were lucky enough to spend 10 days in this amazing resort in May. We had a poolside room, with our own entry to the pool. The pool was like no other pool I've ever seen, it was three and a half kilometers long, winding its way around the whole resort! The accommodation was spacious and comfortable and we were really spoiled by the lovely Polla, who was in charge of our room and who really impressed ,every day with towel sculptures,( swans, dogs, elephants, monkeys and two chicks in a nest), she was delightful. As were Joy and Ping Ping, who served us drinks at Happy Hour. There are four restaurants to choose from, the main resort restaurant plus a Japanese, a Thai and an Italian Restaurant all serving delicious meals.  I, personally enjoyed "Olive" the Italian restaurant as…

title: Wonderful break for middle aged couple
review: My wife and I took time out at JW Marriott Khao Lak for 8 days last week. We were welcomed like royalty. The time and respect taken to make us welcome was amazing. The staff here have the best client centered attention I have witnessed. the accomodation was very clean and well serviced, with attention to detail that I have not seen before. JW Marriott Khao lak manages to attend to many facets of ones stay from quiet respectful staff through to amazing resort facilities, open to all guests. We dined like kings, enjoyed the best spa ever, and utilised various areas of the grounds as prepared for the guests for swimming, sunbathing, enjoying a cocktail, watching the sea, or reading in the air conditioned library. Very professional, staffed by emphathetic people, well run, and above…

title: Nice pool
review: Dear Jamiesor,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Auckland!       Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.   It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the warm welcome, the associates, the spa, the resort’s ground, the pool and the library.
