Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Absolute Relaxation
review: The resort is about 1 hr away from Phuket Airport.  We took the airport transfer from Taxi @ Boss as it worked out much cheaper than the one provided by the resort.  My kids absolutely loved our room with pool access and had a whale of a time swimming around the whole resort.  You may want to bring your own floating mattress or pool ride-on toys as the ones sold at the resort were quite expensive.  It cost TBH 550 (excluding tax) to purchase a floating mattress from the hotel.  Food is also expensive.  The nearest restaurant outside the resort is at the entrance of the resort.  The fried pineapple rice cost about SGD $6-7.  Things at the convenient shop next to the restaurant was very expensive.  Better to buy anything you need from 7-11 when you pass by one.  The staff at the…

title: " A relaxing tropical get away "
review: Dear EmmSpg,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your stay during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool, the friendly associates and the good service.   In terms of pricing in our restaurants, we believe that we are fairly priced and definitely in line with other properties of similar categories in Thailand. The comparison with local dining establishments is not really insightful since the level of service, quality of food, hygiene, etc. are completely different.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: A resort that never seems full even when fully booked during the school holidays
review: Had the Luxury Escape package to JW Marriott, Khao Lak in late June early July. What can I say other than WOW! There was no negative on the trip at all. The Food, Pool, Accommodation, Bars, Staff, Weather all were better than expected. 1st time ever to Thailand but won't be the last and would be thrilled to return to JW Marriott. Went with another couple but would have had an equally great time with our teenage kids too as all ages seemed well catered for. Initially we had a 3rd story room but on seeing the pool rooms quickly went to reception to request an upgrade. You MUST have a pool room it makes this great place so much better.They happily accommodated our request from Day 2 and the extra cost was well worth it. In fact the hardest decision each day was where we would eat…

title: out of the world... truly amazing
review: this was our second visit to the resort and we were truly overwhelmed. First time visited  this place in October last year, with my sister. we were so impressed with the property that we came back to this place with my parents , to celebrate their 40th wedding anniversary. our room was beautifully decorated with flowers and a cute towel elephant saying welcome back. through out our stay the entire staff of J W Marriott had been so courteous and helpful, always greeting with a smile on their face any time of the day. The breakfast is grand with loads of options. all the restaurants in the resort are absolutely fabulous, my favorite one being Ta Krai - serving thai food.they made my parents anniversary special with beautiful towel peacock arrangements and a surprise cake. the…

title: A beautiful resort
review: Dear nobina,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to India!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort location, the courteous and helpful associates, the breakfast and the restaurants. We will certainly ensure to recognize Miss Money for her outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again on your third visit to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Check it out for yourself
review: The Good: The staff are all extremely friendly, helpful, professional and delightful - everyone from the gardeners, to the pool cleaners to the house keepers to Executive Chef were friendly smiling and just delightful. The pool is amazing - easily the best I have ever seen. The infinity bar is a real highlight (but not cheep by Thai standards) The housekeepers do a fantastic job - the rooms were spotless. The quality of the breakfast was outstanding.  The not so good: This may be a comment more about big resorts - but the place is really crowded and needs more than one breakfast venue.  The breakfast venue is loud, cluttered and packed from 7am-10am. Overall the food is so-so - again I lay the blame squarely at the feet of the customers - WHY ON EARTH do people travel 10000km to…

title: Breakfast from heaven
review: Dear Kim N,        Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Australia!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Watt is absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: First time in Thailand
review: We just got back today from a two week stay at the awesome JW Marriott resort at Khao Lak Thailand.  I cannot recommend it highly enough.   The facilities are great and staff are just so friendly and helpful.  Nothing is to much trouble.   You will want for nothing whilst you stay there.   A personal favourite staff member of ours was Watt (the assistant food and beverage manager).  The kids just loved his warm and friendly manner and so did we.    We hope to visit again one day.  Do yourself a favour and check it out !!

title: It's all about the pool!
review: My partner and I spent 8 nights at the JW Marriott after purchasing a deal from the Luxury Escapes website. The deal included accommodation in a pool access room, airport pick up, all meals and 4 spa treatments for $1200 each. We were a little worried that the resort's location was a little remote being two hours out of Patong. That meant there would be little chance of spur of the moment shopping trips if we got bored. Well I'm pleased to say there was absolutely no chance of getting bored after we experienced the best resort pool design we've ever seen! Staying at this resort is all about the pool and enjoying the relaxed atmosphere it provides. Our pool access room allowed us to simply roll out of bed and take a swim without the hassle of fighting for a sun lounge by the…

title: A fabulous, very large resort on the beach front at Khao Lak.
review: Dear Shane B,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort next year!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing resort, perfect stay!
review: From our first day here we were constantly amazed by the friendliness of the staff. They went out of their way to stop and say hello with a lovely Thai greeting. They all seemed to anticipate and cater for all our needs without being asked to do so. Our room was very comfortable with a balcony overlooking the pool. The gardens surrounding the pool were lush, with a large variety of flowering tropical plants. Each of the restaurants we visited, we came away very satisfied and enjoyed every meal. Our favourite restaurant was the Olive. It overlooked the ocean and had live entertainment including a couple of very accomplished and entertaining singers. Happy hour was also a daily treat with 3 bars serving drinks at reduced prices. They made us some really good mojitos in the Czar…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Wendy W,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Brisbane!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about friendliness of the associates, the guest room, the food and beverage, the massage and the Thai cooking class.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Relaxing family holiday
review: My family just returned home from an amazing 9 day holiday on the Luxury Escapes Package. I wouldn't have changed a thing! The resort is stunningly beautiful surrounded by gorgeous gardens that are meticulously maintained. The 3km lagoon pool (the largest pool in SE Asia) is spectacular and we spent so much time in it without ever getting bored. My 2 children (6 and 4) loved it. The food options are extensive and everything was of a high quality. We ate everything, seafood, salad, cut fruit, everything, and never got sick. Their standards are high so you can feel safe there and enjoy what they have to offer.  My tips if you are on the luxury escapes package: 1. As soon as you check in (if during the day, go and book your spa treatments because it can be booked for up to a week.…

title: Heaven on a budget!!
review: We have just returned from a Luxury Escape at this resort and all I can say is WOW!!.  We upgraded to a pool access room which is a must as the 3km of pool is the main attraction.  The room was gorgeous and comfortable with a king size bed. The deal included all meals and the breakfast buffet was enormous with enough choice to suit all tastes. The lunch choices were plentiful and the restaurants, although offering a set menu, provided plenty of choice. We also ate twice at the local Thai restaurant just outside the front gate which was cheap and delicious. The first 4 days outside of school holidays were quiet and much better.  Having said that though we never felt crowded except for the breakfast buffet.  The hotel was fabulous at arranging anything we wanted to do and cocktail…

title: An amazing holiday
review: Dear Peach14,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne! title: Beautiful staff..Fantastic food and stunning hotel
review: We travelled to the Khao Lak on a Luxury Escape package which sounded too good to be true but it achieved everything it promised and more. We were picked up from the airport as promised and the welcoming staff were lovely. We were taken to our room which was magnificent, we stepped off the balcony in front of the room into the pool, which wound 3.2kms through the resort. We had the choice of restaurants, the main dining room and 3 others which all offered comprehensive selections of food to eat. Each day we had a coffee at the Deli which was excellent and the staff lovely. We had 4 massages each which were terrific. Overall it was the staff that made this holiday so superb, they couldn't do enough for us. In the main dining room there was the beautiful Koy, Nuch, Meow, Laila and…

review: Dear Herewego405,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Auckland! Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Beautiful resort, wonderful spa but let down by its kids' club
review: We booked this hotel as a luxuary escape holiday and was a little anxious as ...This sounds too good to be true...BUT it was everything AND more. THE staff .....words cannot explain how these beautiful people made our holiday fantastic??I have never stayed at a JW Marriott hotel chain before but it was so evident that their philosophy of treating the staff like a family and making their employment more than "just a job" was evident and not mere words in a fancy brochure. Leila who served us daily at breakfast made a genuine effort to understand and speak with us was a joy to see every morning. Nucht smiled ,laughed and I believe struck up a real lasting friendship with my husband Aaron and myself and my brother John and I would come back to this hotel because of the real joy…

title: Amazing service
review: The Marriott had everything you would ever need for a relaxing holiday.  The service was amazing.  The staff could not do enough to help.  The restaurants served a wide range of delicious, top quality food.  My husband and I had a wonderful stay.  Thoroughly relaxing and enjoyable.

title: Overpriced, under performed and isolated
review: Dear Andih1,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Swan Hill!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Brilliant Holiday hotel
review: This resort is very impressive on the surface, but is extremely expensive compared with similar establishments nearby. Meals, especially lunch in the Waterfront restaurant are poor quality and luke-warm. Staff are poorly trained, speak minimal English,( for a supposedly international chain ). On the other hand the Spa is first class as are it's services, however again very expensive.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear 358rossb,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience in June 2015.  We really appreciate your nice words about our first class Spa and the impressive overall resort.  Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience during your stay caused by the English language skills of our team. We are providing English language classes for all our associates and the English skills of our managers and supervisors are absolutely sufficient, especially under the circumstances of being in a rather rural area of Thailand.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Brilliantly relaxing
review: Late review. We stayed there in February 2015. All the previous reviews have said it all. We enjoyed the country and this hotel that so much we are taking our children and their partners back in February 2016. There isn't much to dislike about this hotel. there will always be people who don't like certain aspects, for us it was just brilliant. This can only be achieved by the people who work there to make your holiday a memory that stands out from other holidays.

title: Heavenly Holiday
review: Right from our pick up at the airport we felt relaxation set in. Water and an iced towel were a relief from the initial 'Heat Shock'. We upgraded to a pool access room which was roomy and had everything we needed. Loved the huge bathroom and the storage space. The resort is isolated and only has a few beach restaurants and massage places nearby. All our meals were included so there was no need to go anywhere. The Spa was fantastic, the 4 restaurants provided plenty of choice and the Tsar Bar and pool bars were great places to visit. The pool was the best for someone who loves swimming ( me) and to be able to access it from our veranda was a bonus.

title: 10 days in paradise
review: Dear KirstenWollongong,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Wollongong!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the guest room, the resort location, the spa, the restaurant and the longest pool in Southeast Asia.    We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Perfect relaxing place
review: The j w Marriott Koa Lak was a superb place to stay. The staff were friendly and helpful. The food was good, though the drinks a bit pricey out of happy hour. The pools and grounds were immaculately clean and kept. The spa staff were extremely nice and all treatments excellent. The spa itself is a little bit of luxury and a haven in its own right. We can not fault the resort at all, even though a very large wedding was held there for a few days of our stay, we were not pushed aside or ammenities restricted. The resort is a little way out of the main sections of Khao Lak, but taxis a by the front gate, and there is not much to be seen in the main city itself. Is you have not purchased accommodation including meals it is a way to go outside of the resort for other restaurants.

title: Amazing resort
review: Dear Karen M,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort with the friendly and helpful associates, the food, the pool and the spa.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Paradise - unspoilt, peaceful and quiet!
review: Our group of three (1 adult& 2 teenagers) stayed there for 3 days. The hotel was really nicely decorated in contemporary Thai style. Our rooms are spacious, cozy and properly equipped with modern gadgets. Lots of plugs for charging our equipments. Beach is quite a walk but very quiet and clean. The breakfast buffet is good. Lots of varieties. The sandwiches at The Deli were nice too. The best food we ate this trip was at the Mediterranean restaurant on the beach. Everything we ordered were perfect. Soup, pasta, salad and dessert were all taste and look great (especially my Irish Coffee- it is a must!). The services at the hotel are super friendly and courteous. Check in and out super fast. Overall, nothing to complain.

title: Very nice hotel
review: We stayed 8 nights on a Luxury Escapes package. All the vouchers were waiting for us on check in. There were 11 different types of massage or treatments available. I enjoyed every one of mine. Book early though.  We had a pool access room and it was fantastic.  The food was really good. Breakfast had a huge spread with a juice bar. If anything could be improved it would be getting in to breakfast. Every other hotel we have stayed at, you just give your room number. Not here, you had to fill in a form and sign it. This did cause some queues. We sat in the child free room as it did get very noisy in the waterfront restaurant.  Lunch and dinner you had to take your vouchers to get stamped. There was a choice of buffet or menu. You had to ask for the menu though it wasn't freely…

title: Stunning Beach
review: Dear LindaEvBuningyongVic,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We have well noted your comments about your holiday experienced. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Back for 2nd time!
review: Loved this place, holidayed with my husband and 2 teenage children and couldn't have been happier.  The staff were sensational and very helpful and the breakfast was of an incredibly high standard. The beach staff were so attentive and delivered iced water and cool towels during the day.

title: Great if you don't need to sleep
review: Dear white1308,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments especially the associates. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family; great guests make a perfect holiday. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Macha was amazing!!
review: Back again with my family this time, and booked a deluxe pool access room.   Room~ super king bed with addition daybed so these fits 4 of us well! Very spacious, though design is abit dated~ mainly wood and wood. Room air-conditioning is very good (cold), and fitted with ceiling fan as well.   Wifi~ free wifi connection all covered in the hotel premise.   Pool~ warm and clean water is very welcoming, and we will definitely dip ourselves in the pool every noon! Note: seems that min. pool height is 1.3m, so family w young kids ~ do take note of this.   Service~ needless to say, top class! Except check in process is abit slow. But relax~ u r on beach vacation! Slow down a min, and chillax! :)   Hotel ambience~ peaceful, and outdoor beach seating, clean and warm fresg towels,…

title: Be Careful at Checkout - Do Not "Pay in Your Currency"
review: We enjoyed our stay at the Marriott Khao Lak but something at check out really annoyed me - the hotel offered me to pay my bill in Australian Dollars. To translate - the hotel was offering to convert my payment to Australian dollars instead of letting MasterCard or VISA do it for me.  I asked to pay in Baht and then checked what MasterCard had charged me for the service - it was 5% less than what the hotel just offered me!!  So, if you're staying at this hotel - BE CAREFUL AT CHECKOUT. Reject the offer to pay in your own currency. Pay in Baht only.   The hotel promotes this as a service, but in my opinion it is financial trickery and the result is customers paying 5% more than MasterCard and VISA charge for the exact same service. The hotel should tell it's customers that there…

title: Enjoyable stay but not quite the 'wow' factor
review: Dear RTWTripping,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Australia!  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had a great experience during your holiday.   In terms of credit card payment in your home currency, this service is offered by the local bank through the hotel and the commission is obviously charged by the local bank. Similar to a currency exchange in the local bank where you also pay a commission which would not be charged if you get your money directly out of an ATM machine. This service is offered by the banks in Thailand through all hotels of certain categories and the charged commission is a 100% benefit to the banks, not to the hotels.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!   Sincerely yours,  Alex Schoell  Director of Rooms

title: Good place to spent the Monsoon Season
review: We booked this 5 night trip as a much needed short notice getaway, based on it being a short(ish) flight from Japan and the deal we found at 40% off the usual price for bed and breakfast. We knew it was going to be the rainy season before we booked but based on the reviews seen here on tripadvisor we knew that it was a large resort style hotel and there would be plenty on offer apart from the beach and pool. Check In I would agree with previous reviews that check in can be slow.  Whilst staff are very pleasant and polite and provide you with a welcome drink, most people after a long journey would prefer speed and efficiency.   The Room The room looked exactly as it does in the pictures.  We were on the third floor overlooking the pool. the room was large, bright, clean and well…

title: A swim-around Hotel
review: Dear ElizaBiz10,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience in June 2015.  We really appreciate your nice words about our resort and it is my great pleasure to share your feedback with our entire team.  I am deeply saddened to learn that the "engagement welcome set up"  in your room was not creating a WOW effect as it usually does. Usually our guests feel the honeymoon or engagement welcome set ups in the room as a fantastic WOW factor.   Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future and please let me know if I may be of any assistance.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing resort
review: Went on a package to the Marriott- 8 nights including all meals, 8 spa treatments and a Thai cooking class for a great price. Discovered why when we arrived- it is their monsoon season, so package deal to boost numbers.  Great place to stay in the Monsoon season- resort clean and well maintained, they put on entertainment for rainy days, and there is usually some sunshine every day. Service was great. 4 restaurants on site, and while there were definitely some days that were better than others, food was overall of a good standard.

title: NOT A 5 STAR AT ALL
review: Besides the pool n the view n the breakfast.....nothing else was good...surprised to have received such a service frm Marriott.. They took 25mins to chk us in...4 staff at the counter incl manager...not busy during our chk in and the roof of the front desk was leaking and it dropped on my husband's head several times. Basic communication skills are sooo poor. Rooms had a pungent smell..the thai buffet  was over priced.cold bread..flies on the  fruits,cereal and food...and the list goes on and on

title: Nearly but not quite 5 out of 5
review: Dear Mrs. kiranpannu,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience here at the resort. We are deeply saddened that we were unable to meet your expectations. We would appreciate if you could share more specific details at Alexander.Schoell@Marriott.com, so that we may have the chance to follow-up and rectify your concerns.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to more details.  Respectfully,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Lovely Beach - well managed mega resort
review: A slightly late review and husband and I stayed at JWM from 13-28 Feb 2015. Having stayed at the Centara Grand in Krabi the previous year we were looking for a 5* hotel that had restaurants, massages and other amenities close by. Previous reviews helped us to select JMW.  Very good on a lot of points - we had a swim out room near to reception (which I had requested by email a couple of weeks before) so it was nice and quiet and lazing in the pool with easy access to our room was very handy. They also spray the resorts so there were no mosquitoes when we visited. The staff are friendly and attentive and any problems were fixed speedily (drains one day and DVD not playing all sorted). The proximity of the massage places and restaurants on the beach was very handy. We were on…

title: More "Vacation Club" than a JW Marriott luxury
review: Dear Vijay R,           Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Essex!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are happy to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the pool, the resort grounds, the friendly and attentive associates, the spa, the restaurants and the gym.   We have well noted your comments about the food and shuttle bus experienced. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. We will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Wonderful 8 nights at Khao Lak Marriott
review: I had a lovely relaxing weekend at the Marriott in Koh Lak.  This is very much a large, international hotel chain resort, which is not usually my first choice for a get away but the setting of this resort - on a remote beach an hour north of Phukett airport - makes it special.  The pool and beach area are well laid out to take advantage of the gorgeous setting.    I will say this resort is really made for families on vacation or couples on a romantic holiday.  The huge pool and swimming canals leading around the resort are a dream for kids - keeping them endlessly entertained.    There is a gorgeous spa with quality treatments (massage, body scrubs, facials) which although cost two to three times what you can get walking down the beach are very professionally done and worth the…

title: amazing pool, service & beach!
review: We have just spent 8 nights here through the luxury escapes deal. We upgraded to a pool access room which was fantastic, the pool is wonderful and is the highlight of the resort. The resort is simply beautiful, so well maintained and a lovely sprawling lay out. Its the quiet season now so few other guests, if you're looking for a quiet resort I wouldn't recommend going in the high season, it would be quite crowded.  The beach is gorgeous, and the sunsets are amazing.  The staff and the service throughout the resort was exceptional, we felt very well looked after at all times. Our only disappointment was the food. The package deal gave is all meals but these were very limiting. There needs to be more variety on the set menus, once you've eaten once in each restaurant it gets a…

title: Lovely Stay
review: Dear Megsdb,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Melbourne!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our resort grounds, the beach and the exceptional associates and service. We have well noted your comments about the food experienced. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. We will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Beautiful Thai Experience
review: The best views of the sunset in all kinds of Colors at this property. Totally loved the flora & fauna tour, spent time with the baby elephant & lazed around on the beach. The room was so beautiful that you get up, get out & get straight into the pool. The food was yum & tried thai & italian during the stay. Also loved the floating market for a bargain at 1430 hrs everyday it was fun. A very relaxing property refreshes you totally.

title: Amazing hotel and a beautiful location
review: Dear Anuragtrehan,           Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about the resort grounds, the flora & fauna tour, the lovely and friendly elephant, the beach, the guest room and the restaurant.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Memorable experience
review: We stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak on a Luxury Escapes holiday plan. We had not stayed in any type of resort of this kind and were totally delighted with the service and the property. You really can do a lot or very little it's up to you.   If you are traveling on a Luxury Escapes holiday I would advise that once you get settled, do yourself a favour, spend 20 minutes and plan your time. Get out the activities sheet and the restaurant guide and plan out when to have your spa treatments, (as there are a  range of massage types available, scrubs and a facial on offer all 45 minutes). Also there are the  buffet nights at both the Thai and Japanese restaurant to fit in. Plus yoga, Thai boxing and the shuttle to the local markets. That way you will not be disappointed and will…

title: Coconuts on the Beach
review: We had a wonderful relaxing time at the resort on an 8 night stay booked through Luxury Escapes. Like most reviews, it's hard to fault this resort.  The only negative was that it was remote but if you want a peacefull holiday without the hussle and bustle then this is the place.  Quiet walks along the beach (watch out for the local dogs who can be quite aggressive) with tropical forest and coco palms as a back drop, makes a great start to the day and an appetite to enjoy the feast of the breakfast spread.  Something for every taste, always fresh and well cooked. We did find on some mornings the children were a bit noisy but one could escape the excitement of children having fun by having breakfast in the children free area. The rooms were spacious with a comfy king size bed…

title: J W Marriott Khoa Lak,Truly Fantastic.
review: Dear tosh48,         Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the beach, the breakfast, the guest room, the restaurants and the friendly and helpful associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Value for money Package
review: J W Marriott Khoa Lak, truly fantastic. We travelled from Australia arriving at the Phuket Airport approximately 10.00pm, during the first week of May 2015. The travel time from airport to the hotel was approximately one and half hours in a vehicle provided by the hotel as part of the package. The hotel provided separate vehicles for guest travelling in groups, families and or as partners. There were a large number of arrivals, but adequate vehicles to ensure comfortable and private travel. The hotels check in was professional, quick and efficient. The hotel complex is very large. They provided useful maps and detailed information concerning amenities and locations. They then escorted us to our room, again with detailed explanation of amenities and services available. At the…

title: All About the Food !
review: Dear Dennis C,        Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Adelaide!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort grounds, the guest room and the restaurants. We will certainly ensure to recognize Honey and Tuka for their outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Good place for Relaxing holiday
review: We recently spent 10 nights at the JW Marriott Khao Lak via a Luxury Escapes package out of Australia.  As other reviews suggest, the service received was almost exclusively outstanding, friendly and courteous.  We had a room on the third floor [wing 3] overlooking the Aqua Marine swim-up bar which afforded a great view of the pool, gardens and out to sea.  Rooms with the direct access to the pool don't have the ocean view and in my opinion offer less privacy.  The hotel gardens are extensive and simply stunning.  If you are at all interested in gardens I strongly recommend the free Flora & Fauna tour which is offered daily.  The spa complex is beautiful and the treatments are wonderful.  Our package included all meals and this is probably the only area where I felt thatt the…

title: Service standards of a boutique hotel
review: Like,other reviewers , we stayed for 8 nights on a luxury escapes package . We accepted the upgrade offered at about $56 AU dollars per night , to a pool access room. Given how hot it was at this time of the year ( June) this was the best decision ever. We retired from the beach after lunch to our deck with access to the pool and pool bars. In June , wing 3 receives afternoon shade , but I understand at other times of the year wing 4 receives afternoon shade. We normally only frequent boutique resorts and so were a bit hesitant about what to expect at JW which is a huge resort. Well we were very pleasantly surprised. The service from each and every staff member we encountered was outstanding. Plus an added bonus was the choice and standard of food , albeit that we were on a…

title: Fabulous place to take a break
review: Dear WaWa1963,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Brisbane!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Fantastic Place & Lovely Staff
review: What a great place for a relaxing holiday or in my case as it was dubbed a 'divorcation'!  I had originally booked a Luxury Escapes 8 night Voucher in April 2014 to visit with my now Ex Husband.  Can I say a big thank you to Luxury Escapes (Deals.com) and the Reservation Staff at JW Marriott Khao Lak for helping me to rework the original booking.  The JW Marriott happily changed my original booking dates to now fall outside the Australian School Holiday time I was originally booked to go and also booked me a second room for the friends I now had travelling with me.  I was probably pretty lucky because at the time of adding another room to my booking Marriott had a 50% off room sale, inc breakfast.    So we enjoyed the Hotel under a Luxury Escapes Voucher booking and also as a…

title: Sunshine & swim
review: Dear Lozzie64,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sydney!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.
