We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommending our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: An outstanding resort
review: I have been to many places in thailand but this hotel is one of the greatest!All of the employees are expectacular in their behaviour and very hospitable!The pool is very famous because it's cleanlines and it's really big!Food is great in the restaurant and we are near to khaolak town!I really love talking to one of the staff in the breakfast area sadly I can't remember his name.  Generally I don't have any complains while staying here!I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family!

title: 9 DAYS IN PARADISE
review: We ended our stay  at the Marriott 3 days ago and all we can say is this resort is 10 out of 10 in every way. The staff including Laila, Boy, Wat and especially Nana made our stay even more rewarding as they were always smiling and spoiling us in the Waterfront Breakfast restaurant and at The Olive for Lunch.  The food is amazing and lots of variety, the Thai and Japanese restaurants are a must especially the Teppanyakki where you will be thoroughly entertained and fed delicious Australian Beef or delicious Salmon.we would highly recommend this resort as a must do when travelling to Khao Lak you will not be disappointed and also fall in love with the place like we did. forgot to mention we stayed in a pool access room and absolutely loved it as you could swim from your bedroom…

title: A cracker!
review: Dear Herb & Maureen,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Laila, Boy, Wat are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of you; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommending our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana (Nana)   Guest Relations Executive

title: Superb place to stay
review: Like many others, we ended up staying 8 nights at the JWM as part of the Luxury Escapes deal, and we loved it!   Fabulous well appointed ground floor room with direct pool access. Everyone knows how good the pool is, and its true. We were in room 4012, which seemed to be the perfect location for almost everything. More details on room numbers at the bottom...  We ate so much it was crazy.... Breakfast was always a great start to the day. We loved it and the kids always left happy, so that was a bonus. Lunch was just what lunch needed to be - tasty and fresh. Choice of A-La-Carte and buffet. Dinner was the best, being able to choose from any of the resorts restaurants. The Thai and Japanese restaurants were our favourites. Make sure you keep your eyes open for the special…

title: Great location, good staff, nice rooms but beware of the mosquitoes
review: Dear Nick E,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort grounds, the Deluxe Pool Access room, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the breakfast, lunch and dinner, the spa especially your favorite therapist ‘Nok’ and the kids club    We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommending our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Pretty damn awesome
review: Just returned after spending 8 nights with the Luxury Escape Package. We upgraded to the pool access room. We had a wonderful stay. All the staff, meals, beach and pools were fantastic. We didn't expect the meals to be as great as they were. Breakfast was delicious and such an array of food. Lunch was plentiful and dinners consisted of 3 courses in a choice of Thai, Japanese and Mediterranean. All are Delicious.The day spa was perfect. We have only praise for the resort and the staff. Would highly recommend to everybody. Thank you JW Marriott for helping us enjoy a wonderful holiday.

title: Great stay!
review: We had a pool access room and it was great to be able to jump right into the pool. It was a workout of sort to attempt to navigate the entire length of the pool.   The breakfast was awesome, great variety and excellent quality. The staff in the restaurant seems to radar for empty plates and they whip it off your table as soon as you are done, even though the the restaurant was always crowded. And this level of service was consistent throughout the entire resort.   We had a great stay.

title: Marriott Khao Lak
review: Dear AfflatedMizzlinG,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday on July 2014.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the room location,the pool, the breakfast and the associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: We had a great time!
review: Excellent .  The pool is the first thing that hits you😎omg great .  Staff so friendly . Found such friendly Thai people through out our stay. There was many Australians to pass on much friendly advise.W e had all meals included. The spa treatments are all so fantastic. Enjoyed spa treatments with your other half or friend😘. Their travel guides need to experience what there selling the only down fall.

title: Relaxing do nothing holiday!
review: Dear Diane W,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool, the friendly associates and the spa.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time recommending our resort and sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Paradise
review: It was already the 2nd stay and we enjoyed it again. The staff is very friendly, it's clean everywere and the rooms are big enough to stay two weeks. If you prefer an room with view, request a high floor. We had a very nice romantic dinner at the beach, organized by the hotel, you shouldn't miss that, it's worth it.

title: EXCELLENT
review: We stayed here for 8 nights in April 2015.  Everything about this hotel lives up to its 5 star rating and well deserved.  We had a pool access room and it was wonderful.  Nikolas in Reception was so friendly and helpful and he said he would give us the best room in the world and he did (probably says that to all the guests but we were very impressed anyway).  Our room was kept beautifully clean and all meals were first class.  The staff were all very warm and helpful especially Tin in the restaurant every day for breakfast and lunch.  The only downside would be the drink/cocktail prices which in our opinion were very expensive . Too pricey to spend more than the happy hour in the bar.  We did spoil ourselves with a cocktail every night with dinner then went to the bar on the…

title: Went as 'destination' wedding guest
review: Dear Adrian R,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Hobart!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our pool access room, the bar, the spa and the warm and helpful associates. We will certainly ensure to recognize Nicholas and Tin, for their outstanding service and efforts.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time recommending our resort and sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Very pleasant stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: We stayed here 3 nights starting from 28th May-15. Takes an hour and 20 minutes from the Phuket airport depending on traffic. Recommending using a cab if you're in a smaller group, will save you quarter of an hour. Checkin is seamless. Best rooms are the ones that open into the pool because the entire resort is connected via the pool.  Private beach but honestly, the pool is so amazing we hardly felt like leaving it at all. Service is good, good (as I always find with jw resorts) could be far better. Bar is nice, great place for a family of four. Wouldn't come here with older members of the family as have to walk a lot d and buggies are not always readily available especially during peak hours.

title: Service needs improving
review: Dear Rantsfromragz,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!   First of all, we would like to thank you for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during the wedding.   It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the guest room, the pool, the beach and the service.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time recommending our resort and sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Super Resort
review: We stayed at this lovely resort on a 10 day luxury escapes deal from 18th May with two other couples.  We all had delux pool access rooms which was a very good choice and would recommend spending the extra for these rooms.  Our room was 3018 and I think the best position at the resort.  Our room opened to covered verandah area and then straight onto steps into the pool.  Was not too far from the pool bar and another shallower area with some seating in the pool.  We spent hours swimming and relaxing in the pool with our friends.  Our room was large with king bed and extremely comfortable. Decorated in traditional Thai.   Our luxury escapes deal included all meals.  The restaurants were very high standard with a great choice in each.  The staff were amazing and friendly and their…

title: Beyond amazing..
review: Stayed for 1 week the first time .. Stayed 2 weeks the second time... Pure bliss... Could not fault anything about this location and hotel. Staff were friendly and willing to meet all needs. Beach perfection.. The pool was a highlight.. The last time we stayed there the hotel was completely booked out, but you would never know because of the vastness of the pool, it gave a secluded feel.. Food..fantastic .. Cooking school a must .. A beautiful ,romantic ,peaceful holiday,that will have you returning again and again.

title: A Wonderful Relaxing Holiday
review: Dear Connie C,            Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Adelaide!      First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa as your preferred 2nd time holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our resort location, the friendly associates, the beach, the pool, the fantastic food and cooking class.    We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again for a 3rd time to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: A grand hotel with a access to a grand beach
review: We have recently returned from an 11 night stay (10 night Luxury Escape Package) and what a wonderful place it is.  We had a deluxe pool access room in Wing 1 (Room 1024) and it was in a perfect position, top end near the beach of Wing 1.  The room itself was large and comfortable with the King Size bed... tonnes of wardrobe space and a huge bathroom.  No problem with wi-fi while we were here, worked fine all over the resort.  A few stepping stones passed the little garden straight into the pool.  And what a fantastic pool it is, a lot of the time we had the pool to ourselves or so we thought, it is massive and winds around the whole resort.   The resort was only about 1/3 full whilst we were here, so there was no problem getting whatever deck chair you wanted, whether it was by…

title: Impeccable Luxury Beach Resort
review: Dear SharenG22,           Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to New Castle!     First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the guest room, the resort grounds, the beach, the associates, the restaurants, the breakfast buffet and the massages. We will certainly ensure to recognize ‘Laila’, for her outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Best Resort
review: We stayed here just before Christmas 2014 with our 3 yo and 3 month old boys for 5 nights.  The Good: The pools are very grand. Beach is the best in Khao Lak Breakfast buffet is one of the best we have ever had. The staff are very friendly and happy - always accommodating. They often have theme nights with international cuisine with outdoor seating and fire show - kids could run around - food was fantastic. Whilst their wasn't a lot of families their, the families that were there were very friendly. The food at all the restaurants was excellent. The gym is excellent for a hotel.   The Bad: Our room smelt of damp and mould - we were in a room with pool access. The majority of guests staying were in their 50's and 60's and were very conservative and not too friendly.....probably…

title: Best JW Marriott I've Ever Enjoyed
review: I'm a frequent hotel traveler, been to several JW's and the service, the staff, the grounds and the food within the resort are terrific.  Best resort overall - EVER.  Thank you Khao Lak resort staff! EVERY staff person we encountered was courteous and helpful if needed.

title: AWESOME BLISS
review: Dear Sims A,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the terrific service, associates, the grounds and the food. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Relaxing family holiday
review: We visited our friends who were staying at this report so it was a rushed trip and only one night. We chose to visit them as one of them requires wheel chair access so it was not easy for them to visit us in Phuket. Well, I must say that the resort was awesome and our room exceeded expectations. The staff and the meals we had there ( Japanese ) and breakfast was out of this world. Thoroughly recommend. I question whether the hotel is 'wheelchair friendly' as advertised due to my observations of my friend. The staff for this purpose are 200%, the room is equipped for wheel chair access and is great. An easy run from the lobby to their room with assistance from ever willing staff, you could not fault. However, there are stairs everywhere, no lifts so for her to go anywhere else in…

title: Very friendly and considerate staff, pool is excellent
review: Dear Felty55,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa Port Lincoln!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable with ‘wheelchair friendly’ experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the resort grounds, the room, the awesome associates and the meals.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommend our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Outstanding
review: The Marriott Khao Lak is a great hotel to stay on a family holiday. We stayed here for 6 nights, and had a lovely time.  The pool of course is huuuuge, the kids got lost for days, and really enjoyed themselves.  The food was great, we had some really nice meals in the different restaurants.   Lovely stay and will return back some day with the kids into some of the new refurbished rooms.

title: Perfect Weekend
review: We went to Khao Lak for a weekend and this time we tried the first time the JW. Whow! Beach, Pool, Gym, Staff and the ambiance excellent. It is  world-class like all the other Marriott hotels and resorts.The staff deserve a A+. The rooms itself need some "renovation" however we noticed that this is already ongoing - without disturbing the guests. It was perfect and definitely not the last time!

title: Fantastic Resort
review: Dear Walter Benno S,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday weekend. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the beach, the pool, the fitness center, the associates and the guest room.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: unforgettable holiday
review: We have just returned from our trip to Thailand. Staying in the marriott for 7 nights was a highlight of the trip. The staff here were incredible. Very friendly and professional. I arranged for a romantic dinner on the beach in order to pop the question to my girlfriend. She said yes! :) Although the weather was against us we had such a special evening. Our waiter Na was brilliant and deserves a special mention. Escorting us inside when the rain came in under an umbrella then arranging to us to float a Chinese lantern into the sky (nice touch....even though the rain came back so it crashed and burnt!) The food at the Olive restaurant was incredible. Our room with pool access was beautiful. Highly recommend as that pool is so inviting. We spent many an hour floating round it.…

title: Disappointed beyond words
review: Dear Stubrownlfc,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   First of all, we would like to congratulate of your proposal! How gratifying to read your nice words about our brilliant associate ‘Na’ on your romantic dinner, the incredible food, the guest room and the pool. We will certainly ensure to recognize Na and Si, for their outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Awesome Place!
review: The staff at JW Marriott made us feel welcome and pampered from our pick up at the airport. On arrival, you are in awe of how stunning this place is. The unbelievable pool, manicured gardens, spa facilities and the restaurants on site...., top class quality food. My husband and I cannot find a single thing that we would've liked changed. The only decisions we had to make was do we swim in the pool or stay at the beach. Either way, a place we could enjoy our drinks and cocktails. They have everything covered. A very very restful and enjoyable holiday we won't forget for some time. Thank you especially to the staff there who were always so happy and obliging. See you again soon!

title: Excellent service, beautiful beach and amazing pool
review: We had a fantastic stay at the resort. The weather forecast for our stay was rain, rain, rain - but it turned out to be sunny every day!  The pool is amazing. We had a pool access room, and enjoyed our evening swims around the hotel area.   The beach is also so beautiful! No sun beds made the scenery even more fantastic and authentic.   This resort is a few kilometers outside the "city centre", but there are restaurants and massages right outside. Only a short walk on the beach will lead you to a strip with restaurants. I recommend to visit Lai Thai restaurant. They had the best food and service on "the strip".  We stayed a week at the resort, and never left. We had all we could wish for: good food, excellent Thai service and amazing surroundings. Will be back for sure!

title: very spacious resort
review: Dear Johanneslt,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our pool, the guest room, the hotel grounds, the beach, the food and the service.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Tranquility and bliss
review: Several large pool areas,very neat well appointed rooms. Good food offer Thai cooking  classes and several other activities. Great for families and couples also plenty of room to get away from kids if desired.  Right on the Andaman Sea  A little  out of the way  but well worth the travel.

title: First trip to Thailand
review: Dear davo158,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Parreara!     Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our resort’s pool, the guest room, the food and the facilities.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: No entertainment. Dead from nightfall.
review: We stayed for four wonderful night in a Deluxe room. With it's lively balcony overlooking the meandering pool and lush greenery, the room was so relaxing. The hotel is sprawling yet gives the impression of being cosy and intimate. The infinity pool with the jacuzzi is great. Be sure to take advantage of the happy hour and enjoy the cocktails- especially the Mojito. The beach is gorgeous and with plenty of sun beds you don't need to worry about reserving the lounges. The spa is quite expensive and better value is the Andaman massage place just on the right of the beach (facing the sea). Breakfast is fantastic with many options including delicious fresh juice.

title: Thai heaven
review: What a beautiful resort from the moment you arrive the foyer is magnificent with views to 3.5k pool and ocean beyond Staff helpful professional with the gracious Thai attitude The hotel for this standard is remarkably inexpensive  The food so far great and 4 restaurants plus a coffee shop to choose from Spa treatments amazing as are the mojitos

title: Almost Perfect
review: Dear GMD1414,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about our beautiful resort, the professional and helpful associates, the restaurants and the spa.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommend our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Top marks for top staff
review: We stayed here for the second week of our 2 center holiday in in Thailand (first week in Krabbi) We just love Khao Lak and the miles of unspoiled beaches ..The Hotel is a typical prestigious large chain hotel, maybe even a bit too big for our liking but the position is just great and you can walk for miles in either direction and stop at numerous beach side bars serving local food and offering various massage alternatives The scenery and the beaches are just some of the most beautiful anywhere.. The hotel breakfast buffet is just amazing offering every conceivable food you could want, bespoke smoothies you name it they serve it and a great place to start your day. We did not eat any evening meals in the hotel as prefer to travel out and visit local more rustic eateries. Which…

title: Just  An Amazing Resort
review: Dear Kingfisher1959,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.   It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the resort grounds, the beach and the breakfast (especially the smoothies).   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommend our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: The most amazing hotel in the world for a swimming enthusiast family!
review: What a lovely resort. We enjoyed an 8 night stay with all meals and several spa sessions included.  The staff are absolutely outstanding from the cleaners to the groundkeepers to wait staff and reception all were absolutely top of the class. The resort grounds are immaculate, the pool is just beautiful and the beach is well equipped with lounges and beach umbrellas (watch for stingers).  Dining at the resort was a pleasure. We booked in to each of the restaurants and they were all good with the Thai perhaps being our favourite although Japanese was good too. We loved our spa sessions, and the spa itself is really lovely. If you have bought a package that includes spa sessions I would book them in as soon as possible as the spa is very busy.  If the Hotel is at peak occupancy…

title: All About The Pool
review: This is a beautiful resort with the most amazing swimming pool. We had a pool access room which only made the experience all the better. Good place to hang around all day without having to leave the resort at all. Spacious room and comfortable beddings. Many facilities in the resort to fill time. Had a wonderful time and will definitely visit again.

title: Shoddy Customer Service
review: Dear JLMY1301,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our pool, the pool access room and the hotel facilities. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommend our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great place to relax and forget the pressure of life on the treadmill
review: If you are Indians avoid the place, and if vegetarians, avoid like plague.  As Indians, the staff is impolite with you - they almost mock at you.   As a family we had booked the Thai dinner two days in advance, and they also confirmed our booking the previous day. At the dinner time, their Thai restaurant was shut for maintenance, and we were being forced into the buffet - which actually had no vegetarian options except the raw vegetables.   The management at the restaurant was barely co-operative, and expected us to accommodate with whatever was available. As a family most of us escaped to the Deli - which was a relief and the lady [Keh] was extremely helpful and accomodating. We did our next three dinners at the Deli - as none of the buffet options were good enough.  Even the…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear GajriaMB,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience.  I am deeply saddened to read of the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. Please accept my sincerest apologies and I will follow up immediately and once more with our team to ensure these issues will not reoccur.  I understand clearly the frustrations and doubts that you might have and would like to assure you that your experience has not gone unnoticed. We all hope that the stay will not caused you to judge Marriott differently.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to regain your trust and welcome you to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell  Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Best holiday ever.  Want to go back now.
review: For such a large property the Marriott does it so well. Every guest is special, nothing too much of a problem for the staff. I knew we were going to love every day. Our holiday began with an hour and a half wait at Phuket airport while we waited for other guests to arrive to share our transfer to the hotel. The wait had nothing to do with the hotel but the wait was obviously communicated to the hotel and half way back to the Marriott our driver passed me his mobile phone. It was the check in desk apologising for our delay and let me know they had upgraded our room to Premium. The check-in along with so many aspects in the hotel was personalised and attentive. The staff across all sectors were charming and displayed a genuine pleasure in serving you. Special thanks to our room…

title: Beautiful hotel and location
review: Just got back from a 10 night stay at the Marriott khao lak. The hotel and location are beautiful, the staff are friendly and helpful. The swimming pool which runs right throughout the grounds is awesome, and you can drop straight into the pool from your terrace (if you have a poolside room) the beach is lovely and there are plenty of sun loungers.  We were on a bed and breakfast basis and the breakfasts were excellent-a choice of everything you could possibly want. We found we didn't need to eat again until dinner. There are a few things to be aware of: The food and drink are very expensive, all prices are exclusive of service charge and government tax and these invisible charges add 25% to every item. For example a small beer is 169 baht but after taxes and service, this is…

title: Khao Lak Amazing!!
review: Dear Leitrimlad,  greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Telford, UK. It was a pleasure to  have you here in May 2015.  It is nice to read your like our really enormously big pool and our opulent breakfast.  It is a pity to hear you suffered from the vary rare time of the year when we had some jelly fishes in the sea. All the coast line for all hotels it is the same situation, but we can assure you that the jelly fishes come to the shore only once or twice per year for about a week.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Worth The Trip!
review: Had an amazing package holiday with friends at the JW Marriott Khao Lak!  Was such a beautiful place and the location right on the beach was stunning.  Was so nice to be away from the hustle and bustle of Phuket and yet you still had enough local shops and restaurants in the township only 7 or so km away by taxi.    The staff were so friendly especially the restaurant staff which made our dining great fun, Laila, Boy, and several others I forget their names but we all loved our meals especially breakast in the waterfront.  Our daughters got their hair braided at the first massage place to the right of the resort when looking at the beach and they did an amazing job.  Was still going strong two weeks later!  Also we had a lot of fun at the Andaman Restaurant also on the beach…

title: beautiful hotel, amazing lagoon style pool, amazing spa!
review: Dear Kerstinaxt,  as a valued guest, we appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you had a great stay.  We are happy you felt that the staff was so friendly - especially the restaurant staff with Laila and Boy - which made your dining great fun.  Thank you for sharing your impressions: "Was such a beautiful place and the location right on the beach was stunning. Was so nice to be away from the hustle and bustle...'  Our very best regards to Sydney also to your husband and your lovely daughters!  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Outstanding location and Staff
review: Despite some problems with our initial transportation to the hotel thanks to Vacations By Marriott (not the hotel’s fault), from the moment we walked into the resort it was a wonderful holiday. My only negative experience on this stay was a result of booking through, and the customer service from, Vacations By Marriott. The resort staff were all wonderful, helpful people.  The resort grounds are quite large and there are quite a few rooms however, thanks to the size of the resort and it’s rather remote location, it’s very easy to feel secluded and find some peace and quiet. There are a number of families at the resort but I wouldn’t let that deter you if you’re looking for relaxation.   The location is isolated – there is not another resort for some distance so there is a ton of…

title: Really disappointed
review: looks like a 5 star, when you arrive, but once you look closely it is very tired  and over rated. overpriced . The gardens and pool are wonderful. Rooms small and are well worn. when does a hotel who charges an extremely overpriced high season charge close the main rest rooms for renovations. Big area for breakfast and good selections, but  one wall has six of the dirtiest power points you will ever see. Repairs  have done but so badly that they stand out  and become highlights

title: Love it!
review: Dear Christine H,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melburne!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you took your valuable time writing us about your experience in March 2015.  We really appreciate your nice words about our pool and gardens.  On ther other hand we are ashtonished you consider our rooms as small as they are at least 45 sqm plus 10 sqm balcony, wich is not small compared with other 5 star hotels in Thailand.  I am deeply saddened we could not meet your expectations but once again thank you for writing us your feedback.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Best hotel I have stayed in
review: We stayed 3nights 4 days just last 28-April-2015  and we not just enjoyed, had fun but very satisfied with our experience here. I give 3 thumbs up to all the staff & crew! Very friendly and what i really like in their service "unique & excellent" service, housekeeping goes around everyday to ask you what you need ( toiletries, water, tea) its like buying in the grocery. No need to call they are anticipating your needs. Facility, food, everything is really amazing!

title: Fun Family Resort
review: Dear rhadyx,  sunny greetings to Dubai from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Thank you for sharing your experience in April 2015 at our Resort through this portal.   We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay and that you had fun. It is a pleasure to read that you rate our service unique & excellent and that we anticipated your needs. Thank you for your nice words about our facilities and food as well.  With a spirit to serve, we take great pride in not only meeting, but exceeding your expectations. Thank you again for your time and come visit us again soon!  Best regards  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: FUN-tastic!!!
review: This hotel is first class all the way.  The pool access rooms are amazing.  There is nothing better then to wake up in the morning and jump in the pool right from your room.  The breakfast buffett is great.  I had plans to do so many things in Khao Lak, but I only left the resort to go to the little beach shack restaurant next to the hotel.  If you want to splurge on a nice hotel, this one is highly recommended.

title: Amazing location and fantastic Resort
review: We have recently returned from 10 nights at this incredible resort.  We purchased a luxury escape package which included a deluxe pool room, all meals and spa treatments.  The rooms were a decent size and accommodated 2 adults and our 3 small children very well.  Being right on the doorstep of the amazing pool was fantastic.  The food was simply stunning, we had 3 meals a day every day for 10 days and I don't think we ever had a bad meal.  The breakfast buffet is outstanding, massive selection and extremely friendly staff in the mornings.  All the evening restaurants were excellent, one suggestion is make sure you always book, we missed out on tables a couple of times as we forgot to do so. The facilities are excellent, the spa treatments were bliss and very peaceful and…

title: Wonderfully relaxing family holiday
review: Dear louisepetrie75,  thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your most valuable days of the year and for taking time to share your impressions with other travelers in this forum.  We are glad to read all your positive comments about our resort, such as big rooms, excellent spa, food, gym and WIFI... and what a pity that our kids club and our non-smoking zones could not meet your expectations - we will work on that.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Kind regards  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: JW  Marriott Khao Lak
review: We have recently returned from 10 nights at this resort. We were after a holiday where we could relax, enjoy the weather and the kids could play. All this was achieved here. Our booking was for a standard pool access room but we were able to upgrade to a family pool access room the next day. The extra space was great and the pool access from this room was better as the pool was shallower allowing our kids to play by themselves. The staff were amazing throughout the resort and we made friends with a number of people there. Our favourite things were: the large pool near the beach; watching the late night soccer games our young boys played with the security staff while we were eating at the Olive restaurant and the lovely staff we spoke to every day with special mention to Tin,…

title: Pure Paradise
review: Dear Rachel and familiy,  thank you for choosing JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for your most valuable days of the year and for taking time to share your impressions with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read that you appreciate our spacious family rooms and that especially your children enjoyed staying with us. I cite you with pleasure: "Our favourite things were:The large pool near the beach; watching the late night soccer games our young boys played with the security staff while we were eating at the Olive restaurant and the lovely staff we spoke to every day with special mention to Tin, Leila, Honey and Beer. We all used and enjoyed the extra activities such as the gym, table tennis, squash, eight ball, kids club, boogie boards etc."  Thank you also for the good compliments for our Spa and house keeping.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Best regards  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Nice upgrade but that was it!!!
review: A Wonderful holiday we had at this resort in April 2015, for us it was relaxed bliss, the staff were great and the 3-4 restaurants provided a wonderful selection of cuisine , the beach was wonderful to swim at  as well as all that pool... I wold highly recommend.

title: Good, but has issues that need to be fixed
review: My family and I have just returned from 5 days at the JW Marriott Khao Lak. First the good: as many other reviewers have said, the pools are amazing, the breakfast fantastic, and most of the staff very friendly and helpful. However there are four issues that need fixing:  First, the water slide (in the pool between wings 3 and 4) is mounted so the end of it is a couple of inches above the water. I didn't think this was a big deal until my seven year old son went down the slide lying on his back with his hands behinds his head, as instructed on the sign. He slid down the slide feet first, then as his feet and body entered the water he got a nasty bump on the back of his head (just below where his hands were clasped) from the bottom of the slide. I both saw and heard this happen.…

title: Everyone should be so lucky
review: HanoiFoodie,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.   It it a pleasure to read "the pools are amazing, the breakfast fantastic, and most of the staff very friendly and helpful."  Please be assured the other 2 bigger and 2 minor mentioned issues are under our investigation and we truly would like to express our appreciation for your comments as these help us to increase our service quality.  Thank you again for your time and come visit us again soon!  Best regards  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A wonderful holiday
review: Having purchased a "Package Deal" in Australia, I somewhat expected there to be a lot of "fill" where undertakings were honoured, but nothing exceptional. Indeed the experience has now become a marked highlight in our years of retirement travel. We have also stayed at Marriotts in San Diego and Minneapolis which also proved to be good experiences, but must continue to commend the J W Marriott, Khoa Lak as an exceptional, positive experience.  We also witnessed the staff go to extraordinary lengths and trouble for an Indian Wedding across three days. each day was a different theme and area requiring set up and dismantle. Then on the last day, a thunderstorm destroyed all preparations just five minutes before ceremony deadline. All recreated in the Conference Centre.  Well done.…

title: Awesome Holiday
review: Dear mhaseler,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travellers in this forum.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience:  "...Indeed the experience has now become a marked highlight in our years of retirement travel. ", which makes us proud.  Furthermore, thank you very much for recommending our package deal for Australia.  Especially your feedback that our associates did a fantastic job (not only during the Indian wedding) is indeed worth to share with our entire team.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Kind regards  Jorg Wilsdorf Marketing Manager JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Not the same anymore
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our 8 nights at this fantastic resort.  It is not often that a place looks EXACTLY like the brochures etc.  We had a poolside deluxe access room, highly recommended.  The room was spacious and comfortable chairs both in and out.  Breakfast great, and even a kid free zone, which was restful.   The grounds are so spacious there was never a feeling of crowds.  The swimming canals are just plain amazing - they go for kilometres! We swam three times a day, always a different way to go.  Ample chairs at the beach, never any trouble finding one just where you wanted.  Three great restaurants. The staff were unfailingly courteous and helpful.  Not really a shopping holiday, the little town nearby very basic, but a simply wonderful coffee shop not far from the…

title: Absolutely wonderful family resort
review: I stayed here with my family of four children the week before Songkran and was absolutely blown away.  I was a little bit tentative, as I had purchased two rooms through the Luxury Escapes deal but I soon found out I had nothing to fear.  This hotel is absolutely amazing.  The 3KM long (!!!) lagoon is simply wonderful - exploring it with the kids was great fun.  The restaurants were great (especially Sakura Japanese - special thanks to head chef "Mr Pop" who made my kids feel very special) and the breakfasts were amazing.  I've stayed everywhere from mid-tier hotels like Holiday Inn to super-luxury resorts like the Bali St Regis ($1,000 a night!) and the breakfast buffet here is as good as any of them.  The staff just loved my kids and were super friendly.  I can't praise this…

title: Relaxing Thailand Beach Break
review: Dear Omaca69,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!           Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort location, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the restaurants and the breakfast. We will certainly ensure to recognize Mr.Pop, for his outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommend our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Good but missing the WOW factor
review: We were looking for a week's rest and relaxation in a quiet and peaceful setting and Khao Lak and the JW Marriott really delivered.  Travelling with a Luxury Escapes package we had meals and spa treatments included and were really happy with every aspect of the deal.  We loved our pool access room on Wing 2 which was private with a lovely garden screen in front of our balcony.  We swam from our room to the swim up bar for happy hour every day (happy hour cocktails highly recommended!!).  The  hotel location is fairly isolated which has it's benefits if you're looking for a relaxing beach break (we could walk for miles up the beach without seeing another soul).  We could always find a quiet spot to laze right on the beach front or poolside in private adults only secluded areas…

title: Disappointment of KHAO LAK
review: Dear KaznPete2013,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!           Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your comments about the hotel grounds, the guest room, the beach and the friendly associates.  We have well noted your comments about the disruption of the restaurants. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Please accept our sincerest apologies and we will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us and recommend our resort; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in the near future!     Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Excellent
review: This is a good hotel, excellent service, nice rooms, good restaurants, nice beach, good pools but somehow this just missed the WOW factor that I was expecting. It was missing the Thai charm. The pool access is excellent but I found the water too hot and not at all private. There are also a number of good restaurants and massage places outside the hotel on the beach to the right. WIFI was sporadic and didn't work everywhere. You will not be disappointed if you book here...but I just feel that there might have been better alternatives.

title: Beautiful hotel for gateways/ traveling with family
review: Was staying here for 11 nights during my trip to Thailand with my grandmother and fiancé.  It was an absolutely stunning environment and property at this Marriott hotel.  The hotel is perfect for a couples gateway as much as it is for families.  The front desk supervisor ( do not recall his name, Niehang is my best guess! ) was very helpful at our late night check in.   Nice big rooms, and the bathtube was huge.  We fell in love with the  beach restaurant at the left of the hotel, and both ate lunch and dinner there. But of course we grew tired of it and started eating at the hotel.  We tried Ta Krai, Olive and the poolbar. Ta Krai had a wonderful atmosphere and great food. Service was also excellent. One of the managers ( don't recall her name, but she was laughing a lot!)…

title: Elegance at its finest
review: My husband and I, along with our two children aged 12 and 11 have just received from a 2 week stay at the Marriott.  We have all had an amazing time in such a wonderful setting.  The beach is incredible and the kids loved body boarding every day in the sea which was wonderfully warm.  If you enjoy a stroll along the beach this is the place to be - you can walk for miles and pass very few people.  The hotel itself, although big and full for part of our stay never felt crowded and even the breakfast which a few reviews have said could be busy, seemed well organised and the choice was first class.    We made full use of all the sports facilities; playing squash everyday and my son loved the thai boxing lessons.  We also enjoyed the bike ride to the waterfall.  All the staff were…

title: Simply Stunning

Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: what was incredible hotel
review: My husband and our two boys, aged 3 and 5 have just returned from our 10 night stay at the Marriott, and what can I say but WOW. We all absolutely LOVED it, and wouldn't hesitate to go back in a heartbeat.  Everything was top class, the staff just beautiful and friendly - Laila, Tui Tui, Asha, Wat, just to name a few, made us feel part of the Marriott "family", and our boys adored them.  The pool areas were relaxing, great cocktails, the restaurants amazing, my favourite was Olive, I could eat there every day, I loved the cuisine, just delicious.  The kid's club was a big hit with our boys, who enjoyed the activities and meeting other children.  We were in a deluxe room in Wing 4, and the room was so spacious with a king bed and two single beds for our boys, and we still had…

title: A perfect beach resort
review: Everything is perfect about this JW property:  - A beautiful beach stretch - Lovely rooms - The most wonderful swimming pool which runs past your room wherever you are - Most courteous and efficient service - the staff is just amazing - Delicious food - tried most of their restaurants - every single one of them served very well crafted, finger licking dishes - At the time we were there, the resort was running some really great promotions  This is a must do! You'll feel rested, taken care of and love every bit of it.

title: Excellent hotel, we will return
review: Dear nature_traveler101,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bengaluru! title: Good but not great
review: Myself and my wife have just returned from our 2 week stay at the JW Marriott Khao Lak, and loved every minute.  We were looking for a chilled out resort and this was just that. We had a swim up room in wing 3 just a few yards away from the pool bar. The rooms themselves are large, very clean and tastefully decorated. With a massive walk in shower and a bath that was as nearly as big. The hotel grounds are beautiful and are always kept immaculate with a team of gardeners and pool staff always working away. We found the hotel staff to be very friendly and always happy to help.  The breakfast buffet was one of the best we have had, so much choice and excellent quality. We were bed and breakfast and only ate at the hotel on a evening twice, the food was excellent but as everybody…

title: Beach get away
review: Dear Daniel H,     Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sunderland! title: Perfect
review: To start my review I will mention we bought a 8 night package which included buffet breakfast, buffet lunch and 3 course dinner and we are still at the resort now.  POSITIVES The ground and rooms are huge and beautiful, with a massive pool that you can actually get lost in and is incredibly well maintained and serviced. The housekeeping comes twice a day.  The buffet breakfast is amazing, with food from across the globe and friendly cooks and chefs who will make you specialty dishes.  The staff are warm and friendly and always saying hello with a smile, which makes the next part hard to write.  NEGATIVES The buffet lunch is very so so with a lot of left overs. We were told the first time we attended lunch we were only allowed the buffet. we have found out today this is in fact…

title: Absolutely Perfect!
review: Just got back from 8 wonderful days at is resort. Could not fault a thing. Wonderful staff who could not do more to make the holiday just perfect. We booked through Luxury Escapes with meals, massages & a cooking class included. Everything was better than expected. Beautiful serene location, no nightlife so if that's what you're after, perhaps choose something less remote. This is THE place if you want to completely unwind & recharge. Thank you to the staff for their superb service, endless pool, beautiful grounds & serenity.

title: Amazing view, great service .... Must visit
review: Dear Zedelli,    Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Griffith! title: Perfect family resort
review: Visited the hotel with family over Songkran holidays. Had high expectations from the bit that I heard about this place. Experience generally exceeded expectations. One of the best beaches I have visited in Thialand over the last 5 years, hotel service was prompt and efficient, English well spoken and understood by the staff, good resturants within the hotel (continent food was great, Japanese okay, didn't try the Thai). Nice play area and a Deli for family to enjoy .... Two things that they can improve upon a) wifi in the room didn't work consistently, and b) pool cleaning could be improved. Will visit again .... Highly recommended with family.

title: Really stunning - thoroughly enjoyed
review: Dear Khun Kaleem R,   Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bangkok!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. We have well noted your feedback about the wifi and the pool experience. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Excellent in every aspect
review: My family stayed here for 8 nights, and could have stayed for 80! The rooms were big, great sized balconies and the pool access rooms looked brilliant! We didn't book the pool access because we were worried about our little one getting in to the water, but after seeing the security fence / glass fenced balconies, I would book pool access next time. The food was exceptional at all of the restaurants, and if you wanted to eat elsewhere, there were plenty to choose from on the beach just outside the resort.  The facilities were terrific. The gym was amazing and well stocked, plus there were so many additional free activities to join in each day, such as fit ball class, yoga, dance etc. plus you could hire stand up paddle boards and more. There were also lots of non-exercise…

title: Amazing family holiday
review: We have just returned from a two week stay at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak. We loved it - it was perfect and amazing. We have 3 children and had interconnecting rooms which were ideal. the rooms are kept spotless, very luxurious, the maids work hard and we tipped them to show our appreciation. Beautiful location - right on the beach. The sunset is wonderful.  This was our first time in Thailand and won't be our last. We enjoyed the surrounding area of Khao Lak (especially the market on a Weds and a Sat) The staff at this hotel were brilliant and very polite. They can't do enough for you.  The swimming pool is one of the best I have ever come across. Even though on our 2nd week the hotel was full it didn't feel like it due to how spread out the resort is.  The facilities and…

title: LUXURIATING....!
review: Dear Springy8,              Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! title: Absolutely perfect
review: Beautiful resort - self contained! Service is not 100 percent up to the JW mark but this could be because the property is extremely widespread...  Rooms are comfortable and well appointed. The meandering pool is unique.... The beach very well maintained. Food was great....  Recommended!

title: Our most amazing holiday
review: Dear PI THAI HOLIDAY C,             Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bangkok!       Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Paradise just fabulous.
review: Stunning resort. Booked through luxury escapes,all the beautiful meals were included. Been to Thailand many times and this was the most incredible resort we have ever stayed in. Staff so friendly,resort so clean.will definitely be back..AWESOME..

title: Amazing resort with the best pool I've seen. Also Chefs and service are awesome
review: Visited the hotel for 4 nights / 5 days with family. We had 3 rooms, two premium lagoon views and one suite. The rooms were vey good and very spacious. Even the basic ones had a hot-tub and spacious bathroom. They also had balconies.  But the best part about the hotel is definitely its pool. Travelled a lot but never seen a pool this amazing. It almost connects every room at the ground level in the hotel. I would actually suggest getting a pool access room because it's totally worth it.   The hotel is huge so walking to the lobby or gym or fitness center or spa maybe tiring at times. But with a super nice beach, I've not come across such a relaxing place.  A special shout out to Chef Lucky and his team (Chef Mong, etc). We had special dietary preferences and the chef went out of…

title: One of the Best
review: My wife and I have just returned from a two week stay at the Marriott booked through Thomson. The transfer time from Phuket Airport is about an hour and a half. You are greeted with cold drink and towel on arrival at the hotel,the check in process was very quick and efficient . We had booked a garden view room intially,but upgraded to a pool access room after a couple of days because our room had an adjoining door and we found it noisy from the room next door. The grounds and public areas are large but kept clean and tidy by the staff. The pool and the lazy river are huge and staff work all day to keep them clean. Breakfast is first class with a wide selection of food which should suit everyone. We had a meal in the Olive restaurant and a beach barbecue celebration meal as it…

title: A fabulous retreat!
review: Dear Grant522              Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Horsham! title: family trip
review: Khao Lak is a delightful area of Thailand.  Easy to access via Phuket without the over-run and over-commercialized feel of Phuket.  A perfect get away spot for families or couples.  The property is very well maintained.  The restaurants offered an excellent selection of foods and cuisines, so everyone had something that they liked to eat.  The one area where they could use an improvement on is their beachfront BBQ event, the grilled meats where cooked to a one-size fits all approach of well-done and the line chef wasn't too keen to cook a separate piece of meat to medium-rare when asked.  Maybe he was just having an off night when we were there.  The breakfast buffet is massive and covers all sorts of ethnic food choices.  A special callout for one of the best iced coffees I've…

title: The Best Pool EVER!!!

title: Absolute Gem
review: as I write this we still have 2 days to go at this resort. Resort layout & ambience-magnificent garden setting and unbelievable pool, more like one giant canal, I have seen many pools much smaller than this and not maintained as well. A wonderful lack of chlorine smell. People- The most friendly staff I have ever come across, having travelled to many destinations, they are so humble and genuine, no pretences here. Food-just sensational, choice of Japanese, Thai and Italian, great little deli that makes the best flat white, you can even get an Aussie pie if you can't wait till you get home! Spa/massage-we had 4 each with our package, couldn't fault the options and the lovely ladies' skills. Room-we are in the 3rd wing overlooking the pool bar, nice and quiet, great beds etc My…

title: 3 times
review: Dear Kevin W,           Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are happy to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. title: Not even visited yet and already been treated badly
review: This is our 3rd stay now and we have no complaints and have noticed many improvements over the past 40 months. The resort has undertaken improvements to walk ways for prams adding ramps, and changing the board walk to concrete paths that can deal with the off season weather conditions. More beach lounges and umbrellas, on beach bar with excellent service and on the beach dining. We notice there are more families and young couples, that are attracted to the great package deals that come up, which we have taken up for each stay. We scuba dive so the resort is a great place to use as a base or to recover and relax after diving the Similan Islands and other great dive sites north of the Similans. Sea Bees have a dive office onsite making it easy to book day trips for diving or…

title: Honeymoon Paradise
review: Dear Papa G,          Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the resort location, the beach bar and entertainment, the Sax artist, the restaurants, the Thai cooking class, the Fitness center, the garden and grounds, the pool, the guest room, the food and the service.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your 4th time in November 2015!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Beautiful but pricey
review: Booked to stay 2 extra nights after a wedding. Confirmation from Event staff at hotel >2 months before due to visit. was happy and excited to get some down time after the wedding. Received an email 3 week before we are due to visit stating that hotel was busy and they could not give us a room for the last 2 nights of our stay and we would need to find alternative accommodation. What kind of customer service is this! Completely soured rest of the trip. Have had to make alternative arrangements at higher cost. Been completely put off Marriott brand. Will update the review once I have stayed.

title: Fantastic hotel, but:
review: Gorgeous location. Beautiful grounds and pool. Well organized overall. Top notch resort, but hampered a little by limited on site activities and unorganized food and beverage management.   Our family spent 3 nights here with another family and linked up with another family who had been staying there 4 nights previously. All of us walked away with the same impression, developed independently.  While the pool, swim up bars, beach, ocean are all splendid, the food and beverage management isn't as polished as it could have been, and this detracted from our experience a bit. This is in NO way reflective of the incredibly hard working, albeit understaffed, waiters and bartenders. The issue is on their management.   Examples: Czar bar - one waiter and one bartender. 50 plus people…

title: Wow
review: We have recently returned home after spending 8 blissful nights at this resort.  WOW, what a holiday!  We arrived at the resort at about 5.30pm and our 3 year old son had fallen asleep in the transportation so we were lucky enough to get a babysitter that first evening and enjoy the BBQ dinner at the beach and a few cocktails.  We were on a package and for the next 7 days ate our way around the hotel.  The breakfast buffet was definitely a standout....it was a great selection on fruits, cold meats, 2 omelette stations, smoothies, pastries....the list just goes on and on.  We really enjoyed the interactions with the staff, in particular Apple who made our flat white coffees nice and strong and was always up for a chat with a smile. Special mention must also go to Nuch and Tanny…

title: Amazing! A++
review: Dear valued guest,      Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa! Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: A truely beautiful hotel, but prices running away
review: what a special place. We got a room with balcony and direct pool access. We were in the water all day long. Breakfast is amazing too with a large selection of foods. The hotel is beautifuly decorated. The room is clean and big. The shower is amazing. One remark; food and beverage are much too expensive. They are at the level of europe. So does the travel service. A tour will cost you 100 euro in the hotel ant 60 euro outside in a travel agent.  So go outside. There are many excellent restaurants.

title: Good time with family
review: I had gone to the JW Marriott Khao Lak last year! And that's where I was proposed by my husband now :)   Cannot every forget that place! Extremely relaxing! The staff is friendly and the food is great! The Spa is amazing too...  Do not miss the fresh and chilled Coconut Water!

title: Most relaxing experience
review: We stayed at this hotel for a week. The whole hotel and its services is top quality. I reccommend it to all - couples, family etc. Hotel breakfast is the best I have had in Asia. The selection is so wide.   Only minus is the air condition in the room. It is too cold and the cleaning ladies, they put AC to maximum and 23 degrees and therefore I got my throaght sick. Hotel - please ask your staff not to touch AC while they clean up the room!  The area Kao Lak is really good (we have visited many parts on Thailand). Recommend visiting Kao Sok national park.

title: A WOW factor, but under the veneer
review: Dear Leilani L,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Tallinn,     Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination, for spending time to share your detailed feedback and recommend our beautiful resort with other travelers on this website.
