Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Enormous, over-rated hotel
review: We arrived at 13.00 having come down from Chiang Mai- we had been on the go since 05.00. The drive was impressive although the last  1.9km from the main highway was rickety at times.  We were sat down in the rather understated main reception and given some non descript red welcoming drink. The check in process was slow with a lady who was polite courteous and very corporate- were my fears about staying in an international chain hotel going to come true?  Paperwork was required even though we were on a UK tour group. Why was such information not on computer? Another member of our party did not have their detailed documents and this was got round but should not have been an issue. We were asked to sign documents and also hand over passport and credit card which were then taken out…

title: architectural delight in stunning location
review: Dear theflyingdoctor,  sunny greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us very detailed about your experience in March 2015.  We really appreciate your nice words about our excellent breakfast, the gorgeous beach views and the lively rooms.  I am deeply saddened to read of the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. Please accept my sincerest apologies and I will follow up immediately and once more with our team to ensure these issues will not reoccur.  In terms of check in, the official check in time in our resort is 3 pm as mentioned on the booking confirmation and to be asked for a passport and a credit card or a cash deposit is a common policy worldwide in almost all hotels of all categories. We never take any documents further than the reception desk and the waiting time for receiving back your credit card was purely due to the size of your group.  The safety and security of our guests is paramount for us hence we have a certified, trained and qualified security and life guard associate including all necessary rescue equipment on standby at the beach at all times.  In terms of being suitable for disabled guests, we are providing accesible guest rooms and restrooms in our resort. We are absolutely equipped and certified to accommodate disabled guests which is also occurring on a very regular basis.  The 10% service charge added to your bill are entirely and 100% passed on to our associates without any deductions. This is a pure team benefit and also extremely common in restaurants and hotels of certain categories in Thailand.  I understand clearly the frustrations and doubts that you might have and would like to assure you that your experience has not gone unnoticed. We all hope that this stay has not caused you to judge Marriott differently.  Once again thank you for writing us with your detailed feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to regain your trust and welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fabulous getaway
review: Initially deterred by the 1 hour 15 minute journey from the airport to the hotel, we arrived at the JW Marriott Khao Lak and immediately had no regrets. We were struck by the beautiful, tranquil atmosphere that contrasted markedly with the touristy hustle and bustle of Phuket.   Flawless service, luxurious yet understated bedrooms, and nice balcony overlooking the impressive 3km pool. Khao Lak Beach is one of the best beaches I've had the privilege of visiting in Thailand, and you can find excellent massage parlours along the beach for amazing value. Next door you will also find good local restaurants at a fraction of the price offered at the hotel. The best thing about the beach is its seclusion and privacy, which means you won't be approached by vendors selling you trinkets…

title: JW Marriot Kha Lak booked with Thomson Holidays
review: Dear vicky_c852  Sunny greetings to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the resort's location, the flawless service, the luxurious guest room, the beautiful beach, the breakfast and the cocktails by the beach lounges.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fabulous Resort
review: Booked this through Thomson holidays as we always have had a good experience with them. Arrived at hotel early morning for a no hassle easy check in and taken to our room - no waiting around. We had booked half board and a swim up room. Firstly the half board would highly recommend simply for the reason if you can't be bothered to wander out to eat. The food is simply brilliant with an endless choice - chefs even at hand to prepare you something of your own choice. The buffet evenings fantastic especially the Thai evenings. The room we had was probably one of the best on the resort - room 5010. The sun is on the terrace to this room from morning until night due to its location and short pitched roof. You simply don't need to move from the room if you want to just lay in the sun…

title: The Italian Restaurant is amazing
review: Dear Andy R,       Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination, for spending time to share your detailed feedback and recommend our beautiful resort with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our food and beverage, the guest room and the friendly associates.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great resort
review: Fabulous week of relaxation during Chinese New Year.  Upon checking in the front desk staff was very welcoming, delivering cool drinks and towels. We had booked a family suite with pool access, but the hotel was overbooked. The hotel compensated us by giving our family 2 rooms with pool access. The rooms were well maintained and very spacious. The breakfast buffet had plenty to offer, Indian dishes, western dishes, fresh fruit and smoothie bar, fresh pancakes and made to order omelets. The beach area was great with ample seating. The dining options on property were great. The Thai restaurant was the best. We will definitely go back.

title: Wow!!! Stunning hotel and location. Exceptional experience.
review: Not too sure what to say or what to write... I could go on and on.  We had an amazing week as part of our honeymoon, it was all we hoped for and more. The hotel is beautiful - the rooms, the buildings, the pool, the gardens, the beach, the restaurants - everything about it is exceptional.  Our room, 1008, was large and carefully furnished as was the bathroom. The bed was amazingly comfortable, excellent quality duvet and pillows. The pool access we loved, perfect for a quick dip to relax after a hearty breakfast or for a quiet evening swim. The rooms were perfectly clean and had all the amenities you could ask for.  We were sure the pool access was worthwhile before visiting and we were right. Personal recommendation would be block 1 or if jot 2. The terraces don't get much sun…

title: Great Location
review: Dear Daveh104,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Oxford!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred honeymoon destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our resort’s location, the guest room, the breakfast, the restaurant, especially your feedback that our associates were fantastic is very satisfying and we will certainly ensure share with the entire team.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your near future.   Best regards,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Good choice
review: we stayed here for 7 nights at end of a 3 week trip. We had a junior suite with pool access, do yourself a favour, pay the extra and get that.  The Breakfast is without question the best hotel breakfast ever. You want for nothing. You could fill yourself up for the day.  The room was great too.  Minus: drinks so expensive, and all the on-site dining is so overpriced. The best thing to do is walk down to the beach, turn right and you will find about 3-4 restaurants off the beach. Authentic thai at very cheap prices as is the beer and wine. You can buy beer and wine from them to take back to your room.  There isn't a lot to do in the town, this resort is for those who want to do nothing but relax.   It's a good 1.5 hours transfer, we always use resort hopper for any transfers…

title: Nice resort
review: Dear Padden73,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Edinburgh!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are pleased to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the breakfast, the guest room and the facilities around the resort.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Wonder experience
review: We booked a package through Luxury Escapes but once we paid our money they did not reply to any emails so I contacted the hotel direct to book our room. This was done promptly by Marriott Food in theJapanese, Thai and Waterfront was very good but we had a disappointing meal in the Olive but maybe it was because it was a buffet evening  Spa was THE BEST, expensive but worth every cent  Our room on the first floor was excellent . The staff throughout the resort were without exception polite and  eager to help with any query If you wish to do a half / full day tour, airport transfer etc we found Keng mobile 0819709159 to be very prompt. He has a new 4 wheel drive, is an excellent driver, very reasonably priced and speaks good English   Very highly recommended We will hopefully…

title: Relaxing, tranquil and Beautiful
review: We spent a week at this resort in August last year to celebrate our birthday and it was an amazing vacation. The never ending pool at this resort is the best thing and the beach is excellent. This place is ideal for a quite, relaxing holiday where you spent more time in the water then in the room. The rooms are beautiful and large and have a porch with direct access to the pool. The staff is polite and pleasant and always willing to help. The spa is also very nice. There is not much to do in and around the resort but we didn't mind as we were there to relax and not do much apart from eat and chill by the beach and the pool. A big thank you to Arjun Sood for organising all details of our trip!  Highly recommended if you like a quite, scenic and tranquil vacation.

title: Outstanding
review: Dear Neha H,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Dubai!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred birthday vacation and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the guest room, the beach, the associates and the spa.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic Holiday
review: First of all I wanted to say that what makes this hotel special are the people. Everyone makes you feel welcome and the service you receive is with a personal touch. Well done to the management team for there selection process as it obviously works.  From arriving at the hotel you are greeted with friendly faces (Money) helped us settle in quickly and we were given a complimentary drink and cold face towel.  The hotel was full but is sure doesn't feel like it, plenty of places to get away if you want to, we chose to stay near the main pool which was excellent as you could have your own private spot, we loved this and in some hotels you would pay for the liberty.  The restaurants were of a very high standard, yes they are expensive compared to the local restaurants but the…

title: A great place to spend 2 weeks in mid winter
review: Dear Toffeefig,      Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred anniversary and birthday holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our resort’s location, the restaurant, the breakfast, the pool, the pool bar, the spa and the gym. Especially your feedback that our associates were attentive is very satisfying and we will certainly ensure to recognize Money and Meen, for their outstanding service and efforts.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back again to our beautiful resort in your near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Excellent
review: Last year we stayed at Le Meridien and we intended to come back. However, since it was taken over by Pullman, we decided to try JW Marriott instead. We were a bit concerned as we did not know what we signed up for, and the first evening was really not the best, however afterwards it turned out to be an excellent, relaxing holiday.   Due to the delay of the plane we arrived late in the evening and, as we were told by surprisingly formal receptionist, the last pool access room left. Which meant two huge single beds put together to make a sort-of double bed and there was only one bedside cabinet. The room looked cramped and there was not enough space on both sides of the newly formed bed to get up at night without danger of bumping into something. We started to ask questions about…

title: You won't believe it from the pictures!!!
review: The grounds are spectacular. If you see pictures of the pool complex, they simply do not do justice.  They connect each and every building and pass under walk bridges to larger pools areas.  All surrounded by beautiful greenery, and the sea to the west for gorgeous sunsets.  The staff are absolutely great as well.  Not that you would expect less but they are so much more.  The facility is large so there will be walking and swimming to get to some places, but the trip is half the joy.  The food variety is good and the swim up bars (and non swim up bars) pour very good Thai and western drinks.  We shall return next time we return to Thailand!!

title: Beautiful Location
review: Dear Dkazooman,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to McAllen!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. title: Hidden Paradise
review: We stayed for 10 days in the Marriott with two friends. The location on the beach is superb if you are looking for somewhere to get away from the hustle and bustle.   The pool runs around the whole property and is not the best for swimming in but looks stunning from every corner of the hotel.  We spent most of the time on the beach.  On both sides of the hotel there are beach bars and restaurants where the food is excellent and a fraction of the price of the hotel.  We ate three times in the hotel and were impressed twice (The Thai Restaurant, and Olive) and very disappointed once with the beach barbecue. Steer clear of any of the special nights that are buffet style. They are simply not worth it.  Breakfast is good although you often have to wait if you want a table outdoors. …

title: One of the best holidays
review: Dear Steve-Walton, Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sunderland!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. title: The most relaxing vacation - ever!
review: 90 minutes drive from phuket airport, tucked away down the back roads and nestled in the centre of Khao Lak beach the JW is an impressive retreat. Its design is modern yet carefully crafted to represent typical grand Thai style architecture of olden days. One peculiar thing is a lot of the floors are 'black', black tile, black wood and black bitumen...this means it gets very hot so dont go barefoot at midday!  The facilities are extensive and very, very good, with huge swimming pools (that seem to have nobody in them) and 3km of lazy rivers winding through the grounds, great fun and lots of secluded areas to hide away and relax. perfect for families and couples alike as there is a place for everyone. The beach is gorgeous and although it can can get busy for sun loungers in the…

title: Superb
review: This was our first stay at this resort. We were not disappointed, this is a large hotel but you don't feel crowed out here. The pool that runs around the resort is great. There was nice breeze off the sea. The breakfast is wide ranging, I guess this is the only time the place feels busy. We had two of our best thia meal ever at their thia restaurant. The rooms are large and we have a lovely balcony. We shall return and i can't wait.

title: Happy Times :-)
review: Dear mikepay,     Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to York!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our resort location, the beach, the breakfast, the Ta-Krai our Thai restaurant and the guest room. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great Family Holiday Destination
review: FAO Ty Collins - General Manager   This was my 4th visit to the JW Marriott in Khao Lak.  As always the attention to detail in relation to customer care provided by all associates was yet again exceptional.    From the moment we arrived we were greeted by friendly and courteous staff who provided us with a refreshing drink and cool towels.  My vehicle was valet parked and all luggage was conveyed to our room expeditiously.    Upon arrival to our room we were greeted with a 'welcome back' message made from flowers displayed on our bed.  Thoughout the week we had many towel animals left in our room by house keeping staff.    There are a number of activities at the hotel to keep guests entertained throughout the day.  It is clear the hotel is making a consertive effort to compete…

title: Superb, again!
review: Dear Jabawokee,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to West Sussex!   Thank you for making our resort as your 4th returning holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.   It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the arrival experiences, the beach lounge and other resort restaurants, the beach activies, the pool, the fitness center. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Preaw, Tui-Tui, Ton Aor, Meen and Nee are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome your 5th visit to our beautiful resort in near future.    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Fabulous
review: The Property is huge, with a swimming pool that is connecting throughout the property. Make sure you stay in a room which has pool access. The food options are very good. Breakfast spread is one of the best I have every seen around the world. We stayed for 4 nights and it was just amazing.  Highly recommended for a perfect Holiday get away, its a good place to go with your family and children, lots of activities around the property as well.   Travelling during the off season, I am sure you'll get a good rate from the Hotel.  Must go there on your next trip to Phuket. Its just 45mins by road and the drive is quite smooth.

title: Minor Tweaks
review: Stayed here for 6 nights as part of our honeymoon. Just over an hours drive from Phuket airport. The hotel is sat back around 1km from the main road so you are limited to what is near the resort. There is a shuttle into Khao Lak where there are a number of bars, shops and restaurants and this is 100 baht per person and you have to reserve a spot. There are taxis outside the main gates which are 300 baht between 2 people one way.  The resort looks more catered for families. The wifi is slow but I'm not on it 24/7 like some people so didn't bother me.  Check in was pretty quick and was given a welcome towel and drink and that helped in the 35 degree heat. Our pool access room was big and clean. Huge king size bed. First problem was having to call maintenance as the pipe was…

title: A perfect chill out even in 35C.
review: We visited twice 2 years ago and chose the Marriott Khao Lak during New Years, mainly because we felt we'd get more bang for our buck here as all prices are heavily inflated. We were prepared that the resort would be full (which it was) but although it was full it went pretty seamlessly from breakfast (a small line) to getting a beach chair (many more than last time,) to room service. Again, we loooove the pool, it was a lot of fun as always even though we are two adults. We were also happy to see that the New Years eve 'galla' was optional, we opted for room service instead and had a blast in our room. All in all, still happy with the Marriott Khao Lak. The only critique is that they ran their staff a little too hard (or so it looked,) and the air-con or the room smelled a…

title: Very beautiful property but there are issues
review: Dear Travelbird0505,        Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Boulder,   Thank you for returning, making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. Best regards,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Things just not quite 'On Point'
review: We have just had one of the most relaxing beach holidays ever. The hotel is set on Khuk Khak beach, on miles of golden sand edged with palms and casurina trees, with amazing hermit crabs to add interest to walks up and down the beach. The sea was lovely and warm, a gentle slope and then really flat, so never really deep, sadly only the odd pipe fish to be seen.  Our room was well maintained, a lovely big bathroom and a stunning bed that was big enough to sleep a family of five.!!!  Toiletries in the bathroom were stocked up each day and smell heavenly.Bottles of water replenished daily, we never ran out.    The balcony of the room overlooked the amazing pool that meanders through the lush colourful gardens of the hotel. The pool and it's integration through the hotel and gardens…

title: Best place
review: This resort is awesome. Great beach, great pools, great mills. Services were also very good, and I liked the poll best, whole resort was connected with one pool.  One thing, You can barely find local restaurant out side of the resort. There are a few but it will be better to have one in the resort.

title: F&B needs to be sorted out
review: Dear Ben L,     Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Seoul!      Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing hotel!!!
review: I am currently staying here in the hotel and had two meals. The lunch was a strange one as the kitchen sent something that didn't look or taste remotely close to what I ordered. I raised this and it was fixed, by which time I just shared my kids food. The Italian restaurant for dinner was another experience, that doesn't reflect a JW standard. This was bought to the restaurant attention and was assured that only due to short of staff there was a slack in service. I wonder what else I shall be experiencing in the next 3 days I am here.

title: JW a step above the rest!!
review: Dear Devesh K,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback, this is sincerely appreciated.  We regret to read your feedback about your current experiences in our restaurants. We are deeply saddened you encountered this inconvenience and we apologize for not having delivered towards your expectations and our standards. We have followed up immediately with our team to have these points resolved.   Once again thank you for sharing your valuable feedback and I would appreciate you contacting me directly at our reception desk to give me the chance of a personal apology.  We all look forward to provide you with a fantastic experience during the rest of your stay and to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Thailand
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks on bed and breakfast board at the end of Jan into Feb and were staying for our anniversary.   We were both worried about where our room would be situated, but we were given a fine room overlooking the main pool in block 2 with one of the overhanging balconies.  There are some real positives about this hotel but there are some small improvements that could be made.  The positives * The swimming pool - absolutely amazing. So long!  * Quiet area - secluded may not be everyone's preference but we liked it. * Breakfast was probably the best ever - a huge selection and very tasty! You do have to ask for them to cook the eggs though as sometimes the poached eggs were watery and slightly undercooked. * Friendly staff - everyone was very friendly! * Minibus to…

title: A little bit of everything
review: Between Phuket and Khao Lak, the latter was the right choice for us. This resort indeed deserves its star rating. The infinity-pool is great to swim in, there are sunbeds with umbrellas close to the sea, both on grass and sand, not crowded at all, large rooms, rich breakfast and extremelly friendly and helpful staff.

title: We'll be back soon
review: Dear klmonika,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Bucharest!     Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: STAY AT THE JW MARRIOTT PHUKET KHAO LAK RESORT - JULY 2014
review: This summer we'll be returning to JW Marriott Khao Lak for the fourth time (last visit in February 2014, rooms 5003&5004). We have also been to other high-class hotels in Asia and Mauritius, but JW has just proved to be the greatest choice for us in all aspects. As we have four kids, the most valuable asset JW has to offer for us, is the pool access room.   The breakfast is another thing to die for - kids are already dreaming of the waffles and pain au chocolates, thanks for the Pastry Chef and his wonderful crew! Smoothies, egg station, you name it, it's all there. I've also asked for some favours (e.g. the kids' breakfast items and birthday cakes in Japanese restaurant) and these have been fulfilled promptly. Also a private dining experience "Indian style" at the terrace of…

title: Great hotel in great location.
review: Dear Marmarix,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Helsinki!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Nice but expensive
review: My family and I stayed at this resort for 10 nights during the middle of July 2014 for my wife's birthday. The hotel has the most amazing pool facilities with the pool snaking in amongst all the accomodation blocks so it was possible with the ground floor rooms to simply walk out of the patio doors and be in the pool within 6ft. The swim up pool bar was very pleasant and had a Happy Hour every evening which was good value. Our first room was very tired and in poor condition so we complained and were moved to a room on the other side of the resort. This room was in much better condition.The resort has good sporting facilities. The gym is reasonably large with a good selection of machines and there are a number of free exercise classes each day. We tried the stretching and yoga…

title: Beautiful beach resort
review: We had a wonderful stay at this stunning resort & spa. The rooms with direct access to the large pool are just beautiful: Spacious & with very comfortable beds & a nice bathroom. Staff is very professional & super friendly with a smile on their faces & they always treat you as if you were VIP. The beach is clean with white sand, plenty of sunbeds & the view is marvellous. Breakfast is definitely worth 5 stars as you can have almost everything from fresh fruits to noodles to eggs benedict. Even cappuccinos & freshly made fruit smoothies. The JW Marriott has everything you could ask for & it perfectly fits for any group of travelers. It's a lovely resort with beautiful surroundings. Will definitely return the next time I'm in Khao Lak.

title: Great beach!
review: Dear GreenMango22,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Zurich!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about the resort’s location, the Pool Access room, the professional and friendly associates and the breakfast. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great resort in beach location
review: We stayed here for 8 nights in October 2014. We stayed in a pool access room with our 6 year old. The room was spacious and could fit a family of 4. We spent every day down by the beach, surfing on the boogie boards. The water was safe enough and yet fun enough to catch a few waves. The sand was clean and the beach went for kilometres. I think this is the best beach resort we have travelled to in Thailand. We would strongly recommend staying here. We will be back!

title: Very Relaxing with good quality service
review: Dear Nicole W,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Great resort but out side of taxi make sad
review: Stayed here for 10 nights on our first trip to Thailand after a 3 day break in Bangkok.  We Chose this hotel for its quieter location with pool and beach access which it delivered on.  This is a wonderful hotel located on the Kuk kak beach in Khao Lak and is a short 300bht taxi ride from nearest town.  Hotel has an Excellent heated pool located in beautiful gardens. It's like mini canals linking all the hotel together over 3km. A big plus for the hotel. The gardeners do a superb job maintaining high standards. A Choice of several good quality restaurants (one would be shut each night , a bit disappointing), prices European but nightly themed buffets were overpriced. Our fav restaurant was the Italian 'olive'.  Mixed feelings on the room. Bed was excellent,  patio and access to…

title: Our best family holiday!!
review: We have just returned from staying 8 nights at this resort having purchased 2 Luxury Escapes packages, one for my husband and the other for our teenage daughters.  I had high expectations for this resort and the package offer and can honestly say we were not disappointed.   We had interconnecting rooms with pool access.  What a treat to be able to swim off from your room and explore the resort by pool. We bought a few blow up pool toys to float around with (not just for the kids) The pool is wonderful.   As already mentioned by others the buffet breakfast is wonderful with something for all nationalities. If you have purchased a luxury escapes package or deals.com package you get the option of 2 courses for lunch at the Waterfront restaurant or 1 option at the Beach bar and Pool…

title: Great hotel, esp. for families.
review: Dear Nikki C,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: Drop in Standards
review: This is a unique hotel with superb grounds including the largest pool we have seen which meanders in and around the hotel guest rooms. Its right on a superb beach complete with coconut palms and warm, blue sea. It was very busy but the staff worked tirelessly and considering the number of guests tried hard to provide a personal service. The best restaurants are the Thai & Japanese, which in case you don't like Sushi also has a great selection of hot food. The other restaurants are very busy and unless you can get an outside table (which are often taken) it will be noisy - ditto the breakfast room, although the choice of food is excellent. We upgraded to a suite on the top floor which was superb and quiet. As the tittle suggests, for families with children this would be hard to…

title: So close to excellent!  Wonderful resort!
review: Dear ManCityFan3,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to North Yorkshire!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to read that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the resort’s grounds, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the guest room, the superb beach, the resort’s restaurants, the associates and the breakfast. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Very engaged to improve
review: This was our second visit to this resort. Our first time a few years ago I loved it so much that I recommended it to a friend who stayed with his family.  This time around the resort looked worn and dated. Some rooms were having an overhaul.  Checkin was brusque and unfriendly.  The grounds are lovely and well maintained.   For me the atmosphere of the resort had changed. It seems that this hotel is being offered as groupon style deal in some countries (fair enough – who would turn down a good deal?) Where before it felt like a calm, sophisticated resort, this time it felt nothing but. It was crowded and noisy not at all tranquil.   It was hard to get into the spa as some of the deals offered included several spa treatments for couples. I heard one couple had a deal for each day…

title: A lovely relaxing oasis of calm
review: We arrived here in late January for a week's stay. This place is located a few kilometers from closest little village and i have to say that makes this place more attractive - if calm is what you looking for of course. We spent one week before at a more lively place on lower Phuket and then we moved here for some relaxation, and we thought it was a great place for that! So this a quite big resort and the thought is that you could spend all your time at the hotel, they got all you need there. One of the biggest impression's is the 16,000 square meter pool that goes around all buildings and it looks amazing and many of the rooms on ground floor have direct access to that pool and you can just swim around for a few ours if you like that, or as i prefer go down to the beach that you…

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Dear Toni N,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Oslo!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our hotel location, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and the beautiful beach.  We have well noted your feedback about the resort experiences, we will ensure to evaluate the points immediately. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards, please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana  Guest Relations Executive

title: An Oasis
review: Thank you all friendly staffs for the best services. Thank you khun Nueng at Front office for his kindness. He provided us the best service. Thank you khun Money for making us feel so welcome . She is very nice. Thank you the guy who helped us with our bags and parked the car. We stayed in room 2022,2016 on 24th Jan. This trip was only on our weekend. We really wanna stay longer on next trip! Thank you AYS for good and fast services. Thank you the guy who brought us a bottle opener, his uniform was making me felt like he came directly from the restaurant!  (sorry! I didn't catch his name). Thank you nice staffs at fitness. I love the pool  in every single corner. We went to Similan on 25th. The hotel is very close to Wow Andaman pier ( tour company). Similan trip was wonderful!…

title: Fab place and relaxing.
review: Dear Khun WANTANEE C,  Sawasdee ka and sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Khun Nueng and Khun Money are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of you; great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: It will blow you away
review: Family of four stayed at the Marriott Khao Lak in January 2015 and we were super impressed! It is a sanctuary. Although we preferred to eat at nearby beach side Thai restaurants for dinner, the breakfast and lunch options were great. It was busy but it never felt crowded and the beach / pool 'dilemma' is a luxury. Staff outstanding, good gym and we had terrific adjoining rooms. We would definitely return.

title: Marriott Beach Club
review: Absolutely beautiful setting!  The gardeners really work hard here!  3 super pools - we preferred the North pool which was for adults (12 years plus).  The staff bring you iced water to the pool side and keep topping your glasses up throughout the day.. They also bring ice cold cloths round a couple of times a day and bring fresh fruit around too.  This is a huge resort with lots of hidden delights - we managed to find their kitchen garden which grows lots of herbs and spices and veg. There are many restaurants but the prices were absolutely outrageous!  A lower end priced restaurant would be useful. The staff are wonderful - they can't do enough for you - always smiling. The local taxi service is great - do go out and taxi to Phuket  (1000 bht there £20)  You must visit Patong…

title: Perfect piece of heaven
review: Dear Madmandy123,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the pool, the resort location, the restaurants and the wonderful associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Lovely hotel
review: We simply cannot fault the JW Marriott at Khao Lak – its beautifully manicured garden/pool setting, friendly staff, fantastic breakfast offering plus food and cocktails galore. We have enjoyed every aspect of our ten days here and can recommend it very highly. For us, it has been the perfect holiday with walks along the beach, frolicking in the surf, great massages in the spa and every home comfort! The history of the place makes it even more interesting. It started its life as a Novotel before being upgraded to a luxury Sofitel resort. Just 13 days later it was devastated by the Tsunami in 2004. Four years passed before it reopened as the JW Marriott. If you are interested in seeing before and after photos, Google Novotel Khao Lak and Sofitel Khao Lak, as the original…

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear John B,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are happy to learn you enjoyed a fantastic stay with us, thank you for highly recommending our beautiful resort and your great comments about our resort location, the pool access room, the beach, the spa, the breakfast and the friendly associates. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in near future!   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Fabulous hotel, great staff!
review: We stayed here over the Christmas & new year. The hotel is a great place to stay The rooms are large and v clean, the maid keeps an oil burner lite with lemon grass sent burning. This is lovely, but when it isn't on you the room smells damp!! Over the Christmas week the hotel was v busy too many kids running wild, parents not looking after them!! The sun loungers were taken early, the people never returned to sit on the beds, We like to be on beach and stay all day, so this was frustrating, so we just took 2 loungers and placed them on the beach.The beach is great, beware of the jellyfish, we both got bitten.  The food in the hotel is good, breakfast is amazing, Everything you could wish for.  We ate in the olive restaurant, lovely atmos with the Jazz singer but v over priced,…

title: 5 star appearance with 2 star food and service!!!
review: Arrived at the JW Marriott in ah of the ambience and beautiful scenic views of the hotel. We had not booked breakfast and decided to ask about adding breakfast to our package and were told it would cost 800BHT each or €20 each. We decided against paying these outrageous prices and ordered off room service which wasn't to bad at 280BHT each. We had breakfast delivered to the room and each time it took approx 30mins and the food was some what cold, unfortunately we were in a hurry as we had activities booked. On one occasion though I had to send back a latte I ordered as it was stone cold. We found that the best value for money at the hotel was the Deli and the staff were very friendly here. We also ate on the waterfront bar, there were glass on the table, however we weren't…

title: Warm hearted people!!
review: Dear Bazzaloughlin,  Thank you for taking the time and giving us feedback regarding your stay at the JW Marriott Khao Lak.  I appreciate your positive comments about our resort, the grounds and the scenery here in beautiful Khao Lak.  My sincere apologies that you were not satisfied with our room service breakfast.  Service is one of our key priorties and I am sorry that you felt our people at breakfast and room service were not entirely attentive. Your feedback will be taken up with the team and is very helpful for further improvements.  While we do get many positive comments from travellers about our property and also you rated us excellent in many major areas, I appreciate your feedback and we understand that there is always room for improvement.  Thank you and wish you a very Happy New Year  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Outstanding Service, Great Location!
review: Our family have been already three times in this resort and we will come there again on mid-February for two weeks. I have stayed in my business and leisure trips a lot in various 5 star hotels, but I have to say that this is the best one!!! And one big differentiating factor (besides fabulous resort and restaurants and beaches etc..) is definitely your personnel. You have truly wonderful and warm hearted people there, who are true ambassadors for the whole Thailand hospitality and some of them have even become our friends with whom we keep e-mailing correspondence (greetings especially to Tui and Sasha)!!  Look very much forward in coming there again after 1 month!!  Jukka from cold Finland

title: 5 Stars are not enough !!
review: Dear Mr.Jukka and the family,    Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Finland!  Thank you for being our loyal customers of JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and making our resort as your preferred holiday destination.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Tui and Sasha are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family, great guests make a perfect holiday.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your wife back to our beautiful resort in February!    Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Fabulous
review: This hotel is perfect for couples and families. We stayed here in April 2013. I apologize for the delay in documenting my experience, but I have been busy traveling SE Asia. I absolutely fell in love with this area. The beach here is gorgeous.   After traveling to many places since, I can say the beach here is fabulous and this resort is worth returning to.   The bar manager Lauro was so kind to us when we were there. We thank you so much. Mai in the recreation department taught my husband and I Thai boxing lessons and also took us on a fun & memorable bike tour to White Sands beach.   The food & drink were great. We loved the brunch. Sunsets are amazing! Don't miss out in happy hour at the pool bar! Lots of fun memories there.   Thanks again. Hope to visit very soon!

title: Skønt resort, men
review: No doubt that this is a lovely place. But in our opinion it does not live up to be 5 star.  The layout of the resort is good. The way the wings are separated makes you not feel how big the place really is. The pool soars through the whole area - it's fantastic. All in all outdoor areas really nicely maintained, and creates a nice environment. Unfortunately the buildings and rooms in several places worn - maintenance and renovation is to be required. We saw several times to drain in the bathroom stopped, and the air conditioning smelled, especially if it not ran at full speed.  As many have written, breakfast buffet indescribable. Here is everything - great variation in the range of breakfast - in very good quality .  On the whole, it seems as though there is a great atmosphere…

title: Wonderful...highly recommended
review: Dear Erik O,  Thank you for taking the time and giving us feedback regarding your stay at the JW Marriott Khao Lak.  I appreciate your positive comments about our resort layout, the breakfast buffet, the pool and the overall atmosphere. Glad that you found the service to be welcoming and our associates always smiling at all times and in all areas.  Your observations about this being a busy period at the beach is definitely true. My sincere apologies that you were disturbed by other guests reserving sunbeds in the morning. Our team is trying very hard to avoid this behavior and "educate" our guests but it is almost impossible to control the "sunbed blocking" a 100%.   Service is one of our key priorties and I am sorry that you felt our employees at the New Years Eve Gala were not entirely accommodating and polite. Your feedback will be taken up with the team and is very helpful for further improvements. Please accept our apologies.  While we do get many positive comments from travellers about our property and also you rated us excellent in many major areas, I appreciate your feedback and we understand that there is always room for improvement.  Thank you and wish you a all the very best for 2015.  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Excellent
review: After touring the temples of Angkor, I and a friend of mine wanted a few days luxuriating on a Thai beach before heading to Bangkok, and the Marriott Khao Lak was our choice. We're from the Caribbean, and so we are used to a very high quality of beach, with very white sand; Khao Lak was recommended to us as a location we might find such a beach, and the hotel design and amenities appeared amazing, at a reasonable price compared to hotels in Phuket during the high season. (We were visiting Dec 18 - 22).  We arranged pickup by hotel car in Phuket and were met promptly, driven the 90 minutes to the hotel, and greeted courteously by staff, who brought cold towels and a drink, arranged all necessary paperwork efficiently, talked about the hotel layout and amenities and then walked us…

title: Housekeeping nightmare
review: Dear Peter B,    Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the hotel location and ground, the pool access room, the housekeeping team, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the resort restaurants, the breakfast with the friendly associates and the beautiful beach.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Just Fantastic, A Gorgeous Gem!
review: The hotel itself is big and beautiful with a huge pool all around the all property, and mostly in front of the rooms! But the nature and beach in the rear side of the hotel is amazing with a beautiful sunset and place for the kids to play football, as well as close to the pool. There is a very nice and complete breakfast as well!

title: DREAMY AND A MUST STAY
review: The pictures DO NOT do this place justice. its breath taking and true luxury. every detail has been carefully looked after, attentive service, and absolutely breathtaking. Plenty of towels, beach chairs, plenty of food at breakfast, which can feel like a cafeteria - and the only time you're reminded that you're staying at a large hotel - but lots of yummy choices and all delicious. DO NOT EAT at the Olive, over priced, inadequate rushed service and just not good food. When on the beach, turn left and you can have DELICIOUS CHEAP FRESH Thai food on the beach at Farmai Restaurant. we ate here 2 days in a row and the 2nd day we asked them to turn up the heat on the spices and they did ! also the BEST coconut waters here - chilled and sweet. We loved our rooms, truly the best pool…

title: wonderful, personal service
review: Dear creamybuddha,  sunny greetings to the Big Apple!  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travellers in this forum.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed a fabulous stay and had such a fantastic, relaxing experience. Especially your feedback that our resort offers true luxury and our associates provide attentive service is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team.  Furthermore, thank you very much for highly recommending our resort for the pool access rooms, the clean and fantastic pool, the beautiful beach and above all for a fantastic and breath taking holiday.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is hoping to have the opportunity of welcoming you back soon.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great hotel and location over-run with babies and kids
review: The staff really strived to help us have a wonderful stay - the restaurant staff in particular stand out as excellent.    For example - I was really touched one day when my husband and I were slightly later than usual to breakfast, and I found that they had saved my favourite table for us on the outside deck with a view of the beach.   All of the wait staff were really attentive to details and it made the trip wonderful.  We stayed 10 nights on a heavily discounted luxury escapes package, so I was even more impressed that we had been shown such a high level of service even though our rate had been discounted.

title: Luxury and calm resort, perfect to rest...
review: Dear Elizabeth S,  Greetings from Khao Lak to Melbourne!  Thank you for sharing your feedback on this website and describing your experience in our wonderful resort!   We take great pride in providing warm and genuine hospitality to our guests and your comments about our excellent and always attentive associates are appreciated. I totally agree with you that our staff is providing great personalized service and it is my great pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team.  We all look forward to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak in the near future!   Yours sincerely,   Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: We found Paradise
review: The hotel is set amongst tropical and luxurious grounds. Has an extremely friendly and attentive staff. The pool is enormous, winding throughout the entire hotel- it has to be seen to be believed. Has three restaurants on site. The breakfast buffet is well appointed with very good food. Room service food is among the best I've had worldwide. The exercise facility is about 3 and 1/2 star quality.   If you're coming here to get away from it all- forget it... Everyone else here is too, and the feeling is inescapable. With rows of loungers and sun umbrellas lined up next to each other it feels quite like being packed on a bus- albeit rather  like the high class double-decker busses that you see hauling around vacationers that pay a little extra for a bit more special experience.  …

title: Awesom
review: very good and romantic.the staff is very nice and helpful one of the best trips of my life it is beautiful.The pool is great and the beach too. I liked all the restaurants and there are other few small but good restaurants along the beach.The wifi is good and the game are too.Its fun forkids and adults.The hotel is fabulous and the price for the quality of the hotel is very good.Its good for water sports and the village is near and its very good for shoping.I liked every thing about this hotel and I am thinking of going there again.There is also near an indian restaurant and an italian and also thai and a seven eleven.

title: Luxury hotel in stunning surroundings
review: Everything you would expect from a top Marriott resort.  My favorites are:  1. Private beach 2. Japanese, Thai and Buffet restaurants on property 3. 3km winding pool (I know it sounds crazy, but this pool is amazing) 4. Rooms are spectacular.

title: The best resort ever
review: Dear Joel D,    Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Tarpon Springs!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   How gratify to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the beautiful beach, the restaurants, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and the spectacular room. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Does what it says on the tin, but probably wouldn't stay again
review: To begin with, my fiancee and I picked this place because it offered luxury we don't normally go for (we tend to go for tailor made holidays where we book accommodation and flights etc). We wanted a relaxing holiday and the JW Marriott seemed to offer that.  Our room was on the 3rd floor but was easy access to any of the 3km of pool around the hotel. From our section of the hotel, the poolside bar was accessible. Our room had a massive bed and was great to sleep on. En suite was pretty standard with a large shower and phone in the toilet (which we never used). TV was a large flat screen with ample film and sports channels to watch. Free wifi available, but not very strong most of the day- best signal in early morning!  Room cleaning service was very good and we seemed to get a…

title: Stunning..
review: Unquestionably one of the best places you will ever stay.  This hotel is magnificent. Huge, but somehow unintimidating for all that.  The pool areas are spectacular, as is the beach.  A massive stretch of sand, which provides wonderful bathing - although the breaking wave may not work for small children.  The beach is excellent and well managed, with lovely deckchairs and plenty of large towels.  At night time they often have a singer songwriter performing at the beach bar, with a campfire behind them - which is quite magical.  Only criticism would be the lunch and evening restaurants which are (in this writer's opinion) slightly overpriced (charging European prices for average pasta dishes). Also, the fish in the Mediterranean restaurant may have been 1 or 2 days old (not…

title: The best so far ...
review: Dear EuropeanLawyer,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Cannes!     Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about the magnificent and huge resort, the beautiful beach, the beach lounge and the breakfast buffet at Waterfront restaurant.   We have well noted your feedback about the restaurant price and the food quality, we will ensure to evaluate the points immediately. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards, please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Wow wow wow
review: Everything was perfect = 101% perfect. Booking went smooth in past, hotel communicates excellent via e-mail or booking.com system. Hotel driver took us from Phuket airport and within 80minutes we were in pure paradise. Nice welcome, great reception staff, smooth check-in. I decided to pay with my credit card extra for pool access room (I got 1400 bath price for room per day) and it was the best investment of my life:-). I highly recommend these rooms. Rooms are very nice decorated with large bathroom. Fresh bottle of water every day (we got like 4-6 bottles for free and you could ask freely for more without payment), fresh towels changed twice per day. Room service worked nice, we tasted some food and it was good (bit expensive, but it is common in these hotels: fish and rice…

title: Amazing Resort - hope to return someday
review: Dear Neofema,   Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Prague!    Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are happy to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable and unforgettable experience during your holiday.   It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the Pool Access Room, the breakfast buffet, the resort facilities, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and the beautiful beach.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Great time
review: Goodness where to start. This is an absolutely amazing resort. From the moment we set foot in the gorgeous reception area and were greeted with ice cold towels and drinks to cool us down and refresh us from the long journey we knew we had made the best decision to stay here. It's darn right gorgeous!   The rooms: we ( 2 x families of 2 adults and 1 x 5 yr old each) stayed in the deluxe pool suites which have direct access to the lagoon pool. Ideal for families as you have steps down to the pool and a glass fronted area to prevent children from accessing the pool without your knowledge. The room was gorgeous, the bed was huge! And the bathroom is ace. They have Aromatherapy Associate toiletries which are great. Look out for the super gifts they leave you during the turn down…

title: Lovely Time at JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: My partner and I stayed for 5 nights in Khao Lak - our first time to this area in Thailand. We had a lovely room with pool access.  Such beautiful and friendly staff work at the Marriott, we were astounded by just how friendly and caring everyone was.  We enjoyed the beach and the facilities at the resort. Only downfall was the Olive restaurant, we thought the food was of a poor standard (Italian fare) and the service was very average compared to the rest of the resort. We noticed many people eating at the local restaurants along the beach and took this option after our not so good experience at Olive - this turned out to be a much better option. We can't wait to return to Khao Lak and will stay at the Marriott again!

title: beautiful beach property
review: Dear Wanderlustrachel,  Season’s greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sydney!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website. Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: A great resort for family vacation on the beach
review: Beautiful, quiet property.  Clean room with a very comfy bed.  The beach was beautiful and no one on it!  Made for great pictures with the family.  The pool was amazing and I really liked the balcony seating area on our second floor room.  The JW is always lovely and the staff is always great. It does not disappoint!

title: Super-duper
review: Dear Nathalie M,  Season’s greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Singapore!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are pleased to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about the beautiful resort, the pool view room, the beautiful beach, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and the great associates.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: In love with this hotel
review: Great swimming pool throughout entire hotel, you can jump into the pool right from the first floor of the hotel room; beautiful and clean beach with soft sand. The hotel staff are very attentive and are always smiling. You can tell that the staff are well trained in orientating themselves around customer satisfaction. Definitely a place to return to for a nice and relaxed vacation.

title: Fabulous Vacation
review: Last Year my wife and I had the opportunity to go on vacation at the JW Marriott in Khoa Lak. We had a magical time.   When we talked about vacation with our family I suggested we go back to this resort.  As we were with a infant and 2 children under 3,  we needed to get specific rooms. I contacted the hotel and found them to be very accomodating.  I traded emails wtih Alex who is the Director of Rooms and he made sure our rooms were set up exactly to our liking.  All the the staff and the hotel were amazing in making sure our stay was just fabulous.  Nana was great and went out of her way.  It was amazing that she remembered our names and our preferences.  Nee in the deli also went out of her way to make sure what we wanted was what we got.  Besides the rooms being great, the…

title: Beautiful, Quiet, Clean, Flawless
review: Dear Family Nemeth,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred family holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travellers in this forum.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were amazing is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that Nana and Nee are absolutely outstanding in taking care of our guests. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your family, great guests make a perfect holiday.  Furthermore, thank you very much for recommending our awesome resort for the pool, the rooms and the beach.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is looking forward to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Nice hotel in fantastic location
review: We chose this resort as a family of four (2 boys, 10 and 8) for a two week vacation, mainly because of Khao Lak still being the least overcrowded, least overmarketed tourist destination in Thailand, free from sex tourism and binge drinking crowds. The Khao Lak area also has a reputation for being avoided by the rather unsophisticated nouveau riches from the former USSR, which easily manage to ruin one's holiday experience in almost all of the upmarket Patong hotels.  The JW Marriott is a gem. We enjoyed the fantastic beach (great for swimming with children, nice sand, nice tides, gentle waves), the great restaurants with impeccable food and flawless service, the vast pool area and great gardens inside the resort as well as the sports and entertainment facilities. Room was…

title: Perfect holiday at JW Marriot!
review: Dear AhmedHulusi,  Season’s greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to New York!  Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your detailed feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.   It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the beach, the restaurants, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the garden, the sports and entertainment facilities, the room and the friendly, helpful and charming associates.  We have well noted your feedback about the breakfast, we will ensure to evaluate the point immediately. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards, please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you and your family back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  With my best regards and happy holidays!,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic break
review: We stayed there for 5 nights for a short break and kind of happy with it. Nice and big hotel with large beach front. Spacious room. Large pool. Good location for local attraction and restaurants. A bit crowded and noisy for peak season with noise from kids. But really good place for family with kids. Service was a little slow but not a big deal.

title: Fantastic surrounds
review: Our family of 5 had a fabulous time enjoying our pool access room, choice of restaurants and utterly decadent cocktails & massages for the parents. Kids club ladies and resort staff were beautiful & kind and made us feel very welcome.

title: Good but overrated
review: Dear Julie W,  Season greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for your comments about our resort, the pool access room, the choice of restaurants, the cocktails, the spa treatment, the kids club and the beautiful and kind associates. It is my great pleasure to share your feedback with our entire team.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Excellent
review: We spent a week from Dec 14th to Dec 21st in a family pool access room.  Location is gorgeuous with a beautiful sandy beach that stretches for a long distance on both sides of the resort. Great facilities overall. Swimming pools are well designed and leasure area also well equipped (despite kids clubs not well provided).  Depending where you are, you may need to walk for a long distance to reach toilets which are located at the two extremes of the resort.  Atmosphere is very relaxed and breakfast is definitely one of the highlights with a wide selection of food.  As mentioned in other reviews the resort needs some maintenance and the hope was that the management would have it done before the peak season and not in the middle of it.  During our stay there were workers left alone…

title: Fantastic Hotel - Never Disappoints!
review: Dear Pklao,  sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending valuable time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our beautiful resort, nice beach, great facilities, breakfast and the pools.   We have well noted your comments about the resort maintenance and our restaurant staff in need of training. Our maintenance team works very hard the entire year to keep the resort beautiful and in good shape. We are currently solely finishing some minor touch up work in order to get ready for the peak season starting next week. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  We all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our beautiful beach resort again soon.  Kind regards, Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Lovely retreat
review: I support all of the great things that have been said in other reviews - amazing staff, great buffet breakfast, amazing pool, comfortable bed and good rooms. We had all of our meals included in our package and the food at all restaurants was great. Drinks are expensive (for Thailand), similar to Australian prices, but there are cheaper restaurants and bars on the beach and just outside the resort entrance. We loved this resort so much that in the 8 days we were there we only left the resort once to walk on the beach. The pool access rooms are great, worth the upgrade. The staff are all so lovely and accommodating.

title: A great 2 weeks,but needs a little updating
review: We have just returned from a great 2 weeks at the resort.The hotel is rated at 5 star and this is shown in the service that you receive as well as the quality of the food in the restraurants. We stayed in a deluxe pool access room in block 4, which i have to say, showed signs of being a little tired and although all was clean and functional, was not 5 star. Brilliant shower and very comfortable bed. The room service was exceptional with plenty of towels, coffee and tea. The cost of eating and drinking in the hotel is around the same cost as the uk but the quality of the food is excellent. Only disapointment we had was when we were given a discount card which gave you a good discount the more that you used the hotel restraurants. This would have been great if it was issued at the…

title: Perfect for relaxing
review: Dear Graham Y,  Season greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Whitstable!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   Thank you for your great comments about our resort location, pool access room, the food and beverage and a surprise birthday cake on your wife’s birthday.   We have well noted your comments about the discount card during your stay. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back for some more fantastic stays in our beautiful beach resort again soon.  With very best regards  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: We loved it!
review: 5 star all round. We stayed 8 nights.  Loved the daily spa treatments, swim-up bar with food and drinks, plenty of space so you don't feel like you are running into people all the time, able to relax and enjoy the resort with my partner. We dined at each of the restaurants and couldn't fault them at all.  Room was great with day beds, balcony and large bathroom with rain shower!

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear onlyinsydney,  Season greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sydney!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for recommending our beautiful resort as a perfect place for relaxing.   We are very thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience during your holiday.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the room, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the spa, the food and beverage and the resort’s restaurant.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back for some more fantastic stays in our beautiful beach resort again soon.  With very best regards  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing!
review: We really have enjoyed our stay at JW Marriott in Khao Lak (6 nights). It is a big house, but the resort is really spread out, so you don't have a feeling to be surrounded by other guests. The room was very spacious, nice bathroom, new towels. The cleaning people are very kind and coming twice a day. Actually the whole staff at the resort is very friendly, open minded and thoughtful.  We had the pool room with direct access to the swimming pool. Amazing! We can really recommend this type of room! Actually JW Marriott in Khao Lak has the largest pool in south east Asia :-) The area around the beach is very well cared, enough of sunchares, so you don't have to get up at 7.00 in the morning to get one :-) beach-boys coming with the fresh towels and ice water. The restaurants are…

title: World class luxury
review: We spent 5 days here, on a bargain deal from a website.  It far exceeded our expectations. Beautiful grounds, beautiful pool, beautiful Thai service.  The rooms are enormous as is the bathroom - the clear toilet and shower doors are an unusual feature!  The bed is massive and comfortable and there is a selection of pillows.
