The gym is one of the best I've seen with an adjoined studio with mirrors and ballet bars.  They also have squash and tennis courts, and bikes to loan.  The food is at usual Westerner prices (5-10 times the price of local Thai food, but expected for a resort) and we struck gold on a 50% off deal they were having at the in-house spa.  The breakfast buffet is a MUST MUST MUST have - it is the largest and most varied of all I've seen and is open til 11am! The…

title: jimj-South of England UK. Excellent hotel
review: Dear snough,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are thrilled to learn you had such a memorable stay, thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a world class luxury hotel.   How gratifying to read your nice words about our room, the beautiful grounds, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the breakfast buffet and the Sunday market.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all looking forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort again soon.   Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Gorgeous but high maintenance
review: Stayed in this very good hotel for three weeks end of Oct to mid Nov. Having visited this twice before we were not disappointed as it was up to its good overall standard. Room was good, the buffet breakfast was excellent as usual. Reception good, a little care on detail needed occasionally. I find the staff excellent always willing to be of service and keep smiling; on occasions despite the guests! Comment about high food / drink prices I have seen are justified as the hotel is isolated (why we like it).  It would be helpful if prices including all costs were quoted instead of a note at the bottom of the bill stating tax & service charge will be added. Turning to food I do not require a large meal in the evening so used to go to the beach restaurants which were in disarray…

title: Room type key to nice holiday
review: Dear JimJUk,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for returning and recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a great place to relax.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our room, the extensive breakfast buffet and especially the excellent service by our very friendly staff. It is my great pleasure to convey your compliments to our team.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all looking forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort for your fourth visit in 2015!   Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: You won't be disappointed!
review: Pros: most beautiful hotel I have ever seen Giant beautiful pool Exceptional service  Cons: very expensive food/drinks with extra charges  We stayed here for 1 night on our honeymoon. We booked it with only 30,000. Marriott points. The hotel looks better than its pictures, absolutely stunning. The pool is as enormous as everyone says, the room is beautiful, and they gave us rose petals on the bed and cake for our honeymoon. When we first arrived it was magical.  The problem is the resort pricing. We showed up at happy hour, so the first drink was pretty reasonable, but after that it was crazy. 250 baht for a basic drink plus 17% tax and service charge. The only breakfast option is an 800 baht buffet. It is very nice, but these are insane prices for Thailand. For three drinks…

title: Best of the Best for a stunning break away from it all.
review: Not going to bore you by repeating other reviews, save to say if you are looking for a quality 5 star resort, in a quiet region of Thailand, with the best pool and a beach that's good at high tide and fantastic at low, look no further. Pay your money and enjoy your holiday.  If like me you blew most of your budget just getting and staying here, here's a few tips. Take the shuttle bus to town early in your stay. (£8 return per couple). Average cost for dinner at the hotel was £70 with a couple of drinks, (great quality though) but only £20 in town. Don't neglect Bang Niang, there's more to it than just the market. Food street is fantastic with lots of choice for dinner. Your room has a fridge so use the supermarket in town. Chang beer is a very drinkable 6% and about £1 a can.…

title: Fantastic resort
review: Dear DimmerBVB  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Axminster!   Thank you for making our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experiences.   Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and recommending our beautiful resort. We are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.  Yours sincerely, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Fantastic stay
review: I stayed at the J W Marriott Khao Lak with my family (2 adults and 2 kids aged 9 and 6) for 8 nights in September 2014.  We stayed in a family deluxe pool access room using the Luxury Escapes deal which included all our meals, 8 spa treatments and airport transfers.    The resort is fantastic and kept very clean and tidy.  The gardens are beautiful.  The breakfasts are amazing and the three restaurants for dinner are good (we enjoyed Olive the most).  The staff are very friendly and they loved chatting to the kids.  Unfortunately it rained for the first few days but the temperature was still great for swimming and there was heaps of things to do around the resort for the kids including kids club, squash, table tennis and beach soccer.  When the sun came out on day 4 the beach…

title: Last visit
review: Dear Nick P,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Ipswich!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred family holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a great place to relax.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our beautiful garden, the amazing breakfast, the friendly and lovely associates, the restaurants and the kids activities.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you and your family back to our beautiful resort again in near future!  Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Ripped off, Luxuary Escape eight night all-inclusive package not worth the money.
review: We have recently returned from a ten day trip to Thailand and stayed here.  It wasn't our first choice, being out of town, but it turned out just fine.  Check in was smooth and welcoming. The staff are all helpful, very polite and knowledgeable. The room was big and light, the bed comfortable and we had a balcony with a view of the pool. Be warned anything you leave outside may get soaked when it rains, I often moved the chairs right in to the wall!  The bathroom is mainly marble or granite or similar. The bath is big enough for two, takes ages to fill but worth it.  The water wasn't hot enough for the first couple of days then it warmed right up. Only thing you can't do is put a plug in The sink for shaving etc. Room service was daily and good but the timing very random. There…

title: Excellent hotel
review: We stayed there multiple times: Feb 2014, Aug 2014, Sep 2014. The hotel has everything you need when on holiday. The swimming pools are amazing, the beach is lovely. The rooms are slightly dated but overall can't complain about anything. Its clean, well maintained and well equipped. Next to the hotel are few restaurants, spa and small shop.  The only downsides: - It is expensive to eat in the restaurants in the hotel - Shuttle bus to the town is not free - it's 90 minutes by car from the airport.

title: A piece of paradise !
review: Dear Oktawik,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us and share your feedback with other travelers on this website.  We are thrilled to read your comments about the pools, the lovely beach and the room. Thank you for sharing your feedback about the hotel restaurants, the shuttle bus service and the hotel location.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience. For any further assistants on your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact me at chatlada.r@marriott.com. We all look forward to welcome you back for some more stays in our beautiful beach resort in near future.   Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Do not look else where.... This is what you need!
review: My wife and I stayed here as the final part of our Thailand trip having returned home on the 25th November.   The hotel is listed as  Khao Lak but you should note that it is not centrally located but to the north of the centre in a quiet location with little surrounding it.   Check in is efficient and smooth with a welcoming refreshing drink and cold lemon towels to wipe away the stress of the journey   Reception will ask for either a cash deposit or a credit card swipe as everything is charged back to your room to avoid using cash  Once checked in you are escorted to your room and your bags follow you !  We were allocated a pool view room on the third floor which was excellent by anyone's standards.   The room had very efficient air conditioning. A ceiling fan. Huge bathroom…

title: Did someone say 3km of pools?
review: Dear rustymark,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Hull!  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our pool access room, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the beautiful beach, the resort's restaurants and our friendly team of associate, especially Pup at the Aquamarine Bar. It is indeed my great pleasure to share your comments with our entire team.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and recommending our beautiful resort. We are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.  Yours sincerely, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: What a resort...Awsome
review: We have stayed some great places and this one is right up there with the greats! Great rooms, excellent breakfast and the pool and resort just make it perfect. We never want to go home. If you want to check out our brain and engage relaxation then here is the place!

title: Big swimming fool as canal
review: Well this is a one of the biggest hotel in khaolak might be in Southern of Thailand swimming pool look like canal as long i enjoyed my self lot when i was there, hotel staffs are very friendly beach not so far almost closed.

title: Wow! Amazing 5* Staff and Service from check in onwards
review: Dear Alexi H,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a great place to relax and enjoy.  It is my great pleasure to convey your compliments to our team.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort again in near future!  With best regards, Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beyond Expectation
review: I run a 5* resort in the south of Phuket and when it comes to hotel and hospitality I have a lot of experience and very high standards. I can honestly that the customer service at the JW Marriott is AMAZING.  I turned up late without a booking. The reception staff greated me woth a refreshing juice and towel and advised me on my options. I paid for a deluxe poolside room and was delighted to be upgraded to a villa by the beach.  The beautiful Tapanee and Nicholas were amazingly welcoming from the moment I arrived and were so much fun. Their english was perfect and their humour and beauty was simply delightful. I have never met such welcoming hotel staff. I adore these too!!  The room itself was breathtaking. Stunning. High ceilings, comfy bed, beautifully presented. The outdoor…

title: Excellent Service, Facilities and Rooms
review: Dear PhilAnthonyM,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Phuket!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback, this is sincerely appreciated, especially since you are a real expert and well respected colleague.  We are very happy to read your great comments about our breathtaking rooms and the amazing five star staff and service.   Especially your comments about the amazingly welcoming and best in class associates, Ms.Tapanee and Mr. Nicholas at the reception makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team, who are all doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  Once again thank you for sharing your valuable feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  With best regards,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Brilliant Pool
review: We spent 8 nights as part of a group of 120 that had come for a destination wedding. There were three days of different functions and the events manager Zaffer and his excellent staff left no stone unturned to provide an exceptional service.  The resort with its huge pool was prefect. The breakfast and dinner were of excellent variety and quality.

title: Best resort in khao lak
review: We were greeted with a excellent team of staff when we arrive; the staff was courteous,friendly and attentive.The room were nice  big and spacious . Marriott has the biggest pool in khao lak and we could jump into the pool from our room.The property is nicely decorated in thai style.Breakfast was delicious.

title: Thailand Paradise
review: Dear Alisjon,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!   Thank you for writing us about your experience in our resort, we are very happy to learn that you loved your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak.  It's a great pleasure reading your fantastic comments about our wonderful resort, the courteous, friendly and attentive associates, the pool access rooms, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and the delicious breakfast.    We all look forward to welcome you back for another great stay in your wonderful JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Yours sincerely, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Best in class service, beautiful resort
review: We stayed as a couple for 10 nights at the beginning of November and had the time of our lives at this stunning resort! We stayed in a pool access room which was super comfortable, well maintained and had everything you could need whilst on holiday. The swimming pool is out of this world and lazing on your own personal pool deck is so relaxing! We also always looked forward to seeing Borkkam, the elephant who visits the resort twice a week.  All staff members provided wonderful customer service, however the following staff members provided exceptional customer service during our stay: * Wa in the fitness center, cycle tour and Muay Thai extraordinaire! The Muay Thai boxing classes we attended with Wa were one of the highlights of our trip! Recreational facilities at the resort…

title: Nice hotel but surprised by late night music
review: Dear Hanna G,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Perth!  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our pool access room, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, our elephant lady ‘Borkkam’ and our friendly team of associates especially, Wa from Fitnes Center, Pup at the Aquamarine Bar, Meen at the Infinity pool bar, Rat and Fon at egg station, Sorn at the Waterfront restaurant. It is indeed my great pleasure to share your comments with our entire team.   Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and recommending our beautiful resort.  We are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.  Yours sincerely, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: The perfect place to unwind
review: We booked this resort based on Trip Advisor ratings and reviews and were not disappointed.  It is a beautiful resort that left us wanting for nothing.  We booked transport from Phuket airport to the hotel and were greeted by a friendly driver in a very nice van for our 1 hr 20 minute drive to the hotel.  The price was less to book thru the hotel than hiring a private car and they just charged it to our room which made it easy. We originally booked a spa villa but upon arrival realized the room layout (no bathroom vanity area, no dressers or place to put our suitcases) wouldnt be comfortable so we moved to a duplex unit which was awesome.  I would highly recommend.  The balcony was beautiful, bed and bathroom were spacious and we felt very at home for our week.  The spa is…

title: super large pool
review: had a great time in this beaytiful resort,.,huge pool and next to the beach..great breakfast and friendly staff..big rooms and very comfortable..will surely be back and forget Pjhuket..good relaxing place away from the city center

title: Wow ... From a Aussies point of view
review: Dear Roman F,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Mannheim,  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our beautiful resort, comfortable room, the wonderful breakfast and friendly associates. It is my great pleasure to share your compliments with our entire team.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.   Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Wonderful Time here
review: Wow ,  Only the second time we have ever stayed at a 5 star hotel , and what a treat , this is one very special place  , from the moment we checked in to the moment we left , pure magic , the staff are the best,  right from the front desk to the gardeners to the room cleaners and the restaurant staff , always smiling , always saying hi ,  nothing was too much trouble for them with every request met with speed .   We arrived early , at 11am knowing check in wasn't till 3pm  However was told our room was ready and we could check in early , which was fantastic . We couldn't have asked for anything more as far as the room goes , it was perfect , our luggage was about 2 min behind us , 5 min later a phone call from front desk asking if everything was fine , a nice touch , this may…

title: Fantastic resort
review: Dear robinarob,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Australia!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed a fantastic stay and had such an amazing experience in our resort. Thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and we are very happy to read your great comments about the check-in process, the room, our amazing pool, the breakfast, the beautiful garden and the friendly associates.   We have well noted your comments about the beverage during happy hour. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back for some more fantastic stays in our beautiful beach resort again soon.  Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful resort
review: My partner and I spent 3 nights at this resort for a weekend getaway. We were welcomed with cold scented towels and a nice welcome drink and given a personal check in.   Our room was beautifully furnished and very clean. We particularly enjoyed the amazing pool which went round the entire property. The buffet breakfast which was included in our stay was delicious, especially the thai noodle soup! The restaurants in the resort were equally good and we loved being able to have dinner al fresco, enjoying the sea breeze and sound of the waves with our meal.   The spa was excellent and the therapists were skilled and professional. All the service staff in the resort were polite and helpful. We left feeling rejuvenated and relaxed. I would highly recommend this resort for a lovely…

title: Amazing, relaxing, adventurous holiday- must go!!
review: We just returned from an amazing 1 week stay at this resort in Khao Lak and it is one of, if not the best resort I've ever stayed in.   My boyfriend and I were looking for a relaxing week away with the opportunity for exploring and activities whilst not being hounded like you can be at an all inclusive resort. From arrival, you could tell this was exactly what we were going to get. We arrived in the evening to some welcome drinks and cold towels whilst we were being checked in, and were also welcomed by extremely friendly and genuine staff.  The buffet breakfast is amazing, best buffet breakfast I've had at a resort like this, so I would highly recommend you include this in your booking. It had every food you could imagine, and again, the staff are just superb - nothing is too…

title: Family Holiday
review: Dear LadyEmilyO,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to London!   Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are thrilled to learn you enjoyed a fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience in our resort. Thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as one of the best resort you have ever stayed in and we are very happy to read your great comments about our amazing breakfast, the beautiful beach, the room, the restaurants, the friendly associaltes especially Mr. Bomb at the gym and Chef Kon at the Thai cooking class and the helpful concierge team.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back for some more fantastic stays in our beautiful beach resort again soon.  Kind regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fantastic! Cant wait to return
review: Our family stayed at your resort for 10 nights, our stay was wonderful, the girls had a ball, easy access to the pool & beach. The food was wonderful, the staff excellent, always polite & helpful, will definitely recommend you to family and friends. Thank you for a fantastic family holiday.

title: Wonderful
review: Dear Nichole C,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak to Australia.   Thank you for making our resort your preferred family holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience with your whole family. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our beautiful beach, the wonderful food, the fantastic pool access rooms and our excellent, polite and helpful staff. It is my great pleasure to share yor compliments with our entire team.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.   With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Heaven On Earth
review: Loved our experience at the JW marriot. We stayed 8 nights in a pool access room with a 20month old toddler. Room was very spacious, clean, regularly serviced, and the pool access was a real treat. Staff were friendly too. Buffet breakfast was one of the best experienced, especially the freshly made waffles, pancakes and croissants. We ate at all the restaurants, and though the food was delicious and of high standard. highly recommend the thai restaurant. The pools were a massive highlight and our toddler loved the resident elephant who visited the beach every few days. The resort is about a 10 min taxi drive into town. We ventured out every second or so night for dinner to some of the local restaurants which were authentic and delicious.  Cant wait to return to JW marriot next…

title: Beautiful beach
review: This property is one of the most beautiful resort I have ever visited and well maintain.Room spacious and high class.The beach is really beautiful and pool is big-very big indeed.Staff are professional.We didn't want to leave.

title: Amazing
review: Dear Vision98,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience in our resort. Thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as one of the most beautiful and well maintained resorts you have ever stayed in and we are very happy to read your great comments about our spacious and high class rooms, the beautiful beach and the professional team.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back for some more fantastic stays in our beautiful beach resort.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: November 2014  visit
review: We are just finishing our stay and have loved every minute. Everyone is so friendly and helpful, you can't help but have a smile on your face. The pool is immense, the room is fabulous, the food fantastic, the sunsets on the beach are a view to behold. We did the bike ride to the waterfall with What which was a great couple of hours. Congrats to everyone on a beautiful hotel. If we ever come back to khoa lak we will be back

title: Largest pool in SE Asia!!
review: Dear Maxifieldi,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the immense pool, our fabulous rooms, the fantastic food in the restaurants, the beach sunsets, the bike ride to the waterfalls and the beautiful overall resort.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.   With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Good but does not worth 5 stars
review: Nearly  two years had elapsed since my previous visit and I was wondering would it be as good this trip ?Well shortly after a reception/ arrival of many smiling face,s we arrived in room to discover petals on bed dolling out WELCOME BACK ,what a thoughtful and great start to a stay that only got better. Food again exceptional,all staff outstanding ,but special praise to TIN in the waterfront wonderful personality ,very helpful but one serious downfall he supported Manchester United!! Far to many individual staff to praise but our thanks to everyone for making our holiday so enjoyable and to Alex the rooms Manager for assisting in extending our trip as we were so do happy being back there. This resort is kept impeccably clean,managed to the very highest standards and well worthy…

title: Thailand's Hidden Gem
review: This resort is very well design with a thai touch and well maintain.The swimming pool is huge and one of the biggest pool I have ever seen.The resort have a  nice atmosphere and we had very relaxing time.Breakfast was delicious and biggest selection.Thai and Italian food was excellent.Service was great.

title: Our Favourite Resort- 3rd stay here!
review: Dear love m,  sunny greetings to Bangkok and thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a great place to relax.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our resort design and atmosphere, the pools, the breakfast, the restaurants and the overall service.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: week of relaxation, pampering and superb service!
review: Once again, from the moment we checked in, we felt at home. Had a pool access room and it was fantastic with our 2 boys ages 3yrs and 6yrs- Glass pool fence, Wing 5. Every encounter with a staff member was professional and welcoming. We had an all inclusive package, so as we dined for breakfast, lunch and dinner we really got to know the staff in all of the restaurants, as well as the day spa- Quan Spa. Special mention to Ke and Tarn, who really loved playing with our two boys and making them laugh at every meal. Poo, Beer, Boy, Honey, Nut- all the staff really were outstanding. All dining establishments were great. Varied menus. Boys love their first Teppanyaki experience with a playful chef.  Chef Boo, offered many handy tips at our cooking class.  Play, Pat, Koy and Pee…

title: Wow! Unforgettable :)
review: Dear Jetmel,  Greetings from your "second home" in Khao Lak!  Thank you for being one of our most loyal guests and for choosing our resort for your third visit during your recent vacation in Thailand.  We are very happy to learn that you again enjoyed a comfortable stay, thank you for your great comments about our restaurants and the delicious food, the pool, the spa and the comfortable rooms. Above all we really appreciate your nice words about the amazingly welcoming team and your memorable experiences with all our associates. It is my great pleasure to share your feedback with our entire team.  Thank you very much and we all look forward to celebrate with you your fourth visit to our beautiful resort very soon!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Another Great Stay
review: wow, what a place to just stop and do nothing. This resort is in the middle of no where so if you are looking to party every night it's not for you. There is Khao lak town which to be honest took me to the last day to visit for an hour two and I couldn't get back in the hotel van quick enough to get back to the resort. The grounds and the resort pool are immaculate. The swim up pool bars are great and I ate better here at the various restaurants (Thai, Japanese, Italian) then I did when in hong kong the week before. Cocktails (banana colada the best!) are an essential ingredient in my opinion to get through the tough days when I wasn't having a massage or treatment at the amazing spa....I stayed for 8 nights and I could easily have stayed for another 8. Hardest decision was to…

title: beatiful hotel.
review: This is one of the most beautiful hotels I have stayed at. Stayed in a suite fantastic room! It had an outdoors shower on the top floor. Hotels resturants are excellent all of them, I stayed there for 2 weeks. Breakfast is still one of the best hotel breakfast I have ever gotten. They even have a smoothie station. The pool area is awesome, it's perfect for family's and for romantic couples. But you come here for the hotel, not the location there is a small village about 10 min away with car with few shops and resturants even a McDonalds for those who got sick of Thai food. Even though they destroyed 2 pieces of clothing with dry cleaning through the hotel and the elevators did not work. I really enjoyed this stay!

title: Relaxing holiday
review: Dear Kristjaneinarsson,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback.  Thank you very much for your feedback about the one bedroom suite, the breakfast with smoothie station, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and recommend our resort for family and couples.   Once again, thank you for sharing your valuable feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort again in the near future!  Best regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing !!!
review: We have just returned from a very relaxing 11 night stay at the JW Marriott Khao Lak.  Upon arrival we were given a lovely fruit drink and some cold towels. I dont ever find check ins quick - so it was an average length of time.  We were then shown to our Family Pool Access Room,  which was very large and comfortably fitted two adults and two children (11y.o & 8y.o).  We all had a giggle at the bathroom with a large see through window.  But even more so at the glass toilet door!!  Fortunately there are some wooden venetian blinds that you can pull down for privacy. The pool is only about 5 steps away from your rear balcony, so you can sit and watch the kids at play, or join them swimming the 3km of waterways to get to the other 4 pools.  The kids pool has a small waterslide…

title: Clean Beach and Great Pool
review: Dear Janette M,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you very much for your comments on this website. It is with much pleasure to read that you have thoroughly enjoyed your stay including your check in process, your pool access room, the Infinity pool bar, the fabulous beach, the kids club and the great selection of breakfast,  Especially your comment about the nice, helpful staff, Miss Meaw, makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team, who are all doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  I regret to read about the inconvenience of late check-out locker room. We apologize for not having delivered towards your expectations and our standards. We have followed up immediately with our team to have these points resolved.  It would be nice to welcome you back soon again, enabling our associates to look after you once more. Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak as your holiday destination and sending you very best regards.   Sincerely yours,  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: This place is spectacular! It's everything that you expect from a 5 star hotel (and more). It's got gorgeous rooms, amazing swimming pools, right on the beach, friendly staff, luxurious food and breathe taking views. This place is absolutely outstanding and I could not ask for more!

title: Amazing property... Must visit once
review: We went for our anniversary vacation and I have to say.. It was one of the most beautiful properties I have stayed on till date! Very nice rooms with all facilities, a pool just outside the room window (the USP is definately the 3 km long pool that connects the entire resort) and lush greenery everywhere.  Even the food on offer was very nice and I was really surprised to see an Indian vegetarian offering in the in room dining menu.  The beach bar and all the restaurants were also great! Highly recommended for any travellers to Phuket or nearby.

title: Amazing facilities, staff, food and value. Best family holiday ever!
review: Dear Manik G,  Warmest greetings from Khao Lak and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beautiful resort with other readers on this website.  We are thrilled to read your review and like to thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for an excellent stay  We much appreciate the great comments about our beautiful property, the room, the longest pool in Southeast Asia and the Indian vegetarian in room service menu.   We are all looking forward to welcome you back for another vacation and I remain with very best regards.  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Outstanding property
review: We recently stayed at JW Marriott Khoa Lak for 10 absolutely wonderful nights.  From airport transfer to greeting staff to check in we were made to feel so welcome. The spacious, clean and beutifully decorated rooms with direct pool access were a huge hit. The resort was easy to navigate with it's lagoon pool layout with restaurants having stunning beach views. The Spa was amazing and a huge thank you to the wonderful staff there.  The free Kids Club was great with great and varied spaces and activities, good hygiene and bonus activities for a few dollars extra that my children loved. It meant we had wonderful hand made Thai souvenirs to bring home with us too. The hours were 9am till 8pm and it meant some Mum and Dad time was possible and very much enjoyed. My kids were never…

title: Andaman sea
review: Dear Leanne W,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred family holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a wonderful stay with your family at our beautiful resort, thank you for highly recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and your great comments about our amazing resort with our hotel facilities, the spacious pool access room, the longest pool in Southeast Asia, the amazing spa, the breakfast, lunch and dinner at Olive and Sakura, especially the ‘kids club’ and all the friendly service provided by Honey, Poo and Tin, the concierge team and the terrific fitness instructor. It is a great enjoyment to share your nice words with our entire team.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Wonderful place to relax
review: This was our first trip to Thailand & we can't wait to go back. We were greeted warmly on our arrival late at night. We were checked in with a minimum of fuss & shown to our room quickly. We stayed in a pool access room. Our beds were very comfortable, the room had a high standard of cleanliness & was well appointed.  The buffet breakfast was included in our package & a spectacular sight to behold. There truly was something for everyone.  Even though they were always busy we always felt well looked after. Drinks at the pool bar are a must, I highly recommend the Banana Coladas! The tours that were organised for us were wonderful & only in small groups which made it feel much more personal. Rooms were serviced at least daily, linens were changed regularly too. We were given a…

title: Very well maintained with excellent staffs
review: We had a great package through deals.com.au with all meals included.  The reception staff was very nice in allowing our friend's 13 yo daughter to stay as a kid without extra charge.  That allow the holiday to start on a positive note.  The pool is lovely, the garden is well manicured, the restaurants are modern, breakfast buffet is one of the best I've been to.  The only downsides of the resort is the air conditioning in the restaurants.  It's definitely need an upgrade, our son keep sweating profusely at most meals.  Live musics at the Olive restaurant and by the beach at night is exceptional.  It made me got up and dance.  We upgraded to the pool access family room.  It was large and fit our family of 4 comfortably.  The room need an air vent in the bathroom/toilet.  House…

title: Great stay Great food Great staff
review: Dear JamesNoah,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Melbourne!  We are very happy to learn that you enjoyed great family holidays at JW Marriott Khao Lak. It's a great pleasure reading your review, thank you for your fantastic comments about the longest pool in Southeast Asia the well-manicured garden, the live music at Olive restaurant, the studio family pool access room, the excellent coffee at the Deli, the Fitness center and, fantastic breakfast spread and above all the friendly service provided by our reception staff and Mr.Hor and the fitness team. It is a great enjoyment to share your nice words with our entire team. We have well noted your feedback about the air conditioning in restaurant and in guest room, the roof condition. We will immediately follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Once more thank you very much for your comments and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our wonderful resort.  Kind regards  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: The best relaxation in Khao Lak
review: All the above was great would go back. The only downside was the transfer from Phuket Airport to the Marriott. We informed the Marriott what time we were arriving and they said transport would be waiting to pick us up. We arrived and there was no one to met us, we found a guy there that was holding a Marriott resort sign showing another persons name, he said he did not know anything about us and did not know who was picking us up and seemed not to be interested in what was happening to us  My lady who is 72 was starting to panic and went looking for our transfer but could not find anyone. The guy that had been waiting for the person to go to the Marriot found him and put him in a car and was set to leave the Airport when I  asked him to check his paper work again to make sure he…

title: Everything you need and want
review: Dear Sir Den,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about the great food, the great staff and your great overall stay. Especially your comment about the great staff makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team, who are all doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  We have well noted your comments about the inconvenience during your arrival at the airport. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our transportation provider for further improvements.  Once again, thank you for sharing your valuable feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: A wonderful relaxing holiday
review: We totally enjoyed out stay at J. W. Marriott Khao Lak. Excellent service from staffs, spacious rooms, plenty of swimmming pools and activities.  The breakfast buffet was absolutely perfect and if you stay on a monday night, don´t miss out on the mediterranien buffet in the Italian "Olive restaurant". Nice beach, but the ocen water didn´t look clean (like everywhere at the Andaman coast in Phuket and Phang Nga). Waiters will serve you free ice-water, when resting in the beach chairs. Unfortunately the staff allowed the badly behaved "Master-people" (Americans and Germans??) to put their towels on the front row beach chairs early morning, IF they should later find the need, to visit the beach later in the day. We saw beach chairs occupied with towels, but definitely not in use…

title: Can't wait to go back
review: Every single part of this hotel has us wanting to visit again.   For us the best part of the hotel was the location. Some say its a little isolated but that made for a more pleasant stay for us. Being the beginning of the 'quiet' season we couldn't have asked for a better time to get away.  All the staff were amazing and remembered names and drinks and food choices at all the bars and restaurants.  The only down side was the package we had that included all our meals. We were left with a pretty small amount of options at each restaurant. We could have paid extra for more options but we didn't really budget to have to pay for food. We will next time.  The room - Very big and comfortable bed, nice relaxing balcony and very big bathroom. The actual bath was too big and water would…

title: Wonderful stay at Khao Lak
review: Dear BrentonH55,   warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Geelong and thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay and thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a great place to relax.  How gratifying to read your nice words about the hotel location, the comfortable room and especially the friendly staff. It is my great pleasure to convey your compliments to our team.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort again in near future!  With best regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great stay, excellent for families
review: We visited Khao Lak and the JW Marriott for 9 nights in October 2014. It was our first time to Thailand so we weren't sure what to expect! My reviews of Khao Lak had really been a small town with not much going on other than the hotels - we were very pleasantly suprised!  Khao Lak itself is a great little town with lots of small shops to wander through and great restaurants to eat at. The markets at Biang Nang markets are a must see on Saturdays, Mondays or Wednesdays. A taxi to and from town to the hotel is 300 baht.  The hotel as a whole is great! The pool is definitely the draw card. Everyday we swam the lap around all of the little canals and in the main pool - stopping at the jacuzzi seats for a relax and a drink at the pool bars. The pool is kept really clean and they seem…

title: Perfect place for perfect vacation
review: Dear Annalise A,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about our longest pool in Southeast Asia, the beautiful pool view room, the amazing breakfast, the tasty lunch, the Thai, Japanese and great atmosphere at Mediterranean restaurants, Especially your comment about the friendly and accommodating associate, Ms.Koy, makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team, who are all doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  We have well noted your comments about the deposit procedure and the necessary maintenance work. We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  Once again, thank you for sharing your valuable feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  With best regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive

title: Amazing pool - relaxing lovely stay
review: The hotel occupies huge grounds with countless swimming pools all interconnected and a private beach area. There is a wealth of facilities which accurately reflects it's status as a 5 star hotel. Hotel staff were excellent throughout from check-in to check out. Rooms are very large with large king bed, sofa and lounge bed which another could easily sleep on. We had a pool access room which made it very convenient but at the same time all the trees by the balcony meant there were many ants and the balcony was hard to use. Breakfast was excellent with a myriad of choices available and there was so much that on most days we didn't need to eat lunch! Many dinner options on site but a bit pricey in our opinion, but convenient if you didn't want to leave the hotel. There are a couple…

title: Excellent resort for family of five
review: We have stayed at the JW Marriott Khao Lak twice, returning in October 2014 after a shorter stay in September 2013 with our 3 children (aged 7 and 5 year old twins)  An absolutely fantastic resort. We stayed in two rooms with an interconnecting door on the 3rd floor. These rooms were serviced daily, spotless and had everything we needed. We enjoyed the daily breakfast in the restaurant which has everything you could want from coffee, fresh juices and French patisserie to sushi, noodles and eggs benedict. The staff are always attentive and beautifully mannered. The pool and beach are fantastic, very easy to spend your days relaxing between the two. There are pool bars for refreshments, an elephant visits twice a week for people to feed and pat, there are various organised daily…

title: Thailand experience
review: Dear Gvalps,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beautiful resort with other readers on this website.  I am thrilled to read your review and like to thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for an excellent family stay.  We much appreciate the great comments about the spotless rooms, the breakfast, the fantastic beach and pool, the excellent restaurants, the spa and the resort facilities. It is my great pleasure to share your nice words with all our associates.  We are all looking forward to welcome you back for another successful family holiday soon and I remain with very best regards.  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Good large resort
review: We spent 10 days at this resort in September and overall a wonderful time. Rooms were excellent, service superb and food great. We had a deluxe room overlooking the pool which runs around the whole complex though we chose to be on the 2nd floor whilst other rooms were right on the moat/pool. they were quite safe if you had children as there is glass fencing  in front of every room and really needs an adult or teenager to unclip the gate.If you want peace and quiet don't go in school holidays, either European or Australian as it can be very noisy or choose a room away from the water. the resort is right on the beach front so sea swimming is OK and safe. A choice from 4 distinct restaurants enable different cuisine each night and were all included in the package along with…

title: Amazing pool, lovely beach, rooms a bit dated, food/beverage overpriced
review: Dear granitav,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a fantastic stay and had such a memorable experience in our resort. Thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and we are very happy to read your great comments about our excellent rooms, the great food and the superb service.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back for some more fantastic stays in Khao Lak.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: 3rd. visit, but not as good as before when it was newly opened
review: Totally satisfied with this JW experience! Room was modern and beautiful. Experienced problems with wifi as soon as arrived but maintenance arrived and installed a router right in the room and was flawless after. Pool was enormous and fantastic. Beach was private and gorgeous no hawkers!  Not a boutique hotel but can find no fault whatsoever.

title: It was incredible.... Loved it
review: We are staying in the Marriott Khao Lak at the moment. The experience has been extremely satisfying. The food is really good which was a big surprise for us as we are purely vegeterians and it is difficult to find such food in these places. But, the Thai restaurant Ta Krai's chef took extra care and specially made good veg food for us. Same was the experience at Olive's, the Medittarenian restaurant. The pool access rooms are one of its kind. You have your absolute private space to swim and there is no noise of other swimmers. Its your own private pool with the liberty to join other people when you wish to as they are connected to the infinity pool. The waters at the beach are warm and inviting.  So are the spa facilities. Sure would love to come here again one more time.  Just…

title: A perfect holiday
review: Dear ami461,  Thank you for writing us about your experience in our resort, we are very happy to learn that you love your stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak.  It's a great pleasure reading your fantastic comments about our pool access rooms, the good food, the beach and the spa.  We all look forward to provide you with the most memorable experience for the rest of your stay with us and welcome you back in the near future to relax and rejuvenate at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: We got what we anticipated- and more.
review: this was our second stay ay Marriotts Khao lak property and if anything , it was better than the first time. Thanks to Alex, the resorts Director of rooms, we received the same rooms as our stay in April 2013, and our two weeks were perfect: even the odd thunderstorm couldn't dampen our mood. The staff at this resort are always smiling, and greeting you as you walk past them; it adds so much the overall feeling of peace and restful ness you get as a guest at this resort. Breakfast each morning was an absolute feast! A huge range of foods to tempt any palate is on offer between 6.30am and 11.00am each day, and keeps you going until dinner ( for us anywhere ). We had a pool access room in 3 block, which was nearly opposite the aquamarine bar: perfect for happy hour sojourns from…

title: A bit disappointing
review: Dear Peter,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travellers in this forum.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates were really friendly and always smiling is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team. I totally agree with you that our staff is adding the most to the peaceful feeling at our resort. I am personally very proud of our team and appreciate your compliments. It was a great pleasure taking care of your group, great guests make a perfect holiday.  Furthermore, thank you very much for recommending our awesome resort for the breakfast buffet, the pool, the pool access rooms and above all for being an oasis of luxury, peace and tranquility in the south of Thailand.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is looking forward to have the opportunity to welcome you back.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa - beautiful place- poor condition
review: After reading dozens and dozens of Trip Advisor reviews, and recommendations from friends who lodged here, we tacked on four days' R&R to a tremendous experience in Melbourne, AU.  WE FOUND THE STAFF TO BE ABSOLUTELY ON THEIR GAME, save for somewhat hurried explanation of room arrangements and amenities. The room we enjoyed was wonderfully appointed,and housekept to a fault. The smell? Yes, it's there, presumably because it's tropical and so humid you can squeegee yourself off. But we didn't find it obnoxious.  Enjoyed the rain shower a couple times but since our room was on the pool, we didn't have need for it much. So, here's some different "takes" on our experience. First, a safety issue.  If you get a poolside room where the deck has stairs into the pool, BEWARE. When the…

title: Exquisite!
review: The JW Marriott resort is an exquisitely designed resort located on one of the most unspoiled stretches of coastline in Thailand - Khak Keuk Beach.   The 300 odd rooms are surrounded by one of the largest swimming pools in Asia, a pool that allows most ground floor rooms direct access to the water and upper floors a view. The Quan spa is sumptuously decorated as is the entire hotel in traditional Thai architectural style. There are a number or restaurants, a traditional Thai, a Japanese style restaurant, and a Mediterranean style restaurant. The one sour note is that these restaurants follow the resort tradition of charging prices that are more rooted in the US or EU than they are in the country the resort is located. For more pocket friendly eateries there are a number of…

title: Continues to please and amaze us
review: Dear leoie,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for highly recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and your great comments about our hotel being exquisite.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Perfect!!!
review: Spent a few days here last week.   This is perhaps our 5th or 6th visit.   It is my wife's beach resort of choice in Thailand.   We both enjoy the 3.1 kilometers of lagoon pool as well.   We prefer the pool access rooms as it is only 3 steps from you terrace down into the water.  we often eat on the property.   There are many options...   The huge king beds are sooooo comfortable and the large bathrooms pamper you.  We love all the staff here.   The breakfast staff are especially welcoming.   Did someone say breakfast...?  It is huge, fresh and delicious....oh, those fruit smoothies with a dedicated staff just to make the..  The fruits, cheeses, eggs, bacon galore....  The huge beach is really nice as are the giant pools which connect into the lagoon system.  The grounds are…

title: Fantastic Place to just relax and unwind
review: Dear Robert,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for writing us about your experience in our resort, we are very happy to learn that you loved your 5th stay at JW Marriott Khao Lak. We really appreciate your loyalty.  It's a great pleasure reading your fantastic comments about our rooms with the comfortable bed and bathroom, the delicious breakfast, the beautiful grounds, the lagoon pool and the beautiful beach.  We all look forward to welcome you back for another great stay in your perfect place JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Honeymoon delight
review: We spent six days at this hotel last year and just had to come for more.  Again, it was absolutely PERFECT!  The rooms are large and well designed.  The bath rooms have a bath and a separate shower as well as two sinks.  There is a large window between the room in the bathroom with blinds for those preferring their privacy.  Each pool view room has a lovely balcony.  The staff is more than friendly.  They will go out of their way to fulfill any request.  The greatest feature of the JW Marriott is the vast and amazing network of swimming pools. Beautiful beach, fantastic breakfast (the best I've seen anywhere), great gym, lovely spa - what else can you ask for?? Just out side the gate you can rent a scooter for 250 Baht per day to explore the area.  On the beach near the hotel…

title: Lovely hotel which has thought of everything
review: We truly enjoyed staying at the JW Marriott in Khao Lak. The hotel has truly thought of everything - great spacious rooms, lovely large swimming pool with kids and adults areas, great facilities and nice diverse restaurants. Truly enjoyed staying in the pool rooms, which immediately give you access to the pool, the terrace in front of the room was also a nice space to sit back and relax.   If I do have to make one comment, then it would be with regards to the tennis court. The court is pretty well maintained, however in the middle of the net there is nothing to pull the net down (which a standard tennis court has), which really affect your play. On the one side of the court you have the gate, which is not totally closed off. This means that if the ball goes out it will end up…

title: We were spoiled!!
review: Dear Frei83,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to our neighbours in Phuket!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred family holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback on this website.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about our great and spacious rooms, the lovely pools, the nice and diverse restaurants as well as the overall facilities.  We have well noted your comments about the tennis courts and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  Once more thank you very much for your comments and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our wonderful resort.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Relaxing Holiday
review: We booked an 8 day package on line and were not disappointed.  We paid the small extra amount for a pool access room and airport transfers.  A very good move.  Our room was lovely - super king size bed, lots of cupboards and room to move plus a never ending supply of bath sheets and toiletries.  Not to mention the lovely little balcony overlooking the pool with comfortable chairs and foot stools.  The staff were delightful, so friendly and helpful.  The small touches were appreciated.  The welcoming phone call in the shuttle bus, the unsolicited delivery of a cake for my birthday and so many more instances  Breakfasts were excellent - typical asian style with multitudes of choices. I really enjoyed the fresh hot croissants straight out of the oven.  I thought the food at the…

title: Fabulous staff
review: Dear ebonygirl,  Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beautiful resort with other readers on this website.  We much appreciate the great comments about our incredible pool access rooms with spectacular views from the balcony, the room supplies, as well as the comment about friendly and helpful associates, makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team.   We are thrilled to read your comments about the excellent breakfast, the themed dinner buffet during the week of three restaurants, the fantastic food at Sakura, the Japanese restaurant and Olive, the Italian restaurant. We have well noted your feedback about the dinner and drinks experience. We will immediately follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.   Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are all looking forward to welcome you back in near future   With best regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: You've seen the rest now experience the best!
review: Our family recently had a lovely 10 days  at the resort. Even though it was rainy season, we had 5 days with some morning and afternoon rain  and 5 days of glorious sunshine. Though rainy the temps were still around 28-30 degrees so it really didn't stop us from doing anything. We had a family poolside room which was great. It allowed us to hop straight from our room into the pool and the kids were thrilled at the network of canals that took them to the main pool. Mum and dad were very happy to spend time at the infinity pool bar, and mummy loved those lychee daiquiris! The food at the resort was fabulous  but expect to pay Aussie prices  for it if not included in your package. You could quite happily spend all your time at the resort but that wouldn't be terribly adventurous.…

title: One of our best holidays
review: We bought a 8 night package deal through Cudo and it included all meals, accommodation, Thai cooking course and 8 massages (what more could you ask for!).  The value of the package was unbelievable and we had a ball :)  The buffet breakfast options are extensive and the Italian, Japanese and Thai restaurants served amazing quality food.  The staff were always courteous and helpful.  The kids club was great for our kids but probably would not be suitable for 8 years+ (the activity options suit younger kids).  The pool is amazing and because of the size, we never felt that it was overcrowded.  And the dayspa and fitness centre was fabulous! The only downfalls were the lack of TV channel options and movies and the transfer from the hotel to the airport was frightening (the driver…

title: A good stay overall
review: Dear Berlinda C,  Warmest greeting from JW Marriott Khao Lak to Sydney!  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable and fantastic experience, especially the breakfast, the Olive Mediterranean restaurant and Ta-Krai Thai restaurant with amazing quality food, the amazing pool, the fitness and spa. As well as your comment about the courteous and helpful associates makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team.   We have well noted your comments about the kids club offerings, the TV channel and movies selection and the airport transfer. We will immediately follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are looking forward very much to welcome you back when you are returning to Khao Lak.  With best regards, Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing
review: Stayed at the resort for 8 nights in September/October, as part of a Luxury Escapes deal.  The pluses: - hassle free pick up from Phuket airport. We arrived at the resort just bfore ten PM and were greeted warmly, and shown to our room - the pool access room was fantastic, just lovely to be able to access the pool directly from the bdroom. Some of these were fenced, so if you are travelling with you children, it is better to ask for a fenced room to ensure that kids are safe - breakfast buffet was extensive. More vegetarian options would have been nice, especially for the hot food.  - the pool and the gardens were lovely.  - spa was absolutely wonderful, one of the best I have experienced - most staff were friendly and did their jobs impeccably - ta krai thai restaurant was…

title: Large resort, nothing special.
review: Dear sgsydney,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Sydney!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred family holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback on this website.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about our warm welcome at arrival, the pool access rooms, the extensive breakfast buffet, the lovely pool and gardens, the wonderful Spa and Ta Krai restaurant and above all the friendly associates. Our team will be thrilled to read your nice words.  We have well noted your comments about the current renovation work, the kids club offerings, the TV channel selection, the birds in our Waterfront restaurant and the menu structure in Olive. We will immediately follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Once more thank you very much for your comments and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our wonderful resort.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fantastic Marriott
review: I stayed here for a week with my husband and both agreed it was an amazing hotel. The breakfast had the biggest range imaginable with freshly made pastries, pancakes, smoothies. Rooms were well decorated. We had a swim Up room which we loved. We ate at the hotel and the restaurant just outside the entrance. Both were Excellent. We booked a couple of trips and were Very impressed.

title: super place
review: We stayed at the mariott for 4 nights with our five year daugher. great place to relax and enjoy.  we took a family room with back door opening the pool canal which winds its way to the main pool.  good white sand beach though not the most colorful of waters.  it was rainy for most time we were there but plenty of activities indoor as well and the kids club is a great place for children to enjoy.  breakfast at water front is one the best i have seen at any resort or a 5 star hotel   very courteous and responsive staff, and the conceigre desk always willing to help and provide options. Our daugher slipped in the rain at the roadside late at night and the hotel staff immediately arranged for an attendant to provide the required medicare- very impressive  couple of good thai…

title: Great get away location
review: Dear ftalib,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred family holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a great place to relax and enjoy.  How gratifying to read your nice words about our breakfast, the beach, the kids club and above all the very courteous, helpful and responding team. It is indeed my great pleasure to share your compliments with our entire staff and especially with our Concierge team who was always willing to help and providing options.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort for more than 4 nights!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: A Fantastic Break Away from the Crowds
review: After spending a number of holidays in Phuket amongst other holidays in Thailand in years past, we decided to go to Khao Lak this time.  It's a little bit out the normal hustle, bustle and general craziness that you get in the touristy areas of Phuket.  We chose to stay at the JW Marriott, and we weren't disappointed in the Hotel itself, it was great!  We stayed in a family lagoon access studio and can't fault the room, plenty of room, and being able to walk out from the deck to the lagoon was brilliant.  For a young family, the pools are nothing short of fantastic!  3 separate pools with a canal that winds past every room which the resorts claims goes for 3km's and we saw nothing to dispute this claim!    2 pool bars, and one bar near reception are quite good, but to us the…

title: Fantastic resort in Khao Lak
review: Dear David524524,   Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak as your preferred family holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a relaxing and wonderful experience during your vacation. It is very gratifying to read your comments about our pools, the breakfast, the restaurants, the resort activities, the beach and especially that you recommend our resort as a great getaway location with fantastic staff makes us very proud and we really appreciate your compliments.  We have well noted your comments about the menu in the Mediterranean restaurant, the missing squash rackets and appreciate your recommendation in terms of beach cleaning activities. Please accept my sincere apologies for these shortfalls and we immediately followed up to further improve our services.  The squash rackets arrived in the meantime and the unfortunate delay was caused by our supplier. In regards of the menu in our Olive restaurant, we will change the menu on 1st November but to cover all culinary regions of Italy is pretty challenging since our Olive restaurant is offering mediterranean cuisine and not solely Italian. Furthermore I fully agree with you that there is some rubbish being washed up the beach next to us but our entire team is cleaning it twice a week and since we are the only ones in doing so it is rather difficult to keep the public beaches next to our resort under control and neat. Our main focus is obviously on keeping our hotel beach immaculately clean at all times.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback and when you are returning to Thailand, we are looking forward to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Disappointed !
review: In search of a relaxing, tropical break?..  then I thoroughly recommend staying at this resort highlighted by its beautiful location on a white sandy beach, along warm Andaman Sea waters, large pool that winds its way through the resort, friendly atmosphere and fantastic staff.   Guests include a balance of couples and families, and it does not feel crowded given the size of the resort. If you are looking for an active nightlife, loads of tourists and higher end mall shopping, then you should opt for accommodation around Patong and Phuket Town (which is 2-hours away).  Breakfast Breakfast is in the Waterfront Restaurant, and variety is large to cater for all. Popular stations include the Fresh Fruit Smoothies, Fresh Waffles and Pancakes. The fresh breads are also a favourite.…

title: Paradise in Khao Lak
review: We stayed at JW Marriott Khao lak for 4 days 3 nights. The resort not far from Phuket airport we take time around 1 hrs by limousine and after we arrived at the resort staff will serve good welcome drink. It make us to refresh. We stay on room number 3104 (Deluxe Lagoon Pool View) .The room is very luxury, comfortable bed, big bathroom and beautiful view at balcony. You can not imagine of amazing swimming pool until you come and swimming here. Buffet breakfast very fantastic. I recommend to buy tour at Khao Ta Pu island and Khao Ta Ru cave. If we have opportunity we will come back it again.   Chet.

title: Amazing. First timers to Thailand this is one you won't regret.
review: Dear Khun Chet,  greetings from Khao Lak and thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak your preferred choice during your recent short trip to the south of Thailand. We appreciate you taking time to share your comments with other readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such memorable days in our beautiful resort. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about the refreshing welcome at arrival, the luxury room with a comfortable bed and big bathroom, the beautiful views from the balcony, the fantastic breakfast buffet and the amazing pools.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Khao Lak, we are looking forward to welcome you back to your personal paradise JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Yours Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Nearly paradise
review: Just checked out of the resort and to say that my partner and I will miss this place is an understatement. The resort and the friendly staff have made our first trip to Thailand one to remember.  The food was beyond exceptional especially at Sukura (Japanese) with just as exceptional service from 'Beer' and 'Honey'  who spent time getting to know us and making us always feel special! The infinity pool was another favourite of ours perhaps because we spent a lot of our time there. The infinity pool bar staff were a massive highlight of our trip- they made us very welcome and made us laugh on many occasions (while teaching us how to speak a bit of Thai along the way). Thank you 'Meen' for everything.   We will be back! Phoebe & Brett Melbourne, Australia

title: STUNNING
review: Dear Phoebe, dear Brett,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak to Melbourne and thank you very much for your review of the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   We are very pleased to read that you received such memorable and friendly service throughout the resort and that you experienced a wonderful "first time" in Thailand.  Furthermore I am thrilled to read that you could fully enjoy our beyond exceptional food and the Infinity pool bar.  We are indeed extremely proud of our associates and it is my great pleasure to share your nice words about the wonderful and welcoming staff with our entire team, especially with Khun Beer, Khun Honey and Khun Meen.  Thank you once more for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak and we are all looking forward to welcome you back in the near future.   Kind regards,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful place for a honeymoon
review: We stayed here for 3 nights - the climax  of this Thailand holiday  The pool is so amazing - the length is more than several kilometers. From every room you can easily access the pool.  The beach is excellent - flat and wide. The sea is in the west so we could see sunset everyday.  The garden is rather beautiful - but not as famous as the pool.  I highly recommend the Thai restaurant and Italian restaurant - the best food I have eaten during this holiday.  This resort provides one of the best service I have ever got. For example, there is a late check-out lounge with sofa and shower- if your flight is in the evening, you can stay in the resort without many inconveniences.  As Marriott platinum member,  we got lots of benefits including room upgrade, happy hour and discount for…

title: perfect place for honeymoon
review: i had been staying in this hotel for 3 nights one this i really liked about the hotel is the location of the hotel it is perfect place to spend holiday with ur loved ones. the hotel has good swiming pool, good variety food, carring staff etc.

title: Khao Lak
review: Dear krunal3246,  Thank you for sharing your feedback on this website and describing your experience in our resort!   We are very pleased to learn that you had a wonderful stay for you and your loved one. Thank you for your feedback about the resort location, the swimming pool, excellent variety of food and well accommodate staffs which are indeed perfect for honeymoon.
