We look forward to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the near future!   Yours sincerely,   Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive   JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Total service and hospitality
review: We thoroughly enjoyed our time here. With Miss M (6 years old) & Miss P (4.5 years old) it really is a fantastic resort for children. The pool access rooms are superb, especially if requested around the kids swim area.  Look out for the fantastic deals which include meals and spa treatments. Well worthwhile.

title: Perfect Place, Simply Great
review: Dear gbcannon, Warmest greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak to Australia!  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are thrilled to learn that you enjoyed your family stay and had such a memorable experience, especially with the children at our beautiful resort.  It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our the superb pool access room with the kids area and the package which included the meals and spa.   Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.   With very best regards  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Pool is great!
review: My wife and I recently spent our anniversary here. From the time we were met at the airport by the driver until we checked out, the service and personal attention was exceptional. This Marriott stands for the reputation that comes with J.W. properties, everyone there was fantastic. They honored every request with very personal attention and followed up to make sure we were happy with all facilities and offers at the resort. We celebrated two times with the "Romantic Dinner" on the beach and we so very much satisified with the service and attention! I am looking at my schedules to see how soon I can return to Khao Lak JW next year! We actually left the hotel with plans to go to Samui Rennisance, but after 2 miserable days at that bad resort, we re-booked the remainder of our week…

title: Great getaway from everything
review: We stayed on a deal at JW Marriott wanting a resort holiday where we didn't need to think to much and just enjoy. And thats exactly what we did. The resort itself is very sprawling with a few buildings - our room was not too far from the reception or breakfast area - we were on the 3rd floor but enjoyed being away from the families and having a bit more piece. The gardens and pools are immaculate - you constantly see people sweeping the leaves and tidying which must be an endless job. The jobs are fabulous as everyone describes - you can head on little swimming adventures if you fancy. Breakfast was good each morning - ample choices with everything you could want. It does get busy so if you don't fancy a little wait head a bit earlier. We dined at the Japanese restaurant which…

title: Can't wait to return!
review: Dear Dee_Kiss,   Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak as your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a relaxing and wonderful experience during your vacation. It is very gratifying to read your comments about our pools, the breakfast, the good food, the gym and the spa. Especially that you recommend our resort as a great getaway is fantastic and we really appreciate your compliments.  We have well noted your comment about the Japanese restaurant, please accept my sincere apologies and we immediately followed up with the chefs involved to further improve our food quality.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we are looking forward to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: We will be back!
review: 58 days and counting until we return!! I thought about staying somewhere different after our stay in November 2013 but the JW Marriott has everything my husband and I need. Wonderful staff, great food, a beautiful beach and fantastic pool access rooms. We are returning soon and are staying even longer this time and I cannot wait to spend more time exploring the area. I recommend taking pool floats with you. There is nothing more relaxing than floating around that gorgeous pool. We stayed in pool access room 1029 with a small garden out the front for added privacy and would be very happy with this section for our next stay. Close to the beach and pool bar not too far to walk to the deli or reception and away from the kids pool.  Khao Lak and the JW Marriott are sublime - just go.…

title: Better than Koh Samui
review: Dear SMurphBrisbaneAUS,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak to Brisbane.   Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our beautiful beach, the great food, the fantastic pool access rooms and our wonderful team of associates.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are all looking forward to welcome you back very soon.   With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: The longest pool in the world...!
review: This resort was amazing - attentive staff, lovely rooms, fantastic pool, options for great activities. We had one of our best holidays here. We were travelling as a group of 3 adults (myself, husband and my mother) and two children (ages 3yrs and 10 months).   The trip from the airport is a long one, approx 1.5 hours. But the location is great, as you aren't in the hustle and bustle and can catch the resort shuttle into town or markets. This will cost an adult 50 baht each way. It's worth a visit to have a little shop and barter. The market and Bang Niang is interesting, but smaller than we expected. I guess it's comparative to the markets in KK, Sabah - suited to locals and tourists. It's worth trying the food in the local restaurants too - we went to Takeing twice, and would…

title: Simply Breathtaking
review: Stayed at the hotel for 5 days and 4 nights and everyday was a treat. The hotel offered tour packages (Green Andaman Travel) for most of the tourist spots around the area. The pool access room was definitely a cool feature of the hotel where you can just relax with the pool bar within the area. The staff were very accommodating and the food was superb. Definitely a must try for this part of Thailand.

title: Amazing
review: Dear Poy V,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a must try and we apreciate your great comments about the tour packages, the pool access rooms, the superb food and the very accommodating team of associates.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Will be sorry to leave
review: This property blew me away. The rooms were incredible, the views were spectacular, the people were friendly, the direct pool access was UNREAL, and the food was A+.  We stayed for 4 nights in May for a wedding. The staff was accommodating to the entire, massive group. It was over-the-top but in the best way I could ever have imagined. I never wanted to leave! This place was one of the best vacations I have EVER been on and I don't see anything matching it anytime soon!.   Room: The room was large, the bed was soooo comfy, and the bathroom was spectacular. Everything was clean. When we first got there we did notice a head sticking out between the boards of our deck. We called the front desk who sent some people to get (what we thought was) the snake out of the deck. 1 hour later,…

title: Amazing hotel, amazing staff
review: Greetings from Khao Lak and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beautiful resort with other readers on this website.  I am happy to read your review and like to thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as the best vacation destination which you never want to leave again!   We much appreciate the great comments about our incredible pool access rooms with spectacular views, the room cleanliness, the comfortable bed, the spectacular bathroom with big tub and shower, as well as the beach and the great food at the wedding and room service. We have well noted your feedback about the language barriers you encountered, please accept our apologies and we are working hard to constantly improve the language skills of our team by conducting on property and online English classes.  We are all looking very much forward to welcome you back again in the near future and I remain with very best regards.  Chatlada Rattana Guest Relations Executive  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Paradise.
review: We r staying at best Resort we have been in around Asia.  Still here but can't say enough about the service, surroundings and comfort.  Choice of restaurants amazing.  As older couple it offers relaxation, but activities if we want.  Planning elephant trek for husbands birthday on 9th and cost thru hotel very reasonable. We will definitely be back with friends! Well done Marriott!

title: Great stay!
review: We stayed for a week and had a fantastic time - the value can't be beat. Pools access rooms were excellent, the pool bar/beach was perfect for relaxing and the hotel restaurants (and nearby local beach restaurants) had good food and reasonable prices.   The highlight of our stay was actually our breakfast server, Tin. I'm a Platinum and have stayed in many, many Marriotts but have never seen someone go so above and beyond to ensure a good stay. Thanks Tin! Make sure you ask for him in the mornings!

title: fabulous setting for great holiday
review: Dear dwr1127,  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read that you as one of Marriotts most loyal guests fully enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience.   Especially your comment about Khun Tin providing great hospitality, going "above and beyond"  during breakfast makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team, especially with Khun Tin who is indeed one of the "highlights" in our resort and doing an outstanding job every single day in taking care of our guests.  Furthermore, thank you very much for sharing your positive experience in our pool access rooms, at the pool bars and the beach.  I am thrilled to read that you had such a fantastic and relaxing time at the JW Marriott Khao Lak.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are looking forward very much to welcome you back when you are returning to Khao Lak.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Loved the endless pool:)
review: this hotel is set on a beautifull beach a few kilometers from the centre of khao Lak we stayed in the off season so the place was pretty quiet but absolutely lovely. the staff were exceptional giving service over and above the 5 star standard,the restaurants were pleasant although most nights we chose to eat in the local beach bars. the hotel layout pools and gardens are excellent and extremely well kept,the rooms are spacious and extremely comfortable with a generous supply of toiletries etc topped up twice a day from the friendly room service staff. even the late departure facilities are first class and there is no needd for late check out.  a faboulous hotel in a great location for r & r

title: No customer care AT ALL!
review: Dear pest12,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak to the UK.   Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our beautiful beach, the excellent and well kept pools and gardens, the spacious and comfortable rooms and the first class late departure facilities. Most importantly we are very proud to read your nice words about our team providing service above 5 star standard. Our associates will be thrilled to read your positive feedback.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.   With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Fabulous chill out
review: The buffet breakfast was outstanding even for vegetarians like us..They had an Indian counter :).The fresh fruity milk shakes were yummy. Loved the direct access from the room to the pool..We practically saw the whole property from pool..Loved the balcony and slept on the couch gazing at stars.Wonderful experience. The staff was lovely.

title: Honeymoon
review: The best start to our honeymoon we could of asked for.  Incredible service from the moment we checked in.. All staff were very friendly and welcoming.  Really appreciated and enjoyed the effort you went to in our too since we were on our honeymoon!! we received in our room.. Breakfast was fantastic, amazing selection! We did eat several of our meals along the beach, Phen was our favourite, sad it had to move from beach but understandable!  We went on the hotel shuttle into town, was a fun afternoon and much more enjoyable than shopping in Patong! Going through hotel was cheaper than taxis outside the gate!  This resort was the best place we stayed in Thailand.  There were a lot of family's staying but don't let this put you off as resort is so big and the pool is soo long, can…

title: Customer service - second to none.
review: Dear Hamish W,   Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak as your preferred honeymoon destination and for taking time to share your comments with other readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you fully enjoyed your stay and had such an unforgettable and amazing experience during your honeymoon. It is very gratifying to read your comments about our fantastic breakfast selection, the pool and the great Infinity pool bar team. Above all, to see you mentioning the incredible service provided by our very friendly and welcoming associates, leaves us very proud and it is indeed a pleasure to share your feedback with our entire team.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we are looking forward to welcome you back.  Sincerely Yours,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Under new management?
review: From the minute we arrived to the minute we left, we were made to feel so incredibly welcome. All of the staff were so lovely. No request was too much for them. The breakfast team and reception were especially wonderful. They loved our son, and went out of their way to spend time with him.  The pool is magnificent. Easily one of the best we have encountered through out our travels.  We dinned at Ta -Krai , which we loved. I would also recommend venturing out to the beach restaurants on either side of the resort. The views are spectacular, and you will find some interesting characters working there.  The shuttle bus into town was a favourite.  I would come back to JW Marriott in a heart beat.   The management team should be so very proud of their staff.

title: "Stunning 24/7"
review: Dear MichB_12,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak to Australia and thank you very much for your review of the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   We are very pleased to read that you experienced such memorable and amazing customer service throughout the resort and that you and especially your lovely son felt so incredibly welcome.  Furthermore I am thrilled to read that you could fully enjoy our lagoon pool, the Tak-Rai restaurant and our shuttle bus service.  We are indeed extremely proud of our associates and it is my great pleasure to share your nice words about the wonderful staff with our entire team.  Thank you once more for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak and we are all looking forward to welcome you back in the near future or "in a heart beat".   Kind regards,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Absolutely brilliant
review: We are not travelers that like to return to destinations, in particular hotels, however, this was our third (!) visit to this resort and it continues to be a very special place.  The grounds are beautiful and we really enjoy the spa and facilities available as we usually head there to relax, not travel the area - which is a good thing given the location is a long way from many 'tourist spots'.  On this trip however, we noticed a few things that concerned us about the property and really took it from being a great review to just a good one.  The small touches had seemingly gone lessening our overall experience.  What I am about to outline when stood-alone are all rather small, but put together it did take the shine off our 5* hotel expectations: - no-one to greet us on arrival at…

title: Paradise!
review: The JW Marriott in Khao Lak is paradise! The hotel looks to be furnished and of top class. The pool... The pool is just superlative. The hotel is great, and is highly recommended. The staff are also too kind.

title: Most awesome swimming pool in Thailand
review: Dear jen s,  greetings from Khao Lak and thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak your preferred choice during your recent vacation in Thailand. We appreciate you taking time to share your comments with readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such memorable and relaxing days in our "Paradise" resort. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our top class hotel, the superlative pool and the very kind staff.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we are looking forward to welcome you back to your personal "Paradise" JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Yours Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Water World!
review: The swimming pool runs like a river for km around the hotel premises. Hotel architecture is astonishing and classy. Rooms luxurious, spacious. You cam access the pool from your balcony. Service can be slow especially room service and the restaurants

title: Newport Booked 11 nights but stayed 21
review: Dear Corrado G,  Thank you, as a Top Contributor and experienced traveller on this website, for writing us about your experience in our resort, we are very happy to learn that you enjoyed great holidays at JW Marriott Khao Lak.  It's a great pleasure reading your review, thank you for your fantastic comments about our lagoon pool as the most awesome pool in Thailand, the classy resort architecture and the luxurious and spacious rooms.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Amazing holiday experience
review: Located 2 hours away from the Phuket airport (and Phuket city), in a small sleepy small Thai town is this Amazing property, with a waterbody 3 Kilometers long, more than 4 huge pools and a beautiful beach. Swim, walk or wade through the waterbody running through teh hotel to reach any restaurant or your room, enjoy the fresh sea food at a shack right on the beach just outside the hotel. Just outside the hotel are a few restaurants, including an Italian, Indian and thai restaurant.....   Go for a solitary quite time. if you are looking for a "Happening" party place, this is NOT for you. This place is strictly for relaxation. For a mix of party and relaxation, stay at this property for 3 days, then shift to Phuket town for 2 days of partying. Water sports, diving etc. activities…

title: stunning, just stunning resort domain
review: We had booked this Marriott a while ago, and we'd like to thank our travel agency ( andaman adventures , theyre pretty famous for Southern Thailand ) to incorporate this resort in the itinerary they created for us - visited 8 destinations in total, outrageous holiday ! Anyway the Marriott ended up fitting in real nicely with the luxury resorts of our AA itinerary, certainly was up to scratch with them. Very oriental looking, not the international Marriott kindof styling. The staff, as always, was so friendly and attentive to us - without fault. The meals are simply better than in the local restaurants we tried occasionally. This Marriot delivers the goods ! recommended

title: Awesome
review: Dear Rafael G,  Thank you very much for the nice words about our friendly, attentive associates here at the JW Marriott Khao Lak and for recognizing the resort for its stunning, oriental and luxury look in this forum.  It is with much pleasure to read that you have thoroughly enjoyed your stay including your meals in our restaurants.  It would be nice to welcome you back soon again, enabling our associates to look after you once more. Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak as your holiday destination and sending you very best regards.  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful
review: My wife and I recently stayed here on our first visit to khaolak, we were greeted with smiles all round and everyday, I found the service was underpassed by any place I have stayed, the food at breakfast was astounding and most staff went out of their way to be friendly and helpful, as well as to try and learn your name, this impressed me a lot, we found the pool and surrounds very soothing and beautiful

title: lovely quiet location
review: Dear Rodney S,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read you enjoyed your stay in our awesome resort and had such a memorable experience.   Especially your comments about the services provided by our friendly and helpful team makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our fantastic associates who are doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  Furthermore, thank you very much for sharing your positive experience at our breakfast buffet and the beautiful pool and surroundings.  Once again thank you for recommending our resort and we are all looking forward very much to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Relax, Swim, Relax some more
review: First time to thailand and stayed a week in lagoon villa which was near beach. It was a perfect place to relax whether by the pool, on the beautiful beach or day spa.  Food was also great especially banh Thai, and dining on the beach overlooking the andaman sea, priceless   Couldn't have asked for a more relaxing break. I would like to thank all the staff for making our stay an enjoyable one. Hope to be back soon

title: Heaven on earth!
review: This place is simply incredible! I loved every minute of my stay here.  We went on a Luxury Escapes 8 night package and it was such great value. The spa treatments were an absolute delight. The spa is incredible and each therapist was just incredible.  The food is amazing. I personally preferred to go to a restaurant when the buffet wasn't on as I felt it was a more personal experience however the buffet was still lovely. Make sure to try the Chocolate dessert from Olive. It was just amazing!  The staff however are what makes this resort. They are all super friendly and so very helpful. They are happy to chat to you. Sue from front desk was very helpful! There is so much to do at this resort yet it was so lovely to just relax and do nothing.  AMAZING! +++ Thanks to all who made…

title: Do yoursef a favour and get in quick!
review: Dear AuntieLaura88,  greetings from Khao Lak and thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak your preferred choice during your recent vacation in Thailand. We appreciate you taking time to share your comments with readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you had a perfect stay and had such memorable and relaxing days in our beautiful resort. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our spa, the great food and most importantly the very helpful and super friendly staff.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we are looking forward to welcome you back to your "heaven on earth" JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   Yours Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Relaxing week at a wonderful hotel
review: We completely reiterate all other positive comments made about this wonderful, relaxing resort. Thank you Vetch the Omelette king at breakfast, wanted to take Lily from the Quan Spa home with us, and Robin is the best waiter in the world. We used Luxury Escapes and found the process completely seamless.  Will definitely be back! :)

title: Beautiful resort
review: Dear KarenHoward123,  Thank you for sharing your feedback on this website and describing your experience in our resort!   We are very pleased to learn that you had a great stay, thank you for your great compliments and comments about our wonderful and relaxing resort. Our team takes great pride in providing warm and genuine hospitality to our guests and your feedback about our associates is really appreciated. It is a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team and especially with Khun Vetch, Khun Lily and Robin. I am sure your review will make them super happy and proud.  We all are looking forward to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak very soon.  Yours sincerely,   Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Excellent for relaxation !
review: We stayed here for 7 nights - hotel is excellent in all areas but it is the staff that help make this hotel what it is.Tin at the Waterfront Restaurant was fantastic . He was always there to help us and always made us laugh . He is a credit to the JW Marriott Hotel at Khao Lak.

title: Amazing...
review: Myself hubby and our 2 girls 7 & 4 visited the resort from 2/8-12/8 on a luxury escapes deal and we where totally thrilled with our experience!  Transfer was perfect,check in all great, nice big clean room #3003 everything you could want, amazing pool and staff and restaurants and day spa and the room service people where amazing they cleaned our room beautifully twice a day, and it didn't change at all while we we where in the resort loved it....   I had read on prior reviews complaining smell of mould /paint /run downt etc but really the resort is wonderful if you have ever lived with the weather condition beach/sand salt/rain/heat/humidity it is a never ending process in keeping everything maintained you finish and you think great, NO you have to start again from the start as…

title: Do yourself a big favour
review: Dear VBDDLVB,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred family holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read you enjoyed your stay in our amazing and wonderful resort and had such a memorable experience.   Especially your comment about Khun Meaw, Khun Tarn and Khun Joy providing such an exceptional service at our Waterfront restaurant, makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our fantastic team, especially with the above mentioned associates who are doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  Furthermore, thank you very much for sharing your positive experience at arrival, check in and our breakfast buffet. I am also thrilled to read your compliments about the room, the pool, the restaurants, the spa and the housekeeping services. We really appreciate your comment about the overall condition of the resort since our engineering and maintenance teams are working very hard throughout the whole year and I am sure your nice words will make them very happy.  Once again thank you for recommending our resort and we are all looking forward very much to welcome your lovely family back in the near future.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: "Great spot for some R&R despite a rocky welcome"
review: Magnificent Resort, it might be 90 minutes north of airport, but it's well worth the effort, and the sights on the way give you an idea of semi rural Thailand. The pool is the biggest and best I've seen, and the rooms are excellent, very clean and functional. All the food outlets were high standard and the buffet breakfast has a huge variety. The Cafe was very good value for light meals. But best of all is the service, out of 10 I would give it an 11, wonderful smiling staff throughout that couldn't do enough for you. Congratulations to you all, we'll be back.

title: Family Stay
review: Dear JKMarriott,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travellers in this forum.   We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. Especially your feedback that our associates and the service they offered are a 11 out of 10 is very satisfying and it is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team.  Furthermore, thank you very much for describing our resort as magnificent and recommending us for the pools, the rooms, the restaurants and the breakfast buffet.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and our whole team at JW Marriott Khao Lak is looking forward to welcome you back.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Beautiful and relaxing
review: We have just returned from a 8 night fully inclusive package at the JWM and despite a disturbing error upon arrival I have to say the balance of our stay was excellent in every aspect.   We arrived at Phuket Airport on JQ17 at 2210 on 17/8/14. I had received an email from the hotel on 1/8/14 confirming both our arrival and departure details together with information on where to meet our driver. After collecting our luggage we went to the meeting point and attempted to find our driver. Unfortunately after walking up and down for about 20 min I was unable to find anyone with our names on their board. I did speak to 2 people who had the name of the hotel on their boards but with other guests names. Despite checking their lists neither contained our names and neither person offered…

title: A great hotel with minor hiccups
review: Group of seven, 6 adults and one child (2 years) staying in 3 deluxe pool access rooms 8-23 July 2014.  Check-in We arrived the hotel around 12pm, luggage was promptly taken care of and we were taken to the hotel lobby. A lot of people arriving at this time, but even so we were quickly helped and given some ice tea and refreshing towel.  Only one room was ready, so we were told to all go there and wait and they would come with the key cards for the two other rooms when ready. Check-in time is 3pm, at 3:30pm I call the reception. Seems like they have forgotten us.   We get the rooms around 4pm. The first room has not been renovated and is quite worn down. After some back and forth my cousin who stays in the room is able to change. Before arriving, we asked for two interconnecting…

title: Great
review: Dear geddi,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to Norway!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred family holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback as a senior contributor on this website.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about our super friendly and helpful associates, the fantastic breakfast and the amazing pool. Our team will be thrilled to read your nice words.  We have well noted your comments about the minor maintenance and service delivery issues you experienced and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  Once more thank you very much for your comments and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our wonderful resort.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms  JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Anniversary
review: I do not really understand the people giving bad reviews. What on earth are talking about when they speak about mold or moldy smell or run down rooms... Not ours, definitely. It is very unfair to say this. We were even wondering (and we would have bet) that the resort was built post-tsunami, so brand new everything looks.  The breakfast was spectacular, staff really kind, beds confy, high quality cotton linen, everything was just great, really.

title: Sweet Escape!
review: Dear cloninggirl,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred choice during your recent stay in Thailand and for taking time to share your comments on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you fully enjoyed your brand new looking room with the comfortable bed and high quality linen, the breakfast and most important the really kind staff. Fantastic to learn that you had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team who is indeed outstanding in taking care of our guests.  Thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa and we are all looking forward to welcome you back soon.  With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Quality hotel in isolated area
review: My wife and I arrived for 7 days to celebrate our 40th Anniversary.  We stayed in a pool access room which was fantastic for us. We also took the special package to celebrate our anniversary which consisted of a private chef (Mana) and Steward (Nu) in our own cabana on the beach.  We enjoyed the expansive breakfast buffet with fresh juice bar and made very good use of the "Deli" where we could get light meals, snacks, drinks and ice creams. Pool was massive joined together with main pool but had privacy as well with well placed hedges.  The site was a little isolated but that didn't really bother us as we had plenty to do on site. We had very good assistance from the tour desk when we asked to go to Exotic Fishing Thailand in Phang Na which they were unfamiliar with. We got…

title: Great experience for family holidays...
review: If you want to spend quality time with your family at a good resort with all amenities (pool, beach, spa) this hotel is a great choice. We spent a great time with our 2 year old daughter ... Between the swimming pool and the beach! They have as well a children garden/playground for those who want to spend some time at the spa without their children :o)

title: sheer indulgence
review: Dear Nutella2310,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak to Dubai and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beautiful resort with other readers on this website.  I am thrilled to read your review and like to thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for great family holidays.  We much appreciate your great comments about the beach, the pool and the kids club.  We are all looking forward to welcome you back again in the near future and I remain with very best regards.  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Good food and flashing.
review: An eight day package to a resort is not our normal type of holiday but we thoroughly enjoyed it. In fact we were so content with the resort and it's facilities that we didn't venture outside the gates for the whole of our holiday, although there were plenty of things we could have done.   We travelled with my brother and sister in law. We chose to organise a transfer from Phuket airport and back with Khao Lak Land Discovery Tours.  For 4 of us, we found them a little cheaper and very reliable. (1500 baht each way for the vehicle and driver).  They had a pool access room and we had a first floor room with balcony. The rooms were identical inside. Its the outside where the rooms differ. While the pool access would be great for families to supervise their children in the water…

title: Lovely relaxing holiday in a beautiful location.
review: Dear YvonneT,  Greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for making our amazing resort your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience.   Especially your comment about Khun Tarn, Khun Nuch, Khun Tin, Khun Mam and Khun Thorn being welcoming, respectful, courteous and making your stay as comfortable as possible makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team, especially with the above mentioned associates who are doing a fantastic job in taking care of our guests.  Furthermore, thank you very much for recommending our resort for a relaxing and indulgent holiday, the comfortable rooms, the restaurants and food, the pool and the spa.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are looking forward very much to welcome you back when you are returning to Khao Lak.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: awesome resort, super friendly
review: We stayed at the hotel for 8 nights with our 4 and 1 yr old kids.  We had a fantastic and relaxing holiday.   We were picked up from the airport by the hotel car/minibus and they had put 2 baby seats in there for the children, as we had requested.  It was an easy drive, to under 90min and the road was fine. We just shared one room which was large enough for us and we just sat on the balcony at night which was quite large.  The bathroom was a little bit tired and a bit musty smelling (maybe due to us but I don't think so).  Also the toilet door was glass, so I copped an eyeful a few times. Also the pool access rooms are quite exposed as you swim bye.  I saw a few bottoms, but this provided me with a few giggles when I swam around after happy hour.  The pools were great and very…

title: A quiet place to relax
review: Folks, if you are a busy bee and prefer lots of activities (shopping, bars, clubs, etc.), this place is not for you. But if you are in need of peace and quiet, and really want to just escape the hustle of city life, this is perfect.  Just returned from staying at the hotel for 11 days. What left a lasting impression is the service. All the staff were attentive and courteous -- the best we've ever encountered. Management needs to give all the staff a big bonus!  Like other posters have said about the restaurants, there's only three at the hotel with limited variety on the menu. After a while, it gets a bit monotonous. Sitting outside of the restaurants whenever possible made a big difference though. The Deli is great, but it's indoors. Too bad the hotel doesn't use the extra…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear T B,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak to Bangkok and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beautiful resort with other readers on this website.  I am thrilled to read your review and like to thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as a relaxing, peaceful and quiet "escape".  We much appreciate the great comments about the overall great hotel, the pool and especially the excellent service provided by our attentive and courteous team. We are very proud to read that you are rating our staff as the best you have ever encountered. It is my great pleasure to share your nice words with all our associates.  We have well noted and appreciate your recommendation of utilising the beach area, which we are currently working on.  We are all looking forward to welcome you back again in the near future and I remain with very best regards.  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great place to stay
review: What a place! Stayed 12 days and absolutely loved it. The highlight has to be the pool - all 3.2km of it! Great for lazing or swimming. Rooms are a very good size - plenty of space and the bathrooms are gorgeous. Breakfast is really good and will keep you going most of the day if you stuff in as much as I did. The restaurants are good but a bit pricey. However, there are some real Thai beach restaurants just down on the sand that are great value. Really good massages too! Staff were really nice and helpful, and the overall standard of service was excellent. If you are looking for somewhere to relax, eat well and are not bothered about bright lights then this is the place for you.

title: Isolated
review: Dear MrRobSharjah,  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable and relaxing experience.   Especially your comment about the nice, helpful staff and the excellent overall standard of service makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your nice words with our entire team, who are all doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  Furthermore, thank you very much for sharing your positive experience in our well sized rooms, gorgeous bathrooms, at our breakfast buffet and in our restaurants.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are looking forward very much to welcome you back when you are returning to Khao Lak.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Amazing property and pool
review: Booked a deal with a tour company and were not disappointed at all.  We found the people the resort the food the gardens absolutely wonderful.  We travelled in monsoon season so it rained a lot but that didn't stop us.  The rooms are great, the spa's fantastic, the pool reminds me of Venice it just meanders up and down canals and is crystal clear and beautifully maintained.  It is a long way from the city etc. so if you want to go and do things a bit more as a tourist I wouldn't spend you whole holiday here.  We just wanted to relax so it was perfect for us. There are so many little private areas that you can escape to so the size of the resort and the amount of people are never overwhelming.   Sasha the dining co-ordinator is spot on with her organisation and Tin and Boy two of…

title: However you want to spend your time.. You can!
review: This resort has a lot going for it.  A windy pool going all the way round the hotel, offering more swimming than you could ever need to do even if you're in training! A great gym, a choice of food places including some great little ones on the beach that are super cheap.  Good choice of tours, a lovely spa and breakfast will keep you going for most of the day.  Very pleasant room, light and airy with terrace and garden.

title: A great place to just relax & renew your mind
review: Dear Blackgeoffrey,  Greetings from Khao Lak to the UK and thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination in 2013!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for your great comments about our pleasant rooms, the pool, the food at the various restaurants, the breakfast buffet and the lovely spa.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Exceptional Family Vacation
review: We had purchased a special for 3 nights inclusive of breakfasts & a free thai massage for 2. We loved it, from the decor of the hotel to the service & smiles of the staff. The food at the Olive was great & every one enjoyed their meals. The buffet breakfast had such a huge variety that there was no way to try all the different dishes out in 3 breakfasts. My young adult kids loved the library & so did my 4 yr old grand-daughter. As well as the pool. Only regret not having gone into the sea. The red flag was up all 3 days but it was only around sunset on the last day that we saw ppl swimming in the sea. By then we had had our fill of the pool.

title: JW Marriott at Khao Lak
review: Dear VeiledTraveler,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for a relaxing holiday and to renew your mind. Your great comments about our nice decor, the pool, the food at Olive restaurant, the huge variety at the breakfast buffet and the library are truly appreciated.  I am thrilled to read your nice words about our service quality and the smiles of our associates. It is my great pleasure to share your compliments with our entire team.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: JW Marriott exceptional pool
review: Our trip to Khao Lak was a last minute decision, and we decided to stay at JW Marriott without much information.  It turned out to be a wonderful stay.    Not only was the resort well maintained and wonderful, the service was exceptional - from the point of check in to check out, everything was smooth and the staff went out of their way to provide assistance.    We were also quite happy with the restaurants on the premise and the direct access to the beautiful beach.    Our boys loved the pool, the beach and everything the resort had to provide.

title: JWMarriott
review: A wonderful hotel with incredibly helpful staff.  We enjoyed a relaxing break at Easter.  The breakfast bar options had to be seen to be believed.  The hotel was completely full when we stayed there but it never felt crowded. We loved the cocktails and nibbles on the bar balcony and watching the sun set

title: Beautiful resort with excellent service
review: Dear 159TheresaP,  Greetings from Khao Lak and thank you so much for your review on this website.  Your compliments are greatly appreciated and it is very nice to know that you enjoyed a relaxing break at our wonderful resort. Especially your feedback about the incredibly helpful associates leaves us very proud and it is my great pleasure to share your comments with our entire team.  I fully agree with you that even during very busy periods our resort never feels crowded and leaves plenty of privacy for our guests to relax and unwind.  We all hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Everything was fantastic
review: We stayed at this resort for 3 days. After few initial hiccups during check-in, where there was no bell boy to assist us to park our car (we rented a car to explore this area),our remaining stay was very nice. The resort sports a huge pool area. The beach is quite nice barring few stray dogs which we found at 300-400 mts on both side of the beach area.  Room was very nice. Breakfast was delicious with wide variety. 2 highlights of our stay at this resort were: 1) Beautiful sunset view: one of the best I have witnessed.  2) Amazing staff: They have an excellent staff at every service touch point. I would especially like to mention 'Nuch' and 'Poo' who served us at the restaurant. Very charming ladies. They would even remember the guest and their preference, and would stop by to…

title: Greatest pool
review: Dear at3122014,  sunny greetings from Khao Lak to Singapore and thank you very much for your review of the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa.   We are very pleased to read that you experienced such memorable and amazing customer service throughout the resort and particularly the charming service by Khun Nuch and Khun Poo in our waterfront restaurant. Furthermore I am thrilled to read that you could fully enjoy your very nice room and the delicious breakfast.  Above all it is my great pleasure to share your nice words about the excellent staff with our entire team.  On another side, we have also taken good notes of your improvement recommendations in terms of the arrival experience.   Thank you once more for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak and we are all looking forward to welcome you back in the near future and refresh your good memories during your next visit to Khao Lak.   Kind regards,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: Wow, we are still dreaming about this hotel even after returning from our trip! We are typically budget travelers but decided to splurge on this hotel during our tour of Thailand. It was a very welcome change to come from Bangkok to this gorgeous, peaceful resort.   The service of the staff is exceptional. Nana at the front desk was incredibly helpful and went out of her way to answer questions for us as well as leave us a welcome gift in our room. Tin at the Waterfront Restaurant breakfast room was always so kind and helpful. Loved the variety of the breakfast buffet. Really enjoyed the Thai cooking class that they offer.   The pool was amazing and the beach was beautiful. We absolutely loved our room - especially the bed!   All in all, we loved our stay here and have already…

title: Neglected... below JW standard
review: Having read all the good reviews and coming from the JW in Phuket, we anticipated our next 4 nights to another JW. After the nice welcome at reception, huge was our disappointment once we saw our room in detail. I understand that this hotel was very affected by the tsunami but the rooms need major refurbishing from top to bottom. Everything was moldy and musty, the attached pictures are a testimony of the hotel's desolate condition. As we had 2 rooms on different floors, our room was not an exception. Especially the balconies were disgusting with fungi growing on it and the black mold stains simply overpainted, so that the paint was peeling . On the outside corridors, in the service niches, trays with used dishes and remaing food remained there for 24 hours. Even a mattress…

title: Nice hotel, needs maintenance, Reception Staff Service Fails Hotel
review: Dear luxk69,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us very detailed about your experience. Thank you for your great feedback about our pool and the beach.  I am deeply saddened and regret to learn of the unsatisfying stay you experienced with regards to the condition of your room and the overall facilities. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused, I have followed up immediately with our team to ensure these unpleasant experiences will not reoccur, your feedback is important to us and supports us to improve our service in the areas where needed.  I understand clearly the frustrations and doubts that you have experienced and would like to assure you that your feedback has not gone unnoticed. We all hope that this experience has not caused you to judge Marriott differently.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to regain your trust and welcome you back to our resort in the future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great Hotel,very friendly Staff
review: The Good: Staff are generally nice (especially those at the restaurants and especially OIL at the Thai Restaurant who was attentive and so obliging, 5 stars for her!), restaurants offer fantastic food, rooms are clean and very nice, nice sized bathrooms, large rooms, comfy beds, rain showers, good water pressure and temperature  The Not So Good: Hotel needs maintenance and a new paint job, room that I was in had hoards of birds living in the rafters just outside my door so together with birds you get p.. (you get my drift, we had to duck in and out of the room quickly to avoid the birds), power was intermittent (not too bad though), weak weak weak (did I say weak?) wifi, aircon died but service staff came immediately and sorted it out  The Bad: Perhaps it was because the rest of…

title: Paradise!!! Excellent everything, we will definitely be back!!
review: Dear charmthebear,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about our associates, the restaurants and the rooms.  We have well noted your comments about the necessary maintenance work in the resort and the service delivery issues you experienced with our Front Office team.  We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  Once more thank you very much for your feedback and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our wonderful resort.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Amazing resort - perfect family holiday
review: Very clean and peacefully hotel. friendly Stuff and great food. The Spa area was a must every day, very relaxing and clean as we'll. We highly recommended this Hotel and we looking forward to come back next year. Special thanks to Tin, Tain and Honey.

title: Great hotel needs more maintenance
review: We had a great time staying here. BUT I must say it, since no one is... the minute you walk into the room there is a stuffy smell almost like old sheets, maybe because of the moisture in the area. The airconditioner's filter is super dirty! Also I was laying my head on the pillow, about to sleep, and I noticed the the lamp is really dusty and thats not such a pleasant feeling, to sleep under dust. Other then that the pool is great and all restaurants in the hotel have real great food! I found some hotel staff a bit upset if I would ask for some thing a bit extra like "can I have that eggs benedict with no sauce and no bread please?" I would get a wierd look or a huff and then a yes... just makes you feel uncomfortable to ask next time.

title: Great Hotel, Staff and Food
review: Dear ailenebk,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  Thank you very much for your great feedback about our pools and the restaurants with their great food.  We have well noted your comments about the smell in your room, some service delivery issues and the lack of cleanliness. During this season of the year with heavy rain and high humidity our team works very hard to avoid any unpleasant odors in the rooms.  We deeply regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will certainly follow up with our team evaluating these points for further improvements.  Once more thank you very much for your feedback and we all hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back to our wonderful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Everything we could have wished for
review: Had a great weeks stay at Marriott Khoa lak Resort and Spa in Thailand. A classy Oasis with 3knm of pool, and suitable for couples and families alike one hour north of Noisy, tawdry Phuket. Sensational staff and ammeities, what else can we say about it.. A special thanks to Tin and staff at breakfast for making us feel relaxed, welcome and invited. I do not believe we have seen happier staff anywhere. Will definatley go back at soonest opertunity.

title: Just Beautiful
review: Dear Anthony C,  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred choice during your recent stay in Thailand and for taking time to share your comments on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed the amenities, the food, our 3 km lagoon pool and most important the sensational staff. We take great pride in providing a warm and personalized service and we are most pleased by reading your feedback about feeling relaxed, welcome and invited by our associates. Fantastic to learn that you had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team and especially with Khun Tin who is outstanding in taking care of our guests at breakfast.  Thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for families and couples alike and we are all looking forward to welcome you back to your personal classy oasis in Thailand.  With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Highly recommend. Wonderful resort!
review: Months after our trip we are still smiling due to very fond memories of the friendly staff, the yum-tastic breakfast buffet, white sandy beach on-site, the pristine surroundings and amazing pools. It's a must go!!!

title: Not what you would expect from a 5 star resort
review: After having visited Bali many times we decided to try something different. The JW Marriott Khao Lak is advertised as a 5 start resort. Our experience would suggest it is more like a 3 star!. In the car from the airport to hotel we received a call from hotel to welcome us to Thailand and they were looking forwards to welcoming us to the resort. They asked if I had any questions and I only wanted to make sure we had interconnecting rooms (as requested and confirmed with us. We have 3 girls, youngest aged 7 so it is important to us that we only book hotels that confirm this). They said yes it was noted on our booking. So imagine our surprise when we arrived at the hotel to check in we were told that interconnecting rooms were not available. Infact thew best they could do was room…

title: We'll done
review: Dear Joe F,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us very detailed about your experience. Thank you for your great feedback about our restaurants and the food, the Quan Spa and our lagoon pools.  I am deeply saddened to read of the inconvenience you experienced with regards to the availability of connecting rooms upon your arrival and the service levels at breakfast and Czar Bar. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience caused, I have followed up immediately with our team to ensure these service delivery issues will not reoccur.  My apologies that the late check out lounge was not communicated to you properly during check in. I regret to learn of this inconvenience - your feedback is important to us and supports us to improve our service in the areas where needed.  I understand clearly the frustrations and doubts that you have experienced and would like to assure you that your experience has not gone unnoticed. We all hope that this experience has not caused you to judge Marriott differently.  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward having the opportunity to regain your trust and welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Absolutely Beautiful!
review: A great resort on the beach with everything in it, a great infinity pool, activities for children as well as adults. Restaurants are also very good with Chinese, Italian, Japanese and Thai cuisine and if you want a change go for a restaurant just outside the resort not far. The hotel needed a renovation which was already going on but no doubt a great resort.

title: amazing hotel
review: Dear Agha I,  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience in our resort!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for your kind comments about our lagoon infinity pools, the resort activities for adults and children, our various restaurants and for recommending our pool access rooms and pool view rooms with a great balcony.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Incredible resort, great beach, amazing pool and fantastic service
review: Stayed here for 4 nights in July with a voucher that reduced the price - what an impressive Resort! With 4 restaurants, 3 bars, and 3km of swimming pool, you can get an idea of the grand size of this place. Was really impressed with everything on offer....great food, service, and activities to do (although was quite happy to lounge near the ocean and the main pool most of the time....). I did one of the various biking tours to a local waterfall which was neat (not an amazing waterfall, but the ride was the best part). Bfast options are awesome, and you can order grt room service also - their on site Thai restaurant is a must visit. The Deli is also grt for fresh sandwiches and smoothies! Ideally suited for families as so much for kids to do, but equally impressive for any type…

title: Great Relaxing Holiday
review: We spent two wonderful weeks at this resort. It is isolated; which we wanted to relax and do little; but may not suit those who are looking for more lively night life.   The hotel is built in the Thai style, with a wonderful entrance and lobby. There are five three story wings, which are split into Thai house blocks with pointed red tilled roofs. All have balconies / verandas and the bottom floor has access to the canal pools.   Our room was on the third floor overlooking the Aqamarine pool bar, was nicely decorated with a big mural over the bed and other art throughout the room. The room was spacious with a big double bed; setee and chase longe. There is a large flat screen built into the wall and three telephones. The bathroom is divided from the bedroom by a glass wall with a…

title: Great holiday experience at JW Marriott resort,Khao Lak.
review: Dear Darron R,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa for a relaxing holiday and your great comments about our spacious rooms, the pool, the various restaurants, the faboulous breakfast buffet, cooking classes and the overall immaculate resort.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experienceand we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: 4th time and it keeps getting better
review: We just returned from a 10 night luxury escape package to this fantastic resort,fully chilled out thanks to the wonderful friendly staff who make it a pleasure to stay here. I think we have been converted to having spar treatment (as a couple) as we did not know how good the massages or treatments would be,our shakra's have never been so well aligned thanks to "Pe" & "We" who are both expert masseurs ! Food was exceptional ,the selection for breakfast was just magnificent,something for everyone every day. We found the Olive Restaurant to be the best and suited our more European tastes although the Thai and Japanese were good also although a little less slick with service,Janne runs a tight ship as the Exec Chef in Olive ,your Exec Sous Chef also really looked after us,like…

title: Perfect in every way
review: Dear Steve and Nicky,  Greetings from Khao Lak to Melbourne!  Thank you for making the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa your preferred choice during your recent holidays in Thailand and for taking time to share your detailed feedback on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed the in Spa treatments, the breakfast, the restaurants and the delicious food, your excursions in the local area and most important the wonderful friendly staff. We take great pride in providing a warm and personalized service and we are most pleased by reading your feedback. Fantastic to learn that you had such a memorable experience on your 50th birthday. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team and especially with Khun Pe, Khun We, Khun Nuch, Khun Tin and Chef Janne who are indeed outstanding in taking care of our guests.   We have well noted your helpful comments about the wine list and the refurbishments which are currently in progress. We will follow up with the team to improve the situation immediately.  I hope you had a safe journey back home and once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Khao Lak, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.     With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Relaxing @ a long distance away
review: This was our fourth time at the resort. Everyone continues to be amazing. We have great experiences with everyone from the bars and restaurants to management and housekeeping.  The food at the restaurants is Delicious, and there are also several restaurants and massage huts along the beach. Blue Mist and Mama's are a couple of our favorites.  You can spend a week at the resort and not cover all of the pathways through the pool. Just get a float and a drink and you'll be set for a day.   We will be back for our fifth visit in February!

title: A wonderful Anniversary holiday
review: We spent eight days in this first class resort. Food, amenities, room and customer service were faultless. Entire staff were friendly and we would highly recommend this resort. We especially loved the pool, which meandered around the resort, so you could walk everywhere in warm crystal clear water. We had a room with balcony, which had steps directly into the pool. The beach was also lovely, although the water had a strong under tow and was unsafe to swim at the time we were there.

title: So Much to do
review: Dear Jenny E,  Sunny greetings from Khao Lak to Sydney!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination to celebrate your anniversary.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing a review about your experience in our resort on this website.  Thank you for your great feedback about our pool and pool access rooms, the amenities, the food and especially our customer service. I will ensure to share your nice words of recommendation about our friendly associates with our entire team.  We all hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort for your next anniversary!  Yours sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: The Venice of Thailand
review: Squash - table tennis with unusually good playable racquets - great gym- pool that you can swim around the resort Good food - possibly don't stay in July it rains 50% of the time Staff are very nice and say hello when eyes meet Good trip One negative 1 1/2 hours from Airport

title: a paradise place for vacation
review: Dear Steven Z,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Thailand and for taking your valuable time writing us about your positive experiences.  We are pleased to learn you had a comfortable stay and enjoyed our Resort sports activities so much. Thank you for your great comments about our pool, the food and most importantly our nice and friendly associates.  Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Kind regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Excellent resort hotel that will not disappoint
review: I had jaded glasses on when we checked in at the hotel as we'd just spent four days at our favourite boutique hotel in Phuket. However, the hotel warmed on us and surpassed our expectations. Staff were superb and genuinely friendly. The rooms were very spacious for our family of four (the boys 5 & 7 were on the day beds). The breakfast was lovely and the pools as advertised, were massive - the pool-bar crawl was a must-do. Luckily the weather for October wonderful - be aware this is the season of wild seas and minimal snorkeling so day trips were limited with a younger family.   Without asking, or informing any of the staff my son, who turned 5, had a 'Happy Birthday' song at breakfast with a bear pancake, later in the day a delicious chocolate cake arrived to keep the…

title: very enjoyable stay
review: my family and I have just returned from an 8 night stay at the Marriot. It proved to be an excellent choice. Most of the positives have been covered by other reviewers so I will only add a few quick points.  -If you're after a beach holiday May -October is not the time to go. The rainy season brings with it strong winds and murky water. Likewise diving is not an option at this time of year. Not the hotels fault of course and it wasn't a concern for us.  -the staff are very friendly and willing to help and most have reasonable English skills.  -the tour desk only books tours with one tour operator, Green Andaman. We went on 3 tours and were very happy but I'm sure with a bit of effort you could book tours much cheaper in town.  - the hotel has an excellent gym with a good range…

title: Excellent
review: Dear pahSydney,  Thank you for taking time to share your comments and your valuable feedback as an experienced traveler and  TopContributor on this website.  We are very happy to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience in our resort. Especially your comment about the helpful and friendly staff is really appreciated and leaves us extremely glad and proud . It is indeed a pleasure to share your comment with our entire team.   Furthermore, thank you very much for recommending our gym for Thai boxing classes and our pool access rooms, which are indeed the perfect choice for families.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and  we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak resort & Spa soon.  With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms Jw Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: An Amazing Hotel with Exceptional Staff
review: 2nd stay here. Excellent grab a pool access room.  Expensive. Drinks and meals, but optons close by cheaper.  Far from khao lak centre - 400 baht tuk tuk  Staff fabulous,  pools and facilities - hard to beat HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

title: Check in
review: Dear Topbloke68,  Sunny greetings from JW Marriott Khao Lak.   Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for spending time to share your feedback with other travelers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience. It is indeed a pleasure to read your comments about our fabulous staff and our pool access rooms.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.    With very best regards  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Amazing Experience - Beautiful Staff
review: My husband and I have just had a wonderful 10 night stay at the the fantastic JW Marriott resort Khao Lak. The hotel is beautifull, the grounds are immaculately maintained as is the magnificent pool, the rooms are cleaned to a high standard every single day. But without a doubt the  greatest asset at this beautifull place to stay are the fantastic staff, they are the most helpful, friendly, polite people I have ever met, from the staff that greet you at the reception to the hard working maintenance staff that keep the hotel and grounds in the beautifull condition it's in. The staff in the reastarunts are especially friendly and helpful they manage to make every guest feel special. I would like to give a special mention to two particular staff that made our trips to the…

title: Excellent choice for a getaway
review: Hotel is right next to the beach with a lazy river connecting all the building to the main pool. Ground floor rooms have an immediate access to the water which is very much fun for a family with kids.   Hotel staffs are very friendly and helpful, whatever inquiry would have a quick response. Spent 6 nights, enjoyed the sun/beach and Thai hospitality, joined the cycling tour to a waterfall, rode elephants. Due to the humid weather, towels in the room might get smelly however housekeeping change them everyday which is very thoughtful. Overall we have a great stay.

title: Perfect fit
review: Dear SKIsaround,  Thank you for sharing your feedback on this website and describing your experience in our resort!   We are very pleased to learn that you had a great stay, thank you for your feedback about our Pool access rooms, which are indeed perfect for families with children.  Great to read that you enjoyed the activities in Khao Lak and had such memorable experiences.  Our team takes great pride in providing warm and genuine hospitality to our guests and your comment about our very friendly and helpful associates is really appreciated. It is a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team and especially with our Housekeeping department.  We look forward to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak in the near future!   Yours sincerely,   Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Great family Holiday
review: My husband and I recently spent 8 nights at this spectacular resort. From the moment we arrived to the moment we left the service, staff and the resort itself was everything we could have hoped for and more. I could not fault my stay and will definitely return. We wanted a relatively quiet holiday away from the hustle and bustle and that is exactly what we got. The room was spacious and the bed large and comfy. We swam daily from our pool entrance deck. The swim up bar was a must each afternoon. The meals in the restaurants were fantastic and the staff always friendly. The pool is definitely the draw card as it meanders through the entire resort. We visited the day spa for relaxing treatments that were all you would expect from this world class resort. A must visit.

title: Too large and impersonal
review: Dear 15Tanya69,  Greetings from Khao Lak and thank you very much for sharing your comments about our beatiful resort with other readers on this website.  I am thrilled to read your review and like to thank you for recommending the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa to be your preferred holiday destination as a world class resort in Thailand.  We much appreciate the great comments about our rooms, pool, Spa, the meals in our restaurants and above all, the friendly service you have encountered whilst staying with us.  We are all looking very much forward to welcome you back again in the near future and I remain with very best regards.  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

title: Stunning hidden secret
review: We recently spent 10 nights at the Marriott with our family.  Our room was spacious and well appointed with comfortable lounge chairs on the balcony and a king size bed . We enjoyed lazing around the pool but would have liked more day beds near the children's pool. Our grandchildren enjoyed the kid's club and the meals we had there were most enjoyable.  Staff were very attentive and friendly.

title: Pool pool pool...did I mention the awesome pool?
review: Great location for a family holiday, we stayed a week in a swim up room. Loved the pool, we could swim almost everywhere we needed to. We ate several nights at the traditional restaurant on the beach (to the right) no problems at all. The taxi drivers out front actually were good value for money and would happily recommend a daytrip schedule without accidentally taking you to their "cousins shop". Would stay again.

title: Second visit to JW at Khao Lak
review: Currently in rooms 3005 & 3006 poolside and while still a great place the hotel should indicate to people that are booking that the hotel is undergoing renovations all over the place. The exterior of our room is currently being painted as we sit in it enjoying the strong smell of paint. Why not wait until rooms are vacated before working on them? This is in no way relaxing, and we came to relax.

title: Almost Perfect
review: Apart from office staff who took their time to reply to emails and a mix up on transport the hotel experience was absolutely great.  Three restaurants offer a great variety of excellent food,  we especially liked the Japanese one.  All the staff seem to be genuinely welcoming,  friendly, and helpful.  It is really difficult to fault the hotel....  BUT,  The hotel seems to be rather isolated and there is not much to do unless one goes on their expensive tours.  There is a shuttle service to the nearby town which leaves you there for 2 1/2 hours before the pick up,-  too long to stay in a hot,dirty, un-interesting town..  So,  If you are willing to spend time in luxurious surroundings, eating delicious food,  then this is the place for you

title: Perfect honeymoon!
review: We had a great stay at the Marriott in khaolak..Nice big room and what a pool!! made our stay so romantic and wonderful..very polite staff and helpful..Breakfast was huge and the view spectacular..we had some weather issues but there was nothing you could do to get bored at the hotel...we will surely return..

title: Great resort away from the bustle
review: Dear greta h,    Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak as your preferred honeymoon destination and for taking time to share your comments with other readers on this website.   We are very pleased to learn that you enjoyed your stay and had such a romantic and wonderful experience during your honeymoon. It is very gratifying to read your comments about our spacious and nice rooms, the breakfast and the pool. Especially that you mention our very polite and helpful associates leaves us very proud and it is indeed a pleasure to share your feedback with our entire team.
