Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and when you are returning to Thailand, we are looking forward to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Excellent stay!
review: The hotel was great!  Duty mgr, K. Fon showed professionalism and delivered great hospitality.  We experienced some booking errors through the internet, but she helped us sort out and comforted us. Gift, the one who escorted us to the room, she has that pretty smile on her face that will sure to brighten up your day.  Nicolas at the reception is also very friendly.  The hotel is surrounded by a 3.2km long swimming pool, which is so super long, it will take probably 2-3 hours to complete the whole track.  However, one thing about the swimming pool is that, only some places are actually suitable for swimming, while some pools have depth of around 0.3 meter, which is hard for adults to swim - it would be good for small kids though. They have two pool bars, one in the front pool…

title: Luxury oasis
review: Dear Nathelf,  Thank you for making our resort your preferred holiday destination and for taking time to share your comments with other travelers in this forum.  We are very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and had such a memorable experience.   Especially your comment about Khun Fon, Khun Gift and Nicolas providing great hospitality at our Front desk and smiling friendliness to brighten up your day, makes us extremely proud. It is indeed a pleasure to share your comments with our entire team, especially with the above mentioned associates who are doing an outstanding job in taking care of our guests.  Furthermore, thank you very much for sharing your positive experience at our breakfast buffet and with the great room facilities. I am thrilled to read that you also enjoyed the swimming pool and the tasty cocktails prepared by Tom in our bar.  Once again thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we are looking forward very much to welcome you back when you are returning to Khao Lak.  Sincerely,  Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Needs Refurbishment!
review: Lovely hotel, set out on large grounds with an amazing pool that you never feel like people are on top of you. Staff very friendly and polite. Grounds are immaculate and poolside staff are always offering water to you as you sit by the pool or beach. So many other activities, so if you are wanting a change from the pool there are plenty of other activities that all the family can be involved in, like table tennis, squash, pool table. Rooms are very decent and plenty of room, and well attended to by the staff. I would recommend if you have children that can swim, get a pool access room then they can play in the pool while you are on a sun lounge at the room. The restaurants at the resort are all standard resort prices, so expensive compared to local eating - depends what you are…

title: Great experience...room for improvement
review: Dear Megan M,  Thank you for sharing your feedback on this website and describing your experience in our resort!   We are very pleased to learn that you had a great stay, thank you for your feedback about our Pool access rooms, which are indeed perfect for families with children. Great to read that you enjoyed the breakfast variety and quality, the resort activities and our Japanese restaurant.  We take great pride in providing warm and genuine hospitality to our guests and your comment about our polite and friendly associates is really appreciated.  We look forward to welcome you back to JW Marriott Khao Lak in the near future!   Yours sincerely,   Alex Schoell Director of Rooms

title: Beyond expectation
review: I actually feel guilty complaining about this hotel because they treated us very well. That being said, I just didn't like it. We came here after staying at the amazing JW in Phuket so perhaps our expectations were too high? Our first room was a 2 levels but it was very dark and smelled of citronella. We then moved to a huge suite that was very nice but the rest of the hotel badly needed a facelift.   The pools were nice but, again, the children's slide bordered on dangerous due to disrepair. The large pool by the beach was certainly the nicest and the beach was quite lovely. We really enjoyed the Japanese restaurant but the main facility felt like we were on a cruise ship. Very busy although there was always plenty of food.   I later discovered that the tsunami had been very…

title: Just the best
review: I went here with my boyfriend for a romantic experience - and boy it did not let us down. The pool-side room was beautiful and the pool terrace was very cozy and gave you a feeling of privacy. The pool itself is huge (biggest in asia they say?) and it's very very pleasant to just float around in it for hours on end just talking and having drinks. The restaurants are pretty expensive but good - there's cheap nice restaurants on the beach within a 5 minutes walk - which is really pleasant anyway.  The staff was also excellent, very nice, friendly, attentive. Also with a sense of humour and a good understanding of english.  Only downside I could think of is that the pool was slightly on the warm side, but it was exceptionally warm then, and I imagine cooling a pool that size is…

title: JW Marriot Khao lak family resort
review: we stay here only for 2 nights, but really feel too short, i will back again to this resort. Very nice to stay here, many activity we can do when we stay at this hotel, kids also very happy, this hotel get swimming pool about 3 km total long.

title: We'll above expectations
review: The husband and I purchased an eight day all inclusive package for this resort in April and have just returned from an outstanding holiday in Khao Lak. As can often be the case, advertising blurb can give one false expectations, however the JW Marriott was fabulous in every respect. The rooms were spacious, clean, very quiet and as for the beds and pillows ... Amazing. There are three restaurants and a couple of other bars etc on site. Without exception, the food was excellent. Most of the rooms have direct access to jewel of the resort - the two kilometre pool that is immaculately kept. Perhaps for us one of the nicest surprises was the very high standard of training all staff have clearly had, their friendliness and level of service. We loved every minute and had a truly…

title: Fantastic Holiday experience for all ages
review: We have just returned from a visit to the JW Marriott where we stayed for 10 nights with another family of four. Both famalies had children ageing from 5-11 years old. We could not have hoped for better service and facilities. The pools were amazing, as was the breakfast and the restraurants in the resort. The Quan spa has a fantastic ambience but if you like authentic strong thai massage visit either the massage places on the beach or just outside the entrance. Much cheaper and stronger. We did upgrade our rooms to a one bedroom suite with a larger balcony and was definatley worth it - just for the balcony alone. We are already planning our next trip!

title: Lovely resort without a heart
review: The resort is fairly isolated being 2km off the main road and 10km from Khoa Lak centre. However, this seems to be the case for most resorts along this part of the coast.  The resort itself stretches back from the beach where the three restaurants are, to the main lobby, small bar, Deli and kids area. They are quite separate parts of the resort with nowhere that provides a central focus for people to meet, mix and be entertained. This includes the three large pools around which the resort is built. It is a lovely place, but has no social heart.  The pool access rooms are great allowing you to step straight off you private deck into the pools that circulate the resort.  If you are looking for an active, vibrant, social centred holiday, this is not the resort for you. But if you…

title: Fantastic family resort
review: We stayed here for 8 nights in June 2014. From the moment we checked in the service was 5 star... Special mention to sue from reception, highly professional & nothing was too much trouble. We travelled with our 3 sons, 4,8,9 & had interconnecting rooms over the pool. The rooms, amenities including the gorgeous smelling bathroom amenities & oil burners were a lovely touch. 3 kilometres of pool & waterslide really made the holiday for our kids. Not only that, on rainy afternoons the squash courts, pool table, table tennis & gym facilities kept everyone happy. Breakfast was sensational & service incredible. Everyone here gave exceptional service especially Tarn in the restaurant. The only feedback I could give was that the kids club did not offer much for kids that did not want to…

title: Great resort in a very relaxing setting
review: Loved loved loved this resort. Starting from the beautiful welcome and the gorgeous reception to the stunning swim up pool rooms with their massive tubs and showers. The attention to detail can be seen throughout. The staff are helpful attentive and go the extra mile.  We are not giving the resort a 5 star because of a few things. On of them being the the dining options in the resort. We were disappointed with some of the restaurants in the resort (refer to our separate reviews for the restaurants). The food was overpriced and not so great at two of the restaurants, namely the Thai and Japanese.  During the low season most of the other outside restaurants close up because of the bad weather (especially if on the beach) so dining in the resort is really the only option unless you…

title: Perfect for relaxing and more!!
review: I recently took my daughter for a stay at the resort. I'm not usually a resort fan however there was good deal and I have not stayed on the west coast previously. As the resort is 1 and half hours drive from Phuket International airport it is important to be picked up and this hotel does it well. There is a cost involved but avoids frustration on arrival. The hotel itself is only 3 storeys in height in any one place and well spread out around over 4 kilometres of swimming pool. As well it is located right beside a lovely beach safe for swimming. There are no motorised water sports so very peaceful. It is possible to be as up market or "invisible' as you choose. There are wonderfully cheap eating places , mostly to the right of the resort, where you can eat and watch the sun set.…

title: Wonderfull Hotel and Spa
review: Since more than ten years we stayed in several hotels in Thailand, but this one must rate as one of the best. The JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa is a fantastic hotel and my wife and I had a great stay for seven nights. The hotel staff were a delight, services and amenities excellent and the facilities are first-rate. The range and quality of the breakfast and the food in all the three à la carte restaurants of the resort was superb. The crew of the Spa was very helpful and absolutely professional. Overall, we would not hesitate in recommending staying in this hotel.

title: Relaxing
review: This was an amazing place. It was so relaxing with the 3.4klm swimming pool winding around the resort, enabling us to step off our porch into the water.  Also had a massage every second day.  The staff were so pleasant and obliging.  The food amazing. And the rooms were very comfortable and clean and serviced twice daily. The beach only metres from the resort.  Also found the local markets (9klms) were accessible by the Resorts Shuttle Buses or the cheap local taxis.  Rest and relaxation was what I wanted, but if you wished to go on excursions, this was also readily available through the resort. Families were well catered for and looked after.

title: Not bad but not exactly fantastic
review: We stayed for a total of 5 nights. Check in was good and personalized. Strange thing was that they needed the e certificate and I ended up emailing the email confirmation. Never had to do that at any of the Marriott hotels. Room was nice and quite clean. Dated is indeed an appropriate word to describe many of the things in this hotel.   What was fantastic was the pool. It was huge and very relaxing for floating around. The kids pool didn't seem very clean. Water was a little murky.   Having read so many raving reviews about the breakfast, I must say, I was no where near impressed. Actually very disappointed. For 5 mornings, there were exact same things being served. I really mean exact same things. I'm not taking about the sausages and bacon. They served the exact same veg,…

title: Noisy Indian wedding
review: Dear cattwl,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience in the resort. We appreciate your feedback and will re-look at the breakfast offering as per your observations. We hope to have the chance to serve you again in the future, however we know that te two Rennaissance hotels in Thailand are also excellent choices. So, please let us know if we can assist you with your travel needs in Thailand.  Best regards,  Ty Collins General Manager

title: The ideal beach resort
review: We expected so much of this resort, but we were disappointed.  More than half of the resort was taken over by the guests of an Indian wedding.  Our first night was sleepless as a result.  The room was small and had no table with which you could eat your room service off of. Cleaning of the room was haphazard at best, sometimes cleaned sometimes not.  We had to contact reception twice on one day to get it cleaned. Room service food trays from other rooms were left outside for up to two days, resulting in birds picking food off the trays and scattering it all over the walkway.  When the food tray was removed the food was left on the walkway.  Turn down service appeared once in our stay of eight days. Food handling hygiene questionable.  When you attend one of the buffets, make…

title: Will back again!
review: Dear beaustravels,  Thank you for taking the time to write and share your experience. We sincerely regret that you were dissatisfied with your stay. We will discuss some processes within our team to see how we can improve. We would also appreciate if you could share some of the specific details of your stay with us such as room number, offline,  so that we may have the opportunity to specifically address the points you have raised. Our team works hard to improve each day and we hope to have the chance to regain your trust again in the future.  Respectfully,  Ty Collins General Manager

title: Highly recommended
review: If there was heaven on earth, this place would come close.  It has everything you would look for in a relaxing beach holiday - a great stretch of beach owned by the hotel, couple of beach shacks within walking distance, the best pool you are likely to see, great rooms, and staff that was smarter and more conversant in English than you would otherwise find in Thailand.  The food stands out, as does the spa, which is again, among the best anywhere in the world. There are a few activities such as treks, elephant rides, ATV rides, close to the hotel as well.  If you are looking for a relaxing holiday in Phuket, Khao Lak and the Marriot is definitely worth the 1.5 hr drive and a far cry better than the options you will find in Phuket.

title: Stay with confidence
review: just arrived back in aust' after 8 days at JWM. used a deals dot com offer so got plenty of extras.  JWM is fantastic. Staff all trained up A plus. Breakfast banquet great- love those smoothies. Khao Lak itself hasn't much to offer but staying inside the resort don't need to leave.

title: A  TASTE OF BLISS.............
review: After 7 days of returning to Perth, my husband and I are both SO RELAXED ..... having had the most FABULOUS   RELAXING holiday  at Jw Marriott Resort..and so ....this relaxation continues.  It's a 90mins drive from Phuket airport  to the hotel which is situated in a beautiful location The gardens are immaculate. The reception we received when we arrived at the hotel  was  friendly,the whole process of checking in was mimimun. There is a shuttle bus that runs from the hotel to the markets and the town area for a small fee...a good variety of times to and from the hotel, but make sure you book a day or a few days in advance.This is a popular service. Our room ,( second floor, 3114) was a 5 min walk from the main reception , and another few mins to the breakfast /dining area. We…

title: Amazing
review: What a tranquil place to be staying at from entering the resort to the room. My only regret was we only had 2 nights there, beautiful gardens magnificent pool a fantastic layout of hotel and beach at the doorstep all in all very impressive.  The breakfast buffet is fantastic with a great selection. Staff very helpful and polite recommend this hotel to all wont disappoint 10/10

title: Great Family Resort
review: Wonderful resort for families - Oasis of pools, great facilities, world class Buffet breakfast. Nothing is too much to ask of staff all very polite & professional. We had adjoining pool access rooms and worked out perfectly. Swim swim & swim...up to the pool bar at happy hour. Kids club was excellent during bad weather. Would stay again No doubt. Really not much need to leave the resort grounds - got it all there. 3rd-8th June

title: Quiet, relaxing, ready for another visit.
review: For those wanting a relaxing, peaceful, beautiful beach break, stay here. The staff, pool, room, breakfast, beach are amazing. We stayed here after Bangkok and Phuket and thought this was the most beautiful and relaxing part of the holiday.  The breakfast choices are the best I've ever seen at a hotel buffet. The resort seemed quiet although there was always a lot of people at breakfast, but it was never busy walking around the resort. Plenty of choices for dining along the beachfront (massages too). Quan spa offers great spa treatments also.

title: Heaven on Earth
review: My wife and I stayed from 21st May - 31st May 2014  I would like to compliment you for the staff at your Hotel. Their manners and behaviour were really excellent. Even the gardeners would greet you with a smile, a bow and "Sawadee Kah/Khap". I would particularly like to commend the breakfast buffet staff in the Waterfront restaurant. Specifically, Tin, Tarn and Boy. Their service and smiles were an excellent start to the day, as well as their sense of humour and their gentle affection for us. Also, Phong the doorman was very helpful and entertaining. It really made our stay at your hotel a pleasant and memorable experience.  We will certainly come back again.   regards, Alistair & Robyn

title: Can't wait to visit again!
review: We absolutely LOVED this resort!  It was everything we had hoped for and more for our romantic little getaway.  The pool, gardens and resort grounds were amazing and the staff were so beautiful!  Our room was gorgeous - beautifully decorated Thai style with a spa, super comfy huge bed and relaxing outdoor deck with a day bed over hanging the enormous pool.  We arrived at the resort during the night, and it was so lovely to be escorted to our room to find it candle lit and filled with the unforgettable aromas of Thai essential oils.  The buffet breakfast was the best we have ever had.  All the food you could dream of!  Happy hour at the bar was awesome (best ever Mojitos!).  The gym was quite well equipped (wish my gym at home offered an endless supply of bottled water and fresh…

title: Need to relax, this is THE place
review: If you want nightlife, stay in Phuket. If you want to relax and enjoy a fantastic resort with good service, plenty of dining options - both resort and beachfront - and the best pool, then this is the place.   Yes, driving an hour and a bit from Phuket can be a negative but if you are content to stay onsite, then you don't need to leave for anything. My wife and I had a pool access room (4011)and they are the absolute best way to enjoy your time. The interiors are a great representation of Asian style. Some of the building exteriors were showing some signs of mother nature taking it's toll but discreet work was underway to address.   Great breakfast buffet and all staff were attentive. A special mention to Nana who spoke with us several days to make sure everything was fine.…

title: Awesome staff
review: This hotel was great. My wife and I went for our anniversary and they recreated the top of our wedding cake for us as a special request and could not have done a better job. All the staff were great to deal with.

title: Absolutely fantastic!
review: Absolutely fantastic resort and SPA! amazing swimming pools and facilities, friendly staff and spacious room, very well Thai style decorated. We booked through Travel zoo voucher which is a great deal. The locations is probably the most difficult part but that's one of the reason why it is so private and quiet. If you want a relaxing holiday with lots of activities and great beach/pool to enjoy, this is it!!

title: Great Holiday!
review: Myself and my husband stayed in JW for 10 nights in May.The biggest advantage of the hotel is the amazing serpentine pool that goes on for 3.2 kilometers. I actually enjoyed the morning lap round the pool before breakfast; great way to start the day. Also if you are looking for a gorgeous beach with no vendors and no crowds look no further. There are very few hotels located on Khuk Khak beach so it feels very private. Staff and services as expected in this type of property.3 staff members that really stood out for us were Tom from the Czar Bar; Nana and Gift from the lobby area. We would definitely consider staying here again especially with kids as the property seemed to cater very well for family needs.

title: 2 Visit just as AMAZING!
review: If you want my full review of this place the first time, just click on my profile and read the first review.  Being from LA and making the trip for a second time MUST speak volumes to you.   Being a platinum with Marriott is a good thing, however, it doesn't matter what your status is with Marriott here you are treated just as equal.  There are so many wonderful staff at the property, from Mee & Nicolas at the front desk to the amazing folks at the breakfast buffet.  Mee & Nicolas were there to great us again for our second visit.  What wonderful people.  Both were very kind and catered to any of our needs.    The breakfast buffet is AMAZING!  It even has a juice bar!  WOW!  Just to show you how amazing the staff is, as mentioned in the other reviews, the property has free WiFi…

title: Wonderful secluded resort with outstanding hospitality
review: We spent 12 days at this hotel, and we enjoyed it very much. We had a room with pool access, which we would definitely recommend. It is a wonderful resort that provides everything you would want reflecting the best of Thailand and an upmarket global hotel chain like JW Marriott. It’s a beautiful hotel in a secluded  location ideal for couples on a romantic holiday (there is not much else to see and experience near the resort itself). The beach is among the most beautiful you can find and the pool makes for a nice long swim/walk. The room was perfect except for the mattress which was a bit too hard for our taste. Also I found that the wifi only worked in one particular spot in the room. We went with half board and whilst all of the three restaurants are outstanding we would…

title: Fantastic, top value
review: This is actually the second year in a row my wife and I have stayed at this resort. It must be the best in Khao Lak. Great private complex design, all eating and activity facilities you will need. I always look foward to breakfast and the free wifi extends to the beach, so I can relax and stream vids/music on my smartphone lying on the sun loungers... We use the very good gym facilities, and also rented mountain bikes this year. Everything at the resort feels top quality and we always found the staff and management skilled and helpful.

title: Died and gone to heaven!!
review: A beautiful place to come for a double birthday treat.  My friend and I have birthdays that are one month apart, so we treated ourselves.  I don't know which I liked more -- the 2-mile long pool that meanders around the otel property, or the pool-access rooms where you just step out your sliding-glass door and jump in!  Two swim-up bars, a FABULOUS spa (so pretty and peaceful, it was a good place to take a book and read), and lots of lotus ponds, with frogs serenading us at night.  I'd go bak in a heartbeat.

title: Two Nights in Paradise
review: I have traveled to many places around the world and I have to say that the two nights I stayed in the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa was the best hotel experience ever. The first night I arrived late and I ordered room service. My food was ready in less than 15 min. Also my girlfriend forgot to pack her toothbrush and one was delivered within minutes! The swimming pool was the most beautiful that I have ever seen. It's 3.2 kilometers long, which snakes around the hotel grounds and you can jump in the water from your room if you have pool access. The staff was very friendly, especially Nana, who made our resort experience even more memorable. The breakfast buffet was amazing and the coffee shop serves most delicious hot and cold beverages with a friendly smile. I want to…

title: Paradise
review: We purchased the deal from Deals.com.au we were all really worried if it was going to be as good as the pictures and brochures, well this place is amazing we had a swim out room and that pool was just fantastic. We will definitely be going back!!!!!  The waiting staff were all fantastic, very friendly and couldn't do enough for you. Tin from the Waterfront was No 1, he gave us all lots of laughs!! The Quan Spa was out of this world. My husband had never had a massage before and he thought he had died and gone to Heaven!!!!!!!!!

title: Restful and Quiet
review: Nice location away from it all.  Food Service was hit or miss. Good breakfast buffet with a lot of variety of cuisines.  Not much to do in terms of activities so would only stay 2 days maximum.  It's very far from Phuket so you can't see both places and stay in Khao Lak.  Pool and pool bar are great.

title: Fantastic & memorable stay
review: 10 nights here at this amazing resort just wasn't enough. The service was always warming & welcoming by all staff, the food was great, beautiful, clean lagoon pool, very spacious & comfortable rooms, great massages in the Quan Spa with an amazing water garden that you could sit at for hours....we will be back.....for our wedding!!!

title: Flawless stay in Thailand
review: What can i say?!  Total relaxsation, you are able to swim home from the beach to your room, wow! 5 stars for the staff, food (smoothie bar at breakfast), beach, pool, enviroments, the whole package. But if you want to find the little extra, the hidden gem, you shall take right standing on the beach, go approx. 200m and you will find a small family restaurant managed by father/mother and their 2 small girls at the waterfront, look for the family portrait sign. Here you will find even better food, the best, genuine service in the whole of Thailand. If you instead take left at the beach, again 200meters, you will find the best Thai massage tent with educated staff. Worth a daily visit! Will i and my wife be back, absolutly!

title: Good design and nice staff
review: 1. They made a lot of work to design the resort. To make customer comfortable and happy. 2.  It has a great swimmin pool. Which is around the whole resort and easy to access. 3. Most staff is nice and friendly. 4. It should be better if more facility maintenance work is available. 5. Some room in wing 5 on second Floor need to check their hot water supply.

title: Beautiful views and a relaxing May atmosphere.
review: My wife and I just returned from a beautiful eight nights at this waterside resort and I can't recommend it enough for a short or mid-length getaway.   GETTING THERE It's roughly 90 minutes from Phuket airport (although our driver IN did it in just over a hair-raising hour!) and it's a great chance to have a drive-by look at the towns and goings-on.  Ideally, I think we'd like something a little closer to the airport, but the grounds of the resort itself sure make up for the journey.  Greeted by a handful of incredibly polite staff, our checkin was a breeze (which is always a bone of contention!) - they sit you on the couches and take care of the whole thing before taking you to your room. ROOM We had a poolside room (which allows you to walk about the sliding door, down a few…

title: Restore your inner peace!
review: We moved to JW Marriot a few days into an 8 day retreat at Mai Khao Lak Resort & Spa. To say the difference was like chalk and cheese would do no justice. From our welcome on arrival and being escorted to our pool access room everything was above par here and well worth the forfeit of the $$$ we had already paid at the previous resort. The helpfulness of the staff was faultless in comparison. I made good use of the spa and had a massage every day. Advise the body polish routine. The restaurants provided excellent food, however they open on alternate nights. The breakfast provisions were well catered for. Coffee was pretty good too. We didn't opt for a package deal and this was a good thing as we wanted a specific room. The beds and pillows were comfortable. There was a massive…

title: Just fantastic
review: We recently enjoyed eight nights on a "deal". My husband had been concerned we might experience some problems as we were on a deal but everything was just about perfect.  Room - we booked a pool access room on recommendation of friends and would do so again. our balcony wasn't fenced and we could step straight off into the pool. There are fenced balconies if you have children.  Balcony had two lounges and a table. We were in Wing 3, Wing 4 gets the afternoon sun. We had a problem with our shower and toilet and these were fixed almost immediately.  Pools - just beautiful and so clean. We loved our wander around the huge pool winding around the resort and the Infinity pool is gorgeous. The Aquamarine pool was just near our room.  Spa - spa treatments were included in our package…

title: Great relaxing family holiday!
review: We (my husband and I and 3 kids aged 6,4,2) travelled together with his aunt and uncle here in May 2014 for 10 nights, we had the most fabulous and relaxing time.  We upgraded to a family room with pool access. I didn't book this to start with however when I got there and saw that the rooms had a fence with a gate between the deck and the garden I was happy to upgrade (at an extra charge) which was no trouble to the staff. This was defiantly worth it! Our children all used the kids club and loved it in there. All of them would ask to go there straight after breakfast and were happy doing activities, playing in the ball bit or chilling out watching DVD's. It is free for over 3yr olds, under 3yrs you pay 250bt per hour.  The food was great starting at breakfast with a huge…

title: Fabulous guest experience April 2014
review: Spending two glorious weeks in the JW Marriot Khao Lak definitely ranks as one of the better quality experiences I have had and we stay in some great places.   The pool is amazing, plenty of space, Beach great for access to the ocean. We were made welcome from the moment we stepped out of our transfer bus. The Hotel is everything it says it is in the brochure.  Our duplex room was great and when I mentioned a slight noise on the air conditioning to one of the guest managers and an engineer turned up within a couple of hours to fix a slight rattle which really was unexpected and he fixed the system.  The staff of the Czar Bar, "Great People!" We were fortunate enough to sit each evening and watch the sun setting enjoying cocktails. Tom the bar tender and Tai the hostess /…

title: Luxury Hotel North of Phuket
review: We flew into Phuket on the 25th May 2014 at around 8.30pm. Once we had collected our baggage we were picked up and driven to the Hotel which was located about 90 kilometres North of Phuket arriving there at 10pm. During check in our voucher told us that we would be offered a complimentary drink and cold towel but as there was only one person on duty this was not forthcoming! Also, on checking in to our room the four complimentary beers that should have been in our fridge were missing. In fact the fridge was completely empty. The next morning we queried the beers at 9am and were told they would be sent immediately. To make a long story short they arrived at 1.45pm! A helpful tip is that if you are travelling on a voucher that offers free treatments in the Spa you would be wise to…

title: Pure luxury
review: Stayed here for 4 nights. Staff very helpful and friendly and the resort was amazing. Beautiful spacious room overlooking the fantastic Venice style pool that meanders around the resort.  Resort kept spotless day and night. Breakfast wonderful and ate in the Thai restaurant one evening which was lovely although a little pricey and there are some beach restaurants just outside the hotel to the right which are cheaper and nice. A nice touch was being brought iced water while sunbathing on the beach at no cost. Plenty of complimentary water in the rooms. If you want to head into khoa lak there is a shuttle bus from the hotel but you have to pay. It's not possible to walk it if you think you will save money! There are also plenty of massage huts on the beach which are worth a try…

title: Beach Paradise.....but
review: The JW Marriott is hands down a beautiful peaceful oasis.  The pool is like no other and I have seen and stayed at many over the years.  From the moment we entered the foyer we were made to feel special.  Check in was quick and we asked to upgrade to a pool access room which was no bother at an additional charge.  Our room was stunning with all the comforts one would need.  The bed was very comfortable and it has been the first time I have not had to struggle with uncomfortable hotel pillows.  Mini bar is very reasonably priced for a 5 star hotel.  We ate at the Olive restaurant one night which was fantastic the quality and presentation of the food was outstanding.  Same prices as a good restaurant back in Australia but well worth the money.  The buffet breakfast is the best I…

title: Relaxing
review: Me and my boyfriend stayed here at the end of last year, we had the best time. The surroundings were relaxing and you didnt have trouble finding a quite area to sunbathe. Thw rooms were lovely and the bed super comfortable.  We had slight problems witht the floor boards on the balcony but these were fixed no problem. The balcony is a good size and a nice place to read a book or share a drink with your party. We went bed and breakfast and walked down the drive to get tuc tucs into the centre and eating out was so worth it. When in khao lak ask the taxi driver to take you to joes steak house it is without doubt thw best steak we have ever eaten.  The discovery cafe also does wonderful food! Very much enjoyed our stay here and will be back.

title: More than a perfect stay
review: We stayed here for two weeks in a room with direct pool access. That was a wonderful time we have fully enjoyed. Every morning started with an excellent breakfast - Western, Thai , Indian and Chinese food was offered. Lots of fresh fruits and fresh smoothies. Our waiter "Tin" from Waterfront restaurant was a perfect guy for all questions we had. He spoke excellent Englisch and also German. Of course all the others unnamed waitress also made the stay an amazing experience. We laughed a lot and made many jokes together.  Always very friendly and humorous. They helped to forget to think about work and any other problems. Actually there is no need to leave the property to search for other restaurants, as there are various kind on the property existing.   Every morning our "family"…

title: Wow
review: We purchased a coupon deal for this place after a recommendation of another family member so we had the free breakfasts, 2 free meals, cocktail and massages etc. This place had that "wow" factor for us especially as they upgraded us for free to a poolside room. The walk from reception to some rooms is a very long walk. A number of posters have mentioned maintenance issues but this is one big resort and they are constantly repairing, painting, gardening etc. Did it affect our holiday in any way ...NO. I am not picky enough to get fazed by a scratch or wobbly board somewhere but consider the overall picture and whether the establishment is doing something daily to mend, touch up etc. they not only do your room but call past later in the day to see if you need anything, like extra…

title: Unwinding
review: My husband & I were looking forward to a relaxing holiday, we were not disappointed. The breakfasts were amazing. The various restaurants on site were also very good. Rooms were lovely, slightly tired looking but it looked like that was being addressed with refubs going on. If your looking for a total chill holiday with good service, then look no further!

title: Wonderful property
review: Stayed here nearly a year back and it was a wonderful experience. Went with  family and had take 3 rooms in all .Well away from the hustle of Phuket which is what we wanted... the rooms were very appointed and service was what you would expect at a Thai property. We did have issues with the hot water in just 1 room for 3 days of the 5 days of our stay, but that was duly compensated by the duty manager with a wonderful dinner at the restaurant. The little hotel boat going around with cold drinks was a great idea. The breakfast was exceptional in terms of choice as well.

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: I have just spent 8 days at the JW Marriott, Khao Lak Beach.  I can honestly say it was the best holiday I have ever had.  The ambience, the staff, the meals are all wonderful.  Very peaceful and relaxing.  Most, if not all rooms overlook the pool which is beautiful.  The weather was tropical with afternoon thunder and lightning but nothing to stop  you doing what you wanted.  We had rain a couple of days in the afternoon with sunny mornings.  The breakfast staff really looked after us, particularly Tin, Tarn, Boy 1 and Boy 2.  We told the coffee boys how we liked our coffee and had one waiting for us each morning when we arrived at breakfast.  Definitely hope to return again soon. The massages were amazing - all staff wonderful.

title: Really nice resort, consistent with JW brand standards.
review: I booked a five-day/four-night vacation here for my family to celebrate my wife's birthday. We enjoyed our time there, although there were a few disappointments across the high notes -- see below. Note to management in case you read these....get some windsurfers for rent!!!!!!  One quick note...the hotel is in the middle of what I would expect from the JW Marriott brand. Remember that JW is not the summit of the Marriott brand -- that is reserved for the Ritz-Carlton brand (Marriott own the largest stake of that brand's stock). So you should go to this resort expecting a four-star experience, but not a five-star experience.  That being said, let's get to the review:  Rooms: the rooms we got were more than adequate. One of our rooms was upgraded to a duplex suite (I'm a Marriott…

title: Beautiful property!
review: Dear Laltro,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination; it's a great pleasure reading your review! We are very happy you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for providing such detailed feedback about your experience.  We are delighted to learn you and your family enjoyed our resort so much, thank you for your great comments about the Duplex Suite, associates, resort grounds, beach, watersport facilities, concierge, romantic dinner and Quan Spa.  We have noted your feedback about our Ta Krai restaurant and cocktails; we have evaluated this with the team for immediate improvement.   We will certainly review options for adding wind surfing equipment to our watersports selection.  Thank you for your continuous loyalty to Marriott, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: A great choice for a peaceful beach vacation
review: Contrary to most reviews I read before going to Khao Lak, this property is beautiful and still very well maintained. We had a very peaceful and relaxing time here, and recommend it to everyone who wants time away from their busy schedules.  Our room was a suite - pool facing on the first floor. The best part about the hotel is their pool, which snakes around the entire hotel. From our room we could also see the beach - the water was clear blue and the sand pristine white. This is one of the prettiest and quietest beaches I have been to.  We really enjoyed the pool and pool bar - happy hours every evening so we made the most of that! The food options at the hotel are plenty - japanese, thai, italian, coffee shop, and more. We tried different restaurants every day and enjoyed all…

title: venice on the andaman!
review: Dear HappilyTraveled,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for your review - we are very happy you had a great stay and enjoyed our pool, pool bar and Quan Spa!  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Outdated and low-end 5 (2) star hotel
review: We stayed at JW hotel Khao Lak for less than a week to get away from the city for a little bit and in general we were happy with our stay. The hotel location is away from all the noise, the rooms are spacious, the beach and the water in the sea is clean (which is a big Big thing for us) and the facilities are taken care of well. However, restaurant staff service needs some improvement and the breakfast buffet needs some more variety of choices as it's quite limited compared to the ones at other 5 star hotel brands.   Would like to say a special thank you for Khun Jazzy, the duty manager who made sure everything goes well during our vacation as it was our first stay at Khao Lak branch of Marriott hotel. If there are any even minor issues, she is a go-to person.

title: Heaven on earth
review: We stayed at JW Khaolak for only one week and I missed the place already. It's such a beautiful property with great breakfast. The Staff are awesome and super friendly. They can answer to all your requests. The place is romantic and perfect for couple. would definitely recommend :)

title: Best in the area
review: Dear Piyal M,  Thank you for writing a great review about your recent experience in our resort!  It's wonderful to learn you enjoyed such a wonderful stay with us - thank you for your great comments about our breakfast and associates.  We look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Beautiful hotel, 5* exceeds expectations!
review: Try to book a pool access room they are by far the best to enter one of best pools I seen in a resort took us 30 min to swim to the pool bar it's that big  The resorts right on a lovely beach front also a bit far from the local town we did not leave the resort for the 5 days we were there

title: what a nice discover
review: Dear Marcel S,  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us!  It's a great pleasure to learn you enjoyed a comfortable stay, thank you for your great feedback about our Pool Access room and 16,000 square meter lagoon pool.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Lovely Khoa Lak
review: We travelled to this hotel with Thomson 25th March 2014-9th April 2014. The flight was ok, transfer was via private taxi which was nice after being on a plane full of people for 11.5 hours. Its about 1hr 20 from the airport. Once we arrived at the hotel we were greeted with a refreshing drink and a cold towel to cool us down. This was lovely except we were kept waiting for over an hour until we were told that the room wasnt ready and we would need to wait until later on to check in, I was really not happy about this as we had spent hours travelling so I complained and we got put in a different room straight away. I am happy to say this is the only negative thing about the whole trip.   Our room was on the third floor and was beautiful, all the rooms are. The breakfast had a…

title: Fantastic hotel
review: My husband and I stayed here for the last week in April and loved every minute. The grounds are very well looked after and the pool area is amazing. There was a nice quiet adult only area of the pool for those of us without children. The room, overlooking the swim up rooms was lovely and very comfortable. We were on a bed and breakfast basis and the choice for breakfast was fantastic, with very attentive staff. We ate in the Thai restaurant on our last night and enjoyed the meal, the rest of our stay we ate at the beach restaurants either side of the hotel which were all equally good and very good value. Would definitely return!

title: Best venue for our wedding!
review: Dear DawnyGillingham,  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience in our resort!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for your kind comments about our rooms, lagoon pool, breakfast and associates.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: beautiful property in secluded location
review: My husband and I celebrated our wedding at the JW Marriott in April this year. Firstly let me start by saying that the JW Marriott is a gorgeous resort. I was a bit apprehensive about holding our wedding somewhere I had never visited, but I was confident by all the glowing reviews on trip advisor, that we went ahead and booked!  To our pleasant surprise, the resort was even BETTER then we imagined! As many people have  commented here, the pool is HUGE (it's more like a lake/river). I don't think many of our 70 guests even had the time to swim around the entire pool.. I know I definitely didn't! There  are 2 swim up bars + multiple events/facilities at the resort. It is a massive resort, but you never feel crowded - except for at breakfast maybe. On this matter - the breakfast is…

title: Great food, great beach, great pool and great staff
review: Dear Shelbelz,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred destination to celebrate your wedding, we all are very pleased to learn you enjoyed such a fantastic, special event!  Thank you for your kind comments about our lagoon pool, beach area and sunsets.  We will certainly ensure to recognize Zaffar for his outstanding service and efforts provided during your special event.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort for your 1st anniversary!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Amazing Experience
review: I have just returned from 7 nights at this hotel. as a travel agent I cannot fault the property. the staff were gorgeous and courteous and went out of their way to assist with the smallest of requests, the rooms were spacious and very well equipped and the restaurants we found to be very reasonable. the only issue I will comment on is the pool! as nice as it looks - it was TOO hot! I think they had the heater on and it was no relief from the heat at all! but.. if that is the only complaint then the hotel are doing a pretty good job! this is a 5 star hotel that I highly recommend to couples who want to do nothing but chill... it is remote and not much happening around the area. Phuket is 2 hours away if you can be bothered..

title: Family Holiday
review: We stayed for 8 nights over Easter and had a fabulous time.  We had a pool access room which was fantastic especially when you have kids.  The pool provided endless hours of fun for all.  The resort being so large you never felt that any area was crowded. Great cocktails at the infinity pool at sunset. The grounds are well maintained.  Every afternoon when we needed time out of the sun we played table tennis or air hockey followed by ice cream at the Deli.  The food in Sakura and Ta Krai and Olive restaurant was amazing.  I ate the best Japanese and Thai ever.  Pizza and pasta at Olive were huge and delicious.  Buffet breakfast was sensational.  So much to choose from and the freshest waffles. A big hello to Bee who makes the best breakfast smoothies and to Nana for her friendly…

title: Best Resort Stay with Kids Ever
review: Dear Trish B,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience in our resort.  We are very happy you and your family enjoyed an amazing stay, thank you for your kind comments about our Pool Access room, cocktails, resort grounds, facilities, restaurants and associates.  We will certainly ensure to recognize Khun Bee and Khun Nana for their outstanding service and efforts made.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours Sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Wonderful stay, was sad to leave!
review: We stayed 6 nights with our 4 and 6 year old kids and had our best ever vacation with the kids.  Every day they woke up and swam out of our the doorstep of our ample sized family suite, it was like having a private pool.  They had the nutella crepes or waffles nearly every day, followed by more swimming at the ocean or one of the endless pool selections.  Every night we had dinner on the beach at a different venue at or near the JW or in the small towns nearby.  The kids loved the kids club anytime of day.  We had wonderful couples massage, and thoroughly enjoyed the complimentary happy hour for MR platinum members (breakfast was also complimentary).  We can't think of a better place for a family vacation to get the best use of MR points after a years worth of work travel at…

title: Well set out resort for adults & kids
review: Dear Mumbai69,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your recent experience.  We are very happy you and your family enjoyed a great stay, thank you for your great comments about our Pool Access room, pool, breakfast, Kids Club, associates and restaurants.  Thank you for your continuous loyalty to Marriott, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Deals.com package
review: My husband and I stayed 5 nights at the Marriott khao lak and had a fantastic time -in hindsight, wished we stayed a couple more nights longer and cut down our trip in phuket. Loved the beautiful beach with free use of body boards, stunning sunsets, huge pool, gym, table tennis and lovely staff, especially Tin at breakfast who made such an effort to make us feel like valued guests and not just another number (and trust me, there were a lot of guests at the resort when we were there!). Tin remembered our names, coffee orders and always made us smile. We also appreciated the efforts of Nicholas at reception, who was always helpful and warm whenever we saw him.  Overall, great stay and would definitely return if back in Thailand.

title: Great relaxed vacation
review: We had a wonderful stay. The outstandig Pool around the whole facility is beautiful and great for long swims. It is great for the kids to play. At the Deli Rahel and her team provided us with a great variety of sandwiches and Coffee. The service was great. We enjoyed a diverse and tasty Breakfast buffet while being served with beverages by Kung Poo and her team. At breakfast and in the deli we also got to know Varun the food and beverages director, who was aksing about our wellbeing. We could say nothing but the best. While our stay we were witnessing a indian wedding. The General Manager Ty Collins was very friendly explaining us the frequency of indian weddings and their great arrangements. So all in all our stay was most memorable and we had a great time enjoying the JW…

title: Great resort just to relax
review: Dear Peter K,  Thank you for writing a great review about your recent experience in our resort. Thank you for your great comments about our pool, resort facilities and breakfast.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We certainly will recognize Rahel and Khun Poo for their outstanding efforts and service. We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Fantastic
review: If you want a place just to relax & do nothing go to the JW Marriot Khoa Lak good rooms,breakfast great, staff good but a lot didn't speak English so when we ask them something couldn't understand. The resort is on the beach so you can get a sunbed  on the beach you can also walk on the beach to the restaurants which is much cheaper than the hotel. They have a shuttle service from the hotel to the khoa lak town not much there massages, & shops & restaurants but was very hot. Overall a good quite hotel.

title: Wow!
review: Dear DownunderWA,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  We are delighted you enjoyed a relaxing stay in our resort, thank you for your great comments about our rooms, breakfast and associates.  We have well noted your comment about language capabilities; we have continuous English training classes for our associates. We will evaluate this with the team again to identify areas for improvement.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your great feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: fabulous place to stay with a great deal......
review: We stayed here for 8 nights in April after moving quickly from the sands katathani khao lak, which wasn't our cup of tea! We had 2 deluxe pool view rooms, which were clean and well appointed. The grounds and ambience of the hotel are lovely. The beach is just what you expect, quiet, endless, white sand and turquoise sea. No sun loungers on the sand, no jet skis, no sellers. It was stunning, dotted with a few beach bar/ restaurants and massage huts. Staff were courteous and helpful. Rooms were cleaned to a good standard, even our children's room with messy teenage girls in! We booked a private candlelit birthday meal on the beach which was special, romantic and superb in every way. You could use the body boards free for an hour each time which was great fun also hire for a small…

title: Another Amazing stay
review: We stayed here for eight days in March and as Gold members were again upgraded to a beautiful split level suite. I love this hotel and have been here many times. The pool stretches all the way round the hotel and you can swim from your room to the main pools. The gym is modern and the staff in the gym are very friendly. In fact the staff all over the resort are friendly especially in the restaurants and pool bar. The beach is clean, long sandy and like paradise.There is loads of choice of western, indian and thai food at breakfast. Noodle soup at breakfast is excellent. The hotel does do themed evenings activities but never once in all the times that I have stayed here are you hassled or pressured by the staff to join these activities. We particularly like the beach bar that was…

title: Amazing hotel for a family
review: Dear Sarah1303,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for always selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination when visiting Thailand - it's a great pleasure reading your review about your recent experience.  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed our Duplex Suite, thank you for your great comments about our gym, pool, beach, breakfast and beach lounge.  We all look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Perfect !!!
review: We stayed for 8 nights in this hotel with our two children and it was fantastic! The room was great with the most amazing balcony which we could sit in at night and look at the stars. The pool system was amazing and nothing like we had experienced before. You could literally swim around the whole resort with a stop at pool bars along the way.  The beach was beautiful and practically deserted apart from hotel guests. Our children really enjoyed the kids club which was an unexpected pleasure as they don't usually!  We ate out most nights at the beach restuarants however we did eat a few times in the hotel especially at Olive and the pizzas here were some if the best we had ever had (and we have been to Italy!)  Overall I can't fault this hotel in anyway and would highly recommend…

title: Ideal if you want to relax in a quite and friendly atmosphere
review: Dear Kazclem,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for your great feedback; it's a great pleasure reading your review. We are delighted to learn you and your family enjoyed a comfortable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our room, pool and beach.  We look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Do yourself a favour check it out
review: You can write 1000 words, but they reflect all in one word - perfect Beautiful place, if you have a child, take a pool access room, its fab! All the staff are well trained and with spirit ans soul. Will come back one day. Thanks

title: Second time was just as good as the first!
review: We stayed again at the JW Marriott this year and yet again we were blown by the hotel and facilities.  The rooms are beautifully appointed and spotlessly clean.  The staff are amazing and so courteous.  This is definitely the place to stay if you want to get away from it all and soak up the sun.  So good we have already booked next year!   Two things to mention - there seems to be a recurring issue with getting twin beds in the poolside rooms we had this issue last time and again this year. Also there was a large Indian wedding going on in the hotel which did cause some amount of noise around the beach and pool that was not too much of a problem but the wedding guests were rude and very arrogant to the other guest and the Thai staff in particular.

title: Longest pool we ever have seen
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort for your second visit during your recent visit to Thailand.  We are very happy to learn you enjoyed a comfortable stay, thank you for your great comments about our resort and facilities.  We have well noted your comments about the reserved room type and wedding event. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations; we will follow up with the team to investigate further. Please let us know your specific room type requests when making your reservation so that we can prepare accordingly for your next visit.  Thank you for making your reservations for next year, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort for your third visit!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Nice but not 5 star
review: The most impressive part of the hotel is definitely it's long stretching pool where crowds easily spread out. The location it self is great next to a lonely white sand beach with turquoise and clean sea. Seems that JW Marriot Khao Lak serves a wide clientele from families with kids to young couples. Even it's a huge hotel with plenty of rooms you always can find some privacy. Next to this highlights the resort had also some down points. Our room looked a bit worn and layout was a bit strange with the basin integrated in the wardrobe. There was also quite a strong smell from the toilet. Due to the mere number of guests the breakfast buffet looked a bit plough in the late hours especially the cheese corner but guess that's the price serving so many people. On the beach you can…

title: Pleasant surprise
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your recent experience, this is very much appreciated.  We are very happy you enjoyed a great and relaxing stay, thank you for your comments about our pool and beach area.  We have well noted your feedback about the room condition; our team is continuously carrying out scheduled maintenance in all our rooms to ensure we meet our standards and your expectations.   Thank you once again for sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Paradise found (again) and room selection guide
review: We stayed here for two weeks in March and although we had a fantastic holiday the hotel in my opinion was not a 5 star hotel. The room we stayed in was nice but a lot of the furniture was worn and had scratches on, the shower had cracks in the tiles, and looked really dirty in the corner, it didnt appear to get cleaned. The lights in the room also randomly switched themselves on and off and tv came on during the night.. very spooky!  The hotel gives towel cards for you to collect clean beach towels everyday but they were always really stained and tatty and there was a fee of £10 if you lost one which they are not worth at all!!!   The beach at the hotel was lovely and there were always available sunbeds. They brought round and topped up drinks of water and juice free of charge…

title: Fantastic Hotel in a fantastic location, but a few issues that need addressing
review: This hotel is in a fantastic location, the rooms are nice and the staff are helpful. We arrived on the 8th April and left again on the 20th. April. in room 4017. During our stay we had the luck to speak to Nana which was a very helpful and nice person, the Kids loved her, so large credit to her.  Positives:  Fantastic location, Fantastic Hotel, Good rooms and great Pool and beach. great overall staff around the resort.  Negatives:  Poor Wifi all around the hotel, First impression coming to the hotel is not great, Reception could be made a bit more personel, feels a bit like mass production. Does not have that 5  star quality, I seek when I book a hotel.  To the question if I would come back, My first answer would be NO, but that is coloured a lot by what happend on saturday the…

title: Perfect Staff, location
review: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write and share your experiences. All of your comments, both positive and highlighting your concerns, are important to us and we will discuss how we can provide a better experience in the future. Our team will consider the best way to communicate upcoming events including through social media and our resort website.     We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future and sincerely thank you for your feedback.  Respectfully,  Ty Collins General Manager

title: Simply THE BEST
review: I have traveled extensively - what a lovely hotel - the staff are amazing. I cant say enough about how perfect this hotel is. Such kind service over and above, Beautiful location - a bit of paradise.  Keep it up !

title: Amazing Honeymoon
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination, we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing a great review about your experience.  We are delighted you enjoyed your stay so much! We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Lovely hotel, wonderful staff, beautiful location
review: Planning a trip to Khao Lak?  Look no further - the JW Khao Lak is by far the BEST resort in the area!  We spent 4 days there on a  "mini break" and didn't want to leave.  I highly recommend the pool access rooms where you can jump directly into a 3.2 km pool!  You heard me right - 3.2 km of glorious swimming pool!!!!  The resort has a great beachfront and some lovely local restaurants a short walk away that offers great local Thai Food.  I am already planning my 2nd trip there in July.

title: Excellent
review: Our recent stay at this large resort was wonderful.  The resort, though large was very quiet and quality of sleep very good.  As previously mentioned by other reviewers the resort has a large internal pool complex and beach frontage that stretches for miles north and south.  The ocean at the time of our visit was flat with little surf, no current or rips, very safe. Water in the pool and ocean was warm, if you like getting wet this is the place.  Very beautiful sunrises and sunsets. The buffet breakfast choice was large, Asian and Western, with oodles of fresh fruit and a smoothie bar. Beautiful large room serviced everyday, plenty of wardrobe/cupboard space.  We had a pool access room which allows you to jump in the pool from your room.  The people who work at the resort are a…

title: Beautiful Hotel, Beautiful Staff, Beautiful Weather...
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  It's a great pleasure reading your review, we are very happy you enjoyed an excellent stay with us.  Thank you for your great feedback about our associates and resort facilities/ services.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Lovely property, beautiful beach
review: This hotel is stunning one week was just not enough.  We travelled from the UK with Thomson on a two centre holiday we stay here for our second week 26th March 2014. Well done Thomson's this hotel was a stunner and our Thomson Rep Alan was the best we've ever had, such an interesting and informative guy. We cannot fault a single thing quality, attention to detail, outstanding staff. wonderful - wonderful -wonderful. We had a pool access room, the swimming pool is to die for never seen a pool as large, beautiful and clean and so cleverly designed. Cannot wait to return.

title: We want to live here!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  It's a great pleasure reading your review and to learn you enjoyed your stay so much, thank you for your great comments about our associates, Pool Access room and pool.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Great place to relax away from it all
review: My husband and I stayed here for four nights in April 2014.  Khao Lak is about 11/2 hours from the Phuket airport.  The hotel arranged pick-up and drop-off for us.  We found the property to be very beautiful - the view from the lobby to the ocean is a highlight.  Our room was clean and spacious (we stayed in 1007). I had read that the pool side rooms are dark, and I would agree with this, but it didn't bother us as we were not in the room much of the day.  The property is large, so you will need to walk quite a bit from your room to the restaurants, bars, beach, gym, etc. We like walking, so this was not an issue for us. Things to note: *Amazing sunsets at the beach *The beach bar in the evening and long walks on uncrowded beach *A visit from an elephant to the beach twice a…

title: Paradise in every way
review: Well only have positive comments to make, the hotel seems to have thought of everything. They even supply you with a lovely beach bag during your stay. We had a pool entrance room which was lovely. A bath for 2 people ! Breakfast is right up there as with all marriott hotels but add the amazing food to the amazing view - wow - friendly staff, everyone wears a smile and nothing seems too much trouble. Thank you marriott and a mention to Nana who helped suggest our next movements through Thailand.

title: More than meets the mind
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your great feedback!  It's a great pleasure reading your review about your recent experience; we are delighted to learn you had a great stay.  Thank you for your great comments about our Pool Access room, breakfast and resort facilities/ services. We will certainly recognize Khun Nana for her outstanding service and efforts offering suggestions which places to visit in Thailand.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Great pool area
review: It was a fun trip with my girlfriend and we stayed there for 5 days and 4 nights, we arrived the first night and there were a few problems with the lights in the room, so we went to the front office and told them about the room situation and a very nice girl "Na Na" assisted us and got us a room with a better location near the main pool, it was a more bright room and we loved it! There were also other staff who provided assistance to me and my girlfriend throughout the trip, some of the people were "Gift", "Neung", "Liza" and "Pom". The breakfast buffet there is amazing there are many different kinds of food! My favorite were the bacon, friend eggs and sauté tomatoes. The hotel also had a good service with its drivers, for our whole stay there we had a personal driver and it…

title: Wonderful wonderful holiday
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  It's a great pleasure to learn you enjoyed a comfortable and memorable stay, thank you for your great comments about our breakfast, limousine service, Quan Spa, beach, Infinity Pool and private BBQ dinner on the beach.   We will certainly ensure to recognize Khun Nana, Khun Gift, Khun Neung, Khun Liza and Khun Pom for their outstanding service and efforts.  We regret to learn of the inconvenience you experienced with your room on the first night, thankfully it was resolved promptly. Our team will further check for details ensuring this will not happen again.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: A real 5 star experience
review: We stayed 7 nights in two rooms with direct access to the pool. This was so great with the kids.   The pool area is huge and you can always find one spot for your own if you like that. The beach is great and safe for children. The only thing I felt was average was the breakfast selection.  I made the reservation through Marriott home page and when I arrived they informed me that the breakfast is not included so I had to pay extra 800thb per person per day and it was not worth it. We loved Olive restaurant, excellent food. Can highly recommend this place if you are looking for a relaxing place.

title: Amazing experience
review: My Husband and I went there on our honeymoon and what an amazing start to the trip. The location is really the USP of this resort. The resort is located on the beach. The staff is really nice and they make you feel welcomed. Make sure you enjoy the spa there. This resort has the largest pool in the whole of asia. So from your room you can jump in the pool and swim across the entire resort. Also the pool has a swim up bar.   Take the bicycling trip to the local market and try some local food there.

title: Best resort in Khao Lak
review: Dear valued guests,  Congratulations on your honeymoon and marriage. Thank you for taking the time to write and share your experiences. We think you made an excellent recommendation to enjoy the market in Ban Niang. The market is an authentic functioning market which you can enjoy on Monday, Wednesday, and Saturday.   We hope to have the chance to serve you again on your first anniversary and many to follow.  Very warm regards,  Ty Collins

title: Amazing
review: Sawatdee Kaa... If you have the budget look for nothing else. My wife and I went there on our honeymoon and what an amazing start to the trip. This resort has the largest pool in the whole of asia. So from your room you can jump in the pool and swim across the entire resort. I say that is really cool. The staff is so courteous. They definitely know how to pamper their customers. Make sure you enjoy the spa there. I am too ticklish so spa is not my thing but my wife enjoyed it.   The resort is just on the beach. So from the pool you can see the sunset which is an amazing site.  The breakfast buffet spread was awesome. The hotel also arranges for some nice snorkelling trips.   P.S.- Try the restaurant which is just on the beach. It is a small shack just 20 seconds walk from the…

title: Incredible place for a baby moon or relaxing trip
review: Sawasdee Khrup valued guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write. We can see you have been practicing your Thai language and hope you will come back to practice more in the future.  We are glad your wife enjoyed the spa; we feel it is really a hidden treasure and suggest for anyone who comes to the resort to look around the spa and enjoy its serenity.  We will share your comments with our team in our next meeting.  Very warm regards,  Ty Collins General Manager

title: Thank you JW Marriott staff
review: Our second  visit here for another fab week . Not one fault ( and I'm fussy !) , everything is amazing , but especially the staff - they always greet you , and are always smiling .  Love  the pool bar , walks on the beach and the breakfast is amazing .  I used the spa one day for a facial and it was a fabulous experience - I wish I was there now .  Big thanks to Nicholas on reception and Boy for our daily cocktail ! Well be back again  One teeny thing ..... Please could you put marmite on the breakfast buffet !  Thank you for making our fabulous family holiday ,

title: Relaxing stay in beautiful location
review: Stayed with my wife for 5 nights in February. I would point out that this is a very large hotel- it tends to get quite busy. If you prefer smaller, quite resorts it may not be for you. Having said that, it is still an amazing resort. It is in a great location, with fantastic beaches and coast. I can see that it would be very good with a family, as the pool facilities are amazing. Rooms were of very high standard, and very luxurious. The staff made a few errors with the bill- seems to have lost record of the fact we had paid in advance when we arrived, and then struggled when we paid our account at the end, however sorted it out in the end.  Along the beach are a number of shacks run by locals that sell food, tours and massages. These were a real benefit, as you could wonder down…

title: Top quality resort with the most amazing pool area!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  We are very happy to learn you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us, thank you for your great feedback about our beach area, rooms, breakfast and activities.  We have well noted your feedback about the departure experience, we will ensure to evaluate the procedure immediately. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards, please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time providing us with this great feedback. We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: 2nd time at the resort. Amazing every time.
review: Excellent resort with the most amazing pool area I've seen anywhere! The pool stretches for over 3 kilometers around the resort and you get a pool access from every wing. Also few larger pool areas and two separate bars. They also have a separate kids area and grown up area with a 'bar canoe' serving drinks. Service is top notch and the staff is always smiling and very helpful. Especially friendly towards kids! For kids you have a large and well equipped playroom with personnel to play with kids. Good gym, classes like yoga, bike rental, beach volley, hobie cat, canoes, excellent spa, massage, etc. You will not get bored! The beach is beautiful and not too crowded. Also no motor boats are allowed so it's very peaceful. Plenty of sun loungers on grounds so you will be able to…

title: Amazing place !! Beautifully designed.
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for writing us with your feedback - it's a great pleasure reading your fantastic, detailed review.  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a memorable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our service, lagoon shaped pool, gym, activities, beach area, breakfast and Olive restaurant.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time sharing your feedback with us; we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Good but could be better
review: We have been lucky enough to travel all over the world, and this is our favorite location and resort.  We got engaged at the resort during our last stay in February.  Very romantic resort and location for couples.   Everyone on the staff is amazing; from the general manager who met us when we arrived to house keeping.  They are very friendly and eager to please.    The pool is huge, and you can swim anywhere within the resort through the connected lazy rivers.    We stayed in the two story suite, and couldn't ask for more.  The view from the balcony is beautiful, and the living area downstairs give plenty of room to spread out and relax.  The buffet breakfast is great and has may western and Asian options to choose from.   The food is expensive, but it's a JW Marriott so you…

title: Fantastic
review: Recently stayed at this hotel and couldn't speak highly enough of it.  The staff are very customer service focussed and nothing was too much bother for them and they follow-up to make sure they have satsified your needs. Met the Executive Chef on our first day and he showed us around the complex when we looked as if we were lost - not something we expected him to do but again it was no bother. The spa is great - we went almost every day and couldn't fault their service and quality of treatments.

title: Great location, lovely staff but dated now
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for writing a fantastic review about your recent experience in our resort, we are very happy our enjoyed your stay so much.
