Thank you for your great feedback about our Quan Spa and overall resort service experience. We will certainly recognize our Executive Chef for his great efforts and outstanding service.   We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Great family holiday
review: I have just returned from a wonderful week at the JW Marriott Khao Lak. After a week here we then went to the JW Marriott in Phuket for a couple of days before flying home.   This really isn't a 5 star hotel like the JW Marriott Phuket which was grander in every way. It doesn't feel like a Marriott either. Although the hotel was refurbished some of the builds and the pool dates back to its Sofitel Magic Lagoon days. As other reviewers have noted in the pool whole tiles are missing in places and although the easily accessible areas have been repainted other areas look very tired as shown in the pictures.   The room itself was very nice. The furniture a little dated and I always found it very dark in the room even with all of the lights on. We booked a pool access room which…

title: at crossroads for divers
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback about your experience. We are delighted to learn you enjoyed your stay, thank you for your great comments about our service and Quan Spa.  Thank you for your feedback about the resort maintenance, we regret to learn we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards in regards to the upkeep of some areas in our resort. Our maintenance team is continuously working on our rooms and facilities to ensure we maintain all areas in perfect condition.  We have addressed your points immediately with our team who followed up urgently resolving them.  Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Best pool I have seen till date!
review: The resort is located a good hours drive from Phuket airport, however the transfer by hotel mini van was seamless.  The hotel upholds the standards one would expect from a JW Marriott property. The resort itself is sprawling, the beach beautiful and the lagoon pool massive and despite almost full occupancy, it never felt over crowded. The kids club while perhaps not as good as it's sister property's  in Phuket still had enough going on to keep our kids busy when we wanted to keep them out of the sun. We stayed in a duplex room which was double storied and perfect for our family of two young ones and two adults. The kids had their beds set up on the lower floor,which also had a tv, a dining and seating area in addition to a half bath which came in very handy! The master bedroom…

title: Excellent Resort
review: What an excellent resort!! J W Marriott Khao lak is a resort one always dreams of. Big spacious rooms with an amazing balcony overlooking its long and serpentine pool. This pool is 3 kms long and one of the biggest ones you would ever get to experience.. 2 swim up bars where we we had soothing mock tails and cocktails all the three days that  we were there.  The beach is one of the most beautiful ones with beach chairs and ice lollies available for u thruout the afternoon. There are some really good restaurants to the right of the hotel on the beach about 2 mins walk from the resort.. Yummy tasty thai food canbe enjoyed here.. And yes nice  massages available in shacks next to these restaurants..  This resort is definitely reccommended and we can' t wait to get there again for a…

title: A MUST STAY Hotel in Khao Lak with A Truly Beautiful Beach!
review: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and experiences around the resort. We appreciate your kind words and will do our best to make the resort even better before your next visit.   Best wishes to you and your family.  Ty Collins General Manager

title: Amazing experience
review: I stayed at JW Marriott in Khao Lak the first time this February and I am very impressed with the friendliness of all staffs and the beauty of this hotel. A lovely Spa, A Unique Long Pool, A Beautiful Beach And Great Choices of Restaurants Thai, Japanese and Mediterranean.  The hotel occupancy during my stay was definitely 100% but I didn't feel like it at all. I could imagine that all staffs must be busy with all the guests but they are all smiling and providing a great service to us all.   Every afternoon, We were hanging around the pool with friends and their small children and we have our privacy, the pool was not packed at all. Overall we all were very happy that we chose to stay at this hotel. Children enjoyed their time and adult like us enjoy ourselves. The breakfast…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Madam,  Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions of the resort. We appreciate your kind words and will do our best to make your next stay even better.  Very warm regards,  Ty Collins General Manager

title: Best Place for honeymooners....
review: This beautiful resort has a beautiful pool and the ground floor units allow you to walk right out your door to your own little pool "canal".  2 swim-up bars with decent happy hours.  The beach is one of the most beautiful we've ever been to--crystal clear, calm water & nice, flat beach you can wade way into.  Loved the restaurants & massage huts that flank either side of the resort, on the beach.  The girls at Chiya Massage are the best!  The staff is incredibly friendly & helpful.  Breakfast was amazing & we always were seated immediately, outside, with that gorgeous view.  This is a very special resort, one of the best we've ever stayed at.  It is a bit isolated from bigger towns (phuket, etc) so renting a car was very helpful for us to have the freedom to explore without…

title: lovely
review: good: swimming pool canals- hotel overall design and look thai restaurant  dining in room quality and staff service beach space and ambiance   bad: reception handling of unexpected situation  wifi reception at room

title: Nothing to fault
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our beautiful resort - we are very happy to learn you enjoyed a pleasant stay with us.  It's a great pleasure reading your review, thank you for your great feedback about our pool canals, beach area, hotel design, service, in room dining and ambiance.   We have well noted your feedback about the Wi-Fi signal and service delivery at the Reception. We will evaluate these points immediately.  We look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: PARADISE!!! such a beautiful resort
review: This hotel is one of the best I have stayed in and I am a frequent traveller west and east. The service, rooms and hotel itself is outstanding, can't see how anyone could ever complain. It was a special birthday while I was there and 10 of us had a private BBQ on the beach, this again was excellent, service, quality and amount of food, they made it very special for me and a birthday I will never forget. It was not cheap however worth every penny. Other than this we ate across the beach resturants every night, Phenns and also Andaman were very good and extremely reasonable (around £25 per couple for food and drinks all night). Khoa Lak town is aorund 15 mins away and again great food, amazing value and we went in there a few times. The beach is beautiful, all soft sand and not…

title: BEAUTIFUL stay, shame about construction workers
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for selecting our beautiful resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing a fantastic review about your experience at our resort.  It's a great pleasure to learn you enjoyed a great experience celebrating your special birthday - thank you for your excellent feedback about our service, rooms, resort facilities and beach area.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: What a wonderful hotel
review: WOW I can honestly say this is the best hotel I've ever stayed at! The friendliest & most welcoming staff who made us feel like royalty during our whole stay. The buffet breakfast is out of this world & you can pretty much get anything that you desire. There are chefs waiting on hand to make you anything from soups to delicious omelettes. The fresh smoothies are to die for!  The rooms are spacious & have very nice toiletries provided, all exceeding the necessities. The bed/pillows were super comfortable. The balcony overlooks the gorgeous pool & has very modern chic outdoor furniture.   The resort amenities included the huge outdoor pool, swim up bar, gym, business centre & the amazing spa where we got classy Thai massages plus refreshments afterwards. I can't say enough nice…

title: Just a great and comfortable place to be
review: We have been here repeatedly. In fact, that just says it all. Throughout the years the quality of the service provided has been kept at a constant high level. In fact it has even been improved wherever necessary. The entire team here seems to be highly motivated to help and serve their guests just wherever they can. Every single day in this fine hotel is a great pleasure from beginning to end. I have read some evaluations here from people who have missed the fact that there was not more night entertainment. But in fact I believe that one of the very highlights of this hotel is the fact, that they leave things naturally quiet here. No fancy night dances, no loud bars at night. Instead here you can find total silence. You can enjoy the stars at night and a very relaxed and laid…

title: Exceptional Resort
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for selecting our beautiful resort each year you visit Khao Lak!  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback. It's a great pleasure to learn you are enjoying your stay so much.  Thank you for your great comments about our quiet surroundings, breakfast, associates, room service, At Your Service follow up and management team.  We have well noted your feedback about our beach volleyball field location, flood lights on the beach, beach chairs lay out, portion size served in the restaurants and doorman in the lobby. We will review these points with our team and take action immediately.  Once again thank you for selecting us every time you visit Khao Lak - we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Fantastic for a quiet, peaceful retreat
review: We spent 5 days at the JW Marriott Bangkok and 5 days at the JW Marriott Phuket prior to arriving at the JW Marriott Khao Lac. We arrived about 2:00 PM and were met by a young women with juice who took our passports. In a few minutes an associate came back with our paperwork and room keys. She escorted us to our room and our luggage arrived shortly thereafter. The pool side room was great with a large bathroom. We ate at the Ta-Krai (Thai), Olive (Italian), and the Waterfront. Food and service were above expectations. Breakfasts at the Waterfront were outstanding. Sit outside if seating is available. We attended a wine tasting with a buffet which was well worth the cost. We made restaurant reservations at the restaurant concierge desk. After our first reservation the associate…

title: Simply wonderful
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying at our beautiful resort during your recent visit to Thailand!  It's a great pleasure reading your detailed review about your experience at our resort, we are very happy to learn you had a comfortable and enjoyable stay.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your kind feedback about our facilities and service.  We have well taken note of the inconvenience you experienced upon check out - we will evaluate the credit card terminals configuration immediately.   We look forward having the opportunity to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: OK. Not a great atmosphere.
review: First off, this is not a party resort. This is a very laid back resort to lay in the sun, relax, and escape the fast pace of daily life. I would definitely return, but I would not return alone. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because, although beautiful, it is a bit spooky at night. I felt as though something or someone was watching me everywhere I went. During the day, it is a nice place to walk the beach, swim the giant pool, and swim in the clean Andaman Sea. The breakfast buffet is the best buffet I have ever seen in my life--highly recommended.

title: Fantastic Marriott
review: A group of 10 of us stayed here from the 12th Feb for a week after a week in Krabi. The hotel is absolutely fantastic. Lovely setting, lazy river, great layout.  The beach must be one of the best in the world.  Rooms are fantastic with lovely big beds and more pillows than anyone could need. We had a fantastic balcony with two sunbeds with fat cushions and a day bed.  We had a beach BBQ for my friends 'special' birthday with a private chef and butler watching the sun setting. The food was amazing with a lovely setting.  The Czar bar is a lovely place to have a drink at the end of the day. The deli is fabulous for a snack at lunchtime.  Check out the beach shacks a short walk down the beach. I would highly recommend Phen's & Andaman, great food at ridiculously cheap prices. All…

title: Great location, wonderful staff
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand!  We are very happy you have enjoyed your stay so much - it's a true pleasure reading your excellent review.  Thank you for your great feedback about our resort, facilities and our associates.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: a cool lap in Khao Lak
review: We leave Marriott Khao Lak on tuesday morning and would really like to recommend this resort..The location is great, rooms are fine but most of all: the staff is nicer, more friendly and helpfull than we have experienced in any other hotel. We really hope that the management is aware and appreciate what kind of "human gold" they employ. So many thanks to waiters, waitresses, cleaners, gardeners, bellboys..etc. You have alle made our to weeks holiday a wonderful time to remember.  Kind regards mrs. Nielsen, Denmark

title: Great resort!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your recent experience.  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a great stay, thank you for your great feedback about our team. We will certainly communicate your kind comments to all of them.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Phenomenal Experience
review: Myself and two mates stayed at the JW Marriot Khao Lak for 2 says before moving to a nearby Muay Thai camp for a week of training. I had been to Khao Lak twice before and as I was taking friends we decided to start the holiday at the JW.  What a resort, the place is huge. Note it is some 10km or more from the small Khao Lak town which means arranging hotel car or taxi to and from town or you can opt to stay in the resort and never. The decor is typical high end Thai resort and but there is nothing wrong with that. The rooms are generous and the bathrooms are brilliant with both a rain head shower and separate bath.   the grounds are lovely with a great beach (no surf) and the entire resort surrounds a couple of km's of pools including two, yes two swim up bars.   there are…

title: You will probably want to go back
review: After spending two weeks at the JW Marriott back in December 2012 we had no hesitations on going back when traveling to Thailand again in January 2014.   I must say that I have never been to a hotel with more pleasant, and forthcoming, employees. They always smile, are extremely polite and are great with kids. All in all, the level of service at the JW Marriott is outstanding and some of the staff actually remembered us from last year.  The breakfast is great. Maki-bar, smoothie-bar, warm food, pastries - you name it. Probably the best hotel breakfast I´ve ever had. And I was very pleased to see that the standard was as good as during our last visit. This year we actually had to stand in line almost every morning because the breakfast hall was so full. However, it never took…

title: Relax in style!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing our resort again as your preferred holiday destination!  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing such a detailed review about your experience, thank you.  Thank you for your compliments about our forthcoming, polite associates - breakfast, beach, pool and restaurants.  We have well taken note of your feedback about our Food & Beverage offerings, children's playground, balcony cushions and Wi-Fi. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations and will further evaluate each point with our team.  We all look very forward to welcome you back for the third time in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: No Reviews on Write-Ups do justice...
review: I went with friends to this beautiful resort and had a wonders time! I was amazed by the pool that traveled around all of the rooms in the property! I also enjoyed the plentiful breakfast buffet each morning before lounging the day away on the beach.   I am glad a colleague recommended that we visit Khao Lak instead of just staying in Phuket. If you're looking for a place to unwind, this is it!

title: Brilliant Honeymoon
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying at our beautiful resort and for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience!  It's a true pleasure to learn you have enjoyed your stay so much, thank you for your great feedback about our pool, breakfast and beach.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: JW Marriot Resort - Khao Lak
review: If you want to get away, be pampered, relax and yet indulge...this place hit the mark.  The serenity is amazing.  Beauty surrounds this resort and is noticed everywhere.  The food is amazing and you are treated with the utmost respect by every single employee.  This a must visit and must return to resort.  The pool system is second to none.

title: A great holiday hotel
review: They say, "never go back" but this does not apply to the Marriott in Khao Lak.  This was our third visit and we enjoyed it immensely.  The staff are superb, the facilities excellent and the rooms would be difficult to fault.  You will have read about it all in other reviews.  All I can add is that the rave reports are true.  If someone had a bad experience here that was not of their own making, I would be surprised. Apart from the hotel itself its location is on what must be one of the longest stretches of little populated beach in Thailand.  So well done to Ty Collins and his team for making a big hotel so personal and enjoyable.  You cannot but be impressed by what they have created for their guests.

title: For a FFFF hotel this is awesome
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak and thank you for writing us with your feedback about your recent experience at our resort!  It's a great pleasure to read your review - thank you for visiting us for the third time.  We are delighted to learn you had a pleasant and enjoyable stay. We certainly appreciate your great feedback about our resort facilities and beach.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort for your fourth visit soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft  Director of Rooms

title: Best hotel ever...
review: Our travel bureau markets this hotel as FFFFF de luxe. Once our disappointment was overcome we were in agreement that the hotel correctly markets itself as FFFF and an awesome one at that. The high points of the hotel are: - a beautifully designed, fantastic and lush setting   - free WiFi, although noncrypted - ground floor rooms facing the swimming pool, circulating around the whole area - excellent breakfast - excellent and reasonably priced in-room dining service - an evening meal at the room terrace excels compared to any of the restaurants - response to service calls of any kind was incredibly fast and efficient - room cleaning service was top notch - many thanks Mey for the beautifully crafted animal figures made out of wet room towels Points for future improvement:  -…

title: Paradise found yet again
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  It gives us great pleasure to learn you have enjoyed your stay with us - thank you for writing a detailed review about your experience. Thank you for great comments about our hotel design, complimentary Wi-Fi, Pool Access rooms, breakfast, in room dining, our prompt At Your Service operator and housekeeping service. We will certainly recognize Khun May for her outstanding efforts and service crafting some unique towel fold masterpieces.  We have well noted your feedback about the room maintenance and amenities, restaurant A/C temperature and volleyball field. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations for these points. Our team is continuously carrying out maintenance work throughout the resort's rooms to ensure we meet your expectations and our standards. We will evaluate the in room amenities, restaurant A/C temperature and create an alternative game schedule and solution for the volleyball field.  Your feedback is of great value to us, I will communicate your feedback to our team accordingly so that we can improve in the areas where needed.  Once again thank you for providing us with your valuable feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Holiday like a honeymoon!
review: Beautiful hotel with an amazing atmosphere and the most service minded staff you can imagine. Wonderfull beach - good but a little expensive restaurants at the resort. Pool is perfect and very long. Nice fitness room with free and fresh towels and water bottles.

title: Best Hotel I have ever stayed in!
review: Wow. Absolutely perfect! We came here for our Honeymoon and it was the best decision. Weather was perfect, staff were polite and impeccable, restaurant foods were excellent, bedroom was top-grade. Hotel and Grounds were clean and tidy and staff were in the pools cleaning the tiles on a daily basis. The beach was divine. Bars and restaurants and massage stalls made the beach great!! I would highly HIGHLY recommend this hotel. Well done JW Marriott!!

title: great stay
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak and thank you for selecting our resort to celebrate your honeymoon!  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience.  Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback about our associates, restaurants, room, hotel cleanliness, pool and beach areas.  It gives us great pleasure you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us - thank you once again for staying with us and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Heaven on earth
review: stayed at this resort during CNY period in jan-feb 2013 for 6 days. one of the best resorts i have stayed in. We did not have a Pool Access room but only pool facing on 1st Floor. Travelled with my wife and 2 kids( 2 and 5)  Pros great pool for kids and adults lavish breakfast spread great beach... even though not private i dont see any other non hotel guests huge property... even though full we never felt it was crowded great kids club decent food options on the beach right next to the hotel helpful staff going out of their way to help  Cons limited books selection in kids club food in the hotel is expensive dvd selection can be improved- too limited  will definitely visit again... a pool access room is a lot better

title: A family resort
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience.  We sincerely appreciate your great feedback about our pool area, breakfast, beach, kids club and helpful associates. We are very happy to learn you and your family enjoyed a great stay.  We have well noted your comments about the limited book selection at the kids club, food pricing and limited DVD selection. We will review these items immediately and follow up appropriately.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Idyllic
review: This is one of the nicest hotels which my husband and I have ever stayed in (& we travel extensively around the Far East).  The rooms are excellent.  We were on the first floor and had wonderful views of the pools and beach.  The room was a good size.  It was spotlessly clean, service regularly at the same time each day.  On the large balcony there was two lounging chairs, a table and a huge day bed with lots of large scatter cushions.  The breakfast is amazing.  Everyone is catered for with a vast selections from all continents.  Chefs oblige and will cook anything you request.   The staff are very accommodating when it comes to seating.  Even at busy times and always seat you at the table that you want.    The staff are all very helpful and provide service with a glowing…

title: Swimmers Paradise
review: Marriott Khao Lak is another shining example of the Marriott brand.   I'm guessing the fastest lap of their pool to be around an hour!  Huge and wonderful pool!  Tube or lilo a good idea.   Nice to see many foreign staff catering to their respective countrymen. Hat-tip here as the Korean staff were incredibly helpful to my Korean family.    Just one more thing..if you come here, you would be wise to do so in a rental car, as Khao Lak town is definitely not within walking distance.   You should also book a Similan Island tour...(Nov-Apr only)   Overall a satisfactory experience.

title: Excellent, fantastic, nearly perfect
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Thailand. We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  It gives us great pleasure you and your family experienced an enjoyable, comfortable stay! Thank you for your great comment about our pool and associates.   We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Unique pool
review: My husband and I celebrated our honeymoon here and loved it. The property is quite big and takes some navigating at first but after our 8 days we had seen it all. We had a two story suite so upper level and enjoyed the view from higher up. Many have suggested to stay lower level but we could actually see the water and watch the spectacular sunsets. Staff are friendly and helpful. Big Thai smiles always and so gracious. We had two wonderful spa treatments. All dinner restaurants were delicious. We ate at the little restaurants outside the hotel and although cheaper, the food and service weren't nearly as nice as what we experienced at the JW.  The breakfast buffet is a must. Khao Lak is beautiful and we were grateful to be away from busy Phuket and Patong. Two minor…

title: couldnt be better
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort to celebrate your honeymoon during your recent visit to Thailand.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback about your experience. We are delighted to learn you enjoyed your stay, thank you for your great comments about our Duplex Suite, associates, breakfast, Quan Spa and restaurants.  Thank you for your feedback about the cocktails and coffee facility, we regret to learn we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards.  We have addressed your mentioned points immediately with our team who will review and follow up further. Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Stunning
review: We spent 10 nights at this hotel.  Four young kids, my wife and I.  Pool access room a must.  Well appointed and serviced.  The breakfast buffet was spectacular and we ate in a few of the (pricey) hotel restaurants.  A very short walk up the beach were a collection of great little restaurants not associated with the hotel which were cheap and great.  Spent quite a bit of time navigating the massive pool with the kids which was great fun.

title: Relaxation at its best
review: Thailand is knows for relaxation but this hotel just adds to the comfort so much that you are spoilt. I will certainly be back whenever in need of winding down. The place made me forget all that's not required & just enjoy without much agenda. The breakfast restaurant serves a huge buffet & staff are excellent and ever willing to help. We had booked the pool access rooms & took great advantage of it. Staff are well trained to let people enjoy. Service is attentive yet not intrusive. Awesome stay.

title: A Place of Peace
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  It gives us great pleasure to learn you have enjoyed your stay at our resort so much - thank you for your kind feedback about our services and facilities.   We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours Sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Best in Khao Lak
review: Not only are they luxurious resorts where you can relax comfortably in beautiful surroundings, they are also places where you can also feel good about yourself in the knowledge that your stay there is helping the local community.

title: Fantastic resort - the best in Thailand!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Thailand! We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  It gives us great pleasure you experienced an enjoyable, comfortable stay! We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Beautiful and Relaxing
review: The staff are all really great and their English is awesome. Our stay there was amazing. We bought a voucher through an online deals website, and were not disappointed. The hotel was amazing, the grounds were well maintained and the whole resort was in great condition. The pools are great and my family and I had an awesome time swimming around the lagoon. We booked a Pool View room and it was great. Our bed was huge and the bathroom had an amazing big bath with an equally massive separate shower. The room had all the mod cons and had a really good view over the swimming pool.  The beach was really clean and the water was nice. Right along side the hotel are some beach restaurants, which were good for a nice cheap meal and cold beers. The hotel restaurants are great, and the…

title: The is word is out... stunning and relaxing!!
review: My wife and I just recently spent an enchanting ten night stay at the JW Marriott Khao Lak. This was our third visit in four years and once again the resort exceeded all of our expectations.  We have noticed that with each visit the resort has become more and more popular. Still even at seemingly full capacity the resort is very quiet and tranquil.    Once again the staff were so very friendly and accommodating.  All staff members really made an effort to acknowledge you with a smile and warm greeting.  The lush tropical grounds, with blooming hibiscus and orchids growing on the trees, were immaculate. The large pool was again stunning offering both a kids section and an ultra private and quiet adults section. The pool's water was sparkling and its temperature superb.  The…

title: Beautiful resort with excellent staff
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for selecting our resort again for your third visit as your preferred destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your kind feedback about your experience at our resort. It's a true pleasure to learn you and your wife enjoyed a relaxing stay and enjoyed so much.  We sincerely appreciate your kind comments about our beach area, lush gardens, Thai and Olive restaurant and Czar Bar.  We look forward to welcome you back next January!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Just gorgeous...
review: The hotel is fabulous and the staff there can't do enough to ensure you have a relaxing stay. Everywhere is maintained to the highest level and is spotlessly clean. Themed dinners on the beach area involve the staff in a lot of work but have great food and atmosphere. Staff remember your name even if you are only there for a week, as we were. Anyone going there does need to be aware that it is quite isolated but there beach bars / restaurants on either side of the hotel for a change of scenery. We only ate in the hotel but did use the beach bars for occasional drinks. The pool areas are brilliant with a total of 3 kms swimming distance around the resort and 2 pool bars to stop off at for a quick break Like all Marriott beds, the bed and bedding were first rate and wonderfully…

title: Fabulous & relaxing
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand!  It's a great pleasure to learn you have enjoyed your stay so much, thank you for your great feedback about the overall resort condition and cleanliness, swimming pool and comfortable bed.   We have well noted your feedback about the outdoor furniture at Olive and a full length mirror in the bedroom - we will certainly assess the furniture immediately and review the options for a full length mirror.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Beautiful & Relazing!
review: My husband and I and 4 children just spent a beautiful 10 days here with another family of 5 under the recommendation of other friends.  We were very glad we chose this resort after lots of deliberation.  The most important factor for both our families was to have internal interconnecting rooms.  This is a very hard thing it would appear in Thailand to "get right".  We stayed in interconnecting pool access rooms which were fantastic. Rooms 5007/5008 and rooms 5009/5010. We chose to eat at all the beach side restaurants and all of them were great our favorite being bluemist and for beach massages the andaman.  We did a cooking class at the hotel with 2 of our 9yr old daughters and it was fabulous.  Our "master chef" was gorgeous.  The kids club staff were beautiful and all our 7…

title: Great Experience at Khaolak
review: We are so happy with our whole experience at JW Marriott Khao Lak. Friendly and competent staff made our stay so comfortable. The restaurants and swimming pool were superb. Loved this resort and wish we had stayed longer.

title: outstanding value
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us, thank you for your great comments about our associates, restaurants and pool.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Excellent and I will visit again whenever I can.
review: we had our 4th stay at JW Marriott in Khao Lak. Next year will be our 5th. Simply great for families with kids. Great pools, outstanding beach, great Gym and best tenniscourts in Khao Lak. Not to mention staff service, breakfast quality. Rooms are great and choices from pool access, to upper level and duplex "apartment". Simply real 5 stars for families or couples

title: Wonderful resort
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for writing us with your great feedback - we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time describing your experience.  We are very happy you enjoyed a relaxing and comfortable stay. Thank you for your great comments about our pool, beach, gym, tennis courts and the service provided by our associates!  Thank you for your loyalty - visiting us for the 4th time. We look very forward to welcome you back for your 5th visit!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Beautiful, just Beautiful, best holdiay ever
review: Even though Flight was delayed for 3hrs.  Hotel room was good enough to wash away my disappointing   Room was clean and bed was comfortable  Breakfast was fantastic, Dinner was great also.  Remarkably, the Pool was really awesome!  I hope to visit again whenever I can.

title: Great setting, great pool. Expensive F&B pricing.
review: We stayed at this resort for 5 nights in early January.  The best and most unique thing about this hotel is the pool!  Never seen anything like it - it really is quite amazing.  The beach is gorgeous, great for walking and the waves were just right for a bit of body surfing but not too rough.  The hotel room itself was nice.  Good size, very large bathroom and a nice balcony.  We must have been the only ones that did not have breakfast included in their room rate as when we came for breakfast each day, they were totally unprepared to take an a la carte order.  They only had one menu so we shared and they kept trying to get us to do the buffet but at that price we just weren't interested in it.  Once we would order it either took a very long time, had items missing, were…

title: Wonderful surprise
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Thailand and for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience.  We are pleased to learn you had a comfortable stay and enjoyed our pool so much. Thank you for your great comments about our beach area, room and bathroom.  We have well noted your feedback about the a la carte breakfast service, please accept our apologies for not having delivered towards your expectations and our standards. We are in constant process of reviewing the current training needs and retrain on certain service delivery aspects if required - we will review the a la carte breakfast service delivery process and shift our focus to that area.  Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us about your experience, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Great location and service, but room for improvement (esp. the restaurants)
review: We returned this week from a fabulous trip to Hong Kong and Thailand.  The trips origin was the offer to rent a friend's timeshare at the Marriott Phuket (to be reviewed separately).  We snatched that up and used points to secure two rooms at the JW Khao Lak and paid for two rooms at the Four Seasons Hong Kong (also to be reviewed separately).  The JWKL was a wonderful surprise.  Check in was very quick.  I  had requested an upper level floor - we quickly regretted that.  Lower level floors have access to the lazy river-pool that meanders through the hotel compound.  Grab one of those rooms if you can.  We also failed to notice that we were put in a handicapped room, which meant no shower or door on the shower.  A bit awkward but as we were there for 3 nights, it wasn't worth…

title: A fantastic hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us about your experience.  Thank you for your kind comments and great feedback about the quick check in, friendly associates and breakfast buffet.  It gives us great pleasure you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us - thank you once again for staying with us and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft Director of Rooms

title: Good Holiday But With some Problems
review: Overall we have a pretty good experience at the Khao Lak Marriott. The hotel was about 1 hr and 15 mins from the airport and was quite isolated from anything near by, which was nice. The arrangement of the room was also quite interesting- the rooms were arranged in 3 bars and they were connected with a continuous swimming pool. The lowest level room have direct access to the swimming pool. It was nice hotel with good service. However, some annoyance stop me from giving this place a top mark.  Pro: 1) The beach was very nice. Sand was very fine. Since there was no other hotel nearby, the whole beach was only occupied by the guests from our hotel.  2) Massage was also pretty good. We had massage almost every day. 3) Service was mostly outstanding. 4) When we arrived, the staffs…

title: Paradise in Thailand
review: I had always wanted to experience the thai hospitality first-hand. There is no better way to experience the best that Thailand has to offer. The drive from Phuket to the hotel was a pleasure. We had booked a room in the 2nd floor since i was not too keen to have direct pool access. We got a free upgrade to a duplex suite !!! The food, the service, the facilities and the miles of pools were all excellent. Definitely a paradise for those who love swimming and want to have a relaxed vacation.

title: Swam to lunch, swam to dinner, swam all over. Great 2q```Family Heaven.
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Thailand - we sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We are very happy you experienced a comfortable and relaxing stay, thank you for your great feedback about our airport-resort transfer, Duplex Suite, food, service, pools and beach.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Love everything about this place
review: Sawadee-Kop! If you always stay in big resorts when you travel, then we are probably not your best source for advice. But for a traveling family that rarely stays in resorts, I can give you an opinion: We loved it. We stayed on the third floor, which is pretty safe, because we still have one or two little ones that are not "water-independent". But the resort life on this trip may have spoiled us. We played and swam and ate great food, every day, while imply "being" together. It was brilliant.  If you are single, you may not like this particular part of Khao Lak, as its a ways from the town, but if you dont need to leave the resort, well, then this place has everything you need.  Overall, the atmosphere is styled after the local area and helped create a great setting for a Thai…

title: "Wonderful holiday break in khao lak"
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing about your experience at our resort, we are delighted you and your family enjoyed your stay so much.   Thank you for your great comments about our breakfast, Quan Spa, courteous and helpful associates, resort grounds and amenities.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: excellent choice of hotel given by trip advisor
review: Wow - what a contrast to the first part of our trip.  We upgraded to a pool access room and have a beautiful room just steps from 3km of swimming pools so our girls are in heaven.  Let me tell you the website and photos of this place don't do it justice and the food, pools, beach and staff are all exceptional.  If there is one thing that's not quite right here it's the ambiance and staff at Infinity Bar which is missing the mark but it's a small thing in the scheme of things.  10 days here was perfect but I wish we'd spent the whole two weeks here as there is just enough variety in food, spaces and activities to keep it interesting for 2-3 weeks.  We'll be back.

title: Fabulous!
review: We stayed here for a week, with our last evening being New Years Eve, where a huge marque was transformed with 'The Oscars' theme with a red carpet, chandeliers and beautifully laid tables.   A stage with a program of entertainment that lasted into the small hours, beautiful firework display and lanterns to send up to the stars.  Thank you Marriott, it was fantastic! The hotel is right on a beautiful beach where you can walk and walk, dipping your toes into the warm sea as you stroll along.    We had a few problems that were soon dealt with and all the staff were delightful and could not do enough to welcome us.  Thailand is certainly the land of smiles!  Jazzy was particularly helpful, as was Tin at breakfast, not forgetting Teddy in the shop and all other staff, too many to…

title: Wonderful family holiday in Khao Lak
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred holiday destination and for taking your valuable time providing us with your feedback.  We are very happy to learn you enjoyed a comfortable and memorable stay, thank you for your kind feedback about our rooms, facilities, beach and New Year's Eve Gala; we are delighted you experienced a great evening!  We will certainly recognize Khun Jazzy, Khun Tin and Khun Teddy for their outstanding efforts and service.  Once again thank you for staying with us, we all look very forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Great Stay, Fantastic Happy Hour with Meen & Wat!
review: Our family of 4 spent a week in Khao Lak's JW Marriott, celebrated the New years at JW Marriott and enjoyed every minute of it. What a great hotel!  Resort had everything you could hope for and service in each area was outstanding. The best past of the week was the breakfast which was to die for; especially the smoothie bar! There was everything one could imagine and service during the breakfast was very fast and smooth.  Beach with its cosy little restaurants and massage places was great and it was nice to be able to rent the body boards for free and other equipment for very reasonable price.  I found the resort to be clean despite some signs of aging and needs for maintenance. This has been mentioned by many and it was true but I did not find it disturbing as overall image of…

title: Heaven
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort during your recent visit to Thailand and for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback about your experience.  It's a great pleasure reading your review, we are very happy you and your family enjoyed a comfortable and enjoyable stay.   Thank you for your kind feedback about our breakfast, smoothies, service and resort cleanliness.  We have well noted your feedback about the overall maintenance of our resort. Our maintenance team is continuously working on our rooms and facilities to ensure we maintain all areas in perfect condition.  Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback. We all look forward to welcome you and your family back to our resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Fantastic
review: This is our second time at Khao Lak JW.  We were there when it first opened in early 2010 as a Marriott, and this time around it had it's rhythm down (and the plants had grown in around the pool). We stayed from Christmas Eve for four nights.  As a Platinum we were upgraded to a huge executive suite, with the biggest bathroom I've ever seen at any hotel - and in room treats and gifts at night during the holidays were customized and very special.  Loved Ta-Krai restaurant.  What was most impressive that I haven't seen at other Marriott properties that do not have a concierge lounge... they had a Platinum Happy Hour, and we spent our four "happy nights" at the Infinity pool bar with Meet and Wat... their level of attention and customer service, big smiles, and can do attitude was…

title: Luxury resort???
review: Well if it is based on facilities, this is for sure a 5 star resort. If you look at the condition of the hotel, we are very far away from 5 star status. I was actually amazed when i discovered that the resort was built in 2009. I thought it was much much older. The rooms are nice, but showing clear signs of lack of maintenance. The balcony was showing significantly lack of maintenance, the wooden floor was loose, and you could cut yourself on screws!!. The hotel is set in the most beautiful surroundings, and the pool area is very nice (not counting the children pool that doesnt fit in). The exterior of the hotel (walls, roof, wooden constructions, pathwalk around the resort area), was in very bad condition some places. The general feeling is that they are spending to few money…

title: Simply amazing resort if you can afford it
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback about your experience. We are delighted to learn you enjoyed your stay, thank you for your great comments about our breakfast, service and beach area.  Thank you for your feedback about the resort maintenance, we regret to learn we were not able to meet your expectations and our standards in regards to the upkeep of some areas in our resort. Our maintenance team is continuously working on our rooms and facilities to ensure we maintain all areas in perfect condition.  We have addressed your mentioned points immediately with our team who followed up urgently resolving them.  Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Awesome Family Holiday
review: We have stayed at this resort twice now, both times with a TravelZoo coupon which brought the price down to about 3500 Baht per night for a pool room. The pool is amazing, the beach great, and the amenities all very good. Buffet is very large, so mak sure you get it included in your room fee. For other meals, there are several restaurants on premises, a few restaurants a short ride away, and even a few great thai shacks on the beach. Will return to this resort.

title: Enjoyable experience
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort again as your preferred destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  It's a great pleasure to read your review and we are very happy you have enjoyed your stay so much with us again.  Thank you for your kind feedback about our pool, beach, amenities and breakfast. We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Outstanding hotel
review: Where do I start?  In terms of the resort, the place is just awesome.  Love everything about this resort.  The pool, the beach, everything is spotless clean.  Buffet breakfast have enough varieties to keep everyone happy.  The Chef is always there monitoring the flow of food.   Room is always replenished.  Bed is comfortable, so are the pillows.  We are happy with everything.  Staff are friendly and always happy to greet you.  Just minor things; some parts of the building might need a coat of new paint, but we could see that there are people fixing and doing maintenance in some parts of the resort.  Mind you, the resort is huge.   Quan Spa is just exquisite and all the staff there are good and qualified.   Buffet dinner have huge varieties.  We tried the Japanese at Sakura,…

title: Usual great standards!
review: This was our second visit to the hotel in the past 5 months. We choose it for Christamas as we wanted  a reliable quality and we were not disappointed.  It's such a beautiful location with a stunning beach and amazing sunsets. They exceeded expect ions when we ordered some ice for my swollen ankle and they sent not only ice but cool gel also. I expect we will be back before too long!

title: Exquisite
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Season's greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for selecting our resort again and for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  It's a great pleasure to learn you have enjoyed your stay with us, thank you for your great feedback about our beach area and ambiance during sunsets.  We all hope your ankle has fully recovered; we look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Fantastic Holiday!
review: I had the good fortune to stay here on three occasions recently whilst away diving in the Similans.  The hotel really is exquisite.  The welcome received on every occasion was so warm, efficient and friendly.  Check in was smooth.  The resort is large which makes for it being lovely and quiet and it really did not feel busy which it was.  The gardens are beautiful and kept up to really high standards.  The pool is over 3k long and you can just swim around the resort.  My first room was on the ground floor and I was able to just walk straight out of my room into the pool.  The beach is lovely and both here and at the pool staff constantly replenished glasses at your sun lounger with ice cold water, plus mid afternoon ice cold flannels were brought around.  There is an adults only…

title: Amazing Experience !!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Season's greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for selecting our resort again for your visit to Thailand - we appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your detailed feedback about your experience at our resort.  We are very happy you enjoyed your stays so much and would like to thank you for your great feedback about the welcome and smooth check in, our gardens, cool water service on the beach, comfortable beds and bed linens, shuttle service, late check out lounge, Christmas Eve event and service provided by our associates.  We are delighted to learn our team prepared vegetarian dishes as per your request; we are working on new menus which will have more vegetarian items to choose from.  Once again thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Wonderful hotel, gracious staff, lovely location
review: I have decided to write a review on this hotel as we have recently been and we found that even though there are lots of reviews on here none of them really gave a comprehensive view. We were in this hotel for a full 2 weeks on bed and breakfast.  Room/Hotel: We had a swim up room in the corner of the hotel with a large part of the pool which was lovely, the room is beautiful with everything you need inc a beach bag! We had some noise issues but the hotel were happy to move us and when we decided it wasnt worth it they sent us a bottle of wine and some truffles. Some people have commented on the 'run down' state of the hotel but we must say we didn't think any of it was an issue, there were grounds staff painting etc everyday we were there and cleaners in the pool all the time,…

title: Very pleasant staff & nice ammenities
review: A very pleasant trip with a pool access room.  Some external maintenance is needed, but we did witness some progress on that front.  The vast pool was well maintained and the chemical level was just right.  Sure you are a captive guest given the location but there is cheap and authentic Thai restaurants within 30 seconds of the property on each side on the beach.  Prices for inflatable toys, alcohol are in line with other 5* hotels, plan ahead if you want to save some $.  Breakfast buffet was superb, many many choices and no rush with how long you can stay to enjoy the food.  Rooms are looking a bit tired, but overall they are a good standard for Thailand. Lets face it nothing stays new for long with constant use.  It was my wife's birthday during the stay, so the staff went the…

title: Fine but Fading
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Season's greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us, thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your kind feedback about our services and facilities.  Great to learn your wife liked the birthday cake and flower message on the bed - I will ensure to pass your feedback to our team!  We have well noted your comments about the maintenance of our rooms and facilities. Our team is continuously carrying out maintenance work throughout the resort rooms and facilities to ensure we meet your expectations and our standards.   Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours Sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Stunning hotel on amazing beach
review: Starting to show some obvious signs of wear and tear now and the clientele is shall we say a little less gracious than in previous visit. The management seem to be doing a valiant job of battling the elements and filling the rooms with the demand from certain parts of the world less used to international travel - a guest flicking a cigarette into the pool, brash and loud buffet grabbers, face tattoos at the poolbar, etc. But actually everything still runs well and due to the size of the resort you can still find a quiet spot to relax. Dinner options abound along the beach. Worth a visit but the feeling that you're somewhere special is perhaps gone now,

title: Good hotel - but some "need to know"
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Season's greetings from Khao Lak!  Thank you for choosing our resort again as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback about your stay.   We have well noted your feedback about the resort maintenance; our team is working continuously carrying out maintenance throughout our facilities and rooms to ensure we meet your expectations and our standards.   Once again thank you for writing us with your feedback, we look forward having the opportunity again to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours Sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Jwmarriott
review: This hotel is one of the best!    We enjoyed our stay and would love to come back!  Pros:   A very unique setting, it is spread out so you never get a crowded feeling,   There is a separate area geared families (blocks 3, 4 and 5)  so honeymooners, singles, families with young children……. everyone can have a wonderful time.  The amenities are many:  wonderful ethnic restaurants, an amazing deli that we used a lot for meals, delicious smoothies, healthy choices, great lattes, homemade breads and pastries,  and whole fruit at a good price that they cut up and you could take to you room.   All of the Thai workers were especially sweet and helpful.  They have ping pong, pool, bikes, a well equipped and clean fitness center that looks out over the pool area, a business center with…

title: Chris England. wonderful hotel
review: Just arrived back from a two week stay at the Marriott. What a great hotel this is. are room  was brilliant and had everything we needed, and the bed was really big and very comfy. the pool areas are great and was never crowded .the breakfast was excellent so much choice and the staff was very helpful and always had a smile and a warm greeting every morning.We found all the staff very friendly and always willing to help.We ate out at the beach bars most nights as we thought the food in the hotel was exspensive.We thought the blue mist was best great food very cheap and Mr Moo and his staff was great.We had a great a two weeks and we would love to go back to the Marriott. The only thing they could  improve on is the check in we was told we would have to wait three hours before we…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing our resort and for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We are delighted to learn you enjoyed a comfortable stay and had a great holiday!    Thank you for your great comments about our associates and service, we will share your feedback with our team.   We have well noted your feedback about the check in experience and regret we were not able to meet your expectations.  Recently we have opened an "Early Check In Lounge" for the comfort of our guests who arrive early. This lounge has also locker and shower facilities which can be used to fresh up and so forth guests can enjoy our facilities while we follow up getting the room ready as soon as possible.   Once again thank you for sharing your feedback with us, we look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours Sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Dream family holiday
review: We recently stayed here and were very impressed.  We had a ground floor room with pool access which was fantastic.  We had a problem with the air con but this was repaired immediately.  The staff were very friendly in all the restaurants and bars.  We found it more reasonable to go into Khoa lak centre to book tours and excursions rather than through the hotel.  I've read reports that there was need for repairs but we witnessed staff doing repairs where necessary and apologising for inconvenience.  We were lucky that we weren't there at the same time as a wedding as we had heard a number of guests complaining about this.  We would go back.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time writing us about your recent experience at our resort. We are very happy to learn you had a comfortable stay and enjoyed our Pool Access room!  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: 15 days in another world
review: My party of 7 consisting 2 children, 1 teen and 2 elderly grandparents were very impressed by the care and attention paid to us during our stay. The grounds are well maintained and the staff made it a point to ensure that we had a pleasurable holiday. We were never bored as there were many activities in and around the hotel. Thank you, Marriott for a wonderful vacation.

title: Blissful Seclusion
review: We stayed there for 4 days and we loved each and every moment of it ,rooms were spacious,bed comfy and balcony overlooking the pool was fantastic.Bathroom was huge and beautiful ,love the bath tub and glass wall connecting bedroom and bathroom.We had a pool view room.  Pool : The pool was amazing and huge that you will always get the "me" time ,it never seems to be crowded and the pool bar are fantastic offering different types of cocktails.Perfect for couples and families.  Food : Food was great but  in-room dining menu can have better options. Deli was really good and breakfast had an Indian corner too ;)  Spa : We did not have time for Spa as we spent most of our time in the pool.The Khuk khak beach is beautiful.  Location : The resort is located 7 km away from city center of…

title: Great resort for Relaxation
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for selecting our resort as your preferred destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  Thank you for writing us with your kind feedback about your experience at our resort. It's a true pleasure to learn you enjoyed a relaxing stay and enjoyed our pool so much!  Your feedback about the in room dining menu is well noted, currently the team is working on a new menu which will be launched soon.  We look forward to welcome you back in the near future and hopefully you would have the opportunity to visit our world renowned Quan Spa!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Lovely!
review: We stayed here for 5 nights on a special deal and it was well worth it.  The resort was beautiful and the wrap-around pool, in my opinion, played an important role in creating a soothing atmosphere.  I have listed the positives and negatives of the resort below:  POSITIVES: 1.  Wrap-around /Canal pool as it creates a lovely ambience and you can always find a little private spot to swim if you don't feel like going to the main pool areas.  We didn't get the Pool Access Room but we didn't mind it a bit as being on the 3rd floor (highest) gave a nice vantage point for views.  2.  Pool bars:  There are 2 and I think it adds to the resort atmosphere.  3.  Cocktails :  Love the No Rum Mojitos and Lychee Mojito.  Tried a lot of non-alcoholic and some alcoholic cocktails and they were…

title: Fantastic place
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  It gives us great pleasure to learn you have enjoyed your stay with us - thank you for writing a detailed review about your experience. I will communicate your detailed feedback to our team accordingly.  We have well noted your feedback about the maintenance of certain areas, hotel shuttle bus conditions and check in experience. We regret we were not able to meet your expectations for these points. Our team is continuously carrying out maintenance work throughout the resort's rooms to ensure we meet your expectations and our standards. We will evaluate our shuttle bus procedure as well as the check in/ out process during large group movements.  Once again thank you for providing us with your valuable feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: I like Marriotts, but this one is Special! I lived it and loved it! I’ll be Back for more!
review: Very beautiful. Nice rooms, good service, the breakfast is wonderfull. Very big pool - you can almost swim from your room to the ocean =) Lays a little bit "off" from the centre of Khao Lak but taxi is only about 250-300 bath. We has a lovely week!

title: Fantastic !!!!!!!
review: First time I have ever stayed at a JW Marriott, won't be my last. This resort gives you everything, pool side rooms are amazing, own beachfront to use, 3 Klms of pool to swim around. Reception was a little bit disappointing on check in but after that, service was 10/10. Breakfast staff would greet you with a smile on every occasion, "Tin" was very welcoming as was "Apple" who made the best banana smoothies I have ever had. Resort is about to 10 minute drive to Khao Lak town, taxi's and Tuk Tuk's at front gate. Small Italian restaurant at front gate in a block of small shops serve a very good carbonara, not Marriott but good food anyway.  Great relaxing 3 days, would recommend to families, groups and solo travellers.

title: A great escape with minor annoyances
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand!  We are very happy you have enjoyed a comfortable and relaxing stay with us, we will certainly recognize Khun Tin and Khun Apple from our Waterfront breakfast team.  We regret the reception during check in was a bit dissapointing and didn't meet your expectations, we will follow up and review the area and process immediately.  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback, we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Excellent stay with family - really enjoyed it!
review: I and my wife spent 5 nights at the resort and it was wonderful. The staff were great and very responsive and helpful, the room was lovely and we got a room with pool access which was fantastic as you go out to your patio and into the pool that goes around the entire resort, there seems to be some privacy problems with the rooms as people swim directly in front of you and can see in if the curtains are open, didn't really bother us but I'm sure others could be. The spa was nice and the restaurants were good. The beach is lovely and our overall experience was excellent. Also for food there are some local beach restaurants that are good and cheap, check them out by walking to the right when you are on the beach. Now the breakfast buffet is amazing and diverse, we loved it and it…

title: Beautiful
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  It gives us great pleasure to learn you enjoyed a comfortable and pleasant stay with us, we highly appreciate you taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We will certainly follow up to assess our pool/ beach towel inventory immediately, ensuring all our pool towels are in perfect condition. Our team is consistently focused on training our associates for their respective disciplines. We are in constant process of reviewing the current training needs and retrain on certain service delivery aspects if required - we will review the areas you mentioned and shift our focus to those areas.   We regret to learn the event preparation on our beach lawn restricted some of the beach areas. We always try our very best to allocate events to specific areas in our resort, avoiding certain impact to all guests.  Our team is continuously carrying out maintenance work throughout the resort's rooms and facilities to ensure we meet your expectations and our standards.  Thank you once again for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: A truly candid review
review: As background, I am a Platinum Elite member of Marriott Rewards, so I have stayed in many of their hotels, and have certain benefits because of my status.   I booked a 7-night stay for a family of 4 as part of a Marriott Rewards Travel Package.  When I made the booking, Marriott originally booked me to a base/standard room as part of the Travel Package, and said I would need to pay or use additional points for the upgrade to a family room. I said I would pay cash for the upgrade (rather than use points which would have been deducted from my account immediately and didn't seem like a good deal to me), so my booking noted that I needed to pay about 19000 THB for the upgrade. However, at the hotel they were nice enough to waive the cost for the upgraded room because I was Platinum!…

title: Ageing paradise with great people
review: A lot has been said about the maintenance issues at the resort and it is true that the hotel does look as if maintenance was not part of the plan since the property opened. Having said that it appears that now some work is being done here and there. What is worth mentionning is the quality of the service which is outstanding. I travel a lot for business in Asia and the Middle east and wasn't expecting the same level of excellence I was used to. Well I must say that I was proved wrong on several occasions! To my great satisfaction, my demands (all reasonable) were always resolved swiftly. For instance WiFi reception was extremely poor in our room, next day after checking in I called to see if something could be done thinking "yeah right, ask for a bowl of purple m&ms at the same…

title: Amazing Resort, Beautiful Grounds, Will Return
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort as your preferred holiday destination during your recent visit to Thailand.  Thank you for you kind feedback about our associates, it gives us great pleasure to learn you enjoyed your stay with us and your requests were responded to in a timely manner. We will certainly recognize the associates (Khun Kai, Khun Pat and Khun Tin) from our Quan Spa and Waterfront breakfast team.  Our team is continuously carrying out maintenance work throughout the resort's rooms and facilities to ensure we meet your expectations and our standards.  We look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours Sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: A couple of days in pure relax
review: When we first walked through the hotel lobby we were in complete awe! The common ground areas were absolutely gorgeous and lush. Stepping outside and seeing the snake-like pool wrapped around the hotel was amazing. This hotel is well-maintained, filled with helpful and welcoming staff, and just a dream to stay in. The breakfast selection is gigantic and diverse. It has so many options that just a few items will fill you up. Plus you can see on the patio and listen to the ocean waves.  The room is clean, modern, and has all you need. We stayed in their standard room and the bedding was plush, the décor was modern, and the amenities were fantastic.  The bathroom has a shower and tub and surrounded by granite. The room was beautiful, warm, and inviting. It has a mini fridge,…

title: JW Marriott Khao Lak
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa!  Thank you for choosing our resort during your recent visit to Thailand, we are delighted to learn you had an enjoyable, comfortable experience with us!  Thank you for taking your valuable time writing us with your feedback, this is very much appreciated.  We all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Paradise on earth
review: We stayed just a couple of days in this resort because we were traveling around Thailand. We really appreciated the luxury of this property and the excellent service of the staff. They are in fact very attentive to guests needs and they can definitively walk the extra mile to make your holiday a great experience

title: A great holiday!
review: We just came back 2 days ago from the JWM in Khao Lak. Firstly I have to say, that the staff is wonderful. When we arrived, Nicolas from reception welcomed us in such a warm and friendly way. And the staff at the breakfast buffet every morning were exceptional (lovelovelove them), particularly with our two boys. We loved the beach, clean and beautiful, you can get body boards for free for one hour and surf the waves. You can go for long walks along the beach. The family room with pool access was of good size, bathroom nice and big. We loved the king size bed, the pillows and everything else was so comfortable, The hotel though has to do something about the balcony that leads to the pool and outside furniture. The gate to the pool falls off, if you don't open it carefully (we…

title: Beautiful Resort
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings from paradise and thank you for choosing our resort and taking your valuable time writing us about your experience during your stay with us.  I will certainly pass your compliments to the associates you mentioned at our Reception; Khun Nicholas and associates at our breakfast area.   The defects of the balcony gate, worn balcony cushions as well as buildings that require paint have been well noted. Our team is highly focused, dedicated and carries out continuous maintenance work in our ongoing effort  to improve our rooms and resort facilities.  On behalf of the team we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Faultless
review: We spend nearly a week at JW Maroitt Khaolak Resort n Spa,a wonderful time we had here.This resort is really beautiful a mixture of thai and bali architecture ,and the room is equipt with all technology.The rooms were very clean and the maid was very nice too.The service was excellent and breakfast was too good.The beach was magnificient specially during sunrise and sunset.The pool was huge, amazing!!!

title: Khao Lak virgins - now Kho Lak regulars!!
review: Dear Valued Guest,  Greetings and thank you for choosing our resort during your recent visit to Khao Lak!  We are pleased to learn you had a comfortable stay with us and we all look forward to welcome you back to our beautiful resort soon!  Yours sincerely,  Jan-Hein Breitschaft

title: Good getaway...
review: The quality of the service by all staff at the Marriott is faultless. They were unfailingly cheerful, polite, friendly, helpful, and genuine-especially when we rocked up for breakfast at 10.45 and they had already been up since 5am! There seem to be a few whinges in the reviews about rooms looking "tired", and surfaces needing revarnishing, doors to balconies not having handles, beds being hard...Personally we found the beds very comfortable (we have stayed twice now), and the rooms very nicely appointed and clean. The rooms are dark if the curtains are closed-but you can switch the lights on, or go outside to the beautiful pool and garden area!
